T07yabhkvyu:10: yaṃ buddhimatām agryaṃ dvitīyam iva buddham ity āhuḥ.||
T07yabhkvyu:16: sukṛtā [Tib.2a] sābhimatā me likhitā ca tathāyam artha iti.||
T07yabhkvyu:17: siddhāntārthāpasṛtā kvacitkvacid yā tu taiḥ kṛtā vyākhyā |
T07yabhkvyu:18: tām udbhāvya yathāvad vihiteha mayānyathā vyākhyā.||
T07yabhkvyu:20: pravicāryatām iyaṃ tair vyākhyā yuktā na vā yuktā.||
T07yabhkvyu:21: yuktā ced grāhyeyaṃ na eed apohyānyathā vidhātavyā |
T07yabhkvyu:22: na hi viṣame 'rthe skhalituṃ na saṃbhaven mādṛśāṃ buddhiḥ.||
T07yabhkvyu:27: ity asya ślokasyārthaṃ vivṛṇvāna ācārya āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28: śātraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya (Abhidh-k-vy 2) śāstur māhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāram ārabhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29: śāstram abhidharmakośaṃ praṇetukāmaḥ kartukāmaḥ svasya ṣāstur ātmīyasya śāstuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32: [Tib.2b] tena vā śāstrā mahākaruṇāparatantreṇa sakalo lokaḥ svatvena parigṛhītaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33: tasmād ācāryasyāpi svatvena gṛhītasya sa bhagavān svaḥ śāstā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36: guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ guṇakathanapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāram ārabhate tasmai praṇāmaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:38: atītakālatvād ārabdhavān iti vaktavye vartamānakāle padaprayogo 'dyāpi namaskārārambhābhiprāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:47: atha vā guṇākhyānenaiva māhātmyaṃ jñāpyate na namaskāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:50: kṛtābhimatadevatāpūjāstutinamaskārā hi santaḥ kriyām ārabhanta iti satām ācārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:57: māhātmyajñāpanaṃ tv ekam ācāryeṇa prayojanam uktaṃ sākṣātprayojanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:61: tadyathā ya eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gauraḥ śukravāsāḥ sa evaśarmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:67: na hi buddhād anya evaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃbhavatīti ato vyācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:73: atha yāvidyānidrādvayāpagamād buddhaḥ prabuddha ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:76: svayaṃ budhyata iti buddha ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:77: karmaṇy api ktavidhānam apy adoṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:78: sarvaguṇasaṃpatsaṃpannatayā sarvadoṣavinirmuktatayā ca buddhair anyair vā buddho jñāta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:80: nirupapadānām abhidhānānāṃ hi loke anādaro dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:84: pratyekabuddhaḥ svayaṃbhutvād buddha iti śakyate vaktum.
T07yabhkvyu:87: yo hi māhātmyavān sa bhagavān ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:94: ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhau mārgeṇa hatam iti kartṛbhūto mārgo adhyāhāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:104: evam uttarayoḥ padayor aikapadyaṃ kṛtvā paścāt saptamītatpuruṣaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:106: tathā ca sati hataśabdo 'tra na pūrvaṃ nipatati.
T07yabhkvyu:107: saptamīsamāsas tv iha kena lakṣaṇena bhavatīti cintyam.
T07yabhkvyu:113: saha supeti sub iti vartamāne subantaṃ subantena saha samasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:114: yatreṣṭam iti akṛtalakṣaṇo vā tatpuruṣo mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu draṣṭavya ity anena vā katham upasarjanībhūtam andhakāraṃ sarvasminn ity anenabhisaṃbadhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:117: yena hy andhakāraghātena yogād bhagavān hatāndhakāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:126: sarvathā sarvahatam asyāndhakāram anena veti sarvathā sarvahatāndhakāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:131: sarvaṃ sarvam iti brāhmaṇa yāvad eva dvādaśāyatanānīti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:134: ajñānaṃ hi bhūtārthadarśanapratibandhād andhakāram ity avagantavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:142: vipakṣaḥ kleśaḥ vipakṣapratighātāya pakṣaḥ pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:143: atha vā jñānaṃ anāsravam ajñānapratipakṣaḥ tasya lābhena.
T07yabhkvyu:144: atyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye puṇaranutpattidhamatvāt hatam asamudācāraprahāṇīkṛtam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:150: nanu ca sarvaṃ sāsravavastu śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām api buddhavat prahīṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:154: nāham ekadharmam apy anabhijñāya aparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:155: tathā nāham ekadharmam apy aparijñāyāprahāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:156: tasmāc chrāvakapratyekabuddhānām api tad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ cakṣurādivac chandarāgaprahāṇāt prahīṇam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:157: anyathā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ duḥkhāntakriyā na bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:159: prahīṇam eva teṣāṃ kliṣṭavad akliṣṭam apy ajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:160: tat tu teṣāṃ cakṣurādivat prahīṇam api samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:161: buddhasya tu prahīṇaṃ san na samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:162: ata eva ca viśeṣitaṃ punaranutpattidharmatvāt hatam [Tib.4b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:163: anyathā tat sarvathā sarvatra jñeye prahīṇam ity evāvakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:164: ye tu vyācakṣate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kliṣṭasaṃmohamātravigamāt saṃkleśavinivṛttir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:165: tad apavyākhyānam eṣāṃ yathoktam iti pratyācakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:168: atha vā tatheti yathā na sarvathā tatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:174: bhavaty evākliṣṭam ajñānaṃ samudācaraty eva tad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:178: jānīṣe (Abhidh-k-vy 5) tvaṃ śāriputra tathāgatasya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham iti bhagavatā pṛṣṭena sthaviraśāradvatīputreṇoktam.
T07yabhkvyu:186: ativiprakṛṣtakāleṣv apy atīteṣu anāgateṣu vā teṣv artheṣv atibahukalpāntarāntaritavināśaprādurbhāvatvāt [Tib.5a] teṣāṃ bhavaty evājñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:188: bhagavatā tu tasya mokṣabhāgīyaṃ dṛṣṭam uktaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:189: mokṣabījam ahaṃ hy asya susūkṣmam upalakṣaye
T07yabhkvyu:201: teṣāṃ kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi kvacit catvāsrīti saṃbhavato yojyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:204: ātmahitapratipatteḥ sampat ātmahitapratipattisampat phalaniṣpattir ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:216: atha vā saṃsaranty asmin sattvā iti saṃsāras traidhātukam.
T07yabhkvyu:219: saṃsāro hi jagadāsaṅgasthānatvād duruttaratvāc ca paṅkabhūta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:220: paṅko hi loke avasādātmakatvāt āsaṅgasya sthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:227: jagat sattvalokam atrāṇam anākrandam anukampamānaḥ karuṇāyamāno bhagavān saddharmadeśanāhastapradānaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:232: yathābhavyam iti anucyamānam api gamyate loke tathā dṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:234: ye tatra bhojayituṃ śaktā grāme nagare vā saṃnihitāh.
T07yabhkvyu:241: śirasā praṇipatya kriyāspadībhūtatvān namaḥśabdasya praṇipatyārtho namaskṛtyaśabdo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:242: praṇipātaś ca loke śirasā pratīta iti śirasety āha.
T07yabhkvyu:243: vāṅmanonamaskāro 'pi atranuktasiddho guṇākhyānapūrvakatvāt manaskarmapūrvakatvāc ca kāyakarmaṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:250: svatantrasya namaḥśabdasya yoge sā caturthī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:266: tatra yadā kartur īpsitatamaṃ karmeti pāribhāṣikaṃ karmāśrīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:271: yadā tu karma kriyeti laukikaṃ karmāśrīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:282: saṃpradānasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃpradāne caturthī 'ti caturthī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:296: tadā caturthī 'ti ubhayam api siddhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:300: tṛntṛcau śaṃsikṣādibhyaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ cāniṭāv iti tṛnpratyayānto 'niṭ śāsteti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:304: dvividhā hi saṃjñā viśeṣasaṃjñā sāmānyasaṃjñā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:307: mātrādayo 'pi hi tatra saṃjñāyām eva nipātyante.
T07yabhkvyu:309: tena yathā sarvāsāṃ mātṝṇām iyaṃ saṃjñā māteti.
T07yabhkvyu:311: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca śāstṝṇām iyaṃ saṃjñā śāsteti.
T07yabhkvyu:316: ato viśinaṣṭi yathārtham aviparītaṃ śāstīti yathārthaśāstā.
T07yabhkvyu:320: na tv ṛddhivarapradānaprabhāveneti prabhāvaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:323: varapradānaprabhāvas tadyathā maheśvaro varaṃ prayacchatīti pravādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:325: ṛddhiś ca varapradānaṃ ca prabhāvaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:327: nanu ca buddhā api kadācit ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vineyānām upadarśayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:341: [Tib.6b] kiṃ śāstram iti kiṃ nāmadheyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:350: dharmapravicayakāle prajñā pradhānam iti mukhyavṛttyā prajñāgrahaṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:356: rājñā samaṃ carann api bhṛtyo rājānucara ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:358: tathehāpi samakālaṃ caranto 'pi tatsahabhuvo dharmā anucarā evocyante.
T07yabhkvyu:360: cittacaittāḥ anāsravasaṃvaro jātyādayaś ca cittaviprayuktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:362: tathā hi cittasya ime citte vā bhavāś caittā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:364: na tu cittaṃ prajñāyāḥ caitasikatvāt asty etat.
T07yabhkvyu:365: api tu dharmapravicayakāle prajñā caittasyāpi sarvasya kalāpasya rājāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:381: paramārthena vā dīvyati caratīti vā pāramārthikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:385: tasyā anāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ prāptyarthaṃ sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā yā śrutamayī cintāmayī ca bhāvanāmayī ca prajñā sāsravā yā copapattipratilambhikā
T07yabhkvyu:392: ata iniṭhanāv iti ṭhanvidhānān na vṛddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:393: śrutacintāmayy upapattipratilambhikā bhāvanāmayī cārūpyāvacarī catuḥskandhako 'bhidharmaḥ anuparivartakarūpabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:397: tat tu sānucaraṃ na sānucaram iti vyākhyābhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:405: anye tu vyācakṣate śāstram iti [Tib.7b] jñānaprasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:407: prakaraṇapādaḥ vijñānakāyaḥ harmaskandhaḥ prajñaptiśāstraṃ hātukāyaḥ saṃgītiparyāya ity atas tad api śāstraṃ sānucaram eva pāraṃparyeṇa pāramārthikābhidharmaprāptaye sāṃketiko 'bhidharma ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:408: upapattipratilambhikā hi prajñā śāstraśravaṇāt tadartham anusarati.
T07yabhkvyu:409: tasyāḥ śrutamayī śrutamayyāś cintāmayī cintāmayyāḥ sāsravā bhāvanāmayī tasyā anāsravā prajñā jāyata iti anukramaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:412: ayam iti svalakṣaṇadhāraṇatvena niruktaḥ pāramārthikaḥ sāṃketiko 'bhidharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:418: svasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anityaṃ duḥkham ityevamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:419: tat pratyabhimukhaḥ pratilambhāya prativedhāya avabodhāya vā abhimukho dharmaḥ abhidharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:421: nanu ca lakṣaṇenābhipratī ābhimukhya iti avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:422: yadā hy abhir lakṣaṇena saha samasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:431: śāstrākhyo 'pi sāṃketiko 'bhidharmaḥ prāpaṇāyābhidyotanāya vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā praty upaniṣadbhāvenābhimukhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:432: kimaṃga pāramārthika ity atas tatpuruṣasamāsenābhidharma iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:435: (Abhidh-k-vy 10) samudāyārthas tu na tāvad ity ataḥ samudāyārthaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:436: idaṃ tu śāstraṃ katham abhidharmakośam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:447: etac chāstraṃ madīyaṃ tasyārthasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:453: atha vā so 'bhidharmo jñānaprasthānādir etasya madīyasya śāstrasyāśrayabhūtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:454: tato hy ārṣād abhidharmād etan madīyaṃ śāstraṃ nirākṛṣṭam.
T07yabhkvyu:463: (I.3) kimarthaṃ punar abhidharmopadeśaḥ kiṃ prayojanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:464: saprayojanasya hi śāstrasya pratyāsaḥ sādhur bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:468: āptopadiṣṭasya hi śāstrasya pratyāso 'rharūpaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:477: evaṃ kṛte praśnadvaye abhidharmaśāstrasya saprayojanatām āptopadeśatāṃ ca pradarśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:481: vinā dharmapravicayena rūpaṃ vedanā anityaṃ duḥkham ityevamākāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:484: sa eva tu kleśopaśamābhyupāya iti arthād āpannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:485: tadyathā nāhāreṇa vinā prāṇasaṃdhāraṇopāya ity ukte sa evāhāraḥ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇopāya ity arthād āpannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:487: yadi kleśopaśamo (Abhidh-k-vy 11) na syāt kiṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:499: tadyathā anyapādapānupayogena palāśeṣv ārāmaḥ sthita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:500: vṛttau tu hetvarthatāṃ tṛtīyāyāḥ sūcayatā hetumaṇṇicā hetvartha uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:505: dharmapravicayaḥ kleśopaśamopāyo nānyo dharma ity abhidharmopadeśakaḥ saṃbandha ity ata uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:513: kathaṃ nāme dharmapravicayaḥ syād ity abhidharma upadiṣṭaḥ śāstrā buddhena.
T07yabhkvyu:515: na hi vinābhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:519: udita ity uktaḥ upadiṣṭa ity ekārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:523: na tv asmākaṃ sautrāntikānām iti bhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:535: yadi na śāstraprāmāṇikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ piṭakatrayavyavasthā.
T07yabhkvyu:539: sūtraviśeṣā eva hy arthaviniścayādayo 'bhidharmasaṃjñāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 12) yeṣu dharmalakṣaṇaṃ varṇyate.
T07yabhkvyu:541: sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavateti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:544: ityevamādikā vineyavaśāt tatratatra sūtra uktā vargīkṛtā ekasthīkṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:545: evam abhidharmo 'pi dharmalakṣaṇopadeśasvarūpo vineyavaśāt tatratatra bhagavatoktaḥ [Tib.9b] sthavirakātyāyanīputraprabhṛtibhir jñānaprasthānādiṣu piṇḍīkṛtya sthāpita iti āhur vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:552: na santy āsravā eṣv iti anāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:556: etāvanto dharmā yad uta sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:560: vistaranirdeśas tu paścād ā śāstraparisamāpter bhaviṣyati anye 'pi samāsanirdeśāḥ santi.
T07yabhkvyu:565: tatpakṣadvayāvabodho hi saṃkleśapakṣam apahāya vyavadānapakṣāsevanān niḥśreyasāvāptir bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:574: mārgasatyasya saṃskṛtatvāt prasaṅga ity ata evaṃ viśinaṣṭi.
T07yabhkvyu:576: mārgasatyaṃ varjayitvā sarve saṃskṛtāḥ [Tib.10a] sāsravā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:578: yady āsravasaṃprayogāt kliṣṭā eva cittacaittāḥ sāsravāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:580: athāsravasahotpādād ekasyāṃ saṃtatau samudācaratkleśasya sattvasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:588: ūrdhvā ca bhūmir ūrdhvabhūmyālambanair āsravaiḥ sāsravā syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:593: tasmāt sāsravā iti pūrvam evādhyāhāryas tasmācchabdaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:594: anuśerata iti puṣṭiṃ labhanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:596: puṣṭilābhe pratiṣṭhālābhe vā te rāgādayaḥ saṃtāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:598: yathānuśete mamāyam āhāra iti pathyo 'nuguṇībhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:605: anuśerate anuguṇā vartante pratyayā eṣv iti vā [Tib.10b] anuśayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:606: anuśayanaṃ caiṣām ālambanataḥ saṃprayogato vā draṣṭavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:608: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yat sarvadharmeṣv āsravāṇām ālambanībhavatsu saṃskṛtā eva mārgavarjitāḥ sāsravā ucyante iti.
T07yabhkvyu:609: sarvadharmāḥ sāsravāṇām ālambanam ity anabhidhārmikīyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:611: ṣaḍ eva hy anuśayā anāsravālambanāḥ paṭhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:616: tasmān na sulikhitam etad iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:619: abhyupagamyata eva nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:624: yad dhi vastv ātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:635: ity arthāpattisiddhatvāt na sūtrayitavyam etad iti evaṃ codye ācāryaguṇamatis tāvad āha.
T07yabhkvyu:638: dvividho hi mārgo laukiko lokottaraś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:644: tṛtīyarāśyāśaṃkānivṛttyartham arthāpattisiddham apy etat punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:649: atha vā naiva sāsravā nānāsravaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:651: kiṃ te 'nāsravā eva utāho sāsravānāsravā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:660: prahīṇais tair ananuśayānair āsravair na sāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:661: aprahīṇais tv antataḥ parasaṃtānagatair api sāsravā [Tib.11b] eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:662: dārṣṭāntikaprakriyayāpi ca cakṣurādayo arhatsaṃtānagatā bāhyāś ca rūpādayo anāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:664: sāsravāś ca te āsravāṇām apratipakṣatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:665: pāryāyikaṃ sāsravānāsravatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ kalpyata iti saṃdehaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:669: niṣparyāyam anāsravā evāmī na sāsravā yathoktam iti punarvacanam.
T07yabhkvyu:670: te tarhy arhaccakṣurādayo vaibhāṣikaiḥ kva pakṣe nikṣeptavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:672: sāsravapakṣa iti ta āhuḥ kathaṃ prahīṇair āsravais te sāsravā vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:673: yeṣv āsravā anuśerate anuśayitavanto anuśayiṣyante vā.
T07yabhkvyu:675: traikālikārthavivakṣayāpi hi loke vartamānākāle prayogo dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:681: atha vā yady api te prahīṇair āsravair na sāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:682: aprahīṇais tu aparimitair āsravair antataḥ parasaṃtānagatair api sāsravā eva bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:695: tadyathā viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity anenaiva sarvasiddham.
T07yabhkvyu:698: katamaṃ trividham asaṃskṛtam ity apratītatvāt pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:700: santi hi kecid ekam evāsaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇam ity āhur yathā vātsīputrīyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:711: bhṛśam asyāntaḥ kāśante bhāvā ity ākāśam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:715: yo dharmo 'nyān dharmān nāvṛṇoti anyair vā nāvriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:723: apratighā api cittādayaḥ saṃskārās tathaiveti [Tib.12b] ākāśaṃ prāpnuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:726: ṛddhimanto hi cittacaittabalena pareṣāṃ gatiṃ cittādīnāṃ vibadhnanti.
T07yabhkvyu:730: atha vā yasyānāvaraṇam eva lakṣaṇaṃ nānyal lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:732: tayoś cānyalakṣaṇam astīti na tau nirodhāv ākāśaṃ prāpnutaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:733: asarvagataṃ tarhy ākāśaṃ anityaṃ vā prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:738: kuḍyādyapagame ca punas tad bhavatīti anityaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:741: yadi hi tatrākāśaṃ na syāt tasyaiva kuḍyāder anavakāśatvād avasthānaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:756: [Tib.13a] yo visaṃyoga iti viśeṣeṇānityatānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca vyudastau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:766: tena prajñāviśeṣeṇa prāpyo nirodha iti pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:770: yadi pratisaṃkhyā anāsravaiva prajñā gṛhyeta laukikamārgaprāpyo nirodho na gṛhīta ity avyāpilakṣaṇaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:776: yo hi laukikena mārgeṇa kaścin nirodhaḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:777: sa eva punar lokottareṇa prāpyata eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:779: dravyasan pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ satyacatuṣṭayanirdeśanirdiṣṭatvān [Tib.13b] mārgasatyavad iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:786: saṃyogāś ca te dravyāṇi ceti saṃyogadravyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:788: sāsravaṃ hi dravyaṃ stambhasthānīyaṃ saṃprayojanaṃ rajjusthānīyaṃ pudgalas tu balīvardasthānīya iti bhagavatoktam.
T07yabhkvyu:794: yat tarhy uktaṃ asabhāgo nirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:797: pūrvabhartrā viśākhena gṛhapatinā pṛṣṭayā harmadinnayā bhikṣuṇyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:800: apratisadṛśo nirodha ity artham abhisamīkṣya pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:802: bahutve hi sati pratisadṛśo 'nyo bhaved iti parasyabhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:805: dṛśyante hi padeṣu padaikadeśān prayuṃjānā vākyeṣu ca vākyaikadeśān.
T07yabhkvyu:806: tadyathā satyabhāmā (Abhidh-k-vy 17) bhāmā evadatto attaḥ praviśa piṇḍīṃ praviśa tarpaṇam [Tib.14a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:812: nāsau pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ kasyacid anyasya dharmasya sabhāgahetur iti adhikṛtam.
T07yabhkvyu:815: tatra na sabhāgo asabhāga iti tatpuruṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:817: na tv asya nirodhasya kaścid anyo nirodhaḥ sadṛśo na bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:819: anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ utpādasyātyantaṃ vighnaḥ atyantavighnaḥ atyantaniyatarodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:833: katham abhāvena sa nirodhaḥ prāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:844: yathaikasmin nīlarūpe vyāsaktaṃ cakṣur manaś ca yasya.
T07yabhkvyu:847: yāni rūpāntarāṇi gṛhyamāṇāt nīlād anyāni nīlāntarapītalohitāvadātādīni varṇarūpāṇi saṃsthānarūpāṇi ca śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni ca sarvāṇi atyayante pratyutpannam adhvānaṃ atikrāmanti.
T07yabhkvyu:855: na ṣakyam utpattum iti bhāvasādhanam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:856: na hi te samarthā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:857: na hi te paṃca vijñānakāyā atītaṃ viṣayaṃ svālambanam api śaktā grahītuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:859: athānyad idānīṃ nīlantarādikaṃ vartamānam (Abhidh-k-vy 18) ālambya kasmān notpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:866: ālmbanapratyayavaikalyāt te paṃca vijñānakāyā na punar utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:869: teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pratyayavaikalyāt prāpyate ālambanapratyayavaikalyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:870: caturbhir eva hi pratyayair hetusamanantarālambanādhipatipratyayaiś cittacaittā utpadyamānā utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:873: samanantarapratyayo hi tadānīṃ cittacaittalakṣaṇa ekasyaiva tasya nīlavijñānasya utpattāv avakāśaṃ dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:877: evaṃ kṣāntilābhyādīnāṃ paṃcānām api āpāyikānāṃ anāgatānāṃ skandhānāṃ tadutpattiviruddhapratyayasaṃmukhībhāvena pratyayavaikalyāt apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ prāpyate ity udāhāryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:878: apratisaṃkhyānirodham eva cābhisaṃdhāya srotaāpannaṃ pudgalam adhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā niruddhā asya narakās tiryaṃcaḥ pretā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:880: pratisaṃkhyām antareṇa utpādasya niyatarodhabhūto yo dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:882: na hi pratyayavaikalyamātrād atyantaṃ tadanutpattir upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:884: ko hi tadā tadutpattau vibandhaḥ syād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:898: tadyathā ṣaḍbhūmikānām anāgamyadhyānāntaradhyānabhūmikānāṃ śraddhānusārimārgāṇām ekasmiṃ saṃmukhībhūte śeṣāṇāṃ paṃcānām apratisaṃkhyānirodho
T07yabhkvyu:905: atas tatprasaṃgo mā bhūd iti tad viśeṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:908: teṣāṃ katham asaṃskṛtānāṃ grahaṇaprasaṃgo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:912: utpādātyantavighno hy apratisaṃkhyānirodho na cāsaṃskṛtānām utpādo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:919: santi yeṣām ubhayam iti pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca apratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:923: yadā tadānayoḥ prāptir abhiprīyate nāvaśyam anayor yugapatprāptir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:931: tadyathā dṛṣṭiprāptasyādhimātrādhimātrakleṣapratipakṣodaye teṣāṃ adhimātrāṇām anāgatānāṃ kleśānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś cāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca yugapat prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:934: atītādīnām eṣām utpādasya vighnayitum aśakyatvāt apratisaṃkhyānirodho na labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:937: utpādātyantavighno hi apratisaṃkhyānirodha ity uktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:939: (I.7) evam asaṃskṛtasyālpavaktavyatvāt purastāt tatpraśnān parisamāpayya saṃskṛtān nirdeṣṭukāma upodghātam utthāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:945: punaḥśabdaḥ prabhedāntarapradarśanārtha uktaḥ pūrvaprabhedaḥ sāsravānāsravā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:966: śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandhaḥ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:969: atha vā sametya samāgamyānyonyam apekṣyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:979: yat stanān niṣkāsitaṃ tad dugdham iti nyāyyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:981: yac ca naiva niṣkāsiṣyate dhenustham eva vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:984: evam ihāpi ye saṃskariṣyante utpattidharmāṇo 'nāgatā ye 'pi na saṃskariṣyante anutpattidharmāṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:989: sarvābhidharmaḥ sūtrārthaḥ sūtranikaṣaḥ [Tib.17b] sūtravyākhyānam iti sūtroktānām api adhvādīnāṃ skandhaparyāyarūpāṇāṃ iha vacanaṃ gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvād
T07yabhkvyu:992: ayam adhvā grāmaṃ gato 'yam adhvā gacchati ayam adhvā gamiṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:993: evam ihāpi gato 'dhvā yo 'tītaḥ gacchati yo vartamānaḥ gamiṣyati yo 'nāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:997: anityatayā bhakṣyanta iti adhvāna iti saṃskṛtā evādhvaśabdena bhagavatā deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:999: śabdenāpi ta eva saṃskṛtā bhagavatā deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1000: trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ kathāvastūni acaturthāny apaṃcamāni yāny āśrityāryāḥ kathāṃ kathayantaḥ kathayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1002: atītaṃ kathāvastu anāgataṃ kathāvastu pratyutpannam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1004: kathā vākyaṃ varṇātmakaḥ śabda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1010: yadi nāmaiva kathāvastu nāma ca saṃskāraskandhaikadeśa eveti kathaṃ kṛtvā kathāvastuśabdena saṃskṛtā evoktā ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1013: yadi sārthakaṃ vastu na gṛhyeta prakaraṇagrantho virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1015: kayā punar yuktyā sārthakaṃ vastu gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1020: sa hi svaviṣayabhūtasya nāmno viṣaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1024: viṣayo hetur iti vā arthadvayavācakavastuśabdaparigrahād vā.
T07yabhkvyu:1025: yad dhi kathāyā viṣayo hetupratyayaś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1027: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu na hetupratyayaḥ kathāyā iti na kathāvastu.
T07yabhkvyu:1030: evaṃ caivaṃ ca maitreyas tathāgato bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:1031: evaṃ caivaṃ ca rājā kapphiṇo bhavatīty ataḥ saṃskṛtā eva kathāvastutvenoktā nāsaṃskṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1033: yady evaṃ sāsravasya tad astīti bhavati sāsravasya sanissāratvayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1035: kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhir dharmā api prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmā iti mārgasatyasyāpi niḥsaraṇaṃ kalpata eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:1039: vasanty asmin prāk kāryāṇi paścāt tata utpattir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1042: pravacane hi vastuśabdaḥ paṃcasv artheṣu dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1043: svabhāve [Tib.18b] ālambane saṃyojanīye hetau parigrahe ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1046: samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastuneti tena svabhāveneti gamyate (Abhidh-k-vy 22).
T07yabhkvyu:1050: sarvadharmā jñānena jñeyā yathāvastu yathālambanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1066: ye sāsravā anāsravāḥ pūrvam uktā iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:1075: sarvo 'bhidharmaḥ sūtrārtha iti vistareṇa uktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:1081: upādānānāṃ skandhā upādānaskandhā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva madhyapadalopam akṛtvā anye sādhayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1083: yathā tṛṇānām agnis tṛṇāgnir iti yuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1097: upādānāṃ saṃbhavā hetavo vā skandhā upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1098: yathā puṣpāṇāṃ phalānāṃ vā saṃbhavo hetur vā vṛkṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1102: tebhyo 'pi pārasāṃtānikāni upādānāni saṃbhavantīti aviruddham eṣām upādānaskandhatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1104: ye hy ātmānaṃ parāṃś ca vyābādhante.
T07yabhkvyu:1106: tathaiva ca kleśā [Tib.19b] iti raṇā ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1120: samudety asmād duḥkham iti samudaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1124: asminn eva rohitāśva vyāmamātre kalevare lokaṃ prajñapayāmi lokasamudayaṃ ceti sūtraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1125: lujyate pralujyate tasmāl loka iti ca bhagavataivoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1128: nairuktena tu vidhānena gakārasya sthāne kakāraḥ kṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1131: ye kecid bhikṣava ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1132: ta imān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyantīti vacanād upādānaskandhā dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1133: bhava iti sāsravā eva dharmāḥ bhavaśabdenoktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1136: ete ca duḥkhādayaḥ śabdā mārgasatye 'pi prasajyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1141: bhavati ca tad utpadyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1144: ye dharmāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā āryānām pratikūlā duḥkhā virodhinaḥ tadutpādakāḥ prasiddhāḥ dṛṣṭipuṣṭijanakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1146: teṣv evāmī duḥkhādaya āryaiḥ saṃketitā na mārgasatye.
T07yabhkvyu:1147: tasmāt sāsravā eva dharmā duḥkhaśabdādyabhidheyā bhavanti nānāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1148: na hi gacchatīti gaur ity ukte sarvo gantā gaur ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1162: teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ vā vijñānāni tadvijñānāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1166: rūpāṇi ca tāni prasādāś ca ta iti rūpaprasādāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1171: [anuśayitās te.] na tu mano rūpasvabhāvam ity ato nirastaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1173: tadvijñānāśrayā ity anena viśeṣaṇena śraddhāyā aprasaṃga iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:1177: na hi rūpamayo 'sti prasādo yasya tadvijñānāny āśrayatvena kalperan.
T07yabhkvyu:1183: rūpādiviṣayavyatiriktāni acchāni atīndriyāṇi svavijñānānumeyāni indriyāṇi yeṣāṃ cakṣurādīni adhiṣṭhānāni dṛśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1186: yadi hi rūpaprasādāś cakṣurādaya ity etāvad avakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:1192: na hi śrotram anyad vā indriyaṃ rūpavijñānasyāśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1199: ātmaśabdo hi cittam ātmety upacaryata iti vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1202: [Tib.21a] ātmani cittalakṣaṇe kartavye hetur ity ayam artha ādhyātmikaśabdenocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1213: evaṃ ca kṛtvā prakaraṇagrantho 'py anuvṛtta iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1219: parasparaviśeṣopalakṣaṇārthaṃ tu vayam etaiś cakṣurādibhis tān viśeṣayanto darśayāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1221: etasya prathamasyaikasya svasaṃvedyasya vjñānaviśeṣasya ya āśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1223: evaṃ yāvad etasya paṃcamasya svasaṃvedyasya vijñānaviśeṣasya ya āśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1228: lokapratītatvāt tasya svalakṣaṇaṃ anuktvā prabheda eva kathyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1233: tadbhedā anya iti nīlādivarṇacatuṣṭayasaṃparkaviśeṣāt [Tib.21b] kākāṇḍavarṇādayo 'pi jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1247: yatra rūpāṇāṃ darśanam iti vacanaṃ chāyāndhakārayor nānākaraṇapradarśanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1248: na vipaṃcitaṃ na vibhaktam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1250: yadi nīlādivarṇacatuṣṭayabhedā eva abhrādayo na tadvyatiriktā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1255: māyārūpasadṛśatvāt nīlādibhedabhūtā api te abhrādayaḥ pṛthag uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1256: tathā hi te dūrato bhittaya iva lakṣyante abhyāsagamane tu na dṛśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1268: kāyavijñaptir hi kadācid dīrghā kadācid dhrasvā kadācid yāvad visāteti.
T07yabhkvyu:1279: tasmād eṣām api tṛtīyāyāṃ koṭyām antarbhāva ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1280: kathaṃ punar ekaṃ dravyam ubhayathā vidyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1282: varṇarūpād dhi saṃsthānarūpaṃ dravyāntaram iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1285: jñānārtho hy eṣa vidir na sattārtha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1286: vida jñāna ity etasya dhātor lugvikaraṇasya etad rūpaṃ vidyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1287: na tu vida sattāyām ity etasya dhātoḥ śyanvikaraṇasyaitad rūpam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1289: na dravyaṃ ekam ubhayalakṣaṇam iti vaibhāṣikaparihāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1290: kāyavijñaptāv api tarhi prasaṃga ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1291: na hi kāyavijñaptau gṛhyamānāyāṃ varṇagrahaṇaṃ na pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:1296: sautrāntikapākṣikas tu ayam ācāryo nainam arthaṃ prayacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:1300: na saṃsthānaṃ nāma dravyaṃ kiṃcid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:1307: yadi hi sattvāsattvasaṃtānaja iti ayam artho 'bhipreto bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:1308: sattvākhyo vāgvijñaptiśabdo 'sattvākhyo 'nya iti evaṃ vakṣyamāṇakaṃ vivaraṇaṃ niḥprayojanam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1309: tasmāt sattvāsattvākhyaś ceti pāṭhaḥ sphuṭaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1316: bāhyo 'pi hi nirmito mānuṣākāro hastavācchabdaṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1318: sa ca mānuṣīm api vācaṃ nirmātṛvaśād bhāṣet.
T07yabhkvyu:1322: tasya ca bāhyanirmitaśabdasya anupāttamahābhūtahetuka ity atra grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1329: taṃ vāgvijñaptiśabdaṃ varjayitvā anyaḥ śabdo hastaśabdo 'pi yāvad asattvākhya eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1330: kim aṃga asattvasaṃtānaja iti vyākhyātaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1331: tad evam upāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ sattvākhyaś cāsattvākhyaś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1334: caturvidhaḥ śabdo manojñāmanojñabhedāt punar aṣṭavidho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1341: rasaṣaṭkasya anyonyasamparkaviśeṣāt tv atibahuprakārā rasāḥ saṃbhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1349: samagandha iti tayor evaikadeśa iti sa evārtho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1355: grīṣme yady api tan na kuryāt tajjātīyatvāt tu śītam eva tad avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1363: ityādi abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhakāraṇatvāt buddhotpādasya sa sukham ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1366: saṃcitāni punas tulyanta iti sūkṣmagurutvasadbhāvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1379: tatra kadācid ekena dravyeṇa śrotravijñānam utpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1385: kadācid ekena dravyeṇotpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1386: kadācid dvābhyāṃ yāvat paṃcabhir yadā na vyavacchedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1391: yathā cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānālambanāny abhisamasya manovijñānaṃ gṛhṇātīti kṛtvā sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tad vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1392: tathā nīlapītalohitāvadātālambanānāṃ caturṇāṃ cakṣurvijñānānāṃ tāni catvāri bahutarāṇi cālambanāny abhisamasya cakṣurvijñānam ekaṃ gṛhṇātīti sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tat prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:1400: tat praty ete paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante pravacane.
T07yabhkvyu:1401: na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante iti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1404: na tat praty ete paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyaṃte ity adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1407: dvayoś ca vijñānayor yugapatpravṛttir na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1411: yadi kāyendriyasya viṣayaḥ paṭutaraḥ kāyavijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1412: atha jihvendriyasya viṣayaḥ paṭīyān jihvāvijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1413: samaprāpte tu viṣaye tulya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1418: pūrvaṃ jihvāvijñānam utpadyata iti vacanāt paścāt kāyavijñānam utpatsyata ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1420: kiṃ yo 'sau jihvāviṣayakṣaṇena saha prāptaḥ kāyaviṣayaksaṇa āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:1428: anyat tu tatsadṛśaṃ kāyavijñānam utpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1429: ataḥ paścāt tad utpadyate ity ucyate jātisāmānyenaikatvopacārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1432: uktāḥ paṃcendriyārthā yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1433: kadācid ekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānam utpadyata ityevamādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:1434: [Tib.25a] teṣāṃ tu grahaṇam iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī.
T07yabhkvyu:1437: rūpaṃ paṃcendriyāṇy arthāḥ paṃcāvijñaptir eva cety
T07yabhkvyu:1443: vikṣiptaṃ nāsti vā cittam asyeti vikṣiptācittakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1444: atha vā vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ nāsti vā cittam asyeti vikṣiptācittakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1448: asmin pāṭhe uttarapadadvayasya bahuvrīhiṃ kṛtvā paścād evaṃ vigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1452: tadyathā kuśalāyā avijñapteḥ samutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ kuśalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1455: akuśalāyās tv avijñapter akuśalaṃ cittaṃ samutthāpakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1468: pravṛttaḥ prakṛṣṭo vā vāho 'syeti pravāho dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1476: tatprāptir api vikṣiptāvikṣiptacittasyāpi pravāhiṇī kuśalākuśalaiva ceti tadviśeṣaṇārtham ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1493: yasmād rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī [Tib.26a] vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:1497: yad dhi vastu rūpasvabhāvam eva na kṛiyāsvabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1500: yad api kriyāsvabhāvam eva na rūpasvabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1506: vijñaptir hi svasamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ saumyaṃ krūram anubhayam iti vā paraṃ vijñāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:1509: śiṣyasukhāvabodhārthaṃ saṃkṣepato vākyena tad avijñaptirūpaṃ darśayaty ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1520: nanu caivaṃ vijñaptir api avijñaptiḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:1524: ata eva divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca samādhisaṃbhūtam api sat vijñaptijaṃ ca vipākarūpaṃ nāvijñaptiḥ prasajatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1526: nyūnaṃ śāstrāpetaṃ hānir atasyāḥ prasajyate tattvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1529: na cādyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pravāho mā bhūd atiprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1530: tasmāt tasyātra lakṣaṇenāsty avarodha iti nyūnaṃ pravāhasya cādravyatvāt adravyam avijñaptir iti śāstrāpetaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1531: samāhitāyāś ca nāsti vikṣiptacittācittakasyānubandha iti sā cāvijñaptir na prasajyata iti hāniḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1532: avikṣiptacittakasya tadanubandhān naiṣa doṣa iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:1533: śubhāśubhāyā vijñapter avijñaptilakṣaṇaprasaṃga ity atasyāḥ prasajyate tattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1539: na ca vyākhyāne 'pi viśeṣita iti viśeṣyam aviśeṣitam.
T07yabhkvyu:1540: (Abhidh-k-vy 31) idaṃ cāparaṃ viśeṣyam aviśeṣitam apratighaṃ rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1541: evam anekadoṣaduṣtatvāt na saṃbaddham etal laksaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1543: yat tāvad uktaṃ nyūnaṃ pravāhasyāvijñaptyupadeśād ādyaḥ kṣaṇo nāvijñaptiḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1547: yady evaṃ ādyo 'pi kṣaṇaḥ pravāhaḥ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:1549: tathā hy utsāt taḍāgād vā nirgacchatām udakānām ādyodakāvayavaprabhṛtiṣu pravāhasaṃjñeti.
T07yabhkvyu:1551: yadā cānubadhnātīti anubandha ity acpratyayāntena padena dravyam eva nirdiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1557: samāhitāyā apy avijñapter agrahaṇaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1558: sāpi hi yady api vikṣiptacittācittakasaṃtānaṃ nānubadhnātīti avikṣiptakasacittasaṃtānaṃ tv anubadhnāty eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1562: avikṣiptacittakasya tadanubandhān naiṣa doṣa iti ced iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1564: sāpy avijñaptir iti samāhitāyā avijñaptes tyāgo na bhavatīti bravīṣi.
T07yabhkvyu:1565: vijñaptir api kuśalākuśalā tathaiva bhavatīty avijñaptis te prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1566: sa cāpy adoṣaḥ śubhāśubha evety avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1569: atha vā prakarṣagater eṣa prasaṃgo na bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:1577: tathā hy eka eveha sūtre paṭhito 'piśabdaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1578: vṛttau tu tena pudgaladvayena tadarthaḥ sambadhyata iti dviḥ punaḥ paṭhitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1579: tenaikena sūtrapaṭhitenāpiśabdena vikṣiptaviparītam avikṣiptam acittakaviparītaṃ ca tam eva sacittakaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pudgalam avijñaptyāśrayaṃ bruvann ācāryaḥ svanāmoktaṃ vikṣiptācittakapudgaladvayaṃ jātisāmānyenāvijñaptyāśrayaṃ pradarśayan vijñapticittacaittebhyo 'rthāntarabhūtām avijñaptim ācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:1580: traya eva hi pudgalā bhavanti vijñapticittavisabhāgacitto vijñapticittasabhāgacitto acittakaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1583: acittakasya tu cittacaittā api niruddhā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1595: cittacaittā api hi tasya vartanta eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1599: tad evaṃ dharmāntaraviśeṣaṇārthaṃ avikṣiptacitto vikṣiptācittakatṛtīyabhūtas tenaikenāpy apiśabdenābhidhīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1602: itarathā hy apiśabdenāvikṣiptacittakasyāpīty evāvakṣyat sacittakasyāpīti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:1605: tāv abhisamīkṣya viṣṇumitrasya dhanam astīty ekenokte dvitīyo vaktā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:1608: evadattayajñadattagatena dvaitam ivāpannenāpiśabdena sa eva viṣṇumitro lakṣyate na tv avasṛjyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1615: sā cāvijñaptijātir acittakasya bhavatīti etāvad vivakṣitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1617: tvadīye 'py avijñaptilakṣaṇe śubho 'vijñaptyanubandho acittakam adhikṛtya na viśeṣitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1618: kṛte 'pi visabhāge 'pi citte cittātyaye ca yat
T07yabhkvyu:1619: vyākṛtāpratighaṃ rūpaṃ sā hy avijñaptir iṣyata
T07yabhkvyu:1621: eṣā ca vijñaptisaṃbhūtā kuśalaivāvijñaptir acittakasya saṃbhavatīti caturthe kośasthāne jñāpayiṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1630: tasmād idam āsmākīnam evam adoṣaduṣṭam avijñaptilakṣaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1639: ṣaḍdhādhātudeśanāyāṃ punarbhavabījārtho vā dhātvarthaḥ bhavaṃ puṣṇantīti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:1643: tair mahābhūtair udbhūtā vyaktā vṛttir dhṛtyādikā yeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:1646: eṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ mahāsaṃniveśatvān mahāracanatvāt bhūtaṃ tanvantīti bhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1650: upalādike hi pṛthivīdravye saṃgrahapaktivyūhanadarśanāc cheṣāṇāṃ jalatejovāyūnām astitvam anumīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1653: vāyau saṃdhāraṇaśītoṣṇasparśadarśanāt pṛthivyaptejasām astitvam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1670: pradīpaś ca kṣaṇikaḥ prasiddha ity udāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1678: (I.13) pravacane pṛthivīdhātvādayaḥ pṛthivyādayaś coktā ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:1700: bādhanārthaparicchinnenānena rūpyateśabdena rūpyate rūpyata iti bhikṣava ity atra sūtre rūpyateśabdo bādhanārtha eva paricchidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1701: śalyaviddhaḥ kāmayānaś ca [Tib.30a] duḥkhavedayitṛtvād bādhyata iti yuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1708: ity atrāpi yadi vikriyata ity artho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1718: bādhanarūpaṇe pratighātarūpaṇe ca dravyaparamāṇur niravayavatvān na śakyate rūpayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1719: na vai paramāṇurūpam ekaṃ pṛthagbhūtam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1727: tad dravyaparamāṇurūpaṃ saṃghātasthaṃ rūpyate bādhyate pratihanyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1729: atītānāgatam adeśatvān na rūpyate na bādhyate nāpi pratihanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1736: yad apīddhaṃ yad apīndhiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1738: tajjātīyaṃ punar indhanaṃ yad indhanārthe kalpitam aprāpyaivāgnim aṃtarā naṃkṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:1742: apratighatvena hi sā na bādhyate nāpi pratihanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1745: tasyāḥ sapratighāyā rūpaṇāt avijñaptir api rūpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1746: yathā chāyāsamutthāpakasya vṛkṣasya pracalanāt chāyā pracalati.
T07yabhkvyu:1755: abhyupagato hi vijñapter vikāre 'pi avijñapter avikāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1756: tathā hy aṃjaliṃ bhaṃktvā kapotaṃ kurvataḥ kāyavijñaptir vikriyata ity abhyupagamyate na tv avijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1758: vijñaptinivṛttau vāvijñaptinivṛttiḥ syād [Tib.31a] ity anena dharmiviśeṣaviparyayo 'py asyāḥ pratijñāyā udgrāhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1759: yadi vṛkṣachāyādharma iṣyate vṛkṣanivṛttau chāyānivṛttir dṛṣṭeti.
T07yabhkvyu:1761: atra kaścin nāvikārād iti na samyag etad uktam iti dūṣayati.
T07yabhkvyu:1763: mṛdumadhyādhimātratve hi vijñapter mṛdumadhyādhimātratā bhavaty avijñapter iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1788: vaibhāṣikamataṃ tu chāyā varṇaparamāṇuḥ svabhūtacatuṣkam āśritya vartate [Tib.31b] na vṛkṣaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1789: tathā prabhā varṇaparamāṇuḥ svabhūtacatuṣkam āśritya vartate na maṇiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1791: ity evam anāśrayakāraṇatvān maṇivṛkṣayoḥ na mahābhūtavijñaptivat upaśliṣṭe chāyāprabhe iti asāmānyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1792: saty api ca tadāśritatva iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1800: (Abhidh-k-vy 36) niruddheṣv apy avijñaptyāśrayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodhābhyupagamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1803: tasmān na bhavaty eṣa parihāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1804: ya ukto 'bhūd avijñaptir hi chāyeva vṛkṣam iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:1805: anye punar atra parihāram āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1806: ayam evācāryas tan mataṃ samarthayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1815: rūpaṇād rūpam ity āśrayarūpaṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1817: vijñaptisaṃbhūtāyā avijñapter evaṃ parikareṇa rūpatvaṃ bhavad bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:1825: tāsu ca ye skandheṣu deśitā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1832: lāghavikaś cāyam ācāryo vedanādiskandhalakṣaṇam anuktvaiva lāghavena rūpaskandhasvabhāvān dharmān āyatanadhātuṣu darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:1837: āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ tu yathāsaṃkhyena daśāyatanāni cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1838: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśa dhātavaḥ cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātur yāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1866: yadi paricchedātmikā saṃjñā tatsaṃprayoge nimittam udgṛhṇantīti paṃcāpi vijñānakāyā vikalpakāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1869: manovijñānakāyasaṃprayoginī tu paṭvīti tad eva vikalpakam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1876: rūpaskandhādibhyas [Tib.33a] tribhya uktebhyo vijñānaskandhāc coddiṣṭavakṣyamāṇakāc caturbhyo 'nye saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1877: sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1881: evaṃ caivaṃ ca syām ity abhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānā.
T07yabhkvyu:1883: chandaprāptyādayas tu cetanānuvidhāyitvāt tadākārahetubhāvānuvidhānataḥ saṃskāraskandha eva veditavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1884: tad evaṃ sati saṃskaraṇe pravṛtto dharmarāśiḥ saṃskāra ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1888: saṃprayuktaviprayuktasaṃskṛtadharmasaṃgraheṇa tu prādhānyād ayam eva skandhaḥ saṃskāraskandha uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1890: saṃskṛtam abhisaṃskarotīti bhāvinyā saṃjñayā anāgataṃ skandhapaṃcakaṃ saṃskṛtam ity uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:1892: yadi yathāsūtranirdeśaṃ cetanaiva kevalā saṃskāraskandha iṣyate nānye.
T07yabhkvyu:1893: śeṣāṇāṃ chandādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ prāptyādīnāṃ ca cittaviprayuktānāṃ skandhāsaṃgrahāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1897: iti skandheṣv asaṃgrahād duḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1903: naham ekadharmam (Abhidh-k-vy 38) api aparijñāyāprahāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1905: nanu cākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau lokottareṇa mārgeṇa na parijñāyete.
T07yabhkvyu:1911: nirodhamārgasatye api tarhi na saṃkleśavastū iti na parijñeye syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1915: kena copāyena sa nirodhaḥ prāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1917: na tv ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor duḥkhena sambandha iti na tau parijānanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1918: prayogāvasthāyāṃ tu laukikena jñānena tāv api sāmānyarupeṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti bhāvayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1933: avijñaptir vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ ākāśaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:1948: samastāni tv etāni ṣaṭ manodhātur iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1954: teṣām eva madhye nānyad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1961: ata evācittikāvasthāyāṃ cirātītam api samāpattipraveśacittaṃ vyutthānacittasyāśrayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1964: manovijñānaṃ hi āśrayi tasyām avasthāyāṃ pratyutapannaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1974: yadyat samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ tattan manodhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1976: tadyathā sa eva putro 'nyasya pitrākhyāṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1978: tathehāpi sa eva cakṣurādivijñānadhātur anyasyāśraya iti manodhātvākhyāṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1983: ta eva ca ṣaḍvijñānadhātava iti itaretarāntarbhāve yadi ṣaḍvijñānadhātavo gṛhyeran nārtho manodhātuneti saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1984: yadi manodhātur gṛhyeta nārthaḥ sāḍvijñānadhātubhir iti dvādaśa dhātavo bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1994: tāmraparṇīyā api hṛdayavastu manovijñānadhātor āśrayaṃ kalpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1995: tac cārūpyadhātāv api vidyata iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1996: ārūpyadhātāv api hi teṣāṃ rūpam abhipretaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1997: ārūpya iti ec īṣadarthe āṅ āpiṃgalavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2020: cakṣurvijñānadhātor āśrayaś cakṣurdhātur [Tib.35b] yāvan manovijñanadhātor manodhātur āśraya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2029: tad api tajjātīyatvāt cakṣurdhātutvena vyavasthāpyata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:2033: cakṣurvijñānadhātvādīnām api hi sa āśraya iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2041: nānyeṣām āśrayaḥ sa iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhāśrayaprasiddhir na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2044: cakṣurvijñānadhātor ālambanaṃ rūpadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātor dharmadhātur ālambanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2046: kiṃ yathā cakṣurvijñānadhātor yāvanti rūpāṇi ālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2048: evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānadhātor yāvanti spraṣṭavyāny ālambnaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2057: [Tib.36a] yadi hi te 'pi dharmadhātāv antarbhāvyeran sāṃkaryaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:2060: vijñānānām āśrayās te cakṣurādaya ity ādhyātmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2065: dharmā bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanam ekādaśabhir āyatanair asaṃgṛhītam anidarśanam apratigham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2069: na ca cakṣurvijñānādīnām aparipūrṇa alambananirdeśa iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2071: kiṃ tu cakṣurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām āśrayatvena nirdeśāc cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ cāśritatvena rūpādīnāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ paṃcavijñānakāyālambananirdeśān (Abhidh-k-vy 41) na teśāṃ manovijñānaviṣayatve 'pi dharmadhātau prakṣepa iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2078: ayaṃ tu deśanātrayān niṣkṛṣya samāsata uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2079: rūpaskandhena rūpaskandhaḥ saṃgṛhīto daśa cendriyārthasvabhāvāny āyatanāni dhātavaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2082: tad eva ca manaāyatanaṃ saptacittadhātavaś ca saṃgṛhītāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2083: dharmadhātunā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2088: cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītaṃ tatsvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2103: cakṣurāyatanam api cakṣurindriyeṇety ayam abhidharmanayo veditavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2130: (I.19cd) kāryāntarābhāvāt tarhi dvayānutpattiprasaṃgaḥ syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2133: ekacakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānaikanāsikābilasaṃbhavān mahad vairūpyaṃ syād ity ekasya cakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānasya ekasya ca nāsikābilasya saṃbhavān mahad vairūpyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2134: nanu coṣṭramārjārolūkaprabhṛtīnāṃ cakṣurādidvayodbhave 'pi na bhavaty āśrayaśobhā.
T07yabhkvyu:2146: na hi yathā dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ pariśuddhaṃ darśanaṃ bhavati tathaikena.
T07yabhkvyu:2155: śobhārthaṃ dvayodbhava ity eko vyaktyartham ity apara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2158: kim anyad evocyate śobhārthaṃ vyaktyarthaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2162: atas tadabhilāṣapūrvakeṇa sphuṭopalabdhyabhilāṣapūrvakeṇa ca karmaṇā tad indriyadvayam [Tib.38a] abhinirvartamānaṃ śobhārthaṃ vyaktyarthaṃ codbhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:2165: yathākramaṃ rāśiḥ āyadvāraṃ gotraṃ cārtha eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2177: yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2185: tad yady atītaṃ rūpaṃ niruddham ity eva brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2198: anāgataṃ yady apy aniruddhaṃ na tūtpannam.
T07yabhkvyu:2199: atītam api yady apy utpannaṃ na tv aniruddham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2216: apekṣayā vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2219: tad evaṃ sati sapratigham eva audārikaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2223: saiva ca audārikī yūkām apekṣya sūkṣmeti avyavasthitam audārikasūkṣmatvaṃ pārāpāravat.
T07yabhkvyu:2225: audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ bhavati sūkṣmaṃ ca audārikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2230: yad evāpekṣya audārikaṃ na jātu tad apekṣya sūkṣmaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2231: na kadācit tad evāpekṣyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2237: na cāpekṣikatvād asya pitṛputrabhāvo na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:2239: na hi sa yajñadattas tam eva viṣṇumitram apekṣya putraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2240: nāpi tam eva devadattam apekṣya (Abhidh-k-vy 44) piteti.
T07yabhkvyu:2242: hīnaṃ kliṣṭaṃ sadbhis tyaktam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:2247: yā kācid vedanā atītānāgatapratyutpannā ādhyātmikī vā bāhyā vā audārikā vā sūkṣmā yā vā dūre yā vā antike tāṃ sarvām aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya vedanāskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:2249: yāvat sarvam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya vijñānaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2271: sa iti na sautrāntiko na ārṣṭāntika ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2275: dharmasyādhvasu pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyasyānyathātvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2280: tena lakṣyate bhadantaharmatrātād anyo 'yaṃ sautrāntikaḥ kaścit sthaviro bhikṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2285: mana āpnotīti manaāpaṃ manojñam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2287: pūrvatrāsiddham iti īṣadarthena ñaparigrahāt kiṃcit siddham ity ekasavarṇadīrghatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2298: āsannam api hi kiṃcid atisūkṣmatvān na dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2305: teṣāṃ vedanādīnām amūrtatvenādeśasthatvāt tasmād evaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2312: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti sarveṣām āyatanatvasiddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2320: pūrvotpannaṃ cakṣuḥ paścimasya sabhāgabetur ity ākaro dhātuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2324: na hy asaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtasyānyasya vā sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2328: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti sarvadhātavo vijñānasya sasaṃprayogasya pratyayo 'vaśyam ālambanam adhipatiś cety ākarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2340: śarīrapradeśaḥ sa loke skandha ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2341: anenāpi kāryabhāra uhyate nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam ityādivacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2342: tasmāt skandha iva skandha ity aupacārikaśabdaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2347: tad etad ubhayaṃ kāryabhārodvahanārthaḥ pracchedārthaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2352: sarvam etad atītādirūpam ekaśaḥ ekaikaṃ rūpaskandha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2354: teṣāṃ hy atītādīnāṃ rūpāṇāṃ sa rāśir ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2359: ayaṃ ca parihāraḥ kāryabhārodvahanārthapracchedārthapakṣayor spi śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2362: ekaikaṃ rūpaskandha iti na śakyate vijñātuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2366: tasmād rāśivad eva skandhāḥ prajñaptisanta iti sthāpanāpakṣa ācāryasya.
T07yabhkvyu:2367: dravyasadrūpapratipattis tu skandhanirdeśe tatsamudāyitvād ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2370: arūpi hi manaāyatanaṃ asaṃhatam api kāraṇabhāvaṃ bibharti.
T07yabhkvyu:2371: rūpīṇy api (Abhidh-k-vy 46) cakṣurādīni āyatanāni samuditāny eva cittacaittāyadvāratāṃ gacchanti nāsamuditānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2379: yasmād bahūnām eṣām cakurādiparamāṇūnāṃ parasparam apekṣyamāṇānām ekaikaśaḥ kāraṇabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2381: tadyathā dārvākarṣaṇe bahūnām ākraṣṭṝṇāṃ [Tib.41b] pratyekam asāmarthyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2383: yathā vā keśāḥ pṛthakpṛthag avasthitā na samarthās taimirikacakṣurvijñānakaraṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:2385: tadvac cakṣurādīndriyaparamāṇavo rūpādiviṣayaparamāṇavaś ca cakṣurādivijñānotpādane pratyekam asamarthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2389: yadi bahūnām āyadvārabhāva iti samudāyāyatanatvaṃ syān na dravyāyatanatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2390: indriyaviṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ samuditānām āyadvārabhāva iti tat samudāyāyatanatvaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2407: rāśir iti prajñaptim [Tib.42a] apekṣata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2409: daśānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ anyatamasya pradeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2410: evam āyatanānām eṣām evānyatamasya rūpaskandhasya ca pradeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2412: na hi prajñaptāv apekṣitāyāṃ pradeśini pravṛttaḥ śabdaḥ pradeśe vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2418: sa ekaikas teṣām āyatanadhātūnāṃ yo 'nyatama ukto rūpaskandhaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2419: bhavati hi pradeśe 'pi pradeśivad upacāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2422: yathā paṭaikadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2429: yadā tu rūpāṇy eva skandhā iti samāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2432: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yad indriyaparamāṇūnāṃ viṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ ca vijñānotpattaye tulye 'py anyonyasāpekṣatve na dvayānām eṣāṃ kevalendriyaparamāṇuvad ekāyatanatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2433: yasmāc [Tib.42b] cakṣurindriyādiparamāṇavaḥ sarve svavijñānotpattau sādhāraṇāni kāraṇāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2435: tathā hi cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavo nīlaviṣayavijñānotpattāv api kāraṇaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2437: nīlaviṣayaparamāṇavas tu svavijñānotpattāv eva kāraṇaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2442: evaṃ yāvat kāyendriyaspraṣṭavyaparamāṇūnāṃ ekāyatanatvavyavasthānaṃ na yujyata iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2447: tridhaiva traidham iti svarthe 'ṇpratyaya ity eke.
T07yabhkvyu:2448: tridhābhāvas traidham iti bhāve 'ṇpratyaya ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:2452: kecic caittān piṇḍato gṛhītvā tān evātmato gṛhṇanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2455: tasyāṃ hi vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārabhedena tridhā caittā deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2456: nāyam ekaḥ pinḍaś caittaviśeṣā ihety ātmagrāhaḥ pratipakṣito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2458: sa cātmā vedayitā saṃjñātā cetayiteti kecit saṃmūḍhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2460: nāyam ātmarūpaḥ piṇḍaś caittā iheme vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ [Tib.43a] pravartante ity ātmagrāhaḥ pratipakṣito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2464: tasyāṃ hi rūpaṃ cakṣurādibhedena bahudhā vibhaktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2465: caittās tv aikadhyam eva dharmāyatanatvena cittaṃ ca manaāyatanatveneti.
T07yabhkvyu:2469: tasyāṃ hi rūpaṃ cakṣurādibhedena bahudhā vibhaktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2471: na tu caittā dharmadhātutvenaiva deśitatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2475: atha vā trividhaḥ pudgalaḥ udghaṭitajño vipaṃcitajñaḥ padaparama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2477: te hi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt skandhabhedenaiva āyatanadhātubhedaṃ pratipattuṃ śaknuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2478: yathoktaṃ yad bhikṣo na tvaṃ sa te dharmaḥ prahātavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2480: yathā katham asya bhikṣo saṃkṣiptenoktasyārtham ājānāsi.
T07yabhkvyu:2482: sa me dharmaḥ prahātavya iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2484: te hi madhyendriyatvān [Tib.43b] madhyenaiva nātivistīrṇenāyatanaprabhedena dhātuprabhedaṃ pratipattuṃ śaknuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2487: te hi mṛdvindriyatvāt nāvibhaktaṃ svabuddhisāmarthyena pratipattuṃ śaknuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2494: nanu ca kāraṇam uktaṃ piṇḍātmagrahaṇataś caittasaṃmūḍhānāṃ skandhadeśaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:2497: vedanāsaṃjñe eva tu saṃskāraskandhāt pṛthak skandhīkṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2498: na punar anya iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2501: tayor vivādamūlayor adhyavasānayor vedanāsaṃjñe yathākramaṃ pradhānahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2502: pradhānagrahaṇād avidyādayo 'pradhānahetava ity arthata uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2507: adharme dharmasaṃjñino dharme cādharmasaṃjñino 'nātmādiṣu cātmasaṃjñinas tās tādṛśīḥ śīlavrataparāmarśādīr abhiṣvajante.
T07yabhkvyu:2511: vedanāsaktaś caturbhir viparyāsair viparyastaḥ saṃsāre janmaparaṃparāṃ karoti kramakāraṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2518: haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:2520: vijñānāt saṃskārā ity ato yathaudārikaṃ tat pūrvam uktam ity prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2521: atha vānādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2525: cittaṃ ca tatsaṃkliṣṭam iti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ krama iti dvitīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2526: bhājanādyarthena vā bhājanabhojanavyaṃjanapaktṛbhoktṛbhūtā hi (Abhidh-k-vy 49) rūpādayaḥ skandhā iti tṛtīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2531: etā vijñānasthitayas tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānam iti kṣetrabījasaṃdarśānārthaḥ skandhānukrama iti caturthaṃ kāraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:2532: atha eva ca kramakāraṇāt vedanāsaṃjñe [Tib.44b] pṛthak skandhīkṛte.
T07yabhkvyu:2533: yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhojanavyaṃjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2534: (I.22ab) na tāvad eṣv evāntarnetuṃ śakyate arthāyogād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2536: rūpasvabhāvaṃ yāvad vijñānasvabhāvam iti vā na śakyam eṣv eva paṃcaskandheṣv antarnetum.
T07yabhkvyu:2538: na cāpi ṣaṣṭhaḥ skandho vaktuṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2542: nanu ca bahutvād asaṃskṛtānāṃ asaṃskṛtaskandho 'nyo yokṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2549: atha vā rūpaskandha ity ukte yāvad vijñānaskandha ity ukte saṃkleśavastu vyavadānavastu ca rūpaskandho yāvad vijñānaskandha iti vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2550: na tv asaṃskṛtaskandha ity ukte saṃkleśavyavadānavastu vijñāyata iti na saṃbhavati asaṃskṛtaskandha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2551: teṣāṃ dhātvāyataneṣv apy eṣa prasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2552: teṣām evaṃvādināṃ yathā ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2554: āyatanoparamo nāyatanam iti dharmadhātvāyatanayor apy asaṃskṛtaṃ na vyavasthāpitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2555: sarvadharmasaṃgrahaś ca dhātvāyataneṣv abhipreta ity ayuktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:2568: vijñānāt saṃskāra audārikaḥ sukhī syāṃ na duḥkhī syām ity abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2570: yathaudārikaṃ ca vineyānām arthapratipādanaṃ nyāyyam iti evaṃ skandhānukramaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2572: te ca strīpuruṣā vedanāsvādasakter anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2581: saṃjñā vyaṃjanabhūtā vedanāṃ tannimittodgrahaṇena vyaṃjayatīti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:2582: saṃjñāvaśena vā vedanā rocata iti kṛtvā vyaṃjanabhūtā samjñā.
T07yabhkvyu:2599: tatra hi cetanā aśītiṃ kalpasahasrāṇy āyur ākṣipati.
T07yabhkvyu:2600: vijñānaṃ kasmāt sarveṣāṃ paścād uktam ity ata āha etā vijñānasthitaya iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2606: tāsu catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānaṃ tadāśritatvāt sarvapaścād uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2607: ity evaṃ kṣetrabījasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukrama ukto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2608: ata eva ca paṃca skandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2609: yathaudārikādibhiḥ kāraṇair nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2614: vartamānaviṣayāṇi ca pūrvavṛttīni bhavanty evaṃ ca pūrvam uktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2615: manas tv aniyataviṣayam ity ākulaviṣayitvāt asugamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2618: kiṃcid vartamānaviṣayaṃ kiṃcid yāvat tryadhvānadhvaviṣayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2619: yāvacchabdena kiṃcid atītaviṣayaṃ kiṃcid anāgataviṣayaṃ kiṃcit tryadhvaviṣayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2623: tathā ca na tat sugamam iti paścād uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2624: sugamaṃ hi loke pūrvam upadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2630: kadācid bhūtāni kadācid bhautikaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 51) yadi vyavacchedagrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2632: śeṣaṃ punar itarasmād yathāyogaṃ dūrāśutaravṛttyā pūrvam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2634: tad itarasmāt saṃbhavato dūrāśutaravṛttyā dūravṛttyā dūrataravṛttyā āśutaravṛttyeti vibhajya dvayaṃ dvayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2635: ekaṃ caikasmāt punar ekaṃ caikasmād iti yojyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2637: cakṣuḥśrotraṃ hi dūraviṣayaṃ tat pūrvam uktaṃ dvayāt ghrāṇajihvātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2638: tayor api cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ [Tib.46b] cakṣuṣo dūratare vṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2640: atas tat pūrvam uktam iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:2643: tayor ghrāṇajihvayor ghrāṇaṃ pūrvam uktaṃ jihvāyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2651: vāyos tu gandhāntaram udbhavati bhojyāvayavena vā sūkṣmeṇa sahāgato gandho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2656: taj jihvām aprāptam ity abhisaṃdhāyavacaṇād adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2657: evaṃ hy āśutaravṛtti ghrāṇaṃ yad bhojyāvayavasahāgatam api gandhaṃ jighrati.
T07yabhkvyu:2659: piṇḍabhojyasahāgatam eva tu rasam āsvādayatīti na sāśutaravṛttir ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2662: yathā vijñāyeta ekaikaśa eṣāṃ daśānāṃ āyatanatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paṃcānāṃ viṣayitvena.
T07yabhkvyu:2664: na samastānām āyatanatvaṃ rūpāyatanam ity ekam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:2665: tathā ca parasparato viśeṣaṇaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2666: yadi viśeṣaṇārthaṃ nāmantarāṇy ucyante navānāṃ cakṣurāyatanasya yāvat kāyāyatanasya śabdāyatanasya yāvat spraṣṭavyāyatanasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:2669: cakṣurādibhiś ca viśeṣitair yan na cakṣursaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2670: tad rūpāyatanaṃ jñāsyata ity asya nāmāntaraṃ nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2671: tadyathā sarvāsu goṣv aṃkitāsu yā gaur nāṃkitā.
T07yabhkvyu:2674: prādhānyād iti tribhiḥ kāraṇai rūpāyatanasya prādhānyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2677: idam eva rūpam iti lokapratītatvāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2680: yathā gamyeta pratyekam eṣāṃ dvādaśānām āyatanatvaṃ viṣayiviṣayatvena vyavasthānāt (Abhidh-k-vy 52) na samastānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2681: cakṣurādibhiś ca viśeṣitair yan na cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ dharmaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2682: tad dharmāyatanaṃ jñāsyata iti tasya nāmāntaraṃ nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2690: āryaṃ prajñācakṣur āryāṇām anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ satyacatuṣṭayālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2706: tathāgatasya yā vāg vacanaṃ vyāhāro gīr niruktir vākpatho vāgghośo vākkarma vāgvijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2712: kuśalacittasya tathāgatasya vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya yā vāg yāvad vāgvijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2715: punas tatraivānantaram uktaṃ buddhavacanaṃ nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2716: nāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyānāṃ yā anupūrvaracanā anupūrvasthāpanā anupūrvasamāyoga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2717: teṣām ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ rūpaskandhena saṃskāraskandhena ca tāny aśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi saṃgṛhītāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2718: sātirekāṇi me aśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukham udgṛhītānīti sūtravacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2728: tac ca śāstraṃ harmaskandhasaṃjñakaṃ granthaprāmāṇyena ṣaṭsahasrāṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2730: ekaṃ tv etad avaśiṣyata iti kathayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2756: te 'py eṣv eva skandhāyatanadhātuṣu pratipādyāḥ praveśayitavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2757: svaṃsvaṃ svabhāvaṃ eṣāṃ yathā vyavasthāpitam asmin śāstre vimṛṣya skandhāḥ skandheṣu pratipādayitavyā āyatanāny āyataneṣu dhātavo dhātuṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:2775: tasyālobhasya parivāro 'nuparivartirūpaṃ rūpaskandho vedanāsaṃjñe vedanāsaṃjñāskandhau cetanādayaḥ saṃprayuktā jātyādayaś ca viprayuktāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2776: vijñānaṃ cātra kalāpe vijñānaskandha iti paṃcaskandhasvabhāvāni tāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2779: saparivārāṇi tu paṃcasvabhāvatvān manodharmāyatanena pūrvavat vyākhyātavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2786: katamāni iha bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2788: yathāyathāsya śāstā anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī dharmaṃ deśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2789: tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṃvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṃvedī ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2800: yatra sthitasya bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā anupasthitā smṛtir upatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:2804: punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayaty anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī.
T07yabhkvyu:2805: api tu yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:2806: yathāyathā tān yathāśrutān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptāṃ vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:2810: punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī.
T07yabhkvyu:2811: nāpi yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:2812: api tu yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2813: yathāyathā yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2814: tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṃvedī bhavatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2817: punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāstā pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2819: api tu yathāśrutān yāvad yathāparyavāptān cintayati tulayati upaparīkṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:2820: [Tib.50a] yathāyathā yathāśrutān yāvad yathāparyavāptān cintayati yāvad upaparīkṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:2824: punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāsteti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2825: nāpi svādhyāyaṃ nāpi parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayati nāpi cintayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2826: api tv anenānyatamaṃ bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtaṃ subhāvitaṃ sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2827: tadyathā vinīlakaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 55) vā vipūyakaṃ vā vyādhmātakaṃ vā vipaṭumakaṃ vā vilohitakaṃ vā vikhāditakaṃ vā vikṣiptakaṃ vā asthi vā asthisaṃkalikā
T07yabhkvyu:2828: yathāyathā khalv anenānyatamānyatamaṃ bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ pūrvavat yāvat supratividdham.
T07yabhkvyu:2829: tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthaprativedī bhavati pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2836: manodharmāyatane tu prajñāparivārabhūte sarvatrasthe iti tribhiḥ saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2842: arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2845: anayor dvayor āyatanayor asaṃjñisattvā daśabhir āyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2847: bhavati hi cyutyupapattikālayos teṣāṃ manaāyatanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2858: evaṃ yāvan manodhātuṃ dharmadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2859: itīmān ānandāṣṭādaśa dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2860: ṣaḍ api dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2861: pṛthivīdhātum abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2862: aparān api ṣaḍ dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2863: kāmadhātuṃ vyāpādadhātuṃ [Tib.51a] vihiṃsādhātuṃ naiṣkramyadhātum avyāpādadhātum avihiṃsādhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2864: aparān api ṣaḍ dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2865: sukhadhātuṃ duḥkhadhātuṃ saumanasyadhātuṃ daurmanasyadhātum upekṣādhātum avidyādhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2868: trīṇy api dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2870: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2872: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2873: atītaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 56) dhātum anāgataṃ dhātuṃ pratyutpannaṃ dhātuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2874: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2875: hīnaṃ dhātuṃ madhyamaṃ dhātuṃ praṇītaṃ dhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2876: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2877: kuśalaṃ dhātum akuśalaṃ avyākṛtaṃ dhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2878: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2879: śaikṣaṃ dhātum aśaikṣaṃ dhātuṃ naivaśaikṣaṃnāśaikṣaṃ dhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2880: dvāv api dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2882: aparāv api dvau dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ dhātum asaṃskṛtaṃ dhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2883: imau dvau dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2885: itīmāny atrābhisaṃbandhīni vākyāni pratyekaṃ madhye 'pi paṭhitavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2886: vistarabhayāt tu mayā na likhitānīti bodhavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2888: aṣṭādaśa tāvad dhātavas ta eva ta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2894: kāmadhātvādīnāṃ tu ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmadhātuḥ kāmarāga ihābhipretaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2898: sukhadhātvādīnām api ṣaṇṇāṃ tasminn eva saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2904: rūpadhātvādīnāṃ tu trayāṇāṃ dvayor uktaḥ saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2906: atītadhātvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekam aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2907: hīnādayas trayo dhātavaḥ kāmadhātvādaya eveti eṣām uktaḥ saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2908: kuśalādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ kuśalākuśaladhātvo rūpaśabdadharmadhātuṣu saptasu ca cittadhātuṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:2923: nanu ca vijñānadhātor apy uktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2927: vijñānadhātus tu kim iha kiṃcid eva vijñānam ity abhipretaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2932: tathā hi ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti sūtrāntaram uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:2933: ity anayā buddhyābhihitaṃ dvayor lakṣaṇam anuktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2940: svamataṃ tu sapratighadravyābhāvamātram ākāśam iti abhiprāyo lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2946: atyarthaṃ hanti hanyate ceti aghaṃ nairuktena vidhinā.
T07yabhkvyu:2947: atyarthaśabdasya akārādeśaḥ kṛto hanteś ca ghādeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2952: svamataṃ tu yat tat paścād ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2955: anyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātān na pratihanyate 'nyad rūpam asminn iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:2958: aghaṃ ca tat sāmantakaṃ ca tad iti aghasāmantakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2967: ṣaṭ khalu dhātūn pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntir iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2980: yena viśeṣeṇa yogāt tad vastu tathā nidarśayituṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2982: vacanena parasya cakṣurvijñānām utpannaṃ vā nidarśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2983: tena saha vartate sanidarśana eko rūpadhātur atrāṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:2984: rūpadhātur evaikaḥ sanidarśana ity avadhāraṇād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2986: anena cāsya sanidarśanatvena prādhānyam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2988: ete ca sanidarśanatvādayaḥ prabhedāḥ prāyeṇa sūtroktā eva pradarśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:2991: catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpaprasādaḥ rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2992: yāvat kāyo bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2993: mano bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ arūpy anidarśanam apratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2995: catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpi sanidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2997: catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2999: catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3001: ekādaśabhir āyatanair asaṃgṛhītaṃ arūpy anidarśanam apratigham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3002: ete ca prabhedā dhātūnām eva ā prathamakośasthānaparisamāpteḥ kathyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3009: daśeti cakṣurdhātvādayaḥ paṃca tadviṣayadhātavaś ca paṃca ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:3011: sa cāpi hi rūpīti śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3013: rūpiṇa evety avadhāraṇāt tannirāsaḥ kṛto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3014: ye hi dhātavo rūpisvabhāvā eva te grahītavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3032: mārjārādīnām ity ādigrahaṇena cauramanuṣyādīnāṃ vyāghrādīnāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3037: tac ca svacittacaittān praty āśrayabhāvaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3041: viṣayaḥ punaś cakṣurādīnām api na kevalaṃ cittacaittānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3043: yo hi loke yataḥ pareṇa na pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3044: sa tatra pratihanyate kāṣṭhe kuḍye vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3045: tathā cakṣurādi viṣayāt pareṇa na kāritraṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:3046: viṣaya eva tu karoti tasmāt tatra pratihanyata ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3053: atrāvaraṇapratighātena te daśa dhātavaḥ sapratighā abhipretāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3054: tatra viṣayālambanapratighātābhyāṃ cittacaittānām api sapratighatvaprasaṃgāt catuṣkoṭikaḥ praśnaś catuṣkoṇaś catuḥprakāra ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3056: yadi praśnasya paścādbhāgaṃ gṛhītvā visarjanāyottiṣṭhate sa paścātpādakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3057: yadi pūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhītvā sa pūrvapādakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3070: svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandhanalakṣaṇena pratighātena sapratighatvād ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:3075: yatrotpitsor manasaḥ pratighāto na śakyate paraiḥ kartuṃ yathā manodhātor dharmadhātoś ca manovijñānotpattau [Tib.55a] antarāvaraṇaṃ na śakyate paraiḥ kartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3094: kutsitāc chalitā gatā apakrāntā iti kuśalāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3095: prajñā vā kuśa iva tīkṣṇeti kuśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3113: tābhyāṃ kuśalākuśalacittasamutthābhyāṃ rūpaśabdadhātubhyām anyau rūpaśabdadhātū avyākṛtacittasamutthau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṃgṛhītau vijñaptyasaṃgṛhītau
T07yabhkvyu:3138: atrācāryo bhadantaśrīlātamatam anādṛtya vaibhāṣikamataṃ sāvakāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā viniścayam ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3149: yathā hi strīpuruṣendriyaviṣayo niḥprayojanatvena avidyamānasvagrāhako bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3157: tābhyāṃ ghrāṇajihvendriyābhyāṃ [Tib.56b] vinā śarīraśobhaiva na syāt vāgvijñaptiś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3166: adhiṣṭhānenaivāśrayaśobhā vacanaṃ ca bhavati nendriyeṇeti saprayojanatvasya hetor asiddhatāṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:3183: evam atra saprayojanatvavādini vaibhāṣikadeśīye kasmiṃścin niṣiddhe yad etad ādāv uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3184: evaṃ tarhi ghrāṇajihvendriyayor apy abhāvaprasaṃgaḥ niḥprayojanatvād iti taddūṣaṇābhāsatāṃ darśayanto vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3203: puruṣendriyam api vā kiṃ nirvartata ity ācārya eva vikalpaṃ vāhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:3205: yadi niḥprayojanā hetum antareṇāpi vā ghrāṇajihvendriyayor utpattiḥ puruṣendriyam api vā na nirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3210: ācāryas tu puruṣendriyam api kiṃ na nirvartata ity anena tasya pakṣasya dharmiviśeṣaviparyayaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:3219: tadanumānabādhanān na viparyety asmākam eṣā pratijñā.
T07yabhkvyu:3220: yadi dṛṣṭaṃ na bādhata iti naiyāyikasiddhāntād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3229: teṣāṃ kiṃ na śobhate śobhata evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3231: na ca prayojanavaśād utpattir iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3232: vaibhāṣikair aśobhākaratvād iti bruvadbhir arthāpattyaitat pratijñātaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3245: [Tib.58a] tathā hi bhagavatā rūpāvacarāḥ sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyā iti uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3250: yāni tatra rūpadhātau ghrāṇendriyādirahitāni cakṣurādīni tair ahīnendriyā iti sūtrārthaparigrahād avirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3254: eva tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 63) rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye na tu gandharasau.
T07yabhkvyu:3255: ātmabhāvamukhena hi svasaṃtānamukhena ṣaḍāyatane cakṣurādike tṛṣṇāsamudācārḥ prāṇināṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3261: anena ca na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye nirhetukatvād iti yat sādhanam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3267: tasmāt tasmāt tatra na tṛṣṇāpūrvakaṃ karma bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3269: tatra puruṣendriyaṃ nāsti nirhetukāṃkurādivad iti siddhaṃ rūpadhātau caturdaśaiva dhātava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3273: [Tib.58b] evārūpyāptā ity avadhāraṇād anye dhātavo na santīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3275: ato daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca rūpādayaś cāpi paṃca na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:3276: tadāśrayālambanāś ca paṃca vijñānadhātavo na santīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3277: te cakṣurādayo rūpādayaś ca yathākramam āśrayā ālambanāni ca yeṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3279: āśrayāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnām ālambanānāṃ ca rūpādīnāṃ abhāvāt te 'pi cakṣurvijñānādidhātavas tatra na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:3282: eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3286: nanv eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3290: śeṣāṃ sāsravā evānāsravā eva vā syur ity āśaṃkāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3300: vitarkavicārau saṃprayuktakadharmadhātusvabhāvau tayor atra grahaṇaprasaṃga iti parivarjyete.
T07yabhkvyu:3303: tadanyas tu (Abhidh-k-vy 64) triṣv api prakāreṣu nāntarbhavatīti vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:3304: te ete manodhātvādayaḥ saṃprayuktadharmadhātuparyantāḥ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne sasāmantake maule savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ vitarkavicārasaṃprayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3307: ata eva dvitīyāt prabhṛti yāvad bhavāgraṃ tayor abhāvād avitarkā avicārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3309: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ traidhātukarūpacittaviprayuktā asaṃskṛtāś ca dhyānāntare ca vicāraḥ avitarko.
T07yabhkvyu:3313: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko vicāraḥ prathame tāvat prakāre nāntarbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3315: sa hi savitarkaḥ saṃbhavati na tu savicāro vicārasaṃprayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3322: sa hi yady api avicāro dvitīyavicārābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3324: sa kathaṃ vaktavya ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3329: yasmāt savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ bhūmau vicāra eva caturthaḥ prakāro bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3334: te 'vitarkā vicāramātrā vā avitarkā avicārāḥ syur iti āśaṃkāyām avadhārya tadubhayavarjitā eva śeṣā avitarkā avicārā evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3336: cakṣurvijñānasamaṃgī nīlaṃ vijānāti nohati nīlam iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3339: svābhiprāyas tu cetanāprajñāviśeṣa eva vitarka iti na svabhāvavikalpo 'nyo dharmo 'stīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3344: pratyavekṣako manojalpas tathaiva yā cittasya sūkṣmatā.
T07yabhkvyu:3347: tad iti vākyopanyāse nipātas tasmādarthe vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3350: sa eṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃprayogato 'sti tasmāt savikalpā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3354: pādatraye cchinne ekasminn api pāde saty (Abhidh-k-vy 65) apādaka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3357: sā mānasy asamāhitā prajñā śrutacintāmayy upapattipratilaṃbhikā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3363: rūpaṃ vedanā anityaṃ duḥkham ityādyabhinirūpaṇāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3364: samāhitā tu bhāvanāmayī nāmanapekṣyālambane pravartata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3374: saptaiva sālambanāḥ sālambanā eva ca sapteti.
T07yabhkvyu:3381: yasmāc ca saptaiva sālambanā dharmārdhaṃ caiva sālambanam iti avadhāraṇam asti tasmāc ccheṣā rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś cāsaṃyukto 'nālambanā iti siddham ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3382: tathā hy anavadhāraṇe hy ayam artho na sidhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:3389: te ca sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś ca yasyārdhaṃ sālambanam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3395: cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca śabdavarjyāś ca rūpādayaś catvāra iti nava te dvidhaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:3402: cakṣurdhātvādīnām anugrahopaghātābhyām aṃjanādipāṇighātādilakṣaṇābhyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 66) cittacaittānām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3403: cittacaittānāṃ cānugrahopaghātābhyāṃ saumanasyadaurmanasyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ cakṣurdhātvādīnām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3404: atas te cittacaittair adhiṣṭhānabhāvenopagṛhītā ucyante svīkṛtā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3405: yal loke sacetanam iti sajīvam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3408: spraṣṭavyam eva dvividhaṃ dvividham eva spraṣṭavyam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:3414: tasmāc cheṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś cāvijñaptivarjyo nobhayatheti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3417: ślakṣṇatvādayas tatra cakṣurādayaś ca na bhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:3418: khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāc ca pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātuṣv anye dharmāś cakṣurādayo nāntarbhāvaṃ gacchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3420: catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur [Tib.61b] abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3425: varṇādayas tu draṣṭavyāḥ śrotavyā ghrātavyāḥ svādayitavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3431: syān mataṃ te 'pi varṇādayaḥ spraṣṭavyā ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3437: katham iti vistareṇa yāvad idam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3438: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratigham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3439: śeṣaṃ cakṣurādyāyatanaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭam ādarśitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3440: yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3441: yac cakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭakharagataṃ kharaprakāra ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3448: [Tib.62a] ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 67) bhikṣo puruṣa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3449: garbhāvakrāntisūtre kalalādyavasthāyām iti bhūtamātropadeśān na bhautikam astīti codyam āśaṃkyāha.
T07yabhkvyu:3454: manodhātur api mūlasattvaṃ manaḥsparśāyatanasya tata utpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3456: vijñānadhātoś ca caitasikānām āśrayatvāt ta eva mūlasattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3460: ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānīti cakṣuḥsprarśāyatanaṃ yāvan manaḥsparśāyatanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3461: ato vijñāyate mūlasattvadravyasaṃdarśanārthatvāt ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3463: nanu ca yathā vijñānadhātor avyatiriktam api manaḥsparśāyatanaṃ punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3464: evaṃ cakṣurādīny api caturdhātvavyatiriktāni punar ucyerann iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3467: yadi hi pṛthivīdhātvādaya eva sparśāyatanāni abhaviṣyan bhūtāny eva sparśāyatanānīty evāvakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:3477: yadi ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti yathābhūtam eva dravyāṇi gṛhyeran nānyāni tadāśritāni dravyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:3487: na ca yuktaṃ cittam eva caittā ity abhyupagantuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3489: saṃjñā vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaś cittaniśrita iti sūtravacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3499: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:3500: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:3501: sadveṣaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3508: anye tu dhātavo 'smād avadhāraṇān na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3510: tathā hi tula unmāna ity asya dhātos tolayatīti rūpaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3512: tulāṃ karoti tulayatīti prātipadikadhātor etad rūpam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3513: karmaṇi ca tulya iti rūpaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3524: tasya vibhaktotpādanaṃ vibhaktajananaṃ yat sa chedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3525: kṣaṇikānāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ vināpi paraśvādinā cchedo bhavaty eva.
T07yabhkvyu:3529: tatra dhātucatuṣṭayam avacchinatti chidyate vety avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:3533: atra na cakṣurindriyādīnīti vaktavye kasmāt kāyendriyādīnīti vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3534: yasmāt kāyendriye parisphuṭaś chedo bhavati yadi bhaved ity ataḥ [Tib.63b] kāyendriyapurassarāṇīndriyāṇi kathyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3539: na hīndriyāṇi dvidhā bhavanti chinnasyāṃgasya kāyād apagatasya nirindriyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3541: nirindriyaṃ tad aṃgaṃ yac chinnaṃ kāyād apagatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3542: yasmāt tat pratītya spraṣṭavyādikaṃ ca kāyādivijñānānupapattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3543: kathaṃ tarhi chinnena punar lagnena nāsikāgreṇa kāyavijñānotpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3545: katham iha gṛhagodhikādīnāṃ pucchāni chinnāni spandante yadi tatra kāyendriyaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:3546: vāyadhātor eṣa vikāro naitat kāyendriyasya karmety avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3552: ity evaṃśabdena tad eva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tathātvena pradarśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3554: ca cendriyānāṃ na bhavati maṇiprabhāvad acchatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3555: na hi tāni kāṣṭhādivac carmādivad vā vikriyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3558: tulādibhūtaṃ ca tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tulayati nendriyāṇi tathaivācchatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3559: amūrtānāṃ tu dhātūnām amūrtatvād eva chedādyasaṃbhava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3565: ity uttaratrāpīdam anuvartate na śabda uccheditvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3566: tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:3570: tatrāpi samastasya tulāvanatihetutvād ity ekeṣām abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3571: tejodhātūr eva dagdhā gurutvam eva ca tulyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3580: vipākajaupacayikā eva paṃcādhyātmikā na naiṣyandikā ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3583: vipākajā aupacayikāś ca yady api naiṣyandikā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3588: ye tu svahetusadṛśā na ca vipākajā na caupacayikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3591: kiṃ tarhi vipākajā vā aupacayikā vā bhavantīty ata evam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3593: kathaṃ punar jñāyate naiṣyandikās te na santīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3600: yathā gobhir yukto ratho goratha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3606: phalaṃ tu vipaktir eveti vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3608: bhavatu vā hetau phalopacāra iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3609: avipākasvabhāvo 'pi karmalakṣaṇo hetm vipāka ity (Abhidh-k-vy 70) ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3612: ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni paurāṇaṃ karma purāṇe janmani bhavaṃ purāṇam eva vā paurāṇaṃ karma.
T07yabhkvyu:3613: tāni sparśāyatanāni apaurāṇakarmasvabhāvāny api paurāṇaṃ karmety ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:3631: anupayghātamātraṃ tu tena brahmacaryeṇa syāt nopacayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3633: kasmāt tarhi pravrajitānāṃ keṣāṃcic charīrāpacayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3639: śabdo me syād iti icchayā śabdaḥ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3653: bhūtāni pāruṣyavirateḥ karmapathasya kaṇṭhe vipākasvabhāvāni [Tib.65b] nirvartante.
T07yabhkvyu:3656: tebhya aupacayikāni āhāropacayataḥ samādhyupacayato vā bhūtāntarāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:3659: paraṃparābhinirvartanaṃ tv abhisaṃdhāya pāruṣyavirater brahmasvaratā nirvartata ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3662: śabda icchātaḥ pravartata iti vipākayuktivirodhāt na vipākaja uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3663: tad yadi tadvac chārīriky api vedanā icchātaḥ pravartate na vipākajā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3672: sabhāgasarvatragahetubhir eva janitā na vipākahetuneti avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3674: vipākahetunā janitā eva na tu vipākahetunaiva janitā ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3697: pūrvakṣaṇānāsravābhāvāt kṣaṇikā na tu kṣaṇāntaravināśina ity ayam artho 'bhipretaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3698: anyathā hi paścimā eva dhātavaḥ kṣaṇikā ity avadhāraṇāt taditareṣāṃ dhātūnām akṣaṇikatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3699: kathaṃ punar duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś ca yugapad bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3705: tena vyācaṣṭe duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:3707: tatra kṣāntikalāpe cittād anye dharmāḥ śeṣāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3720: caturthī tu uktanirmukteti sugamatvān na darśitā.
T07yabhkvyu:3725: kāmadhātau sthitaḥ pudgalaḥ krameṇa kalalādikrameṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 72) mṛtyukrameṇa vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3730: aviśeṣeṇa kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā rūpapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā pratilabhamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3731: kalalādyavasthāyāṃ tathā krameṇa maraṇasyācakṣuṣmanmaraṇasya ca kāle cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3733: ṣaḍāyatanotpattyavasthāyāṃ bhavasyāntarāle vā tenedānīṃ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3734: na tu cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3735: yasmād asau kuśalakliṣṭenātītānāgatena samanvāgata eva pūrvam antarābhavapratisaṃdhikāle.
T07yabhkvyu:3738: dvitīyādidhyānopapannas tatra tasya cakṣurvijñānadhātor abhāvāt tena pūrvam asamanvāgata idānīṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anivṛtāvyākṛtasvabhāvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3740: na tu cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3743: dvitīyādidhyānapracyuto 'dhastāt prathame dhyāne kāmadhātau copapadyamānaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3745: na tu cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3749: antarābhavapratisaṃdhyavasthāyām eva cakṣurdhātunotpādābhimukhena cakṣurvijñānadhātunā kuśalakliṣṭenātītānāgatena samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3753: ārūpyadhātucyutas tatraivotpadyamāno nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
