T07yabhkvyu:3755: dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś ca cakṣurvijñānam asaṃmukhīkurvāṇo nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3757: cakṣurdhātunā yady api samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate na tu cakṣurdhātunāsāv asamanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3758: cakṣurvijñānadhātunā yady apy asau asamanvāgato na tu samanvāgamaṃ [Tib.67b] pratilabhate tadasaṃmukhīkurvāṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3759: cakṣuṣmān kāmadhātusthaḥ sakṛnmaraṇāt antarābhavapratisaṃdhau (Abhidh-k-vy 73) nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:3761: yaś cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataś cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi sa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3766: prathame catuḥkoṭike pratilambho 'dhikṛto dvitīye tu prāptimātraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3776: sa kāmadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātunā antarābhavapratisaṃdhau pratilabdhena kuśalakliṣṭena samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3780: sa kāmadhātau cakṣurdhātunā cakṣurvijñānadhātunā ca tathā pūrvaṃ pratilabdhenedānīṃ tv anena cāvyākṛtena samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3782: svabhūmikasya tatrāvaśyam astitvāt parabhūmikasya cakṣuṣaḥ sambhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3789: yaś cakṣurdhātunā asmanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3797: syād rūpadhātunā na cakṣurdhātuneti iyaṃ koṭir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:3802: yaś cakṣurdhātusamanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3803: yas tāvac cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3804: syāt rūpadhātunā na cakṣurdhātunā kalalādyavasthāsv alabdhacakṣur labdhavihīnacakṣuś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3805: (Abhidh-k-vy 74) yaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3806: yo vā rūpadhātunāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3822: yas tāvac cakṣurvijñānadhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3833: avadhāraṇād eva cānye rūpādayo bāhyā iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3838: ahaṃkārasaṃniśrayatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryata ity ahaṃkārasaṃniśraya ātmety ātmavādinaḥ saṃkalpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3841: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita
T07yabhkvyu:3843: kathaṃ punar gamyate cittam ātmaśabdenocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3847: [Tib.69a] cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham
T07yabhkvyu:3850: ātmani cittīkārye ātmānaṃ vā cittam adhikṛtya ye dharmāḥ pratyāsannabhāvāt āśrayabhāvena vartante.
T07yabhkvyu:3856: cakṣurādiṣv eva hi vijñānaṃ lakṣyate na rūpādiṣv (Abhidh-k-vy 75) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3857: tathā hi cittam indriyasambaddhe śarīradeśe paricchidyate na viṣayadeśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3858: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3859: iha paṃca tāvad vijñānadhātavo vartamānā eva gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3861: vartanānaviṣayā hi paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ manovijñādhātur api vartamāna eveha vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3865: na hy ete manodhātutvam aprāptā atītatvam aprāptāś cittasyāśrayībhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3866: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3869: vartamānānām apy eṣām āśrayabhāvo bhaviṣyatīti bhaviṣyadāśrayabhāvenādhyātmikatvaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3872: tad anāgatapratyutpannayor apy adhvanor asty evety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3878: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3879: tadyathā cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ niyato viṣayo yāvan manovijñānasya dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3880: yadi tatra tac cakṣurvijñānam utpannam utpattidharmi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3881: yāvad yadi tatra manovijñanam utpannam utpattidharmi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3888: na hi tad evāṃgulyagraṃ tenaivāṃgulyagreṇa spṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3893: na hy akṣistham aṃjanaṃ tena gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3894: sa punaś cittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasya ālambanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3895: ye pūrvasmin kṣaṇe svabhāvasahabhuvo dharmā nālambitā abhūvan.
T07yabhkvyu:3896: te 'py ālambitā iti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā ālaṃbanaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3902: nanu ca dharmadhātur [Tib.70a] eva sabhāga evety avadhāraṇe śeṣā na sabhāgā iti sabhāgatatsabhāgāḥ setsyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3904: yady api na sabhāgā eveti bhaveyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3908: na tu sabhāgā eva nāpi tatsabhāgā eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:3915: asvakarmakṛd eva tatsabhāgas tatsabhāga eva vāsvakarmakṛd ity avadhāraṇe 'rthāpattyā svakarmakṛt sabhāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3918: evaṃ hy adyatanātītaṃ hyastanātītaṃ ca parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3920: athaivam eva pāṭha udāharaṇamātraṃ tad draṣṭavyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3922: evaṃ yāvan manaḥ svena viṣayakāritreṇa vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3925: yena śrotreṇa śabdān aśṛṇot śṛṇoti śroṣyati vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3926: tad ucyate sabhāgaṃ śrotram iti sarvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3927: vijñānasamāyuktam asamāyuktaṃ ceti vijñānasambaddham asambaddhaṃ cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3928: yad ekasya cakṣuḥ sabhāgaṃ tad [Tib.70b] sarveṣāṃ kiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3929: sabhāgam iti vartate evaṃ tadsabhāgam apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3937: ity asādhāraṇatvād eṣāṃ cakṣurādivad atideśo nyāyyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3941: na tu vaktavyaṃ yathā rūpam evaṃ gandhādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3942: asti hy eṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānam utpādayeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3944: yadi te evadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā bhaveyur evadattasya vijñānam utpādayeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3945: atha yajñadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā yajñadattasya vijñānam utpādayeyur ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3948: na tasyaiva evadattasya yasya ghrāṇādīndriyaprāptās te gandhādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3951: tathā hīndriyadhātavo vijñānadhātūn āśrayabhāvena yathāyogaṃ bhajante.
T07yabhkvyu:3955: vijñānadhātūṃs tu viṣayabhāvena ālambanabhāvena vā bhajante.
T07yabhkvyu:3969: samāno vā bhāga eṣāṃ eṣāṃ ta ime sabhāgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3979: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3982: ye punar anye cakṣurādaya ittham asabhāgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3985: teṣāṃ tair vā sabhāgās te tatsabhāgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3992: rūpiṇo dhātavo daśa paṃca ca tadvijñānadhātava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3997: antyatrayāt anye paṃcadaśa dhātava eva ta ucyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4001: eta eva tridhā aṣṭāśītyanuśayās tatsahabhuva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4002: dhātuprakārākārabhinnāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'nuśayās tatsahabhuvo vijñānavedanādayaḥ saṃprayuktāḥ asaṃprayuktāni ca tallakṣaṇānulakṣaṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:4005: teṣām anuśayānāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ ca prāptayas tatprāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4008: kāścid dhi prāptayo 'nuśayādisahabhuvo bhavanti yāḥ sahajāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4009: kāścit tu pūrvaṃ paścāc ca tebhyo bhavanty ataḥ pṛthak prāptigrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4010: sānucarā iti grahaṇena anuprāptayas tallakṣaṇāni ca saṃgṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:4012: eta eva trayo 'ntyā dhātavo ye śeṣā darśanaheyebhyo 'nye sāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4022: apāyasaṃvartanīyaṃ ca (Abhidh-k-vy 78) kāyavākkarma rūpasvabhāvatvād bhāvanāheyam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:4026: niyate cāpāyike karmaṇi sati āryamārgo notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4027: āryamārgotpāde ca saty āpāyikaṃ karma notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4028: tasmāt satkāyadṛṣṭyādivat tad ubhayaṃ darśanaheyam iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4031: na dṛṣṭiheyam akliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpy aṣaṣṭhajaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4033: akliṣṭam anivṛtavyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ vā na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4034: rūpaṃ tu kliṣṭam api na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4036: paṃcendriyajaṃ paṃcavijñānaṃ tad arūpaṃ kliṣṭam api san na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4038: akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ samucchinnakuśalamūlavītarāgāṇām api tatsamanvāgamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4047: tad yadi pṛthagjanatvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ syāt laukikavītarāgāṇāṃ tasya prāpticheda iti tenasamanvāgamaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4049: tathā hi te laukikavītarāgāḥ pṛthagjanā eveṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:4054: tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā yo bhikṣavo rūpe chandarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4056: evaṃ vas tad rūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4057: tasmād akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ teṣāṃ prahīṇam api cakṣurādivat samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:4063: akleśaduṣṭatvāt pṛthagjanatvaṃ na duḥkhādiṣu satyeṣu vipratipadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4068: ayaṃ ca satyeṣv avipratipatter [Tib.73a] iti hetur aṣaṣṭhaje 'py anuvartayitavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4070: ayam upacayahetuḥ pṛthagjanatvasyaiva darśanaheyatvanivṛttyartham ucyate kāyavākkarmaṇo 'nabhisaṃbandhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4076: tena tatprāptisadbhāvāt duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyavasthāyāṃ sa pudgalaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4077: na cāsau tasyām avasthāyāṃ pṛthagjana iti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum adhigatāryamārgatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4083: tat pṛthgjanatvaṃ kiṃ bhāvanāmārgapratilambhād eva prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4085: tat pṛthagjanatvaṃ navabhaumikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ yāvat bhāvāgrikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4088: sarvaṃ hy akliṣṭaṃ sāsravaṃ navama eva vimuktimārge prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4089: yady evam avītarāgāvasthāyām āryaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4092: [Tib.73b] duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ prabhṛti hi tad vihīnam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:4097: tasmāt prāptichedāt tena pṛthagjanatvenāsamanvāgamāt tasyām avasthāyām ārya eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4099: (I.40, 41) cakṣuś ca dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo dṛṣṭir
T07yabhkvyu:4101: cakṣur eva dharmadhātupradeśa eva dṛṣṭir ity avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:4103: satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭir mithyādṛṣṭir dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:4111: sameghāmegheti vistareṇa yāvat kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣībhir dṛṣṭibhir dharmadarśanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4116: kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikī ca śaikṣī cāśaikṣī ca kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4121: evaṃ kliṣṭayā laukikyā satkāyadṛṣṭyādikayā dṛṣṭyā dharmadarśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4123: yathā tasyām eva rātrau ameghāyāṃ rūpadarśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4136: ata evāsaṃtīraṇād anyāpi mānasī kliṣṭā rāgādisaṃprayuktā akliṣṭā vā kṣayānutpādajñānānivṛtāvyākṛtā prajñā na dṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4147: tad eva cakṣurāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ paśyatīty astv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4154: naiva hy āvṛte cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate ity anābhāsagatatvāt viṣayasyety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4155: kiṃ khalu notpadyata ity apratighatvāt kuḍyādīni vyatibhidya kuḍyādyavyavahita iva viṣaye vijñānam utpatsyata iti bhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4157: yasya mama vaibhāṣikasya pakṣaḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4158: tasya mama cakṣuṣaḥ sapratighatvāt vyavahite kuḍyādibhir vṛttyabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4160: vijñānaṃ tarhi vaibhāṣikasya vyavahite 'pi prāpnotīti codyam antarnītam āśaṃkya sa eva vaibhāṣikaḥ punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:4162: yathaiva cakṣuṣo vyavahite vṛttyabhāvo yujyate vijñānasyāpy anutpattir vijñānavṛttyabhāva āśrayeṇa sahaikaviṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4163: ya eva hi cakṣuṣo vyavahito 'rtho viṣayaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4164: sa eva vijñānasyeti yuktā vijñānasyāpy anutpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4165: tava tu vijñānavādino 'pratighatvād vijñānasya vyavahite vijñānam utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:4167: tasmāc cakṣuḥ paśyati na vijñānam iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4168: evaṃ vijñānavādini pratiṣiddhe tatpakṣam ācāryo gṛhītvāha.
T07yabhkvyu:4169: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4170: yathā kāyendriyaṃ prāptaviṣayaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ [Tib.75a] viṣayaṃ na gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:4173: kim evaṃ cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kuḍyādipratighātena pratihataṃ sat tataḥ pareṇa gantum alabhamānaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 81) taṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ viṣayaṃ na gṛhṇātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4175: tasmāt sapratighatvāt āvṛtaṃ cakṣur na paśyed iti na vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4177: kācenābhrapaṭalena sphaṭikenāmbunā cāntaritaṃ vyavahitaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4178: sapratighatvād dhi kuḍyādivyavahitavat kācādivyavahitaṃ cakṣur na paśyet tac ca paśyatīti siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4180: āloke hi sati viṣaya ābhāsagato bhavatīti vijñānotpattisaṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4184: tajjaś ca manasāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavatīty ata āvṛte rūpe kācādibhis tatrotpadyate eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ yatra tu pratibandho 'kācādisvabhāvaiḥ kuḍyādibhis tamasvadbhiḥ tatrāvṛte notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4188: yat tvayā kiṃ khalu notpadyata iti anutpattau kāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭam idaṃ tatkāraṇam iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4189: yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4190: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyaṃjanagrāhīti viṣtaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4200: na hy anantarātītaṃ mano dharmān vijānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:4203: āśritasya vijñānasya karma darśanam āśrayasya cakṣuṣa upacaryate.
T07yabhkvyu:4204: vijñāne paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīty upacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4206: yathā maṃcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu maṃcāḥ krośantīty upacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4208: yathā ca sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4216: dvāram iva dvāraṃ hetur āśraya iti abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4221: cakṣur brāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvad eva rūpāṇāṃ dārśanāyety atra.
T07yabhkvyu:4222: na hy etad yujyate darśanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:4224: yadi darśanaṃ karaṇaṃ dṛśyate 'neneti darśanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4225: kartari vā lyuṭ paśyatīti darśanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4234: yadi tu cakṣurdvāraṃ vivaraṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya vijñānāyety artho gṛhyeta tad yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4235: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyaty apy ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4238: kā punar asau yā prajñaivam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4242: tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyata iti sūtre 'pi vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4243: kiṃcid iti vacanān na sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ paśyatīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4251: kartṛbhūtasya vijñānasya kānyā vijñānakriyeti vaktavyam iti tulyaṃ codyam āpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4253: na kartur vijñānasya kriyāyāś ca vijñānalakṣaṇāyā bhedo 'nyatvam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:4261: [vijñānaṃ tarhi kasyāśrayabhāvād rūpaṃ vijānātīty āha.] vijñānasyāśrayabhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4263: tad vijñānaṃ darśanam iti rūḍhaṃ loke iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4264: darśanam iti loke rūḍhaṃ na tu vijñānam iti rūḍhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4266: tathā hi tasminn utpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam ity ucyate na vijñātam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4273: yathā yathā sāṃnidhyamātreṇa sūryo divasaṃ karotīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4279: anena hi kartur arthāntarabhūtāṃ vā kriyāṃ pratiṣedhati.
T07yabhkvyu:4283: asaty api kartari hetuphalayoḥ kāryakāraṇam arthatvaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:4284: tatra chandata upacārāḥ kriyante yad vastu vyavahārāṃgaṃ teneha vyavahārārthasaṃsiddhyartham asad api sadrūpeṇa parikalpya [Tib.77a] kartṛkriyādivyavasthāṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4289: janapadas tatra niyatā niścitā coktir janapadaniruktiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4292: na vā sarvām evārthavatīṃ niruktiṃ kalpayet.
T07yabhkvyu:4294: ātmā jīva ity evamādikāṃ saṃjñāṃ lokasya nādhyāropayet.
T07yabhkvyu:4295: abhūtasamāropeṇāsty ātmā śarīrādivyatirikta iti gacched ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4296: atha vā saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāven nātisaret.
T07yabhkvyu:4297: arthābāvāt saṃjñāpi nāstīti na kalpayed ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4303: unmīlitārdhanimīlitayor akṣṇoḥ ekatarasyānyathībhāvād dvayor ekatarad yady anyathībhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4307: yadi tat sarvanimīlitaṃ kriyet sarvonmīlitaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:4309: ato 'vagamyate dvayor api cakṣuṣor atra vijñānotpattau vyāpāro 'stīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4311: yathā rūpasya deśapratiṣṭhitatvāt āśrayavicchedād [Tib.77b] vicchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4313: na hi vijñānaṃ ca nāśrayavicchedād vicchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4325: anenānumānena tatra pramāṇānupalabhyamānatvaṃ hetum asiddhaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:4328: yadi prāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ kalpyeta divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotram iha manuṣyeṣu dhyāyināṃ nopajāyet.
T07yabhkvyu:4329: yadi hi cakṣuḥśrotram api viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaṃ vyavahitaṃ ca kuḍyādibhir yathāyogaṃ rūpaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4333: yathā ghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ prāptaviṣayatvāt divyā dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:4342: āsannenātidūrasthena tiraskṛtena vā tulyā tadaprāptir iti [Tib.78a] tatra darśanaṃ prasaṃjayati.
T07yabhkvyu:4343: kim idaṃ parasya sādhanam uta dūṣaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4344: yadi tāvad evaṃ sādhanam atidūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ cakṣuḥśrotreṇa gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4349: atha dūṣaṇaṃ sarvaprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotralakṣaṇasya dharmiṇaḥ prasajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4352: kathaṃ tāvad ayaskānto na sarvam aprāptam ayaḥ karṣayatīti praśnamukhenāyaskāntanidarśanam upanyasya sarvāprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrasya
T07yabhkvyu:4356: ayaskānto hy aprāptam ayo gṛhṇāti karṣatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4366: ghrāṇādīnāṃ hi prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4368: ghrāṇādisahabhūni hi gandharasaspraṣṭavyāni ghrāṇādibhir na gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:4371: prāptatvaṃ mūrtānām eva vyavasthāpyeta nāmūrtānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4374: prāptaviṣayam eva trayam iti iṣṭāvadhāraṇārtham ārambhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4375: anyathā hi prāptāprāptaviṣayam ity api saṃbhāvyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:4377: yad ucchvāsena sardhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ bhūtacatuṣkaṃ ghrāṇam āgataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4390: kathaṃ citaṃ pratyāhataṃ na viśīryata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4391: anyonyam aspṛśatāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghātaḥ pratyāhataḥ pāṇyādibhiḥ kathaṃ na viśīryate.
T07yabhkvyu:4392: tad evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid ity ālokādi madhye nāstīti nirantaratvam eṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4397: yo 'sau doṣa ukto yadi sarvātmanā spṛśeyur miśrībhaveyur dravyāṇy athaikadeśena sāvayavāḥ prasajyerann iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4410: tad dhi pūrvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paścān mahad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4419: tad evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4422: yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti bruvāṇā vaibhāṣikā madhye ālokādi necchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4424: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣv antareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta gatimata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4426: na ca paramāṇubhyo 'nye saṃghātāḥ yathā vaibhāṣikāḥ kalpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4427: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:4432: yadi paramāṇor ekasya pūrvādidigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyeta spṛṣṭasyānyonyam aspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4447: teṣāṃ nairantaryeṇāvasthānāt abhinnadeśatvaṃ mā bhūd iti sāntarāṇām api sapratighatvena gatiḥ pratibadhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4449: ātmaparimāṇatulyasyaivārthasya grahaṇa iṣyamāṇe kathaṃ parvatādīnāṃ mahatāṃ sakṛd iva grahaṇaṃ lakṣyate na krameṇety āśaṃkya yuktiṃ tathā grahaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:4451: yathā alātacakrādigrahaṇaṃ krameṇa vartamānaṃ sakṛd iva lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4459: kadācit samāḥ yadā śrotraparamāṇusamapramāṇaṃ kasyacic chabdaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4461: ajājīpuṣpavad avasthitāḥ kālajīrakapuṣpavad avasthitāḥ ekatalāvasthitā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4471: sa kileti karmasāmarthyād evāviśaraṇaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4486: dvitīyā koṭiḥ samanantarātītaś caitasiko dharmadhātus tasya samanantarabhāvena.
T07yabhkvyu:4487: ṣaḍ eva hy āśrayā vijñānasyeṣyante cakṣurādayo manaḥparyantā nānye.
T07yabhkvyu:4492: [Tib.80b] evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānasya svam indriyaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4519: cakṣurādīnāṃ aṃjanādibhir anugrahaṃ reṇvādibhiś copaghātaṃ cakṣurādivijñānāny anuvidadhate.
T07yabhkvyu:4524: nanu ca paṭuni rūpe paṭucakṣurvijñānam utpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4526: [teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ.] yady api rūpasya paṭumaṃdate cakṣurvijñānam anuvidadhīta.
T07yabhkvyu:4527: vidhurāvasthayos tu cakṣūrūpayoś cakṣuravasthām eva cakṣurvijñānam anuvidhatte.
T07yabhkvyu:4529: tathā hi cakṣuṣi anugṛhīte rūpe copahate tadvītarāgāṇāṃ madhyasthānāṃ ca cakṣurvijñānam avikāram utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4531: rūpe punar anugṛhīte 'parityakte cakṣuṣi copahate kāmalavyādhinā timiropaghātena vā pītadarśanaṃ bhrāntaṃ keśoṇḍukādidarśanaṃ vā pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:4532: tathā paṭuni rūpe jarayā mande cakṣuṣi mandaṃ cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4533: evaṃ mande rūpe cakṣur yady atipaṭu bhavet paṭu cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4534: tathā hi jātisvabhāvena paṭuni gṛdhracakṣuṣi mande 'pi śavarūpe anekayojanaviprakṛṣṭe 'pi cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4539: āśrayabhāvo vyākhyāta iti na taṃ praty ādriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4548: asādhāraṇatvāt tābhyāṃ bherīyavābhyāṃ yathā nirdeśo loke bherīśabdo yavāṃkura iti na tu daṇḍaśabdaḥ kṣetrāṃkura iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:4550: kṣetraṃ ca śāligodhūmāṃkurasyāpīti sādhāraṇatvāt na tābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4553: api khalu cakṣur iva vijñānam ubhayoḥ sattvasaṃkhyātatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4564: tatsaṃprayoginyāḥ sukhāyā duḥkhāyā vā (Abhidh-k-vy 88) vedanāyāś cakṣuṣy eva paricchidyamānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4566: tad evaṃ cakṣurādibhir eva vijñānanirdeśo yujyate na rūpādibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4567: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato [Tib.82a] yojayitavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4578: kāmāvacarāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāny ārūpyadhātāv abhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4590: kāmāvacarasya cakṣuṣo 'dharabhūmikasya prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4592: kāmāvacarasya cakṣuṣaḥ svabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaram eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4593: prathamadhyānabhūmikasya cakṣuṣaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4594: kāmāvacaraṃ tu cakṣurvijñānam asya na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4600: dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānacakṣuṣo hy asaty ātmīye prathamadhyānabhūmikam evādharaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4602: saṃbhavatas tv evam uktam adharabhūmikam abhyanujñātam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4607: prathamadhyānabhūmikasya tu prathamadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya cakṣurvijñānasya svabhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ ca rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4608: caturthadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya tu caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ tataś cādharabhūmikaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4609: evaṃ yāvat dvitīyadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ tataś (Abhidh-k-vy 89) cādharabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4610: evaṃ cakṣurvijñānajāter ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4611: kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4612: kāmāvacarasya kāyasya śarīrasya svabhūmikordhvabhūmike rūpavijñāne bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4616: dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya vijñānam adharabhūmikam eva prathamadhyānabhūmikam evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4617: rūpaṃ tu dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya svordhvādharabhūmikaṃ [Tib.83a] yathā svāśrayaṃ cakṣuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4625: yatra kāye sthitaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4626: kiṃ tāni kāyaśrotraśabdavijñānāny ekabhūmikāny eva bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4630: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena śrotreṇa svāṃ śabdāṃ śṛṇvataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa anayā diśātra grantho vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4632: na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotram ūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruter
T07yabhkvyu:4633: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvata
T07yabhkvyu:4637: paṃcabhūmikā hi kāyaśrotraśabdāḥ kāmāvacarā yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4645: na hi kadācid ūrdhvabhūmikaḥ śabdo 'dharabhūmikena śrotreṇa śrotuṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4648: asya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4649: asyeti anantaroktasya śrotravijñānasya śabdaḥ sarvato viṣaya ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca.
T07yabhkvyu:4650: kāyasya cobhe śabdavijñāne sarvato bhavata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4654: yathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vā niyamitaṃ na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vety evamādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:4657: paṃcabhūmike 'pi kāye sarvabhūmikāni manaādīni bhavantīti [Tib.83b] manodharmamanovijñānāni sarvabhūmikāni kāmāvacarāṇi yāvad bhāvāgrikāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:4658: tadyathā kāmadhātūpapanno yadi kāmāvacarān manaso 'nantaraṃ kāmāvacaram eva kāmāvacaradharmālambanaṃ manovijñānam utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:4660: yadi prathamadhyānabhūmikād yāvad bhavāgrabhūmikād upapattikāle samāpattikāle vā saṃbhavataḥ kāmāvacaraṃ tathaiva manovijñānam utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:4664: dharmās tv ālambanaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikā yāvad bhavāgrabhūmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4667: evaṃ prathamadhyānopapanno yāvad bhavāgropapanno yathāyogaṃ vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4670: cakṣuś ca dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo dṛṣṭir
T07yabhkvyu:4672: atha yatra kāye sthitaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatīty evamādir ayam ānuṣaṃgikaḥ prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4678: bāhyā eva paṃca dvivijñeyā ity avadhāraṇād anye trayodaśa dhātava ekavijñānavijñeyā iti siddham.
T07yabhkvyu:4684: dharmārdha indriyaṃ ye ca [Tib.84a] dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:4688: atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4689: upasaṃkramya bahagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikante nyaṣīdat.
T07yabhkvyu:4690: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavantam idam avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:4696: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyam upekṣendriyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 91) śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam.
T07yabhkvyu:4699: atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4704: teṣāṃ pāṭhe ardhadharma iti samapravibhāgaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4707: atha napuṃsakaliṃgo 'py ardhaśabda ekadeśārthe vartate tadaivaṃ samāsaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4711: cakṣurāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ [Tib.84b] manaāyatanam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthāṃ yuktarūpām anādṛtya jīvitendriyānantaraṃ manaindriyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4720: paṃca cakṣurādayo dhātavaḥ paṃcendriyāṇi cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvat kāyendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4725: dvādaśādhyātmikā dhātava eva dharmārdha eva cendriyam iti avadhāraṇāt paṃca dhātavo rūpādayas tadanyadharmadhātupradeśo nendriyam iti siddham.
T07yabhkvyu:4726: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtau sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyāṃ dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:4732: prathamasya dvitīyasya ca kośasthānasya sambandhopanipātatāṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:4748: bahutvāt tu bahuvacanena kṛto nirdeśa indantītīndriyāṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4749: tasmāt indantīty asya śabdasya indriyam ity ādeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4752: tena nairuktena vidhānena indriyam iti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4754: vaiyākaraṇair hi kuñjo 'syāstīti kuñjara iti matvarthīyena kuñjaraśabdo vyutpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4755: nairuktais tu tad anādṛtya kuñjaraḥ kuñjacāritvād iti nairuktena nyāyena sādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4757: yadi hi vaiyākaraṇanayena indrasya liṅgam indriyam iti vyutpādyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:4765: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇotītyādi vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4785: sattvavikalpa iti stanādeḥ saṃsthānasya svarasyācārasya cānyathātvaṃ viśeṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4791: viyuktāś ca te vikalāś ca viyuktavikalāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4800: vinaye tu paṇḍakā eva paṃca paṭhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:4810: lūnapaṇḍako hi tāvad indriyacchedāt indriyavikala iti sphuṭa eṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4814: indriyasadbhāvāśaṃkānivṛttyartham eva ceha ṣaṇḍhapaṇḍakā iti pṛthakpāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4815: anyathā hi vinayavad ihāpy abhidharme paṇḍakā ity eva paṭhyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:4836: teṣām eko 'pi saṃvaro na bhavati kim aṅga sarvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4839: ata eva ca srotaāpattyādiphalaprāptiḥ kāmādivairāgyaṃ ca teṣāṃ na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4852: samānakālaṃ ca jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgena tatsambandhanaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4853: manaindriyaṃ tu bhinnakālam api punarbhave tatsambandhanaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4855: cittasya vaśibhāvam anuvartate loko dharmo vā yathoktam.
T07yabhkvyu:4862: teṣu sukḥādiṣu anuśāyituṃ śīlam eṣām ālambanataḥ saṃprayogato vā.
T07yabhkvyu:4871: tad evaṃ kleśaviśuddhāv eśāṃ śraddhādīnām ādhipatyam uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4872: vyavadāne 'pi sukhādīnām ādhipatyam ity apara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4877: vyavadāne 'pi teṣām ādhipatyam astīti āgamam (Abhidh-k-vy 96) ānayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4878: yasmāt sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyata ity uktaṃ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:4883: duḥkhe sati kasyacid dharme ratnatraye vā śraddhā jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4890: dhātoḥ saṃsārād vā niṣkramaṇaṃ vairāgyam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:4892: cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate saumanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ naiṣkramyālambanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4894: evaṃ yāvan manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃś ca utpadyate saumanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4895: tathā cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya utpadyate daurmanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritam.
T07yabhkvyu:4897: tathā cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate upekṣā naiṣkramyāśritā.
T07yabhkvyu:4900: na naiṣkramyāya mayā yatnaḥ kriyate iti kasyacid daurmanasyam.
T07yabhkvyu:4906: nāpi vijñānād anyad rūpadarśanaṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ vāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4908: grahaṇaṃ ca vijñānam eveti nānyad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4909: tasmāc cakṣuḥśrotravijñānayoḥ sasaṃprayogayor utpattau yad ādhipatyam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:4914: ity eva siddhe manasaḥ sarvārthopalabdhāv iti vacanaṃ dharmadhātor asarvadharmasvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4919: adhikaḥ prabhur adhipatis tadbhāva ādhipatyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4923: na hi nīlarūpaṃ pītarūpopalabdhau kāraṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4936: tasmāc cakṣurādīnām adhikam aiśvaryaṃ [Tib.88b] na rūpādīnām.
T07yabhkvyu:4946: tad evaṃ sati sattvavikalpa eva strīpuruṣendriyayor ādhipatyam.
T07yabhkvyu:4953: tathā hi taiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ kleśāś ca viṣkaṃbhyante laukikamārgagatair mārgaś cāvāhyate nirvedhabhāgīyādigataiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4954: tad evaṃ vyavadānasaṃbhāre śraddhādīnāṃ pratyekam ādhipatyam uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4957: tad eva ca vimuktaṃ kleśavimuktyā saṃtānavimuktyā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:4993: etac ca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ maulaṃ sattvadravyam [Tib.89b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4997: tad etad api sattvadravyam iṣyate na tu maulam.
T07yabhkvyu:5009: nivṛtter api nirvāṇasyāśraya utpattiḥ sthitir upabhogaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5013: tasya śabdādyupalabdhir ādir guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhir anta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5014: tatra ṣaḍāyatanaṃ mūlasattvadravyabhūtaṃ saṃsaratīti pravṛtter āśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5031: ata etāvanty evendriyāṇīti nāvidyādīnām indriyatvam iṣṭam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5033: cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvad ājñātāvīndriyam iti pravṛttinivṛttyor āśrayādibhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5036: jātamātro hi bālako vinaiva śikṣayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:5040: jihvendriyādhiṣṭhānasyaiva tu etat karma vacanam (Abhidh-k-vy 99) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5042: pāṇir eva hy anyathānyatra cotpanna ādānam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5043: pāda eva cānyathānyatra cotpanno viharaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5049: atha ca teṣām ādānaviharaṇaṃ bhavati na pāṇipādasyendriyatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:5050: teṣām apy asti sūkṣmam iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:5053: pāyor api nendriyatvam utsarga ity aśucyutsarge.
T07yabhkvyu:5054: gurudravyasya yasya kasyacid ākāśe chidre sarvatra pāyusthānād anyatrāpi patanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5055: gurudravyasya gurutvād evaṃ svayaṃ patanaṃ nendriyakṛtam.
T07yabhkvyu:5058: [Tib.90b] vāyor eva tat karma syān na pāyvindriyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:5065: yadi yathoktāt kāraṇāt etāvanty evendriyāṇīti neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5071: sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya bījādeḥ svasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ svakāryakriyāyām aṅkurādilakṣaṇāyām indriyatvaṃ prasajyetety adhikṛtam.
T07yabhkvyu:5084: āyur jīvitam ādhāra ūṣmavijñānayor hi ya
T07yabhkvyu:5089: nanu ca vedanāyā api kṛto nirdeśaḥ caitteṣu ca kariṣyate
T07yabhkvyu:5095: [Tib.91a] satyaṃ sāmānyaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāyā uktaṃ vakṣyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5096: viśeṣavibhāgarūpaṃ tv iha vivakṣitam iti sukhādīnāṃ kartavyo nirdeśa ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:5097: ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ tarhi na kartavyo yasmān manaso lakṣaṇam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:5102: etasyāṃ cāvasthāyām etāṇi nava dravyāṇy anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyākhyāṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:5103: etasyām avasthāyām ājñendriyākhyām etasyām ājñātāvīndriyākhyāṃ labhanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5104: sa eṣām avasthāviśeṣo darśayitavya ity ataḥ sūktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:5110: tatra kāye bhavā kāyena vā āśrayeṇa saha caratīti kāyikī.
T07yabhkvyu:5123: dhyāne tṛtīye tu [Tib.91b] caitasī sā sukhendriyam
T07yabhkvyu:5125: tṛtīye tu dhyāne caitasy api sātā vedanā sukhendriyam iti vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5126: kasmāc caitasy eva sātā tatra gṛhyate na kāyikīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5130: tṛtīye dhyāne kasmāt sā na saumanasyendriyam.
T07yabhkvyu:5138: prīter virāgād upekṣako viharatīti vistareṇa yāvat smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5157: na tu kāyikaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ vikalpanād utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5162: tayoḥ kāyikacaitasikayoḥ sukhayor duḥkhayoś ca indriyatvena bhedaḥ pṛthaktvaṃ sukhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyam
T07yabhkvyu:5163: upekṣā tu svarasenaivānabhisaṃskāreṇāvikalpayata evānabhinirūpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī vā vipākajā naiṣyandikī vā.
T07yabhkvyu:5164: tasmād ekam indriyaṃ kriyate indriyatvenābhedaḥ upekṣendriyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5181: tasminn eva mārgatraye yāni manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāśraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñākhyāni nava dravyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:5182: tāni darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyam iti vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:5183: anyonyam apekṣyamāṇāni tāni nava dravyāṇi tattan nāma labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:5185: na tv ekasmiṃś cittakalāpe nava dravyāṇi bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:5195: anājñātaṃ satyacatuṣṭayam ājñātuṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 102) vedituṃ pravṛttaḥ ājñāsyāmīti prārabdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5199: bhāvanāmārge nāsty apūrvam ājñeyaṃ tad eva tu satyacatuṣṭayam ājānāti śeṣānuśayaprahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanāheyakleśaprahāṇārtham.
T07yabhkvyu:5202: aśaikṣamārge tv ājñātam ity avagamaḥ ājñātāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5206: avateḥ ghañi rūpam etad āva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5208: ājñātam avituṃ śīlam asyeti veti tācchīliko ṇiniḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5219: sāsravānāsravā ete trayaḥ śeṣās tu sāsravā
T07yabhkvyu:5223: ataḥ śiṣyasukhapratipattyartham ayam evamādiprakārabhedaḥ pratipadarūpeṇa punar abhidhīyata ity evam avagantavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:5225: ekāntānāsravasāsravanirdhāraṇād eva hi dvidhā naveti siddheḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5247: tathā hy [Tib.93b] āryapudgalavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā yasyemānīty āheti.
T07yabhkvyu:5251: śraddhendriyaṃ yāvat prajñendriyaṃ eṣāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt paripūrṇatvād arhan bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5258: iti hi bhikṣava indriyapāramitāṃ pratītya phalapāramitā prajñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5260: yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa sarvāṇi na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:5262: tad evam āryapudgalavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā yasyemānīty āha bhagavān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5267: ata eva ca bāhyam iti viśeṣaṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:5271: adhigato me dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso durdarśo duravabodho 'tarkyo 'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmo [Tib.94a] nipuṇaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5277: yan nv aham ekākī araṇye pravaṇe dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāratāyogam anuyukto vihareyam.
T07yabhkvyu:5278: atha brahmaṇaḥ sahāpater brahmaloke sthitasyaitad abhavat.
T07yabhkvyu:5281: yatredānīṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:5283: tasya cādya bhagavato 'lpotsukavihāritāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati na dharmadeśanāyām.
T07yabhkvyu:5285: atha brahmā sahāpatiḥ tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ sammiṃjitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet.
T07yabhkvyu:5287: evam eva brahmā sahāpatiḥ brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purastāt pratyasthāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5288: atha brahmā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthām abhāṣata.
T07yabhkvyu:5293: atha bhagavān tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat.
T07yabhkvyu:5294: kṛcchreṇa me adhigato brahman khilāṃ pravidālya.
T07yabhkvyu:5300: santi bhadanta [Tib.94b] sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhās tīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apīty apravartita eva dharmacakra iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5303: yasmād apravartite 'pi dharmacakre santi tīkṣṇendriyā ityādy uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:5306: na tāvad aham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto niḥsṛto visaṃyukto viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyahārṣam iti vistaravacanam.
T07yabhkvyu:5308: na hy anāsravāṇām āsvāda ādīnavo niḥsaraṇaṃ vā yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5318: tad āyuḥ praṇidhāya cetasi kṛtvety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5325: cittam utpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5326: cittavācāv api tatsiddhaye kuryāt naikakāraṇasādhyaṃ hi kāryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5327: tad anena [Tib.95a] vipāka eva jīvitendriyam iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5332: akālamaraṇenāparisamāptaphalasya tyaktasya janmāntarakarmaṇo bhāvanābalena vipākoccheṣam ākṛṣya pratisaṃvedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:5343: taṃ pūrvakarmajaṃ sthitikālāvedham indriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvartayanti yognaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5347: atha yad arhan bhikṣur āyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5348: taj jīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipāka ity asmāt praśnāt kimartham āyuḥsaṃskārān adhitiṣṭhantīti praśnāntaram.
T07yabhkvyu:5355: kvety asya praśnavisarjanaṃ manuṣyeṣv eva [Tib.95b] triṣu dvīpeṣv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5356: kasyety asya visarjanaṃ strīpuruṣayor asamayavimuktasyārhataḥ prāntakoṭidhyānalābhina iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5360: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yady api samādhau vaśitvam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:5361: na tu tasya kleśair anupastabdhā saṃtatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5362: samayavimuktasya yady api kleśair anupastabdhā saṃtatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5371: na hy ekasya kṣaṇasya utsarjane 'dhiṣṭhāne vā proyojanam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:5376: tac caitad āyur dravyaṃ na bhavatīti dyotanārthaṃ bahuvacanam ity eke.
T07yabhkvyu:5377: bahuṣv eva saṃskāreṣv iti sautrāntikānām ayaṃ pakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5378: ekasminn api kṣaṇe bahavas te saṃskārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5381: te ca saṃskārāḥ paṃcaskandhasvabhāvāś catuḥskandhasvabhāvā vā draṣṭavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5384: bhagavān jīvitāny adhiṣṭhāya āyūṃṣy utsṛṣṭavān iti maraṇavaśitvajñāpanārtham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5388: trimāsam eva traimāsyam atra kālādhvanor atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5394: kalpa ekaḥ sakalaḥ kalpādhikaḥ kalpaḥ sātireka ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5396: catvāro mārāḥ devaputramāraḥ kleśamāraḥ skandhamāraḥ maraṇamāraś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5398: dvitīye yāme divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tṛtīye yāme kleśamāro nirjitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5399: vaiśālyāṃ tu traimāsyaṃ jīvitasaṃskārān adhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārān utsṛṣṭavān.
T07yabhkvyu:5403: niṣṭhitam ānuṣaṃgikaṃ yat praśnāt praśnāntaram upajātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5409: jīvitendriyād ekantavipākād anyāni dvādaśendriyāṇi vipākaś cāvipākaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5410: tatra cakṣurādīni puruṣendriyāvasānāni sapta svapnādyabhinirvṛttāny aupacayikāny avipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5413: yāni ca yathāyogam airyāpathikaśailpasthānikanairmāṇikasvabhāvāny avyākṛtāni tāny avipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5415: airyāpathikādīnāṃ mānasatvena duḥkhendriyasaṃbhavāt sukhasaumanasyayoś ca kvacid asaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5416: tatra kāmadhātāv airyāpathikaṃ manaindriyaṃ tatsaṃprayukte ca saumanasyopekṣendriye avipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5425: jīvitendriyaṃ dvādaśa cakṣurādīni hitvā tadavadhāraṇād eva śeṣāṇy avipāka iti siddham.
T07yabhkvyu:5438: yadi daurmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka ity anenāgamavirodhaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5441: daurmanasyaṃ vedanīyam asminn iti daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma.
T07yabhkvyu:5443: saṃprayogamātravacanād daurmanasyavat saumanasyopekṣe api na vipākaḥ prāpṇuta iti parasyābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5446: tathā saumanasyaṃ vipākatvena vedanīyam asya saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:5448: yadi daurmanasyaṃ yuktyā paricchinnaṃ na vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5449: tata evam agatyākhyāyeta saṃprayogavedanīyatām adhikṛtyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5450: tenāha kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5451: atha vā agatyā hy etad evaṃ gamyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:5456: kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5457: daurmanasyaṃ hīty [Tib.97b] aniṣṭacintanādikaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣair utpādyate ca [vyutpādyate ca] vyupaśāmyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5459: parikalpaviśeṣair iṣṭacintanādibhir utpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:5462: na hi cakṣurādiko vipākabhūto vītarāgādīnāṃ vyāvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:5466: avītarāgasya dviśalyā vedanoktā kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayate caitasikaṃ ca daurmanasyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5467: vacanāt vītarāgasya ca ekaśalyā kāyikam eva duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5469: vītarāgāṇām avyākṛtaṃ vipākarūpaṃ saumanasyaṃ kīdṛśaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5475: aparicchidyamānam api tad asty eveti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5477: sarvathāpy asamudācārāt samāpattyavasthāyām apy asamāpattyavasthāyām apīty ato na vipāka iti siddham.
T07yabhkvyu:5481: idam utsṛṣṭaṃ jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya [Tib.98a] vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5482: tatra katham ubhayavyaṃjanam asādhusammataṃ kuśalasya vipāka ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:5486: ubhayaṃ tu vyaṃjanaṃ kuśalasyaiva vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5493: tad ekaṃ savipākaṃ tv iti hi kramo na bhinnaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5501: avyākṛtaṃ hi pūtibījavan na vipākadānāya samartham.
T07yabhkvyu:5503: pāriśeṣyād akuśalaṃ vā tad bhavet kuśalasāsravaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:5504: ataḥ savipākam eva nāsty avipākaṃ daurmanasyam.
T07yabhkvyu:5506: daśaiva dvidhā dvidhaiva ca daśety avadhāraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:5509: manaś ca anyavittayaś ca śraddhādīni ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5514: gṛhyanta ity adhikṛtam anyad avipākam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5516: jīvitaṃ rūpāṇi ca saptendriyāṇy ājñāsyāmīndriyādīni ca trīṇy avipākānīti siddham avyākṛtatvāt anāsravatvāc ca yathākramam.
T07yabhkvyu:5522: dvidhaiva daurmanasyaṃ daurmanasyam eva dvidhety avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5525: kūśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ ca akuśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5529: atha vā daurmanasyaṃ savipākam eveti nirdhāritam.
T07yabhkvyu:5530: tasmād idam eva dvaidhaṃ bhavati nānyat.
T07yabhkvyu:5545: anyathā hy akuśalam eva kuśalāvyākṛtam evākuśalāvyākṛtam eva vā tat saṃbhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5557: samāsānte vidhir anitya iti paribhāṣayā samāsānto na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5561: te strīpumindriye duḥkhadaurmanasye amalāṃ cehānuvartamānaṃ hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:5580: anarthaṃ me akārṣīt karoti kariṣyati cety āghātavastutrayam.
T07yabhkvyu:5581: mitrasya me anartham akārṣīt karoti kariṣyatīty aparam āghātavastutrayam.
T07yabhkvyu:5582: amitrasya me artham akārṣīt karoti kariṣyati cety aparam āghātavastutrayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5583: eṣāṃ navānām āghātavastūnām abhāvāt viṣayakṛtam api daurmanasyaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:5586: pratyayakṛtaṃ ca tad yan navāghātavastukṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5591: strīpumindriye duḥkhe cāmalaṃ ca hitveti vartata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5611: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5618: kāmapradhānatvāt kāmadhātuḥ kāma iti nirdiśyata iti vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5619: aṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajais sattvaiḥ kāmadhātāv ādau prathamato dve indriye vipākātmake labhyete.
T07yabhkvyu:5628: aviśeṣitatvād dhy upapādukair api tathaiva dve eva labhyeyātām iti prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5630: kim upapādukais te dve naiva labhyete.
T07yabhkvyu:5641: cakṣurādīni pañca jīvitaṃ ca ṣaṣṭham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5645: kiṃ punar ubhayavyañjanā apy upapādukā bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5659: ye 'pi te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5660: te 'py anityā adhruvā anāśvāśikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5674: mriyamāṇa ārūpyadhātāv etāny eva trīṇīndriyāṇi nirodhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5684: sarve hy upapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5690: yadi tu vikalendriyo 'ndho badhiro vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5696: na hy eṣāṃ kāmadhātāv anyonyaṃ virahayya nirodho 'stīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5705: kuśalacittasya tu maraṇe śraddhādayaḥ pañcādhikāḥ prakṣeptavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5706: eṣāṃ hi śraddhādīnāṃ kuśale cetasy avaśyaṃ bhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5712: yatra catvāri tatra naveti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam.
T07yabhkvyu:5716: sarva indriyadharmā indriyāvasthāviśeṣāḥ kāritraviśeṣā vā vicāryanta ity eke vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:5718: indriyaprakaraṇe indriyaskandhake sarva indriyadharmā avasthāviśeṣāḥ kāritraviśeṣā vā vicāryante.
T07yabhkvyu:5733: evaṃ paṅktyavasthitānāṃ caturṇāṃ phalānāṃ srotaāpattiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ cānte bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5735: tayor antyayoḥ phalayor navabhir evendriyaiḥ prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5756: iti ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā abhisamaya ity ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:5757: tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntir yāvan mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir iti pañcadaśa (Abhidh-k-vy 113) kṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5762: tataḥ prabhṛtyā vajropamasamādher yāvān anāsravo mārgaḥ sarvo 'sau bhāvanāmārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5773: mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ tu asyām avasthāyām ājñendriyasvabhāvam utpādābhimukhaṃ vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:5774: tena śraddhādibhiḥ pañcabhir ājñāsyāmīndriyeṇājñendriyeṇa manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti tatphalaṃ navabhiḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5783: yathā hi dvayor manuṣyayoḥ ekena cauro niṣkāsyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5785: tathānantaryamārgeṇa visaṃyogaprāptir āvāhyate kleśaprāptim ādāya nirodhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5791: vajropamasamādhikalāpas tasyām avasthāyām ānantaryamārga ājñendriyasvabhāvo vartamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5795: [Tib.103a] atha prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tatra saumanasyendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5797: kṣayajñānakalāpas tu asyām avasthāyāṃ vimuktimārga ājñātāvīndriyasvabhāva utpādābhimukho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5798: tena śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir ājñendriyeṇājñātāvīndriyeṇa manaindriyeṇa sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatameneti tatphalaṃ navabhiḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5803: sakṛdāgāmiphalasya saptabhir aṣṭābhir navabhir vā prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5806: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvad yady ānupūrvakaḥ prāpṇoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:5810: tenottarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ niḥsaraṇataś ceha yogī paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:5811: adharām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataś ca paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:5820: adhimātrādhimātro 'dhimātramadhyo 'dhimātramṛduḥ madhyādhimātro madhyamadhyo madhyamṛduḥ mṛdvadhimātro mṛdumadhyo mṛdumṛduś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5821: tad yadi pṛthagjanaḥ prajahāti darśanabhāvanāheyān kleśān miśrīkṛtya tena mṛdumadhyādhimātrādibhedena navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:5823: evaṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrābhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ mṛdumṛdukleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:5824: āryas tu bhāvanāheyān eva kleśāṃs tathaiva navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:5829: ihāpi mṛdumṛdubhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyām adhimātrādhimātraṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:5830: evaṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrābhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ mṛdumṛdukleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:5832: tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānupūrvakeṇa vā labhyeta bhūyovītarāgeṇa vā.
T07yabhkvyu:5833: tatrānupūrviko yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya kramāt sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5835: yaḥ sakalabandhana ekaprakārādyupalikhito vā yadi na ṣaṣṭhaprakāropalikhito niyāmam avakrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:5837: sa bhāvanāheyasyaikasya yāvat ṣaṣṭhasyaiva vā prakārasya prahāṇāya śamathacaritatvāt laukikam api mārgam utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5839: tasya phalasya saptabhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 115) paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa ca saptamenānāgamyanirśrayatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5840: atha lokottareṇe mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5842: tany eva hi śraddhādīni saptendriyāṇi ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:5854: ayaṃ hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ aprāpyaiva ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5856: ihānupūrvako [Tib.104b] yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca prāpya anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5857: yo vā bhūyovītarāgo bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalam alabdhvaiva sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva ca labdhvānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5858: sa ca yadi laukikena mārgeṇa prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5866: kāmadhātumātravītarāgo laukikena mārgeṇa navame prakāre prahīṇe prathamād api vā dhyānād yāvad ākiṃcanyād api vā viṭarāgo yo 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5870: asya ca darśanamārgeṇaiva prāptir iti tulyatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:5874: yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:5876: atha prathamadvitīye dhyāne niśritya saumanasyendriyaṃ tatra bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5877: athānāgamyadhyānāntaracaturthadhyānānām anyatamaṃ niśritya upekṣendriyaṃ tatra bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5881: sa navame vimuktimārge dhyānaṃ praviśati maulaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpy aṣṭābhir indriyair anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5885: yadi na pṛaviśati tatra copekṣendriyam eva nānyathā.
T07yabhkvyu:5886: tasya prāptir aṣṭābhiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaupekṣāsaumanasyendriyaiś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5892: tasya navabhir indriyaiḥ prāptis tair evedānīm uktair indriyaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5894: tāny eva hi indriyāṇi anāsravatvād ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:5896: kasmād ānupūrvika evam ukto na punar vītarāgapūrvī.
T07yabhkvyu:5897: na hi vītarāgapūrvī anāgamyaniśrayeṇa darśanamārgam utpādya ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśati.
T07yabhkvyu:5900: tasmād asti saṃbhavo yad asau maulam eva praviśati.
T07yabhkvyu:5901: vītarāgapūrvī tu catuḥsatyadarśanaṃ prati kṛtādaro na dhyānaṃ pratīti [Tib.105b] na tatra ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5904: tad virodhayati yat tarhi abhidharma uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5909: tat kathaṃ na virudhyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5912: kasyacid evaikasya pudgalasya saṃbhavo na sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5913: yo hi mṛdvindriyaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhiḥ niśrayaviśeṣāt pāryāyikībhir arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5916: na tu saṃbhavo 'sti sakhasaumanasyopekṣāṇāṃ ekasmiṃ kāle samavadhānam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5918: yo hi kaścin mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalo 'nāgamyaṃ anyaṃ vopekṣendriyaniśrayaṃ niśritya arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5921: tataḥ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5924: tataḥ sa tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5926: pratyekaṃ tatra phalaprāptau avaśyaṃ navaivendriyāṇi vyāpriyante.
T07yabhkvyu:5927: śraddhādīni paṃca manaājñātāvīndriyāṇi sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatamad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5928: punaḥpunaḥ prāptes tad ekādaśabhir ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5929: katham anāgāmino 'py eṣa prasaṃgo [Tib.106a] na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5930: kasmāt tatra śāstre 'rhatvaphalam eva ekādaśabhiḥ prāpnotīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5932: na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5945: na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5949: prāpnuyāt yadi navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśet.
T07yabhkvyu:5954: sa na śaknoti navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5958: kiṃ tu yady asau mṛdvindriya ānupūrviko 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpya tataś ca parihīṇo bhūtvā indriyasaṃcāraṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5959: indriyasaṃcāreṇa ca tīkṣṇendriyo bhūtvā pūrvakeṇaiva krameṇānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvan yadi navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ [Tib.106b] praviśet.
T07yabhkvyu:5960: tasya tadānāgāmiphalaprāptir aṣṭābhir navabhir vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5961: śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa cānantaryamārgasaṃgṛhītena saumanasyendriyeṇa ca mauladhyānavimuktimārgasaṃgṛhīteneti.
T07yabhkvyu:5963: ebhiś cāṣṭābhir ājñendyiyeṇa ca navamenety avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5965: na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5968: yo mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalas tṛtīyadhyānalābhī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmet.
T07yabhkvyu:5972: sa tato 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa indriyottāpanena tīkṣṇendriyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā anāgamyaniśrayeṇaivānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvan navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5973: tasya tatphalaprāptiḥ pūrvavad upekṣendriyeṇa saumanasyendriyeṇa ca śraddhādibhiś cāpi paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa cāṣṭamena lokottaramārgatvāt ājñendriyeṇāpi navameneti.
T07yabhkvyu:5974: evaṃ dvayoḥ kālayor ekādaśabhir indriyais sa pudgalas tad anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5978: na ca kāmavītarāgaḥ kenacin niśrayeṇa niyāmam [Tib.107a] avakrāntaḥ parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5989: niyāmāvakrāntau ca lokottareṇa mārgeṇa punas tat prāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5996: darśanaheyānām avastukatvād ity etad api kāraṇāntaram asti.
T07yabhkvyu:5997: kasmāt tad iha noktam ity etad api vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6000: bhāvanāheyakleśamātravairāgyaparihāṇis tu kasmād asya parihīṇakasya na bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:6002: tatra ca satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā ca darśanaheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6004: tayoś ca tasya vītarāgapūrviṇo 'bhisamayānte ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe prahāṇasya laukikena mārgeṇa prāptasya tatsāmarthyāt punar anāsravā prāptir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6006: [Tib.107b] anāsravaṃ hi navamavimuktimārgasvabhāvaṃ saṃskṛtam anagāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaṃ ca kāmacchandādiprahāṇaṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6012: upekṣayā jīvitena manasā vā yukto 'nvito 'vaśyaṃ trayeṇa samanvāgataḥ tenaivopekṣājīvitamanaḥsvabhāvena.
T07yabhkvyu:6013: na hy eṣām anyonyena rinā samanvāgama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6020: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyair ārūpyadhātūpapanno na samanvāgata ity atra kāyendriyāgrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6021: kāmadhātau ca yenāpratilabdhavihīnānīty asyopacayārthasya cakṣurādiṣv eva saṃbhavān na kāyendriye.
T07yabhkvyu:6022: anyathā hi rūpibhir indriyair ārūpyopapanno na samanvāgata ity evocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6029: ihastho dhātvantarastho vā pṛthagjano vāryo [Tib.108a] vā na samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6036: yā apratiṣiddhā avasthāś cakṣurādibhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgamaṃ prati.
T07yabhkvyu:6039: tadyathā kāmadhātāv apratilabdhavihīnāvasthāṃ hitvā cakṣurādhibhir jihvāntaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6045: saṃkhyānukramavivakṣāyāṃ tu tadanantaraṃ tair ity evānantaraṃ sukhādigrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6047: caturthadhyānārūpyadhātūpapannaṃ pṛthagjanaṃ muktvā sarvaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6049: cakṣurādibhir jihvendriyāntair ārūpyadhātau kāmadhātau ca apratilabdhavihīnāvasthāyām asamanvāgamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6068: daurmanasyena śraddhādibhiś cānyaiḥ pūrvavad asamanvāgamo vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6080: so 'vaśyaṃ paṃcabhir upekṣājīvitamanaḥkāyais tena cety evaṃ sarvaṃ neyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6085: cakṣurādiṣv eva saumanasyaṃ kasmān na prakṣiptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6087: tathā hy ādiśabdena prakṣepa ākulaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6088: dvitīyadhyānajas tṛtīyālābhī katamena sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6094: na ṭṛtīyadhyānabhūmikena tasyālābhitvād iti matvā codayati.
T07yabhkvyu:6098: sarve hy adharabhūmyupapannāḥ sattvā uparibhūmikenāprahīṇena kliṣṭena samanvāgatā iti siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6103: tasmād avaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇa caturbhiś ca vedanendriyair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6121: kāyajīvitamanobhiś caturbhiś ca vedanendriyair iti saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇa cāṣṭamena.
T07yabhkvyu:6125: daurmanasyavān api kāmopapannaḥ kāmavītarāga iti tathaiva taiḥ saptabhir daurmanasyena ca.
T07yabhkvyu:6126: śraddhāvān api traidhātukaḥ sattva iti taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ śraddhādibhir avinābhāvibhir upekṣājīvitamanobhiś ca samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6132: ājñendriyam api hi ājñāta indriyaṃ na tu niravaśeṣe sāvaśeṣatvāt praheyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:6133: atha vā padaikadeśagrahaṇena ājñātāvī pudgala ājñāta ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6136: ājñendriyavān phalasthaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 121) śaikṣaḥ triṣv api dhātuṣu bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6148: tasmāt tābhyāṃ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi aparityaktābhyāṃ caturthadhyānārūpyopapanno 'pi āryaḥ samanvāgata eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6153: asaṃvegād iha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti vācanād
T07yabhkvyu:6156: catasro vedanā daurmanasyavarjyāḥ tasya vītarāgāvasthāyāṃ vyabhicārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6158: trayodaśabhir ebhir indriyair avaśyam eva samanvāgata ity avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:6168: kramamaraṇād vā strīpuruṣendriye nirodhe 'py abhyastanirvedhabhāgīyasya darśanamārgotpattir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6175: upekṣāsamanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ kāmadhātūpapanno vā yāvad bhavāgropapanno vā sarvo 'sāv avaśyaṃ trayeṇa samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6177: kaścid eva hi rūpibhir indriyair asamanvāgato ya ārūpyadhātūpapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6179: vistareṇa yāvat kaścid eva śraddhādibhir asamanvāgato yaḥ samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6181: tasthehāpi yāvān ājñāsyāmīndriyopetaḥ sarvo 'sāv ebhir yathoktais trayodaśabhir indriyair avaśyaṃ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6193: sa kiyadbhir alpaiḥ samanvāgata ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6200: kāyendriyaṃ ca jīvitamanasī ca sta eva sarvatra.
T07yabhkvyu:6204: vedanaṃ vā vid iti bhāvasādhana auṇādikaḥ kvip.
T07yabhkvyu:6210: śubhāny eva nākuśalāvyākṛtāni yāni tāni śubhānīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6219: aṣṭābhir ity ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ nirāsaḥ kṛto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6239: (Abhidh-k-vy 123) ukta indriyāṇāṃ dhātuprabhedaprasaṃgenāgatānāṃ vistareṇa prabhcda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6240: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katīndriyaṃ kati nendriyam iti dhātuprabhedaprasaṃgena.
T07yabhkvyu:6241: dharmārdham indriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:6256: santi hi kecit sahotpādā na tu niyatasahotpādāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6274: tadā niyatam aṣṭadravyaka eva bhavati nāto nyūnadravyakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6279: yatra hi cakṣuḥ śrotrādi vā tatra kāyendriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāc cakṣurādīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6280: saśabdāḥ punar ete paramāṇava ity aṣṭadravyakādayaḥ saṃghātaparamāṇavaḥ saśabdā utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ nava daśaikādaśadravyakā utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:6292: katham avinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścid eva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:6297: tulyabhūtasadbhāvāt tulyarūpais tatsaṃghātair bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6300: yatra saṃghāte paṭutamaṃ sphuṭatamaṃ prabhāvataḥ śaktito na tu dravyataḥ udbhūtam utpannaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6302: tasya dravyasya tatra saṃghāta upalabdhir grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6314: yathā tulye 'pi sūcīnāṃ tūlīnāṃ kalāpasadbhāve tīkṣṇatvāt sūcīnām eva sparśo vyaktam upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6316: tathā kvacid eva saṃghāte kāṣṭhādike kaṭhinam upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6320: na ca tatratatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:6332: yadi hi tan na syāt kāṣṭhādikaṃ na pūtībhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:6334: prasarpaṇaṃ hi tasya na syād vṛddhir vā yadi vāyudhātus tatra na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6337: pratyayānām agnyādīnāṃ lābhe sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ ca dravaṇādibhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6346: apsu śaityātiśayād auṣṇyaṃ gamyate ity apara iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6347: yasmād āpaḥ śītāḥ śītatarāḥ śītatamāś ca upalabhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:6352: yathā na ca (Abhidh-k-vy 125) śabdasya dravyāntareṇa vyatibhedo miśrībhāvo 'sti atiśayaś ca bhavati svabhāvabhedāt paṭuḥ śabdaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutama
T07yabhkvyu:6354: yathā ca vedanāyā na kenacid dravyāntareṇa vyatibhedo bhavatīti [Tib.113b] svabhāvabhedāt tāratamyenātiśayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6357: tā eva hy āpaḥ kāścic chītāḥ kāścic chītatarāḥ kāścic chītatamā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6358: bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ity apara iti sautrāntikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6360: na svarūpato na dravyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6361: śaktir eva hi nānāvidhāsti yayā yogibhir adhimokṣaviśeṣeṇa suvarṇadhātū rūpyadhātus tāmradhātur ity evamādayo dhātavaḥ kriyante.
T07yabhkvyu:6363: saṃty asmiṃ dāruskandhe vividhā dhātava iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6366: kathaṃ vāyau varṇasadbhāva iti vaibhāṣikān evaṃ codayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6368: iti niyame kathaṃ vāyau varṇo 'stīti nirdhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:6369: na hi kathaṃcit tatra varṇa upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6371: paramāptair ayam ukto 'rtha iti pratyetavyo nārtho 'numānasādhya ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6374: gandhavatā tu dravyeṇa vāyoḥ saṃparkād gandha upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6375: sa ca gandho varṇaṃ na vyabhicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:6383: tena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭā dravyakā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6392: saśabdakāḥ punar ete saptāṣṭanavadravyakā ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6394: uktakalpatvān na punaḥ sūtryanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6395: kiṃ punar atra dravyam eva dravyam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6396: mukhyavṛttyā yad dravyaṃ yasya svalakṣaṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:6399: āyatanam api hi dravyam iti śakyate vaktuṃ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6408: sa navadravyako yāvac caturdaśadravyaka ity aṣṭadravyakaniyamo bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6428: yad bhūtacatuṣkam āśraya ekasyopādāyarūpasya nīlasya pītasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:6429: na tad evānyasyopādāyarūpasya gandhasya rasasya vāśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6431: anyad eva bhūtacatuṣkaṃ tasyāśraya iti vaibhāṣikasiddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6437: kiṃcid atra dravyam eva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yad āśrayabhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6447: yogācāracittās tu saṃghātāvasthāne bhūtānāṃ bhautikānāṃ ca niyamaṃ varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6450: asti samudāya ekabhautikas tadyathā śuṣko mṛtpiṇḍaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6453: asti yāvat sarvabhautikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaś ca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6454: upādāyarūpe 'pi yad upādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāye upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6469: (II.24ab) śeṣāṇāṃ vaktavya iti cittacaittānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:6479: tat sarvaṃ taiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇair jātyādibhir avaśyaṃ sahotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6481: yatkiṃcid utpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāś cittaviprayuktāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:6486: kiṃcin na yad asattvasaṃkhyātam iti vikalpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6487: pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor yady api prāptir asti na tu tāv utpadyete iti na tayor grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6489: asattvasaṃkhyātasya prāptir nāstīti kim atra kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6491: sahajayaiva ca prāptyā prāptyā prāptimān sahotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6499: svamataṃ tu chandādayaḥ sarvacetasi na bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6506: cittapraspandaḥ praspanda [Tib.116a] iva praspanda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6512: yadyogād indriyaviṣayaviṣayavijñānāny anyonyaṃ spṛśantīva sa sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6515: pravicīyante vā anena dharmā iti pravicayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6516: yena saṃkīrṇā iva dharmāḥ puṣpāṇīva pravicīyante uccīyanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6520: pratītatvāt prajñeti vaktavye ślokabandhānuguṇyena matir iti kārikāyām uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6540: katham ekasmiṃś citte daśānāṃ bhinnalakṣaṇānāṃ caittānām astitvaṃ gamyata iti ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6541: sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6542: sa eṣa viśeṣaḥ cittacaittānāṃ durlakṣyaḥ prabandheṣv api tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu kālaparyantalakṣaṇeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:6543: rūpiṇīnām api oṣadhīnāṃ mūrtānām api kāsāṃcit harītakīprabhṛtīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ ṣaḍrasānām indriyagrāhyā jihvendriyagrāhyāḥ duravadhārā duḥparicchedā
T07yabhkvyu:6544: kiṃ punaḥ ye dharmā amūrtā buddhigrāhyā manovijñānamātragrāhyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6545: tasmād āptopadiṣṭā iti kṛtvā tathaiva te pratipattavyā ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6551: satyeṣu caturṣu ratneṣu ca triṣu karmasu ca śubhāśubheṣu tatphaleṣu ca iṣṭāniṣṭeṣu saṃty evaitānīty abhisaṃpratyayo 'bhisaṃpratipattiḥ śraddheti.
T07yabhkvyu:6555: iti vacanāt sā katham apramādo nāma caitasiko bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:6560: tad evaṃ sati bhāvanāhetāv ayaṃ bhāvanopacāraḥ kṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6567: nanu ca sūtre kāyapraśrabdhir apy ukteti.
T07yabhkvyu:6568: kaś ca paryāyo yat praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgadvayaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6571: tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbhodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:6573: tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartata (Abhidh-k-vy 129) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6577: yathā cetasy api vedanā paramāṇusaṃcayātmakendriyāśrayatvāt kāyikīty ucyate tatheyam api praśrabdhir avagantavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:6578: kathaṃ sā bodhyaṃgeṣu yokṣyata iti asamāhitatvāt paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:6580: [Tib.117b] tatra sūtre kāyavaiśāradyam eva kāyakarmaṇyatā bhūtaviśeṣalakṣaṇā prītyadhyākṛtā.
T07yabhkvyu:6583: pṛthakkalāpatvāt sāsravatvāc ca na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6584: prītiḥ prītisthānīyāś ca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṃgam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6587: evaṃ yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paṃca nivaraṇāni prahāya cetasa upakleśakarāṇi prajñādaurbalyakarāṇi sapta bodhyaṃgāni bhāvayateti.
T07yabhkvyu:6589: tatrāsmākam śramaṇasya ca gautamasya ko viśeṣo dharmadeśanāyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6593: pratighaḥ pratighanimittaṃ ca navāghātavastūni vyāpādanivaraṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:6602: yadā ca triskandho mārgaḥ kriyate śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6611: nanu coktaṃ durjñāna eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6613: sa eṣa duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣv api tāvad ityādi vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6615: asti hi nāma durjñānam api jñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6616: yad aviruddhaṃ ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe dharmāntareṇa sparśādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:6617: idaṃ tu khalu atidurjñānaṃ yad virodhe 'py avirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6618: ābhoganābhogayor ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe avirodho vyavasthāpyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6619: na hi viruddhayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayor ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe bhāvo dṛṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6629: tayos tu ekatra citte virodha iti vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6633: hrīr apatrāpyaṃ ca paścād vakṣyate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6656: ito bāhyakānāṃ yad vīryaṃ kausīdyam eva tad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6661: bhāvanāyā abhāvamātrapratipattir mā bhūd iti bhāvanāvipakṣa ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6666: yathā vedanā rūpīndriyāśrayatvāt caitasiky api kāyikīti vyākhyātā.
T07yabhkvyu:6671: na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyate ity abhidharme.
T07yabhkvyu:6672: prāptijño devānāṃ priyo na tv iṣṭijña [Tib.119a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6673: pāṭhaprāmāṇyamātreṇa daśa kleśamahābhūmikāḥ prāptā ity etām eva prāptiṃ jānīte devānāṃ priyo na tv ācāryāṇām iṣṭim icchāṃ jānīte.
T07yabhkvyu:6675: rjukajātīyo devānāṃ priya ity eke vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:6678: yo hīśvarāṇām iṣṭaḥ sa na tāḍanena śikṣata
T07yabhkvyu:6681: yathaivamohaḥ kuśalamūlaṃ prajñāsvabhāvatvān mahābhūmika iti vyavasthāpito na kuśalamahābhūmika evety avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:6683: tathā muṣitasmṛtyādayo (Abhidh-k-vy 131) 'pi paṃca mahābhūmikatvāt na kleśamahābhūmikā evety avadhāryante.
T07yabhkvyu:6684: tataś ca ime na kleśamahābhūmikamadhye paṭhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:6687: samādhir eva kliṣṭo vikṣepa ity evamādīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6690: adhimuktir eva kliṣṭā mithyādhimokṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:6695: ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta iti kākvāpṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:6705: uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikādayaś caitasikā rūpādayaś cānya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6711: dvitīyā āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ avidyā auddhatyaṃ pramādo vikṣepaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:6715: yat tūktaṃ na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6724: tatra śāstre styānasyāpāṭhe kāraṇam āhur ābhidhārmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6727: kathaṃ hi nāma kliṣṭo dharmaḥ śuklasya samādher anuguṇo bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:6730: na hy ete jātu sahacariṣṇutāṃ jahīta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6731: na hy ete styānauddhatye kadācit sahacaradharmatāṃ tyajata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6733: evam api ca styānam auddhatyaṃ vā yasya pudgalasyādhimātraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6734: sa pudgalas taccaritaḥ styānacarita auddhatyacārito vāvagantavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6735: kvacid dhi kalāpe kaścid dharma udbhūto bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6753: yasmād ime krodhādaya upakleśā manobhūmikā eva bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6755: rāgādikalāpe hy avaśyam avidyayā bhavitavyam iti na parītto rāgādikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6766: eṣāṃ tu nirdeśa upakleśeṣu kariṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6769: ye kadācit kuśale kadācid akuśale kadācid avyākṛte cetasi bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:6771: ādiśabdenārativijṛṃbhikātandrībhakte 'samatādaya upakleśāḥ kleśāś ca rāgādāyo 'py aniyatatvena gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:6772: na hy ete rāgādayaḥ paṃcānāṃ prakārāṇām anyatamasmiṃ niyatā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6776: na hi sapratighe cetasi rāgo bhavati sarāge ca cetasi pratighaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6780: mānaś ca vicikitsā cety aṣṭāv aniyatāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:6784: na hi sapratighe savicikitse vā citte mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:6788: tasmād yadvā tat vedam uktam iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6798: sa tu caitasika iti na saṃbadhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6800: iha tu (Abhidh-k-vy 133) punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6804: tatsaṃprayuktā apy anye cittacaittāḥ kaukṛtyaṃ prāpnuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6807: vipratisārāvasthāyāṃ hi kaukṛtylakṣaṇaṃ caitasikaṃ kaukṛtyākāram udbhūtavṛttikam.
T07yabhkvyu:6809: kasyacid eva hi dharmasya kasmiṃścic cittakalāpe prādhānyam iti varṇayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:6811: skandhānām antarvyāpārapuruṣarahitālambanaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ samādhiviśeṣaḥ śūnyatety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6815: tathehāpi kaukṛtyālambanaś caitasiko dharmaḥ kaukṛtyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6819: sthāniṣu manuṣyeṣv āgateṣu vaktāro bhavaṃti sarvo grāma āgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6828: hetuvācakena śabdena phalam ucyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6829: yathā ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:6830: pūrvajanmakṛtasya paurāṇasya karmaṇaś cakṣurādīni ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni phalāni.
T07yabhkvyu:6833: yat tarhy akṛtālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ kaukṛtyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6835: tan na kṛtam iti matvā codayati.
T07yabhkvyu:6843: yat kuśalaṃ dānādikaṃ akṛtvā tapyate paścāt tāpībhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6850: yad akuśalam akṛtvā tapyate kuśalaṃ ca kṛtveti.
T07yabhkvyu:6851: yat pāpam akṛtvā paścāt tāpībhavati na sādhu mayā kṛtaṃ yat.
T07yabhkvyu:6854: yac ca kuśalaṃ dānādikaṃ kṛtvā paścāt tāpībhavati na sādhu mayā kṛtaṃ yad dānādikaṃ kṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6856: tad etad ubhayam apy ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6857: tad etat kaukṛtyam ubhayam api kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati yathoktena vidhānena.
T07yabhkvyu:6864: mahābhūmika eva kaścit prajñāviśeṣo dṛṣṭir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6873: kleśaiś caturbhir ityādiṣu pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptir veditavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:6874: na hi rāgādayaḥ paraspareṇa saṃprayujyanta ity ābhidhārmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6875: sa ca kleśa āveṇikoktāś ca viṃśatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6876: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ dvāv akuśalamahābhūmikau vitarko vicāraś ceti viṃśatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6877: sa ca kleśo rāgaḥ pratigho māno vicikitsā cety ekaviṃśatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6882: [Tib.122b] ebhir api saṃprayukte citte ekaviṃśatir eva caitasikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6884: sa copakleśaḥ krodho vā yāvad vihiṃsā veti.
T07yabhkvyu:6885: kaukṛtyena ca saṃprayukte te ca pūrvoktāḥ tac ca kaukṛtyaṃ ity ekaviṃśatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6889: avidyāmātrasaṃprayukte cetasi akuśale dṛṣṭisaṃprayukte cākuśale viṃśatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6898: trayodaśeti kvacid anivṛtāvyākṛte kaukṛtyaṃ trayodaśamam adhikaṃ prakṣipya.
T07yabhkvyu:6899: middhaṃ pracalāyamānāvasthāyāṃ svapnadarśanāvasthāyāṃ vā kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6901: kathaṃ middhaṃ kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6903: kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6909: yatra trayoviṃśatiḥ kaukṛtyam adhikaṃ kvacid iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6911: evaṃ yāvad anyatra dvādaśavyākṛte matā middhaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 135) trayodaśaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6912: bahirdeśakamatena tu kautṛtyādhike caturdaśaṃ middhaṃ bhavatīti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6916: na kuśalaṃ nāpy avyākṛtaṃ kuta evākuśalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6927: te ca sa ca kleśa upakleśo vā tatraikānnaviṃśo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:6936: vicāraś ca māyāśāṭhyaṃ cety apiśabdād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6937: vicāraś ceti etāvati vaktavye vicāraś capīty apiśabdādhikyād arthādhikyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6938: māyāśāṭhyam api tatra nāstīty ayam aparārtho labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6949: brahmaṇo hi yāvac chāṭhyam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6955: kṣatriyaparṣat brāhmaṇaparṣat gṛhapatiparṣat śramaṇaparṣat cāturmahārājikaparṣat trayastriṃśatparṣat māraparṣat brahmaparṣat.
T07yabhkvyu:6956: tāsām anyatamo 'pi ūrdhvam ato nāstīti māyāśāṭhyabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6959: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadi niṣaṇṇo 'śvajitā bhikṣuṇā brahmalokagatena praśnaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 136) pṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6960: kutremāni catvāri mahābhūtāni apariśeṣaṃ [Tib.124a] nirudhyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6961: aprajānann ārūpyadhātau catvāri mahābhūtāni aśeṣaṃ nirudhyanta ity anavabudhyamānaḥ kṣepaṃ kathāprakaraṇam akārṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:6963: brahmety uktvā mahābrahmeti vacanaṃ brahmāntarebhya ātmano viśiṣṭatvapradarśanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6965: kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛja iti paryāyā uttarottaravyākhyāyogo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:6970: yā bhūmir yac cittaṃ yāvantaś ca caittāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6971: sā bhūmis tac cittaṃ tāvantaś ca caittā ity uktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:6991: bhayena vaśe vartituṃ śīlam asyeti bhayavaśavartī.
T07yabhkvyu:7001: avadyaṃ nāma yad garhitaṃ sadbhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7007: yadi tāvad evaṃ kriyeta na bhayam abhayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7012: atha punar evaṃ kriyate bhayaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlam asyeti bhayadarśī.
T07yabhkvyu:7016: tathā hy avidyāyogād bhayaṃ na paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:7026: hṛī lajjāyāṃ trapūṣ lajjāyām ity ekārthayor anayor dhātvoḥ katham arthāṃtare vācakatvam iti aparituṣyaṃto 'nye punar āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7028: evam api dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7029: asminn api pakṣe yugapadapekṣādvayāsaṃbhava iti paśyaṃś codaka aha.
T07yabhkvyu:7031: apiśabdena ayam api pakṣo duṣyatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7032: āhrīkyam anapatrāpyaṃ caikasmiṃś citte kathaṃ bhavata iti matvā codayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7033: dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7034: na khalūcyate yugapad ātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7036: kasyacid dhi doṣair ātmānam apekṣamāṇasyāpi na pravartate lajjā.
T07yabhkvyu:7044: dvitīyena kalpena ātmāpekṣayā doṣair alajjanaṃ āhrīkyaṃ parapekṣayānapatrāpyam iti anena.
T07yabhkvyu:7047: evam api dve apekṣe iti vistareṇa codyaparihārau vaktavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:7054: dvividhaṃ hi prema kliṣṭaṃ akliṣṭaṃ cetyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:7058: priyatārūpā tṛṣṇā nābhisaṃpratyayarūpeti śraddhā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7060: abhisaṃpratyayarūpatvāt spṛhaṇīyatvāc ca nirodhamārgasatyayos tadubhayātmakaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7063: evaṃ dharmālaṃbanasya premnaḥ śraddhāyāś ca catuḥkoṭikaṃ kṛtvā pudgalālaṃbanasya catuṣkoṭikaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:7066: ye pravrajitāḥ guror aṃte vasaṃtīti aṃtevāsinaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7068: teṣu putrādiṣu prema na gauravaṃ kliṣṭaṃ akliṣṭaṃ ceti saṃbhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7072: iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaṃ gauravaṃ na prema gauravasthānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7075: [Tib.126a] nobhayam etān ākārān sthāpayitvā yo 'nyo jano 'saṃbaddho nirguṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7076: tatra na prema na gauravam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7079: tasmān na saiva śraddhā premety ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7082: yathoktā hrīḥ sagauravatā sapratīśatā sabhayavaśavartitety uktā.
T07yabhkvyu:7086: hrīlakṣaṇaṃ tu gauravam ity uktaṃ tayor nānākaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7088: evaṃ hrīr api dharmeṣu ca pudgaleṣu ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7090: te tatra na sta iti pudgalālaṃbane śraddhāhriyāv adhikriyete yayor aikyaṃ manyante.
T07yabhkvyu:7091: te ārūpyadhātau na staḥ kāmarūpadhātvor eva bhavata ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7092: (II.34) kathaṃ punar anayor ekatra citte yoga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7093: na hi tad eva cittaṃ tadyogād audārikaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca yujyate vipratiṣedhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7095: niḥpūrvasya ṣṭhīvate niṣṭhāyām etad rūpaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7104: evaṃ vitarkavicārau cittasyaudārikatāsūkṣmatayor [Tib.126b] nimittabhūtau na tu punar audārikasūkṣmatāsvabhāvāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7108: brūyās tvam abhyupagamād adoṣa eṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7115: kāmadhātum apekṣya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmam alpābhisaṃskārataratvāt praśāntam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7116: tad eva punar dvitīyaṃ dhyānam apekṣya audārikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7118: prakārabhedād api tasyām eva bhūmau āpekṣikyāv audārikasūkṣmate.
T07yabhkvyu:7119: tadyathā ya eva te trayaḥ kleśānāṃ mūlaprakārā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā guṇānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7120: kāmadhātau yāvad bhavāgre teṣām adhimātraḥ kleśa audārikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7123: evaṃ bhūmiprakārabhedenāpekṣikyāv (Abhidh-k-vy 139) audārikasūkṣmate ity ā bhavāgrād audārikasūkṣmate syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7129: na caudarikatvena sūkṣmatvena ca vitarkavicārayor yathākramaṃ svabhāvabhedo yuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7132: na ca punar audārikasūkṣmatayaiva tayoḥ [Tib.127a] svabhāvabhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7139: vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣate nāvitarkya nāvicāryeti.
T07yabhkvyu:7140: vitarkavicārair evaṃ caivaṃ ca bhāṣiṣya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7143: karmaṇā svabhāvo dyotito na śakyam anyathā svalakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7148: kathaṃ punar anayor ekatra citte yoga ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7150: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audārika iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7151: ekatra citte vitarka audārikasvabhāvo 'nyo dharmo vicāras tu sūkṣmasvabhāvo 'paraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7152: tau ca yathākramaṃ cittaudārikatāsūkṣmatāhetutvāc cittaudārikatāsūkṣmatety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7156: na syād virodho yadi vitarkavicārayor jātibhedaḥ syād vedanāsaṃjñāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:7158: tayos tu jātibhedo 'stīti audārikasūkṣmatāyām apy ekatra citte na virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7159: ekasyāṃ tu jātau anavadhṛtalakṣaṇāyāṃ aikyena ca kaiścid gṛhītāyāṃ mṛdvadhimātratā audārikasūkṣmatālakṣaṇā [Tib.127b] yugapan na saṃbhavatety arthād ayugapat saṃbhavatīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7160: tathā hi vedanā anyo vā dharmaḥ paryāyeṇa mṛdutām adhimātratāṃ ca bhajate.
T07yabhkvyu:7174: bhavato 'pi hi kāmāvacarau vitarkavicārāv audārikau prathamadhyānabhūmikau sūkṣmau.
T07yabhkvyu:7178: na mṛdvadhimātratayā jātibhedo vyakto bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7180: ekatra ca citte audārikasūkṣmate bhavato na ca virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7182: yadā hi cittacaittakalāpe vitarka udbhūtavṛttir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7191: bhavati kasmiṃścit kalāpe kasyacid dharmasya udbhūtavṛttitvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7192: kiṃ tv anayor na lakṣaṇaṃ vivecitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7196: pratyekaṃ tu jātīnām audārikasūkṣmate iti tāv audārikasūkṣmatālakṣaṇau bhavitum arhato yathoktam iti naitad asmān ārādhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7197: naiva hi vitarkavicārāv ekatra citte bhavata ity apara ity ācāryamatam.
T07yabhkvyu:7202: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpo 'nabhyūhābhyūhāvasthayor yathākramaṃ sā ca cittasyaudārikatā.
T07yabhkvyu:7204: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā pratyavekṣako manojalpo 'nabhyūhābhyūhāvasthayor yathākramaṃ sā ca cittasūkṣmateti.
T07yabhkvyu:7205: asmin pakṣe vitarkavicārāv ekasvabhāvau samudāyarūpau paryāyavartinau paryeṣaṇapratyavekṣaṇākāramātreṇa bhinnāv iṣyete.
T07yabhkvyu:7207: tadyathā bahuṣu ghaṭeṣv avasthiteṣu ko 'tra dṛḍhaḥ ko jarjara iti muṣṭinābhighnato ya ūhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7209: iyaṃto jarjarā dṛḍhā veti yad ante grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7211: katham idānīṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcāṅgam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7212: viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti sūtre paṃcāṃgam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7214: bhūmitas tat paṃcāṅgam uktaṃ na kṣaṇata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7215: prathamadhyānabhūmiḥ [Tib.128b] kadācid vitarkeṇa vyavakīrṇā kadācid vicāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:7216: tad evaṃ saṃtānam adhikṛtya paṃcāṅgam uktaṃ na kṣaṇam adhikṛtyety adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7218: bhūtenābhūtena vā parata utkarṣaparikalpena śūro 'rthavān asmi śīlavān buddhisaṃpanna iti vā yā cetasa unnatiḥ sa māno nāma caitasiko dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7222: madas tu svadharmeṣv eva raktasyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7224: yena svadharmeṣv (Abhidh-k-vy 141) eva rūpaśauryādiṣu raktaṃ cetaḥ paryādīyate saṃnirudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7226: yaḥ svadharmeṣv eva raktasya darpacetasaḥ paryādānāt kuśaladharmakriyābhyaḥ pratisaṃhāraḥ mada iti ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7234: (II.35) uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ caittāḥ prakāreṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7242: tad eva manas tad eva vijñānam ity eko 'rtho 'syety ekārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7248: mana jñāna ity asya auṇādikapratyayāt tasyaitad rūpaṃ mana iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7249: vijānāty ālambanam iti vijñānaṃ kartari lyuṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:7252: āśrayabhūtaṃ manaḥ āśritabhūtaṃ vijñānam iti āśrayabhāvāpekṣaṃ manaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7260: ya eva hi cittacaittā ity anena śabdenābhihitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7261: ta eva sāśrayā ity anenāpi śabdenābhidhīyante.
T07yabhkvyu:7268: yena te sālambanāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 142) tasyaivālaṃbanasya prakāreṇa grahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7270: vijñānaṃ hi nīlaṃ pītaṃ vā vastu vijānāti upalabhata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7274: atha vā tasyaivālambanasya vijñānaṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa upalabhyatārūpaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:7286: yadi hi nīlākāraṃ cittaṃ nīlākārā eva tatsaṃprayuktā vedanādaya utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:7287: yasmiṃś ca kāle cittaṃ tasminn eva vedanādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7288: yathā ca cittadravyam ekam evotpadyate na dve trīṇi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7289: tathā vedanādravyaṃ ekam evotpadyate na dve trīṇi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7292: yathaiva hy ekaṃ cittaṃ evaṃ caittā api ekaikā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7293: (II.36) viprayuktān vaktukāma ācārya upodghātaṃ karoti nirdiṣṭāś cittacaittāḥ savistaraprabhedā viprayuktās tv [Tib.130a] avasaraprāptā idānīm ucyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7309: saṃghabhedaprabhṛtayo hi dravyataś cittaviprayuktā iṣyante iti ye 'py evaṃjātīyakā iti śāstre 'py uktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7311: cittam iva cittena ca viprayuktā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7314: rūpitvād eva hi viprayuktatve 'pi rūpaṃ na viprayuktatve nāma labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:7315: yad vāmīṣāṃ nāmarūpam iti nāmatvaṃ tat teṣāṃ cittena samānajātīyatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7317: te tu cittena sahālambane saṃprayuktās tadviśeṣaṇārthaṃ viprayuktagrahaṇaṃ asaṃskṛtam api tatsamānajātīyam anālaṃbanatveneti tatparihārārthaṃ saṃskāragrahaṇaṃ [Tib.130b] ata evāha.
T07yabhkvyu:7318: ime saṃskārā na cittena saṃprayuktā na ca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktā ucyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7338: vihīnasya tadyathā kāmāvacarasya kāmavairāgyeṇa tyaktasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇyā vā punaḥpratilambhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7341: yaś ca pratilambhaḥ yaś ca samanvāgamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7342: sā dvidhā prāptir iti pratilambhe samanvāgame ca prāptiśabdo vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:7343: abhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama ity eka evārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7344: tathā hi prathame kṣaṇe duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ prāptiḥ pratilambha iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7346: prathamakṣaṇastha [Tib.131a] āryapudgalo duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā samanvāgata ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7350: na hi bhedavivakṣāyām api paryāyavacanena lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ kalpate.
T07yabhkvyu:7356: pūrvānte ajñānam aparānta ajñānam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7358: viparyayād evāprāptir iti siddhe naitadarthaṃ sūtraṃ kartavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7359: aprāptir apratilambho 'samanvāgama iti viparyayād etat trayaṃ gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7365: apratilabdhena vihīnena ca dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣv asamanvāgama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7373: na hi parakīyaiḥ kaścit samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7374: nāpy asaṃtatipatitānām iti nāsattvasaṃtatipatitānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7376: na hy asattvasaṃkhyātaiḥ [Tib.131b] kaścit samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7378: cakṣurādayaḥ sattvasaṃkhyātāḥ keśādayo rūpīndriyasambaddhāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā eva veditavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7380: tathā hi rūpīndriyopaghātāt pālityādivikāraḥ keśādīnāṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7381: rasāyanopayogena cānugrahāt pālityādipratyāpattir iti sarveṣāṃ sattvasaṃkhyātānāṃ prāptir bhavatīti siddhaṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7383: iti pratisaṃkhyānirodhāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor asattvasaṃkhyātayor api prāptyaprāptī bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7390: sakalabandhanāś cādikṣaṇasthāś ca ta iti sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7391: te varjyā eṣāṃ tair vā varjyāḥ sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7396: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyāṃ kṣāṃtivadhyāḥ [Tib.132a] kleśāś chidyante na chinnāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7400: ekaprakāropalikhitādayas tv āryā laukikamārgaprāptena nirodhena tasyām avasthāyāṃ samanvāgatāḥ.
