T07yabhkvyu:7401: ata ūrdhvaṃ dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu samanvāgatā eva anāsravamārgaprāptenāpi nirodhena.
T07yabhkvyu:7402: pṛthagjanāś ca kecit samanvāgatā ity ekaprakāropalikhitādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7403: ākāśena tu nāsti kaścit samanvāgata iti asaṃbaṃdhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7406: yasya ca nāsti prāptis tasyāprāptir api nāstīti siddhānta eṣa vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7413: aṣṭāv aśaikṣāṇy āryamārgāṃgāni samyagvimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7419: paṃcāṃgāni satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7421: imāni tu prayujyamānāni paṃcāṃgāni paśyāmo yad utordhvabhāgīyāni rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:7422: pratinidhibhūtāyāḥ prāpter yogāt prakṛtistho 'py arhann ārya ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7426: tena tarhy asattvākhyair api cakraratnādibhiḥ parasattvair api strīratnādibhiḥ samanvāgamo dravyasan prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:7430: rājā bhikṣavaś cakravartī saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7432: tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam eva saptamam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7433: ebhis saptabhī ratnais samanvāgamaḥ sūtra ukto na ca dvavyato 'stīti anaikāntikatāṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7437: na dravyasan daśāśaikṣadharmasamanvāgamaḥ samanvāgamasvābhāvyāc cakravartisaptaratnasamanvāgamavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7445: pravacane hi dvividham iṣyate dravyasac ca vastu prajñaptisac ceti katham ayuktir iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7448: iha yad dravyasad vastu tat pratyakṣagrāhyaṃ [Tib.133a] vā bhaved anumānagrāhyaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7454: prāptiḥ punar na pratyakṣagrāhyā na cānumānagrāhyā tatsiddhau niravadyānumānādarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7455: tasmād dravyadharmāsambhavād ayoga iti sthitam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:7458: yasya prāptir asti sa utpadyate hetusadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7459: asaṃskṛtasya na syāt prāptir yasmād asaṃskṛtam anutpādyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7460: ye ca dharmā aprāptā duḥkhe (Abhidh-k-vy 146) dharmajñānakṣāntyādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7462: tadyathā kāmāvacarā akliṣṭā ūrdhvabhūmyupapattyā kliṣṭāś ca vairāgyeṇa tyaktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7463: teṣāṃ dhātupratyāgamataḥ parihāṇyā vā katham utpattiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7476: tena yadi lakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām utpattiḥ prāptihetukocyeta tatra jātiḥ kiṃkarī.
T07yabhkvyu:7489: teṣāṃ sakalabandhanānāṃ khalv api mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattiprakārabhedo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7492: vikalabandhanānāṃ hi prāptivaikalyān mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedaḥ parikalpyeta na tu sakalabaṃdhanānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7495: yato vā kāraṇād abhyāsato 'nyato vā sa bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7508: laukikaṃ mānasam eṣāṃ te ime laukikamānasāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7517: teṣāṃ na syād vyavasthānam iti paricchedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7528: nanu ca pṛthagjanā api kecit prahīṇakleśā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:7533: eṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣām aprahīṇa iti yad etad vyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7535: prāptau tu satyāṃ kleśaprāptyā etat sidhyati vyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7541: nanu ca pṛthagjanānām api keṣāṃcit kleśaprāptir vigatā.
T07yabhkvyu:7544: sa tarhi lokottaramārgakṛto [Tib.134b] viśeṣaḥ kathaṃ paricchidyate lokottareṇeyaṃ kleśaprāptir vigatā laukikeneyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7547: ātmabhāvaviśeṣād etad vyavasthānaṃ eṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣām aprahīṇaḥ kleśa iti sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:7553: evaṃ yathoktena nyāyenābījībhūtaḥ āśrayaḥ kleśānāṃ prahīṇakleśa ity ucgate.
T07yabhkvyu:7556: tena laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇa iti śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7561: yaś cāprahīṇo 'nantaroktena vidhinā darśanaprahātavyaḥ kāmāvacaro yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ bhāvanāprahātavyo vā kāmāvacaro yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7563: yaś ca prahīṇas tathaiva yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7583: tasyāśrayasya tadbījabhāvasya upaghāto mithyādṛṣṭyā veditavyo nānyathā.
T07yabhkvyu:7585: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījabhāvasyātyantaṃ saṃtatau samudghāto yathā kleśānām āryamārgeṇātyantaṃ saṃtatau samudghāta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7598: tasmād bījam eva śaktiviśeṣa evātra samanvāgamāvasthāyām anapoddhṛtaṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām āryamārgeṇānupahataṃ laukikena mārgeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:7600: paripuṣṭaṃ ca vaśitvakāle yatnabhāvināṃ kuśalānāṃ bījam iti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7607: yat paṃcaskandhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ phalotpattisamarthaṃ sākṣād anantaraṃ [Tib.135b] pāraṃparyeṇa dūrataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7613: kiṃ yathā sāṃkhyānām avasthitadravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāṃtaraprādurbhāvaḥ tathāvasthāyinyāḥ saṃtater anyathātvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7618: hetuphalam iti nairantaryeṇa pravṛttās traiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃtatir iti vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:7622: lobhena samanvāgataḥ abhavyaḥ ayogyaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni utpādayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7624: bījaṃ nityam astīti smṛtyupasthānotpattir na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7625: bhavadīyāyām api prāptau tadutpattir na syād iti tulyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:7631: sarvaprakāreṇa yady utpattihetur yadi vyavasthāhetur yady āśrayaviśeṣaḥ yady adhivāsanam avinodanaṃ vā sarvathā prajñaptidharmaḥ prajñaptyā saṃvṛtyā vyavahāreṇa dharmaḥ prajñaptidharmo na dravyadharmaḥ na dravyato dharmaḥ svabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7632: atha vā dravyaṃ ca tad dharmaś ca sa dravyadharmo [Tib.136a] na rūpādivat vidyamānasvalakṣaṇo dharma ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7633: tasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ tasya ca prajñaptidharmasya pratiṣedho 'samanvāgama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7634: idam asyeti jñānacihnaṃ pratilabdhadharmāvipraṇāśakāraṇaṃ ca prāptir ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7635: idam asyeti jñānacihnaṃ ity asiddham etat.
T07yabhkvyu:7641: sa eva ca śaktiviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bījabhāvam ācāryena vyavasthāpitaṃ dūṣayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7642: kim ayaṃ śaktiviśeṣaś cittād arthāntaram ato 'narthāntaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7648: nanv akuśalaṃ kuśalasya bījaṃ abhyupagataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7650: ko hi nāma auṣṇyasya tejaso 'narthāntaratve saty auṣṇyam eva dāhakam adhyavasyen na tejaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7651: kuśalabījaṃ hy akuśale cetasy avyākṛte vā vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:7652: evam akuśalabījaṃ kuśale cetasy avyākṛte vā vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:7653: tathaiva cāvyākṛtabījam api kuśale (Abhidh-k-vy 149) cākuśale ca vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:7654: sāsravabījaṃ cānāsrave 'nāsravabījaṃ ca sāsrave cetasi vartata iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7657: tat tu bījaṃ na cittād arthāntaraṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7661: kuśalena hi cittenotpannena svajātīye 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7664: tad viśiṣṭaṃ cittaṃ kuśalabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7665: evam akuśalenāpi svajātīye 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7666: tac ca tena viśiṣṭaṃ cittam akuśalabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7667: evam avyākṛtenāpi cittena svajātīye 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7668: tac cāpi tena viśiṣṭam avyākṛtabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7670: anāsraveṇāpi sāsrava ity evam anyonyabījādhāyakam anyonyajanakaṃ ca cittaṃ cittāntarād utpadyamāmaṃ anyonyavāsyavasakatvena pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:7671: na ca kuśalenākuśale citte śaktiviśeṣa āhita iti tad akuśalaṃ kuśalatām āpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7681: yadā sāsravacittasamanaṃtaraṃ [Tib.137a] anāsravaṃ anāsravacittasamanantaraṃ vā sāsravacittam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7682: tadā kiṃ pūrvakaḥ sāsravakalāpo 'nāsravakalāpo vā śaktimān samanantarapratyayādibhāvenottarakalāpotpattāv utāśaktimān.
T07yabhkvyu:7686: sā śaktiḥ kiṃ sāsrave cetasi sāsravā āhosvid anāsravā.
T07yabhkvyu:7687: tac cittaṃ sāsravasyānāsravasya ca cittāntarasya samanantarapratyayādibhāvaṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7688: tat kiṃ yayaiva śaktyā sāsravasya samanantarapratyayādibhāvaṃ kuryāt tayaivānāsravasya.
T07yabhkvyu:7689: yadi tayaiva kathaṃ śaktikāryasāṃkaryaṃ na bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:7691: katham anayor ekatra śaktyos tasmāc cittād ananyayor bhinnarūpatā bhinnakāryatā ca yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7693: asmākam api cittād ananyāsāṃ śaktīnāṃ tatrāvasthānaṃ kāryabhedaś ca bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:7694: evam anāsravasyāpi cittasya sāsravānāsravacittasamanantarapratyayādibhāvena saṃbhavataḥ tathaiva śaktyor bhinnarūpatā kāryabhedaś ca vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7695: tena yad uktaṃ nanv akuśalaṃ kuśalasya bījam (Abhidh-k-vy 150) abhyupagataṃ bhavatītyādi tad ayuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7696: na hi kuśalāhitena śaktiviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaṃ samartham akuśalam akuśalabījakāryaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:7699: svāhitena tu śaktiviśeṣeṇa tad akuśalaṃ svabījakāryaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:7702: brūyās tvam akuśalacitte tat kuśalabījam āhitaṃ kathaṃ akuśalaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7705: tathā śaktiviśiṣṭam akuśalaṃ cittaṃ janyeta yathā tac cittaṃ svotpattiyogyaṃ bhaviṣyati sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa veti śaktiviśeṣa eva bījaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7710: (II.38, 39ab) atītānāṃ dharmāṇām atītāpi prāptir iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7711: atītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadyathā kliṣṭānām atītā prāptir yā utpannaniruddhā sāgrajāpi saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7719: tathā pratyutpannānām apy atītā prāptir yāgrajotpannaniruddhā.
T07yabhkvyu:7723: na tv ekasyātītasyāvaśyaṃ trividhā prāptir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7724: na hi vipākajasyānāgatātītā vā prāptiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7727: [Tib.138a] yadi tu pratidravyaṃ prāptivyavasthā kriyeta saṃbhavaṃ praty etad evaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:7728: kliṣṭānām utpattipratilaṃbhikānāṃ ca kuśalānām atītādīnām atītādayaḥ prāptayo 'vaśyaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:7729: na hi pṛthagjanasyānutpannasya anāsravasya mārgasyātītā pratyutpannā ca prāptir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7753: kāmadhātūpapannasya [Tib.138b] kāmāvacarādīnāṃ yathāsaṃbhavam apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya prāptiḥ kāmāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:7757: na tu teṣāṃ vaśena yeṣām apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7758: yadi hy evaṃ syāt mārgasatyasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaprāptir anāsravā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7762: rūpāvacareṇa tu mārgeṇa prāptasya rūpāvacarī prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7765: āryasya tu rūpāvacareṇa mārgeṇa prāptasya rūpāvacarī cānāsravā cārūpyāvacareṇārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7771: samāsena traidhātukī cānāsravā ceti uktam arthaṃ nigamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7776: śaikṣāśaikṣebhyas tv anye naiva śaikṣā nāśaikṣāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7777: asaṃskṛtā api yāvan naiva śaikṣā nāśaikṣā iṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:7781: śaikṣī aśaikṣī naiva śaikṣī nāśaikṣī ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:7785: tasyaiva pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa prāptasya śaikṣī.
T07yabhkvyu:7789: yady api sā vajropamena śaikṣeṇa prāpyate tadāvāhakatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7790: tatprāptatvavacane tu śaikṣyāḥ prāpteḥ aśaikṣī prāptir viśeṣitā syād iti na tena śaikṣeṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 152) aśaikṣīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7794: āryeṇa laukikamārgaprāptasya pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya prāptiḥ kiṃ sāsravā utāho 'nāsravā.
T07yabhkvyu:7801: yā tv asaṃkīrṇā prāptiḥ saivehocyate iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7827: tac ca kliṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva vijñaptirūpaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7831: tad eva cādhimātraṃ vijñapticittaṃ avijñaptiṃ notthāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7836: abhijñādvayādīnāṃ tu pūrvaṃpaścātsahajā prāptir iti tadbhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7839: yadi kuśalasya yady akuśalasya nāsty eva sarvathety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7841: tadyathā prathamasya vijñaptyavijñaptikṣaṇasya ādau sahajā prāptir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7842: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tasyaivādyasya kṣaṇasya paścātkālajā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7843: evam anyeṣām api dvitīyādīnāṃ kṣaṇānāṃ sahajā paścātkālajā prāptir veditavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:7844: kāmāvacarasyaiva rūpasyāgrajā (Abhidh-k-vy 153) prāptipratiṣedhād dhyānānāsravasaṃvararūpasyāgrajā prāptir asty evety utsṛṣṭā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7849: yadi kuśalā syāt samucchinnakuśalamūlasya na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7859: aprāptānāṃ prāptavihīnānāṃ ca prāyogikānāṃ guṇānām anāgatānāṃ ca cakṣurādīnām api ca yeṣāṃ [Tib.140b] prāptir nāsti atītāpy asty aprāptir anāgatāpi
T07yabhkvyu:7860: srotonyāyena hi teṣām aprāptir utpadyate nirudhyate 'nāgatavasthāneti.
T07yabhkvyu:7868: tasmāt kāmadhātūpapannasya kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ anāsravāṇāṃ ca dharmāṇām aprāptiḥ kāmāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:7871: tadyathā kāmadhātūpapannasya prāyogikānāṃ guṇānām upapattilābhikānām api kuśalasamucchedāvasthāyām aprāptir avītarāgatvāc ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇām akliṣṭānām aprāptiḥ pṛthagjanatvāc cānāsravāṇām aprāptiḥ kāmāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:7872: tathā rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmisaṃcāratyaktānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca prāyogikānāṃ guṇānāṃ pṛthagjanatvāc cānāsravāṇām aprāptī
T07yabhkvyu:7873: tathaiva cārūpyadhātūpapannasya kāmarūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmisaṃcāratyaktānām ārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca prāyogikāṇāṃ [Tib.141a] guṇānāṃ pṛthagjanatvād eva cānāsravāṇām aprāptir ārūpyāvacarīty neyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7875: āryadharmāṇām alābha ity anena śāstrapāṭhenānāsravatvābhāvam aprāpter darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7877: āryadharmā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntim ārabhya sarvo 'nāsravo mārga iti ata evaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:7882: yady (Abhidh-k-vy 154) evam utpannāyām api duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau pariśiṣṭānām āryadharmāṇām alābho 'syāstīti anāryaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7888: yady āryadharmāṇāṃ lābhe 'pi sati anyeṣām api dharmāṇām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam iṣyate buddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhasaṃtānikair āryadharmair asamanvāgamāt anāryaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7898: [Tib.141b] atha vā apa eva yo bhakṣayati so 'bbhakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7899: yo vāyum eva bhakṣayati sa vāyubhakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7902: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāṃ ity apara iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7903: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntes tatsahabhuvāṃ ca vedanādīnāṃ dharmāṇām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:7904: asmiṃ pakṣe utpannāyām api duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau pariśiṣṭānām āryadharmāṇām alābho 'stīty anāryaḥ syād iti yo doṣa uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7907: tadā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāṃ vihānir iti phalaprāptāv anāryaḥ syād iti doṣaparihārārtham āha.
T07yabhkvyu:7909: na ca teṣāṃ kṣāṃtisahabhuvāṃ tyāgād anāryatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7913: asāv atyantaṃ hatas tatsaṃtāne punar anutpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7919: evaṃ tarhi sa eva doṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7920: buddho 'pi trigotrālābhād anāryaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7922: sa tu yo vinālābheneti pūrvavat prapaṃco yāvat tadyathā abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7924: kṣāṃtipariśiṣṭāryadharmālābhasadbhāvād anāryaḥ syād ity asya doṣasya parihārāya kṣāntitatsahabhuvām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam iti yo yatnas sa vyarthaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7927: anutpannā āryadharmā asyām ity anutpannāryadharmā saṃtatiḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7929: arthād utpannāryadharmā saṃtatir āryatvam ity uktaṃ bhavati āśrayaparāvṛtteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7936: tasyāryamārgasya lābhāt tat pṛthagjanatvam alābhalakṣaṇaṃ vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7942: tasmād asya kāmāvacarasya sattvasya kāmāvacaram eva pṛthagjanatvam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7944: atas traidhātukaṃ vihīyata iti ayujyamānam etat paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7945: atha punar anutpattidharmatāṃ tad āpannam iti kṛtvā traidhātukaṃ tad vihīyata iti upacārakalpanā.
T07yabhkvyu:7948: kāmāvacarasyaiva tv ekasya pṛthagjanatvasya prāptir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7950: tac ca kāmavairāgye navame vimuktimārge prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7951: rūpārūpyadhātvor utpadyamānasya tv āryasya pratibhūmyavasthitānāṃ pṛthagjanatvānāṃ āryamārgaprāptisāmarthyān naiva prāptir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7952: pratibhūmi tu navame vimuktimārge teṣāṃ prahāṇaṃ bhavatīti avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7954: yadā ca kāmadhātor vairāgyaṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:7955: tadā ca tat kāmāvacaraṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7959: ūrdhvabhūmeś cādharāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃcarate ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyata iti vaktavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:7961: yathāryamārgasya prāptyā pṛthagjanatvam aprāptir vihīyata iti yojitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7962: evam anyeṣām api śrutacintāmayādikānāṃ dharmāṇām aprāptir vihīyata iti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7964: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tāvac chrutacintāmayādikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prāptilābhād aprāptir vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7965: upapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ prāptyā samucchinnakuśalasyāprāptir vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7967: yadā cāyaṃ kāmadhātoś cyutvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upapattyā saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:7968: tadā ca tadbhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skaṃdhānām aprāptir vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7972: evaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ prāyogikāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ prāpter aprāptir vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7974: ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skandhānāṃ tadbhūmisaṃcārād vihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7975: idam ekeṣāṃ bhūmi saṃcāravyākhyānodāharaṇaṃ tatra aviviktaṃ paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7976: ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skandhānām aprāptir na kevalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārād vibīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7980: tadyathā dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikānāṃ prāyogikāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ tadalābhinaḥ kāmāvacarasya sattvasyāprāptir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7981: sa yadi kāmavairāgyaṃ kṛtvā prathamadhyāna upapadyate (Abhidh-k-vy 156).
T07yabhkvyu:7993: prāptyutpādāt tena dharmeṇa cittena vā samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8002: dvitīye kṣaṇe tasya dharmasya tatprāpteḥ prāptiprāpteś ca prāptaya iti tisraḥ prāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8004: tābhis tisṛbhiḥ prāptibhiḥ samanvāgamārthaṃ punas tisro 'nuprāptaya udbhavantīti ṣaḍ bhavanti prāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8006: dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ navānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdham anuprāptibhir aṣṭādaśa bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:8015: caturthe kṣaṇe prathamakṣaṇotpannais tribhir dharmaiḥ prāptyanuprāptimadbhir bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8016: dvitīyakṣaṇotpannābhir api ṣaḍbhiḥ prāptyanuprāptibhiḥ punaḥ prāptyanuprāptimatībhir bhavitavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:8017: evaṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇotpannābhir aṣṭādaśabhiḥ prāptyanuprāptibhiḥ punar api prāptyanuprāptimatībhir bhavitavyam iti prathamadvitīyatṛtīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ prāptayaḥ sārdham anuprāptibhis tāvatībhir iti catuḥpaṃcāśat prāptayaś caturthe kṣaṇe bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:8018: paṃcame tu kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyatṛtīyakṣaṇotpannāḥ prāptyanuprāptayaḥ punaś catuḥpaṃcāśac caturthakṣaṇotpannaprāptyanuprāptayaś ca dviścatuḥpaṃcāśad
T07yabhkvyu:8026: anādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānām anādāv anante ca saṃsāre saṃgṛhītānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8034: kevalaṃ na pratighātinyaḥ arūpiṇītvāt yato 'vakāśaṃ labhaṃte prāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8037: samāno bhāgo bhajanam eṣām iti sabhāgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8043: sattvānāṃ sāmyaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8045: sattvānāṃ sattvasaṃkhyātānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sādṛśyaṃ sabhāgatā.
T07yabhkvyu:8048: jñānaprasthānādike śāstre nikāyasabhāga iti anayā saṃjñayā ayaṃ cittaviprayukto nirdiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8049: iha tu ślokabandhānuguṇyāt sabhāgateti anayā saṃjñayety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8052: sā pratisattvam [Tib.144b] anyānyāpy abhinnety ucyate sādṛśyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8053: na hi sā yathā vaiśeṣikāṇām ekā nityā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8054: bhinnā yā kvacid vartate kvacin na vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:8069: yadi skandhasabhāgatādravyam aviśiṣṭaṃ na syād anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu skandheṣu skandhaḥ skandha ity abhedena buddhir na syāt prajñaptiś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8070: evaṃ dhātvādibuddhiprajñaptayo 'pi yojyā ity eke paṭhanti.
T07yabhkvyu:8072: yadi sabhāgateti vistareṇa yāvad anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu dhātuṣu kāmāvacaraḥ kāmāvacara iti abhedena buddhir na syāt prajñaptiś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8074: syāt cyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyān na ca pratilabheteti.
T07yabhkvyu:8078: sattvasabhāgatā hy atra catuḥkoṭike vivakṣitā na dharmasabhāgateti.
T07yabhkvyu:8079: na tu sattvas sattva ity ākārasabhāgatehābhipretā.
T07yabhkvyu:8081: tṛtīyā koṭir na sidhyeta gatisaṃcāre 'pi tasyāḥ sattvasabhāgatāyās tādavasthyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8084: manuṣyagateś cyavate maraṇād upapadyate ca tasyām eva pratisaṃdhibandhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8085: na cāsau manuṣyasabhāgatāṃ vijahāti na ca pratilabhate tasyā manuṣyasabhāgatāyās tādavasthyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8087: sa sattvasabhāgatāṃ pṛthagjanatvasvabhāvāṃ sabhāgatāṃ vijahāti āryatvasvabhāvāṃ sabhāgatām aparāṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:8090: cyavate tathaiva maraṇād upapadyate ca pratisaṃdhibandhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8095: tadyathā jīvan pṛthagjana āryo vā kiṃcid alabhamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8096: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyam asti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena āryadharmalābhasvabhāvena kalpitena prayojanam iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8097: pṛthagjanasabhāgatayaiva pṛthagjana iti paricchidyeta yathā [Tib.145b] manuṣyasabhāgatayaiva manuṣya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8098: na hi manuṣysabhāgatāyā anyan manuṣyatvaṃ kalpyate vaibhāṣikair alābhavad anyasvabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8103: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyati arūpiṇītvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8104: na lokaś cakṣuṣā sabhāgatāṃ paśyaty arūpiṇītvād arūpavatītvād arūpasvabhāvatvād vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8105: yathā na paśyati evaṃ na śṛṇoti yāvan na spṛśatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8110: satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8112: sā tu na sabhāgatayā dravyāntarakalpitayā kṛtā pramāṇenānupalabhyamānatvena tasyā vyāpārasaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8117: vayam api tāṃ sāmānyabuddhiṃ sanimittāṃm brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8119: tac ca sādṛśyaṃ na dravyāntaram iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8121: api cāsattvasabhāgatāpi kiṃ neṣyata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8122: na dravyāntarasabhāgatānimittā sattvaḥ sattva iti sāmānyabuddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8126: na ca teṣāṃ svajātisādṛśyaṃ svato 'rthāntaraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8128: anyā sattvasabhāgatānyā dhātusabhāgatānyā gatisabhāgateti anyonyabhinnāḥ sabhāgatā iṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:8129: tāsāṃ sabhāgateti prajñaptir iyaṃ sabhāgatā iyaṃ sabhāgatety abhedena kathaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8131: yady atrāpi sabhāgatāntaraṃ pratijñāyeta yena sabhāgatāsāmānyabuddhir bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:8141: na hi paralokāstitvādīni vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitānīti na vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:8144: saced itthaṃtvaṃ āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ prāpnoti prāṇātipātenālpāyur bhavatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8151: ta eva hi saṃskārās tathākāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyaṃte iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8158: yenānāgate 'dhvany avasthitāś cittacaittāḥ kālāṃtaraṃ tāvatkālaṃ saṃnirudhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8164: yathā brahmapurohitā nāma te devā yeṣāṃ kecin mahābrahmāṇaḥ pradeśe bhavaṃti dhyānāṃtarikāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8165: tathā bṛhatphalā nāma te devā yeṣām asaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8167: upapattikāle cyutikāle ca saṃjñina iti saṃbaṃdhanīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8177: kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīm iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8183: (II.43) asaṃjñināṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattir asaṃjñā vā samāpattir iti asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8191: yata eva parihīṇo 'pi punar utpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyate tata eva tallābhī niyāmaṃ nāvakrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:8200: caturthadhyānalābhād atītānāgatam anādimati saṃsāre labdhapūrvaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ pratilabhaṃte yoginaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8201: tasmāt kiṃ tadvad eva atītānāgatāṃ tāṃ pratilabhaṃta iti pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:8203: pṛthagjanā api tāvan nātītānāgatāṃ pratilabhaṃte yeṣāṃ tāvad iyaṃ ātmīyā samāpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8204: kiṃ punar āryā yeṣām iyam anātmīyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8206: anādimati saṃsāre labdhapūrvāpi mahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvān mahāyatnābhiniṣpādyatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8213: prāptiś ca tasya tasminn eva kṣaṇe utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8214: labdhayā tu tayā samāpattyā dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu prātimokṣasaṃvaravad eva samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8219: na tv iyaṃ acittaketi na tadvad anāgatā bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8223: yathāsaṃjñisamāpattinirdeśe athāśabdena nirodhaś cittacaittānām iti atidiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8230: sā pūrvā asyeti śāṃtavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakaḥ manasikāro manaskāra iti yo 'rthaḥ aluksamāsāt sa manasikāra iti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8231: saṃjñāveditasamudācārapariśrāṃtā hi tatra śāṃtavihārasaṃjñinas tathāvidhena manasikāreṇa enāṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8232: tāṃ tv asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa mokṣasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇety (Abhidh-k-vy 161) arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8237: ya āryaḥ kāmadhātau nirodhasamāpattim utpādya bhavāgra utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:8239: yas tu tataḥ parihīṇo rūpadhātāv upapadya kālāṃtareṇa ca punar api bhavāgraṃ labdhvā nirodhasamāpattim utpādyānutpādya vā bhavāgra upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8245: vyathaṃte hy apunarbhavāt prapātād iva bāliśāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8248: rūpe hy ātmasaṃjñām abhiniveśya tāṃ samāpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8249: nirodhasamāpattau tu ārūpyabhūmikatvād rūpam api nāstīti sarvātmabhāvabhāvaṃ paśyaṃto na tāṃ samāpattum utsahaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8251: kasmāt tatrātmasaṃjñām abhiniveśya tāṃ na samāpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8254: kathaṃ punar gamyate āryamārgabalena tad utpādanam iti ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8262: dṛṣṭe janmani etan nirvāṇam iti āryas tām adhimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8270: dṛṣṭanirvāṇa āryas tām adhimucyate nānya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8271: nanu ca pṛthagjano 'pi laukikena mārgeṇa dṛṣṭanirvāṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8274: taduttarāṃ hi bhūmiṃ pṛthagjanaḥ śāṃtataḥ paśyan vairāgyaṃ labhate na nirvāṇam iti acodyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:8276: [Tib.149a] iyam api samāpattir asaṃjñisamāpattivad eva mahābhisaṃskārasādhyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8299: na te prāyogikaṃ kiṃcit kuśalaṃ kuśalāntaga
T07yabhkvyu:8309: dharmataiṣā yad bodhisattvaś caramabhaviko bhavāgralābhī bhūtvā caturthadhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa darśanamārgam [Tib.149b] utpādya tataś ca vyutthāya bhavāgraṃ samāpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8311: tato vyutthāya punaś caturthadhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa bhāvāgrikabhāvanāprahātavyakleśaprahāṇaṃ kṛtvā kṣayajñānakālāt prabhṛti anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddho bhavatīty evaṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ sa tām utpādayatīti pāścātyāḥ kaśmīramaṇḍalāt paścād bhavāḥ pāścātyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8314: nirodhasamāpattim utpādya kṣayajñānam utpādayatīti vaktavayṃ tathāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8316: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtim ārabhya yāvan mārge 'nvayajñanam iti ṣoḍaśabhiś cittakṣaṇaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8318: navaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇāya navānaṃtaryamārgā nava ca vimuktimārgā ity aṣṭādaśabhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8319: ta ete catustriṃśad bhavaṃti ṣoḍaśa caṣṭādaśa ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8321: kāmāvacarādīnāṃ kleśānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa pṛthagjanatvāvasthāyām eva prahīṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8322: yady eṣa niyamaḥ prahīṇakleśapratipakṣotpādanaṃ na kartavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8323: atha kimarthaṃ prahīṇeṣu kāmāvacareṣu kleśeṣu tatpratipakṣaṃ dharmajñānapakṣam mārgam abhisamayakāla utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8325: [Tib.150a] na hy asatyāṃ dharmajñānapakṣotpattāv anvayajñānapakṣasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8326: etad dhy anvayajñānasyānvayajñānatvaṃ yad ataḥ paścād bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8329: ko doṣaḥ syād yadi visabhāgaṃ sāsravaṃ cittam aṃtarā saṃmukhīkuryāt (Abhidh-k-vy 163).
T07yabhkvyu:8336: īdṛśāni kuśalamūlāni bodhisattvānāṃ yaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtais tāvan na vyuttiṣṭhaṃte yāvad ekāsana evānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāpteti.
T07yabhkvyu:8338: satyam avyutthānāśayo na tu yathā bhavaṃto varṇayaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8341: (II.45cd) yady apy anayor bahuprakāro viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8351: yaḥ kvacid rūpabhavaḥ sarvo 'sau bhavaḥ paṃcavyavacāra iti catuḥkoṭikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8352: syād rūpabhavo na cāsau bhavaḥ paṃcavyavacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8353: [Tib.150b] rūpāvacarāṇāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānām asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ ca samāpannānām asaṃjñināṃ ca devānām āsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8354: syād bhavaḥ paṃcavyavacāro na cāsau rūpabhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8355: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sabhāge citte sthitānāṃ yo bhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8356: syād rūpabhavaḥ sa ca bhavaḥ paṃcavyavacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8357: rūpāvacarāṇāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ sabhāge citte sthitānāṃ asaṃjñināṃ ca devānām āsaṃjñike 'pratilabdhe yo bhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8358: syān naiva rūpabhavo na cāsau bhavaḥ paṃcavyavacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8359: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānām asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ yo bhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8373: tatra yadi rūpadhātāv asaṃjñisamāpattir neṣyate asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ [Tib.151a] samāpannānām iti nocyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:8375: tatra api tv ayaṃ viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8378: ya āryā nirodhasamāpattim utpādya tataḥ parihīṇā dhyānaṃ ca labdhvā rūpadhātāv upapadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8381: asaṃjñisamāpattis tu kāmarūpadhātau prathamato 'pi pṛthagjanair utpādyata ity ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8384: katham ataḥ parihāṇir ity asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:8387: udāyī tu tatra vibaṃdhaka ity udāyisūtram ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8391: ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati samādhisampannaś ca prajñāsaṃpannaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8392: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8393: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:8394: sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipady evājñām ārāgayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8396: bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8397: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ [Tib.151b] samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8398: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:8399: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān udāyī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhut saṃnipatitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8400: athāyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:8401: asthānam etad āyuṣmaṃ chāriputrānavakāśo yad bhikṣur anyatamasmiṃ divye manomaye kāye upapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣtḥate cāsti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:8402: dvir api trir api āyuṣmāṃ udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:8406: yāvat trir api me ayaṃ bhikṣur bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.
T07yabhkvyu:8407: na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.
T07yabhkvyu:8408: yan nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8410: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vaṃditvaikāṃte niṣaṇṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8411: ekāṃte niṣaṇṇaś cāyuśmāṃ chāriputro bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:8415: evaṃ dvir api trir apy āyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:8418: śāstur api me purastād ayaṃ bhikṣur yāvat trir api bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.
T07yabhkvyu:8419: na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī [Tib.152a] bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.
T07yabhkvyu:8422: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:8423: kaṃ punas tvam udāyinn anyatamaṃ divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ saṃjānīṣe.
T07yabhkvyu:8426: tvaṃ tāvan mohapuruṣāndha eva sann acakṣuś cakṣuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhikṣuṇā sārdham abhidharme 'bhivinaye saṃlapitavyaṃ manyasa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8427: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinaṃ saṃmukham avasādya āyuṣmaṃtaṃ ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:8428: tvam apy ānanda sthaviraṃ bhikṣuṃ viheṭhyamānam adhyupekṣase.
T07yabhkvyu:8429: kāruṇyam api te mohapuruṣa notpannaṃ sthavire bhikṣau viheṭhyamāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8430: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam āyuṣmaṃtaṃ cānandaṃ saṃmukham avasādya bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:8432: samādhisaṃpannaś ca vistareṇa yāvad asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty uktvā bhagavān utthāyāsanād vihāraṃ prāvikṣat pratisaṃlayanāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8433: atrāyuṣmān udāyī ārūpyāvacaro 'yaṃ manomayaḥ kāya ukta iti manasikṛtvā pratibaṃdham akārṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:8437: tatra ceyaṃ samāpattir na samāpadyate iti tasyābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8438: āryaśāriputrasya [Tib.152b] tu rūpāvacaro divyo manomayakāyo 'bhipretaḥ śuklaśoṇitam anupāyya prādurbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8439: ata eva cāsāv āyuṣmān udāyī bhagavatā pṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8440: kaṃ punas tvaṃ udāyinn anyatamaṃ divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ saṃjānīṣe.
T07yabhkvyu:8443: bhagavān api rūpāvacaram eva divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyam abhipretyāryaśāriputrasya mataṃ samarthayan tam āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam avasādayati sma.
T07yabhkvyu:8444: tvaṃ tāvan mohapuruṣāndha eva sann acakṣuś cakṣuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhikśuṇā sārdham abhidharme 'bhivinaye saṃlapitavyaṃ manyasa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8445: asti caitat sthānam iti yad etan nirodhasamāpatteḥ samāpadanaṃ vyutthānam cety etat sthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:8451: tasva bhavāgra evopapattiḥ syān na rūpadhātau.
T07yabhkvyu:8453: sa tatra rūpadhātāv upapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8454: tasmād asty ataḥ parihāṇir iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8457: ārya eva hi nirodhasamāpattilābhī na cāryamārgād asti parihāṇir iti sautrāṃtikasiddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8458: [Tib.153a] tasyāryasya katham uparibhūmikād āryamārgāt parihāṇir iti iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8459: teṣām apy etat sūtraṃ na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8461: yo hi kaścid bhavāgralābhī niyāmam avakrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:8466: sa parihīṇo bhūtvā dhyānam utpādya rūpadhātāv upapadyet.
T07yabhkvyu:8467: tasmād asty ataḥ parihāṇir na cāryamārgāt parihāṇir iti na svasiddhāntavirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8469: catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyā nirodhasamāpattiś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8483: saṃjñāvedanādvāreṇa vitarkavicārādicaittapracāraparikhinno 'nāgāmī tāṃ tena vihāreṇa sukhaṃ vihareyam iti nirodhasamāpattim utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8484: rūpadhātūpapannas tv anāgāmī rūpadhātoḥ śāṃtatvān na tathā tatratyacaitasikapravṛttyā pīḍyata iti na prathamatas tatrotpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8486: ārūpyadhātūpapanno 'py ata eva śāṃtatvān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopapanno notpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8488: tatra hi rūpaṃ nāsti cittacaittā yadi nirudhyeran parinirvāṇam evāsya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8491: asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ tu mokṣasaṃjñayā niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa samāpadyata iti rūpadhātāv api prathamataḥ samāpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8493: sarvacittacaittanirodhasvabhāvatvāt ubhe apy ete samāpattī cittacaittanirodhe iti vaktavye ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8496: saṃjñāprātikūlyenāsaṃjñisamāpattiprayogaḥ [Tib.154a] saṃjñā rogaḥ saṃjñā śalyaḥ saṃjñā gaṇḍaḥ etac chāṃtaṃ etat praṇītam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8499: yathā paracittajñānavacanaṃ na ca paracittajñānena caittā na jñāyaṃte kadācit.
T07yabhkvyu:8500: atha ca parasya cittaṃ jñāsyāmīty evaṃ prathamataḥ prayogāt paracittajñānam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8502: tadvad ihāpy anayoḥ samāpattyos tathā vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8510: yadi samanaṃtaraniruddham astīty abhyupagataṃ bahukālaniruddham apy astīti kiṃ nābhyupagamyate iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8511: na samanaṃtaraniruddhasyāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ api tu vartamānaṃ cittam ātmano 'nyacittahetubhāvaṃ vyavasthāpya nirudhyate 'nyac cotpadyate tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmavat.
T07yabhkvyu:8512: tac ca niruddham aparaṃ ca cittam [Tib.154a] utpannaṃ bhavatīty anaṃtaraniruddhāc cittāc cittāntaram utpadyate ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8517: idam eva tāvad dṛṣṭāṃtārthaṃ vaktavyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8520: tasmāc cittād eva taj jāyate na rūpād iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8522: citte 'pi sendriyasya kāyasya bījam asti kāye ca sendriye cittasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8526: paṃcavastukādīny api hi tasaya saṃti śāstrāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:8530: katham idānīṃ bahukālaniruddhāc cittād iti ya uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8533: saṃjñāvedanayor apy atra nirodho na syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8535: sacittakatve 'pi tasyā nirodhasamāpatteḥ saṃjñāvedanayos tatra nirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8541: na tu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita īdṛśaḥ sparśo vedanāpratyaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8546: samādhinā hi cittacaittāḥ samā āpādyaṃte ekagrīkriyaṃta ity evaṃ matvā pṛcchati (Abhidh-k-vy 168).
T07yabhkvyu:8549: evam asyāṃ niodhasamāpattau dhyānādiṣu ca samāpattitvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8569: yena cittena kālāṃtaraṃ nātyaṃtaṃ apravṛttimātraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8576: yadi na dravyadharmaḥ katham asau saṃskṛtam iti prajñapyate ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8578: na pūrvam abhūt nottarakālaṃ vyutthitasya yogino bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8579: saṃskṛtāsau samāpattir asaṃjñisamāpattir nirodhasamāpattir vā prajñapyate saṃvyavahārato na tu dravyataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8584: sa cāvasthāviśeṣaḥ pūrvaṃ nāsīt pāścāc ca na bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtatvaṃ na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8586: saṃskṛtāvasthāviśeṣatvād asyāḥ samāpatteḥ saṃskṛtatvaṃ sidhyatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8588: cittam evāsau yogī tatrāsaṃjñiṣu cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:8590: āsaṃjnikam iti prajñapyate na tu dravyato 'stīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8593: tasmāj jīvitam ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhāra ucyate sthitihetus tayor eva.
T07yabhkvyu:8598: ta eva tathābhūtās saṃskārā rūpādiskaṃdhasvabhāvā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8605: sa hi skandhaprabandhalakṣaṇāyāḥ sthiteḥ kṣaṇaparaṃparayā kāraṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8611: yathā sasyānāṃ pākakālāvedhaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣasvabhāvo bījenāṃkura evādhīyate yaḥ kṣaṇaparaṃparayā ā pākakālāt sasyasaṃtānahetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8614: yathā kṣiptasyeṣoḥ śarasya sthitir ākāśadeśāṃtarotpattiḥ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8615: tasyāḥ kālo maryādā yataḥ pareṇa sā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8619: tadyathā kṣipteṣusthitikālāvedho na dravyāṃtaraṃ tadvad ayam āyurlakṣaṇam āvedho draṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8622: pṛthivyādīnāṃ vaiśeṣiko guṇaḥ saṃskāro nāma karmajaḥ [Tib.156b] karmahetuś ca vegadvitīyanāmā iṣau jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8623: yadvaśād yasya guṇasya vaśād gamanam iṣor ā patanād bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8625: yathā hi saṃskāro nāma bhāvāṃtaram asti.
T07yabhkvyu:8639: śīghrā śīghratarā śīghratamā deśāṃtaraiḥ saha prāptir nopapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8640: pūrvoktād asmāt kāraṇadvayāt saṃskārasyāviśiṣṭatvāt patanānupapattiś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8641: patanaṃ ca iṣor nopapadyate sati saṃskāre.
T07yabhkvyu:8642: na hy etad iṣṭam sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8643: vāyunā tatpratibaṃdha iti cet syān mataṃ vāyur atra pratibaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8644: pratibaṃdhaviśeṣāc chīghrataratamaprāptikālabhedaḥ patanaṃ copapadyata iti sparśavaddravyasaṃyogād abhāvaḥ karmaṇa iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8645: atrocyate arvākpatanaprasaṃgo jyāvibhāgānaṃtaram evārvāg avarata eva vāyusaṃyogāt sa iṣu patet.
T07yabhkvyu:8646: atha pratibadhyamāno 'pi vāyunā nārvāk patet na vā kadācit [Tib.157a] patet na paścād api pated ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8649: yathā hi samīpe vāyur evaṃ dūre 'pīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8652: kṣīṇa āyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8654: tasmād ubhayakṣaye sati maraṇam ubhayakṣayād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8656: (Abhidh-k-vy 170) so 'rtha ubhayakṣayād ity ayam artha ukto veditavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8657: āyurakṣayād api maraṇaṃ bhavatīti kathaṃ gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8659: sasyādīnāṃ hi bījāvedhaparikṣaye sati satsu pratyayāṃtareṣu kṣetrodakādiṣu dṛṣṭā saṃtānanivṛttir aprāpyaiva phalakālaṃ phalapākakālaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8661: saty api ca sārabījākṣepe salilādisthitivṛddhipratyābhāvād dṛṣṭā saṃtānanivṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8663: yadā bījākṣepaś ca parisamāpto bhavati salilasya cābhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8664: saty api ca sārabījākṣepe salilādisthitivṛddhipratyaye ca jaṃgamādyupakramakṛtā dṛṣṭā sasyādīnāṃ saṃtānanivṛttir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8667: āśrayasaṃtatipratibaddhaṃ tad āyur iti saṃtatyupanibaddham ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8671: atha vā saṃtatyupanibaddham iti svasaṃtatyupanibaddhaṃ saṃtānavarty eva tat kevalaṃ na tu sakṛd utpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti [Tib.157b] sāṃtarāyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:8672: anenāgamena asty akālamṛtyur iti darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8673: sūtre 'py uktaṃ catvāra ātmabhāvapratilaṃbhā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8680: anupakramaṇadharmāṇo hi buddhā bhagavaṃto āyurutsargavaśitvalābhinaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8683: jinadūto yo buddhena bhagavatā dūtaḥ kaścit saṃpreṣitaḥ tadyathā śukaḥ kaścid bhagavatā āmrapālyāḥ preṣito licchavibhiś ca yogyāṃ kurvāṇair dṛṣṭaḥ śarajālenāpūryamāṇo 'pi mārayituṃ na śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8684: yāvad dhi sa dūtakṛtyaṃ na karoti tāvan nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃcetanā.
T07yabhkvyu:8685: jinādiṣṭa iyaṃtaṃ kālam anena jīvitavyam iti ya ādiṣṭo bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:8689: caramabhavikānāṃ ca ye tasminn eva jannani arhattvaṃ prāpnuvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8692: yadi tarhi sarveṣāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā na parasaṃcetanā atha kasmāt sūtre uktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8694: tatra naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane svabhūmika āryamārgo nāsti yāvad eva saṃjñāsamāpattis tāvad ājñāprativedha iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8703: tasya paryaṃtasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasyādiś catvāri dhyānāni trayaś ca śeṣā ārūpyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8704: na tu kāmadhātus tadādir asamāhitatvena visādṛśyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8708: asti kvacid anyatrāpy evaṃ dṛṣṭam iti astīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8709: kvacid ādinā paryaṃta ityādi.tadyathā devā brahmakāyikā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8710: devā brahmakāyikāḥ tatparyaṃtagrahaṇāc ca brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaś ca prathamā sukhopapattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8712: ābhāsvarās tadādigrahānāc ca parīttābhā apramāṇābhāś ca dvitīyā sukhopapattir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8717: etad dṛṣtāṃtacaritaṃ yad ekam api tatprakāraṃ nirdiśate na sarvaṃ śeṣasaṃpratyayaś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8719: kṛtakatvāt yathā ghaṭa iti paṭādīny api gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8724: tadeke devāḥ ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ prathamābhinirvṛttavarjyāś ca prathamadhyānopapannā devā ity etāvaṃta eva nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ sattvā naitadvyatiriktāḥ saṃtīti nāyaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāṃtavācakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8726: upadarśanārthatve ca sati tad eva sthitam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:8733: dravyāṃtararūpāṇi ceha saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīṣyaṃta ity acodyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:8741: caturtham apy atra vaktavyaṃ syād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8744: yat tarhīdaṃ sthityanyathātvam apīti [Tib.159a] sthitiśabdo 'tra śrūyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8745: katham idam ucyate sthitir nokteti codakābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8747: jareyam uktā sthiter anyathātvaṃ sthityanyathātvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8751: kasmāt punar lakṣaṇacatuṣṭe sati bhagavatā trīṇy evoktānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8754: udvejanārthaṃ vineyānāṃ jātijarānityatā iti dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāny uktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8755: ābhiprāyiko hi sūtranirdeśo na lākṣaṇiko yathābhidharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8763: nanu cānityataiva dharmaṃ pratyutpannād adhvano 'tītam adhvānaṃ saṃcārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8770: na hy adurbalīkṛtasyādhvasaṃcāro 'stīti jarāpi tatsaṃcāre vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8776: sthitir hy asaṃskṛtāvasthāviśeṣalakṣaṇayā sthityā [Tib.159b] sadṛśīti tasyāsaṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtatvaprasaṃgaparijihīrṣayā na lakṣaṇam uktam ity abhiprāyo bhagavato dharmasvāminaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8779: sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthitiś ca sthityanyathātvaṃ ca sthityanyathātvam iti abhisamasya ekaṃ lakṣaṇam uktaṃ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:8783: kim atra prayojanam ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8784: eṣā hy eṣu saṃgāspadam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8785: eṣā hi sthitir eṣu jātyādiṣu saṃgāspadaṃ saṃgasthānaṃ dharmo 'nayā tiṣṭhatīty abhiprāyaḥ śriyam ivaināṃ sthitiṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ alakṣṃīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa bhagavān tasyāṃ sthityām asaṃgārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8786: nāsyām āsaṃgaḥ kartavyo yasmād iyam anitatayānubaddhā lakṣmīr ivālakṣmyeti tad ekīyaṃ vyākhyānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8788: nāsyām āsaṃktavyaṃ yasmād iyaṃ jarayānubaddhā lakṣmīr ivālakṣmyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8789: jarayā hy anyathātvalakṣaṇayā asyā ekīkaraṇaṃ nānityatayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8795: tasmāt tasyā api anyayā jātyā bhavitavyaṃ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8802: jātijātyādayaś ca teṣām iti caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭo draṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8804: ekaikasya lakṣaṇasya caturlakṣaṇī caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ samāhāraḥ caturlakṣaṇī prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:8807: jāter jāter jātijāter yāvad antiyatāyā anityatāyā anityatānityatāyāś ca prasaṃgāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8814: na hi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tatra prāptyādayo bhūtāni bhautikāni vā notpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8819: svātmani vṛttivirodha ity ataḥ ātmānam virahayya muktvāṣṭau dharmān janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8821: taṃ dharmaṃ rūpaṃ cittaṃ vā sthitiṃ jarām anityatāṃ jātijātiṃ sthitisthitiṃ jarājarām anityatānityatāṃ ca janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8822: jātijātis tu tām eva jātiṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8823: evaṃ jarānityate api yathāyogaṃ yojye iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8824: [Tib.160b] jarā ātmānaṃ virahayya aṣṭau dharmān jarayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8826: anityatā ātmānaṃ virahayya aṣṭau dharmān vināśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8832: tad vibhaktuṃ yathā na śakyate na yujyate vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8833: evam ime jātyādayaḥ asaṃto dharmā vibhaktuṃ na śakyaṃte na yujyaṃte vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8836: na hy ete dravyataḥ svalakṣaṇataḥ saṃvidyaṃte yathā vibhajyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8837: jātir ātmānaṃ virahayyāṣṭau dharmān janayatīty evaṃ vistareṇa vibhajyaṃte yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8839: tatra rūpaśabdādi tāvat pratyakṣeṇa cakṣurvijñānādilakṣaṇena pramāṇenopalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8844: evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdāṃ cchrutveti vistareṇa evaṃ gandhādiṣv api yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8845: [Tib.161a] tathā yatkiṃcid rūpam atītanāgatapratyutpannam (Abhidh-k-vy 174) iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8847: pārasāṃtānikānāṃ tv arūpiṇāṃ vedanādīnām astitvānumānam ātmīyavac charīravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsaṃpratipatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8848: āgamo 'pi cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ sahajātā vedānā saṃjñā cetaneti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8850: na caiṣām astitve samartham anumānam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:8852: yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8853: nanu cāyam āgamo 'sti saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8868: saṃskāraprabandham ātmata ātmīyataś cādhimuktāḥ kṛtarucayo 'bhiṣvajaṃte ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8871: taṃ [Tib.161b] taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya samutpannaṃ pratītyasamutpannam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8875: na hi kṣaṇasyotpādādaya utpādavyayasthityanyathātvalakṣaṇā dharmāḥ prajñāyaṃte kṣaṇasya duravadhāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8876: brūyās tvam aprajñāyamānā apy ete lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhaṃtīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8877: na cāprajñāyamānā ete lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8881: ata evātra sūtre prajñāyata iti padagrahaṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:8882: anyathā hi saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvam apīty evāvakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:8884: saṃskṛtam iti lakṣaṇānīty arthapratigrahārthaṃ punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8886: vaidharmadṛṣṭāṃto 'yaṃ yathā balākā jalāstitve lakṣaṇaṃ na punar jalasya jalatve lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8891: yathā kanyāyāḥ śubhāśubhāni lakṣaṇāni yathākramaṃ sādhvasādhutve lakṣaṇānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8892: yadi hy amūni tathā saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve sādhvasādhutve vā lakṣaṇānīṣyeran trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīty ucyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:8896: [Tib.162a] kathaṃ punar avidyamānā jātyādayaḥ pravāhe vyavasthāpyaṃte prajñāyaṃte vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8897: na brūmo jātyādayo na saṃvidyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8914: pravāhagatā hi vedanās tasya viditā ivotpadyaṃte viditā iva tiṣṭhaṃte viditā iva parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchaṃti na kṣaṇagatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8933: sa ca dharmo vyety eva satyām api sthitau.
T07yabhkvyu:8938: dvitīyādikṣaṇāvasthānena [Tib.162b] hi sthitiparikalpanā na vṛthā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:8940: yasmāt kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya sthitiparikalpanā vyartheti.
T07yabhkvyu:8942: pravāha eva sthitir iti kṛtvety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8947: so 'py ekaḥ kṣaṇo na syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8952: syān mataṃ hetupratyayebhya utpadyamānaṃ dharmaṃ sthitir upagṛhṇātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8955: (Abhidh-k-vy 176) janikā tarhi sthitiḥ prāpnoti na sthāpikā.
T07yabhkvyu:8960: ekasmiṃ nikāyasabhāge 'nekam api cittaṃ ekam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8962: tac cittaṃ yujyata ekasmiṃś citta iti vaktum.
T07yabhkvyu:8963: anyathā hi katham ekasyaiva cittakṣaṇasya jātiś ca maraṇaṃ cānyathātvaṃ ca syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8965: pūrvasya kṣaṇasya uttaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratinidhibhūtaḥ sādṛśyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8966: ataḥ sa pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo 'dyāpi avatiṣṭhata iveti kṛtvottaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ sthitir ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8971: ataḥ sadṛśotpattau sthityanyathātvaṃ nāstīti avyāpilakṣaṇaṃ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8973: kṣiptaṃ ca tad akṣiptaṃ ca kṣiptākṣiptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8975: kṣiptākṣiptaṃ ca tad balidurbalakṣiptaṃ ca kṣiptākṣiptabalidurbalakṣiptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8999: tasyāḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣasiddheḥ na te nirviśeṣā bhavantīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9001: śabdasyārciṣaś ca dīpāder yo 'ntyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ saṃtānoparatikāle.
T07yabhkvyu:9004: sthiter abhāvāt sthityanyathātvaṃ nāstīti avyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9005: yeyam uktā tasyā visadṛśatvam sthityanyathātvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9009: tasya nāsti sthityanyathātvam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9010: saṃbhavaṃ hi praty evam uktaṃ sūtre trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9011: tasmād aṃtyaśabdārciḥkṣaṇaprabhṛtīnām utpādavyayāv eva dve lakṣane iti abhiprīyete.
T07yabhkvyu:9014: (Abhidh-k-vy 177) aṃtyānām api śabdārciḥkṣaṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ sthitir asti yat svāvasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9016: teṣām api trīṇi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9017: katham idānīṃ sa eva dharṃo lakṣyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9024: dharmamātraṃ tv abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca na bhavatīti adṛṣṭāṃta eṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9027: yathā hi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣākhyāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇākhyāni ca bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9028: evaṃ saṃskṛto dharmaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ coyate saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9029: utpādādilakṣaṇena hy avasthāviśeṣeṇa sa dharmo lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9032: yathā mahāpuruṣasaṃjñaḥ samudāyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samudāyibhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9039: sa eva hi pṛthivīdhātuḥ kaṭhinalakṣyamāṇaḥ kaṭhinalakṣaṇa ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9040: etad eva saṃskṛtam abhūtvābhavadbhūtvācābhavallakṣyamāṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9045: sa evordhvadeśāṃtareṣu niraṃtaram utpadyamāna ūrdhvagamanākhyāṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:9046: tad ūrdhvagamanaṃ tato bhinnam iva lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9047: na ca dhūmasya ūrdhvagamanatvam anyad iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9049: na ca tad ūrdhvagamanaṃ tasmād dhūmāt anyat.
T07yabhkvyu:9051: evam utpādo vināśo 'nyathātvaṃ ca tato bhinnam iva lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9052: na ca saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtam anyad bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9053: na ca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ gṛhṇatāpi rūpādīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9055: yāvat teṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ prāgutpattyabhāvo na jñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9059: prāgabhāvaś ca pradhvansābhāvaś ca yāvan na jñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9060: saṃtateś ca viśeṣo yāvan na jñāyate iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:9061: tasmān na tenaiva tal lakṣitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9065: yadi hi rūpādīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ gṛhṇan saṃskṛtam iti gṛhṇīyāt prāgabhāvaṃ paścādabhāvaṃ ca saṃtateś ca viśeṣaṃ ajñātvā tenaiva tal lakṣitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9066: na tv evaṃ jānīta iti na tenaiva tal lakṣitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9067: na ca tebhyo 'pi rūpādibhyo dravyāṃtarāṇy eva jātyādīni vidyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:9079: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ karotīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9081: anāgatam eva tāvad dravyato nāstīti pratipādayiṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9084: saty api tu dravyato 'nāgate jātir anāgatāvasthāyāṃ kāritraṃ kurvatī katham anāgatā sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:9091: uparatakāritre hi vartamānāvasthāyām evātītā prāpnotīti na vartamānā bhaved iti vartamānalaṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9095: yadaivaṃ hy enaṃ sthitir iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9097: na hi sa eva dharmas tiṣṭhati ca jīryati ca vinaśyati ceti yukto vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9104: eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9110: na tu tasmin kāle jarā jarayati nāpy anityatā vināśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9111: punaḥ kenābalīyastvaṃ [Tib.165b] paścāt kenābalīyastvaṃ yad enāṃ yasmād enāṃ sthitiṃ saha dharmeṇa yasyāsau sthitiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9113: kṛtakṛtyā punaḥ kartuṃ notsahate jātivad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9114: yathā jātiḥ kṛtakṛtyā janyaṃ janayitvā parikṣīṇaśaktir na punar janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9115: tathā sthitir api tadvad eva na punaḥ sthāpayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9117: na vartamānatām ānītaṃ janyaṃ punar ānetuṃ śakyate 'navasthāprasaṃgāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9118: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyam atyaṃtaṃ sthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9122: yena sthitiḥ sthāpyam atyaṃtaṃ sthāpayituṃ na śaknoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9123: jarā hi sthitiṃ durbalīkaroti durbalām anityatā nihaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9126: yadi hi te jarānityate balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvam eva syātāṃ sthitikāritrakāle.
T07yabhkvyu:9127: yataḥ sā sthitir na labhate kāritraṃ kartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9134: katham atiṣṭhantyau jarānityate kutra vā dharmiṇy atiṣṭhati kāritraṃ kartum utsahiṣyete.
T07yabhkvyu:9135: kiṃ vā punas tābhyāṃ jarānityatābhyāṃ kartavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9136: sthitisāmarthyād dhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vinaṣṭo 'bhūt.
T07yabhkvyu:9137: sa tayā uparatakāritrayā sthityāpy upekṣyamāṇo 'sthāpyamāno dhruvaṃ na sthāsyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9138: ayam evāsya vināśo yad idam anavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9139: kiṃ punar jarānityatābhyāṃ [Tib.166a] kāryam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9140: na ca tasmād eva tasyānyaprakāratā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9146: sa ghaṭāder mudgarādikṛto vināśa iti manyate kālāṃtarāvasthāyi hi tasya rūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9149: cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāt tadanityatāyāś cittacaittānityatāyā vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvāt svayaṃ vinaśvaratvāt sthityanityate kāritraṃ yugapat kuryātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9150: ata ekasya cittasya caittasya vā yugapatsthitivinaṣṭatā anyonyaviruddho 'pi saṃprasajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9152: yad etat trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9160: na hi hetupratyayasāmagrye 'pi taj janyaṃ kadācid bhavati kadācin na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9162: yathā cakṣur na vinā ālokādibhiś cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9164: evaṃ jātir na vinā hetupratyayair dharmaṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9165: na cātas tadutpattau na kāraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9168: cakṣur hi dṛṣtasāmarthyam satsv ālokādiṣu andhānandhayoś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpattyutpattidarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9171: tadyathā sparśādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ prakṛtayaḥ svabhāvā duḥparicchedyatvāt sūkṣmāh.
T07yabhkvyu:9174: na tv evaṃ jātiḥ kāritreṇa nirdhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:9178: jātam ity eva tu na syāt asatyāṃ jātāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9180: na tu jātam iti svalakṣaṇāpekṣā jātabuddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9183: ṣaṣṭhīvacanaṃ ca na syāt rūpasyotpāda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9188: yathā rūpaṃ rūpād ananyad iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśo na bhavati (Abhidh-k-vy 180) rūpasya rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9192: sthitam eva tu na syāt asatyāṃ sthitau.
T07yabhkvyu:9193: ṣaṣṭhīvacanaṃ ca rūpasya sthitir iti yathā rūpasya rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9194: jīrṇam ity eva tu na syāt asatyāṃ jarāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9195: ṣaṣṭhīvacanaṃ ca rūpasya [Tib.167a] jareti yathā rūpasya rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9196: tathā vinaṣṭam ity eva tu na syāt asatyām anityatāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9197: ṣaṣṭhīvacanaṃ ca rūpasya vināśa iti yathā rūpasya rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9199: yadi jātamityevamādibuddhisiddhyarthaṃ ṣaṣṭhīvidhānārthaṃ ca jātyādayaḥ kalpyaṃte anātmatvam apy eṣṭvyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9200: na hi nirnimittā anātmabuddhir bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:9211: ekaṃ rūpaṃ dve rūpe mahad aṇu pṛthak saṃyuktaṃ vibhaktaṃ param aparaṃ sadrūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9212: tathā dravyam etad rūpam idaṃ ghaṭo 'yam ity evamādibuddhisiddhārthaṃ saṃkhyādayo 'pi vaiśeṣikaparikalpitā abhyupagaṃtavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9215: rūpasya vibhāgaḥ paratvāparatvam ityevamādy api yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9216: eṣā ca ṣaṣṭhī kathaṃ kalpyate rūpasya svabhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9217: na hi vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ [Tib.167b] rūpād anyo rūpasya svabhāva iṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9219: jātam eva na vinaṣṭam ity abhūtvābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ kriyate prajñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9222: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti na vedanādīnām utpāda iti viśeṣaṇārthaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kurvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9223: mānyaḥ pratyāyi rūpasaṃjñaka evotpādo na vedanādisaṃjñaka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9228: vaiśeṣikasiddhāntāpekṣayā tu asiddhaś candana ity aparo dṛṣṭānta upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9230: śilāputrakaśarīrayor vaiśeṣikāṇām api siddhānte nārthāntarabhāvo bhavati ca ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9233: tasmāt prajñaptimātram evedaṃ pravāhāvasthānajñāpanārthaṃ kriyate sthitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9235: tasyā viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasya sthitir iti ṣaṣṭhīṃ kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9236: yathā rūpasaṃjñakaiva [Tib.168a] sthitiḥ pratīyeta mānyā pratyāyīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9237: tathā prajñaptimātram evaitat pūrvaparaviśeṣajñāpanārthaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 181) kriyate jīrṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9239: tasyā viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasya jareti ṣaṣṭhīṃ kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9240: yathā rūpasaṃjñakaiva jarā pratīyeta mānyā pratyāyīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9241: tathā prajñaptimātram evaitat pravāhanivṛttijñapanārthaṃ kriyate vinaṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9243: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasya vināśa iti ṣaṣṭhīṃ kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9244: yathā rūpasaṃjñaka eva vināśaḥ pratīyeta mānyaḥ pratyāyīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9246: tadyathā candanasya gandhādayaḥ śilāputrakasya śarīram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9250: cakṣuḥ samṛddhe śūnyaṃ nityena dhruveṇa śāśvatena avipariṇāmadharmeṇa ātmanātmīyena ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9253: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimad iṣyate ākāśādi.
T07yabhkvyu:9254: tathā dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jāyata ity eṣṭavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:9255: na hy atra kiṃcit kārāṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:9256: yat saṃskṛtam eva jātimad bhavati nāsaṃskṛtam iti anyatra dharmatāyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9257: evam asatyām api jātau saṃskṛtam evotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9259: yathā ca tulyajātimatāṃ keṣāṃcid rūpavedanādīnāṃ tadanye pratyayās tebhyo rūpotpattipratyayebhyo 'nye vedanādyutpattipratyayās tadanye.
T07yabhkvyu:9260: te tadanye pratyayās tadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9265: tadanyasya te vedanādipratyayā utpādane yathā na samarthā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9266: evam asaṃskṛtasyākāśāder utpādane sarve 'pi rūpavedanādipratyayā na samarthāḥ syur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9269: yathā na mṛgāḥ santīti yavā nopyaṃte upyanta evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9271: yathā na makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9274: tathā na dūṣakās santīti āgamo 'bhidharmaśāstrāṇy apāsyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9277: siddhāntaś cānusartavyo na parityājya ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9288: yena saṃjñā caitasiko dharmaḥ kriyate janyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9292: yadi hi saṃjñā nāmety ucyeta caitasiko 'pi saṃbhāvyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:9293: tat punaḥ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ [Tib.169a] nāma rūpaṃ śabdo raso gandho vety evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:9311: yasmād utpādavyayadharmavantas tasmād anityā iti paricchidyante
T07yabhkvyu:9314: ya utpadyante nirudhyante ca te anityāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9321: ta iti yasmād ete utpadya nirudhyamānā dṛṣtā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9330: ye hy anityās te duḥkhā atas
T07yabhkvyu:9335: tadyathā pacati paṭhati gacchatīti kṛṣṇo gauro [Tib.169b] rakta iti pacati pakṣyati apākṣīd iti kriyāguṇakālānāṃ saṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9337: tathā hi sāmānyavartamānānāṃ padānāṃ yad viśeṣe 'vasthānaṃ sa vākyārtha ity āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9338: tad evaṃ svalakṣaṇābhidyotakaṃ nāma kriyādisaṃbandhaviśeṣābhidyotakaṃ padam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9339: vyaṃjanam akṣaram iti varṇa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9340: na tu hal eva acām api vyaṃjanakatveneṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9346: ato vyaṃjanam api lipyavayavānāṃ nāma bhavatīti lakṣaṇasāṃkaryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9347: tataś ca yad abhipretaṃ nāmno vyatiriktam anyad eva vyaṃjanam akṣaram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9354: samuktir iti uca samavāya ity etasya dhātoḥ ktini samuktir iti etad rūpaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9364: tan nāmātmarūpatām iva vāca āpādayad arthatvaṃ dyotayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9368: na vai ghoṣamātraṃ vāg iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9369: na vayaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ vāg iti varṇayāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9374: na yaḥ kaścic chabda iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9377: tac caitadarthadyotanaṃ nāmarahitāc chabdāj jātyādyabhidheyapadārthakāt sidhyatīty ayam asyārtha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9379: vāci satyāṃ sa cittaviprayukta utpadyata itīṣyate tenāśaṃkyate yady utpādayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9380: evaṃ cet sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ vṛṣabhādigarjitam api nāmotpādayiṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:9382: brūyās tvaṃ viśiṣṭa eva ghoṣo yo varṇātmakaḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9385: yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9387: na tu sa cittaviprayukta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9392: sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakāśayiṣyatīti pūrvavad vācyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9393: na khalv api śabdānāṃ sāmagryam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9399: ekasya ca dravyasato [Tib.170b] dharmasya bhāgaśaḥ khaṇḍaśa utpādo na yukto yathā ghaṭapaṭādeḥ prajñaptisataḥ kalpyata iti katham utpādayantī vāṅ nāmotpādayet.
T07yabhkvyu:9401: tadā (Abhidh-k-vy 184) kathaṃ sā tad utpādayatīti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9403: na ca sarve vācchabdakṣanā yugapadvartamānā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9404: yadā hi rūpam iti raśabdo vartamāno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9409: evaṃ pakārākārāv api kramaśo yadā vartamānau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9412: brūyās tvaṃ vartamāno raśabdas tasya rūpanāmnaḥ pūrvaṃ bhāgam utpādyati.
T07yabhkvyu:9413: ūśabdo 'pi vartamāno dvitīyaṃ bhāgam evaṃ yāvad akāraśabdas tasya caturthabhāgam utpādayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9417: kathaṃ tāvad atītāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇa utpādayaty avijñaptim iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9420: atha cātītakāyavāgvijñaptikṣaṇāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītām avijñaptim utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9423: paścimaśabda eva nāmna utpādāt [Tib.171a] yo 'pi tam evaikaṃ śṛṇoti yo 'pi paścimam evaikaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9430: kṣaṇapratibhāsā varṇavāg vyaṃjanam api tatpratibhāsam iti pakṣāntaram upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9433: atrāpi sa eva prasaṃgo vyaṃjanānāṃ sāmagryābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9436: na caikasya dharmasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti katham utpādayad vyaṃjanaṃ nāmotpādayet.
T07yabhkvyu:9437: kathaṃ tāvad atītāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇa utpādayaty avijñaptim.
T07yabhkvyu:9438: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva vyaṃjane nāmna utpādāt yo 'pi tam evaikaṃ paścimaṃ vyaṃjanotpādakaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9439: yo vā tad evaikaṃ paścimaṃ vyaṃjanaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9441: eṣa eva tu prasaṃgo nāmnaḥ prakāśatve vāca iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9442: na khalv api śabdānāṃ sāmagryam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:9443: na caikasya dharmasya bhāgaśaḥ prakāśo yukta iti kathaṃ prakāśayantī vāk nāma prakāsayet.
T07yabhkvyu:9444: kathaṃ tāvad atītāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇaḥ prakāśayaty avijñaptiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9445: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva śabde nāmnaḥ prakāśād yo 'pi tam evaikaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9450: atrāpi sa eva prasaṃgo vyaṃjanānāṃ sāmagryabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9451: yasya tarhi śabdamātraṃ nāmānekākṣaraṃ ca nāma bhavati na ca śabdānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 185) sāmagryam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:9454: ata eva ca nāntarīyakanyāyena prathamākṣaraśravaṇakāla eva śeṣākṣarānusmṛtibalena kaścid arthaṃ pratipadyata eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:9455: vyaṃjanasyāpi vāṅ naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9456: pūrvaṃ śabdasyotpādyaṃ śabdasya vyaṃgyaṃ vā vyaṃjanam abhyupagamya doṣa udgrāhitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9457: idānīṃ śabdavyatiriktānupalabdheḥ utpādyavyaṃgyatvam api tasya nāstīti tad eva unmūlayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9461: api ca ghoṣasvabhāvatvād vācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ vyaṃjanam utpādayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vā.
T07yabhkvyu:9462: yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate vyaṃjanasyotpādakaḥ prakāśako vā.
T07yabhkvyu:9464: athāpy arthasahajaṃ nāma jātyādivad iṣyeteti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9465: atha sahaje nāmni kalpyamāne vācotpādyaṃ prakāśyaṃ vā nāmety evamādighoṣaprasaṃgo na bhaviṣyatīti matvā pakṣāntaram idaṃ vikalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9466: yathā jātyādīni lakṣaṇāni arthasahajāny eveṣyante nātītānāgatasyārthasya vartamānāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9470: na hy atītānāgataṃ nāmārthaṃ dyotayitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:9471: yathātītānāgatā vāṅ nāma notpādayituṃ vyaṃjayituṃ cārhati.
T07yabhkvyu:9472: nāmabahutve ca na sahajaṃ nāma paricchidyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:9473: asaṃskṛtānāṃ [Tib.172a] cānutpattimattvāt sahajanāma na syād iti aniṣṭir eveyaṃ na kartavyaiveyam iṣṭir ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9477: tasmāt santi nāmāni vākyaṃ ceti vacanāvakāśo 'stīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:9482: yathā paṃktiḥ pipīlīkādīnāṃ racanāviśeṣo na tato dravyāntaram upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9484: ekakālavartināṃ pakṣipipīlikādīnāṃ racanāviśeṣaḥ paṃktir ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9485: kramavartināṃ tu śabdānāṃ na racanāviśeṣaḥ tena vaiṣamyam iti vacanāvakāśam abhisamīkṣya dvitīyo dṛṣṭānta upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9491: na hi sarve dharmās tarkagamyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9501: kāmarūpāptā [Tib.172b] eva sattvākhyā eva niṣyandā evāvyākṛtā eva cety avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9503: te tv ārūpyāptā nāmakāyādayo 'kathyā vācas tatrābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9506: tasmāt kāmarūpāptā eva nārūpyāptā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9514: yathā cakṣurindriyeṇa draṣṭaiva samanvāgato na dṛśyaḥ sattvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9515: tathā dyotayitaiva taiḥ samanvāgato na dyotyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9523: itarathā hi yadā samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalān dharmān dyotayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9546: jātyādīnāṃ tāv eva prabhedāv evam eva vaktavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:9550: na hi vipākasyāpy asamanvāgamo vipāko bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:9551: tathā hy akuśalasya kuśalasāsravasya ca vipāka iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9552: na cānayor aprāptir vipāko bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:9553: yo hi buddhipūrvakaś cetanātmakas tatsaṃprayuktasamuttho vā dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9555: na cāsamanvāgama (Abhidh-k-vy 187) evaṃ buddhipūrvakakarṃakṛta iti ato na vipākajaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9557: eṣāṃ prāptilakṣaṇasamāpattyasamanvāgamānāṃ vaktavyaṃ vyākhyātavyam uktaṃ vyākhyātam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9565: na hy asattvasaṃkhyātena saṃskṛtena santi samanvāgamāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9577: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca
T07yabhkvyu:9621: ācāryeṇa tu yad darśanaṃ vaktavyam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9625: (II.50) ka ime hetavaḥ ke ca pratyayā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9629: dvau hetū dvau pratyayau samyagdṛṣṭer utpādāya.
T07yabhkvyu:9631: parataś ca ghoṣo 'dhyātmaṃ ca yoniśomanaskāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9632: hetuḥ pratyayo nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ liṃgaṃ upaniṣad iti paryāyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9633: upaniṣacchabdas tu kadācid upāṃśau kadācit prāmukhya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9636: yadi prativiśeṣo nāsti kim arthaṃ hetūnāṃ pratyayānāṃ ca pṛthagnirdeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9639: pratyayanirdeśe tu hetusamanantaratvādibhir aparo 'rthaviśeṣa ukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9640: atha katamasmin sūtre ṣaḍ ḍhetava uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9641: sarvo hy abhidharmaḥ sūtrārthaḥ sūtranikaṣaḥ sūtravyākhyānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9643: tathā hi ekottarikāgama ā śatād dharmanirdeśa āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:9644: idānīṃ tv ā daśakād dṛśyaṃta iti kathayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9647: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam iti kāraṇahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9650: taiḥ saha jātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā ceti sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9652: samanvāgato 'yaṃ pudgalaḥ kuśalair api dharmair akuśalair api yāvad asti cāsyāṇusahagataṃ kuśalamūlam asamucchinnaṃ yato 'sya kuśalamūlād anyat kuśalamūlam utpatsyate (Abhidh-k-vy 189).
T07yabhkvyu:9653: evam ayaṃ pudgala āyatyāṃ viśuddhidharmā bhaviṣyatīti sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9654: eṣa hy atītapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svaphalanirvartanārthena vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9659: mithyādṛṣṭeḥ puruṣapudgalasya yac ca kāyakarma taddṛṣṭer yac ca vākkarma yā cetanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ ye ca saṃskārās tadanvayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9662: dṛṣṭir hy asya pāpikā yad uta mithyādṛṣṭir iti sarvatragahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9664: iha kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalasya sāsravasya bhāvanāmayasya tatrotpannā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayante.
T07yabhkvyu:9665: saṃcetanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya vipāka iti vipākahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9667: ity ata ete ṣaḍ ḍhetavaḥ sūtrata eva prasiddhā iti
T07yabhkvyu:9675: yo hetur viśeṣasaṃjñayā nocyate sāmānyaṃ hetubhāvaṃ parigṛhyocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9677: anyeṣu hi viśeṣasaṃjñānirukteṣu hetuṣu yo na viśeṣitaḥ kāraṇaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9681: yasmād utpādaṃ praty utpattimatāṃ svato 'nye dharmā avighnabhāvenāvatiṣṭhante.
T07yabhkvyu:9685: udapatsyanta āsravās ta iti vistaro lṛṅy arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9687: asyājānataḥ anutpannadarśanabhāvanāmārgapudgalasya ye darśanabhāvanāmārgavadhyā rāgādaya āsravā udapatsyaṃta.
T07yabhkvyu:9688: jānata utpannadarśanadarśanabhāvanāmārgasya pudgalasyāsya tadvadhyās te rāgādayo notpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9690: jñānam eṣāṃ vighnam utpattau karoti darśanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9691: sūryaprabhā ca jyotiṣāṃ darśanasya vighnam utpattau karotīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9692: evaṃ sati kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇahetur bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9697: (Abhidh-k-vy 190) jyotirdarśanotpattau ca svabhāvasūryaprabhāvarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9699: samagreṣu hetupratyayeṣu anantarabhāvī dharma utpadyamāna ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9702: jñāne punaḥ sati ta āsravā notpadyamānā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9704: jyotirdarśanam api pratyayavaikalyād eva [Tib.176a] notpadyamānam iti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9705: atas tadavastham idaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇahetur bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9710: yasmād asāv upadravakaraṇe samartha upadravaṃ na karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9714: nārakādīnāṃ ca nārakatiryagyonyādikānām ārūpyaskaṃdhotpattau kathaṃ hetubhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9715: nārakādigrahaṇaṃ manuṣyādīnāṃ kadācid bhavet upadeśādinety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9718: yathā saṃto vidyamānā vighnaṃ kartum asamarthāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9719: ato 'satāṃ satāṃ caiṣām nirvāṇādīnāṃ vighnakaraṇe nirviśiṣṭatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9722: upadravaṃ kartum asamarthe 'pi bhojake grāmīṇās tathā vaktāro bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9725: ato 'nenaiva dṛṣṭāṃtena vighnayitum asamarthānām api nirvāṇādīnām avighnabhāvāvasthānāt kāraṇahetubhāvaḥ siddhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9726: kasmāt punar asattulyānāṃ nirvāṇādīnāṃ kāraṇahetutvam [Tib.176b] iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9729: na hy asantaṃ bhojakam adhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavaṃti vaktāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9731: na vā śaśaviṣāṇena smaḥ sukhitā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9734: yaś ca pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetur yaś cāpradhānaḥ sarvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9739: sa sutarām avighnabhāvenāvatiṣṭhate na kevalam itaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9746: kāraṇe sati kāryeṇa bhavitavyam iti matvā codayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9749: tathā sarve 'pi kasmān na tadbhājo bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9752: tena sarvasya tāvad yugapad utpādo na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9759: nirvāṇālaṃbanāt [Tib.177a] kuśalād akuśalād vā manovijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9761: evaṃ paraṃparayā tasyāpi nirvāṇasya pratyayībhāvād asti sāmarthyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9767: amī bata nārakapretādayaḥ paramaduḥkhitā iti nārakādyālaṃbanaṃ manovijñānaṃ kuśalam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9768: yataḥ krameṇa śīle vyavasthitasya bhāvanāyāṃ prayogāt ārūpyasamāpattir upapattiś copayadyata.
T07yabhkvyu:9774: ye dharmā mithaḥphalā ye parasparaphalā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9777: saṃti hi dharmāḥ kecit sahabhuvo na tu sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9792: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvam eva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūhetur yathāyogam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9795: ato yathāyogaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇavattvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9799: (II.52a-c) teṣāṃ ca ye jātyādayaś cittasya ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:9800: teṣāṃ ca cittasaṃprayuktānāṃ cetanādīnāṃ dhyānasaṃvarasyānāsravasaṃvarasya ye jātyādayaś catvāro dharmāś cittānuparivartina ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9804: kālena ca phalādibhiś ca śubhatādibhiś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:9807: cittena sahaite ekotpādā ekasthitaya ekanirodhāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9819: ayaṃ caikaśabdaḥ saṃkhyāne sādhāraṇe vā ekaphalatayetyādi [Tib.178a].
T07yabhkvyu:9820: pūrvakas tv ekaśabdaḥ sahārthe cittena sahotpādasthitinirodhatayety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9830: anutpattikadharmiṇi hi citte te cittānuparivartina ekādhvapatitā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9834: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatayā ceti punas tribhir iti daśabhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9835: paryāyavṛttiṃ jātiṃ vā praty evam uktaṃ daśabhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9836: na hy ekatra citte daśa kāraṇāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:9837: na hi kuśale cetasi akuśalāvyākṛte kāraṇe bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9839: avyākṛte citte anutpattidharmiṇi ekādhvapatitatvena ekaphalaniṣyaṃdatābhyāṃ avyākṛtatvena ceti caturbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9840: utpattidharmiṇi tv ebhir eva caturbhir ekotpādasthitinirodhatābhiś ceti saptabhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9842: avyākṛtatāṃ tu kevalam apanīya kuśalatā [Tib.178b] prakṣeptavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:9843: akuśale tu kuśalasāsrave cānutpattikadharmiṇi akuśalatayā kuśalatayā ca yathāvastu ekādhvapatitatvena ekaphalavipākaniṣyandatābhis ceti paṃcabhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9844: utpattidharmiṇi tu tasminn ebhir eva paṃcabhir ekotpādasthitinirodhatābhiś cety aṣṭābhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9866: lakṣaṇānāṃ tu citte 'sti vyāpāra iti tāni cittasya sahabhūhetur bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9871: ato na teṣāṃ hetubhāvo dharma iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9873: [Tib.179a] na citta iti na tāni cittasya sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9874: cittaṃ tu teṣāṃ rājakalpam iti sahabhūhetur bhavatīty apareṣām abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9875: prakaraṇagrantho hy evaṃ virudhyeta daśānāṃ mahābhūmikānāṃ yāni catvāriṃśal lakṣaṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:9879: eṣāṃ kati satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9882: kati naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ iti praśne kṛte visarjanaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9883: dve naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetuke na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9888: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9890: syān naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyaḍṛṣṭer hetur iti trikoṭikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9893: atītapratyutpannān duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyān anuśayāṃs tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:9894: [Tib.179b] atītapratyutpannān samudayadarśanaprahātavyān sarvatragān anuśayān tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:9896: satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yat tad anyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9897: satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur yad etat sthāpitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9898: naiva satkāyahetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur akliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9899: yathā duḥkhasatyaṃ evaṃ samudayasatyam iti prakaraṇagranthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9903: tair daśabhir anuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ sthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9905: eta evānāgatā daśānuśayās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca vedanādikaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ varjayitvānāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9907: anāgataṃ ca satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitveti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9908: tatprāptijātyādayaś cāsthāpitā varjayitvā satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ [Tib.180a] ca dharmāṇāṃ jātyādīn.
T07yabhkvyu:9910: satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9911: tad evaṃ tāvad anāgato 'nuśayas tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca sthāpitād anyat.
T07yabhkvyu:9912: tad anyat kliṣṭam ity ucyate satkāyadṛṣṭihetukam.
T07yabhkvyu:9915: na tu satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ na hy anāgato dharmaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9916: na ca sahabhūhetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetur vātra saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9917: na hi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyā saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā.
T07yabhkvyu:9919: na cāpy antagrāhadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā.
T07yabhkvyu:9921: viprayuktās teṣām atītapratyutpannānāṃ duḥkhadarśanaheyānāṃ prāptayo jātyādayaś cāsthāpitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9926: prāptayas tāvad vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvat svasarvatragebhyo bahir avasthitatvān na sarvatragā vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:9929: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis te 'pi sarvagā
T07yabhkvyu:9931: na tu te cittacaittavat paścimānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9934: tasmān na te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur iti śāstrārtho lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9937: yasya hi dharmasya janane yaḥ puruṣakāravān dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9939: idam eva ca jñāpakaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ sabhāgahetuvyavastheti.
T07yabhkvyu:9941: cakṣuś ca cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur devadattacakṣuṣo devadattacakṣuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9942: dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇasya vāmaṃ vāmasya yāvac cakṣurdravyaṃ cakṣurdravyāntarasya.
T07yabhkvyu:9943: bāhyeṣv api yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāler iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9944: yadi hi sarvacakṣuḥ sarvasya cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur iṣyetāvyākṛtatvaṃ tulyam iti kṛtvā naivaṃ viśeṣaṇam ucyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:9945: tasmān na te satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ sabhāgahetur ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9948: tasmāt [Tib.181a] sajātyādikās te 'nuśayās tatsaṃprayuktāś ca dharmāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 195) sthāpitā veditavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:9949: ye hi dharmasya tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca jātyādayaḥ sahabhūhetur bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9950: taiḥ sārdhaṃ te dharmāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragahetuḥ sabhāgahetur vā bhavanto bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:9951: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis ta 'pi sarvagā
T07yabhkvyu:9954: satkāyasaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:9960: samudayadarśanaprahātavyā api ye sarvatragā atītapratyutpannās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9963: ye sarvatragā anāgatās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9968: jātyādayas tv ekasmiṃ pakṣe naiva sthāpitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9971: tad etat sarvam asthāpitaṃ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaṃ [Tib.181b] sarvatragahetunā satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9975: asarvatragāṇāṃ ca rāgādīnāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ ca vedanādīnāṃ jātyādīnāṃ caikasmin pakṣe sarvaprāptīnāṃ cāsarvatragatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9980: satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur yad etat sthāpitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9981: ye 'tītapratyutpannā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā daśānuśayās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ yac ca pakṣāntare jātyādikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9984: te sahabhūhetunā pūrvoktābhyāṃ ca hetubhyāṃ taddhetukāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9986: te saṃprayuktahetunā ca pūrvoktaiś ca hetubhis taddhetukāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9988: ye 'py atītapratyutpannāḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyāḥ sarvatragās [Tib.182a] tatsahabhuvaś ca vedanādayo jātyādayaś ca pakṣāntare.
T07yabhkvyu:9993: asaṃkliṣṭaṃ tu duḥkhasatyaṃ kuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca na satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na ca satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10000: tatra yad etad uktaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti tad virudhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:10001: yadi hi satkāyadṛṣtisaṃprayuktadharmajātyādayo na sahabhūhetur bhaveyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10006: ye tarhi tatsaṃprayuktānām ity etan na paṭhanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10008: te hi satkāyadṛṣṭer jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvety evaṃ paṭhanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10011: [Tib.182b] atas tāni tasyā na sahabhūhetur iti teṣām evaṃvādinām abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10013: evam apāṭhe doṣa ity atas tair etat paraṃ paṭhitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10016: tasmād yathā teṣu tatsaṃprayukteṣv etāni lakṣaṇāni sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10019: satkāyadṛṣṭigrahaṇena satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktānām api grahaṇam adhikārānuvṛtter vā tair evaṃ boddhavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10024: cittasya hi caittās tāni ca lakṣaṇāni sahabhūhetuḥ sahabhūni ca tāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10028: jātyādiṣu hi teṣāṃ vyāpāro na dharme.
T07yabhkvyu:10029: tāni cānyonyaṃ tāni cānulakṣaṇāni anyonyaṃ sahabhūni jātyādiṣu vyāpārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10033: sa hi rājeva yātrāyāṃ sabhṛtyaḥ tad bhṛtyavargaṃ sarvaṃ svakalāpam ākarṣann iva pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:10035: cittānuparivartināṃ caittadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāṇām [Tib.183a] teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām anulakṣaṇāni ca tathaiva cittasya sahabhūni.
T07yabhkvyu:10040: sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpam anyonyam aṣṭadravyakādiṣu paramāṇuṣu rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyātmakaṃ sahabhūḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10043: apratighaṃ hi dhyānānāsravaṃ saṃvararūpaṃ saptavidhavijñaptisvabhāvaṃ parasparaṃ sahabhūḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10048: prāptayaś ca sahajāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 197) prāptimato dharmasya sahotpāde 'pi na sahabhūhetuḥ pūrvaṃpaścātkālajāt prāptīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10053: yasmāt tāsāṃ prāptimatā saha naikaṃ phalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvat pṛthaksrotatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10055: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca
T07yabhkvyu:10057: [Tib.183b] na cāpy ekaniṣyandaphalaṃ prāptīnāṃ hi prātaya eva niṣyandaphalaṃ pṛthaksaṃtānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10062: yat tāvat sahabhūhetunā hetur iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10075: atha ca pradīpaḥ prabhāyāḥ sahotpannāyā hetur bhavati chāyāyāś cāṃkuraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10079: yasmāt pūrvotpannaiva vartisnehādikā sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasyotpattau hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10080: pradīpasya prabhāyāś ca saiva sāmagrī hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10081: na tu pradīpaḥ prabhāyā hetur iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10082: evaṃ sacchāyasyāṃkurasyotpattau pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī bījātapādikā vācyā.
T07yabhkvyu:10084: yasya dharmasya bhāve yasya dharmasya bhāvo niyamena na yadṛcchayā.
T07yabhkvyu:10088: tadyathā bhūtānāṃ caturṇāṃ cittacaittānuparivartināṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇānāṃ caikasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasya cābhāve sarveṣām abhāva iti yukto
T07yabhkvyu:10091: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sahotpannam api cakṣurvijñānena tadutpattau hetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10093: na hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ tasya cakṣuṣo hetur bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10095: ata eva kāraṇād bhāvābhāvayos tadvattvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10096: caittādīnāṃ bhāve cittasya bhāvād abhāve cābhāvāt te 'pi cittasya hetavo bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10098: yady ekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ cābhāva ekasyety ato 'nyonyaṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10110: tenaiva cādiśabdena prāptibhiḥ sahajābhiḥ [Tib.184b] prāptimatām eṣa prasaṃga iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10121: tena sahotpannabalena kim eṣāṃ daṇḍānām avasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10124: tathaiva paścād api parasparāśritānām utpāda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10125: anyad api ca tatra kiṃcid bhavati nānyonyabalam eveti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:10131: eṣām api sahabhuvām anye 'pi sabhāgasarvatragavipākakāraṇahetavaḥ sūtrakādisthānīyā bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10133: kliṣṭā akuśalā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca kliṣṭatvasāmānyena sabhāgahetutvam eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10137: nivṛtāvyākṛtāś cākuśalānāṃ sabhāgahetur iti darśitaṃ bhavati, avyākṛtā avyākṛtānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10139: rūpam avyākṛtam avyākṛto rūpaskandhaḥ paṃcānāṃ skandhānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10140: catvāras tu skandhā vedanādayo na rūpasya sabhāgahetur viśiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10141: na hi viśiṣṭo nyūnasya sabhāgahetur iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10144: kuśalākuśalaṃ tu rūpam ābhisaṃskārikatvāt samaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ceti catvāras tasya sabhāgahetur bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10146: paṃcagarbhāvasthāḥ kalalārbudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ paṃca jātāvasthāḥ bālakumārayuvamadhyavṛddhāvasthā ity ete daśa daśānām avasthānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10151: anyeṣu samānajātīyeṣu nikāyasabhāgeṣu yadā manuṣyajanmano manuṣyajanmaivotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10152: tadā daśāpy avasthā daśānām apy avasthānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10156: aṃtyā tu janmāntarakalalādīnāṃ daśānām apy avasthānāṃ sabhāgahetur ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10159: śāliḥ śāler eva na yavasyety anena tulye 'py avyākṛtatve svasaṃtāna eva sabhāgahetutvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10161: atītāni mahābhūtāni anāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ hetur adhipatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10175: agre jātā atītāḥ pratyutpannā vā sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10176: anāgatā na sabhāgahetur ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10180: na tu anāgatāny anāgatānām ity uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:10181: ato gamyate nāsty anāgataḥ sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10183: na kadācin na hetur ity adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10185: tasmād asty anāgataḥ sabhāgahetur ity abhiprāyaḥ.
