T07yabhkvyu:10189: tasmāt sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipāka hetvabhisaṃdhivacanād adoṣo na kadācin na hetur iti vacane.
T07yabhkvyu:10197: yasmāt sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgahetur abhūtvā paścād bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10199: bhavīnām anāgatāvasthānām ekā caramāvasthā sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūtā.
T07yabhkvyu:10201: tatra ca sāmānyenoktaṃ na hetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10203: ekāsyām (Abhidh-k-vy 200) api hy avasthāyāṃ [Tib.186b] sa na sabhāgahetur iti śakyam evaṃ vaktuṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10204: yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10207: sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ samanantarapratyayatve niyatībhūto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10208: ataḥ śakyaṃ tāṃ caramāvasthām abhisaṃdhāyety anayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syān na kadācin na samanantara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10211: yadi sa dharmo 'nāgato bhavati nāsau samanantarapratyayo bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10214: yathā tatra yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10215: kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10220: kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na samanantara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10223: (yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti) yathā ceha tathā tatreti.
T07yabhkvyu:10226: kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na samanantaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10232: kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10235: yadi sa dharmo 'nāgato bhavati nāsau hetupratyayo bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10237: evaṃ sati ko guṇa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10239: [Tib.187a] naiva hy utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sa dharmo hetuḥ samanantaro vā mukhyavṛttyā bhavatīty akauśalam evātra śāstrakārasyaivaṃ saṃbhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10244: kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10247: kathaṃ na kadācin na hetur ity evam uktvā punar varṇayati.
T07yabhkvyu:10249: niravakāśaṃ yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavati na samanantaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10251: ayam atrābhiprāyārtha aikāntikam arthaṃ vyavasthāpya punar anyathākarotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10252: tasmāt pūrvaka evaiṣa parihāraḥ sādhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10257: tad yadi anāgato naiva sabhāgahetuḥ kasmād anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ sthāpitā.
T07yabhkvyu:10259: tat satkāyadṛṣṭihetuṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur iti vyākhyātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10260: tatra katham anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10261: na tāvat sahabhūhetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetur vā saṃbhavaty asahabhūtvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10264: [Tib.187b] (Abhidh-k-vy 201) pāriśeṣyāt sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā bhavatīti bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:10266: ato yady anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭer na sabhāgahetuḥ kasmād asau tṛtīyakoṭyarthaṃ sthāpiteti.
T07yabhkvyu:10268: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktakaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvety evam etad kartavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10271: tad dhi vedanādikaṃ sahabhūhetunā saṃprayuktakahetuuā vā satkāyadṛṣṭihetukam satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10273: vinaṣṭako hy ayam anāgatāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭim iti pāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10277: arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyaṃ yady evaṃ na kriyate pāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10278: bhāṣyākṣepanirvṛttaḥ pāṭho na tantram ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10279: prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate sarvadharmāś catuṣke niyatā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10280: hetau niyatā yasya dharmasya yo dharmo hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10281: sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na kadācin na hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10282: triṣv api kāleṣu hetur ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10283: evaṃ phale niyatā yasya dharmasya yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ puruṣakārādi yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10284: evam āśraye niyatā yasya dharmasya [Tib.188a] cakṣurvijñānāder yo dharma āśrayaś cakṣurādir iti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10285: evam ālambane niyatā yasya dharmasya cakṣurvijñānāder yo dharma ālambanaṃ rūpādir iti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10286: tena dharmāṇāṃ hetau niyatatvāt triṣv api kāleṣu sabhāgahetur bhavatīti codakābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10287: sarvahetvanabhisaṃdher adoṣa iti darśayan vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10288: hetur atra saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūhetuś ca na sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā.
T07yabhkvyu:10297: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāgahetur abhūtvā anāgatāvasthāyāṃ hetur bhavati vartamānāvasthāyām iti prāptaṃ prasaktam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10298: iṣyata evāvasthāṃ prati na dravyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10299: iṣyata eva sabhāgahetoḥ sabhāgahetutvāvasthā pūrvaṃ nāsīd idānīṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10300: na tu dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ nāsīd idānīṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10301: avasthāphalaṃ hi sāmagryaṃ na dravyaphalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10312: anāgatāni kuśalamūlāni anāgatānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 202) sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10316: yady apy anāgato 'sti sabhāgahetur na tv asau phaladānagrahaṇakriyāyāṃ samarthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10317: ya eva hi phaladānagrahaṇakriyāsamarthaḥ phalākṣepakriyāsamarthaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:10318: tasyaiva sabhāgahetoḥ atītasya vartamānasya ca grahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10334: anāgatāvasthāyām idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścimam iti na paricchidyate viprakīrṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10335: na cāsati pūrvāparabhāve sadṛśaḥ sadṛśasya niṣyando yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10337: utpannam atītaṃ vartamānaṃ vā anāgatasya niṣyanda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10339: na cotpannam anāgatasya niṣyando yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10341: tathānāgatasyāpy utpanno na niṣyando bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:10343: mā bhūd dhetoḥ pūrvaṃ phalam iti doṣāṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:10345: mā bhūd dhetoḥ pūrvaṃ phalam iti pūrvam ayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10347: na hi pratyutpannāvasthāyāṃ sahabhūhetor iva vipākahetoḥ sahotpannaṃ phalam upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10350: viprakīrṇatvād anāgatasyādhvano na pūrvaṃ vipākahetuḥ paścād vipākaphalaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10351: tasmāc ca sabhāgahetuvad vipākahetur apy anāgato na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10353: naitad asti yad uktaṃ vipākahetur apy evam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10356: tasya sa eva dharmas tadānīṃ eva kathaṃ niṣyando yokṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10357: na hi putraḥ svasyaiva pitus tadānīm eva pitā bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10360: anyonyahetuphalatā na paurvāparyeṇa vinā saṃprasajyate prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10362: hetor anyal lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10374: lakṣaṇena vyavasthitas triṣv api kāleṣu yathoktalakṣaṇa ity anāgato 'pi vipākahetur na vāryate na pratiṣidhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10376: kim anāgate 'dhvani sadṛśā dharmā viprakīrṇā iti na śakyate paricchetuṃ ayaṃ hetur idam idam asya niṣyandaphalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10378: āhosvit yo dharmo yasya dharmasya sabhāgahetur bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:10379: sa dharmas tasya hetupratyayavaśān niṣyandaphalaṃ bhaved iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10382: mama tu pūrvaka evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ pratibhātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10391: sāsravo hi dharmaḥ svabhūmika eva sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10395: yat sāsravāṇāṃ mārgasya ca tulye bhūmibhede mārga eva navabhūmiko 'nyonyaṃ sabhāgahetur na sāsrava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10397: āgantuko hy asau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10399: na hi kāmarūpārūpya(navabhūmisaṃniśrayādhigamyatvāt navabhūmiko na tadbhūmisaṃgṛhītatvāt) caryas tṛṣṇāḥ sāsravān ivānāsravān dharmān svīkurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10400: yadā tarhi nirvāṇaṃ mārgaṃ vābhilaṣati kuśalo 'sau dharmacchandaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10404: evaṃ tarhi sarvaḥ sarvasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10414: duḥkhe dharmajñānakśāntis tasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sameti kṛtvā sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10415: viśiṣṭasya ca duḥkhe dharmajñānasya duḥkhe 'nbvayajñānakṣānter yāvad anutpādajñānasya (Abhidh-k-vy 204).
T07yabhkvyu:10417: na hi duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāgatāyāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ sabhāgahetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10419: darśanamārgo darśanamārgāntarasya bhāvanāmārgasyāśaikṣamārgasya ca sabhāgahetur iti trayāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10422: aśaikṣamārgo 'śaikṣamārgāntarasya na darśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayor ity ekasya sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10424: tatra darśanamārgādiṣu mṛdvindriyamārgo darśanamārgasvabhāvo mṛdutīkṣṇendriyamārgasya tatsvabhāvasyaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:10433: dharmānusārimārgasya cātmīyasyānāgatāvasthasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cātmīyāṇāṃ yathāyogam utpattyanutpattidharmāṇāṃ ceti ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10434: śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cāpareṣām api trayāṇām iti caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10436: na tu śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgayor hetuḥ pūrvakālīnatvāt darśanamārgasya.
T07yabhkvyu:10439: [Tib.191a] dharmānusārimārgaḥ dharmānusārimārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktamārgayoś ceti trayāṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10446: samayavimuktamārgas tarhīndriyato viśiṣṭasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10449: na hi pūrvakālīnaṃ phalaṃ paścātkālīno hetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10450: dṛṣṭiprāptamārgaḥ punaḥ samayavimuktamārgasya na sabhāgahetur indriyato nyūnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10452: kathaṃ punar ūrdhvabkūmikasya dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya darśanamārgasya bhāvanāmārgasya vā aśaikṣamārgasya vā yathāyogam adhobhūmiko mārgo vijñānānamtyāyatanāt (Abhidh-k-vy 205) prabhṛti yāvad anāgamyabhūmiko yathāyogaṃ darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgo vā aśaikṣamārgo vā samo vā viśiṣṭo vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10456: indriyatas tāvat samo bhavati viśiṣṭo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:10457: darśanamārge śraddhānusārimārgaś caturthadhyānabhūmiko 'dharabhūmikasya tasyaiva śraddhānusārimārgasya samaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10462: evam etāv eva śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgau caturthadhyānabhūmikāv adharabhūmikayor bhāvanāśaikṣamārgayoḥ pratyekaṃ bhūmīndriyabhedabhinnayoḥ samau vā viśiṣṭau veti saṃbhavato yojyau.
T07yabhkvyu:10463: tathā bhāvanāmārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya śraddhādhimuktamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ samaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10471: evam aśaikṣamārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasyāśaikṣamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ samo viśiṣṭo veti yathāyogaṃ yojyam.
T07yabhkvyu:10472: anayā diśā sarvabhūmayo yojyāḥ kathaṃ hetūpacayataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10473: ūrdhvabhūmikasyādharabhūmiko mārgaḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavatīty ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10476: ūrdhvabhūmikāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10477: duḥkhe dharmajñānād apy ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmikā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntir yāvad ūrdhvabhūmikān mārge dharmajñānād adharabhūmikā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir hetūpacayato viśiṣṭā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10479: darśanamārgād ūrdhvabhūmikād adhobhūmiko bhāvanāmārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10480: darśanamārgo hi darśanamārgahetūpacito bhāvanāmārgas tu darśanabhāvanāmārgahetūpacitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10481: ūrdhvabhūmikābhyāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyām adharabhūmiko 'śaikṣamārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10483: ūrdhvabhūmikasya darśanamārgasyādhobhūmiko darśanamārgo hetūpacayataḥ samānakṣaṇāpekṣayā samo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10485: tad evaṃ kaścid indriyataḥ samo bhavati hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaḥ saty apy adharabhūmikatve.
T07yabhkvyu:10487: kaścid dhetūpacayataḥ samo bhavati indriyato viśiṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10494: tatra mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārād ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmiko 'pi mṛdumadhyo yāvad adhimātramadhyād adhimātrādhimātraḥ samānāsamānakṣaṇāpekṣayā hetūpacayataḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10496: yad uktaṃ śraddhānusārimārgaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti kathaṃ śraddhānusārimārgo dharmānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10503: santi hi mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyamārgavad ātmīyās tīkṣṇendriyamārgā api.
T07yabhkvyu:10504: dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktamārgās tu tatsaṃtāne saṃmukhībhaveyur api yadīndriyasaṃcāraḥ kriyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:10505: tasmād utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo 'nutpattidharmiṇo dharmānusārimārgasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ ca yathāyogam anāgatānām utpattidharmāṇām anutpattidharmāṇāṃ vā samaviśiṣṭānāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10507: [Tib.193a] utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo 'nutpannasya dharmānusārimārgasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya vā hetur yadā śraddhānusāryādaya indriyāṇi saṃcaranto dharmānusārimārgādīn saṃmukhīkurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10529: mṛdumṛdavo mṛdumṛdvantarāṇāṃ samānāṃ mṛdumadhyādīnāṃ cānyeṣām aṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭānām iti sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10532: tadyathā mṛdvadhimātrāḥ saptānāṃ madhyamṛdavaḥ saṇṇāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrā adhimātrādhimātrāntarāṇāṃ ekarūpāṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10533: pūrvān pūrvān apāsya teṣāṃ teṣāṃ nyūnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10538: sarve te nava prakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10543: ābhisaṃskārikasya hi sabhāgahetor nyūnaṃ phalaṃ neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10547: pūrvotpannāḥ sarve samānabhūmikānāṃ paścādvartināṃ sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10559: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ phalaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānaphalam iti catuṣprakāraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10560: tad yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ ca sabhāgahetur iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:10565: kā punar atra yuktir yayaivaṃ niyama iti tāṃ yuktiṃ nirdikṣur āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10567: na caturthadhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ prathamadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya yāvat tṛtīyadhyānadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10569: na hy ābhisaṃskārikasya mahāyatnasādhyasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānam amahāyatnasādhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10570: yādṛśena hi yatnaviśeṣeṇa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niṣpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10574: tasmāt phalam asyotkṛṣṭatareṇaiva yatnaviśeṣeṇa niṣpādyate ity avagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10580: yasmād ābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānaṃ phalaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10584: duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāsravam utpannam anutpattidharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntināṃ na hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10589: tadyathārhattvāt parihīṇasya aśaikṣo mārgaḥ pūrvotpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmimārgayoḥ paścādutpadyamānayor na sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10591: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ prathama eva kṣaṇe pratilabdhā ekasaṃtānagatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10595: pūrvataraṃ hi duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntibhyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10598: anāgato vā dharmaḥ yasmān na sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10599: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ aparimitāḥ pratilabdhā eva na tūtpannāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10601: pūrvaṃ pratilabdhamātro dharmaḥ pṛṣṭo na tūtpannaḥ anutpannaś ca na sabhāgahetur bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10602: idānīṃ pūrvotpanno 'pi kim asti na sabhāgahetur iti atiśayarūpeṇa pṛcchyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10608: sa paścādutpannasyānāgāmiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vā na sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10611: sa pūrvotpannaḥ paścādutpannasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya na sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10615: sā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannānāṃ uttaraiḥ kṣaṇair duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇādibhir ā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣānteḥ sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe [Tib.195b] dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ na sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10619: kathaṃ punas tāsāṃ nyūnatvaṃ tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10620: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānter duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tadvadhyakleśaprāpter vimuktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10622: tasmād dhetūpacitatarābhyo 'pi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāniprāptibhyo duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir viśiṣṭā tāś ca nyūnās tatprāptitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10623: kiṃ ca prathamakṣaṇotpannāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāpter duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptis tasmād eva hetudvayād (Abhidh-k-vy 209) viśiṣṭā.
T07yabhkvyu:10625: atas tatpūrvikā apy anyā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptayo hetūpacitataratve 'pi nyūnā eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:10626: tasmān na sā tāsāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10632: yadi cittacaittā eva saṃprayuktasahetur ity etāvad ucyate bhinnakālajā api bhinnakālajaiḥ saha bhinnasaṃtānajā api ca bhinnasaṃtānajaiḥ saha saṃprayuktakahetuḥ [Tib.196a] saṃprasajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10633: na hi te kālasaṃtānabhinnā na cittacaittā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:10635: yadi cittacaittā ekākārā ekanīlādyākārā ekālambanāś ca ekanīlādyālambanā evaṃ te saṃprayuktakahetur nānyatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:10636: evaṃ bhinnakālajatvaṃ bhinnasaṃtānajatvaṃ ca vyāvartitaṃ bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10639: saṃbhavati hi bhinnakālasaṃtānajānām api cittacaittānām ekākārālambanatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10642: navacandrādīni hi paśyatāṃ bahūnāṃ ekākārālambanāś cittacaittā vartante.
T07yabhkvyu:10647: tulyārthe samaśabdagrahaṇe hi jātitulyatvāt sa eva prasaṃgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10651: caitto 'pi cittasyety anyonyaphalam iti tenārthena sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10656: yathā teṣām eva sārthikānām anyonyabalena mārgaṃ gacchatāṃ samo 'nnapānasnānaśayanādiparibhogakriyāyāṃ prayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10659: ekenāpi hi vinā na sarve saṃprayujyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10662: pūrve ca te sarvagāś ca sarvapūrvagāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10664: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannā atītāḥ pratyutpannā vā sarvatragā anuśayāḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kleśasvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamutthānāṃ paścimānāṃ paścādatītapratyutpannānāṃ anāgatānāṃ ca sarvatragahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10668: vimatiḥ saha tābhiś ca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yety
T07yabhkvyu:10671: yasmād ayaṃ sarvatragahetuḥ kliṣṭānām eva sāmānyena paṃcanikāyānām api bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10677: eṣāṃ hi sarvatragāṇāṃ prabhāvena anyanaikāyikā anyanikāyabhavāḥ kleśā rāgādaya upajāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:10682: sarveṣāṃ vā kleśanikāyānāṃ hetubhāvaṃ gacchantīti sarvatragāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10687: sarvatragā āryapudgalasya sarva eva prahīṇā darśanaprahātavyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10689: te rāgādayas teṣāṃ na sarvatragahetukā iti manyamāna evaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:10692: yaś ca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10697: nivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ kāmadhātau satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭitatsaṃprayuktasamutthā dharmā rūpārūpyāvacarās [Tib.197b] ca kliṣṭā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10701: tatra kāmāvacarāḥ kliṣṭā dharmā yathāyogaṃ sabhāgasarvatragasahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetubhūtais tair eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhir avyākṛtahetukāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10703: ūrdhvabhūmikās tv anyair apīti sugamam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:10708: akuśalāś ceti hy aviśeṣitatvāt darśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāś ca gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:10710: yat tad anyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ satyam iti tṛtīyaṃ jñāpakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10711: tadanyad dhi kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ ca aviśeṣitatvāt gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10712: sarvatragahetunā (Abhidh-k-vy 211) hi bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ pṛthagjanānām ivāryāṇām api satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur iti vyākhyātam
T07yabhkvyu:10714: yady akuśalā avyākṛtahetukā api bhavanti na kevalam akuśalahetukāḥ prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10716: āryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt [Tib.198a] parihīyamāṇo yas tatprathamataḥ kliṣṭāṃ cetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti.kāmavairāgyaparihāṇikāle hi sā āryapudgalasya cetanā sahabhūhetunā ca saṃprayuktakahetunā ca akuśalahetukaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:10722: aprahīṇaṃ sahabhūhetuṃ saṃprayuktakahetuṃ ca saṃdhāya abhipretya etat prajñaptibhāṣyam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10723: darśanaprahātavyo hi satkāyadṛṣṭyādikaḥ tasyāś cetanāyā hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10726: akuśalā avaśyaṃ sāsravā eveti na viśeṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:10727: kuśalās tu dviprakārāḥ sāsravā anāsravāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:10734: yathā pūtīni bījāni abhiṣyanditāny api durbalatvān nāṃkurotpattihetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10735: evam avyākṛtā dharmās tṛṣṇābhiṣyanditā api na vipākotpattihetur bhavanti durbalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10736: anāsravā balavanto 'pi tṛṣṇānabhiṣyanditatvād vipākaṃ [Tib.198b] na nirvartayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10737: yathādbhir anabhiṣyanditavāc chuṣkāṇi balavaṃty api sārabījāni nāṃkuraṃ nirvartayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10742: kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākam apratisaṃyuktāḥ kāmādiṣv apratisaṃyuktā anāsravā abhinirvartayeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:10747: akuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāś ca śeṣā ubhayavidhatvāt ubhayaprakāratvāt balavadabhiṣyaṃditaprakāratvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10748: nirvartayaṃti vipākaṃ yathā sārāṇy abhiṣyaṃditāni bījāny aṃkuraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10754: atha vipacyate svayam iti karmasādhano ghañ.
T07yabhkvyu:10755: tatra karmasādhano vipāka eva hetur vipākahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10758: vipākajaṃ cakṣur ity etan na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10763: atha vipāka eva (Abhidh-k-vy 212) hetur iti karmasādhanaparigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10765: karmaiva hi [Tib.199] vipāko vipacyata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:10766: kiṃ tu karmaṇo vipāka ity etan na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10768: karmaṇo vipāka iti cātra bhāvasādhanārtha iṣṭe na karmasādhanārtha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10769: tasmāt karmaṇo vipāka ity etan na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:10770: ubhayathāpi yoga ity uktaṃ prāg iti
T07yabhkvyu:10775: phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karma vipāka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10779: phalavivakṣyāyāṃ bhāvasādhana evaṃ parigṛhyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10780: tasmād vipākajaṃ cakṣur iti madhyapadalopāt karmasādhanaparigrahād vā sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:10788: sahabhūhetvādīnāṃ tu sadṛśa eva pāka iti viśeṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10789: [Tib.199b] abhidharmaśāstra evaṃ vyutpādyate tenedaṃ praty ādiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10791: iha prāptayo vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvac cittādibhyaḥ pṛthag avasthitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10797: yad eva ca prāptīnāṃ phalaṃ tad eva tajjātyādīnām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10801: kāyavākkarmaṇo rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt tajjātyādīnāṃ ca caṃskāraskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt dviskaṃdhakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10807: jātyādīnaṃ ca saṃskāraskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāc catuḥskaṃdhako vipākahetur ekaphalaḥ sādhāraṇaphalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10808: na hi cittasyānyat phalam anyac caittādīnām iti asamāhitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10810: na hy atra rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītaṃ kāyavākkarma cittacaittair ekaphalaṃ [Tib.200a] bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10812: triskaṃdhakas tu triṣv api dhātuṣu nāsti cittacaittānām avaśyam ekaphalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10817: asaṃjñisamāpattir api saha jātyādibhiḥ tathaiva vaktavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:10825: tatra sarvam eva rūpaṃ nāstīty ekaskaṃdhakaś catuḥskaṃdhakaś ca vipākahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10828: nirodhasamāpattir api saha svajātyādibhir ekaskaṃdhako vipākahetur ekaphala iti sugamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10831: tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyaṃ tajjīvitendriyaṃ tajjātyādayaś ca viprayuktā vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10832: [Tib.200b] tac caitat sarvaṃ dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītam ity ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10835: tasya hi manaāyatanasya kalāpe avaśyaṃ vedanādayaḥ sahabhuvo jātyādayaś ca vipākarūpā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10836: vedanādijātyādayo dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītā iti te dve manodharmāyatane vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10838: tasya spraṣṭavyasyāvaśyaṃ jātyādayas saṃtīti dharmāyatanam api vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10839: na kevalaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti dve āyatane tasya vipacyete.
T07yabhkvyu:10841: tad eva kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tadāśrayabhūtacatuṣkaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10843: tasya ca jātyādibhir bhavitavyam iti dharmāyatanam api tatra tṛtīyaṃ vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10847: tad evāyatanaṃ rūpādīnām anyatamat spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tadāśrayabhūtasvabhāvaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ ca tajjātyādisvabhāvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10850: tad eva cakṣuḥ kāyāyatanaṃ cāvaśyaṃ cakṣuḥkāyapratibaddhavṛttivāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10855: tad eva śrotrādīnām anyatamad āyatanaṃ kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni ca pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:10861: asti karma yasyaikam eva dharmāyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyata iti nopapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10864: yadi tāvat kāmadhātau jīvitaṃ vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10865: karmaṇas tatrāvaśyaṃ kāyajīviteṃdriye bhavataḥ kalalādyavasthāsu anutpanne ṣaḍāyatane.
T07yabhkvyu:10866: utpanne tu ṣaḍāyatane saptabhir āyatanair bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10868: rūpadhātāv api saptabhir ārūpyadhātāv api manodharmaāyatanābhyām avaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10870: ko vātra dhātur abhipreta iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10872: nanu ca tatrākṣepakakarmaphalatvāj jīviteṃdriyasya avaśyaṃ manaāyatanenāpi bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10873: na ca jīviteṃdriyam eva vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10878: yasmiṃ kṣaṇe ārūpyopapannasya [Tib.201b] vipākajaṃ cittaṃ na samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:10879: tasmin kṣaṇe jīviteṃdriyam eva vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10880: vipākasya jīviteṃdriyasyaivotpādān manaāyatanasya cāsamudācārād iti kim arthaṃ tatsamudācāre manaāyatanam aparaṃ na bhavatīti tasya dve manodharmāyatane
T07yabhkvyu:10882: bhavaty evaṃ cāksepakasya karmaṇo jīviteṃdriyaṃ vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10883: jīviteṃdriye ca vipacyamāne manaāyatanādīny api vipacyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10886: asti tat karma yasyaikam eva dharmāyatanaṃ vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10888: atha mataṃ jīviteṃdriyākṣepakasyaiva karmaṇo manaāyatanādīny api vipacyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10891: tasyaiva karmaṇo 'nye 'pi manaāyatanādayas tatra vartamānā vipāko na punar anyasya karmaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10893: asti hi saṃbhavo yad ekasya karmaṇo nikāyasabhāgo vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10897: tasya cakṣuḥkāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanānīti vacane yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10899: evaṃ manaāyatanādīny api tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10903: asaty api tu vipāke manasi jīviteṃdriyaprādurbhāvo 'stīti asamam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:10905: asti karma yasya dharmāyatanam eva vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10914: rūpāvinābhāvitvāt rūpāyatanam api tasyaiva cakṣurnirvartakasya (Abhidh-k-vy 215) karmaṇo vipāka iti samayāntaram icchati.
T07yabhkvyu:10915: ayaṃ tv ācāryo na rūpāyatanam avaśyaṃ tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity aparaṃ pakṣam avalaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:10920: na hy anyonyamavinābhāvino jīvitanikāyasabhāgādīny āvaśyakam ekasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10925: atha kathaṃ kasyacit karmaṇa ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10935: ekadhvikasya karmaṇo 'tītasya traiyadhviko vipāko vipacyate atītapratyutpannānāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10936: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpy atītasya pratyutpannasya caikādhviko 'nāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10939: mā bhūd atinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalam iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:10940: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10947: yady apy asau samanaṃtarapratyayo vipākahetuḥ itthaṃ caitad eva.
T07yabhkvyu:10948: yasmāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇo vipākahetoḥ samanaṃtarapratyayāt kadācit kuṣalaḥ kadācid akuśalaḥ kadācid avyākṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10950: atha vā samanaṃtarakṣaṇasya avipākasvabhāvasya samanaṃtarapratyayākṛṣṭatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10951: pravāhāpekṣo hi vipākahetuḥ cittacaittādipravāhe sati atikrāṃte vipākahetur vipākaṃ dadyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10954: arthata ukto na śabdata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10955: dvividhaṃ hi vacanaṃ svaśabdābhitaṃ arthoktaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:10963: aviśeṣavacanād eva sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetavas traiyadhvikā ity arthata uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10965: pūrvotpannāv eva ca tāv ity avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10979: kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvena tv ayaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ pṛthag vyavasthāpyata ity uktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:10985: tryadhvakā eva trayas traya eva tryadhvakā iti avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10989: svato 'nye hi svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10991: (II.56cd) hetuḥ phalam iti anyonyāpekṣayaitat dvayam ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:10992: kiṃ punas tat phalaṃ yasyaitaddhetavaḥ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10995: ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ phalam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10997: phalatvād asaṃskṛtasya phalam asaṃskṛtam iti kṛtvā [Tib.204a] hetunā svato 'nyenāsya bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11007: ata eva ca ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11008: na sahabhūhetur asya saṃprayuktakahetur vā saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11019: anutpādyatvād eva cāsyaite hetavo na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11020: anutpādyatvād eva cāsya kāraṇahetur na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11035: kiṃ ca na tāvad adhipatiphalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11039: tac cānutpattimad iti nāsya sahajaṃ paścājjātaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11042: utpattimato hi sadṛśo dharma utpattimān niṣyandaphalam.
T07yabhkvyu:11043: ata eva ca na puruṣakāraphalaṃ asaṃskṛtasya puruṣakārābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11044: yasya hi balena ya utpadyate prāpyate vā.
T07yabhkvyu:11053: atha vā paṃcavidhahetuvaidharmyāt paṃcavidhaphalāsaṃbhava iti nāsaṃskṛtasya phalaṃ sambhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11054: yad mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇahetur neṣyate kasyedānīṃ tat phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11055: hetumatā hi phalena bhavitavyaṃ kathaṃ vā kena vā prakāreṇa tat phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11057: yat tāvad uktaṃ kasyedānīṃ tat phalam iti [Tib.205a] mārgasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11058: yad apy uktaṃ kathaṃ vā tat phalam iti phalaṃ tadbalena mārgabalena prāpter ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11064: prāptir eva tarhi mārgasya phalaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11065: tasyām eva prāptau tasya mārgasya sāmarthyāt na visaṃyogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11069: evaṃ tatra visaṃyoge mārgasyāsāmarthyād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11070: tasmān na ca tāvad asya mārgaḥ kathaṃcid api hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11071: ṣaṇṇāṃ hetūnām anyatamo 'pi hetur asya mārgo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11073: prāpyaṃ phalaṃ na janyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11074: paṃcavidho hi hetur iti kecid icchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11075: kārako jñāpako vyaṃjako dhvaṃsakaḥ prāpakaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:11083: prāpyaṃ ca visaṃyogaphalaṃ na janyam iti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11085: asaṃskṛtasya yadi phalaṃ syāt adhipatiphalaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11088: iti vacanāt tad apy asya [Tib.205b] nivāritam iti paricchinne codakaḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:11092: saṃskṛtam eva pratīdam asaṃskṛtam kāraṇahetur vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11094: kasmād asya saṃskṛtavat phalaṃ na vyavasthāpyata ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11097: adhvasaṃgṛhītasyaiva hi dharmasya phalapratigrahaṇadānasāmarthyam asti nānyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11099: vartamānāḥ phalaṃ paṃca gṛhṇanti dvau prayacchata
T07yabhkvyu:11104: te 'py anityā evety avadhāraṇād arthān na nityo hetur ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11107: evaṃ pratyayā apy anityā evoktāḥ ye hetavo ye pratyayā iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11116: ālambanapratyayo hi nirudhyamāne dharme kāritraṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11126: dharmatāyā avirodhān na doṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11131: kiṃ tu asaṃskṛtam eva vicāryate 'sti vā na veti.
T07yabhkvyu:11136: yathā rūpād vedanābhāvāntaraṃ vedanāyāś ca saṃjñā yāvat saṃskārebhyo vijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11137: tathā na rūpādibhyaḥ paṃcabhyo (Abhidh-k-vy 219) 'saṃskṛtaṃ bhāvāntaram asti.
T07yabhkvyu:11142: utpannānuśayajanmanirodhe utpannānām anuśayānāṃ janmanaś ca nirodhe pratisaṃkhyābalena prajñābalena anyasyānuśayasya janmanaś ca anutpādaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11143: tad evaṃ anuśayanirodhaḥ samudayasatya nirodho janmanirodho duḥkhasatyanirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11146: kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ janmanaś ca pratisaṃkhyābalena nirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11148: yasya cānuśayasya yaḥ pratipakṣo mārgaḥ pratisaṃkhyā.
T07yabhkvyu:11149: tena saha prathame kṣaṇe so 'nuśaya utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11151: tadbalād eva ca paunarbhavikasya janmanaḥ apratisaṃdhiko nirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11156: tasya nikāyasabhāgaśeṣayāntarāmaraṇe āyuṣyaparisamāpta eva pratyayavaikalyād yo 'nutpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11158: pratyayavaikalyaṃ punar aṃtyānāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ maraṇabhavākhyānāṃ nikāyasabhāgasaṃbandhane yad asāmarthyaṃ upakaraṇādipratyayāsāmagryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11172: akṛte utpattau pratibandha eṣām iti akṛtotpattipratibandhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11178: anāgatasyaiva cānutpāda iti yadi nirvāṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11179: atītapratyutpannasyotpannatvāt nāsty anutpāda iti katham idam uktaṃ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:11180: atītānāgatapratyutpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvartante iti tat sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11182: tasyātītapratyutpannayor api tadāsevanādibhir nirvāṇaṃ prāpyata iti sunītam idaṃ sūtraṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11189: yo vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne (Abhidh-k-vy 220)([Tib.207b] chandarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11191: chandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vas tad vijñānaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11195: atas triyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ yujyata iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:11199: yaḥ kleśe rāge dveṣe vā chandarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11202: na svabhāvata eveti traiyadhvikasyāpi kleśasya prahāṇaṃ yujyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11206: tad evam aikakṣaṇikaḥ kleśaḥ paryudasto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11209: na punar aikakṣaṇika ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11212: aṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritāni katham atīte 'dhvani ekasmiṃ kṣaṇe yojyaṃta iti ato 'tītaṃ janmādhikṛtyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11215: evam asmīti anyathāsmīti sad asmīti asad asmīti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11217: na bhaviṣyāmītthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi anyathā bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11219: itthaṃ syām evaṃ syāṃ anyathā syām ity asya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11221: apītthaṃ syām apy evaṃ syām apy anyathā syām ity asya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11223: tathehāpi paurvajanmikaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kleśapravāhaḥ ajhajanmikaś ca saṃbadhyate naikakṣaṇika iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11226: paurvajanmikenaihajanmikena ceti kleśadvayenāsyāṃ saṃtatau pratyutpannāyāṃ bījabhāvo vāsanālakṣaṇaṃ sāmarthyam āhito 'nāgate 'syotpattaye.
T07yabhkvyu:11227: tasya bījabhāvasya prahāṇāt tad api kleśadvayaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11228: yathā vipākakṣayād vipākopabhogāt karma kṣīṇaṃ bhavatīty upacaryate.
T07yabhkvyu:11231: na hi tena saṃtatau bījabhāva āhito yasya prahāṇāt prahāṇaṃ bhaved ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11232: anāgatasya punar duḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījabhāvād atyantam anutpḍaḥ prahāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11234: na hi niruddhe 'tīte nirodhābhimukhe ca pratyutpanne yatnaḥ pratipakṣotpādane yatnaḥ sārthakaḥ saprayojanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11237: katham asatām asann agro bhavitum arhatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11238: katham asatām ākāśādīnām asaṃskṛtānām asann asaṃskṛto virāgo 'gro bhavitum arhatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11243: (Abhidh-k-vy 221) dṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃ prajñayā uddiṣṭaṃ parebhyo deśanayā trayāṇāṃ pūraṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11248: kiṃ ca punaḥ syād iti guṇaparipraśna āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11250: yat tūktaṃ kiṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ syād iti atrocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11262: na hi vastuno nirodhe hetuḥ phalam avayavāvayavītyevamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:11265: asyaiva nirodhasya prāptir nānyasyeti tasmiṃ prāptiniyame ko hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11266: na hi nirodhasya prāptyā sardhaṃ kaścit saṃbandho 'sti hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11269: yady abhāvaḥ katham asya prāptiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11271: āryamārgalābhena kleśasya punarbhavasya cotpāde 'tyantaviruddhasyāśrayasya lābhāt prāptaṃ nirvāṇam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11275: prahāṇaṃ yāvad aprādurbhāva iti paryāyaśabdā ete.
T07yabhkvyu:11276: aprādurbhāva ity etat sphuṭam ity udāharaṇam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11277: nāsmiṃ prādurbhāva ity ato 'prādurbhāvā ity adhikaraṇasādhanam [Tib.209b] iti darśayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:11278: na tu aprādurbhūtir aprādurbhāva iti bhāvasādhanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11279: yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate yato mārgāt prahāṇaḥ prāptaḥ parikalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11280: tasmiṃ sati mārge prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatām aprādurbhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11297: tasmāj jātaṃ adhipajaṃ adhipatiphalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11308: tad anena dvividhasyāpi kāraṇahetoḥ kārakasya vādhyupekṣakasya vādhipatiphalam [Tib.210a] astīti darśitaṃ bhavati anyatrāsaṃskṛtāṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:11315: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvat kāyaṃ pratītya spraṣṭavyāni cotpadyate kāyavijñānam iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11317: na hi cakṣurādīny āyatanāni cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ sahabhūhetvādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11320: dharmāyatanam api sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvādi saṃbhavatīti na kāraṇahetur evety avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:11321: tasmād daśānām ity uktaṃ na dvādaśānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11325: bhājanaloko hi kuśalākuśalakarmajanito 'py avyākṛto 'pi na vipākaphalam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11334: draṣṭukāmatāyāṃ ca cakṣurvijñānam utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11340: puruṣakāraphalam api hi tayor anantaraṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11347: puruṣakarmaiva hi puruṣakāro na puruṣād anyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11348: na hi karma karmavadbhyo 'nyad iṣyate bauddhaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11352: yasya dharmasya yat karma yā kriyā.
T07yabhkvyu:11354: nanu cāntarvyāpārapuruṣābhāve dharmamātraṃ puruṣa iti ato dharmakāra iti prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11370: yasmāt sahotpannaṃ samanantarotpannam vā puruṣakāraphalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11373: na hy anyat phalaṃ sahotpannam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:11376: kiṃ punar niṣyandaphalād adhipatiphalād vānyat puruṣakāraphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11378: tad eva hi phalaṃ tattan nāma labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:11410: vyākṛtāt kuśalād akuśalād vā ya uttarakālam eva bhavati na yugapan nāpy anantaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11412: samādhijas tūpacayaḥ samādhinā saha cānantaraṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11413: nirmāṇacittaṃ tv anaṃtaram eva ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11414: vipākaś ca samānabhūmika evābhipreta ity etac cobhayaṃ bhinnabhūmikam (Abhidh-k-vy 224) api bhavatīti na vipākasya prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11418: yady evaṃ kuśalasāsravasya hetor anāsravaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ prāpnoti kuśalasādṛṣyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11424: asya sarvatragahetoḥ sādṛśyaṃ bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11428: bhūmitas tāvat sarvatragahetuḥ kāmāvacaro yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11429: tatphalam api kāmāvacaraṃ yāvad bhāvāgrikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11432: na tu prakārataḥ sādṛśyaṃ yathā sabhāgahetoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11434: yasya sarvatragahetoḥ svaphalena saha prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11435: sa sarvatragahetur abhyupagamyate eva sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11437: sabhāgahetuś ca sa bhavati prakārato 'pi sādṛśyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11442: sa hi sabhāgahetur eva svanaikāyikasya kleśasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11458: tadyathā kliṣṭā dharmāḥ kuśalānāṃ na sabhāgahetur asādṛśyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11464: tadyathā rāgādayo 'nyanaikāyikānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ na sabhāgahetur anyanaikāyikatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11466: sarvatragā api dharmāḥ kliṣṭānām ekanaikāyikānām api na sabhāgahetur na sarvatragahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11469: dhiyā prāpyamāṇo nirodho visaṃyogaphalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11473: tena kāraṇena pratisaṃkhyānirodho visaṃyogaphalam ity uktaṃ bhavatīty ācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:11484: puruṣakārāj jātaṃ puruṣakārajaṃ puruṣakāraphalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11486: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya kāmāvacarasya prathamadhyānabhūmikasya vā tatprayogacittasya uparibhūmikaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmiko dvitīyadhyānabūmiko vā samādhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11489: dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittaṃ tad eva phalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11491: tadyathā kāmāvacarān maraṇacittād rūpāvacaraḥ prathamo 'ntarābhavakṣaṇa ity evamādi vijātīyodāharaṇaṃ niṣyandaphalavivecanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11492: adharabhūmikasya hi prayogacittasya uparibhūmikaḥ samādhir na niṣyandaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11495: na tu sarvaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati yad dhi yasya balāj jāyate sadṛśaṃ samānabhūmikaṃ anaṃtaraṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11496: tat tasya puruṣakāraphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11507: na cāsau hetubalāj jāyate nityatvād ity ataḥ kārikāyām anuktaṃ tad upasaṃcaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:11508: pratisaṃkhyānirodhas tu yadbalāt prāpyata iti vaktavayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11516: na hi pūrvaṃ phalaṃ paścād dhetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11523: yadbalāj jāyate yat tat phalaṃ puruṣakārajam
T07yabhkvyu:11530: aśilpinām avighnabhāvāvasthāyināṃ tacchilpam adhipatiphalam eva na puruṣakāraphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11547: vartamāna eva phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti natīto nānāgato vā.
T07yabhkvyu:11548: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11552: na ca pūrvam utpadyamānena dharmeṇa saphalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11562: na hi tayor vartamānāvasthāyāṃ niṣyando dṛśyate ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11568: na punas tad eva datta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11569: na punas tad eva phalaṃ prayacchata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11572: na hi vartamānatām ānītaṃ punar ānetuṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11573: yadā ca tāv atītau phalaṃ prayacchataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11575: utpadyamānāvasthāyām eva hi phalaṃ nirvartate nānyadā.
T07yabhkvyu:11576: kevalaṃ tu vyavahitam tat phalam ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11577: kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścād vijahātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11582: kuśalamūlāny api nava prakārāṇi tadviparyayeṇa mṛdumṛdvyā mithyādṛṣṭyādhimātrādhimātrāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante yāvad adhimātrādhimātrayā (Abhidh-k-vy 227) mithyādṛṣṭyā mṛdumṛdūni kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11588: tāḥ prāptayo 'ntyavasthāḥ kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11598: na tu pratigṛhṇāti pūrvam eva pratigṛhītatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11600: kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānakāle hi navaprakārāṇām api kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptayo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ samaṃ pratilabhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:11602: sa kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ dadāti na pratigṛhṇāti pratigṛhītatvād [Tib.215a] iti yuktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:11603: yās tu vartamānās tathaiva pratilabdhāḥ prāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11606: sa hi pratigṛhṇāti ca dadāti ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:11611: tā eva prāptayaḥ kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ dadāty eva svaniṣyandaphaladānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11617: yasyām avasthāyāṃ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścād vijahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11618: yasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:11619: yathāsmadādīnāṃ kuśalāḥ prāptayaḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti dadati ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:11624: tadyathā ūrdhvabhūmeḥ parihīṇasya [Tib.215b] ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ yāḥ prāptayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11625: tāḥ kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetur na phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11638: pūrvaniruddhasyāpi hi tatprāptisaṃtānasya sa niṣyanda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11639: ataḥ kathaṃ phalagrahaṇāt kṛtsna eva tatsabhāgahetur gṛhītaḥ syād iti tadartham evedam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11641: tad eva ubhayatrāpi pāṭhadoṣa udgrāhite kataraḥ pāṭhaḥ śreyān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11644: aviśeṣitatvāt kuśalapratisaṃdhānakāle pratilabdhā vartamānāḥ prāptayaḥ phalaṃ dadati pratigṛhṇanty api.
T07yabhkvyu:11645: nanu dadaty eva na pratigṛhṇantīti doṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11647: kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāna iti kuśalamūlaprāptyutpadyamānāvasthāyām etad ucyate na vartamānāvasthāyāṃ tatra ca na kāścid api kuśalamūlaprāptayo vartamānā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11648: tāḥ kathaṃ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti dadati ceti [Tib.216a] śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11649: atītās tu svasaṃtāne kuśalamūlaprāptayaḥ sarvā api sabhāgahetubhūtāḥ svaniṣyandaphalaṃ tadānīṃ dadaty eva.
T07yabhkvyu:11654: nanu caivam aviśeṣite pāṭhe anāgatānāṃ kuśalamūlaprāptīnāṃ dvitīyakoṭitvavacanaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11655: tā api hi tadānīm atītaprāptivat prāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11658: evam api na prāptaya eva vaktavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11663: cittacaittā api hi kuśalapratisaṃdhāne prathamataḥ pratilabhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11666: kiṃ tu prāptīnām eva kuśalapratisaṃdhāne āvaśyakatvād evaṃ vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11667: kuśalaprāptayo hi samyagdṛṣṭyā vicikitsayāpi vā kuśalapratisaṃdhāne 'vaśyam utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11668: cittacaittās tu vicikitsayā kuśalapratisaṃdhāne na tāvad utpadyanta iti prāptaya evotpadyanta iti varṇayamti.
T07yabhkvyu:11671: asty akuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:11673: kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścād vijahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11674: tā akuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11681: kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnuvan yā mṛdumṛdūnām akuśalānāṃ prāptīḥ sarvapaścād vijahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11682: tā akuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11685: kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate akuśalānāṃ prāptīḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11686: tā akuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ dadāti na pratigṛhṇāti pūrvavad vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11691: tā eva yāḥ kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnuvan prāptīḥ sarvapaścād vijahātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11694: pūrvapāṭhe tu dvitīyā koṭir na saṃbhavati yathoktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:11702: ete eva yathokte prathamadvitīyāvasthe śeṣāsv avasthāsu.
T07yabhkvyu:11705: tā akuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11716: asti nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11718: arhattvaṃ prāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīh sarvapaścād vijahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11719: sa nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11725: evaṃ hi phaladānam evaikam [Tib.217b] upapāditaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11731: tadyathā arhattvaṃ prāptasya yās tridhātukyo nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ prāptayaḥ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11732: sa nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ sabhāgahetur na phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11737: paścātpādakalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyātam iti na punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11738: yo 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāty api saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11740: yas tāvad dadāti pratigṛhṇāty api saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11745: pūrvam anālambanānāṃ sambhavato niyama uktaḥ sālambananiyamena tu cittacaittānām eva sabhāgahetutvam ucyate kṣaṇaśaḥ kṣaṇāntarāpekṣayā.
T07yabhkvyu:11746: na tu paryādāya vicchedata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11748: yadā kuśalcittānantaraṃ kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ vā [Tib.218a] cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:11749: tadā tat kuśalaṃ cittaṃ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti yatas tatsaṃtānapatitaṃ vyavahitam anāgataṃ kuśalaṃ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:11753: sadṛśena hi phalena saphalaḥ sabhāgahetur iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11757: tadā yena kuśalena cittena tat kuśalaṃ cittaṃ phalatvena pratigṛhītam āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:11763: tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvitīyaṃ cittaṃ phalatvena pratigṛhṇāti dadāti ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11767: yadā kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:11768: tadāsau sālambanaḥ kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetur na phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11773: asti sālaṃbano 'kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadāti catuḥkoṭikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11775: akuśalānaṃtaraṃ kuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:11781: ādiśabdena nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ anivṛtāvyākṛtaś ca sabhāgahetur yojyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11783: nivṛtāvyākṛtacittānantaraṃ kuśalaṃ anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ sammukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:11791: anivṛtāvyākṛtānantaraṃ kuśalaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:11799: tasya phalasya hetubhāvopagamanād ity upamā sautrāntikaprakriyaiṣā.
T07yabhkvyu:11805: kāṃcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyās tathā sasyauṣadhiprabhṛtayaḥ pratiṣṭhāphalam ity adhikāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11812: evaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ bhāvanāphalam iti samāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11821: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvaḥ prathamānāsravāḥ.(Abhidh-k-vy 231) tebhyaś ca śeṣāḥ kliṣṭādibhyas tribhyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11825: tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakalāpādayaḥ sarva eva śaikṣāśaikṣamārgā laukikāś ca kuśalāḥ śeṣā ity avagantavyaṃ śeṣāś cātra tṛtīyo rāśiḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11829: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajā
T07yabhkvyu:11832: kliṣtā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ paṃcabhyaḥ kāraṇasahabhūsabhāgasaṃprayuktakasarvatragebhyo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11837: yasmāt te cittacaittasvabhāvāḥ pūrvotpannasatkāyadṛṣṭyādilakṣaṇāt sarvatragahetor jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11840: na ca kliṣṭā dharmā vipākasvabhāvā iti te na tato jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11841: vipākajāḥ sarvatragahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ paṃcabhya eva hetubhyo jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11845: yady api mithyādṛṣṭyādibhyaḥ sarvatragebhyo vipākajā jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11846: na tu sarvatragahetor iti kṛtvā tato jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11853: atas tau vipākasarvatragahetū varjayitvā śeṣebhyaś caturbhyo jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11856: caśabdenānukṛṣṭau sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ kāraṇasahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetubhyo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11860: na hi sāsravā agradharmā anāsravasya kalāpasya sabhāgahetur yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11867: te cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaś ca cittacaittebhyo 'nye kliṣtādayaḥ kliṣṭavipākajaśeṣaprathamānāsravasaṃgṛhītāḥ tathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaittāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11871: kliṣṭā cittaviprayuktarūpiṇo [Tib.220b] (Abhidh-k-vy 232) vipākasaṃprayuktakahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaś caturbhyo hetubhyo jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11872: vipākajā api saṃprayuktakasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaś caturbhya eva.
T07yabhkvyu:11874: prathamānāsravā vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca saṃprayuktakahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ jāyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11877: (II.62cd, 63) janasya janaikā jātir na hetupratyayair vinety
T07yabhkvyu:11879: ato hetuvistaravacanānantaraṃ pṛcchati pratyayāḥ katama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11892: samaś cāyam anantaraś ca pratyaya iti samanantarapratyaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11895: avijñaptirūpasya kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ avijñaptirūpaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpam utpadyate sāsravadhyānasaṃmukhībhāve gṛhītasamvarasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11897: na tu kāmāvacaracittānantaraṃ kadācit [Tib.221a] kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca yugapac cittam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11898: kāmāvacaraṃ ca anāsravaṃ cety ākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11901: yadā hi bhuktvā svapiti dhyānam vā samāpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11902: tadāhāraja aupacayikaḥ svapnajaś ca samādhijo vā aupacayika utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11912: āveṇike tv akuśale dṛṣtiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11916: ity anena krameṇa kadācid bahubhyaś caittebhyas trayoviṃśater ekaviṃśatir aṣṭādaśa dvādaśa vālpe caittā utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11918: savitarkavicārādau ca samādhitraye asti savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ asti avitarko vicāramātraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11921: ataś ca cittacaittā api na samanantarapratyayāḥ syur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11922: asti jātyaṃtaraṃ prati na svajātim [Tib.221b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11923: asty alpabahutarotpattir jātyantaraṃ prati na svajātiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11924: vitarkavicārādīnāṃ hi kvacic citte jātyantarabhūtānāṃ satāṃ vṛttir avṛttiś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11926: na hi kadācid vedanaikasmiṃś citte ekā kvacid aparasmiṃ dve tisro veti.
T07yabhkvyu:11934: yataś caittānām alpabahutarotpattir na parigṛhītā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:11941: saṃtānasabhāgena dīvyanti vyavaharanti vā sāṃtānasabhāgikāḥ kecid ābhidharmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11947: tasya kleśasya paścādutpannasya pūrvaniruddhakleśaḥ kṣaṇāntaravyavahitaḥ samanantarapratyaya iti vyavasthāpayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11956: kāmadhātvavītarāgasyāryasya kāmāvacaryāḥ prāpter anantaraṃ traidhātukāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ prāptaya utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11959: ity evaṃ vyākulasammukhībhāvāt viprayuktā api saṃskārāḥ prāptijātyādayo na samanantarapratyayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11962: iti atītapratyutpannā eva samanantarapratyaya iti pūrvam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11968: (Abhidh-k-vy 234) vartamāno hi anāgatāt pūrvo vartamānād atīta iti śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11971: ata eva ca vartamāno vartamānasya na samanantarapratyaya iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11972: pūrvapaścimatāyā abhāvāt tulyavartamānasya na samanantarapratyaya iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11979: idaṃ cāpi saṃpraty evaṃjātīyakam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11984: anāgato neṣyate samanaṃtarapratyayo vyākulatvāt pūrvapaścimatāyā 'bhāvād ity ukte 'yam āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11988: yasya dharmasya duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāder yasmiṃ dharme laukikāgradharmādau pratibaddha utpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11995: apiśabdāt sati samanantarapratyaye sutarām utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11996: tasmān nāsti ca kramaniyamāvasthānaṃ tadvat samanantarotpattiniyamaś ca bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12003: yathā cakṣur utpannaṃ cakṣurvijñānāśrayabhāvenāvasthitaṃ yadi kāraṇāntaravaikalyāc cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpadyate na tatra cakṣur aparādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12005: kāraṇāntaravaikalyāt tu vijñānāntaraṃ notpadyate iti na tad aparādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12006: tad dhi na kāritraprabhāvitaṃ na jananapuruṣakāraprabhāvitam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12007: yadi hi taj jananaprabhāvitaṃ syāt jāyamāna eva sati kārye tan manaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12009: ato 'saty api janye tan mano bhavaty eva.
T07yabhkvyu:12010: kāritraprabhāvitas tu samanantarapratyayaḥ saty eva janye samanantarapratyayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12012: tena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhītaḥ tena samanaṃtarapratyayena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhīto jāyatām etad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12013: sa sarvair api dharmair abuddhimadbhiḥ sarvaprāṇibhir vā saṃcintyakāribhir na śakyaḥ pratibanddhuṃ yathā notpadyeta motpādīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12016: cittasya samāś ca te 'nantarāś ca te iti cittasamanantarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12020: te punaś cittasamanantarāḥ cittacaittā [Tib.223b] dve ca samāpattī asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī.
T07yabhkvyu:12037: cittacaittā eva hi saha samāpattidvayena cittasamanantarā iṣṭāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12040: ādigrahaṇena ca sarva eva viprayuktā gṛhyante samāpattidvayaṃ varjayitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:12041: te ca tathaiva cittaniraṃtarā na cittasamanantarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12045: tadā paścimāś cittacaittāḥ [Tib.224a] pūrvakeṇa cittena cittasamanaṃtarāś cittaniraṃtarāś ca bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:12047: dvitīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ vyutthānacittasya ca jātyādayaḥ na cittasamanantarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12051: ye tṛtīyacaturthyau te prathamadvitīye iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12062: accittikāyāḥ samāpatter vyutthānacittaṃ dvitīyādayaś ca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12066: ime dharmā na cittasamanantarā na samāpattinirantarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12073: āyatanaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca kṣaṇaś ca teṣāṃ niyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12076: yathā tāvac cakṣurvijñānaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ rūpāyatane ālambane niyataṃ na śabdāyatanādau.
T07yabhkvyu:12078: tatrāpy āyatane dravyaniyamena nīlarūpe nīlarūpagrāhakam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ niyataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12081: tatrāpi nīlarūpe ālambane yo nīlarūpakṣaṇo yasyālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12085: evaṃ śabdāyatanādiṣv api śrotrādivijñānaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12094: ālambanapratyayo hi sahabhuvāṃ na saṃbhavatīti nādhikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12099: sa pratyaya ity adhipatipratyaya iti samāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12102: sarvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaḥ sarvasya saṃskṛtasya svabhāvavarjyasya sālambanasyānālambanasya ca pratyayo 'dhipatipratyayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12115: samanantarapratyayaḥ pūrvoktas taṃ paścāduktaṃ kāritrakālaniyamam āśrayate.
T07yabhkvyu:12127: na cātītanāgatāś cittacaittā grāhyam arthaṃ gṛhṇantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12129: yad anāvaraṇabhāvena sarvasyām avasthāyām avasthānaṃ etad evāsyādhipatipratyayasya kāritram iti sugamatvān nādhipatipratyayasya [Tib.225b] kāritrakālaniyamaḥ sūcita ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12134: nirodhasamāpatter bhāvāgrikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ sabhāgahetur hetupratyayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12148: dvābhyām eva hetvadhipatipratyayābhyām anye vai cittacaittasamāpattidvayavinirmuktā dharmā jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12152: yadi veśvara ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ puruṣa iti vātra pakṣe ko hetur iti hetur mṛgyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12153: īśvaravyatiriktaṃ hetuṃ kṛtvā tatsiddher iti abhyupagataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12154: tadabhyupagamāc caikam īśvaraḥ puruṣa iti vā kāraṇaṃ sarvasya jagata iti asya vādasya vyudāsaḥ parityāgaḥ prāpnotīti piṇḍena vākyarthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12163: yadi hy ekam eva kāraṇam īśvaraḥ syāt mahādevo vā vāsudevo vā anyad vā puruṣādi vety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12164: yugapat sarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃ kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12167: dṛśyate ca bhāvānāṃ kalalādīnām aṃkurādīnāṃ ca kramasaṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12168: tasmāt svakāraṇaparaṃparānirvṛtta iti neśvarādikāraṇam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12169: īśvarādyekakāraṇaṃ jagad iti hi pratijānānasya svakāraṇakramotpāditvādilakṣaṇena dharmaviśeṣeṇa tasya sāpakṣālatvaṃ pakṣasyopalakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12173: ayam idānīṃ bhāva utpadyatāṃ yāvad ayaṃ paścād utpadyatām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12174: evaṃ kramasaṃbhavaś ca bhāvānāṃ īśvaraś ca kāraṇam iti īśvarakāraṇikābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12176: īśvaracchandabhedāc caikakāraṇatvābhyupagamāc ca prākpakṣavirodhād dharmasvarūpaviparyayaḥ pakṣasyotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12179: taddhetoś chandabhedahetor īśvarasyābhinnatvād ekatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12180: (Abhidh-k-vy 238) tataś ca eva sa pūrvokto dośo yugapat syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12182: anyad api kāraṇāntaraṃ bhinnaṃ tadutpattau īśvaro 'pekṣata ity ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12184: neśvara eva kāraṇam ity abhyupagame sa eva doṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12186: teṣām api ca kārṇāntarāṇāṃ kramotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāraṇāntarabhedānām api punaḥ kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇād anavasthāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12187: teṣām api kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇaṃ teṣām api kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇam ity aparyavasānaprasaṃgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12189: anādiḥ saṃsāra iti śākyaputrīyaṃ nyāyaṃ nātikrāntaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12195: yaś chandaḥ ayam idānīm utpadyatām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12199: idaṃ ca paścāt paścāttaram evaṃprakāram iti tasya tasmāt paścāttaraṃ tathaivotpattir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12202: teṣāṃ chandānāṃ paścān na kaścid viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12207: atha vā eka evotpādayitā netara iti tesāṃ viśeṣābhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12208: ataḥ prāptam eva bhāvānām īśvaracchandānām [Tib.227a] iva yaugapadyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12211: na tasyāṃ prītau īśvaraḥ syād vinopāyena tatkāraṇaśakteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12216: evam anyasminn api trailokye neśvara ity anumīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12218: narakādiṣu prajāṃ sṛṣṭvā bahubhiś cetibhir upasṛṣṭāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12219: bahubhir anekaiḥ prakārair ītibhir upasargai rogādibhir upasṛṣtām upadrutāṃ prajāṃ sṛṣṭvā yadi prīyeta namo 'stu tasmai ity utprāsavacanam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:12221: sūktaś cāyaṃ tam ārabhya tam īśvaram adhikṛtya ślokaḥ śatarudrīye vyāsena
T07yabhkvyu:12227: bījādīnāṃ aṃkurādiṣu pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihnutaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12229: cakṣūrūpālokamanaskārādibhyaś ca eakṣurvijñānādyutpattau bījakṣetrodakādibhyaś cāṃkurādyutpattau anyasya vyāpārānupalabdheḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12230: yathā hi cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānādyutpattau bījādīnāṃ cāṃkurādyutpattau vyāpāro dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12232: na tathā cakṣurādibhāve bījādibhāve ca [Tib.227b] īśvarasyābhāve cakṣurvijñānāṃkurādyabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12235: atas tadvyāpāradarśanāt saha kāraṇair īśvaraṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpayatāṃ kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12240: anyeṣu tu sahakāriṣv īśvaraḥ syād iti anyagrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12243: kāraṇebhyo 'nyasya vyāpārādarśane cādośo jagataś ceśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12252: tasmāt tatra chandavikalpanāṃ hitvā śeṣapratiṣedhavidhānaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12253: yady ekam eva kāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12256: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā na pradhānam eva kāraṇaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12257: teṣām api kramotpattau kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣanād anavasthāprasaṃgaḥ syād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12258: evaṃ khalv api jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā anyeṣām arthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihnutaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12259: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ kalpayatām [Tib.228a] kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12261: sahakāriṣu cānyeṣu kāraṇeṣu tatpradhānam apradhānaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12264: nityaṃ hi pradhānaṃ pradhānaṃ ca mahataḥ kāraṇam iti pūrvapradhānaṃ pascān mahān iti na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:12265: prasavadharmi ca pradhānam iti tena nityaṃ pravartitavyaṃ kāraṇāntaranirapekṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12266: na hi prakāśaḥ prakāśyam arthaṃ prakāśya punar na prakāśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12271: pūrvotpannāni bhūtāni paścādutpannānāṃ svāsaṃtānikānāṃ sabhāgahetur avinirbhāgavartīni sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12281: janmahetutvam eṣāṃ bhūtānām ākhyātaṃ tu bhautikasya tebhya utpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12286: aviśeṣavartitvād iti [Tib.228b] avighnabhāvavasthānenānyeṣām api hetutvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12293: tāny api ṣaṭ tasya sahabhūhetur iti sarvaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12295: cakṣurādikaṃ sarvam upādāyarūpaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarādisaṃgṛhītam api yāvan nānyonyaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ pṛthakkalāpatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12305: sa viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam [Tib.229a] upasaṃpadya viharatīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12311: tatropapattāv api nāsty akuśalam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12312: rūpārūpyadhātau sarva eva kleśopakleśāv avipākatvān nivṛtā eva nākuśalāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12313: (II.68-71) anantaram iti paścād vakṣyata iti kārikānte.
T07yabhkvyu:12316: kāmāvacaraprāyogikakuśalacittānantaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ maulīyaṃ vā cittam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12325: yad ārūpyāvacareṇa āśrayeṇa kāmāvacaraḥ kaścid api dharmo na saṃmukhīkriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12326: yathā rūpāvacareṇāśrayeṇa kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ saṃmukhīkriyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12332: yad ārūpyāvacareṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 241) cittena na kāmadhātur ālambyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12334: nanu ca rūpadhātur api nārūpyāvacareṇa cittenālaṃbyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12337: tat katham idam ucyate kāmadhātor evārūpyā dūrata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12338: satyaṃ na maulārūpyāvacareṇa cittena rūpadhātur adhyālaṃbyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12339: kiṃ tu ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmantakacittena audārikādyākāraiś caturthadhyānam ālaṃbyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12340: ato na kāmadhātor iva rūpadhātor ārūpyā dūre vyavasthāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:12344: ity evam āśrayālambanākārapratipakṣadūratābhir api kāmadhātor ārūpyā dūre bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:12345: tasmān na kāmāvacarakuśalānantaraṃ ārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12350: kliṣṭayā samāpattyā utpīḍitasya yogino 'dharāyāḥ kuśalāyā bhūmeḥ saṃśrayaṇān nivṛtāvyākṛtād api kuśalaṃ cittam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12351: varam adharāpi kuśalā bhūmir nordhvā kliṣṭeti.
T07yabhkvyu:12373: na hi tat prayogalabhyaṃ yathā rūpāvacaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ca nirmāṇacittaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12374: kāmāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭadvayaṃ ārūpyāvacaraṃ cānivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ hitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12375: na kāmāvacarāt kliṣṭadvayāt rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12377: ata eva ca nārūpyāvacarād anivṛtāvyākṛtāt tad utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12380: na kāmāvacarāt kliṣṭadvayād rūpāvacaraṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12396: na kāmāvacareṇa kuśalena tatsamāpatter vyutthānaṃ saṃbhavati ativiprakṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12398: ata eva ca na rūpāvacareṇānivṛtāvyākṛtena vyutthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12399: na caibhiḥ pratisaṃdhibandho 'stīti naiṣām ata utpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12411: śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca tena vyutthānāsaṃbhavān na tebhyas tadutpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12428: upapattilābhikaṃ kāmarūpadhātvor antarābhavapratisaṃdhikṣaṇe prathamato yasya prāptir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12436: nirmite nirmāṇe vā bhavaṃ nairmitaṃ nairmāṇikam iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12440: ṣoḍhā kuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca saptadhā bhittveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12441: triṣu dhātuṣu prāyogikopapattipratilaṃbhikabhedena [Tib.231b] kuśalaṃ ṣoḍhā bhittvā.
T07yabhkvyu:12445: tāny etāni trayodaśa śeṣāṇi ca saptābhinnāny eva.
T07yabhkvyu:12447: rūpāvacaraṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam eva ārūpyāvacaraṃ nivṛtāvykṛtam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:12448: śaikṣam aśaikṣaṃ ceti viṃśati cittāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:12459: śilpopadeśaśabdam ālambya manovijñānena śilpaṃ śikṣate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12460: vipākajasyāvacanāt sarve 'pi rūpādaya ālambanam ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12464: vipākajam avacanāt ṣaḍvijñānasvabhāvam iti jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12465: paṃca tu vijñānakāyam airyāpathikaśailpasthānikayoḥ prāyogikā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12467: yasmāt te dṛṣṭvā yāvat spṛsṭvotpadyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12471: airyāpathikena manovijñānenābhinirhṛtam utpāditaṃ manovijñānam asti dvādaśāyatanālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12472: cakṣurāyatanālambanaṃ yāvad dharmāyatanālaṃbanam anivṛtāvyākṛtasvabhāvam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:12474: anyad apy anivṛtāvyākṛtam asti yad airyāpathikādiṣu nāntarbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12478: dvitīyādau tad ādyāptam akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat.
T07yabhkvyu:12479: svabhūmikena nirmāṇaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ tv adhareṇa cetyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:12480: tāni vijñānāni eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ katamena saṃgṛhītāni.
T07yabhkvyu:12485: ajñānādivāsanācittaṃ ca kva praveśayitavyaṃ bhadantānantavarmaṇā 'pi vibhāṣāvyākhyāna uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:12520: evam anyatrāpy anyatra prāyogikād iti vyākhyeyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12528: tatrasthasya maraṇāsaṃbhavāt airyāpathikavipākajavad iha rūpārūpyāvacarakliṣṭayor asaṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12533: na hy apraviśya dhyānaṃ abhijñāphalād vyutthānam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12538: asti hi saṃbhava upapattipratilaṃbhikenāpi samāpattivyutthānaṃ paṭutvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12553: kuśale ca kliṣṭe ca kuśalakliṣṭānīti samāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12560: ārūpyāvacaram api kliṣṭam asminn eva svaṃ prāyogikaṃ ato notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12564: tathedaṃ vipākajānantaraṃ sapta yāvad anyatrābhijñāphalād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12597: na tu tathā rūpārūpyāvacare upapattilābhike paṭunī iti na te saṃbhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12604: atra viṃśaticittānāṃ samanantarapratyayasya asūtritasya sūtrarūpāḥ saṃgrahaślokāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12605: prāyogikāc chubhāt kāme daśāṣṭabhyas tad anyathaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12606: śubhān navaikādaśatas tat sapta kliṣṭataḥ pṛthak
T07yabhkvyu:12608: te tu saptataḥ ṣaṭ śailpasthānikāt tat tu saptataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12609: nairmitād dve dvayoś caitad rūpe prāyogikāc chubāt
T07yabhkvyu:12610: dvādaśaitat tu daśataḥ śubhād aṣṭāv ayatnajāt
T07yabhkvyu:12611: tat paṃcabhyo nava kliṣṭāt tad ekādaśataḥ punaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12613: dve abhijñāphalāc cittād dvābhyām eva tathaiva tat
T07yabhkvyu:12614: ārūpye yātnikāt sapta kuśalāt ṣaḍbhya eva tat
T07yabhkvyu:12615: ayātnikāc chubhāt sapta caturbhyas tat punaḥ smṛtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12616: kliṣṭād aṣṭau daśabhyas tat ṣaṭ cittāni vipākajāt
T07yabhkvyu:12617: caturbhyas tat tu ṣaṭ śaikṣāc caturbhyaḥ punar eva tat.
T07yabhkvyu:12618: aśaikṣāt paṃca tad api paṃcabhyaḥ samanaṃtaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12620: na punar ebhyaḥ prāyogikam utpadyata ity adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12626: idaṃ evaṃ karomīdam evaṃ karomītīty evamākārapravṛttatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12635: anabhisaṃskāravāhitvāc ca vipākajasyaivaikasya airyāpathikaśailpasthānikayor api vā prāyogikābhisaṃskārābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12640: ato na tadanantaraṃ prāyogikam utpadyata iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12644: tena hy asau yogī tataḥ pravāhān niṣkrāmati tadavatāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12645: niṣkramaṇacittam anbhisaṃskāravāhi anābhogavāhīti yukto 'sya niṣkramaṇacittasya vipākajādīnām anyatamasvabhāvasya [Tib.235b] prāyogikacittānantaram
T07yabhkvyu:12647: yadi na prāyogikānukūlānīti vipākajādibhyo 'nantaraṃ prāyogikaṃ notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12648: evaṃ tarhi kliṣṭebhyo 'pi prāyogikaṃ notpadyate viguṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12649: viguṇo hi kliṣṭo dharmaḥ kuśalasya nānukūla ity arthaḥ tadvirodhitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12651: yady api tad viguṇaṃ tathāpi kleśasamudācāraparikhinnasya yoginaḥ tatparijñānāt kleśasamudācāraparijñānād yuktaḥ prāyogikasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12652: tatparijñānam eva hi prāyogikaṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12654: kāmāvacaram utpattipratilaṃbhikaṃ paṭu tac chaikṣādibhyo vyutthānacittaṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12655: ata eva ca kliṣṭasamādhyutpīḍitasya tadāśrayaṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12656: anabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt tu tasya tasmāc chaikṣādīni notpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12661: tāni ca manaskāravaśād utpadyaṃta iti ato manaskāropakṣepaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12665: ādiśabdenānubhavanalaksaṇā vedaneti evamādi.[Tib.236a] anityatvādimanasikaraṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamanaskāraḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 247) ṣoḍaśākārasaṃprayuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12670: tadyathā maharddhiko mahānubhāvaḥ parīttāṃ pṛthivīsaṃjñām apy adhitiṣṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:12676: samṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ hy āryamārga iti asty adhimuktimanaskārānantaraṃ āryamārgotpāda iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:12678: yadi sāmānyamanaskārānāntaram eva nādhimuktimanaskārānaṃtaram āryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:12683: prāyogāvasthāyām aśubhayā cittaṃ damayitvā yāvad avasāne sāmānyamanaskārānantaram āryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkartoi.
T07yabhkvyu:12687: [Tib.236b] āryamārgānantaram api sāmānyamanaskāram eva saṃmukhīkarotīty apare.
T07yabhkvyu:12690: ādiśabdenānāgamyaprathamadhyānadhyānāntaratribhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ trimārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ vā saṃmukhīkuryāt saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12691: atha dvitīyādidhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau katham āryamārgānantaraṃ kathaṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:12692: na hi kāmāvacaraḥ śakyaḥ saṃmukhīkartum iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12697: na ca tadbhūmikaḥ pratilabdho 'nyatra nirvedhabhāgīyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12698: dvitīyadhyānādibhūmiko 'nāgamyādibhūmiko vānāsravo mārgo 'nyatra nirvedhabhāgīyān na pratilabdha āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:12699: anākārapatitas tu laukiko mārgaḥ pratilabdha āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:12707: na hi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12708: prayogasya kṛtārthatvān [Tib.237a] nihīnatvāc ca nirvedhabhāgīyāni cāryamārgasya prayoga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12710: yaḥ satyālambanatvān nirvedhabhāgīyajātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:12715: sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti vā sarvadharmā anātmāna iti vā śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti vāryamārgānantaraṃ saṃmukhīkariṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12723: ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikaṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ vā yadi bhavāgropapanno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12731: mārgānantaraṃ tūpapattipratilaṃbhikasyāpi kāmāvacarasya saṃmukhībhāva ity adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12732: (II.74) kliṣṭe tridhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayor
T07yabhkvyu:12744: iha kuśalapratisaṃdhānaṃ samyagdṛṣṭyā vā vicikitsayā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12746: tatra vicikitsāsaṃprayukte kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte yadā rūpadhātor ārūpyadhātor vā kāmadhātuṃ pratyāgacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:12749: akuśalaṃ ca nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaram eva adhikārād rūpāvacarasya ca nivṛtasya pṛthakpāṭhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12755: yadā rūpadhātor ārūpyadhātor vā kāmadhātuṃ pratyāgacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:12756: tadāsyāṃtarābhavapratisaṃdhicitte 'vaśyaṃ kliṣṭe 'kuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayor anyatarasmiṃ saṃmukhībhūte tayor akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayor lābho bhavati pūrvavihīnatvāt tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12759: tadāsya kliṣṭe parihāṇicitte saṃmukhībhūte tayoḥ kliṣṭayor lābhas tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12762: tadāsyāntarābhavapratisaṃdhicitte 'vaśyaṃ kliṣṭe rūpāvacarasya kliṣṭasya pūrvavihīnasya lābho bhavati tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12765: tadāsya vairāgyatyaktasya rūpāvacarasya kliṣṭasya lābho bhavati tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12772: evaṃ tāvat kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābha uktas tair asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12773: rūpāvacare kliṣte citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ lābhaḥ tair asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12776: tadāsya rūpāvacarāntarābhavapratisaṃdhicitte 'vaśyaṃ kliṣṭe rūpāvacarāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ kuśalasyopapattipratilaṃbhikasya [Tib.238b] kliṣṭasyānivṛtāvyākṛtasya
T07yabhkvyu:12781: evaṃ rūpāvacare 'pi kliṣṭe ṣaṇṇāṃ lābha uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12782: ārūpyāvacare tu kliṣṭe dvayor lābhas tābhyām asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12783: parihāṇita ārūpyāvacareṇa cittenārhattvāt parihīyamāṇasyaiva kliṣṭasya yasyaikadeśaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ śaikṣasya ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:12787: kuśale kasmiṃścid rūpāvacare trayāṇāṃ lābhaḥ saṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12789: ādye tāvad rūpāvacare kuśale citte saṃmukhībhūte tasyaiva kuśalasya rūpāvacarasya lābhas tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12790: mauladhyānasaṃgṛhīte tu kuśale citte saṃmukhībhūte kāmāvacararūpāvacarayor anivṛtāvyākṛtayor nirmāṇacittayor lābhaḥ tābhyām asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12791: ity evaṃ kuśale rūpāvacare citte saṃmukhībhūte trayāṇāṃ lābha ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12795: śaikṣe citte saṃmukhībhūte duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃticitte tasyaiva śaikṣasya duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtikalāpasvabhāvasya lābhas tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12801: tadā navamavimuktimārgasaṃgṛhīte śaikṣe citte saṃmukhībhūte kāmarūpāvacarayor anivṛtāvyākṛtayor nirmāṇacittayor lābhas tābhyām asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12802: yadā tu ṣaḍbhūmikānām āryamārgāṇām anyatamena rūpavairāgyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:12803: tadādyaprakāracitte śaikṣe saṃmukhībhūte 'tītānāgataprāptinyāyenārūpyāvacarasya kuśalasya lābhas tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12809: tasyaiva śaikṣasya kāmarūpāvacarayoś cānivṛtāvyākṛtayor arūpyāvacarasya ca kuśalasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:12811: āryamārgeṇa kāmarūpavairāgye yadāyam anāgamyabhūmikenāryamārgeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:12813: tasmiṃ mauladhyānabhūmikam apūrvakaṃ śaikṣaṃ labhata iti śaikṣasya lābha ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12814: kāmarūpāvacarayoś cānivṛtāvyākṛtayor nirmāṇacittayor eva tasmiṃ lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12815: ṣaḍbhūmikena tv āryamārgeṇa [Tib.239b] kāmarūpavairāgye yo navamo vimuktimārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12817: tacchiṣyo 'py ācāryavasumitras tam evārthaṃ tena vākyena tair eva padavyaṃjanair likhati.
T07yabhkvyu:12819: na hy evaṃ ekavākyena vyākhyātārtho ghaṭate.
T07yabhkvyu:12821: tasyaiva śaikṣasya lābha ity etad ekaṃ vākyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12822: kāmarūpāvacarayoś ca yāvat kāmarūpadhātuvairāgya ity aparaṃ vākyam.
T07yabhkvyu:12823: āryamārgeṇa kāmarūpadhātuvairāgya ity etena viśeṣeṇa tasyaiva śaikṣasyety etat pūrvoktaṃ na viśeṣyaṃ vākyāntaratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12828: navame vimuktimārge śaikṣacittavataḥ pudgalasya śaikṣacittalābho vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12829: nanu coktaṃ mauladhyānabhūmikam apūrvaṃ śaikṣaṃ labhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12831: rūpāvacaram api kuśalaṃ cittaṃ mauladhyānabhūmikam apūrvaṃ pratilabhyata iti tasyāpi lābha iti prasajyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:12833: śaikṣacittasthitasya kāmadhātuvairāgye kuśalam uṣmagatāvasthāyām eva rūpāvacaraṃ niyāmavākrāntau labdham iti kṛtvā na gaṇyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12835: śaikṣam api hi darśanamārgāvasthāyāṃ labdham iti na bhavatā tathā sthāpayitavyam iti prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:12845: kāmāvacare tāvat kuśalacitta iyatāṃ cittānāṃ lābha iti na vyākhyātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12847: tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhāne kāmāvacare kuśale citte saṃmukhībhūte tasyaiva kuśalasya cittasya lābhaḥ tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12853: na rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kuśalādīnāṃ śaikṣaśaikṣayoś ca prāptyabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12854: anivṛtāvyākṛte 'pi kāmāvacare citte lābho na vyākhyātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12860: nirmāṇacitte tu saṃmukhībhūte na kasyacil lābha iti na vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12861: yatra hi kliṣṭe 'nyatra vā kasyacil lābho nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:12863: kliṣṭa eva hi traidhātuke ṣaṇṇāṃ yāvad dvayor lābho na tv avaśyam ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12866: tathārūpyāvacare ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakādyaprakārasaṃgṛhīte kuśalacitte saṃmukhībhūte tasyaiva lābhas tenāsamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12878: kuśalaṃ hi traidhātukaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:12879: tatra saptānāṃ kaśale citte iti vaktavyṃ na ṣaṇṇām iti tad darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:12883: laukikena lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa kāmadhātor vairāgye navame vimuktimārge kāmarūpāvacarayor nirmāṇacittayor lābhas tābhyām asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12894: ity āsv avasthāsv amībhiś cittair yathoktaiḥ saptabhir asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamanaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:12895: śeṣam ata eva vyākhyānād upadhāryam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12896: ata eva madīyād vyākhyānāc cheṣam avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12905: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ trayāṇām ārūyāvacarasya nivṛtasya śaikṣasya ceti navānāṃ yathāyogaṃ lābhaḥ tair asamanvāgatasya.
T07yabhkvyu:12907: kāmāvacaro ca kliṣṭe kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānena vā dhātupratyāgamanena vā kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12908: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoś ca dhātupratyāgamanena parihāṇyā vā lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12909: rūpāvacara eva klṣṭe rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya kāmāvacararūpāvacarayoś cānivṛtāvyākṛtayor nirmāṇacittayor dhātupratyāgamanāl lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12910: kāmāvacare rūpāvacare vā kliṣṭe rūpāvacarasya vā kliṣṭasya vā dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇito vā lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12911: kāmāvacare rūpāvacare ārūpyāvacare vā kliṣṭe [Tib.241b] ārūpyāvacarakliṣṭaśaikṣayoḥ parihāṇito lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12917: avyākṛtānāṃ hi traidhātukānām anyatamasmiṃ saṃmukhībhūte tasyaivāvyākṛtasya lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12933: vicikitsayā samyagdṛṣṭyā ca kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānād iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12938: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyām indriyanirdeśo nāma dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12943: dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca kośasthānasya sambandhapradarśanārtham idam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12945: niyamasya bhāvo naiyamyaṃ niyama eva vā naiyamyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12953: dhyānāntare vitarkaś ca vicāraś cāpy ataḥ param
T07yabhkvyu:12956: kāmāptam amalaṃ hitvā rūpāptam strīpum indriye.
T07yabhkvyu:12957: duḥkhe ca hitvārūyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohye rūpi ceti
T07yabhkvyu:12971: narer iti ri gatireṣaṇayor ity asya pratiṣedhapūrvasya rūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12973: na raṃjayanta iti narakā ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:12975: na raṃjayati prāvaṃti nāspṛhayaṃti trāṇaṃ iti narakā iti ācāryasaṃghabhabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12985: catvāro mahārājāno lokapālā virūḍhako virūpākṣo dhṛtarāṣṭro vaiśravaṇaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:12986: teṣu bhavāś cāturmahārājikās tanmadhyagatā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12987: tadyathā deveṣūpapadyate devamadhye utpadyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12988: caturmahārājasthāne bhavāś cāturmahārājikā madhyapadalopā gorathavad ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:12991: aṣṭau vasavā dvāv aśvinau ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā iti tāvatpramukhatvāt trayastriṃśā iti laukikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12992: tadanusāreṇa pravacane 'pi tathā nāmavyavahāra ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:12996: tuṣo vā vidyante eṣām iti tuṣitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12997: svayaṃkṛte nirmāṇe ratir eṣām iti nirmāṇaratayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12998: paranirmitān bhogān vaśe vartayituṃ śīlam eṣām iti paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13002: yadi tu viṃśatisthāno viṃśatir iti uttarapadalopaḥ kriyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:13003: tadyathā pītatoyā aśvāḥ pītā iti [Tib.243a] sutarāṃ śliṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13004: saṃjīvo yatra sattvān mriyamāṇān vāyavo jīvayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13005: kālasūtrā yatra kālasūtrāṇi pātayitvā sattvās takṣyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:13006: saṃghāto yatra meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatādaya ubhayata āpatantaḥ sattvān pīḍayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:13007: rauravo yatra sattvā yātyamānāḥ paramavikṛtaṃ rudaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13011: avīcir yatrātimātrāgnijvālāliṃgitānāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhavīcir antaraṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:13019: aṣtau narakāś catvāro dvīpāḥ ṣaṭ cānantaroktāś cāturmahārājikādayaḥ pretās tiryañcaś cābhinnā iti viṃśatisthānaḥ kāmadhātuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13029: tatra rūpadhātau sarveṣām api dhyānānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena pratyekaṃ tribhūmikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13034: tasya tv adhimātrasyaivānāsravadhyānavyavakiraṇena mṛdumadhyādhimātradhimātratarādhimātratamabhedabhinnena punaḥ paṃca sthānāntarāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:13035: abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛṣāḥ sudarśanā ākaniṣṭhāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13036: ataś caturthaṃ dhyānam aṣṭabhūmikam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13040: dhyānāṃtaralābhāt paścāt pūrvaṃ cyutyupapattilābhāt pramāṇādiviśeṣādibhiś cāsya mahān.
T07yabhkvyu:13041: tasya kāyo nivāsa eṣāṃ vidyate iti brahmakāyikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13043: āyurvarṇādibhir viśeṣair mahābrahmā eṣām iti mahābrahmāṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13045: nābhāpramāṇam eṣām śakyaṃ pramātum ity apramāṇābhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13048: tad eṣām anyabhūmim apekṣya parīttam iti parīttaśubhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13051: [Tib.244a] na tadutkṛṣṭataram anyatrāsti sukham ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13053: saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayād iti vacanān naiṣām upari bhūmyantaram astīti anabhrakāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13054: abhram iva hy upari na bhūmisaṃbandha ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:13055: āniṃjyakarmasaṃbhūtatvāt puṇyebhyaḥ prasava eṣām iti puṇyaprasavāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13056: sthānāntarapratibaddhaṃ pārthagjanikaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ bṛhad eṣāṃ phalam udbhavatīti bṛhatphalāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13057: pṛthagjanāmiśratvāc chuddha āvāsa eṣām iti śuddhāvāsāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13059: nālpena vā kālenātmanaḥ sthānaṃ bṛṃhaṃti jahatīty abṛhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13061: kalyāṇāśayatvād vā na parāṃs tāpayaṃtīty atapāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13064: tadutkṛṣṭatarabhūmyantarābhāvān naite kaniṣṭhā ity akaniṣṭhāḥ jyeṣṭhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13066: katham idam ucyate ity etāni saptadaśa sthānānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13079: arūpiṇo vedanādayas tathaiva vartamānā apy adeśasthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13087: anantam ākāśam iti samāpattiprapogakālākārād ākāśānaṃtyaṃ tasya tad eva cāyatanam.
T07yabhkvyu:13088: evam anantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiṃcid iti tadākārād vijñānānaṃtyāyatanam ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ cocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13089: saṃjñā gaṇḍaḥ saṃjñā śalyaḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ sammoha iti saṃjnāmāndyotpatter naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13090: na tv eṣāṃ deśakṛtam anuttarādharyam ity adeśasthatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13093: iha nairātmye sati cittacaittānāṃ kāmarūpadhātvo rūpaniśrayā [Tib.245a] pravṛttiḥ kalpyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:13095: tatra cittacaittapravṛttyā na bhavitavyam ity āśaṃkānivṛttyartham idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13101: rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ durbalā cittasaṃtatir avibhūtarūpasaṃjñatvād vinā rūpeṇa na vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:13109: atas tajjā ārūpyā cittasaṃtatir api rūpanirapekṣā pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:13110: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt samāpattiviśeṣajanitatvāt pravartiṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13114: evam arūpiṇāṃ kiṃ niśrite iti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13118: kim arthaṃ na tad eva dvayam anyonyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13123: asāv api cittasaṃtatiḥ samāpattiviśeṣāj jātā bhavatīti na dvayaṃ niśritya pravartiṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13130: caittāṃś ca niśritya cittaṃ pravartiṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13138: tasyāś cittasaṃtateḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavād rūpaṃ niśrītya (Abhidh-k-vy 257) pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13142: vajreṇa pratisaṃyukto vālako 'ṅgulīyakaḥ kaṭako vā vajravālakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13156: tadā ārūpā evārūpyā iti svārthe taddhitāt parigrahaḥ kāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13157: ārūpye vā sādhava ārūpyā iti paśyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:13158: kāmānāṃ vā dhātur iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva sādhayati vināpi pratisaṃyuktaśabdalopena.
T07yabhkvyu:13159: kaś cāsau kāmānāṃ dhātur ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:13164: ārūpyasya dhātur ārūpyadhātur ārūpyaṃ yo dadhātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13171: kavaḍīkārāhāramaithunābhyām upasaṃhitaḥ saṃbaddho janita iti vā kavaḍīkārāhāramaithunopasaṃhitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13174: katham evaṃ gamyata iti sthaviraśāriputrabhāṣitayā gāthayā tam arthaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13183: tatrāvītarāgo manasā kāmopabhogitve 'pi sati nābhikṣur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13184: kevalaṃ tv asya śīlam apariśuddhaṃ vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:13185: yas tu kāyena vācā tāthāgatīṃ śikṣāpadabandhalekhāṃ laṃghayitvā kāmāṃ paribhuṃkte.
T07yabhkvyu:13194: iti pakṣaḥ śāstā te avītarāga ity abhyupagataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13201: kāyenāpy upabhuṃjāno 'pi tān viṣayān iti prasaktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13210: yasmād dhātvantaradharmā dhātvantare samudācaraṃty adhātupatitāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13212: evaṃ rūpadhātau kāmāvacaraṃ hi nirmāṇacittaṃ tatra samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:13217: yeṣu kāmarāgo 'nuśete ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13236: dhātubhiś ca rāgā ity ubhayam apy etan na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13261: kāmāvacare nirmāṇacitte dhyānaphale kathaṃ kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ kāmarāgaḥ yatas tasya kāmāvacaratvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13266: (Abhidh-k-vy 259) katham asya kāmarāgeṇa vinā kāmāvacaratvaṃ vyavasthāpyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13268: śrutvā tat parato nirmāṇacitte 'sya rāga utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13271: evaṃdhyāyinaḥ kāmāvacareṇa nirmāṇacittena kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmiṇvantīti śrutvā tadālambano rāga utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13274: manoharaṃ nirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā [Tib.248a] nirmāpake citte nirmāpakasya vā citte rāgaḥ darśayatītthaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ yasyedṛśaṃ nirmāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13285: kasmāt punaḥ rūpāvacareṇa cittena tayor gandharasayor anirmāṇaṃ.
