T07yabhkvyu:13293: ato lokadhātūnāṃ tiryag evāsthānam iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13299: yadi kuśalakliṣṭā api syuḥ gatisaṃbhedaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13302: ity ato manuṣyagatir narakagatir api syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13305: kāmadhātūpapannaś cordhvabhūmikaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kāmāvacareṇa ca [Tib.248b] sārvagatikena kliṣṭena samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13306: sa eva manuṣyo nārako yāvad deva iti syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13314: asya pratipādanārthaṃ jñāpakam ānayaṃti prajñaptiṣūktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13322: kaśmīre bhavāḥ kāśmīrakāś ca sūtraṃ paṭhantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13323: muktakaṃ tat sūtraṃ te eva paṭhanti nānya ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13329: yasmād uktaṃ nirvṛtte vipāke nārake iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13330: gatiṣu sarve 'nuśayā anuśerata iti prakaraṇagranthaḥ parihāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13333: yadi hi paṃca prakārā dharmā gatisvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13335: yadi tv anivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gatayaḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13338: anivṛtāvyākṛtā hi saṃskṛtā dharmā bhāvanāprahātavyā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:13339: teṣu ca bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ sarvatragāś cānuśayā anuśerate ālambanataḥ prayogato vā.
T07yabhkvyu:13341: tena jñāyate nānivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gataya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13351: āyuḥkaṣāyaḥ kleśakaṣāyo dṛṣṭikaṣāyaḥ kalpakaṣāyaḥ sattvakaṣāyaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13354: kleśakaṣāyād dṛṣṭikaṣāyaḥ pṛthag ukta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13360: pṛthak cāsya vacanaṃ syāt gatigamanajñāpanārtham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13363: na cāntarābhava evaṃ yujyata iti na gatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13367: ārūpyagā hi yatra cyavante vihāre vā vṛkṣamūle vā yāvac caturthyāṃ dhyānabhūmau.
T07yabhkvyu:13372: gatyor antarā aṃtarāle bhavatīti aṃtarābhava ity anvārthasaṃjñākaraṇān nāntarābhavo gatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13375: nirvṛtte vipāka iti vipākaśabdavacanād vipākasvabhāvā gatir iti tadabhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13377: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti nārako vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13382: tasmāt kuśalakliṣṭā api gatayo bhavantīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13395: vipākasvabhāvā evety ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ pūrvam eva pakṣam icchati.
T07yabhkvyu:13398: bahirdeśakanayena brahmakāyikāḥ brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaś ca prathamābhinirvṛttavarjyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13399: kāśmīranayena punaḥ brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitāś ca prathamābhinirvṛttavarjyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13400: brahmapurohiteṣy eva hi teṣāṃ nayena mahābrahmāṇo na sthānāntaranayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13408: evaṃ viśeṣite vedānādīnāṃ vigrahaḥ paryudasto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13422: sā ca dvitīyadhyānalābhāt prahīṇā na samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:13426: na hy adharabhūmyālambanaḥ kaścid api kleśa iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13428: antarābhavasthās te taṃ mahābrahmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvaivam ūcuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13431: tathā hi tatrāpy antarābhave dīrgham adhvānam avasthātuṃ na saṃbhavaty upapattipratibandhābhāvāt śuklaśoṇitānapekṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13432: teṣāṃ kathaṃ bhavatīyaṃ buddhir imaṃ vayaṃ sattvam adrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13435: prathamadhyānabhūmisthā eva tasya mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmarantaḥ utpadyamānāvasthāyām eva taṃ mahābrahmāṇaṃ pūrvotpannaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13436: dṛṣṭvā ca paścād uttarakālam adrākṣmety eṣām babhūva.
T07yabhkvyu:13441: upapattipratilaṃbhikena prathamadhyānabhūmikena tasya mahābrahmaṇa evaṃ cetasaḥ praṇidhim anvasmārṣuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13445: nanu ca śubhakṛtsneṣv apy eṣa prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13449: te hi maulyāṃ bhūmau sukhendriyaparikhinnāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 262) sāmantakopekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvaṃtīti vistareṇa [Tib.251a] vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13450: te caikatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñina iti paścād vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13470: arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ye sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānaṃtyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13473: arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ye sarvaśa ākāśānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānaṃtyaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānaṃtyāyatanam [Tib.251b] upasaṃpadya viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13476: arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ye sarvaśo vijñānānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13479: paṃca skaṃdhāś catvāraś ca yathāyogam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13493: abalavad vijñānaṃ na tiṣṭhatīti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13500: ayaṃ prathamaḥ sattvāvāsaḥ dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthā api yathā vijñānasthitiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:13506: (Abhidh-k-vy 263) ārūpyāṇāṃ ca sattvāvāsānāṃ trayo vijñānasthitivad vaktavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13507: caturthas tv ārūpyaḥ arūpiṇaḥ saṃti sattvāḥ sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13510: asaṃjñisattvebhyo ye 'nye caturthadhyānopagāḥ kiṃ te sattvāvāsā uta neti.
T07yabhkvyu:13512: kasmād evam uktam ācāryeṇa ke punar anye.
T07yabhkvyu:13516: ihāpi tad eva kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ yad vijñānaṣthitiṣūktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13525: ato na te sattvāvāsā ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13528: apāyā iti apāyānām eva vacanād anabhrakādayaḥ sattvāvāsā iṣṭā ācāryasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:13537: rūpaṃ ca tad upagā ca sā rūpopagā.
T07yabhkvyu:13538: evaṃ yāvat saṃskārāś ca te upagā ca saṃskāropageti.
T07yabhkvyu:13540: rūpopagā vijñānasthitir yāvat saṃskāropageti sautrāntikānāṃ nayenocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13545: evaṃ yāvat saṃskārā upagā asyā vijñānasthiteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13551: sā rūpam upagacchati tadabhiṣvaṅgata iti rūpopagā.
T07yabhkvyu:13553: vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ punar nayena kārakārtho na śakyate yojayitum [Tib.253a] iti dūṣayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13555: dvividhe 'py asmin vyākhyāne rūpādivyatiriktā vijñānasthitir uktā.
T07yabhkvyu:13560: ity etat sarvaṃ nirastaṃ bhavatīti doṣāṃtaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13562: etad vaibhāṣikavyākhyānaṃ varṇayāmo na tair evaṃ vyākhyātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13571: anyo loke sthātā devadattādir anyā sthitiḥ sthānaṃ gṛhādikam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13576: na tu vijñānaṃ vijñānam evābhirūhya vāhayatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13578: parasaṃtānavijñānaṃ tu yady api yugapad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13579: na tu taditarasya samīpe vartata iti na tat tasya sthitir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13581: sapta ca vijñānasthitayaḥ paṃcaskaṃdhasvabhāvāḥ tat katham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13582: saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu paṃcaskaṃdhasvabhāvatveneṣṭāsu tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ na vijñānasthitir [Tib.253b] iṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13584: abhedenaikapiṇḍarūpeṇa rūpādīnāṃ skaṃdhānām upapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skaṃdheṣu manuṣyādinikāyasabhāgasaṃgṛhīteṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:13587: pratyekaṃ tv ekamekaṃ skaṃdhaṃ prati yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13594: tasmāc caturvijñanasthitideśanāyāṃ kevalaṃ pṛthag vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktam.
T07yabhkvyu:13595: tathā vineyajanāpekṣayā hy ekatra sūtre 'nyathā vijñānasthitir uktā.
T07yabhkvyu:13599: vijñānasya kṣetrabhāvena catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārasvabhāvā deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13600: vijñānaṃ bījabhāvena vapanīyarūpeṇa sopādānaṃ svabhūmikayā tṛṣṇayā satṛṣṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13602: na punar bījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃ babhūva bhagavān.
T07yabhkvyu:13603: na hi loke bījaṃ kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13605: [Tib.254a] ye ca dharmā vijñānasya sahavartino rūpādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13607: sahavarti hi bījasya kṣetraṃ loke dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13608: vijñānaṃ tu vijñānena saha na vartate yugapadabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13609: atītānāgatās tarhi rūpādayo na vijñānasthitayaḥ prāpnuvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13610: te 'py atītānāgatā yathāsvam atītānāgatānāṃ vijñānānāṃ sthitayo bbhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13611: tasmāt svabhūmau sarva eva sāsravā rūpādayo vijñānasthitayo bhavantīty avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13619: apāyādiṣv api vijñānaṃ na catasṛṣu saṃgṛhītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13622: saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu ye vijñānavarjyāś catvāraḥ skamdhā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13626: apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca yad vijñānam anāsravāś ca dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13629: jarāyur yena mātuḥ kukṣau garbho veṣṭitas tiṣṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:13632: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃsvedād dravatvalakṣaṇāj jātā bhūtasaṃsvedajāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13643: bhinnayānapātrau kila vaṇijau samudratīre krauṃcīṃ samabhigatau.
T07yabhkvyu:13647: tena rājñā maṃjūṣāyāṃ prakṣipya gaṃgāyām avavāhitāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13648: licchavirājena sāṃtaḥpureṇa snāyatā sā maṃjūṣohyamānā dṛṣṭā udghāṭitā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13649: tasyāṃ paṃcaśatāni dārakāṇāṃ dṛṣṭāni gṛhītāni ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13652: upoṣadhasya kila rājño mūrdhni piṭako jātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13653: tasya vṛddher anvayāt paripākānvayāt paribhedānvayād dārako jātah.
T07yabhkvyu:13655: rājñaḥ khalv api māṃdhātur jānūpari piṭakau jātau [Tib.255a] tayor vṛddher anvayāt pūrvavad yāvad dārakau jātau.
T07yabhkvyu:13657: brahmadattasya kila rājña urasi piṭako jātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13658: tasya vṛddher anvayāt pūrvavad yāvad dārikā jātā.
T07yabhkvyu:13671: nanu ca sutarām upapādukatvasiddhyartham iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13679: rātrau paṃcānāṃ sakṛjjanma divā capareṣāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 266) paṃcānāṃ na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13681: krameṇāpi ca rātrau paṃcānāṃ divāpareṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ janma na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13682: sattvajātiḥ sā tādṛśī karmaṇāṃ cāciṃtyo vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13687: yathoktaṃ nirgranthaśāstre ṛddhiṃ bhadanta ko [Tib.255b] darśayti.
T07yabhkvyu:13690: kalpaśatasyātyayād evaṃvidho loke māyāvī prādurbhūya māyayā lokaṃ bhakṣayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13693: bāhyasya śukaśoṇitakardamāder abhāvād ity arthaḥ ādhiṣṭhānikīm iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13694: yad adhitiṣṭhati idam evaṃ bhavatv iti tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13695: tat prayojanam asyās tatra vā bhavā ṛddhir ādhiṣṭhānikī.
T07yabhkvyu:13696: tām icchatāṃ bauddhānāṃ na yukta eṣa parihāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13701: atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattva iti praśna ukto vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:13707: upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgam iti viśeṣaṇadvayaṃ kimarthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13708: kim anupapādukā api suparṇino nāgāś ca santi.
T07yabhkvyu:13714: tatropapādukaḥ suparṇī sarvān upapādukādīn uddharati bhakṣārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13720: tadā tan māṃsādi nāntardhīyata iti nidarśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13724: tasya mṛtasyākāśasyeva bhakṣitasya mānsapiṇḍāntardhānān na tṛpyatīty avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13725: sā hi dve gatī iti narakagatir devagatiś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13732: maraṇabhavo 'pi kadācit kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13734: kathaṃ tayor gatiśabdam adhyāropya gatyantarālatvād ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13736: maraṇopapattibhavayor anivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ nikāyasabhāgajīvitendriyajātyādīnāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 267) gatisvabhāvānāṃ tatkāle vidyamānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13738: na copapattivan maraṇabhavo 'vaśyaṃ kliṣṭo nāpy avaśyaṃ kuśalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13739: tasmāt teṣu gatiśabdam āropya gatyaṃtarālatvād ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13751: atha vā yatra deśe ākṣiptasya karmaṇā nāmarūpasya vipākasya prādurbhāvo 'bhivyaktiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13756: saṃbadhnaṃs tānaḥ saṃtāno vrīheḥ saṃtāno vrīhisaṃtānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13757: tena sādharmyād na vicchinnasya bhavasyodbhavo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13763: saṃtānavartināṃ hi dharmāṇām avicchedena deśāntarotpattyā deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13770: na sa viṛhiḥ pūrvatra grāme nirudhya tadgrāmāntarāle 'nutpadyamāno 'nekayojanāntarite 'pi grāmāntara utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13775: atrācāryaguṇamatiḥ saha śiṣyeṇācāryavasumitreṇa svanikāyānurāgabhāvitamatir vyākhyānavyāpāram apāsya pratyavasthānapara eva vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:13782: ādarśodakādiṣu bimbān mukhāt pratibimbaṃ mukhacchāyārūpaṃ vicchinnam utpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam ity anenānaikāntikatām udgrāhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13789: pratibimbaṃ nāmānyad evotpadyate dharmāntaram ity asiddham etad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13790: bimbasāmarthyād eva tatrārśādiṣu pratibimbākāraṃ bhrāntaṃ vijñānam utpadyata ity ācāryasyābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13791: na tatra pratibhiṃbaṃ nāma kiṃcid astīty anena dharmyasiddhiṃ nāma dṛṣṭāntadoṣaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13797: pratibimbasya dravyasattvena siddhāv api satyām asāmyād dārṣṭāntikenānidarśanam anudāharaṇaṃ pratibimbakam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13803: tatraiva hi ādarśadeśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pārśvasthitena na pratibimbakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13809: nāsty ādarśarūpāśrayabhūtair avaṣṭabdhe deśe pratibimbakarūpāśrayabhūtānāṃ tatrāvakāśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13823: ekatra rūpe puruṣadvayasya paśyata evābhāvāt sahadarśanasya pratibimbam asiddham iti vākyadhyāhāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13825: digbhedavyavasthitaiḥ puruṣair ekair uttaradigvyavasthitair itarair dakṣiṇadigvyavasthitaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13827: svābhimukhadeśasthitānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ dakṣiṇataṭordhvasthitāni rūpāṇy uttaradigvyavasthitapuruṣasvābhimukhasthāni uttarataṭordhvasthitāny api rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:13833: na tūbhayaṃ [Tib.258a] yugapad upalabhyate iti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13834: na hi svataṭādhaḥ pratibiṃbakaṃ ekataṭasthaiḥ samantato 'pi vāpījalaṃ paśyadbhir upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13835: tataḥ kim iti ced ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:13836: na tv ekatra rūpe ghaṭe paṭe vā dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ puruṣayoḥ sahadarśanaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 269) na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13838: iha tu na bhavati sahadarśanam ity ato na tatra rūpāntarotpattir yukteti.
T07yabhkvyu:13840: chāyātapayoś ca dvayos sahaikatrabhāvo na dṛṣṭo loke.
T07yabhkvyu:13845: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya pratibimbakam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13848: tattaṭākataṭasthe ca chāyāvati maṇḍape ādarśaḥ sthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13854: tad ātapasvabhāvapratibiṃbakasamuttham ity etad apy avaśyam ātapasvabhāvam abhyupagaṃtavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:13856: na cānyatra loke chāyātapayoḥ sahabhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13868: sa tasyāḥ prabhāvo yat tathā darśanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13892: ādarśādi hi pratibhimbasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadanuvidhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13894: pratibimbam api tiryag āyataṃ ca dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13897: na caivam upapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavaḥ maraṇabhavāc cānyataś (Abhidh-k-vy 270) ca pradhānabhūtād ādarśasthānīyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13904: uktālitaviśeṣaṇe hetāv ayam atulyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13911: tad evaṃ sati nāsya sādhanasyānaikāntikatā śakyam udgrāhayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13912: nāpi pratisādhanaṃ kartum ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13920: nikāyantarāgamaprasiddhaṃ kim iti na pramāṇaṃ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13926: tad etad ubhayaṃ prathamaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13934: upapadyā nāma te devā ity evamādayaḥ saṃprasajyante.
T07yabhkvyu:13936: eta eva paṃcāntarāparinirvāyiṇaṃ tridhā bhittvā sapta bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:13942: sapta vo 'haṃ bhikṣavaḥ satpuruṣagatīr deśayiṣyāmy anupādāya ca parinirvāṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13943: tac chruṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye.
T07yabhkvyu:13946: no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyati yad asti yad bhūtaṃ tat prajahāmīty upekṣāṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:13950: tac cānena padaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13951: evaṃ pratipannasya bhikṣoḥ kā gatiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13954: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir abhinivartamāna eva nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13955: evam eva tasya tāvan mānāvaśeṣam [Tib.260a] aprahīṇaṃ bhavaty aparijñātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13956: tasya tāvan mānāvaśeṣasyāprahāṇād aparijñānāt paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād antarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13958: (Abhidh-k-vy 271) punar aparam bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13959: no ca syām iti pūrvavat yāvat syuḥ praṣṭāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13960: tadyathāyoguḍānāṃ vāyasphālānāṃ vā pradīptāgnisaṃprataptānām ayoghanena hanyamānānām ayasprapāṭikā utpataṃty eva nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13961: evam eva tasya pūrvavat yāvat paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād antarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13963: punar aparaṃ bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13964: pūrvavad yāvad ayasprapāṭikā utplutyāpatitvaiva pṛthivyāṃ nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13965: evam eva tasya pūrvavat yāvad antarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13967: punar aparaṃ bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanno bhavatīti pūrvavat yāvad ayasprapāṭikā utplutya patitamātraiva pṛthivyāṃ nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13968: evam eva tasya pūrvavad yāvat paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād upapadyaparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13970: punar aparaṃ bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanna iti pūrvavad yāvad ayasprapāṭikā utplutya parītte tṛṇakāṣṭhe nipatet.
T07yabhkvyu:13973: sā tatra dhūmam api [Tib.260b] kṛtvārcir api saṃjanayya tad eva parīttaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ dagdhvā paryādāya nirupādānā nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13974: evam eva tasya pūrvavad yāvat paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13976: punar aparaṃ bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanna iti pūrvavad yāvad ayasprapāṭikā utplutya mahati vipule tṛṇakāṣṭhe nipatet.
T07yabhkvyu:13979: sā tatra dhūmam api kṛtvārcir api saṃjanayya tad eva mahad vipulaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ dagdhvā paryādāya nirupādānā nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13980: evam eva tasya pūrvavad yāvat paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13982: punar aparaṃ bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanna iti pūrvavad yāvad ayasprapāṭikā utplutya mahati vipule tṛṇākāṣṭhe nipatet.
T07yabhkvyu:13983: sā tatra dhūmam api kuryāt arcir api saṃjanayet.
T07yabhkvyu:13984: sā tatra dhūmam api kṛtvārcir api saṃjanayya tad eva mahad vipulaṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ dagdhvā grāmam api dahed grāmapradeśam api nagaram api nagarapradeśam api janapadam api janapadapradeśam api kakṣam api dāvam api dvīpam api ṣaṇḍam api dahet.
T07yabhkvyu:13985: grāmam api dagdhvā yāvad ṣaṇḍam api dagdhvā mārgāntam āgamya udakāntaṃ vālpaharitakaṃ yā pṛthivīpradeśam āgamya paryādāya [Tib.261b] nirupādānā
T07yabhkvyu:13986: evam eva tasya pūrvavad yāvat paṃcānām avarabhgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13989: iha bhikṣur evaṃ pratipanna iti pūrvavad yāvat syuḥ praṣṭāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13990: tasyaivaṃ pratipannasya bhikṣor na pūrvasyāṃ diśi gatiṃ vadāmi na dakṣiṇasyāṃ na paścimāyāṃ nottarasyāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidikṣu (Abhidh-k-vy 272) nānyatra.
T07yabhkvyu:13994: sapta vo 'haṃ bhikṣavaḥ satpuruṣagatīr deśayiṣyāmy anupādāya ca parinirvāṇam iti yad uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:14010: tena trividho bhavaty antarāparinirvāyī yathoktena dṛṣṭāntatrayeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:14011: prathamo vā nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā jātamātra ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14012: yaṃ praty eṣa parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14016: tṛtīyo dharmasaṃgītim anupraviśya dharmasāṃkathyam anupraviśya parinirvāti.
T07yabhkvyu:14019: tad evaṃ vināpy antarābhavena yathāntarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14020: yathā ca tasya dṛṣṭāntatrayeṇa trividho bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14022: tasmiṃ sādhite idaṃ codyeta yadi dharmasaṃgītim anupraviśya yaḥ parinirvāti.
T07yabhkvyu:14023: so 'ntarāparinirvāyīṣyate kīdṛśa upapadyaparinirvāyī bhaviṣyatīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14024: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītim anupraviśya parinirvātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14026: saṃgītianupraveśasāmānyān [Tib.262a] naiṣa bhedo yujyata iti vacanāvakāśaṃ matvā punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14030: ta ete sarve 'pi dhātugatādayas trayaḥ śakālikādibhir dṛṣṭāntair na saṃbadhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:14051: prathamasya dhyānasyaikā daśikā yāvac caturthasyaikā daśikā.
T07yabhkvyu:14061: teṣām eva trayāṇāṃ ūrdhvaṃ srotasaś cābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14066: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimittair viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14067: sa na haiva tān ākārān tāni liṃgāni tāni nimittāni manasikaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:14068: api tu yat tatropalabhate rūpagataṃ vā vedanāgataṃ vā saṃjñāgataṃ vā saṃskāragataṃ vā vijñānagataṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14071: sa tān dharmān rogato manasikṛtya yāvad anātmato manasikṛtya tebhyo dharmebhyaś cittam udvejayati uttāsayati prativārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14072: sa tebhyo dharmebhyaś cittam udvejyottrāsya prativārya amṛte dhātāv upasaṃharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14074: yad uta sarvopadhipratinisargas tṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14075: etad eva ca sūtram uktvāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14076: tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate bhavāsravād avidyāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14077: vimuktasya vimukto 'smīti jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14078: etad eva ca sūtram uktvā no tu vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14079: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena [Tib.263a] tenaiva dharmasnehena tenaiva dharmapremnā tayaiva dharmābhiratyā antarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14089: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavat yāvat tayaiva dharmabhiratyā mahābrahmaṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14090: na haiva mahābrahmaṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14091: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavat yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā brahmapurohitānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 274) devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14092: na haiva brahmapurohitānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14093: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavat yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14094: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimitair vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmasaṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam [Tib.263b] avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14095: sa na haiva tān ākārān tāni liṃgāni tāni nimittāni manasikaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:14098: etad eva sūtram uktvā tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14099: bhavāsravād avidyāsravāt pūrvavat yāvat kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14100: etad eva sūtram uktvā no tu vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14105: na haivopapadyaparinirvāyī bhavati api tv anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14111: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavat yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14113: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā apramāṇābhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14115: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavad yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā parīttābhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14116: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimittaiḥ prītivirāgād upekṣako viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14117: smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:14118: yat tad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃ sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14119: sa na haiva tān ākārāṃs tāni liṃgāni
T07yabhkvyu:14120: tāni nimittāni manasikaroti pūrvavat [Tib.264a] sarvāṇi sūtrāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:14123: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena pūrvavad yāvad chubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14124: na haiva śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14125: api tenaiva pūrvavat apramāṇaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14127: api tu tenaiva pūrvavat parīttaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14128: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimittaiḥ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor (Abhidh-k-vy 275) astaṃgamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14129: aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14130: sa na haiva tān ākārāṃs tāni liṃgāni vistareṇa sarvāṇi sūtrāṇi pūrvavad vaktavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:14132: yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14133: na haiva pūrvavat puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14134: na haiva pūrvavad anabhrakāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14135: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāṃ astaṃgamāt [Tib.264b] nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārāt anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14136: sa na haiva tān ākārān iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:14137: kevalaṃ tu rūpagatam iti na paṭhitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14141: tasyaivaṃ jānata iti pūrvavat yāvan nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14143: api tu tenaiva dharmacchandena yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā upapadyaparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14145: api tu tenaiva yāvad anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14146: na haivānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī bhavatīti sarvam uktvā yāvad ūrdhvaṃsrotā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14148: yāvat tayaiva dharmābhiratyā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14149: iha bhikṣur yair ākārair yair liṃgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvaśa ākāśānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānaṃtaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānaṃtyāyatanam upasaṃpadya
T07yabhkvyu:14150: sa na haiva tān ākārān ity ākāśānaṃtyāyatanavat sapta sūtrāṇi vaktavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:14151: kevalaṃ tu vijñānānaṃtyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyata iti viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14152: punar aparam iha bhikṣur yair ākārair [Tib.265a] yair liṃgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvaśo vijñānānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14153: sa na haiva tān ākārān iti pūrvavat sapta sūtrāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:14154: punar aparam iha bhikṣur yair iti yāvat sarvaśaḥ ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:14155: pūrvavat sarvāṇi sūtrāṇi vaktavyāny ūrdhvaṃsrotasaṃ tv ekam apanīya.
T07yabhkvyu:14156: tad evaṃ caturbhir dhyānair amṛtadhātucittopasaṃhāracittavimuktyantaropapadyānabhisaṃskārasābhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇordhvagamanatryupapattisthānopapattisvabhāvāś catasraḥ sūtrārthadaśikā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14157: tribhis tv ādyair ārūpyair amṛtadhātucittopasaṃhāracittavimuktyupapadyānabhisaṃskārasābhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇordhvagamanopapattisthānopapattisvabhāvās tisraḥ sūtrārthasaptikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14164: tasmāt āgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavo na kevalaṃ yuktita ity apiśabdaḥ [Tib.265b].
T07yabhkvyu:14166: krakucchandasya tathāgatasya viduraṃ nāma śrāvakaṃ dūṣī nāma māras tadānīṃ śirasi muṣṭinābhighnan tenāṃgīkṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14167: tatkṣaṇa eva ca svaśarīreṇaivāvīcau mahānarake prapatita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14168: svaśarīreṇaiveti vacanān nāsty antarābhava ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14169: sa hi jīvann eva nārakībhir jvālābhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14170: jīvann evāsau māro narakotthitābhir agnijvālābhir āliṃgitatvāt svaśarīrāvasthāduḥkhotpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14173: narakopapattibhavṝāvasthāṃ ca na gatavān ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14184: paṃcabhir evānantarryaiḥ kṛtaiḥ na tv ekena dvābhyāṃ vā narakagamanaṃ bhavatīty etat prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:14185: paṃceti rutāt kriyānantaraṃ cānantaryakriyānantaraṃ ca narakeṣūpapanna iti prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:14186: yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata iti rutān na kālāntaraṃ [Tib.266b] jīvitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:14191: na tūpapadyata ity etat padam upapannārtham iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14208: maraṇagatasya te sato manuṣyeṣv antarāvāso nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:14219: samāna eṣa bhavato 'pi praśna ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14222: na bhavaty etat sūtram antarābhavasyābhāve jñāpakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14240: yasmād aiṣyantī gatis tatprāpakaś cāntarābhavas tenaivaikena karmaṇākṣipyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14245: yadi garbhastho 'pi mriyeta tasya nārako 'ntarābhavo mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet.
T07yabhkvyu:14249: nārakapūrvakālabhavāvasthā api nārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavanty utsadeṣu kukūlādiṣu bhramaṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14254: antarābhavānām acchatvād ātmabhāvasyānyonyaṃ asaṃśleṣān na dāhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14259: yataḥ pūrṇayūna iva bodhisattvasyāntarābhavaḥ [Tib.267a] salakṣaṇānuvyaṃjanaś cāto 'ṃtarābhavasthena tena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praveṣtum icchatā trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ svakṣetram iti kṛtvāvabhāsitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14264: kasmād bodhisattvasya mātā gajapotam evaṃrūpam adrākṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:14267: yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇy ārabhate kartuṃ kalpaśate śeṣe tataḥ prabhṛti tasya sarvā durgatayo vyāvṛttāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14268: tadyathā kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān adrākṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:14271: kṛkiṇā kila rājñā daśa svapnā dṛṣtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14276: ārāmāḥ puṣpaphalasaṃpannāḥ sarvaṃ ca puṣpaphalam adattādāyibhir hriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14282: tena ca te bhagavate kāśyapāya tathāgatāya niveditāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14285: tasya śrāvakā vistīrṇasvajanabaṃdhuvargaṃ prahāya pravrajitāḥ vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādya saṃgaṃ kariṣyanti hastino vātāyananirgamanapucchalagnavat.
T07yabhkvyu:14286: kūpasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām abhyupetya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:14287: teṣām śrotukāmatā na saṃsthāsyata ity etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14288: saktumuktāprasthasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva saktubhikṣāyā apy arthāyendriyabalabodhyaṃgādīni prakāśayiṣyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:14289: cendanasvapnena tacchrāvakā evābhāvitakāyaśīlaprajñāḥ tīrthyamatāni gṛhītvā buddhavacanena samānīkariṣyantīty etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14290: ārāmasvapnena tacchrāvakā evāvāsam āśrayaṃ kṛtvā yat tad bhaviṣyati saṃghasya puṣpaṃ vā phalaṃ vādhikaṃ vā tad vikrīya vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayiṣyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:14291: tena ca gṛhiṇaḥ pratisaṃstariṣyantīty etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14292: kalabhasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:14293: ye te bhikṣavaḥ sthavirāḥ śīlavaṃtaḥ kalyāṇadharmāṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14295: aśucimraksitamarkaṭasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva duḥśīlāḥ pāpadharmāṇaḥ santo ye te bhikṣavaḥ kalyāṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14296: tān asadbhir doṣaiś codayiṣyantīty etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14297: markaṭābhiṣekasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva sāmantikābhiṣekaṃ vīhāreṣu [Tib.268a] kariṣyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:14298: loke 'pi ca paṇḍakā adhirājyaṃ kārayiṣyantīty etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14300: na ca vimuktipaṭaḥ khaṇḍayiṣyata ity etad darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14301: kalahasvapnena tacchrāvakā eva nikāyaparigrahāt parasparaṃ vivādam āpatsyanta ity etad darśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14304: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāv iti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14307: tasmāt pareṇa pratisaṃdhikṣaṇād (Abhidh-k-vy 279) anyo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14316: te punar apakṣālā vicikitsā amanasikāraḥ kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyaṃ abhyārabhyavīryam audbilyaṃ chaṃbhitatvaṃ nānātvasaṃjñā abhijalpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14329: manuṣyāntarābhaviko devāntarābhavikaṃ pūrvam apāsya manuṣyapretatiryaṅnārakāntarābhavikān paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:14330: pretāntarābhaviko devamanuṣyāntarābhavikau pūrvāv apāsya pretatiryaṅnārakāntarābhavikān paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:14331: evaṃ yāvan nārakāntarābhaviko devāntarābhavikādīn pūrvān apāsya nārakāntarābhavikān eva paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:14335: gandham arvati bhakṣayati gandharva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14337: ayam arvati na kevalaṃ gatyarthe vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:14340: gandham arvati gacchati bhoktum iti gandharva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14352: yaś ca pūrvakālabhavo yaś cāntarābhavas tatprāpakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14353: tayor eka eva nikāyasabhāgaḥ ata ekanikāyasabhāgatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14358: tasyāpy āyuṣah āntarābhavikasya kṣayān maraṇabhavaḥ prasajyet pūrvakālabhavavat.
T07yabhkvyu:14360: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14361: te kṣudrajantavas taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā tatsahacaraṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 280) cānubhūtaṃ rasam anusmṛtya gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ kriminikāyasabhāgotpādakaṃ karma vibodhya.
T07yabhkvyu:14362: tayā gaṃdharasatṛṣṇayā vipākābhimukhaṃ kṛtvāntarābhavasaṃtatyā krimiṣūpajāyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14364: krimipratyayapracure kāle tatsamvartanīyāni karmāṇi krimisamvartanīyāni vipākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:14366: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalaṃti khalu dehinām
T07yabhkvyu:14375: yasmād vidyamānāny api cakravartisamvartanīyāni karmāṇi vipākābhinirvṛttau kadācid eva vṛttiṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:14379: karmādhipatyenāśvādīnāṃ prasiddhaṃ kālam atikramya [Tib.269b] kālāntare 'pi maithunaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14390: kalmāṣapādādivad iti nāsty eṣa doṣa ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14393: anunayasahagatena vā pratighasahagatena vā cittena yathā viparyastamatir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14397: puṃsaḥ sataḥ puruṣasyāntarābhavasya puṃsāyaṃ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari bhāryāyām iva.
T07yabhkvyu:14398: striyā ayaṃ straiṇo rāga utpadyate pitari bhartarīva.
T07yabhkvyu:14400: puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsnaḥ pratigha īrṣyotthānabhūta utpadyate pitari pratisapatnapuruṣa iva.
T07yabhkvyu:14401: striyās satyāḥ straiṇaḥ pratigha utpadyate mātari pratisapatnyām iva.
T07yabhkvyu:14402: sa tābhyām eva viparyastābhyāṃ cittābhyāṃ viparyasto raṃtukāmanatayā maithunakarmakāmanatayā taṃ deśaṃ indriyadvayasthānam āśliṣya tām avasthāṃ vipratipattyavasthām ātmany adhimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14404: tasmiṃś cāśucau śuklaśoṇite garbhasthānasaṃprāpte āmāśayapakvāśayāntarāsthānasaṃprāpte [Tib.270a] abhiniviśate pratitiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14412: bījāṃkuranirodhotpādanyāyenaikasminn eva kṣaṇe bījaṃ nirudhyate 'ṃkuraś cotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14414: yat tat kalalam ity ākhyāyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14419: valmīka iti bhikṣo asya kāyasyaitad adhivacanaṃ rūpiṇaḥ audārikasya cāturmahābhūtasya odanakulmāṣopacitasya mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhūtasyeti
T07yabhkvyu:14429: yathā parṇakrimeḥ parṇamahābhūtāny upaniśritya bhūtāntarāṇi karmabhir jāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:14434: sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ tarhi nīyate mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhūtasyety ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14441: śuklaśoṇitasaṃniśrayeṇa kalalākhyāni bhūtāṃtarāṇi śuklaśoṇitasamakālāny utpadyanto sendriyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:14442: yathā parṇasaṃniśrayeṇa parṇasamānakālāni sendriyāṇi krimimahābhūtāny utpadyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14443: anyatra tu yathāyogaṃ vaktavyam ity āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14444: anyatra saṃsvedajaupapādukayor yonyor yathāyogaṃ vyākhyeyam ity āhur abhidharmācāryāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14450: yathā bhūtena tadvedyaṃ kṛtaṃ prāk karma tādṛśān sattvān svapna iva prekṣya narake sa dhāvati pārvācāryāḥ yogācārā āryāsaṃgaprabhṛtayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14454: yathā manuṣyas tiryak pretaś ca gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:14466: sūtre hi yaḥ sarvāṇy asaṃprajānan karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:14475: {yathābhūtena tadvedyaṃ kṛtaṃ prāk karma tādṛśān sattvān svapna iva prekṣya narake sa dhāvati.} kaścit kasmaicid vaktā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:14478: aṇḍāj jāto janiṣyate jāyate cety aṇḍajaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14486: na hi saṃskṛtasya punaḥ saṃskāro yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14487: bhaviṣyantyā tu saṃjñayā tathā nirdeśaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14489: kathaṃ punar asaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatīti vistaraḥ saṃnikṛṣṭāvasthā upapattideśasya
T07yabhkvyu:14497: na kevalaṃ rāgadveṣābhyām [Tib.271b] eva viparyastamatir utpattideśaṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:14502: tathārāmaṃ praviśāmy udyānaṃ cetyādi.saṃprajānaṃs tu samyak prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:14504: yadi samyak prajānāti kathaṃ kliṣṭenaiva cittena pratisaṃdhibandho vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14507: mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśala evaṃ viparītau saṃjñādhimokṣāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14508: upapannamātrāvasthāyām etad bhavati vāto vāti yāvad vṛkṣamūlaṃ copasarpāmi kuḍyamūlaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:14525: te na cakravartyādayas tadānīm iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:14526: ta evaṃ tv ete cakravartyādaya iti paryāyamātram etad uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:14540: etac ca viśeṣaṇam āyuṣyasyāyuḥsamvartanīyasya karmaṇo bhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14551: samalānāṃ ca palvalo 'sau palvala iveti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:14559: tasmiṃ hastau saṃpraveśyāṃgam angaṃ hastapādādikaṃ nikṛtya cchittvā pratyāharanti pratyākarṣayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:14571: tadvad eva sarvam ahetukaṃ prāduḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14577: tatra deśapratiniyamo bījādisaṃbaddha eva deśa utpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14579: agnyādīnāṃ vāgniśītoṣṇābhighātacakṣurādīnāṃ pākajādiṣa pākajasukhaduḥkhaśabdacakṣurvijñānādiṣu ḍṛṣṭam sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14581: bījādīnām aṃkurādiṣu agnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣu deśakālapratiniyamenotpattiṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14583: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam ity ato nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14594: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvāyābhisaṃmūrchet.
T07yabhkvyu:14599: pūrvāntasya saphalasya grahaṇād aparāntasya ca sahetukasya grahaṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14600: tatra pūrvānte hetur avidyā saṃskārāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:14605: tad evaṃ saptāṃgāni paurvāntikaḥ paṃcāṃgāny aparāṃtika iti vyākhyātaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14607: kim avidyaiva kevalā utāho sarvakleśāḥ āhosvit kleśāvastheti saṃdehe pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:14641: sa bālo yāvat sukhāyā vedanāyā etat kāraṇaṃ duḥkhāyā etat kāraṇaṃ aduḥkhāsukhāyāś [Tib.274b] caitat kāraṇam iti paricchede na śakto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14643: tathā hi bālako 'gnim api spṛśed duḥkhasyaitat kāraṇam ity aparicchindan.
T07yabhkvyu:14659: eṣa ity etasya dhātor etad rūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14660: upādīyate viṣaya ātmabhāvo 'nenety upādānaṃ caturvidhaḥ kleśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14674: vineyajanodvejanārthaṃ bhagavatā jarāmaraṇaśabdena catvāry aṃgāny uktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:14697: tayā tṛṣṇayā saṃprayuktāny āhrīkyānapatrāpyādīni paryavasthānāni tad upādānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14707: kṣaṇikaḥ sāṃbandhikaś ca yathā prakaraṇeṣu iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14711: tatra saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vināśayogāt kṣaṇikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14714: dvādaśa paṃcaskaṃdhikā avasthā atītānāgatapratyutpannajanmasaṃbaddhāḥ āvasthikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14724: prakaraṇeṣu hi sarvasaṃskṛtagrahaṇāt sattvāsattvākhyaḥ pratītyasamutpāda uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14726: vineyasammohavinivṛttihetuḥ sattvākhya eva dvādaśāṃgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo deśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14753: vijñānaṃ yāvad bhavaś ca madhyasaṃmohavyāvartanārtham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14754: tathā hi sūtre evoktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14758: kiṃ nv aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14761: pratītyasamutpādayathābhūtadarśanena naivam atīte 'dhvani saṃmuhyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14763: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ tathā na sa madhyāntaṃ pratisarati.
T07yabhkvyu:14768: yathā pūrvam upadiṣṭaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad bhavaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:14769: [Tib.276a] kā punar atra yuktir ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14773: vijñānādīni saptāṃgāni vastūny adhiṣṭhānāni kleśakarmaṇām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14790: na punar anāgate 'dhvani phalam evaṃ paṃcadhā viśālitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14791: atīte cādhvani naivaṃ dvidhā hetur viśālita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14810: iti kleśo vastuna utpadyamāno dṛṣṭo vedanāyās tṛṣṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:14811: kleśād api tathā kleśo dṛṣṭas tṛṣṇāyā upādānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14813: tad yady upādānaṃ tṛṣṇāyās tad utpadyate iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14814: atha tṛṣṇā tadvastuna utpadyata iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14815: tasmād avidyā kleśasvabhāvā satī vastunaḥ kleśād veti jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14817: vastunaś ceha kleśa utpadyamāno dṛṣṭo vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:14818: tasmāt tataḥ kleśo bhāvī bhaviṣyatīti jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14819: nātra punaḥ kimcid upasaṃkhyeyam evaṃ jñāpitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14820: kathaṃ punar evaṃ nayo darśita iti gamyata ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14821: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14822: anyathā hi kim asya sāmarthyam syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14823: yady ayaṃ yathokto nayo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14824: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:14827: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ [Tib.277a] saṃbhavantīti idaṃ na brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14828: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14830: tasmād yathoktaprakārābhidyotakam asya sāmarthyam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14835: kaś ca bhikṣavo 'viydyāyā hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kiṃ nidānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14836: avidyāyā bhikṣavo 'yoniśomanaskāro hetur ayoniśomanaskāraḥ pratyayo 'yoniśomanaskāro nidānam iti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14839: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja iti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14841: kathaṃ na bhavāṃgāntaraṃ bhavatīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14847: tathā hy upādānaṃ bhogānāṃ prāptaye kleśasamudācārāvasthā.
T07yabhkvyu:14848: tatra cāyoniśomanaskāro viparītacetasa ābhogo 'ntarbhūta ity ukto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14859: yady ayoniśomanaskāra upādānena saṃprayujyate ity ato bhavatāsyopādāne 'ntarbhāva iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14861: ṭṛṣṇāvidyābhyām api hy asau saṃprayujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14869: katham ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā iti vijñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14870: [Tib.278a] na hi tathā sūtre vacanam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:14873: tasmād ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā iti vijñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14877: atas tayor api tatrāntarbhāvād aṃgāntaratvaṃ śakyam akartum.
T07yabhkvyu:14882: ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā uktaḥ sūtrāntara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14884: avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidāneti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:14888: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14890: āvilo manaskāraḥ ayoniśaḥ pravṛttatvān mohajatvād vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14896: na hi veditam asaṃprayuktam avidyayā tṛṣṇāhetur bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14897: tad evaṃ sparśakāle bhavann ayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavartinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14902: yasmāt sparśakāle bhavann ayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavartinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14909: evaṃ punaḥ parihāram ācāryaḥ sadoṣaṃ paśyaṃs tasya doṣasyābhivyaktyarthaṃ prasaṃgam ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:14911: tad yathoktam ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā iti vistareṇa sūtrato yuktyā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14914: etad anyatra sūtra uktam iha punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasūtre vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14922: na cāviparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣtāyā vedanāyāḥ pratyayībhavatīti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14923: na ca punar niravidyasyārhato viparītaḥ sparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14926: avidyā cāsya sparśasya hetur iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14927: ity anayā yuktyā pṛatītyasamutpādasūtre sāvidyasparśapratyayā vedanā.
T07yabhkvyu:14930: sa cāpi sparśakāle nirdiṣṭa iti vistareṇātra pratītyasamutpāde siddhaṃ bhavaty ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14932: yadi tarhi niravidyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyaḥ pratyayo na bhavatītyādivacanena svagatayaiva yuktyā ayoniśomanaskāro hetur avidyāyā avidyā cāyoniśomanaskārasya hetur iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14938: ataḥ sūtrāntare kaṇṭhoktyeyaṃ [Tib.279b] yuktir vyavasthāpyata iti tat sūtrāntaropanyāsaprayojanam avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14941: avidyāsparśajaṃ veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti sūtrāntare nirdiṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14942: na ca niravidyaveditasyārhato vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14944: na ca niravidyasyārhato viparītaḥ sparśa ity anayā yuktyā etad apy aṃgadvayaṃ sparśavedanākhyaṃ iha pratītyasamutpādasūtre 'nucyamānam apy anyatropadiṣṭatvād gamyate ity etasyāpy aṃgadvayasyāvacanaṃ prāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14946: sa puṇyāṃś cet saṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti (Abhidh-k-vy 291) puṇyopagam asya vijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14948: na ca niravidyasaṃskārasyārhataḥ puṇyopagaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad āniṃjyopagaṃ vijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14951: tathā jātim antareṇa jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavatīti yuktyā gamyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14954: acodyam eva tv etad iti vistareṇācāryaḥ svamatam āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14959: sa ca paraloko jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:14964: acodyam eva tv etat vistareṇa yāvan na cāparipūrṇo nirdeśa ity abhisambandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14965: ubhayaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14967: ata eva ca pratītyasamutpannā iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14977: na tu bhāvinyā saṃjñayeti tam abhiprāyaṃ vihanti.
T07yabhkvyu:14979: ye sāsravā anāgatā evaṃ cetayituṃ yujyante.
T07yabhkvyu:14984: prāptiṃ prati anāsravā dharmāḥ prāpyerann iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14988: tad evam anenārthenānāgatānāṃ saṃskṛtatvavyavasthāpane doṣa iti vidhyaṃtaram upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14990: yathā na ca tāvad rūpyate yad anāgataṃ rūpaṃ rūpyamāṇarūpajātīyatvād rūpam ity atideśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14991: tathā pratītyasamutpannadharmajātīyatvād anāgatā api dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā ity atideśa eṣām anāgatānāṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14993: yasmāt tad evāṃgaṃ hetus tad eva phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15028: kiṃ khalv etā iṣṭaya ucyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15029: āvasthikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā ity evamādyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15039: [Tib.281b] evam atrāpi yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśaḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15041: dvādaśasu paṃcaskaṃdhikāsv avasthāsu yatra yasya prādhānyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15045: saṃti ca tatrāṇye 'pi rūpavedanādayo dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15047: na hi tatra sūtre keśādayaḥ pṛthivīdhātunā nirdiśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:15049: yata eṣāṃ keśādīnāṃ aparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15051: rūpādisvabhāvā api keśādayo na kevalaṃ pṛthivīdhātusvabhāvā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15052: api tu keśādibhir eva pṛthivīdhātur nirdiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15055: na ca keśādīn abhyatītyāpy atikramyāpy asti pṛthivīdhātur ādhyātmika iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15057: evam ihāpy avidyādīnāṃ evam ihāpi sūtre 'vidyāsaṃskāravijñānādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15060: tasmān na tadgataḥ pṛthivīdhātur ukta iti sāvaśeṣaḥ evety [Tib.282a] darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15064: na śakyate darśayitum iti manyamāno yadiśabdaṃ prayuṃkte.
T07yabhkvyu:15065: pūrvānte 'jñānam aparānte 'jñānaṃ madhyānte 'jñānaṃ buddhe 'jñānaṃ dharme 'jñānaṃ saṃghe 'jñānam ity evamādīnāṃ sarveṣām ajñānasthānānām uktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15066: jātyaṃtarasya tu vedanāder avidyāyāṃ kiṃ kṛtaḥ prakṣepaḥ paṃcaskaṃdhikāvasthāvidyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:15067: na hi vedanādīnāṃ avidyātvaṃ yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15069: yasya bhāvābhāvayor yasya bhāvābhāvau yathāsaṃkhyena niyatau tad evāṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15070: avidyābhāve saṃskārāṇāṃ bhāvas tadabhāve teṣām abhāva ity avidyaivāṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15075: saty api ca paṃcaskaṃdhake saṃskārā na bhavaṃtīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15077: puṇyopagaṃ yāvad āniṃjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15082: tathā saty api paṃcaskaṃdhake niravidyāvasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇopādānādayaś ca na bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15085: ato vidyamānā anye skaṃdhā na pratyayāḥ saṃskārādīnām iti na te 'ṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15087: bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15089: āyuṣamāṃ cchāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:15090: śālistambham avalokya bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtram idam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15094: sa buddhaṃ paśyatīty uktvā bhagavāṃs tūṣṇīṃbabhūva.
T07yabhkvyu:15095: tad asya bhagavatā bhāṣitasya sūtrasya ko 'rthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15099: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyatītyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:15102: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiveyaṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā [Tib.283a] tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā bhūtatā satyatā tattvam aviparītatāviparyastatety evamādi bhagavanmaitreyavacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15104: yad uktaṃ prathamā koṭir anāgatā dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15107: uktaṃ ca avidyā yāvaj jātijarāmaraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15116: yo 'yam utpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti nikāyāntarīyair nityaḥ parikalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15121: brūyās tvaṃ lakṣaṇam api nityaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15123: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāṃtaram anityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15124: na hi nirvāṇam [Tib.283b] ākāśaṃ vā kasyacid anityasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15125: prāg utpatter hi lakṣyasya tad astīti kasya laskṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15126: vinaṣṭe ca lakṣye kasyeti na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15131: yathaudanena pākasyāsti sambandhaḥ kartṛkriyālakṣaṇa ity odanasya pāka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15135: yatas teṣām avidyādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15137: pratyayaṃ prāpya samudbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ iti padārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15138: sa kathaṃ nityaś ca nāma pratītyasamutpādaś ceit.
T07yabhkvyu:15145: pratiś copasargaḥ prāptidyotaka ity ayam itir gatyartham ujjhitvā prāptyartham āpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15151: na cāsau pūrvam utpādāt [Tib.284a] kaścid astīti sautrāṃtikamatena.
T07yabhkvyu:15159: na hy avidyamānaḥ kartā snānādikriyāṃ kurvan dṛṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15162: atha manyase pratītyakriyāṃ samutpādakriyāṃ ca saha karotīty evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15168: samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāla iti vacanāt ktvāpratyayo na siddho bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:15171: dvitīye tṛtīye kṣaṇe punaḥpunar utpadyata ity aniṣṭhāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15173: alabdhātmako 'nāgata iti katham asato 'labdhātmabhāvasya kartṛtvaṃ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:15175: yata evam ato yadavastha utpadyate śābdikasya śabdavidaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15188: śābdikānām idam śābdakīyaṃ kartuḥ kriyāyāś ca vyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15190: bhavituḥ kartṛrūpakalpitād arthāt kriyārūpakalpitāyā bhūter anyatvadarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15191: tasmād acchalaṃ bhavaty utpadyate pratyetīty evamādiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:15202: utpanno 'pi punar utpadyate ity anavasthānād anyadaniṣṭhā prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15203: tathā hi sāṃkhyamatānusāreṇa sata evotpādā nāsata iti tad etad adhikṛtya bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15206: yadi bhavatāṃ sann utpadyata iti pakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15211: na cāsau pūrvam utpādāt kaścid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:15213: atha vā yadi tarhi sann evotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15214: pūrvam eva ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍādīn anapekṣya svataḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 296) prasiddho 'stīti prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15220: asann utpadyate yadvat pratyety api tatheti
T07yabhkvyu:15221: siddho naḥ pakṣa iti pūrvavad vācyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15222: yad apy uktam ekasya hi kartur dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhir bhavatīti tad vyabhicārayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:15229: atra na pūrvaṃ tamo dīpaṃ prāpnoti paścād gacchati vinaśyati ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15231: tasminn eva kāle tamo dīpaṃ prāpnuvad vinaśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:15233: samanaṃtaram eva tan na yugapad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15236: na hy asau pūrvaṃ mukhaṃ vyādadāti vidārayati paścāc chete.
T07yabhkvyu:15239: sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śeta ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15245: yaḥ kaścin mukhaṃ vyādāpānaṃtaraṃ ca saṃvṛtya śete.
T07yabhkvyu:15246: sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śeta ity ucyeta na cocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15249: sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śete ity ucyate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15252: nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ vyāptum icchā vīpsā.
T07yabhkvyu:15264: na kaścid dharma eka utpadyate sahotpādaniyamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15271: pratir vīpsārtha ity evamādikā kalpanātraiva (Abhidh-k-vy 297) pratītyasamutpādasūtre yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15272: iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15273: na hi pratītyānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi pratītyacakṣūṃṣīti samāsaḥ saṃbhavaty arthāyogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15274: cākṣur hi pratītya prāpya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam ity ayam artho gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15275: tena tadavastham eva tac codyaṃ na yukta eṣa padārtha iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15277: ekasya hi kartur dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15279: na ca pūrvam utpādāc cakṣurvijñānam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:15280: yac cakṣuḥ pūrvaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi cottarakālam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15284: na kevalam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:15289: dvitīyena tu paryāyeṇasyotpādād idam utpadyate ity anena pūrvaparyāyam evāvadhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15295: asya punar aṃgasya saṃskārāṃgasyotpādād idaṃ vijñānāṃgam utpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15296: evam itareṣām apy aṃgānāṃ paraṃparā vaktavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:15301: sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa saṃtatyāvidyādīnāṃ pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayituṃ paryāyadvayam āha.
T07yabhkvyu:15302: asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti sākṣāt pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15304: tatra sākṣād yadāvidyāyāḥ samanaṃtaraṃ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskārā utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:15308: avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ sākṣāt pratyayo vijñānādīnāṃ pāraṃparyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:15310: avidyāṃge sati saṃskārāṃgaṃ bhavaty asya saṃskārāṃgasyotpādād idam utpadyate vijñānāṃgaṃ sākṣād avidyāpratyayaṃ pāraṃparyeṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:15313: nāsati hetau bhāvo bhavatīty ahetuvādapratiṣedhārthaṃ prathamena paryāyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:15314: nityahetuvādapratiṣedhārthaṃ na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikāt kiṃcid utpadyata iti dvitīyena.
T07yabhkvyu:15320: asyotpādād idam utpadyate ity anenaiva paryāyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:15321: hetor astitvam utpattimataś ca hetutvam ity ubhayasyāhetutvanityahetutvalakṣaṇasya vādasya pratiṣedhasiddhitaḥ pūrvaparyāyasyānarthakyaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15324: ya ātmani saty āśrayabhūte avidyāyā āśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ saṃskāravijñānanāmarūpādīnāṃ bhāvam utpādaṃ kalpayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:15325: avidyādīnāṃ cāvidyāsaṃskārādīnāṃ utpādāt tadutpattiṃ saṃskārādyutpattiṃ kalpayantīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15326: ataḥ kāraṇāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ kalpanāṃ paryudāsayituṃ pratiṣeddhum idaṃ nirdhārayāṃ babhūvāmredayāṃ babhūva.
T07yabhkvyu:15334: nānyasmin yāvad evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15337: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15340: anyathā hy asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīty ucyamāne vaktāras syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15341: ātmani saty āśrayabhūte avidyādiṣu satsu saṃskārādayo bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15342: atha punar dvitīyam eva paryāyaṃ brūyād asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15353: na prahīyanta iti prathamena paryāyeṇa darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15354: tasyā evotpādād utpadyanta iti dvitīyena darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15355: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ aprahīṇāyāṃ jarāmaranādayo bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:15360: yāvat kāraṇasrotas tāvat kāryasroto bhavatīti prathamena paryāyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:15365: asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīty anena yāvat kāraṇasrotas tiṣṭhati tāvat kāryasrotas tiṣṭhatīti evam asya sthityartho varṇyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15366: bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kim arthaṃ ācakṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:15370: asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti pūrvaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15378: asmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīty evāvakṣyad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15381: asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti pūrvam avakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:15383: sūtra uktaṃ jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavantīti jarāmaraṇasaṃgṛhītā evaṃ te.
T07yabhkvyu:15385: [Tib.288a] tatra sattvāsattvasaṃkhyātasya viṣayasya pariṇāmād ātmabhāvapariṇāmāc caite bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:15395: ātmadṛṣṭy asmimānābhiniviṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ kāyādibhiḥ kāyavāṅmanobhis trividhaṃ karma puṇyāpuṇyāniṃjyalakṣaṇam ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:15398: ejater etat rūpam āneṃjyam iti vā pāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15412: yathā dīrghā tṛṇānusaktā jvālā [Tib.288b] gacchatīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15413: tathā vijñānasaṃtatibhir antarābhavasambandhād antarābhavasaṃbandhenātiviprakṛṭadeśām api tāṃtāṃ gatiṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:15415: yadi saṃskārapratyayaṃ antarābhavapratisaṃdhicittam upādāya yāvad upapattikṣaṇaḥ sarvāsau vijñānasaṃtatiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam abhipretaṃ tad upapannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15419: anyathā hi yadi ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃtatir nābhipretā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15421: atra ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā iti noktaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15436: yāvad yac cedaṃ rūpaṃ yac ca nāma.
T07yabhkvyu:15437: (Abhidh-k-vy 300) tad ubhayaṃ nāmarūpam ity ucyata [Tib.289a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15459: parivrājakānāṃ tridaṇḍamauṇḍyaṃ ādiśabdadvayena kāpālikādīnāṃ kapāladhāraṇādīni gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:15463: ye kecic chramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15464: [Tib.289b] samanupśyaṃti sarve ta imān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15466: ātmano hy asattvād ātmavādopādānām iti vādaśabdopanyāse prayojanaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15489: idam atra bhavasya svalakṣaṇaṃ svabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15491: jvālāgamanayogenāntarābhavasaṃbandhād anāgataṃ janma jātiḥ paṃcaskaṃdhikā nāmarūpasvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15494: yat tat khālityaṃ [Tib.290a] pālityaṃ iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15496: yā teṣāṃteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāc cyutiś cyavanam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15500: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvam ukta (Abhidh-k-vy 301) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15505: tāny api hi na vidyeti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:15507: yadi vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyā adravyaṃ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15512: na tu yaḥ kaścid anyo mitrād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15520: na tu ye kecid anye dharmādibhyaś [Tib.290b] cakṣurādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15526: na cāvidyāyā anyeṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ pratyayabhāvenopadeśo yuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15534: na cāpi cakṣurādayas tathā bhavitum arhaṃtīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15535: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāveti nāvidyā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15544: kleśamahābhūmikāś ca sarve 'pi mahābhūmikaiḥ saha saṃprayujyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15545: dṛṣṭyā satkāyadṛṣṭyādikayā prajñāsvabhāvayā avidyā saṃprayujyata iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15551: na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15558: antarāntarotpadyamānayā kliṣṭayā prajñayā vyavakīryamāṇā kṣaṇāntarotpannā kuśalā prajñā na viśudhyatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15564: tāṃ vāsanāṃ tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ vyāvartayato yoginaḥ tac cittaṃ vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15565: evam avidyopahatā kliṣṭā prajñā na śudhyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15566: ataḥ prajñā cāvidyā ca na doṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15576: na ca prajānāti na ca prajānātīty āyuṣman mahākauṣṭhila tasmād avidyocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15582: sarvakleśasvabhāvā hi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthaṅ nocyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:15585: rāgo baṃdhanaṃ dveṣo bandhanam ity uktvā moho bandhanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15596: [Tib.292a] rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyata iti noktaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:15601: rāgeṇa pratighena mānena veti mā bhūt sarvakleśagrahaṇaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15604: avidyopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyata ity evam eva tu vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15611: evaṃ sati na kiṃ cit syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15619: tasmād avidyāyāḥ karmaṇaḥ kāritreṇa svabhāvo vijñātavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15620: asty asau kaścid dharma yo vidyāvipakṣa iti vidyāvipakṣatvaṃ tasyāḥ karmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:15623: nanu ca rūpaprasāda iti svabhāvaprabhāvito 'sya nirdeśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15630: mayatā punaḥ sautrāṃtikair avidyā prakārabhinnā varṇyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15633: mayatānām ity avidyānāṃ prakārabhinnānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 303) nāmeti grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15643: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15647: nanu cānyo māna eva syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15648: asmimānād anyaḥ ṣaṇṇām anyatamaḥ sa ca mayatā.
T07yabhkvyu:15650: atra tu punar vicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃ jāyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15651: atra punar vicāryamāṇe 'vidyāṃge [Tib.293a] bahur ayaṃ grantho jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15653: tasmāt tiṣṭhatv etad etāvad evāstv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15656: kuta etad ity evamādike punar vicāre kriyamāṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:15658: tasmāt tiṣṭhatv etad alaṃ vicārāntareṇety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15667: rūpaṃ paṃcendriyāṇy arthāḥ paṃcavijñaptir eva cety
T07yabhkvyu:15670: nāmavaśena indriyavaśena arthavaśena cārtheṣu rūpādiṣu namatīti nāma.
T07yabhkvyu:15674: yad idaṃ loke pratītim iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15680: yasmāt tannāmavaśena saṃjñākaraṇavaśenārtheṣv apratyakṣeṣv api vā namati pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:15682: indriyārthavaśena tu pratyakṣeṣu rupādiṣu namati utpadyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15686: etasya saṃjñākaraṇalakṣaṇasya nāmnaḥ kena kāraṇena nāmatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15687: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15688: yasmāt teṣv artheṣu catuḥskandhalakṣaṇaṃ nāma tan nāma namayati pravartayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15692: maraṇakāle nikṣipte kāye upapattyantare namanād gamanād arūpiṇo vedanādayaḥ skandhā nāmety ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:15694: mṛtasya khalu kālaṃ gatasya jñātaya imaṃ pūtikāyam agninā vā dahaṃti udake vā plāvayanti bhūmau vā nikhananti vātātapābhyāṃ vā pariśoṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:15696: cittam iti (Abhidh-k-vy 304) vā mana iti vā vijñānam iti vā śraddhāparibhāvitaṃ śīlatyāgaśrutaprajñāparibhāvitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15697: tad ūrdhvagāmi bhavati viśeṣagāmy āyatyāṃ svargopagam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15702: manaindriyasya punar niruddhasya anāgatena dharmeṇa rūpādinā utpatsyamānena vartamānena manovijñānena kathaṃ saṃnipātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15711: sarve ca te trayo 'pi manaindriyādayaḥ sparśotpattau praguṇā anukūlā bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15716: ananyatve hi satīndriyārthavijñāneṣūkteṣu sparśakāyavacanaṃ punar uktaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15722: tayor api vedanātṛṣṇayor dharmāyatanāt pṛthagbhāvaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15726: naiṣa doṣa iti yathoktas tadvyatiriktasyāpi vedanātṛṣṇāvyatiriktasyāpi dharmāyatanasya saṃjñādisvabhāvasya bhāvād astitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15728: na caivaṃ bhavatas trayānāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ity evaṃ bruvāṇasya [Tib.294b] sparśabhūtād indriyārthavijñānatrayād anyad asparśabhūtaṃ trayam indriyārthavijñānatrayam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:15730: ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti prayojanavaśād apṛthagbhāve 'pi sparśabhūtāt trayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15731: tasmād apṛthagbhāve 'pi vedanātṛṣṇayoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśo yukto vineyakāryavaśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15732: na tu bhavataḥ saṃnipātamātrasparśavādinaḥ kenacid api prayojanena ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti pṛthaṅnirdeśo yuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15733: yasmāt ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti vacanenendriyārthavijñānatrayam uktam iti tadavacanaṃ prāptam ity ataḥ ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyā iti na sidhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:15736: tasmāt ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti pṛthaṅnirdeśād asti cittasaṃprayuktaṃ sparśākhyaṃ dharmāntaram iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15740: ata indriyaviṣayavijñanatrayaṃ sparśabhūtam ity asya śeṣasya jñāpanārtham atra grahaṇaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15747: tac ca vijñānam apadiṣṭam atra ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15748: [Tib.295a] tasmāt triṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu indriyārthavijñāneṣu ṣaḍvijñānakāyavacanena punaḥ sparśagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15750: ataḥ saṃnipātād anyaḥ sparśa iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15761: tad idam anyathā na jñāpitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15766: ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyād utpannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15769: saṃgatau saṃnipāte samavāye kāraṇe kāryopacāraḥ sparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15773: atibahuvistaeṇa prakāreṇa visartuṃ śīlam asyā iti atibahuvistaraprakāravisāriṇī.
T07yabhkvyu:15786: prathama āśrayeṇa prabhāvitaḥ pratighāśrayaḥ saṃsparśaḥ pratighasya vā saṃsparśaḥ pratighasaṃsparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15788: adhivacanād ālambanasaṃsparśaḥ adhivacane vā saṃsparśaḥ adhivacanasaṃsparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15789: vacanam adhikṛtya vacanam avadhāryārtheṣu rūpādiṣu manovijñānasya pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15790: na paṃcānāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vacanam adhikṛtyārtheṣu pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15791: atas tad evādhivacanaṃ manovijñānaṃ vacane pravartate 'dhivacanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15793: tena cāyaṃ dvitīyaḥ saṃsparśaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvita ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15800: vidyāhvaḥ avidyāhvaḥ tābhyām itaraś cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15803: naivavidyānāvidyā yā kuśalasāsravā yā cānivṛtāvyākṛtā prajñā.
T07yabhkvyu:15814: sukhaṃ yā vedyam asminn iti sukhavedyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15819: vedyate tad vedayituṃ vā śakyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15820: vedyata iti karmamātre kṛtya iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15821: vedayituṃ śakyam ity arhe kṛtyatṛcaś cety asminn arthe kṛtya iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15824: punaḥ pratighasaṃsparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśo vidyāsaṃsparśo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśo vyāpādasaṃsparśo 'nunayasaṃsparśaḥ sukhavedanīyo duḥkhavedanīyo 'duḥkhāsukhavedanīyaś ca sparśa iti ṣoḍaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:15836: pūrvaṃ laksaṇam uktam idānīṃ prakāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15838: jāte hi janye dharme dharmasya janakasya nāsti sāmarthyam sahotpannatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15840: pratijñāyā aviśiṣṭam etat sādhanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15846: asti sahotpannayor janyajanakabhāva iti pratijñā pūrvābhyupagamavirodhinīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15860: tadyathā pūrvaṃ bījaṃ paścād aṃkura ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:15861: tatrāpi [Tib.297a] pūrvam indriyārthau paścād vijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15862: prathamakṣaṇotpannāv indriyārthau vijñānaṃ tu dvitīye kṣaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15866: utpanna eva hy aṃkuraś chāyāṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:15867: na prathame kṣaṇe 'ṃkuro niśchāyo bhavati dvitīye sacchāya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15869: anayor api chāyāṃukurayoḥ pūrvasāmagrī hetur iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15870: sahabhūhetunirdeśe tv ayam artha ukta iti na punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15871: sparśād uttarakālaṃ vedanety apara iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15875: indriyārthakṣaṇaḥ prathamaḥ vijñānotpattikṣaṇo dvitīyo vedanotpattikṣaṇas tṛtīya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15884: tatsparśapūrvikāpy anyasminn ity evaṃ sarvatra vijñāne vedanā prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15886: te ca sparśāḥ savedanakā iti bhinnālambanayor iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15889: pūrvasya rūpam ālambanam uttarasya śabdaḥ tayor bhinnālambanayoḥ pūrvasparśahetukā rūpālambanasparśahetukā uttaratra sparśe śabdālambane yad
T07yabhkvyu:15892: anyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā rūpaprakārālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā anyālambanā bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:15895: yadā hi rūpālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā rūpālambanaiva vedanā bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:15897: yadā tu rūpālambanāt (Abhidh-k-vy 308) sparśāc chabdālambanā vedanotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15900: atha mataṃ rūpālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā śabdālambanasparśasaṃprayuktāpi rūpālambanā bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:15909: yady abhinnāśrayatvāt kathaṃ śrotrāśrayotpannā satī rūpālambanā bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:15914: yadi tāvad rūpālambanāt sparśād utpannā vedanā śabdādyālambanāntaram ālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:15915: sa rūpālambanaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyo yāvad aduḥkhāsukhavedanīya iti na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:15916: ekālambanayā tu vedanayā tathā nirdeśo yukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15923: tasmāc ca śabdālambanād yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tan na sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15925: anyathā hi yadi pūrvotpannaṃ savedanakaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15926: tadaivaṃ sparśapratyayā vedaneti yathokto doṣaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:15931: na hi sarvaḥ samanantarapratyayo vedanāpratyayaṃ sparśabhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ [Tib.298b] janayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:15932: tad evaṃ tasya bhinnālambanaṃ vijñānam ekāntenāvedanakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15934: yadi tu rūpālambanāc cakṣurvijñānād anantaraṃ rūpālambanam eva cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:15941: savitarkā savicārā kāmadhātuḥ prathamaṃ ca dhyānam.
T07yabhkvyu:15943: avitarkā avicārā dvitīyād dhyānāt prabhṛti yāvad bhavāgraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:15969: tadyathā vedanā sarvāsu bhūmiṣu bhavaty api na yugapat saṃjñācetanāsparśamanaskārādibhir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:15986: tatraiva pravicayo yogāyogavihito 'nyathā cety evamādiḥ paṃcaskaṃdhakagrantho draṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15993: kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtam ity evaṃ pāṭhaprasaṃgenāsaṃhitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:15996: prakaraṇapāde mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāś ceti caturvidhā paṭhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:16000: na tu sparśenety arthaparigraheṇa parihartavyaṃ sūtram ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16002: ayaṃ sahaśabdo nāvaśyaṃ yugapadbhāve samanaṃtare 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16003: na hi maitryāḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgasya ca samavadhānam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:16011: yā vedanā yā cetanā yā ca saṃjñeti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:16014: kiṃ tāvad ayam eṣāṃ vedanādīnāṃ ālambananiyamaḥ ālambane niyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16016: tad eva cetayate yāvad vijñānaṃ vijānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:16017: [Tib.300a] utāho kṣaṇaniyamaḥ yasminn eva kṣaṇe vedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:16023: tatraiva sūtre āyuruṣmaṇoḥ sāhabhāvye saṃsṛṣṭavacanāt siddhaḥ kṣaṇaniyama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16041: pūrvatrāsiddham iti sakāralopasyāsiddhatvād guṇo na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:16044: īṣatsiddham asiddham ity ataḥ siddhatvāt sakāralopasya guṇo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16047: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saunanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇi upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:16048: śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumnanasyasthānīyāṃ śabdān upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:16049: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya saumanasyasthānīyān [Tib.300b] dharmān upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:16050: evaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyasthānīyāny upekṣāsthānīyāni ceti vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16060: tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ viṣayaṣaṭkabhedāt ṣoḍhā bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16063: saṃprayogavyavasthāpanāyām asatyāṃ manopavicārā ity eva na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16065: rūpādiviṣayaṣaṭkālambanavyavasthāpanāyām asatyāṃ pratyekaṃ saumanasyādiṣodhābhedenāṣṭādaśa manopavicārā iti na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16072: ye tu rūpādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ dvau tṛīn [Tib.301a] yāvat ṣaḍ api viṣayān ālambante.
T07yabhkvyu:16076: manaḥ kila pratītyāśritya viṣayān upavicaranty ālambanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16079: vedanāvaśena manaso viṣayeṣu punaḥpunar vicāraṇād iti punaḥpunar ity upaśabdasyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16093: ataḥ paścād api tṛtīye dhyāne sukhendriyasya manaāśritatve 'pi manopavicāreṣv agrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16098: ataḥ sarvatra tat sukhaṃ na manopavicāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16102: [Tib.301b] paṃcabhir vijñānakāyair abhinirhṛtatvam utpāditatvam abhisaṃdhāya cetasikṛtvā etad uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:16108: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā yāvat kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭveti vacanād acodyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:16109: yadi cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyan saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇy upavicaratīty uktaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16112: na tv evam uktam ity acodyam evaitat.
T07yabhkvyu:16119: kāmadhātvālambanāś ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārā rūpadhātūpannasya na syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16124: yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā tatsahacarāṃ chandān upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:16133: eakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāṃ chandān upavicaratīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:16142: tad eva hy ālambanaṃ kasyacit saumanasyasthānīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16144: (III.33-35ab) evaṃ yāvad ārūpapratisaṃyuktā iti kati rūpapratisaṃyuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16152: sa eva ca kāmadhātuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣām ālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16153: svo dhātur ālambanam eṣām iti svālambanā iti kārikāpadavigrahaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:16156: rūpī dhātuḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ dvādaśānāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ gocaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16158: dvau gandharasāv ālambanau saumanasyopavicārau hitvā dvau gandharasālambanau daurmanasyopavicārau hitvā dvau tadālambanāv eva copekṣopavicārau
T07yabhkvyu:16165: trayāṇāṃ saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣādharmopavicārāṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇām uttaro dhātur ārūpyadhātur ālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16173: saumanasyopekṣopavicārau gandhālambanau dvau rasālambanau ca dvau hitvety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16179: ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārā eva santi nānya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16182: gandharasālambanau tu tatra kāmāvacaragandharasālambanāv ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16187: yeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena tad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmaṃtakaṃ [Tib.303a] vyavacchinnālambanaṃ pṛthakpṛthag rūpādyālambanam asamastālambanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16188: audārikādibhir ākārais tac caturthadhyānam ālambata iti ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matam.
T07yabhkvyu:16189: yeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena paripiṇḍitālambanam eva tad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmantakaṃ caturthadhyānabhūmikaskandhapaṃcakālambanam iti mataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16199: maulānām ārūpyāṇām adharo dhātur nālambanam adharabhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16212: tatra svabhūmyālambanā rūpaśabdaspraṣṭavyadharmālambanāḥ saumanasyopavicārāś catvāraḥ kliṣṭāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16215: adharabhūmyupapanno hy ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16227: ataḥ pūrvoktenaiva nyāyena na tābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16231: kāmadhātūpapanna eva lābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītasyāvītarāgaḥ kāmadhātoḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacarair aṣṭādaśabhir api samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16237: ato maulasaṃgṛhītair eva saumanasyopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ svabhūmyālambanaiś caturbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16241: na hi kliṣṭaṃ dhyānam adharālambanam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:16243: atrāviśeṣābhidhānād upekṣopavicāraiḥ [Tib.304a] kliṣṭair api caturbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sāmantakasaṃgṛhītaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16244: ṣaḍbhiś copekṣopavicāraiḥ kuśalaiḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 314) kāmadhātvālambanaiḥ svabhūmyālambanair api.
T07yabhkvyu:16247: sa eva kāmadhātāv upapanno lābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyāvītarāgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikair aṣṭābhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16255: prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī prathamadhyānabhūmikaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16258: lābhī dvitīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalacittasya tadbhūmyavītarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16267: dvitīyadhyānopapannas tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī [Tib.304a] dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16270: lābhī tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalacittasya tadbhūmyavītarāgaḥ sarvair dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16271: tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaiś caturbhir upekṣopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭair gandharasālambanāv apāsya.
T07yabhkvyu:16276: dhyāneṣūpapannasya svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikair upekṣopavicārair eva kliṣṭaiḥ kuśalaiś ca samanvāgamo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16281: na hi yo yasmād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16283: na sa tad rūpādy ālambanam upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:16297: yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16303: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā [Tib.305a] bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16315: arhato laukikaṃ kuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ dharmālambanaṃ dharmāyatanālambanam adhigamadharmālaṃbanaṃ vā saumanasyam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:16316: tasya hi buddhasāṃtānikāṃ guṇān saṃmukhīkurvataḥ kuśalam saumanasyam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16321: tasmāt sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādaya upavicārā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16326: sūtre hi bhagavatā na sāṃkleśikā evopavicārā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16328: tatra bhikṣavo ya ime ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16332: tatra bhikṣavo ya ime ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16343: na sāṃkleśikā eva saumanasyādaya upavicārā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16346: na hītareṇetarasya saṃniśrayaprahāṇavacane 'pi saty eṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ sāṃkleśikatvaṃ vinivartate.
T07yabhkvyu:16349: mānaṃ niśritya māna eva prahātavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16350: na tu jātu kvacin māno vyavadānikaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16351: tasmāt kleśānāṃ parasparavirodhena vṛtter vṛttyantarasya cāpekṣayā guṇavattvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16355: yad upekṣopavicārāṇām upekṣopavicārān eva prahāṇāya saṃniśrayatvena dideśa bhagavān.
T07yabhkvyu:16357: nanu ca gardhāśritanaiṣkramyāśritabhedena ṣaṭtriṃśac chāstṛpadānīti vacanāt siddham eṣāṃ sāṃkleśikavyavadānikatvaṃ vaibhāṣikamatānusārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16366: tadbhedasya teṣāṃ manopavicārānāṃ dvidhābhedasya (Abhidh-k-vy 316) śāstrā buddhena gamitatvād deśitatvād yathāsūtraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16368: kleśās trīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastv
T07yabhkvyu:16385: āhrīkyādibhis tv anyakleśasaṃprayuktaiḥ pratisaṃdhibaṃdho na pratiṣidhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16390: yas tu pudgalo yatra kleśe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ satataṃ caritaḥ pravṛttaḥ āsannaś ca maraṇakālasya pudgalasya.
T07yabhkvyu:16391: tadānīṃ maraṇakāle sa eva kleśaḥ samudācarati samutthāya mithyāḍrṣṭyādir api.
T07yabhkvyu:16394: atha vā yo 'sau tadānīṃ kleśa upatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:16402: anayor itarayor dhātvor bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ tu jñātaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16417: kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavaharaṇaṃ punar mukhena nāsikayā grāsavyavacchedād iti gandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanāni sarvāṇy eva kavaḍīkāra ity ukte pṛcchati chāyātapajvālāprabhāsu (Abhidh-k-vy 317) teṣāṃ gandhādīnāṃ katham āhāratvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16418: na hi tatratyānāṃ gaṃdhādīnāṃ kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavaharaṇam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:16420: na tatratyānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ kavaḍīkāratvam iti pratipadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16426: yāny api tu nābhyavahriyaṃte chāyādiṣu sthitiṃ cāharaṃti yāpanāṃ cāharaṃtī.
T07yabhkvyu:16429: yathā snānaṃ cābhyaṃgaś ca na kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavahriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16439: yasmin kāle antarmukhapraviṣṭa āhāro bhujyate cakṣurviṣayātītaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16440: tasmiṃ kāle svam indriyaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni ca tasyendriyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:16449: tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro na rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16453: muktānām anāgāmyarhatāṃ kavaḍīkārāhāravītarāgāṇāṃ sumanojñam apy āhāraṃ paśyatāṃ anugrahaṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16454: yathā gandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanāni indriyamahābhūtānām anugrahaṃ kurvanty abhyavahārakāle.
T07yabhkvyu:16455: tasmāt tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavatīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16462: sparśādayaḥ sāsravā anāsravāś ca saṃbhavantīti atas ta eva viśeṣitāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:16466: na caivaṃ te bhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai [Tib.307b] sambhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:16471: śuklaśoṇitādikaṃ kiṃcid bāhyam anupādāya bhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16480: asmāt sūtrāc catuṣkoṭikād abhinirvṛttir antarābhava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16481: asti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16483: asti yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ ca prahīṇaṃ upapattisaṃyojanaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:16489: tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yad āryayā prajñayā prahīṇam iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16495: [Tib.308a] pṛthagjanasya āryasya cāvītarāgasya kāmadhātuvītarāgasya rūpadhātāv upapadyamānasya ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:16519: punarbhavāya saṃvartata iti asya jñāpanārtham idaṃ sūtrapadam upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16523: mūlaṃ ca hetur iti anena kavaḍīkāro 'pi tadrāgiṇāṃ punarbhavāya saṃvartata iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16524: anye punar jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya ity etad evodāharaṇaṃ bruvate.
T07yabhkvyu:16525: asmāj janmanaḥ pareṇa jarāmaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16526: kavaḍīkāro 'pi bhūtānāṃ sattvānām ihasthitaya iti yuktaṃ pratyakṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16527: [Tib.308b] tathā sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo vijñānaṃ cānugrāhakam ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16531: ata eva manaḥsaṃcetanāgrahaṇena sparśavijñāne api gṛhīte bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16542: kathaṃ ca punas tayā punarbhava ākṣipyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16546: yaḥ kavaḍīkāraḥ sa āhāra iti praśne āha.
T07yabhkvyu:16555: evaṃ sparśādibhir api yathāyogaṃ catuṣkoṭikāni kartavyānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:16569: tṛtīyā yaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya indriyāṇām upacayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16573: prathamā koṭiḥ yad vijñānaṃ pratītyendriyāṇām apacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ paribhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16575: tṛtīyā yad vijñānaṃ pratītya indriyāṇām upacayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16578: syāt sparśādīn pratītyeti vistareṇa aparaḥ praśnaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16579: sparśādīn iti sparśacetanāvijñānadharmān iti evaṃ netavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16589: anyabhūmikān anāsravāṃś ca pratītyānāhāra ity ukte 'rthād etad uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16598: kāmadhātau [Tib.309b] paṃcānāṃ gatīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ ca yonīnāṃ sadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16603: mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhir iti asyā bādhāc catuṣkoṭikaṃ bādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16610: kavaḍīikārāhāraḥ katamaḥ yam kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇām upacayo bhavati vistareṇa yāvad vijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16620: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ ca pratihantuṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16624: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaś ca bāhyakānām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16634: yaś ca jambuṣaṇḍagatān pṛthagjanān iti vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16635: uktaṃ ca yaś caikaṃ jaṃbuṣaṇḍagatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16638: kim atrāścaryaṃ yad bahūṃ bhojayitvā bahu puṇyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16639: na tv alpīyasaḥ śatamātrān vītarāgān ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16649: bodhisattva eva tv eṣa jaṃbuṣaṇḍagata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16650: kṛṣigrāmakaṃ vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ sarvārthasiddho bodhisattvo jaṃbūvṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam utpāditavān.
T07yabhkvyu:16653: sa cāpi hi bodhisattvaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kāmavītarāgaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:16654: bāhyakāś ca tathaiva kāmavītarāgāḥ pṛthagjanāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:16655: anena sambandhena tebhyo bāhyakebhyo bahutareṇa dānaphalena viśiṣyamāṇa ity evam uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16661: yaś ca tiryagyonigatānāṃ śatāya dānaṃ dadyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16662: yaś caikasmai duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya [Tib.310b] dānaṃ dadyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16664: yāvad yaś ca bāhyakānām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16666: itthaṃ caitad evaṃ bodhisattva eva tv eṣa jambuṣaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16679: srotaāpattiphalapratipannakādibhyo viśiṣṭataratvād ato bodhisattva eva tv eṣa jaṃbuṣaṇḍagato yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16690: dhātubhūmivairāgyaṃ dhātuto bhūmito vā [Tib.311a] vairāgyaṃ manovijñāna eva.
T07yabhkvyu:16695: upapattir api viparyastamater bhavatīti manovijñāna eva yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16697: pratisaṃdhisāmānyād anukto 'py uktakalpa iti nocyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16702: itare hi vadane paṭvyāv iti sukhaduḥkhe.
T07yabhkvyu:16705: ataś cyuticittam upapatticittam vā na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16706: yadā tarhi rūpadhātāv eva mriyate upapadyate vā.
T07yabhkvyu:16707: tadā samāhitabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ tad bhaviṣyatīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:16713: na tad ābhisaṃskārikaṃ cyuticittam upapatticittaṃ vā yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:16725: so 'cittaka upakrantuṃ mārayituṃ na śakyate śastrādibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16728: śastreṇāgninā vopakramān nirodhasamāpattiṃ asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ vā samāpannasya asaṃjñisamāpatter vipāke sthitasya vipākāvedhaparisamāpter avaśyam asya tadānīm āśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ āśraye bījabhāvenāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:16736: yadā cāśrayo vipariṇaṃtum anyathātvam āpattum ārabheta.
T07yabhkvyu:16737: avaśyam asya pudgalasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ bījabhāvenāvasthitaṃ cittaṃ sammukhībhūya samudācarya pariṇantum ārabheta.
T07yabhkvyu:16739: atha vā saṃmukhībhūyeti saṃmukhībhāvyety arthe ṇilopāt.
T07yabhkvyu:16748: na ca cittam antareṇa kleśāḥ kadācid api bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:16777: na etāvad evāvyākṛtam iṣyata iti vyākhyātam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:16787: arūpitvād adeśasthaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ teṣu nirudhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16790: teṣu pādādiṣu kāyendriyapratibaddhavṛtti hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātau ca vijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16791: [Tib.312b] teṣām api hṛdaye vijñānaṃ nirudhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16795: pādaś ca nābhiś ca hṛdaye ceti
T07yabhkvyu:16798: adhogaś ca nṛgaś ca suragaś ca ajagaś cety eto 'pi catvāro 'rthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16801: na tu punas tāni kāṣṭhānīva cchidyante.
T07yabhkvyu:16804: chinnavad vā na punaś ceṣṭanta iti chinnānīty ucyaṃte iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16805: chinnāṃgapratyaṃgavat na punaś ceṣṭaṃta iti chinnānīty ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:16815: tisro bhājanasaṃvartanyaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanī apsaṃvartanī vāyusaṃvartanī ca.
T07yabhkvyu:16816: tāsāṃ ca sādharmyeṇa aptejovāyudhātūnām anyatameneti vistareṇoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16820: na tv ātyaṃtika iti te na ārād yātā eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:16821: te hi mithyātve 'pi niyatā bhaveyur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16824: [Tib.313a] na ca te mokṣabhāgīyalābhinaḥ kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16846: yathā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ cānnaṃ ca yathāsaṃkhyena nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayaṃ patati.
T07yabhkvyu:16853: atha vā śarasya bhāvaḥ śarībhāvaḥ strīprayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16856: śeṣaṃ trayo lakṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16857: viṃśatisahasrottarāṇām ekādaśānāṃ lakṣāṇām aṣṭāv apanīya etāvac cheṣaṃ bhavati.
