T07yabhkvyu:16869: yad asya tiryakpramāṇasya triguṇam eva samantaparikṣiptasya pramāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16919: pītaṃ na bādhate kukṣiṃ na kaṇṭhaṃ kṣiṇoti taj jalam
T07yabhkvyu:16921: pārśvatas tu triguṇo bhavati yugaṃdharatīreṇa gaṇyamāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16922: sa ābhyaṃtaraḥ samudro yugaṃdharapārśvenāyāṃataḥ saṃkhyāyamānas triguṇa iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:16924: aśītir ekā tadubhayataś cetarayor diśos tatsīmānadīvaipulyayogena apare dve aśītīti tisro 'śītayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16927: nimindharagiricakravāḍayor aṃtare ekasyāṃ diśi bāhyasya samudrasya tatparimāṇam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16928: atra sahasram ekaṃ dve śate cānye ardhāṣṭāśītir eveti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:16931: evaṃ dvayoḥ sahasrayoḥ paṃcasu śateṣu paṃcasaptatau ca yojanānāṃ prakṣipteṣu sa ādhāraḥ pūrito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:16940: na tarhi caturdvīpakaḥ tena cakravāḍena cakrīkṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:16949: atas [Tib.314b] taistaiḥ kiṃcidatiricyamānair adhobhāgais tad ādheyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 326) sumervādikaṃ ādhāraṃ jalakāṃcanamaṇḍalātmakam vyāpnotīty avirodha eṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16951: na bodhisattvāśrayād anya āśrayo vajrāsanapradeśād vānyaḥ pradeśas taṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ soḍhuṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:16985: utkṣipte pāde punar api saṃjāyate tvaṅmānsaśoṇitam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17002: tenāhā narakāvarodhād avīcyādinarakāvarodhāt ūrdhvam eṣu kukūlādiṣu sīdanti.
T07yabhkvyu:17007: yasyāṃ te sattvāḥ asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣair ubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇād ūrdhvam api gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17010: vivartanīvāyuvad iti yathā vivartanyāṃ vāyavo bhājanalokābhinirvṛttaye ceṣṭante.
T07yabhkvyu:17014: pāpakarmāṇaḥ sattvā narakapālā jāyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17019: na tu ye kāraṇā yātanāḥ kārayaṃti asiśaktiprāsahastādayaḥ [Tib.315b].
T07yabhkvyu:17024: teṣu narakeṣu teṣāṃ narakapālānāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17026: teṣām api tāvad ānantaryakāriṇāṃ mahadānantaryakarmaṇo vipākasyātimahato narakeṣv avakāśo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:17027: kim aṃga punar narakapālānāṃ yat karma tatkāraṇāḥ kārayatām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17034: kāyavikārānurūpāṇi arbudo nirbuda utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaś ceti nāmāni.
T07yabhkvyu:17036: śabdavikārānurūpāṇi aṭhaṭhaḥ hahavaḥ huhuva ity etāni nāmāni.
T07yabhkvyu:17042: tadubhayamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ deśakālāvasthāntarānurūpyeṇa anugrahārtham upaghātārthaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:17046: tadā jaṃbūdvīpe [Tib.316a] sūryāstaṃgamanam avaragodānīye madhyāhnaḥ uttarakurāv udaya ity evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17056: (Abhidh-k-vy 328) aparapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17060: dūre hi vartamāne pradīpe paripūrṇastaṃbho dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17061: kiṃcid āsanne kiṃcit kṣīyate yāvad āsanne staṃbho naṣṭarūpo vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:17077: sadāmattā iti vaktavye ślokabandhānuguṇyena sadāmadā ity uktam arthaikatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17084: yasmāc caturthyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ catvāro mahārājānaḥ svayaṃ prativasaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:17085: ata evam uktaṃ mahārājikā devā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17086: mahārājeṣu bhavā iti kṛtvā mahiṣṭho mahattamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17092: madhyabhāgam evābhisamīkṣyaivam uktam iti teṣām abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17124: taṃ kovidāravṛkṣam anatikramya sa gandho vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:17125: tasya paṃcāśadyojanāni śākhāpattrapalāśam iti evaṃ vṛkṣānatikramaṃ saṃdhāyoktaṃ paṃcāśadyojanāni prativātaṃ gandho vātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17127: na hi nāma prativātaṃ vāto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17135: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yojanaśatam atra vātaṃ gaṃdho vāti prativātaṃ tu paṃcāśat.
T07yabhkvyu:17139: tataś ca sa gandhasaṃtāna āśv eva samucchidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17140: ataḥ kāraṇāt na tathā viprakṛṣṭam adhvānaṃ yojanaśatapramāṇaṃ prasarpatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17142: yathā tileṣu puṣpagaṃdhād gandhāntaram utpadyate 'nyad eva na sa pauṣpo gandha ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:17155: (III.70cd) dvaṃdvena [Tib.317b] yāvad īkṣitena maithunam eṣām iti
T07yabhkvyu:17161: tāvatā kālena eṣāṃ bhūmisambandhavāsināṃ yāmatuṣitanirmāṇaratiparanirmitavaśavartināṃ yathākramaṃ dvaṃdvasamāpattir (Abhidh-k-vy 330) iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17163: yāvadyāvat pareṇa paratareṇa viṣayāṇāṃ tīvrataratvāt rāgo 'pi tīvrataraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17182: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitāṃ kāmān paribhoktuṃ na samṛdhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:17183: tad evaṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ nirmāṇaratibhyo [Tib.318a] viśeṣaḥ pradarśito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17196: sukhābhāvān na dhyānāntaraṃ sukhopapattir iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17197: kuśalavipākatvena sukhakalpatvāt sukhopapattir iti na śakyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17201: tasmād vicāryaṃ saṃpradhāryam etad iti bhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17217: [Tib.318b] yathā śabda ity etad api gamyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17230: mahato lokadhātoś cūḍābhūtatvāt cūlika ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17236: tasmiṃ hi kāle sattvā ekasmin dhyāne dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe vā saṃvartante saṃgacchanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17237: vivartate ca saṃvṛtta āste saṃvartate samam
T07yabhkvyu:17245: pūrvo goda uttara iti cāhvaya eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17248: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ aṣṭahastapramāṇāḥ pūrvavidehakāḥ ṣoḍaśahastapramāṇāḥ godānīyāḥ dvātriṃśaddhastapramāṇakā auttarakauravā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17252: iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt pāda iti krośasyeti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17262: yatheha kumudāni ahani saṃkucanti rātrau vikasanti.
T07yabhkvyu:17264: tathā tatra keṣāṃcid eva puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocād ahani ca vikāsād ahorātravyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17276: evam teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭir aśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuḥpramāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17283: tasya mahākalpārdhasya kalpīkṛtasya yad ardhaṃ viṃśatir antarakalpāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17288: sa hy adhyardhaḥ kalpa ity ucyate ṣaṣṭyantarakalpasaṃkhyā.
T07yabhkvyu:17290: ādiśabdena brahmapurohitānāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ ca prātilomyena grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17299: evaṃ yāvad yat paranirmitavaśavartinām āyuḥpramāṇam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17306: tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakeneti tena tatratyenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādśamāsakena samvatsareṇa tatratyāni divyāni paṃca varṣaśatāny āyur ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:17307: evam anyeṣv api yathāyogaṃ yojyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17313: aṣṭāv ime bhikṣavaḥ nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇiṃdharāḥ apratyuddhāryāḥ suparṇinaḥ pakṣirājasya devāsuram api [Tib.320a] saṃgrāmam anubhavanty api pratyanubhavanty api.
T07yabhkvyu:17315: tadyathā nando nāgarājaḥ upanando nāgarājaḥ aśvatarī nāgarājaḥ mucilindo nāgarājaḥ manasvī nāgarājaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭro nāgarājo mahākālo nāgarāja elapattro nāgarāja iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17319: caramabhavikasyeti antyajanmanaḥ, yena tasminn eva janmani arhattvaṃ sākṣāt (Abhidh-k-vy 333) kartavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:17320: tasya nāsty antareṇa kālakriyā yāvad arhattvaṃ na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:17321: śraddhānusāridharmānusāriṇoḥ nāsty antareṇa kālakriyā yāvac chraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau na bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17324: tanmātror nāsty antareṇa kālakriyā yāvan na tau jāyete.
T07yabhkvyu:17326: ādiśabdena nirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattisamāpannānāṃ maitryādisamāpannānāṃ ca nāsty antareṇa kālakriyā yāvat tasmāt samādher na vyuttiṣṭhante.
T07yabhkvyu:17333: yathā varṣā ity ekasminn apy arthe bahuvacanaṃ prasiddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17335: pravacane traya eva rtavo na yathā loke ṣaḍ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17336: śiśiro hi śītasāmānyād dhemanta ity uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17338: śarad api vṛṣṭisāmānyād [Tib.320b] varṣā ity ukteti.
T07yabhkvyu:17356: evaṃ māghe phālgunārdhe 'tikrānte śeṣe 'rdhamāse phālgunāvaśiṣṭe punar apara ūnarātro nipātyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17357: tathā grīṣmeṣu vaiśākhakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ āṣāḍhacaturdaśyāṃ cāparāv ūnarātrau nipātyete.
T07yabhkvyu:17358: varṣeṣv api bhādrapadakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ kārttikakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ cāparāv ūnarātrau nipātyete.
T07yabhkvyu:17360: narakādyāḥ paṃca gatayo gatyekadeśe devagatau saṃvartante.
T07yabhkvyu:17365: yadā sattvā eva samvartante dhyāneṣv ekasthībhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:17369: yadā bhājanāny eva samvartante na tu sattvāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17372: yad ayaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 334) loko viṃśatim antarakalpān vivṛtto jātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17375: tat pratipannaṃ vaktavyam iti tat saṃvartanam ārabdhaṃ vaktavyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17379: yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ tiryagvedanīyaṃ karma dhriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17381: evaṃ pretasaṃvartanī yojyā yadā preteṣv iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:17386: dharmatā nāma kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadānīṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17392: sa kālo yad uttarakurau manuṣyāś cyavanta eva nopapadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:17403: brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahad arciḥ paraiti [Tib.321b] gacchatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17407: na hi visabhāgā visadṛśāḥ apakṣālā upadravāḥ agnyādayaḥ kramante tāpayanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17410: tasmād eva ceti vistareṇety ata ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17412: tena kāmāvacareṇārciṣā sambaddhaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ rūpāvacaram arciḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17416: yathā tejaḥsamvartanyām uktam evam anyasyām apy apsaṃvartanyāṃ vāyuṣaṃvartanyāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17418: narakādisaṃvartanīṃ pūrvavad uktvā yāvad iyatāyaṃ lokaḥ samvṛtto bhavati sattvasamvartanyā.
T07yabhkvyu:17420: yas taṃ bhājanalokaṃ lavaṇam iva vilopayati.
T07yabhkvyu:17423: sa cābdhātus tribhūmiko 'pi svenasvena bhājanena sahāntardhīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17424: evaṃ vāyusaṃvartanyāṃ sahajo vāyuḥ saṃbhavatīti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17426: pūrvavad uktvā yāvat sahajo vāyudhātuḥ saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17427: yas taṃ bhājanalokaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ yāvat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ krameṇa pāṃsurāśim iva (Abhidh-k-vy 335) vikarati vidhvaṃsayati.
T07yabhkvyu:17430: tathā hi samvṛtto loka iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17434: tadā prabhṛti yad ayaṃ loko viṃśatim antarakalpān saṃvṛtto 'sthāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17439: yathoktena krameṇa vidhānena ca sarvaṃ jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17440: yathoktaḥ kramo vāyumaṇḍalaṃ apmaṇḍalam tataḥ kāṃcanamayī pṛthivī tataḥ sumervādayaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:17441: yathoktaṃ vidhānaṃ yasya yad vidhānam uktaṃ āyāmodvedhapariṇāhasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17449: yāvacchabdena brahmavimānānantaraṃ paranirmitavaśavartivimānaṃ tadanaṃtaraṃ nirmāṇarativimānaṃ tato 'nantaraṃ yāvad yāmīyaṃ vimānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17451: yad uta bhājanavivartanyeti na sattvavivartanyeti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:17452: śūnye brāhme vimāne utpadyata iti mahābrahmā.
T07yabhkvyu:17457: tad vivartanaṃ lokasya parisamāptaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17461: eko 'ntarakalpo brahmalokavimānādibhājananirvṛttyātikrānta iti ekonaviṃśatir avaśiṣṭā antarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ atikrāmanti ā narakasattvaprādurbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17465: aparimitāyuṣām eva hrasatāṃ yāvad daśavarṣāyuṣām eko vivṛttavasthāntarakalpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17480: aṣṭau sthānāni kvāpi pradeśe pramuṣitatvāt na paṭhitāni.
T07yabhkvyu:17483: tāny aṣṭakāni svayaṃ kānicin nāmāni kṛtvā paṭhitavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:17493: nāsti saṃkhyāpareṇaiṣv iti asaṃkhyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ kalpāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17494: asaṃkhyāś cāsaṃkhyāś ca asaṃkhyāś ceti asaṃkhyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17507: ātmasnehaṃ tebhyaḥ svāsāṃtānikebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyo nivartya apekṣāṃ karuṇālakṣaṇāṃ vardhayitvā taddhetor apekṣāhetor duḥkhāny udvahantīti saṃbhāvyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:17509: pratyekabuddhaḥ śrāvako duḥkhanivṛttim eva mokṣam eva prārthayate.
T07yabhkvyu:17514: yasmāt tat sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhasthānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17532: ata eva sukhaṃ dviprakāraṃ prārthayata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17536: varṣaśate 'py utsadā na tv abhyutsadā yathādhastāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17552: kāmasukhalīnateti vā kāmatṛṣṇā vā kāmasukhallikā yayā kāmasukhe sajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17558: kāmasukhallikānuyogam ātmaklamathānuyogaṃ vādhikṛtyārabhya kleśadṛṣṭikaṣāyābhyāṃ kuśalapakṣavipattir bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17563: yathākramaṃ kāmapradhānā gṛhiṇaḥ dṛṣṭipradhānāḥ pravrajitā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17568: tasmād utkarṣe 'pi teṣām utpattir na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17569: ye hi utpāditasrotaāpattiphalasakṛdāgāmiphalāḥ aṃtarhite buddhaśāsane svayam arhattvam adhigacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:17571: te ca pūrvabuddhotpādakāla eva prākṛtasamvegatvān na punaḥ samvejanīyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17574: na cāryās santaḥ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyerann [Tib.324a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17579: evaṃ te gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ anyaiś ca pratyekabuddhair asaṃsṛṣṭavihāriṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17585: mahākalpānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 338) śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu śīlasamādhiprajñālakṣaṇeṣu caritaḥ kṛtaprayoga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17588: tathāpi taiḥ praṇidhijñānena pūrvabuddhānām anuśāsanam anusmṛtya dharmo deśayituṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17596: tasmāl lokottaravītarāgā api saṃbhaveyur ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17597: yady ete na hetavo dharmadeśanāyā akaraṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:17602: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaprasaṃgaparihārārthaṃ ca notsahante gaṃbhīradharmagrahaṇāya pareṣāṃ vyāpartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17603: tathā vyāpāre hi sati gaṇaḥ parikraṣṭavyaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17615: anāgate 'py adhvani saṃbhavāt yugapad dvayor iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17620: atha vā samaiḥ sarvasattveṣu buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ sama iti samasamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17632: ekacāturdvīpakaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ vā lokadhātum adhikṛtyaitad uktam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17634: asthānam anavakāśo yad apūrvacaramau dvau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātām iti nānena vacanena lokadhātvantarotpādapratiṣedhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17638: asthānam anavakāśo yad apūrvacaramau dvau cakravartinau loka utpadyeyātām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17646: tatsaṃbaddhasya tatsaṃbandhena vā samvartanaṃ tasmai hitaṃ tadanukūlaṃ tatsambaddhasamvartanīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17651: sa ca kuśalavipākaś cakravartina evety avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17657: rūpāvacarā ivāsann ity asyārthasya pratipādanāya sūtram ānayati.
T07yabhkvyu:17673: ayoniśomanaskārasya grāhabhūtasya grāsatāṃ gatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāma eva grahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17694: kim ekasya daśavarṣāyuḥkalpasya trīṇi niryāṇāni krameṇa bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:17700: pūrvaṃ durbhikṣaṃ tadanantaro rogaḥ tadanaṃtaraṃ śastram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17701: pūrvakas tu pakṣa iṣṭa iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17711: tadā dvayor dvīpayoḥ pūrvavidehāvaragodānīyayor vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17721: rūpāvacaro vāyur avinaṣṭaḥ kāmāvacarasya vivartakāle prathamakṣaṇotpannasya vāyor nimittaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17726: yady apy āhriyante bījāni na te sthūlabhāvānāṃ bījādibhyo bījāṃkuragaṇḍādibhyo 'ṃkurādīnām aṃkurakāṇḍādīnām utpattim icchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:17727: bījādīni hi teṣāṃ nimittakāraṇāni na samavāyikāraṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:17734: teṣām api svebhya eveti evaṃ yāvat paramāṇubhyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17736: na janane bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kiṃcid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:17737: aṃkurādiparamāṇūpasarpaṇāt tu teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iṣyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17741: yathā bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaniyamān na aniyamo bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:17744: atha ca na yataḥ kutaścid gandharasāder vijātīyād utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17746: tathā pākajā rūpādayo vijātīyād agnyāder utpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:17747: atha ca na yataḥ kutaścid vijātīyāc cakṣurāder utpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:17750: citro vai guṇadharmaḥ svajātīyebhyo vijātīyebhyaś cotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17754: tad evaṃ guṇadharmo dravyadharmaṃ prati anudāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17755: ta eva hi te tatheti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17756: vīraṇādaya eva hi te tathā tena prakāreṇa kaṭādirūpeṇa saṃniviṣṭā vyavasthitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17760: tathā saṃniviṣṭāḥ paṃktir iti saṃjñāṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:17761: na ca tābhyo 'nyat paṃktidravyam asti bhavatām api siddhānte.
T07yabhkvyu:17762: kathaṃ gamyate tāni vīraṇādīni tathāsaṃniviṣṭāni kaṭādisaṃjñāṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:17766: ārabdhakārye hy ekasmiṃ taṃtau cakṣuḥsaṃsparśābhyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 341) [Tib.327a] saṃyukte bhavanmatena paṭo 'pi ca tābhyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭa iti asāv api tathaivopalabhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17770: ko hi tadā sato vidyamānasya paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17772: tasmān na paṭo nāma dravyāntaram astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17774: ekaikasmin tantau pradeśena paṭo vartate na sarvātmanā vartata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17777: akṛtsnavṛttau paṭasya kalpamānāyāṃ paṭabhāgo 'traikaikasmin tantau syān na paṭas tataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17780: samūhamātraṃ ca paṭaḥ syād iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:17781: ekasmin tantāv eko bhāgo aparasminn apara iti tantuvartināṃ bahūnāṃ bhāgānāṃ samudāyaḥ paṭa iti ca prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:17784: kaṇabhugbhaktāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ yena bhāgenāyam indriyasaṃnikṛṣṭe tantau varteta.
T07yabhkvyu:17785: tasmād etām api kalpanāṃ kalpayitvā nāto 'nyaḥ paṭaḥ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:17790: ato 'nekāśrayasaṃyogāpekṣāyām upalabdhau kalpyamānāyāṃ daśāmātrasaṃghāte gṛhyamāṇe paṭa upalabhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17794: naiva tadānīm apīndriyeṇa madhyādibhāgāḥ saṃprayujyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17800: [Tib.327b] naiva hi saṃbhavo 'sti yat tadāraṃbhakāḥ madhyaparabhāgāḥ sarva evendriyeṇa saṃnikṛṣyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:17801: tathā ca sati tantvādiṣv apy eṣa prasaṃga iti na ca kiṃcid api kāryam upalabhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17803: yadā krameṇa cakṣuḥ saṃsparśanendriyaṃ vā paṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17806: evam anyeṣām api avayavānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17809: tasmād avayaveṣv eva paṭāvayaveṣu kaṭāvayaveṣu vā tadbuddhiḥ paṭabuddhiḥ kaṭabuddhir vā vikalpavaśād bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17822: kīdṛśaṃ tatra rūpaṃ bhavatu (Abhidh-k-vy 342) jātiḥ kriyā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:17823: syād eṣā buddhiḥ citram asya rūpādīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17824: tad evaṃ citrarūpāditve kalpyamāne vijātīyāraṃbho 'pi syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17828: avicitre ca pārśvāntare ekapārśvavicitrasya paṭasyādarśanaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17833: cittrarūpadarśanaṃ vā acitre pārśve syāt yadi paṭo dṛśyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17836: ekaṃ tad dravyaṃ vicitrakriyam iti na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17837: kriyāvaicitrye hi kriyāvad abhimatānāṃ dravyāṇām anyatvam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17839: agniprabhālakṣaṇasya avayavina ādimadhyānteṣu āraṃbhakeṣu tāpaprakāśabhede sparśanabhedo dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17840: sa ca tadbhedas tatra yathākramaṃ tīvramadhyamandatā.
T07yabhkvyu:17842: na hy ekasyāvayavina anekaṃ rūpaṃ sparśo vā yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17847: na ca tair avayavaiḥ aindriyaka ārabdha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17850: tasmād atīndriyaiḥ paramāṇubhir arthāntaram anyad aindriyakam ārabdham iti siddham ity atrocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17852: yathā bhavatāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇām atīndriyatve 'pi samastānāṃ kāryāraṃbhakatvaṃ na vyastānām.
T07yabhkvyu:17853: evam asmākam api samastānām eva pratyakṣatvaṃ na vyastānāṃ asaty apy avayavini arthāntarabhūte.
T07yabhkvyu:17854: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣūrūpālokamanaskārāṇāṃ samastānāṃ cakṣurvijñānotpattau kāraṇatvaṃ naikaikasya.
T07yabhkvyu:17855: evaṃ paramāṇūnām atīndriyatve 'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ naikaikasya.
T07yabhkvyu:17856: taimirikāṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ vikīrṇānām asaṃyuktānāṃ keśānāṃ samūha upalabhyate anārabdhe 'py avayavini.
T07yabhkvyu:17860: tad evam avayavinaṃ pratiṣidhya rūpādibhyo guṃebhyaḥ arthāntaraṃ guṇināṃ pratiṣeddhukāma āha.
T07yabhkvyu:17868: aprayuktam (Abhidh-k-vy 343) asyānyatvaṃ yasmān na kenacit paricchidyante imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi.
T07yabhkvyu:17869: ime eṣāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ rūpādayo rūparasagandhasparśā guṇā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17870: brūyāt atīndriyāṇi tāny ato na nirdhāryanta [Tib.329a] ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:17871: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca tāni pṛthyvyādīni pratijñāyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17873: ūrṇādīny avayavidravyāṇi na dahyanta iti pailukāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17875: prāktanaguṇanivṛttau pākajaguṇotpattau tadāśrayās tu dravyāṇi tadavasthānāny eva bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:17879: rūpādiṣv eva tadbhuddhir na dravye arthāntarabhūta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17880: yadi hi ūrṇādidravyaṃ rūpādibhyo 'nyat syāt tat tadavasthānaṃ bhavatīti rūpādīny evāgnisaṃbandhād uṣṇena niruddhānīty ūrṇādibuddhiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17884: yadi rūpādimātraṃ ghaṭaḥ syād agnisaṃbandhād rūpādīni pākajādīny anyāny utpadyanta iti sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa iti na parijñāyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:17885: yasya tu pākād rūpādīny evotpadyante nirudhyante ceti sa eva ghaṭas tadavasthāno bhavatīti tasya tatparijñānaṃ yujyata ity ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17890: yathā na vas tat pipīlikānāṃ tadvyatiriktaṃ paṃktidravyaṃ nāmāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:17891: atha ca pūrvapaṃktisaṃsthānasāmānyād anyasyām iti tatparijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17895: saṃsthānasāmānyāt parijñānaṃ na tu tādavasthyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17898: yasmāt khaṇḍanimnonnatādicihnam apaśyatas tatparijñānaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:17910: pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya (Abhidh-k-vy 344) viharatīti
T07yabhkvyu:17913: vitarkavicārau cāsū ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17916: ejṛ kampana ity asya dhātor etad rūpam ānejyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17919: na taiḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikaiḥ śakyam ārūpyān praveṣṭuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17925: yathoktena saptānāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ anantaram adbhiḥ saṃvartanī bhavaty ekā.
T07yabhkvyu:17926: punaḥ saptānāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnām anaṃtaram adbhiḥ [Tib.330a] saṃvartanī bhavati dvitīyā.
T07yabhkvyu:17932: tato 'pi bahutareṇa vāyusaṃvartanīty ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:17934: yathā prathamadhyānāt dvitīyadhyānasamāpattiviśeṣāt ātmabhāvānāṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikānāṃ sthitiviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17940: evaṃ dvitīyād api tṛtīyadhyānasya viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:17942: yasmād aṣṭakṛtvas tejaḥsaṃvartanīsaptakā iti ṣaṭpaṃcāśat tejaḥsaṃvartanyo bhavanti saptāpsaṃvartanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvartanīti catuḥṣaṣṭisaṃvartanyo
T07yabhkvyu:17943: tasmād yad uktaṃ prajñaptibhāṣye catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānām āyuhpramāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17953: iyatā hi kālena teṣām āyuṣah parisamāptir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17954: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyāṃ sphuṭarthāyām abhidharmakośe vyākhyāyāṃ tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:17963: atha kasmāt teṣām āśrayā ramyā na bhavanti [Tib.2a] bhogās tu ramyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:17965: āśrayaramyatve hi kasya pratīkārasya viṣayopabhogaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:17991: kṣaṇasyānantarakṣaṇa [Tib.3a] iti nairuktena vidhinā ātmalābho 'nantaravināśī kṣaṇaśabdenābhidhīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18005: dṛṣṭo vai kāṣṭhādīnām iti vistaraḥ [Tib.3b] ādiśabdena (Abhidh-k-vy 346) rūpādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18009: na ca dṛṣṭād gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18010: na pratyakṣād gurutamaṃ pramāṇam astīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18012: kathaṃ tāvad bhavān yāvan manyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18013: na hi kāṣṭhādivināśo rūpādivat pratyakṣata upalabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18025: na hi yasyāpāte [Tib.4a] yo vināśo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18030: sa hi utpannapradhvaṃsitatvāt svayaṃ vinaṣṭaḥ pradīpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18045: atrāhetuko vināśa ity etasminn arthe kim anumānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18062: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18068: pūrvā buddhir uttarayā buddhyā utpannayā vināśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18069: anyā tu buddhiḥ pūrvayā buddhyā vināśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18076: na hy asantaṃ nāśyaṃ hetur vināśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18079: na hi saṃśayaniścayajñānayor yuktasamavadhānam iti (Abhidh-k-vy 347) vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18085: evaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayoś cāsamavadhānam iti yojayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18087: evam [Tib.5a] aviruddhayor api jñānayor asamavadhānaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18092: na hi durbalasamānajātīyo balavantaṃ hiṃsan dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18099: na hy abhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavitum arhatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18107: atha vā kṣaṇa eva kṣaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18109: vṛttilābhapratibandhau vṛttilābho vṛttipratibandhaś ca kṣaṇekṣaṇe bhavituṃ nārhataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18111: yasyārciṣaḥ utpattāv anugraho bhavati caitrasya maitrasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:18112: tasya dharma utpalabdhavṛttiḥ tad utpādayatīty evam utpādahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18119: yadi tadvināśas tasyāpy apakāraṃ karoti andhakārāvasthāyām.
T07yabhkvyu:18120: iti tayor vṛttilābhād arciṣām utpattir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18121: na ca vṛttilābhaṃ tayor apratibadhya tābhyām eva tasminn eva kṣaṇe teṣāṃ vināśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18124: dharmādharmavināśa iti kāraṇaparikalpaḥ sarvatra saṃskṛte dvyaṇukādau anityeṣu rūpādiṣu karmaṇi ca śakyate kartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18130: yadi agnisaṃyogaḥ śyāmatāṃ ghaṭasya nivartya raktatāṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18131: sa eva raktatāṃ nivartya raktataratāṃ janayatīti kalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18133: atha jvālānāṃ kṣaṇikatvād anyas tatsaṃyogo janako 'nyo 'pi vināśaka iti kalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18136: jvālāntareṣu ca tāvad dhetubhede 'pi parikalpanāṃ parikalpayeyuḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18140: kṣārayāvadbhūmisambandhāt tu pākajaviśeṣotpattau kāṃ kalpanāṃ kalpayeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18145: kathaṃ tarhy āpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18148: yasya prabhāvād apāṃ saṃhātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18151: yāvad atikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti.
T07yabhkvyu:18152: kāryaṃ karoti na tv abhāvaṃ karotīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18157: yathā tṛṇajvālāyāḥ kṣaṇikatve 'pi deśantareṣu nirantarotpattau gatyabhimānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18162: avidyamānagatayo deśāntare nirantaram utpadyamānā rūpādayo bhāvāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18172: ūrdhvaikadiṅmukhe bhūyasi utpanna unnatam iti prajñapyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18182: dvābhyām asaya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyād ity ukte vaibhāṣiko brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18187: ato na dvābhyām asya grahaṇaṃ prāpnotīty ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18200: yathāgnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāgner uṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18202: puṣpasya ca caṃpakasya ca gandhaṃ ghrātvā tadvarṇe 'pi smṛtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18206: yuktam atrāgnāv avyabhicārāt uṣṇatāyāś ca varṇasya ca.
T07yabhkvyu:18210: na tu kiṃcit spraṣṭavyaṃ ślakṣṇatvādi kvacid iti saṃsthāne dīrghādau niyataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18211: yato 'tra saṃsthāne spraṣṭavyaṃ spṛṣṭvā samaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18216: na tu yatra ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ vā tatra dīrghatvena hrasvatvena vā bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18217: tasmād taduṣṇatārūpayor niyamena yujyate saṃsthāne tu niyamena smaraṇaṃ na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:18218: tathāsaty api sāhacaryaniyame spraṣṭavyasaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthāne smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18220: tad evaṃ spraṣṭavyaṃ spṛṣṭvā smared ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18221: athāniyamena varṇasmaraṇaṃ bhavati varṇavad vā saṃsthāne 'py aniyamena syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18225: varṇe hy aniyamena smaraṇaṃ bhavati spraṣṭavyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18226: kadācid rakte pītam iti pīte [Tib.7b] raktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18229: yathā varne saṃsmaraṇaṃ na niyamena bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18233: saṃsthāne punar niyamenety ayuktam asya saṃsthānasya spraṣṭavyāt smaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18234: kathaṃ tarhi dīrghabuddhir hrasvabuddhir vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18236: ekadiṅmukhe bhūyasi varṇe vā spraṣṭavye vā gṛhyamāṇe dīrghavikalpabuddhir alpīyasi hrasvavikalpabuddhir ity evamādy avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18238: citrāntareṇa vānekavarṇasaṃsthāne bahubhiḥ prakārair dṛśyamānenānekasaṃsthānaṃ dṛśyate dīrghādi.
T07yabhkvyu:18243: yathā hi varṇaḥ sapratighatvād ekadeśo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18245: tathā ca sati dravyato 'sti saṃsthānam iti sapakṣālaḥ pakṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18249: na caivam aṇau saṃsthānaṃ dīrghādi vidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18253: dīrghaṃ hi daṇḍam upalabhya tasminn evāpacīyamāne dīrghabuddhir na nivartet.
T07yabhkvyu:18254: na hi nīlādidravyam upalabhyapacīyamāne tasmin pītabuddhir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18261: saṃsṭhānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā ekadiṅmukhādikrameṇa dīrghādisaṃjñā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18262: na hy atatsvabhāvāḥ tathā saṃniviṣṭhāḥ samānās tāṃ saṃjñām upalabdhum arhatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18263: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18266: na caivaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇavaḥ pratyavayavaṃ dīrghāditvato gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:18270: varṇādiparamāṇava eva saṃniveśaviśeṣā dīrghādibuddhihetavo bhavantīti kiṃ neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18280: teṣāṃ ca paṃktir ity asmin deśe 'nyādṛśy anyasminn anyādṛśī.
T07yabhkvyu:18284: yat tarhi tamasi varṇam apaśyaṃtaḥ sthāṇupuruṣahastyādīnāṃ dīrghahrasvatva parimaṇḍalādīni paśyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18286: yadi tarhi varṇāj jātyantaraṃ saṃsthānaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18287: yathā varṇaṃ nīlaṃ pītam iti vā na paśyanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18288: tathā saṃsthānam api dīrghaṃ hrasvam iti na paśyeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18292: yathā tamasy avyaktaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 351) pakṣiṇaḥ pipīlikā vā dṛṣṭvā dīrghā paṃktir iti parikalpayaṃti yathā vā tamasy eva hastyādīn avyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā parimaṇḍala iyaṃ senā vyavasthiteti parikalpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18295: yathedānīm uktam asaty api jātyantare saṃsthāne varṇam eva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18301: tadvat saṃsthānam api na varṇavyatiriktaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18321: vijñaptyadhīnā hi kāmāvacary avijñaptir na cittānuparivartinīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18335: cetanāviśeṣeṇāsamāhitena tadākṣepaviśeṣād asamāhitāyā avijñapter ākṣepād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18336: sāpi ca vijñaptir bhavadīyā satī vidyamānā avijñapter ākṣepe utpādanacetanāyā balaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nibhālayate apekṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:18338: jaḍatvād apaṭutvāc cetanābalam antareṇa tām avijñaptiṃ janayituṃ na śaknoti.
T07yabhkvyu:18339: na hy asatyāṃ samādānacetanāyāṃ yadṛcchotpannā vijñaptir avijñaptiṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18343: yathā kāyavijñaptiḥ saṃsthānātmikā na tathā vāgvijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18345: vāgātmako dhvanir varṇātmakaḥ śabda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18354: sāpi dravyato nāsti sāpy avijñaptir dravyato nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:18357: imaṃ divasaṃ upādāya prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīty abhyupetya.
T07yabhkvyu:18358: tasmāt pareṇa teṣām akaraṇamātram avijñaptir ity evaṃ dravyato nāstīti sautrāntikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18361: paṃcame ca kośasthāna etad darśayiṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18362: katham avidyamānāny asyā āśraya ity ato na dravyato 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:18369: trividhaṃ ca tad amalaṃ ca trividhāmalarūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18372: pareṇa kārayataḥ svayam akurvataḥ karma ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18373: trividhāmalarūpoktiś ca vṛddhiś cākurvatpathaś cādir eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18376: ādiśabdena dharmo bhikṣo ity atrārūpīty avacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18390: avijñaptiṃ muktvā nāsti rūpam anidarśanam apratighaṃ yad rūpasaṃgrahasūtra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18391: nāpy anāsravam asti rūpam avijñaptiviraheyyeti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:18403: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18404: ekānte sthita āyuṣmān mahācundo bhagavantam etad avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:18405: labhyaṃ bhadanta aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñapayituṃ mahāphalaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ mahādyutikaṃ mahāvaistārikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18407: saptemāni cundaupadhikāni puṇyakriyāvastūni mahāphalāni yāvan mahāvaistārikāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:18408: [Tib.11a] yaiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā carato vā tiṣṭhato vā svapato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitam abhivardhata eva puṇyam upajāyata eva puṇyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18410: iha cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāyārāmaṃ pratipādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18411: idaṃ cunda prathamam aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahāphalaṃ yāvan mahāvaistārikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18412: yena samanvāgatasya kulaputrasya vā vistareṇa yāvad upajāyata eva puṇyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18413: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasminn evārāme vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18414: idaṃ dvitīyam aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahāphalaṃ yāvad upajāyata eva puṇyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18415: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasminn eva vihāre śayanāsanaṃ prayacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:18417: mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bṛṣīṃ koccavaṃ bimbopadhānaṃ caturaśrakaṃ dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:18418: idaṃ cunda tṛtīyam aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18419: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro kuladuhitā vā tasminn eva vihāre dhruvabhikṣāṃ prajñāpayaty anukūlayajñām.
T07yabhkvyu:18420: idaṃ cunda caturtham aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahāphalaṃ pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18421: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā āgantukāya gamikāya vā dānaṃ dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:18422: idaṃ cunda paṃcamam aupadhikaṃ [Tib.11b] puṇyakriyāvastu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18423: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā glānāya glānopasthāyakāya vā dānaṃ dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:18426: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yās tā bhavanti śītalikā vā vaddalikā vā vātalikā vā varṣalikā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:18427: tadrūpāsu śītalikāsu yāvad varṣalikāsu bhaktāni vā tarpaṇāni vā yavāgūpānāni vā tāni saṃghāyābhinirhṛtyānuprayacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:18428: idam āryā asmākam anārdragātrāḥ anabhivṛṣṭacīvarāḥ paribhujya sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharaṃtu.
T07yabhkvyu:18429: idaṃ ca cunda saptamam aupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahāphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18431: ebhiḥ saptabhir aupadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na labhyaṃ puṇyasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18432: etāvat puṇyaṃ vā puṇyaphalaṃ vā puṇyavipākaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:18433: api tu bahutvāt puṇyasya mahāpuṇyaskaṃdha iti saṃkhyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 354) gacchatīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:18434: dvir apy āyuṣmān mahācundo bhagavantam etad avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:18435: labhyaṃ bhadanta niraupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñapayituṃ mahāphalaṃ yāvan mahāvaistārikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18438: yaiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā carato vā tiṣṭhato vā vistareṇa yāvad upajāyata eva puṇyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18440: iha cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā śṛṇoti tathāgataṃ vā tathāgataśrāvakaṃ vā amukaṃ grāmakṣetram upaniśritya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18441: śrutvā ca punar adhigacchati prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramopasaṃhitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18442: idaṃ cunda prathamaṃ niraupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18444: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā śṛṇoti tathāgataṃ vā tathāgataśrāvakaṃ vā udyuktam āgamanāya.
T07yabhkvyu:18447: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
T07yabhkvyu:18448: vā śṛṇoti tam eva tathāgataṃ vā tathāgataśrāvakaṃ vā adhvānamārgapratipannaṃ tad eva grāmakṣetram anuprāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18452: [Tib.12b] punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā śṛṇoti tathāgataṃ vā tathāgataśrāvakaṃ vā tad eva grāmakṣetram anuprāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18454: idaṃ cunda caturthaṃ niraupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18456: punar aparaṃ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tam eva tathāgataṃ vā tathāgataśrāvakaṃ vā darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:18459: punar aparaṃ cunda śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasyaiva tathāgatasya vā tathāgataśrāvakasya vā antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:18463: punar aparaṃ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasyaiva tathāgatasya vā tathāgataśrāvakasya vā antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:18464: śrutvā ca buddhaśaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaśaraṇaṃ gacchati saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:18466: idaṃ cunda saptamaṃ niraupadhikaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahāphalam iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18471: kṛte tasmin karmaṇi tadājñāpanavijñapteḥ [Tib.13a] karmapatho bhaviṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18474: pareṇa kṛte 'pi tasmin (Abhidh-k-vy 355) karmaṇi tasyā ājñāpanavijñapter na kaścit svabhāvaviśeṣo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:18479: tathaiva paścād ity ato 'stīty abhyupagantavyā yāsau tadānīm utpadyate karmapathasaṃgṛhīteti.
T07yabhkvyu:18487: yady avijñaptir na syād aṣṭaṃgo 'yaṃ mārgo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18490: yat tarhīdam uktam iti vistareṇoktvā yāvat samyaksamādhir iti kim artham evam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18498: na tu mārgakāle tatsaṃgṛhītaṃ vāgādyavijñaptirūpaṃ nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18506: yadi na rūpayituṃ śakyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18508: avijñaptir api vā deśaṃ nāvṛṇotīti tulyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18510: mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇo yogācāras tadrūpam āśayaṃ cāśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:18514: anāsrave 'pi samādhau tad evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaṃ ta ācāryā icchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18515: arhato yad rūpaṃ bāhyaṃ cety apara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18522: na hy arhatsāṃtānikaṃ rūpaṃ bāhyaṃ cāsravāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ niśraya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18523: yady evaṃ yat tarhy aviśeṣeṇa sūtra uktaṃ sāsravā dharmāḥ katame.
T07yabhkvyu:18524: yāvad eva ckaṣur yāvad eva rūpāṇīti [Tib.14a] vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18525: tat punar āsravāṇām apratipakṣatvāt sāsravam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18528: tad evārhato rūpaṃ bāhyaṃ cāsravāṇām apratipakṣatvāt sāsravam āsravāṇām aniśrayatvād anāsravam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18529: tathā ca laksaṇasaṃkaraḥ syād iti doṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18532: vistareṇa yāvad ye dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ sopādānīyāś cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastv iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18549: [Tib.14b] tayā paribhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ phalotpattinimitaṃ prāpnuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18552: na hy atra dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante.
T07yabhkvyu:18553: yatparibhogāt bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣād anugrahaviśeṣāc cānyamanasām api dātṝṇām iti vistareṇa yāvat samarthā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:18554: yāvad upajāyata eva puṇyam iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:18559: caratas tiṣṭhato jāgrato yuktam evaṃ svapatas tu katham ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18560: svapneṣv api tāś cetanā anuṣaṅgiṇyo bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18561: avijñaptivādinas tu vaibhāṣikasya niraupadhike puṇyakriyāvastuni yatra vijñaptir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:18562: kevalaṃ taṃ śrutvādhigacchati prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18565: avijñaptir hi vijñapteḥ samādher vā saṃbhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:18569: pratigrāhaka ālambanam asyāś cetanāyā iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:18571: yady aupadhikeṣv api evam abhīkṣṇaṃ tadālambanacetanābhyāsāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18581: svayaṃprayogeṇa pareṣām upaghātaviśeṣāt kartuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣo jāyata iti sarvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18586: sa hi cetanālakṣaṇasya karmaṇaḥ panthā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18593: yathā vaibhāṣikāṇām avijñaptivādinām avijñaptiḥ karmapatha ity ākhyāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18596: avijñaptir (Abhidh-k-vy 357) adravyam iti prakārāntareṇa darśayan bhadanta āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18598: sattvasaṃkhyāteṣu vartamāneṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate ghātaka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18600: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatam iti cāsya yadā bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18601: tad evam atra cetanaiva karmety uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18602: ācāryo bhadantamataṃ kenacid bhāgenābhipretaṃ kenacid bhāgenānabhipretaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18610: tasmāt svayaṃ ghnann iti bhadantena viśeṣyaṃ vaktavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:18619: [Tib.16a] yathā nāmaiva nāmadheyam ity eke vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:18633: tasyaiva cittacaittasya prayoktus tannimittas tatprayoganimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18640: samutthāpakasya dharmasyābhāvāt samutthāpyasya dharmasyābhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18647: yad dhyāyināṃ samādhiviṣayarūpaṃ samādhiprabhāvād utpadyata ity uktaṃ tad dhy anidarśanaṃ cāpratighaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:18651: ehi tāvad ācakṣety artha ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:18662: (Abhidh-k-vy 358) ato nimitte āśaye āśraye ca naimittikopacāraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18668: yady akriyāmātram aṃgaṃ kathaṃ tad anāsravam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18676: anyacitto na saṃvṛtaḥ syād iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:18678: tasmāc cetanācittād anyacitto na saṃvṛtaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:18679: yathā cetanā yā kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti nāsau tadānīm astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18682: tadbhāvanayā cittasaṃtānabhāvanayā kriyākāle prāṇātipātādicitte pratyupasthite smarataḥ ahaṃprāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativirata iti pratyupasthitasmṛteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18687: ayam akriyāpratijñām anusmṛtya dauḥśīlyaṃ na kuryād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18688: na kaścin muṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhidyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18692: na saiva pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vijñaptyāśrayāṇāṃ sāmagrī sūkṣmaphalā cānidarśanāpratighavijñaptiphalatvāt audārikaphalā ca sanidarśanasapratighavijñaptiphalatvād
T07yabhkvyu:18693: tasmād [Tib.17b] anyāny eva mahābhūtāni upādāyāvijñaptir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18697: yatkālasaṃbhūtā vijñaptiḥ kiṃ tatkālasaṃbhūtāny eva mahābhūtāny upādāyāvijñaptir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18699: sarvam upādāyarūpaṃ vijñaptir avijñaptir dhyānānāsravasaṃgṛhītā cakṣuḥśrotrarūpaśabdādi caivaṃ samānakālāny eva mahābhūtāny upādāya vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:18702: kiṃcid vartamānam anāgataṃ atītāni mahābhūtāny upādāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:18703: kiṃcid upādāyarūpaṃ vartamānam atītāni mahābhūtāny upādāya vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:18704: kiṃcid anāgatam upādāyarūpam atītāni mahābhūtāny upādāya vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:18705: kiṃ punas tad upādāyarūpaṃ yad evaṃ bhūtam iti darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18710: yathānyeṣām upādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyutpannāni (Abhidh-k-vy 359) mahābhūtāny āśrayaḥ [Tib.18a] evaṃ tasyā atītāny āśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18712: atītāni mahābhūtāni pravṛttikāraṇatvāt ākṣepakāraṇatvāt āśrayārthena bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18713: pratyutpannāni śarīramahābhūtāny anuvṛttikāraṇatvād adhiṣṭhānakāraṇatvāt saṃniśrayārthena bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18726: anāsravāṇi tarhi mahābhūtāny upādāya kasmān na bhavatīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18728: kiṃ punar asyā mahābhūtaiḥ kāryam ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18731: atha cittabalenaiva tadutpattiḥ kasmān na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18757: upāttāni hi mahābhūtāni nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu (Abhidh-k-vy 360) cittam antareṇāpi vartante.
T07yabhkvyu:18759: yāvacchabdenādattādānāt kāmamithyācārān [Tib.19a] mṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18762: evaṃ bhūtāny api tadutpādakāny abhinnāny eva.
T07yabhkvyu:18793: anabhivyāpane ca punar vijñaptimahābhūtaiḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnenāṃgena vijñāpayet.
T07yabhkvyu:18797: vijñaptyāśrayāṇi mahābhūtāni tadaṃgaṃ na vyāpyāvatiṣṭhanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18801: pīnena tarhi guruṇā vā tenāṃgena na bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18813: cetanātmanaḥ karmaṇaś ca pañcasattvāt pañcavidham uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18823: yathā na ca tāvad anāsravāyā avijñapter anāsravāṇi mahābhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:18824: atha ca punar yasyāṃ bhūmau jātas tām utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18826: evaṃ na ca tāvad ārūpyāṇi mahābhūtāni syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18827: atha ca punar yasyāṃ bhūmau jāta ārūpyām utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18833: tṛṣṇābhir asvīkṛtatvāt tasyā dhātuto bhūmito vā naiva sabhāgāni nāpi visabhāgāni mahābhūtāni bhavantīty ato yatrajātas tatrajāni mahābhūtāny
T07yabhkvyu:18834: ārūpyāvacarī tv avijñaptir nārhati kāmarūpāvacarāṇi visabhāgāni mahābhūtāny upādāya bhavituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18838: rūpabhūmikā tv anāsravā samāpaṭtir alaṃ [Tib.20b] rūpotpattaye 'vijñaptyutpattaye ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18841: kathaṃ cārūpyasamāpatteḥ sarvarūpaṃ vaimukhyam ity ato bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:18846: tasya rūpabhūmikaṃ śīlam avijñaptilakṣaṇaṃ pratipakṣa iti yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18847: ārūpyāvacaram apy evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18850: dūratvāc cārūpyasaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣe na kalpate.
T07yabhkvyu:18851: catasraś ca dūratā vyākhyātāḥ purastād iti na punar vyākhyāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:18855: savicārayor eva bhūmyor ity avadhāraṇārtha āraṃbhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18856: vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata iti vitarkavicārapūrvakatvāt kāyavākkarmaṇoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18858: na kevalam avicārāsu bhūmiṣv iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:18878: asyaiva ca doṣaparihārārtham anye punar āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18885: dvitīyādau tadā vyāptam akliṣṭavyākṛtaṃ ca tad
T07yabhkvyu:18888: sā tu kiṃ vyākṛtā utāvyākṛtety āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18892: [Tib.21b kiṃkāraṇaṃ na kuśalā na kliṣṭāstīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:18894: na hi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapannaḥ tathājātīyaṃ kuśalakliṣṭajātīyam adhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:18895: yena cittena kuśalāṃ kliṣṭāṃ vā vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet.
T07yabhkvyu:18910: tac ca bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ nivṛtavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ kāmadhātau nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:18911: satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktam eva hi kāmadhātau nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ cittam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18917: [Tib.22a] yad dhi svabhāvasaṃprayogasamutthānataḥ kuśalaṃ na tat paramakṣemam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:18921: tair eva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktair ity ādiśabdena hryapatrāpyayor grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:18935: kathaṃ tāsāṃ kuśalatvam iti vaktavyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:18938: kuśalamūlasamutthāpanīyatvād anāgatāvasthāyām eva tāḥ kuśalamūlā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:18942: sarvasya duḥkhasya pravṛttir ātmā svabhāvo 'syeti sarvaduḥkhapravṛttyātmakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18958: na kiṃcit sāsravam avyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:18960: paramārthata evam uktam iti abhyupagatam etat sarvaṃ saṃsāraparyāpannam akuśalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18977: kuśalākuśalena hi cittena kāyavākkarma tanmahābhūtāni samutthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:18979: karmaṇi hi kartur abhiprāyo na mahābhūteṣu na mahābhūtāni kuryām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18986: na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:18990: mahābhūtavat tasyāḥ kuśalatvaṃ na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:18991: divyayor api vā cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ kuśalatvaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:18992: yady antareṇāpi tadabhiprāyam avijñapteḥ kuśalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19000: (IV.12-14) yad uktaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittaṃ vijñapter asamutthāpakam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19001: darśanaprahātavyasyāṃtarmukhapravṛttatvād ity evaṃ bruvatāṃ kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktam iti virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19005: kathaṃ mithyādṛṣṭer darśanaprahātavyāyāḥ [Tib.24a] mithyāvāk vijñaptisvabhāvā mithyākarmāntaś ca tatsvabhāva evety uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19018: hetuś ca sa samutthānaṃ ca tat hetusamutthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19023: tatraiva kriyākṣaṇe tatkṣaṇasamutthānasya bhāvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19029: tena hi tatkṣaṇasamutthānena vinā asau vijñaptir mṛtasyeva na syād ākṣiptā satī hetusamutthānena janitāpi satī.
T07yabhkvyu:19035: yadi tatkṣaṇasamutthānena vināsau mṛtasyeva na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19036: nirodhasamāpattilābhinaḥ kasyacid upasaṃpādyamānasya kāyavijñaptim ābadhnataḥ tatkālopasthitanirodhasamāpattitvād acittakasya saṃvarotpattau karmavācanāvasānakālīnāyāṃ tatsaṃvarāntargatā kāyavijñaptiḥ kathaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19040: tatkṣaṇasamutthānena sacittakasya vyaktatarā vijñaptir bhavatīty etat tasya sāmarthyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19044: kathaṃ punas tat pravartakam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19056: tena darśanaprahātavyena samutthāpitaṃ kāyavāgvijñaptirūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19057: yathā bhāvanāprahātavyena cittena samutthāpitaṃ [Tib.25a] kāyavākkarma bhāvanāprahātavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19065: dṛṣṭasatyānām api tatsamanvāgatatvān nāsti rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19068: na hi kliṣṭākliṣṭarūpasamudācārāvasthāyāṃ tatprāptipravāhe vā saty avidyā na bhavati avidyāyāṃ ca satyāṃ tan na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19072: tad evam anāsravavad aprahātavyam api na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19077: [Tib.25b] sādhya eṣa pakṣo vidyayā rūpaṃ na virudhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19082: yadi tad rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyacittasamutthāpitaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 366) darśanaprahātavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19086: yena hi darśanaprahātavyena cittena tad rūpaṃ samutthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19088: na ca tāni tathā bhavitum arhanti.
T07yabhkvyu:19096: yathā yena cittena kuśalākuśalena kuśalākuśalaṃ rūpaṃ samutthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19108: na hy akliṣṭo dharmaḥ anivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ kuśalasāsravaś ca vidyayānāsraveṇa mārgeṇa virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19114: tatra yad uktam atha vā punar bhavaṃtv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19124: yad uktaṃ mithyādṛṣṭer mithyāsaṃkalpo yāvat mithyākarmānta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19139: buddho bhagavān nāga ity uktaḥ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:19141: tathāgata udāyin sadevake loke samāraka iti vistareṇoktvāha āgo na karoti kāyena vācā manasā.
T07yabhkvyu:19143: āgo na karotīty aparādhaṃ na karotīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19145: anicchayāsya buddhasya cittasyāvisaraṇād viṣayeṣv agamanād evam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19150: yāvan niṣīdam niṣīdāmīty upasthitasmṛtitvān nityasamāhitaḥ sa ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19156: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19161: mithyādṛṣṭyādikam eva pravartakaṃ vijñapter na satkāyadṛṣṭyādikam [Tib.27a] ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19162: na vā sarvam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam īdṛśaṃ pravartakam īdṛśaṃ neti.
T07yabhkvyu:19170: na tu yathā darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakaṃ tathā vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19175: tadyathāsty ātmeti mayā pareṣāṃ gamayitavyam iti pūrvam evāvadhārya tato vāksamutpādakena cittena bahirmukhapravṛttena bhāvanāprahātavyena savitarkeṇa savicāreṇa vācaṃ bhāṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:19178: tad evam avaśyaṃ darśanaprahātavyasya pravartakasyānantaraṃ pravartakam eva bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ kuśalam [Tib.27b] akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ cotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19181: evaṃ tu vaktavyam anyavyavahitaṃ bhāvanāheyavyavahitaṃ hetusamutthānaṃ saṃdhāyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19196: bhikṣusaṃvarasyānyal lakṣaṇam evaṃ yāvad upavāsasaṃvarasyānyal lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19206: śikṣamāṇā cāpi parivṛttavyaṃjanā śrāmaṇera eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19209: bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraṃ ca pratilabhata ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19219: ato vijñāyate na bhikṣusaṃvarād anyo bhikṣuṇīsaṃvara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19221: tasmād abhinno 'nanyaś caturṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīśikṣamāṇāśrāmaṇeryupāsikāsaṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyo bhikṣuśrāmaṇeropāsakasaṃvarebhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19223: yathā paṃcasaṃkhyāyām anyāni paṃca prakṣipya paṃcavṛddhiyogād daśa bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:19224: paṃcadaśasaṃkhyāyāṃ cānyāni paṃca prakṣipya viṃśatir bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:19226: yathā pūrvako dīnāro dvitīyena saha satero bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19227: tathā hi loke ekadīnāramūlyena dvitīyaṃ dīnāraṃ dīnāramūlyaṃ vā tena pūrvakeṇa dīnāramūlyena sahādhikam apekṣya kaścid vaktā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:19230: kim evam eta upāsakaśrāmaṇerabhikṣusaṃvarāḥ virativṛddhiyogāt prāṇātipātādiviratiṣu tathaivāvasthitāsu punar nṛtyagītaviratyādīnām apūrvāṇāṃ viratīnāṃ [Tib.28b] vṛddhiyogād anyonya ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:19231: anya upāsakasaṃvarāc chrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvarāc cānyo bhikṣusaṃvara iti ekadeśaviśeṣayogād anyonyavyavasthety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19232: āho svit pṛthag eva te sakalā upajāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:19249: evaṃ ca yadi na syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19250: bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇas tyajaṃs trīn api upāsakasaṃvarādīn vijahyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19258: vijñaptyā ca kriyate prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā avijñaptiś cittena ca kriyate dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā avijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19260: tad evaṃ kriyata iti kriyeti karmasādhanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19263: saṃvarastho hy saṃvaraparirakṣaṇārthaṃ kriyāṃ vijñaptilakṣaṇām ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:19270: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ saṃśabdyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19271: ādyo 'pi kṣaṇo dvitīyādayo 'pi ca kṣaṇāḥ prātimokṣasaṃvara ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19274: punaḥ ādye vijñaptyavjñaptī prātimokṣa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19278: pratimokṣa iti prāpte prātimokṣa iti vacanaṃ svārthe vṛddhividhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19279: svārthe pratyaye kṛte vṛddhikaraṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19290: prātimokṣajātīyaḥ prātimokṣād vā jātaḥ saṃvaraḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19294: (IV.19) aṣṭāv eva nikāyā ity avadhāraṇe pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:19305: bhavaviśeṣa eva ca teṣāṃ keṣāṃcin mokṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19309: sāmantakam apy atra dhyānaṃ kṛtvocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19311: tasmād dhyānasāmantakam apy atra dhyānaśabdenocyata itīṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19331: anāgamyabhūmikeṣu vimuktiprayogaviśeṣamārgeṣu maulaprathamadhyānādiṣu vā caturthād dhyānād ānantaryavimuktiprayogaviśeṣamārgeṣu yo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19333: [Tib.30b] tena dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānām aprahāṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19337: tṛtīyānāgamyānantaryamārgeṣu sāsravasaṃvaraḥ ayaṃ prahāṇasaṃvaraś ca tena dauḥśīlyādiprahāṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19342: sa punas tathaivānāgamyabhūmikeṣu vimuktiprayogaviśeṣamārgeṣu vistareṇa yo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19345: evaṃ syād anāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19347: (IV.20cd) manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāvaḥ indriyasaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti dvisvabhāvajñāpanārthaṃ [Tib.31] dvigrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19352: anyatarā kila devatā bhikṣuṃ viṣayeṣv indriyāṇi vicārayantam avocat.
T07yabhkvyu:19353: bhikṣo bhikṣo vraṇaṃ mā kārṣīd iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19357: kuṃbhamātraṃ bhikṣo vraṇaṃ kṛtvā kena pidhāsyasi.
T07yabhkvyu:19361: (IV.21, 22) sa yāvat tām avijñaptiṃ na tyajatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19364: prathame kṣaṇe vartamānasyaiva samanvāgato bhavatīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19374: idaṃ janma tyaktam api hi gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19385: prathame tu kṣaṇe duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇe nābhyatītayā avijñaptyā samanvāgata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19388: nanu ca phalaprāptikāla indriyasaṃcārakāle 'pi vā pūrvamārgatyāge naivātītayā avijñaptyā samanvāgama iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19389: evaṃ tarhi sa cāpi phalamārgasya prathamakṣaṇo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19392: ācāryavasumitras tv asya codyasya parihāram āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19395: atas tena prathame kṣaṇe nātītena samanvāgato dvitīyādiṣv atītānāgateneti.
T07yabhkvyu:19397: tatrānāsravasaṃvarasādṛśyam astīti na tad ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19398: tad iha sādṛśyam astīti na budhyāmahe.
T07yabhkvyu:19402: [Tib.32a] duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikāle 'pi so 'stīti nātītayā samanvāgata iti pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19404: vihīnaḥ sa katham astīti śakyaṃ vaktum iti cintyo 'syābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19416: anyathā hy āryamārgasamanvito 'py āryamārgastha iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:19417: prakṛtistho 'py āryo vartamānayā anāsravayā avijñaptyā samanvāgata iti prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:19420: samāhitaś ca samāhitāryamārgaś ca mārgau samāhitāryamārgau.
T07yabhkvyu:19423: tau yathākramaṃ vartamānayā dhyānasaṃvarāvijñaptyānāsrava[Tib.32b] saṃvarāvijñaptyā ca samanvāgatau.
T07yabhkvyu:19425: na tu tanmārgavyutthitau tayā vartamānayā samanvāgatau.
T07yabhkvyu:19429: katham avijñapteḥ pratyutpannatā āryamārgasthavacanād eva gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19435: (IV.23ab) yo naivasaṃvaraṇāsaṃvare sthitas sa madhyastha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19444: (IV.23cd,24ab) asaṃvarasaṃvarasthau pudgalāv akuśalakuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitāv ity anayor viparyayam asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:19451: yo yasyās tyāgas tasmād ā tyāgāt tayātītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19454: tasmād ā tyāgād anayātītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19458: tasmād ā tyāgād anayā samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19460: so 'vaśyaṃ maulakarmapathasvabhāvayā kṣaṇād ūrdhvam atītayāvijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19461: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit (Abhidh-k-vy 373) samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19464: cittasyāpi tarhi nivṛtāvyākṛtasya mā bhūt prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19473: tadviparyayāt sā durbalena nivṛtāvyākṛtena cittenotthāpitā durbalatarā bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19481: tīvracetanā hi vijñaptiṃ kurvann avijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet.
T07yabhkvyu:19484: yatra hi mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kurvan naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvare sthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati avijñapter anutpādāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19485: prāg evāvyākṛtaṃ kurvan sutarāṃ vijñaptyaivāsau samanvāgato nāvijñaptyā.
T07yabhkvyu:19490: tatra hy avyākṛtam api kurvann avijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19491: satatasamitaṃ carato vā tiṣṭhato vā vistareṇa yāvad upajāyata eva puṇyam iti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19492: prāṇātipātādīṃś ca karmapathāṃ mṛducetanayāpi kurvan avijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19494: parivṛttajanmanāryapudgalena yadā na tāvad vijñaptaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19496: vijñaptaṃ vā punar vihīnam avyākṛtacittotthāpitavijñaptivihīnāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:19497: na hi tasyāḥ prāptir anubandhinī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19500: sa hi tadānīm avijñaptim api parityajati prāg eva vijñaptim iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19501: āsv avasthāsu janmāntaraparivṛttāv āryapudgalo 'nāsravayaivāvijñaptyā janmāntaralabdhayā samanvāgato na vijñaptyā.
T07yabhkvyu:19502: nanu ca pṛthagjanasyāpy ayaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19505: yo hi dhyānalābhī parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ rūpadhātāv akṛtavijñaptiḥ kṛtavijñaptivihīno vā.
T07yabhkvyu:19506: sa eva tathā saṃbhavati nānya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19508: atha vā udāharaṇarūpa āryapudgala uktas tena pṛthagjano 'pi tathā grahītavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19514: evaṃ dve koṭī sūtrite prathamadvitīye [Tib.34b] tṛtīyacaturthyau tu yojye.
T07yabhkvyu:19515: tṛtīyā saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthās tīvrayā cetanayā kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kurvantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19516: caturthī yena janmāntaraparivṛttau pṛthagjanena na tāvad vijñaptaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19525: ehibhikṣukayeti ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti bhagavato vacane.
T07yabhkvyu:19526: ehīti coktaḥ sugatena tāyinā muṇḍaś ca kāṣāyadharo babhūveti.
T07yabhkvyu:19533: tam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā bhagavāṃś codayati sma.
T07yabhkvyu:19536: tataḥ sa bhagavato rūpam avikopitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ me śāsteti sa bhagavantam abhyupagatād [Tib.35]a asyopasaṃpad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19538: sodāyinā praśnavisarjanena bhagavān ārādhitas tenārādhanena tasyopasaṃpat.
T07yabhkvyu:19545: na codayitavyo bhikṣur āpattim āpannaḥ nākroṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19548: na ca bhikṣuṇyā kvacid bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19552: tayā kilāntaḥpuragatayaiva pravrajyārthaṃ buddhāya dūtaḥ preṣita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19566: atha vā teṣām iti yeṣāṃ vijñaptir nāsty upasaṃpatkriyāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19571: kālo nāma ka eṣa dharma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19572: kāla ity asyābhidhānasya kim abhidheyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19575: tadyathātītaḥ kālo yāvat pratyutpanna iti traiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārā eva gamyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:19578: asmaraṇāc ca tenāśrayeṇa tatsamādānaṃ na samarati.
T07yabhkvyu:19585: yathā jīvitād ūrdhvaṃ saty api samādāne [Tib.36a] saṃvarotpattau yuktivirodho visabhāgāśrayatvād ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:19588: yathā nāsty avijñaptir dravyata iti pratipāditaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19613: na tu teṣām iti vistareṇācāryo vaibhāṣikamataṃ yuktyā [Tib.36b] virodhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:19619: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya (Abhidh-k-vy 376) uttareṣāṃ samyagdṛṣṭyādīnām aṅgaṃ yadi syur iti vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19620: evam asyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṃgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19621: na hi tatra pūrvotpannā samyagdṛṣṭir aṅgam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19623: bodhyaṃgeṣv api paścimaḥ kṣaṇo na bodhyaṃgaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19624: na hy anyā pareṇa bodhir asti yasyās tad aṅgaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19625: atha matam anāgatāyā bodhes tad aṃgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19629: dātur grahītur vā vismaraṇād avyutpatteś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:19630: saṃdigdhasya vipannāśayasya vānādarapūrvakaṃ śaraṇam avagacchataḥ saṃvaro notpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19649: yathaiva hi bhikṣur labdhasaṃvaro 'pi jñapticaturthena karmaṇā śikṣāpadāni yathāsthūlaṃ grāhyate pratyāyyate itaś cāmutaś ca pārājikādibhyas tava saṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19654: yadaiva hi tenābhyupagatam aham evaṃnāmā taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha śākyamuniṃ śākyādhirājaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:19662: ity anena labdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19675: na hy evaṃ mahānāmasūtrapāṭho yāvajjīvaprāṇāpetam ity uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19678: yataś ca mahānāman gṛhī vistareṇa yāvad upāsakaṃ māṃ dhārayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:19683: tatas te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ pudgalāḥ avetyaprasādānvayam avetyaprasādahetukaṃ prāṇair api (Abhidh-k-vy 377) jīvitahetor api saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:19684: abhavyā vayam enaṃ dharmaṃ parityaktum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19686: na tv anena sūtreṇa lakṣaṇam apadiśyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19687: prāṇāpetaṃ tu na kvacit paṭhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19695: yo 'yaṃ praśnaḥ kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19699: iha mahānāmann upāsakaḥ [Tib.38a] prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19700: iyatā mahānāmann upāsakaḥ śikṣāyām ekadeśakārī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19701: viśtareṇa dvābhyāṃ śikṣāpadābhyāṃ prativirataḥ pradeśakārī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19702: tribhyaḥ prativirataḥ caturbhyo vā yadbhūyaskārī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19703: paṃcabhyaḥ prativirataḥ paripūrṇakārī bhavatīty etad visarjanaṃ suṣṭhu na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19704: tanmātraśikṣāksamāṃ praty eṣa praśno yujyate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19705: ekasya śikṣāpadasya dvayos tataḥ pareṇa vā kṣamām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19708: yataḥ khalu mahānāmaṃ gṛhī avadātavasana ity evamādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:19710: yadi samutthāpakam asya cittaṃ mṛdu syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19715: tadanādaratas tu śaraṇagamanair vinā na syād upāsaka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19719: yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo buddha ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19728: yādṛśo bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ rūpakāyas tādṛśaḥ paścād apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19732: laukikasya mārgasya puṇyajñānasaṃbhāralakṣaṇasya lokottarasya ca kṣayajñānādilakṣaṇasyāvilakṣaṇatvāt tulyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19736: sadevakenāpi lokena mārgaṃ praty abhedyatvāt saṃghībhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:19741: tatra bhagavāṃs trapusabhallikau vaṇijāv āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:19744: yo 'sau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19745: yadā saṃgho nāsti tadaivam uktam anāgatam eva saṃgham adhikṛtya.
T07yabhkvyu:19746: tat kathaṃ sarvasaṃghān asau śaraṇaṃ gacchatīty anena virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19748: yat saṃgharatnaṃ tayos bhallikayor dharmacakrapravartanānantaraṃ pratyakṣībhaviṣyatti.
T07yabhkvyu:19749: tasyodbhāvanārthaguṇataḥ [Tib.39a] prakāśanārthaṃ sa evādhikṛto bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19751: svaparasāṃtānikānāṃ kleśānāṃ duḥkhasya ca yā śāntiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19758: tasya vipādanād vikopanāt tadāśrayiṇo 'pi te buddhakarakā dharmā vipāditā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:19765: ke te buddhakarakāḥ ye buddhatvasya buddhaprajñapteś ca hetavo laukikalokottarā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19767: ata āśrayasya laukikapaṃcaskandhalakṣaṇasya buddhatvāpratiṣedhād acodyam evaitat.
T07yabhkvyu:19768: yad uktaṃ yady aśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanād ānantaryaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19772: laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syān na saṃghaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19774: na hi laukikaṃ aśaikṣā dharmāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:19775: yadi vā śaikṣā dharmā eva buddhakarakā budddhaḥ syāt nāśrayo 'pi.
T07yabhkvyu:19776: śīlam eva sa bhikṣusaṃvarākhyaṃ bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19779: yady āśrayasyāpi buddhatvaṃ kasmād evam āha śāstre.
T07yabhkvyu:19781: aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchatīty aśaikṣadharmān evāvadhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:19782: evaṃ vaibhāṣikeṇokte ācāryo dṛṣṭāntena samādhim āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19783: yathā tu yo bhikṣuṃ pūjayatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19784: yathā tu yo bhikṣuṃ pūjayati śīlamukhena.
T07yabhkvyu:19786: na ca punaḥ śīlam eva bhikṣuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19787: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchaty aśaikṣamukhena.
T07yabhkvyu:19788: aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmāṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:19789: na punaḥ svasaṃtānikā aśaikṣā eva dharmā buddhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19792: aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmāṃś charaṇaṃ gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:19816: ye gṛhītapaṃcaśikṣāpadāḥ saṃto bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti vivāhayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:19817: kiṃ tair upāsakais tābhyo 'pi strībhyaḥ saṃvaraḥ pratilabdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19822: mā bhūt prādeśika iti sarvāgamyāt prativirateḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19824: na tv asmāt saṃtānāgamyācarāt prativiramāmīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19833: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yad amadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibatīty ābhidhārmikeṇokte.
T07yabhkvyu:19840: yadi hi hat prajñaptisāvadyaṃ syāt glānaśākyopasthānāya tad anujñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19843: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ śāstāram uddiśadbhiḥ śākyamunir naḥ śāstety upadiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19844: prakṛtisāvadyaṃ tad iti bhagavatā tat pratiṣiddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19861: śākyeṣu glāneṣu madyapānaṃ nābhyanujñātam ity apavāda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:19862: madyapānaṃ glānāvasthāyām api nānujñātam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19866: trīṇi sthānāni pratiṣedhamāṇasya nāsti tṛptir vā.
T07yabhkvyu:19872: saiva hi mātrā dravyakālaprakṛtiśarīrāvasthā apekṣya madanīyā cāmadanīyā ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19873: ata eva ca kuśāgrapānapratiṣedha ity atiśayavacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19874: tad evaṃ na prakṛtisāvadyam iti manasikṛtvā bhagavatā tatpariharaṇīyam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19880: śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ hrībalam apatrāpyabalaṃ prajñābalaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:19883: yadi hrīmattvāt tad anadhyācaraṇam ajñātam udakādivat kasmān na pibaṃtīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19887: yāvatyā mātrayā smṛtir naśyatīty ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:19891: yathā kālaprakṛtiśaktiyogād alpam api viṣaṃ kadācin mārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:19897: atraiva śikṣāpade pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṃ prahāya surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiramāmīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19899: prāṇātipātapramādasthānaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātapramādasthānāt prativiramāmīti [Tib.42a] pramādasthānaṃ na paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19910: (Abhidh-k-vy 381) surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānenāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyata iti nandikasūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:19911: atyāsevitena madyapānena durgatigamanābhidhānaṃ tatprasaṃgena madyapānaprasaṃgena abhīkṣṇam ajasram akuśalasaṃtatipravṛtteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19916: vṛttilābhād vā phaladānāya vā pūrvopacitasya karmaṇo maraṇāvasthāyāṃ vṛttilābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19936: surāmaireyasvabhāvasya madyasya pāne doṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19938: sarvapramādānāṃ sarvasmṛtipramoṣāṇāṃ prāṇātipātādyakuśalānāṃ hetubhūtānāṃ sthānam āspadaṃ pratiṣṭheti pramādasthānaṃ madyapānam.
T07yabhkvyu:19945: maulaprayogapṛṣṭhasvabhāvās trayāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pratipakṣabhūtāḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarākhyā vijñaptyavijñaptayo labhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:19948: tad etad ubhayam apy ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:19961: vartamānā eva hi dharmāḥ sattvaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānā nātītā nānāgatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:19969: yathaiva hi sattvākhyebhyo vartamānebhye eva labhyata ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:19970: tathā vartamānebhya evāsattvākhyebhyo 'pi labhyata iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:19995: vartamānebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādikarmapathaprayogapṛṣthebhyaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyāc ca vṛkṣabhaṃgādikād yaḥ saṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20001: atītānāgatebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ kāyavācikebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ saṃvaro yaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20013: sāmaṃtakapṛṣṭhatvān na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau [Tib.44b] svasaṃtāne vartamānebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ saṃvaro na yujyata iti paśyann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:20014: na tu saṃvaralābhakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:20015: vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyas tebhyaḥ karmapathebhya iti vaktavyam iti śikṣayaty ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20020: na hy utpannānām anutpattiḥ śakyate kartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20022: teṣām eva saṃvaraṇaṃ yujyata ity ācāryābhiprāyaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 383).
T07yabhkvyu:20027: prayogaḥ prayogam evaṃ bhavītīva tvām ahaṃ saṃvṛṇomi.
T07yabhkvyu:20031: tathā skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ karmapathaprayogamaulapṛṣṭhasvabhāvānāṃ vartamānānāṃ rundhāno vartamānebhyas tebhyo labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20041: kāyikebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyas tribhyo vācikāc ca mṛṣāvādāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20048: kuśale samutthāpake cetasi teṣāṃ yugapat bhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20055: sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sati saṃvarotpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20057: na sarvakāraṇair mṛdvādīnāṃ kāraṇatvena yugapad asaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20060: yas trividhena cittena trīn saṃvarān samādatta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20064: sarvakāraṇaiś ca na tu sarvāṃgair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20074: vaibhāṣikā apy asyaiva praśnasya parihārāṃtaram āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20082: imaṃ vaibhāṣikaparihāraṃ sāvakāśaṃ paśyann ācārya āha.
T07yabhkvyu:20090: [Tib.45b] evaṃ śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātāṃ vṛddhihrāsau cayāpacayāv ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20096: yathā hy apūrvatṛṇādyutpattāv iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20098: sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃcārāt paścāc ca bhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20104: yadā parinirvṛtā na saṃty eveti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20105: tasmāt pūrvaka eva hetuḥ sādhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20107: ata śakyāśakyebhyaḥ saṃvaro labhyata iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20108: evaṃ tarhi yadi sarvasattvebhyo labhyate prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20112: sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścāc cotpannānām aviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvebhyo lābhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20113: yadi hi te py aparinirvṛtā abhaviṣyan.
T07yabhkvyu:20127: so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇino jīvitād vyavaropayan madhyenaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20129: evaṃ yo 'dhimātreṇa yāvad adhimātreṇaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20133: sa mṛdunāpi cittena prāṇino jīvitād vyavaropayan adhimātrenaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20140: rājānaś cādhikaraṇasthāś ca (Abhidh-k-vy 385) daṇḍanetṛtvād ihāpaṭhitā api āsaṃvarikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20144: yuktas tāvad iti vistareṇoktvā yāvat katham asaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvedhyo yujyata iti praśnite.
T07yabhkvyu:20148: na hi tāvat [Tib.46b] ta eva ta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20149: te mātrādaya iti jānānā hanyur ity aghātyebhyas tebhyo 'saṃvaraḥ kathaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20150: kiṃ cāryībhūtānāṃ punaḥ paśūbhavituṃ nāsty avakāśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20153: yadi vānāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā urabhrādayo bhaviṣyaṃtīti vartamānān mātrāder asaṃvaraḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20154: urabhrān api te aurabhrikāḥ putrībhūtān anāgate janmani sarvathā na hanyur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20157: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20160: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāṃ putrādibhūtānām aurabhrikādīnāṃ tebhyo mātrādibhyaḥ syād asaṃvara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20207: ebhiś ca yathoktaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ patanīyena ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:20222: prakṛtisthaḥ śīlavān iti viparyayeṇa vacanād ato 'vagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20224: yasmāt saṃghāvaśeṣam āpadyata ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20225: yuktir api na hy ekadeśakṣobhāt sakalasaṃvaratyāgo yukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20232: yat tarhi bhagavatoktam iti vistareṇa yāvat parājitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20237: maulyāpy āpattyā na bhikṣutvaṃ naśyatīti viditvā tāṃ kuryur iti vākyārthaḥ [Tib.48a] saṃjñābhikṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20246: yat yat bhagavatoktam abhikṣur bhavaty aśramaṇa iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:20248: yathoktebhyaś caturbhyo bhikṣubhyo 'nya evāyaṃ paṃcamo jñapticaturthopasaṃpanno bhikṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20249: yad apy uktaṃ paramārthabhikṣutvaṃ saṃdhāyaitad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20255: mastakacchinnatālopamāṃ kurvatā śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga iti saṃbaṃdhanīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20260: sarvasmāt bhikṣubhis saha saṃbhogād ekapaṃktibhojanādikād bahiṣkṛto buddhena.
T07yabhkvyu:20267: taṃ śīlavatsaṃghād yūyam apakarṣateti bhagavāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 387) bhikṣūn ājñāpayāmāsa.
T07yabhkvyu:20275: mārge jīvati śīlavāṃ bhikṣur mārganimittaṃ jīvanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20283: hradaś ca śuṣko 'pi hrada ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20287: pūtibījam aṃkurājanakatvād abījam api bījam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20293: śikṣādattako nāma bhikṣur adhimātrarāgatayā [Tib.49a] striyā abhrahmacaryaṃ kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:20294: tadanaṃtaram eva jātasaṃvegaḥ kaṣṭaṃ mayā kṛtam ity ekasminn api praticchādanacitte 'nutpanne bhikṣusaṃgham upagamyāviṣkarotīdaṃ mayā pāpaṃ kṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20295: sa āryasaṃghopadeśāt sarvabhikṣunavakāṃtikatvādi daṇḍakarma kurvāṇaḥ śikṣādattaka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20296: tad yadi dauḥśīlyād abhikṣur eva syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20298: na hi tasya punar upasaṃpādanaṃ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20303: sahādhyāpattyā abrahmacaryād eva sarvaḥ pārājiko bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20311: tasmān na punaḥ pravrājyata ity adhikāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20313: na tu khalu tasya bhikṣubhāvo 'stīty apekṣayā na pravrājyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20314: tathā hy asau parājayiko nikṣiptaśikṣo pi na pravrājyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20319: ata eva ca sarvam eveti vyācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:20326: parihāṇito vā samāpatteḥ tatsamāpattisaṃgṛhītaṃ kuśalaṃ tyajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20328: nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ yat pṛthagjanāvasthāyām utpāditaṃ yāvat kṣāṃtir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20329: tad asaty api bhūmisaṃcāre nikāyasabhāgatyāgena tyajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20332: bhūmityāgāt tyajaty āryas tāny anāryas tu mṛtyuta
T07yabhkvyu:20340: yadi tv anāgāmī dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:20342: sa tasya phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tyajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20350: etat karma na kariṣyāmīty āśayato 'pi śastrajālatyāge vinā saṃvaragrahaṇenāsaṃvaracchedo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20351: tadyathā roganidānaparihāre 'pi tasya pravṛddhasya rogasyauṣadhena vinā [Tib.50a] vinivṛttir na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20359: svasamutthāpitāyā atītāyā vijñaptes tatkāla eva prāpticchedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20364: tatra vijñapter avacane kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20371: na niruddhāyā naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītāyā vijñapter anubaṃdhinī prāptir ity ata etadavijñapter eva tyāgakāraṇam ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20380: maṇḍalakam akṛtvā vā [Tib.50b] na bhokṣya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20381: tad akṛtvā bhuṃjānasya sā madhyamā avijñaptiś chidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20391: atra vairāgyataś ca kiṃcid iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20399: asāv upakleśaprakāraḥ satatsahabhūprāptyanucaraḥ upakleśaprakārasyeti grahaṇaṃ kleśasyāpy upakleśatvena sarvasaṃgrahārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20401: ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te syur upakleśā na kleśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20405: tīvrasya ca hrīvyapatrāpyasyābhāvād eṣāṃ saṃvaro nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:20417: yena hrīvyapatrāpyeṇa yogād yasya hrīvyapatrāpyasya vipādanāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:20421: yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti yistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20434: (IV.46cd, 47) nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni seṃjitāny uktāni bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:20435: yad atra vitarkitam vicāritam ity evam ādi.
T07yabhkvyu:20436: idam atrāryā iṃjitam ity āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20440: tṛtīye 'pi yad atra sukhaṃ [Tib.51b] sukham iti cetasa ābhogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20441: idam atrāryā iṃjitam ity āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20442: atha kasmāt sarvam eva rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ karmāniṃjyam (Abhidh-k-vy 390) uktam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:20446: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ samādhisapakṣālatayā seṃjitam evānyatrāniṃjyam uktam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:20447: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karma vipākaṃ prati neṃjatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:20455: aho batāhaṃ devasubhagānāṃ manuṣyasubhagānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:20458: kṃadhātuprathamadhyānayoḥ [Tib.52a] kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ caitasikaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ sukhā vedanā.
T07yabhkvyu:20471: tatra sukhā duḥkhā vā vedanā nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:20475: dhyānāṃtare vā kasyacit karmaṇo 'nyasya vipāko vedanā na syān na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20476: na hi sukhavedanīyasya maulaprathamadhyānabhūmikasya karmaṇo dhyānāṃtare sa vipāka iti yujyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20482: etaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāka ity eke bruvate.
T07yabhkvyu:20493: dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20501: ataḥ kuśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇaś caitasiky eva vedanā vipāko vipacyata ity avadhāraṇān na tasya karmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāko nāpi vedanāto 'nya iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20502: avitarkaṃ hi karma dhyānāṃtarāt prabhṛty ūrdhvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20517: yady adho 'pi caturthād dhyānād aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmāsti kuśalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20520: na hi kevalaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ kuśalam ā tṛtīyād dhyānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20523: iṣṭavipākaṃ ca kuśalam ity asya virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20524: na hi kevalam iṣṭavipākaṃ kuśalam iṣṭāniṣṭaviparītavipākam api kuśalam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:20545: duḥkhavedanāhitaṃ duḥkhavedanīyam iti vistarṇa pūrvavad yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20551: sukhavedanāhitaṃ sukhaṃ vedanīyam asminn iti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20558: atha vā no tu sa rūpaṃ rāgeṇa pratyanubhavaty ālaṃbata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20560: dṛṣṭe janmani vedanīyaṃ vipākalakṣaṇam asyeti dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karmeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20562: yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate anubhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20563: dve asya vedanā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca tasmin samaye [Tib.54a] niruddhe bhavata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20565: dṛṣṭa eva janmani vipākāraṃbhād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20572: teṣām evaṃ prathamadvitīye koṭyau varṇayatāṃ karmāṣṭavidhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20573: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ niyatam aniyataṃ ca vipākaṃ prati.
T07yabhkvyu:20575: upapadyavedanīyaṃ niyatam aniyataṃ ca vipākaṃ prati.
T07yabhkvyu:20583: syāt triṣu prāṇātipātādattādānamṛṣāvādeṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayam ātmanā prayuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20585: ekaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam aparam upapadyavedanīyam aparaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyam anyac cāniyatavedanīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20598: akuśalasya hi caturvidhasyāpi narakeṣv ākṣepaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20603: tasya hi tasyāṃ bhūmāv upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20605: āryasya hi tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20611: na hy asau bhavyaḥ punar ādhastīṃ bhūmim āyātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20612: na hy asāv āryo 'parihāṇadharmā yato vītarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20613: tata ādhastīm adhastātbhavāṃ bhūmim āyātuṃ bhavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20616: āryo bhavāgralābhī parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihāya rūpadhātāv upapadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:20617: tasyopapadyavedanīyam aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cāpi saṃbhavati yathoktam udāyisūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:20619: aniyatavedanīyam aparihāṇadharmāpy āryo dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ ca yatropapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20633: kalalavedanīyaṃ niyataṃ yāvad aṃtarābhavavedanīyaṃ niyatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20636: ata evānyad aṃtarābhavavedanīyaṃ karma noktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20638: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam upapadyavedanīyam aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ aniyatavedanīyaṃ cety atra noktam.
T07yabhkvyu:20641: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ karma niyatam (Abhidh-k-vy 394) iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20649: yo 'pi hi pārasikaḥ puṇyabuddhyā mātaraṃ mārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:20651: tad akuśalam ānaṃtaryaṃ karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20655: bhikṣuṇā kila kenacid vyavahāraparājitena saṃghaḥ striyo yūyam iti samudācaritaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20656: tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme puruṣavyaṃjanam aṃtarhitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20660: śaṃṭhena gavām apuṃstvaṃ kariṣyamāṇam abhivīkṣya mamedṛśam apuṃstve duḥkham iti tīvreṇāśayena teṣāṃ gavām apuṃstvaṃ pratimokṣitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20661: tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhūtam.
T07yabhkvyu:20665: tato bhūmer atyaṃtavairāgyāt tad adṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam api karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ saṃpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20677: evam avasthāṃtaraniyatavipākena karmaṇā tadvatpudgalasyātyaṃtaṃ tasyā bhūmer vairāgyāsaṃbhavād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20684: apramāṇena puṇyena paribhāvitānugatā ca saṃtatir vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:20689: apramāṇeṣu sattveṣu sukham utpadyatām (Abhidh-k-vy 395) ity adhyāśayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20696: eteṣu pudgaleṣu kṛtānāṃ karāpakārāṇām upakārāpakārāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20697: phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharma ihaiva janmani prāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20706: kā punas tasya paripūrṇasvabhāvatā paripūrṇaphalatā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:20711: sa hi phalamārgas tribhiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20717: na te tadvyutthitās tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:20720: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ hi kleśānāṃ sāvaśeṣaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ayaṃ viśeṣa ukta ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20725: na cāvitarkasya karmaṇaḥ savitarka vicāro 'dharabhūmiko vipāko yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20726: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipāka iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20729: [Tib.57a] caitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ nānyad asti.
T07yabhkvyu:20730: na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātam etad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20734: (IV.59) daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka ity etad amṛṣyann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:20738: katamasminn asau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:20743: ity ato vipākena daurmanasyena bhavitavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20754: tena khalu punaḥ samayena vasiṣṭhasagotrāyā brāhmaṇyāḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ kālagatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20755: sā teṣāṃ kālakriyayā nagnonmattā kṣiptacittā tenatenānuhiṇḍaṃtī yena mithilāmravaṇaṃ tenopasaṃkrāṃtā.
T07yabhkvyu:20756: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati sma.
T07yabhkvyu:20757: adrākṣīd vasiṣṭhasagotrā [Tib.57b] brāhmaṇī bhagavaṃtaṃ dūrād eva.
T07yabhkvyu:20760: adrākṣīt bhagavān vasiṣṭhasagotrāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dūrād eva.
T07yabhkvyu:20761: dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:20764: āyuṣmān ānando vasiṣṭhasagotrāyai brāhmaṇyai uttarāsaṃgam adāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20765: atha vasiṣṭhasagotrā brāhmaṇī uttarāsaṃgaṃ prāvṛtya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāṃtā.
T07yabhkvyu:20766: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikaṃte niṣaṇṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:20767: ekāṃtaniṣaṇṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasagotrāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:20772: ayaṃ tatrārthaḥ bhagavāṃs tasyai dānakathādi kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:20776: tasyā apareṇa samayena saptamaḥ putraḥ kālagataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20785: dīrghe 'dhvani mayā brahmaṃ khāditāni tathā tvayā.
T07yabhkvyu:20788: kaḥ śocet paritapyeta parideveta vā punaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:20789: jñātvā niḥsaraṇaṃ loke jāteś ca maraṇasya ca.
T07yabhkvyu:20790: sāhaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ jñātvā jāteś ca maraṇasya ca
T07yabhkvyu:20791: na śocāmi na tapyāmi kṛte buddhasya śāsana
T07yabhkvyu:20793: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:20798: ata eva sa ca karmavipākaja ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20802: yasmāt karmajena yāvat bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:20804: ubhayaṃ kṣiptacittasya kliṣṭaṃ cittam ity eva tatrodāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20805: na hi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vipāko yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20816: āryāṇāṃ kṣipyate cittaṃ anyatra bhūtavaiṣamyād eva.
T07yabhkvyu:20818: niyatasya karmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ pṛthagjanāvasthāyām [Tib.58b] eva vipākāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20820: ata eva caitad aniyatam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20823: ājīvikābhayam aślokabhayaṃ pariṣacchāradyabhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ durgatibhayaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:20843: tad api hy akuśalena na vyatibhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20849: trividhasya ca kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo vipāko dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītayoḥ kāyavākkarmaṇoḥ dvitīyādiṣv api dhyāneṣu sadbhāvād asti.
T07yabhkvyu:20859: ekasmin saṃtāne kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca samudācaratīti kṛtvā kuśalam akuśalena vyavakīryate.
T07yabhkvyu:20864: nāvaśyam akuśalaṃ kuśalena vyavakīryata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20866: yasmāt kāmadhātau pratipakṣabhūtasya samādher abhāvād akuśalasya balavattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20868: tathā hi kāmadhātau mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlasamucchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20872: na tu naiva śuklam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20881: dhātupatitaś ca vijpāka ity ato 'nāsravaṃ karmavipākaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20884: anāsravaṃ hi karma dhātupatitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ viruṇaddhi.
T07yabhkvyu:20887: dviḥ karmagrahaṇaṃ yat tat karmāstīty apadiṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20888: tat karma sat saṃvidyamānam apracyutasvabhāvaṃ karmakṣayāya saṃvartata ity asya caturthasya karmaṇo dyotanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20891: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20893: dharmakṣāṃtigrahaṇaṃ kāmavairāgye cānaṃtaryamārgagrahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarasya kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇamārgatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20894: anāsravamārgasyaivehādhikṛtatvāl laukikā ānaṃtaryamārgās tatprahāṇabhūtā api na gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:20905: tadālaṃbanasya kleśasya prahāṇāt tasya kuśalasya prahāṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:20906: tadālaṃbanakleśaprahānaṃ ca navamasya tadālaṃbanakleśaprakārasya prahāṇe sati bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:20908: tadā hi navamasya kleśaprakārasya prāpticchede visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyate.
