T07yabhkvyu:20909: tasya ca kṛṣṇaśuklasya karmaṇo 'nyasyāpi cānivṛtavyākṛtasya sāsravasya dharmasya visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyata iti varṇayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:20915: tato narakagater anyatra kāmadhātau manuṣyādigatau akuśalasya kuśalasya ca karmaṇo vipākas tena gatinaiyamyakāraṇena.
T07yabhkvyu:20916: tadanyakāmadhātuvedanīyam ubhayam apy aviśeṣya miśrīkṛtya kṛṣṇaśuklam ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20928: itarathā hi rūpārūpyāvacarasyāpi darśanaheyasya kṛṣṇavipākatvavacanaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20939: tan miśrīkṛtyobhayam api kṛṣṇaśuklam ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20942: munitā vā munikarma vā mauneyaṃ kāpeyavat.
T07yabhkvyu:20956: tat kilakāyavākkarmabhyām aśaikṣābhyām anumīyate aśaikṣām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:20958: praśāṃtena kāyakarmaṇā praśāṃtena vākkarmaṇeti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20962: yasmāc cittasyavijñaptir nāsty ato na manaskarma viratisvabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20966: ato mano eva sarvākuśalebhyo virataṃ maunam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:20969: te cārhata uparatā ity arhan paramārthamuniḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20979: tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:20987: kathaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20988: iha bhikṣava ekatyaḥ saṃciṃtya trividhaṃ karma kāyena karma karoty upacinoti caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manaseti vistareṇoktvāha [Tib.61b].
T07yabhkvyu:20989: kathaṃ bhikṣavas trividhaṃ manasā saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:20993: khalu bhikṣava ihaikatyo bhavati viparītadarśīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20994: na cānyad abhidhyādivyatiriktaṃ tatra manaskarmoktam ity abhidyādaya eva manaskarmeti dārṣṭāṃtikāḥ sautrāṃtikaviśeṣā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:20995: evaṃ tu sati karmakleśayor aikyaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21002: yady evaṃ saṃcetanīyasūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyata ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:21004: sūtre tu cetanāyās tanmukhenābhidhyādimukhena pravṛttes tair abhidhyādibhis tāṃ cetanāṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:21006: anyathā cetanāmataṃ bhikṣavaḥ karma vadāmi cetayitvā cety etad virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21009: pareṣām anugrahopaghātayor abhisaṃdhyabhāve kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭyor yathākramaṃ [Tib.62a] kuśalākuśalatvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21012: yasmāt parānugrahābhisaṃdheḥ paropaghātābhisaṃdheś ca samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭī mūlaṃ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21032: na tv avijñaptir eva ṣaḍ ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21058: na tv avaśyam avijñaptir ity ata evāha.
T07yabhkvyu:21066: tadyathā mṛte 'pi prāṇini punaḥ prahāradānaṃ koṣaṇaṃ mānsacchedanam ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:21072: yo hy prayujyate maulaṃ karmapathaṃ [Tib.63a] na janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:21073: tasya prayogaphalam asti na tu phalaparipūriḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21075: yathā tāvad iha kaścit parasvaṃ hartukāmo maṃcād utthiṣṭhati śastraṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:21082: tatra yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptir ayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21083: dvābhyām hi kāraṇābhyām adattādānāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ phalaparipūritaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:21088: anukīrtayati vā tāvad asya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21089: evam anyeṣv api paṃcasu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21093: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulo 'nyāśrayodayād
T07yabhkvyu:21099: mṛte prāṇini yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21103: atra śāstre prayogaśabdena pṛṣṭham uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21112: kathaṃ ca na doṣa ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21116: yo 'yaṃ praśnaḥ syāt prāṇī hataḥ prānātipātaś cāniruddha ity atra.
T07yabhkvyu:21117: pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktam iti kim ayaṃ pakṣaḥ parityakta eva.
T07yabhkvyu:21120: yadi maraṇabhavānaṃtarakṣaṇavartī prāṇī bhavaty atra prayogaśabdena maula ukta itīṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21123: vijñaptis tarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21125: na hi tena vijñaptiprahāreṇa mṛtasya māraṇaṃ punar astīti manyāmāno 'yaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:21127: yasmād asāv anidarśanatvād apratighatvāc ca prahārākhyā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21128: kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam iti vaibhāṣikeṇokte.
T07yabhkvyu:21131: prāṇini mṛte tasyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ na dṛśyata iti vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:21132: avijñaptir idānīṃ kathaṃ bhavaty asati sāmarthye maulaḥ karmapatha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21133: yasmād evam avijñaptir asāmarthye 'pi maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21135: tad ubhayaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptyākhyaṃ [Tib.64a] karmapathaḥ syād yujyetety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21136: evam anyeṣv api yathāyogaṃ yojyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21137: yathā parasvaṃ hartukāmaḥ kāryasiddhaye parakīyaṃ hṛtvā tena paśunā baliṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21138: dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta (Abhidh-k-vy 403) tair eva tadapahārārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21158: nāsti paraloka iti kṛtvā nirapekṣo haṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:21179: mṛṣāvādādayo lobhajāḥ dveṣajāś ca pūrvavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21186: nāsti paraloka iti nirmaryādaya yo mṛṣāvādo 'yaṃ mohajaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21199: tatra jñaptyā idaṃnāmānam upasaṃpādayet saṃgha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21205: tasyāvasāne tu yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā vāvijñaptir (Abhidh-k-vy 404) ayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21206: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvan niśrayā ārocyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21211: yāvat saṃvaro na tyajyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21234: nāma hi vedanādayaḥ skaṃdhāḥ rūpaṃ rūpaskaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21236: nāmakāyādhiṣṭhānā mṛṣāvādādayo vāgnāmni pravartata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:21238: iti pratiṣedhāt pṛṣṭham api na bhavatīti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21253: svarasenaiva vinaśvarāṇāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ katham (Abhidh-k-vy 405) anyenaiṣāṃ nirodhaḥ kriyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21258: tathā hi nirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattisamāpannasya mṛtasya ca na pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21261: kiṃ te kāyasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21266: kāyacittasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21269: utpannasya svarasanirodhād anāgatasyotpattiṃ pratibadhnan nirodhayatīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21285: kim athaiṣā ṣaṣṭhīty atra pradeśe ciṃtayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:21286: āstāṃ tāvad etat sāmānyāsikam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21292: asaṃcintyakṛtād api prāṇipātāt kartur adharmo yathāgnisaṃsparśād abuddhipūrvād asaṃciṃtyakṛtād dāha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21294: teṣāṃ nirgraṃthānām evaṃ vādināṃ abuddhipūrve 'pi parastrīdarśanasaṃsparśana eṣa prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21314: vadhye hi sati prāṇātipātakriyā vadhakasya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21316: agnir hi na kevalam anyajanaṃ dahati.
T07yabhkvyu:21331: yadi devadattadravyaṃ harāmīty abhiprāyamāṇo yajñadattadravyaṃ harati.
T07yabhkvyu:21335: aparigrahe hi stūpe dānam aphalaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21342: bālakasya vā puṣṭaye tat stanyaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21344: yathā devadattaṃ mārayāmīty abhiprāyeṇa yajñadattaṃ mārayato na prāṇātipāto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21346: ihānyasmiṃ vastuni prayogo 'bhipreto 'nyac ca vastu paribhuktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21351: tasya hi tan na marṣaṇīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21357: nāsty atra devadatto 'sti vety ucyamāne śabdaḥ śrotrā vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21358: tadanaṃtaraṃ tu cakṣurādisamūho devadatto vākyārtho vikalpena manovijñānena vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21361: iṣyate ca vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāvo maulaḥ karmapatha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21367: ye tvayā ghrāṇena gandhā na ghrātāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21370: yāvad ye tvayā manasā dharmā na vijñātā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21376: gandhādīnām arūpalakṣaṇatvena (Abhidh-k-vy 407) dṛṣṭabhāvabāhyatvād aśabdadharmāyatanalakṣaṇatvena ca śrutavijñātabhāvabāhyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21378: dṛṣṭa iti vā yāvad vijñāta iti vety eṣā yuktiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21385: atra ca te tava ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye rūpādau.
T07yabhkvyu:21392: atra ca te mālakīmātar dṛṣṭe viṣayaṣaṭke dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:21394: mate vijñāte viṣayaṣaṭke eva vijñātamātram ity evaṃ tat sūtrapadaṃ vyākhyāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21395: na hi priyāpriyanimittādhyāropas tava bhaviṣyatīti sūtrārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21396: [Tib.68b] nanu ca yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭānīty evoktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:21397: na tu na śrutāni yāvan na vijñātānīty evoktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:21398: evaṃ śabdā na śrutā ity evoktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21399: na tu na dṛṣṭā yāvan na vijñātā ity uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21400: evaṃ yāvad dharmā na vijñātā ity evoktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21401: na tu na dṛṣṭā yāvan na spṛṣṭā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21404: yathā hi rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭānīty uktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:21410: yat paṃcabhir indriyaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ rūpādi tad dṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21411: yat parata āgamitaṃ viṣayaṣaṭkaṃ tac chrutaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21412: yad yuktyanumānato rucitam abhipretaṃ tan mataṃ yuktyanumānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21417: sa dṛṣṭavyavahāraṃ varjayitvā tribhiḥ śrutādibhir vyavahārair vyavahriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21419: tasmād yuktir apy eṣā na yuktir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21420: yā vaibhāṣikair [Tib.69a] uktāḥ evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇa ity evamādikā.
T07yabhkvyu:21424: yac chrotreṇa śrutaṃ parataś cāgamitam iti ubhayam apy abhīṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21430: tad evaṃ yogācāranayenāpi ṣaḍ apy ete viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā vyavahriyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:21433: vijñātā ity evety ato nāsti gaṃdhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21441: iha tu prāṇātipātasya kāyikatvāt kāyiky evāvijñaptir maulasaṃgṛhītā.
T07yabhkvyu:21445: atra mṛṣāvādasya vācikatvād vāciky evāvijñaptir maulasaṃgṛhītety avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21451: bhikṣupoṣadhe hi kacci 'ttha pariśuddhā iti vinayadhareṇānuśrāvite.
T07yabhkvyu:21452: yadi kaścit bhikṣuḥ satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21455: kathaṃ tayo ṛṣibhikṣvoḥ kāyavāgbhyām aparākramamāṇayoḥ prāṇātipāto mṛṣāvādaś ca yathākramaṃ karmapathaḥ sidhyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21460: teṣāṃ hi sattvaparityāgapravṛttaṃ pāpāśayam avetyāmanuṣyās tadabhiprasannāḥ kāyena parākramaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:21466: tatra cāvaśyaṃ kāyavākceṣṭayā bhavitavyaṃ anye tv āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21467: na kāmadhātāv avaśyam avijñaptiḥ sarvaiva vijñaptyadhīnā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21469: ity akuśalāpy evaṃjātīyā kācid vijñaptim aṃtareṇāpi syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21470: pūrvavijñaptaṃ tair iti [Tib.70a] avaśyam itaratrāpi bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:21481: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21489: sa saṃbhinnapralāpa ity uktvodāharaṇaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:21494: ādiśabdena paridevasaṃgaṇikābhyāṃ yo 'nyaḥ kliṣṭacittānāṃ kaścid ālāpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21506: so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāya vigatābhidhyena cetasā bahulaṃ viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:21507: vyāpādaṃ styānamiddham auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsāṃ loke prahāya tīrṇakāṃkṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21513: daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yad audārikam duścaritaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21521: mā bhūc cakravartināṃ uttarakauravāṇāṃ cābhidhyā karmapatha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21522: na hi tatra kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇā nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:21546: tathā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti phalāpavādikā.
T07yabhkvyu:21555: abhidhyādisaṃprayogiṇī teṣām abhidhyādīnāṃ vāhena gatyā vahati.
T07yabhkvyu:21564: karmaṇaś ca cetanākhyasya paṃthāna iti karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21566: tān adhiṣṭhāya tān prāṇātipātādīn adhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21569: yathā vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣau.
T07yabhkvyu:21570: vakraṣ ca kuṭilaś ca vakrāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21571: iha tu karma ca karmapathāś ceti na karmaśabdasya karmapathaśabdasya ca sārūpyaṃ śabdataḥ nāpy arthataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21572: karmārthasya karmapathārthasya ca bhinnatvād ekaśeṣo na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:21573: yasmāt tv asarūpāṇāṃ sākalyenaikadeśena tu sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:21579: yaṅ ca luk ca yaṅlukāv iti ayaṃ luko 'niṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21581: yaṅo yaṅlugekadeśasya ca yaṅ iti sārūpyāt sidhyaty ekaśeṣo yaṅlukor iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21583: karma ca karmapathāś ca karmapathā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21585: karmapathāś cābhidhyaḥ karmapathāś ca prāṇātipātādaya iti karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21588: karma ca te karmapathāś ca karmakarmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21593: kuśalā api karmapathā evam eva yojyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21595: prāṇātipātaviratyādayaś ca karma ca karmaṇaś ca paṃthāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21596: yasmāt tadartha iti vistaraḥ yasmān maulakarmapathārthaṃ teṣaṃ tatprayogāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21597: yasmāc ca maulakarmapathamūlikā teṣāṃ tatpṛṣṭhānāṃ pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21599: yady api karmapatho 'pi karmapathasya prayoga uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21608: yeṣāṃ maulānām utkarṣāpakarṣeṇādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām utkarṣāpkarṣau loke bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21617: na hi teṣām abhidhyādibhyo 'nyan manaskarmāsti cetanā.
T07yabhkvyu:21618: yasya karmaṇas te 'bhidhyādayaḥ paṃthāna iti karmapathāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21630: karmaṇaś caiṣām ekatarasya panthāna iti karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21631: (IV.80, 81) mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlasamuccheda ity etam arthaṃ vaktukāma upodghātaṃ bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21653: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ prāpter dūrīkaraṇam abhipretya tasya pudgalasya.
T07yabhkvyu:21657: yasmād asau tatsaṃtatiḥ pūrvaṃ bhājanabhūtā tatprāptīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21661: śrutaciṃtābhāvanāmayebhyaḥ prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvam evāsau mṛdumṛdvyavasthāyāṃ tebhyaḥ parihīṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21667: ubhe apy ete hetuphalāpavādinyau mithyādṛṣṭī kuśalasamucchede vyāpriyete.
T07yabhkvyu:21675: kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃta ity adhikṛtaṃ kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:21678: sā saṃprayogamātreṇa saṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣv anuśete nālaṃbanataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21683: yā ca hetum apavadate yā ca phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21684: yā ca sabhāgaṃ dhātum ālaṃbate yā ca visabhāgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21685: yā ca sāsravaṃ yā cānāsravam ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:21688: yathā duḥkhādidarśanaheyāḥ kleśā nava prakārā api duḥkhādisatyadarśanāt sakṛt prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:21689: tadvan nava prakārāṇy api kuśalamūlāni sakṛt samucchidyaṃta ity ete.
T07yabhkvyu:21691: yathā navaprakāreṇa mārgeṇa navaprakāraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21694: evaṃ navaprakārayāpi mithyādṛṣṭyā navaprakārāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:21706: kuśalamūlasamucchedasamāptiṃ saṃdhāya katamāny adhimātrāṇīti vistareṇa etad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21710: yasmāt tair navabhir mithyādṛṣṭiprakāraiḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ niravaśeṣacchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21711: eko 'pi hi prakāras teṣām asamucchinna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21712: mṛdumṛdunavamaḥ prakāraḥ sarveṣāṃ navānām api prakārāṇāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21717: yo mṛdumṛdunā cittena saṃvaraḥ samātta āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:21718: tasya mṛdumṛdoś cittasya mṛdumṛdukuśalamūlasaṃprayuktasya (Abhidh-k-vy 413) tyāge samucchede tasya saṃvarasya tyāgo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21719: evaṃ yāvad yo 'dhimātrādhimātreṇa cittena samāttaḥ saṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21725: kena karmaṇety evaṃ karmaphalapratyakṣatvān na deveṣu kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:21728: sarvālpair aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ paṃcabhir vedanendriyaiḥ kāyajīvitamanaindriyaiś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:21736: atideśād asty anayor api kuśalamūlasamuccheda iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:21740: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato niyatam asāv aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21741: caturbhir vedanendriyais tribhiś ca kāyajīvitamanaindriyaiḥ [Tib.75a] strīndriyeṇāṣṭamena.
T07yabhkvyu:21758: yathāpāyikāḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭayoḥ prajñayor adṛḍhatvān na kuśalamūlāni samucchindaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:21771: arthata etad uktaṃ bhavaty anānaṃtaryakāriṇa iha pratisaṃdhir bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21795: atra ca yaḥ svabalena parabaleneti pūrvoktasyaivāyaṃ paryāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21796: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno yo dṛṣṭiśīlavipanna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21819: sā cetanā ekena karmapathena saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21820: abhidhyayā vā vyāpādena vā mithyādṛṣṭyā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:21827: tasyāpi hy ayaṃ ayaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21829: vyāpādena prāṇātipātena ceti dvābhyāṃ saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21837: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadha ity abhidhyāviṣṭasya cādattādāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21850: nanu coktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:21856: evam apy abhidhyādyanyataracittasya tān prāṇātipātādīn kārayato (Abhidh-k-vy 415) dvābhyāṃ saha cetanā vartata iti saṃbhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:21859: udāharaṇamātraṃ tv etad uktam ity adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21865: na tarhīdānīm adattādānasya lobhenaiva niṣṭhā sidhyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21868: apaharaṇacittasyaiva tatparisamāptāv adattādānaparisamāptau sa niyamo jñeyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21878: evaṃ bhedābhiprāyatvāt tad eva paruṣavacanaṃ paiśunyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21892: tad eva hy anṛtavacanaṃ paiśunyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpa iti cocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:21894: evaṃ paruṣavacanam api trināmakaṃ bhavatīti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21909: evam abhidhyādigatasyānyapaṃcaṣaṭniṣṭhāgamane ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhiś ca saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21911: ṣaṭsu prāṇātipātādiṣu prayogaṃ kṛtvābhidhyāgatasya svayaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane.
T07yabhkvyu:21912: navabhiḥ saha vartata iti nāsty etat.
T07yabhkvyu:21918: nāpi rūpīnaikena saṃvarasaṃgṛhītena karmapathena saha cetanā vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21921: kuśale cetasy anbhidhyāvyāpādayor dvayor avaśyaṃ sahabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21922: saṃvarasaṃgṛhītānāṃ ca prāṇātipātādīnām [Tib.78a] eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ avaśyaṃ sahabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21924: bhikṣusaṃvarasaṃgṛhītānāṃ kāyikavācikānāṃ kliṣṭāvyākṛtāvasthāyāṃ saptānām eva saṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21925: kuśalacittāvasthāyāṃ ca navānāṃ daśānāṃ vā saṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21926: pāriśeṣyāt dvyādibhiḥ saha vartata ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21929: kuśaleṣu paṃcasu vijñāneṣv anabhidhyā cāvyāpādaś ca staḥ na samyagdṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21934: ārūpyasamāpattisaṃgṛhītayoś ca kṣayānutpādajñānayor ābhyām eva dvābhyāṃ saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21943: tatra hy anabhidhyāvyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭaya eva trayaḥ karmapathā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:21945: akuśalāvyākṛtacittasyeti viśeṣaṇān mānasā na saṃtīti daśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:21951: śrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāne tv abrahmacaryād viratis tṛtīyaḥ karmapathaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21954: upāsakaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāne taiś caturbhir yathoktair (Abhidh-k-vy 417) anabhidhyāvyāpādābhyāṃ ceti ṣaḍbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21957: upāsakaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāna eva tair eva yathoktaiḥ samyagdṛṣṭyā ca saptamena karmapathena.
T07yabhkvyu:21959: akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne saptabhir eva rūpibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21965: kṣayānutpādajnānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tair eva navabhiḥ saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:21974: sarvā ca dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasahavartinī kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayuktā cetanā saptabhiḥ kāyikavācikair dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21977: saṃvarasaṃgṛhītaiḥ karmapathaiḥ sahaiva cetanā [Tib.79b] vartata iti darśitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:21978: saṃvaranirmuktena tv aṣṭavidhasaṃvaranirmuktena tv ekenāpi saha syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:21988: kuśalamanovijñānasya pudgalasya dvyaṃgasamādāne yugapan mānasais tribhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21990: paṃcāṃgasamādāne yugapat taiś ca rūpibhiḥ paṃcabhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:21994: kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya saṃvarāsaṃgṛhītapaṃcāṃgasamādāne paṃcabhiḥ saha vartata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22008: apāpāśayatvān na prāṇātipātādayaḥ ṣaḍ api saṃmukhībhāvataḥ saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22009: niyatāyuṣkatvān na prāṇātipātaḥ dravyastṛiparigrahābhāvād yathākramaṃ nādattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:22011: yadi parigraho nāsti katham eṣām abrahmacaryam iti pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:22017: śiraśchedān madhyacchedāc ca devā api mriyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:22018: devo devaṃ na mārayatīty ukte avadhyā devā ity abhipretaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22019: devānāṃ hy aṃgapratyaṃgāni chinnāni chinnāni punar jāyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:22020: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi śiromadhyacchedāc chiraśchedān madhyacchedāc ca na punaḥ pratisaṃdhānam ity asti devānām vadha ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22039: trividhaḥ saṃvaraḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvaraś ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ grahītavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22059: viṣamartupariṇāmā iti viṣama ṛtupariṇāma eṣām iti viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ [tib 81a] sasyādaya oṣadhayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22067: idaṃ niṣyandaphalam iti bāhyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 419) tad vastv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22071: prāṇātipātaprayogeṇa hi vadhyasya prāṇino 'tīvatīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22073: yathā tasya vadhyasya prāṇina āyur upadrūyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22076: tatra ca na duḥkhā vedanāstīti yuktam iha mauleneti vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22081: prāṇātipātena mauleneti sūtrārthaṃ paśyann evaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:22085: tasmiṃ prayoge prāṇātipātopacāraṃ kṛtvaivam uktaṃ prāṇātipāteneti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22091: saced itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ prāṇātipātenālpāyur bhavaty adattādānena bhogavyasanī bhavatīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:22092: bhavati hy atra hetuvipākaphalayoḥ sādṛśam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22096: saced itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ prāṇātipātaviratyā dīrghāyur bhavatīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:22101: adattādānaṃ hi kurvatā dravyasvāmino duḥkham utpāditaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22104: ato 'sya duḥkhanād bhogatyājanād ojonāśanāc ca trividhaṃ phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22111: evaṃ paradāram abhigacchatā parasya duḥkham utpāditaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22122: saced itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ sa na bhogavyasanī bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22130: evam adattādānāt prativiramatā nārthasvāmino duḥkham utpāditaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22157: yathā tridaṇḍinn eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya vividhadarśanasamāraṃbhānuyogam anuyuktā viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22184: ity apy evaṃrūpāc chramaṇo vividhadarśanasamāraṃbhānuyogāt prativirato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22185: yathāpi tatra tridaṇḍinn eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya vividhaśabdaśravaṇasamāraṃbhānuyogayuktā viharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22204: ity apy evaṃrūpāc chramaṇo vividhaśabdaśravaṇasamāraṃbhānuyogāt prativirato bhavatīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:22227: tasya tat puruṣakāraphalam ata eva tac ca prahāṇaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22229: pūrvotpannavarjyā iti pūrvotpannaṃ phalaṃ na yujyata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:22235: tasya hi niṣyandaphalaṃ samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22236: visaṃyogaphalaṃ visaṃyoga eva yat tat prahāṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22242: adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvād anye sarve saṃskrtāḥ pūrvotpannavarjyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22245: prahāṇamārgād yad anyasāsravaṃ karma samāhitam asamāhitaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:22246: tad api caturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:22248: tasya hi vipākaphalaṃ svabhūmāv iṣṭo 'niṣṭo vā vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22260: avyākṛtaṃ ca yan nivṛtāvyākṛtam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:22276: yasmāt kuśalā dharmā akuśalānāṃ na sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22292: tasmād akuśalānāṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ cākuśalāḥ niṣyandaphalaṃ yujyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:22308: atītasya karmaṇaḥ paścād atītas tadvipāko vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22311: svabhāvavarjyāḥ tena sahotpannāḥ paścādutpannāś cātītāḥ adhipatiphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22319: evaṃ pratyutpannā api tasyātītasya catvāri phalāni yojyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:22325: pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyutpannasya dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22326: tasya hi sahotpannaṃ tadbalāj (Abhidh-k-vy 423) jātam iti puruṣakāraphalam adhipatiphalaṃ ca bhavaty eva.
T07yabhkvyu:22329: pravāhāpekṣatvād vipākasya na vartamānaṃ vartamānasya vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22334: sādṛśyena cāsyedaṃ phalam iti paricchettum aśakyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:22337: vipākaphalaṃ tu bhaved anāgatasya hy akuśalasya kuśalasāsravasya vānāgataṃ paścādutpatsyamānaṃ ca vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22340: adhipatiphalaṃ tu sugamam iti na punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22372: [Tib.85b] na cāśaikṣasya vipāko bhavatīty ato na vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22401: aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāry anukramam
T07yabhkvyu:22404: apraheyasya te tv ekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam
T07yabhkvyu:22412: ity evamādiṣu yathākramam iti sarvatra vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22427: kiṃ ca tadanyad avyākṛtaṃ karma vidhibhraṣṭavidhibhraṣṭābhyām anyad avyākṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22432: yady ekam eva karmaikam eva janmākṣipati.
T07yabhkvyu:22434: tat kathaṃ na virudhyata iti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22435: tena janmāntare tagaraśikhine pratyekabuddhāya [Tib.86b] piṇḍapāto dattaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22440: tulye 'pi mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyo bhavati kaścid vikalendriyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22444: varṇādayas tu paripūrakasya karmaṇaḥ phalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22446: tulye 'pi mānuṣye kaścid varṇavān kaścin neti.
T07yabhkvyu:22448: anyathā hi na kaścid vikalendriyaḥ syāt sati janmākṣepa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22452: yasmāt karmaṇā cetanākhyena saha te samāpattī na bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22456: tadākṣepakeṇa karmaṇā saha bhavaṃtyo 'pi prāptayo na tena sahaikaphalā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22457: vṛkṣaprapāṭikā iva hi prāptayo bahiravasthāyino bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22470: aṇḍajāṃ saṃsvedajāṃ ca yoniṃ na pratipadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:22471: strītvam aṣṭamaṃ ca bhavaṃ na nirvartayiṣyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22513: ity evaṃ paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni suprajñapakāni.
T07yabhkvyu:22514: na tu punas tāny apāyādiniyatāni karmāṇi paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni suprajñapakānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22522: vipākāvaraṇasya hi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vyāpāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22524: yasya dharmasya yogāt pitṛvadhādeḥ so 'naṃtaro bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22528: yathā yenānāsraveṇa mārgeṇa yogāc chramaṇo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22546: yasya hrīvyapatrāpyasya vipādanād vikopanād ānaṃtaryeṇa spṛśyeran ṣaṇḍhādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22547: tat teṣāṃ mātāpitror aṃtike na tīvraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22552: jātyandhādīnām api strīpuṃsānāṃ mātrādivadhād ānaṃtaryaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:22562: paṭubuddhīnāṃ syād ānaṃtaryaṃ tiryakpretānām apīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22564: śrūyate yathā kaścid eva viśiṣṭāśva ājāneyo mātaraṃ na gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22565: vāsasā mukhaṃ pracchādya mātaraṃ gamitas tena paścāt jñātvā svam aṃgajātam utpāṭitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22568: manuṣyasyāpy amānuṣaṃ mātāpitaraṃ mārayato na syād ānaṃtaryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22573: na hi manuṣyānurūpam upakāram amanuṣyaḥ kartuṃ samarthaḥ [Tib.88b] na ca manuṣyasyāmanuṣyayor mātāpitror aṃtike tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:22584: tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanaṃ kasmān na prāṇātipāta ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:22594: karaṇasādhanaparigrahād vā mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃghabheda ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22605: naiva ca tena viprayuktena dharmeṇa bhettā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22607: (IV.101) [Tib.89a] sa punar mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃghabhedasahajo viprayuktadharmasahajo vāgvijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22617: sa hy ūhāpohasāmarthyād anyaṃ śāstāraṃ mārgāṃtaraṃ ca grāhayituṃ samarthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22629: bhinnam bhavatīti kathaṃ bhinnam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:22638: (IV.103) avaśyaṃ hi saṃghena dvayoḥ pakṣayoḥ sthātavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22639: buddhapakṣe [Tib.89b] bhettṛpakṣe ca sthātavyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22641: (Abhidh-k-vy 428) saṃghadvayena ca bhavitavyam ity aṣṭābhir bhikṣubhir bhedyair bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22652: na bhettā śāstṛmānī bhavatīty aṣṭābhir eva bhikṣubhir bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22666: tathā tad eva cittaṃ saṃdhāvati saṃsaratītyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:22669: tena ca śrāvakayugena yasmāt pratisaṃdhānīya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22670: [Tib.90a] avaśyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ śrāvakayugaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22673: iha śākyamuner āryaḥ śāradvatīputraḥ prajñāvatām agraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22676: yasmāt parinirvṛte bhagavati tasya bhettuḥ pratidvaṃdvabhūto nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:22679: ekasyāṃ hi sīmāyāṃ pṛthakkarmakaraṇāt saṃghadvaidhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22683: jñaptisīmāyāṃ tu satyāṃ sā prakṛtisīmā vyavasthāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22684: tasyā api bandho vyavasthāpyata eveti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22689: śākyamuninā ca kila bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ paṃcābhijñasya ṛṣeḥ parṣadbhedaḥ kṛta āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:22694: guṇayogād dhi tat puṇyasya kṣetraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22695: yathā kṣetre bījam uptaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22701: upakārikṣetrasya guṇakṣetrasya vā nirākṛteḥ parityāgān mātṛpitṛvadhādiṣv (Abhidh-k-vy 429) [Tib.90b] ānaṃtaryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22710: yadi punar mātur vyaṃjanaparivṛttaṃ syāt pitur veti.
T07yabhkvyu:22711: vyaṃjanaparāvṛttyā tan mātṛtvaṃ tat pitṛtvaṃ vā vinaṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22712: mātur māraṇābhāvāt pitur māraṇābhāvād vā na syād ānaṃtaryam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22729: maṃcopari prāvaraṇakalpanena puruṣo 'tra supta iti manyamānena putreṇa tatraśastraprahāraḥ kṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22730: tena śastraprahāreṇa maṃcatalāvalīnā mātā māritety udāhāryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22731: dhāvakasya ca rajakasya putreṇa maśakaṃ mārāyāmīti maśakaprayogeṇa pitur māranam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22734: vijñaptis tv ānaṃtaryam eva tatsaṃgṛhītaiva sā nānyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22737: gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhīti rauruke nagare udrāyaṇo nāma rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ nāma putram abhiṣicya pravrajitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22741: amātyaprakrāmitena tena śikhaṇḍinā rājñā svapitā māritaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22742: tena tu māryamāṇāvasthāyāṃ sa mārako manuṣya ukto gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:22745: dvābhyām ānaṃtaryakāraṇābhyāṃ bhavatā kṛtam ānaṃtaryam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22753: chekaḥ kila śākyamanuṣyo virūḍhakabhayād viṣamaṃ vanapradeśam āśritya lubdhakavṛttim aśiśriyat.
T07yabhkvyu:22754: bhagavatā ca trāyastriṃśeṣu traimāsyāṃ kurvatā tato 'vatīrya (Abhidh-k-vy 430) chekāya saparijanāya dharmo deśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22756: tatputraiś ca phalaprāptaiḥ pūrvaṃ pratānitāni kūṭajālādīni mṛgebhyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22757: tatprayogeṇa ca māryamāṇeṣv api mṛgeṣu phalaprāptyā na te punar akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ spṛṣṭā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22760: mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedas tathāgate duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22775: na hy anyena kāyakarmaṇā vākkarmaṇā vā tāvato mahājanasya vyāpādaḥ saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22777: na hy anyad akuśalamūlaṃ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti.
T07yabhkvyu:22780: narake 'vaśyam utpattyā tāni tatsādṛśyāt tatsabhāgāny ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:22782: anyathā hy ānaṃtaryāṇy eva syur ity apareṣāṃ abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22783: anaṃtarabhāvitve 'pi na tāny ānaṃtaryāṇy eva saṃbhavaṃty atulyakālavipākatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22793: yat sukhopayogikaṃ yena saṃgho jīvikāṃ kalpayati tasyāpahāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22799: yathā puruṣasya deśatyāgaṃ kurvato dhanikā uttiṣṭhaṃte tathaivety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22806: yayoḥ kāyavācoḥ pravṛttyā parasya duḥkhadaurmanasye bhavatas tadapekṣayā tannigraho yaṃtraṇety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22811: kim anarthāyāsi bho gautama kulānāṃ pratipanno yas tvam īdṛśe durbhikṣa iyatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham aśanivad utsādayaṃ bhikṣām aṭasīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22813: ito 'haṃ grāmaṇi ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāyeti [Tib.93b] vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22829: aham apītthaṃ syām ity aparāḥ paṃcāśad ity evaṃ puṇyaśataṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22834: aṣṭau ca śītanarakā ity aṣṭacatvāriṃśad vikalpaṃ traidhātukaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22838: yathānenāsmāt traidhātukāt sattvā mocitā ity ekā cetanā.
T07yabhkvyu:22840: aham apy evaṃ mocayeyam ity ātmālaṃbaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:22841: paṃcāśac cetanā bhavaṃti [Tib.93b] tāsāṃ punar dviḥsaṃmukhībhāvāc cetanāśataṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:22843: prāṇātipātaviratir buddhasya bhagavataḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇair upetā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:22851: evaṃ daśakarmapathālaṃbanā daśa paṃcakāś cetanānāṃ paṃcāśac cetanā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:22852: tāsāṃ dviḥsaṃmukhībhāvāc cetanāśataṃ bhavatīty etat puṇyaśataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22853: yathā ayam asādhāraṇadaśakuśalakarmapathanirjāto bhagavān evam aham api syām iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:22854: tad evaṃ saty ekaikaṃ puṇyaśatajam ity etat sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:22895: tena vīryāraṃbheṇaikanavatyā kalpaiḥ paripūrṇā vīryapāramiteti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:22896: ata evoktam ekanavatyāṃ kalpeṣv ākṣiptam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22914: trayas tv abhidhyādayaḥ paṃthāna eva karmaṇaś cetanākhyasyeti [Tib.94b] karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22932: tatsaṃprayuktāyā maitrīsaṃprayuktāyāś cetanāyāḥ maitrīmukhena maitrīvaśenābhisaṃskaraṇād abhisaṃcetanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:22933: tatsahabhūr maitrīsahabhūś cetanā śīlaṃ ca dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:22934: na hi dhyānasaṃvaraṃ pravartayeyam ity adhiṣṭhāya cetanā pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:22936: anye tatsahabhuvo vedanādayaḥ puṇyam eva pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:22938: dānamaye puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca vastu ca.
T07yabhkvyu:22942: śīlamaye puṇyaṃ ca [Tib.95a] kriyā ca kriyāvastu ca.
T07yabhkvyu:22950: (IV.117) yad api dīyate tad dānam iti deyaṃ vastu karmaṇi lyuḍ iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:22953: iha tu kuśalam iṣṭaṃ dānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:22963: kāyavāgvijñaptis tad avijñaptir api vā rūpaskaṃdho draṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22968: tais tu nirvikārair eva tat kṛtam ity atas tṛṇamayaṃ tṛṇasvabhāvaṃ tad iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22970: tadvikāratāṃ parikalpya mayat kriyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:22971: tatprakṛtivacane mayad ity anena vā lakṣaṇena mayad vidhīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:22972: evaṃ parṇamayaṃ bhājanam ity etad api vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:22998: upakāritvaviśeṣāt kārāpakārau mahāphalau tayor bhavata ity artho 'vagaṃtavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23000: evaṃ ṛkṣamṛgayor guhāṃ praveśya gātroṣmaśītopanayenohyamānanadyuttāraṇena vopakāriṇor apakārakaraṇena sadyo 'ṃgapātāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23002: śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka ity evamādīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23003: ādiśabdena srotaāpattiphalapratipannakāya dattvā aprameyo bhavati vipākas tato 'prameyataraḥ srotaāpannāyetyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:23008: yad etad adān me dānam ity evamādikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23010: dattam anena me (Abhidh-k-vy 435) pūrvam iti dānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23012: dattapūrvaṃ me pitṛbhiś ca pitāmahaiś ceti dānam iti paṃcamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23015: cittālaṃkārārthaṃ yāvad uttamārthasya prāptaye dānam ity aṣṭamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23020: uttamārthasya prāptir arhattvaṃ nirvāṇasya vā prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23027: yasmād asya gatikṣetratā guṇakṣetratā ca na saṃbhavati tasmāt pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:23037: mātāpitroḥ prāṇātipātanāt guru karma na tv evam adattādikāt guru.
T07yabhkvyu:23038: na hi mātāpitror dravyāpaharaṇakarma tadvadhavat guru bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23045: atha vā nābuddhipūrvaṃ kṛtam idaṃ kuryām ity asaṃciṃtya kṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23050: yad abhyāsena bhāṣyākṣepān mṛṣāvādādyanuṣṭhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad akuśalaṃ [Tib.97a] na punar upacitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23064: avyākṛtena cittena pāṣāṇaṃ dadāmīti suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ dadyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23068: yathā bhāṣyākṣepāt satyavacanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat kuśalaṃ na punar upacitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23085: sati hi pratigrahītari yuktaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23086: tatra hi prītyanugraheṇa [Tib.97b] grahītā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23092: tathā hy atīte pi puṇavati tathāgatādau.
T07yabhkvyu:23095: yadi svacittād eva puṇyaṃ bhavec cittenaiva dānamānāv anuṣṭheyau.
T07yabhkvyu:23101: yasmād dānamānau bhagavataś cittamātreṇa ciṃtayato yā bhaktiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23102: tata iyaṃ dānamānau kurvato bhaktiḥ prakṛṣṭatarā.
T07yabhkvyu:23104: cittamātreṇa hi cintayato bhaktiḥ kāyavākkarmaṇī na pravartayataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23106: yathā hi śatruṃ hanmīti kṛtābhiprāyasya kasyacit tatsamutthitaṃ tadabhiprāyasamutthitaṃ kāyavākkarma śatrusaṃjñayā śatrur ayaṃ na tāvan mriyata ity anayā saṃjñayā tasmin mṛte 'pi kurvato bahutaram apuṇyaṃ jāyate cetanānubaṃdhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23108: tathā hy atīte 'pi parinirvṛte 'pi bhagavati tadbhaktisamutthāṃ śāstṛbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ pṛṣṭhabhūtām iva kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:23113: kukṣetre tu viparītam ity ato bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23116: na kṣetraviśeṣād iṣṭaṃ phalam iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23119: na hi sukṣetre prāṇatipātādibījasyeṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23120: kukṣetre 'pi hi phalasya mṛdvīkāphalasya bījāt mṛdvīkābījād.
T07yabhkvyu:23122: mṛdvīkāphalam eva madhuraṃ dṛṣṭam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23145: na tair dauḥśīlyahetubhiḥ samudācaradbhir upahataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23159: bhave bhoge ca satkāre ca yā tṛṣṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:23170: samādhisvabhāvaṃ tena ca saha bhavati yad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23172: tat samāhitaṃ kuśalam atyarthaṃ cittaṃ saṃvāsayati.
T07yabhkvyu:23175: na tv evam atyartham iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:23187: (IV.127cd) atha śīlaṃ bhāvanā ca kasmai saṃvartata iti vākyaśeṣato 'rthaṃ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:23191: anyat tu na prādhānyena svargāya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23203: apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:23204: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23205: cāturdeśe bhikṣusaṃghe ārāmaṃ niryātayati tatraiva cārāme vihāraṃ [Tib.99b] pratiṣṭhāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:23206: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23208: ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23209: maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsaṃspardhenāvyābādhena vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇena subhāvitenaikāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:23213: ity ūrdhvam adhas tiryak sarvataḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:23214: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23224: anena ca karmaṇā kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate.
T07yabhkvyu:23230: nanu ca kāmadhātau nāsti kuśalasya karṃaṇaḥ kalpaṃ vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23233: yāsāṃ krameṇa kalpapramāṇaṃ svārgikaṃ phalam abhinirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:23249: puṇyo bhāgaḥ apuṇyo bhāgaḥ aniṃjyo bhāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23251: atha vā puṇyaṃ bhajata iti puṇyabhāk.
T07yabhkvyu:23255: atha vā saṃsārabhāgo mokṣabhāgaś ceti dvau bhāgau.
T07yabhkvyu:23275: yena hi kāyakarmaṇā lipir likhyate mudrā vā khanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:23285: vedanādayas tūbhayatrāpi samutthānabhūtāś catvāraḥ skaṃdhā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23288: ekaṃ dve trīṇīty evamādi sā saṃkhyā.
T07yabhkvyu:23289: [Tib.101a] yat tu vācā na manasā sā gaṇanety ābhidhārmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23294: ime paryāyā upanyasyaṃta ity aparaḥ saṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23299: kleśā api hi saṃprayogiṇā kleśāṃtareṇa nivṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23312: śubhāmalā eva ca praṇītā ity avadhāraṇād ato 'nye na hīnāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23345: tathā hy uktaṃ ye kecid bhikṣavo dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā virāgas teṣāṃ agra ākhyāyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23355: tāni ca karmāṇi yathoktalakṣaṇaprabhedāni anuśayavaśād upacayaṃ gacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23358: aṃtareṇa cānuśayān vinānuśayair bhavasya janmano 'bhinirvartane utpādane na samarthāni bhavaṃti kuśalāny akuśalāni vā karmāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:23359: na hy arhataḥ paunarbhavikāni karmāṇy aniyatāni na saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23360: anuśayābhāvāt tu punarbhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23363: yasmād aṃtareṇānuśayān bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23365: apare punar etad vākyadvayam evaṃ vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:23366: tāni ca karmāṇy anuśayavaśād upacayaṃ gacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23368: tāny anuśayavaśāt punarbhavābhinirvartana upacīyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23369: na hy arhatāṃ karmāṇi punarbhavābhinirvartana upacīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:23370: aṃtareṇa cānuśayāṃ bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23372: tāny apy aṃtareṇānuśayāṃ bhavābhinirvartane na śaktāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23373: na hy arhatāṃ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ kṛtāni [Tib.102b] kuśalākuśalāni paunarbhavikāny aniyatāni karmāṇi na saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23374: anuśayavaikalyāt tu tāni bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni.
T07yabhkvyu:23417: yaḥ kleśo yaddhātukaḥ sa taṃ dhātuṃ nātikrāmayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23425: ādhipatyaphalena ca lokasyāniṣṭam upasaṃharati tadvegena bāhyabhāvavikārāpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23430: ata eva ca rāgānuśayanābhāvād anāsravavisabhāgadhātvoḥ kleśā nānuśerata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23434: ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātum ity etat jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23442: (Abhidh-k-vy 443) balaśaḥ suṣṭhu samyag avahatam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23453: na hi viprayuktasya prāptilakṣaṇasya ebhir indriyaiḥ saṃprayogo yujyata iti śāstravirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23459: na punar anuvartate saṃkleśa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23460: aupacāriko vā sūtre 'nuśayaśabdaḥ upacāre bhava aupacārikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23466: tadyathā duḥkhavedanāhetutvāt agnir duḥkha ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:23469: lakṣaṇe bhavo lakṣaṇena vā dīpyati [Tib.104a] lākṣaṇikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23493: yasmāc cetasy avidyamānais tair yathoktakliṣṭādi na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23494: saṃprayuktaiḥ punaḥ sarvam etad yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23495: atha viprayuktair apy evaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23499: yady evaṃ kuśalaṃ na kadācid apy upalabhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:23501: [Tib.104b] yasmāt kliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ kuśalāvasthāyāṃ anyasyāṃ vā te viprayuktā vartaṃta iti upalabhyeta ca kuśalam.
T07yabhkvyu:23509: yo hi viprayuktam anuśayam icchatīti vātsīputrīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23514: paryavasthānaṃ ca na nityasaṃnihitaṃ bhavatīti kuśalopalaṃbhasiddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23515: kāmarāgasyānuśaya iti pakṣaparigrahe sānuśayaṃ prahīyata iti nāsti sūtravirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23518: na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23527: smṛtyutpādanahetur dravyāṃtarabhūtaḥ kaścid viprayukta ity āśaṃkya dṛṣṭāntāṃtaram upanyasyati.
T07yabhkvyu:23529: yathā cāṃkurādīnāṃ pūrvotpannā śāliphalajā śāliphalāṃtarotpādanāya śaktir na dravyāṃtarabhūtā.
T07yabhkvyu:23534: yat tarhi sūtra eva kleśo 'nuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:23535: 'sya pudgalasya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23537: sukhavedanāvasthāyāṃ hi rāgaḥ samudācaraṃn evam uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23538: na tu tasya bījam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23554: tathā hi [Tib.105b] rāgajā rāgotpādanaśaktī rāgānuśaya ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23560: vimānādiṣv api teṣāṃ rāgo 'stīty ataḥ prāyeṇeti grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23563: tadvicchandanārthaṃ bhagavān deśayāmāsa kāmarāgo bhavarāga ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:23567: ātmabhāva eva tu bhava ity ācāryamataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23573: ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ity ukto na kāmarāga iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:23577: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ phalabhūtān paṃcopādānaskandhān ālaṃbata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:23578: evam aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ [Tib.106a] teṣām eva skandhānāṃ śāśvatocchedāṃtagrahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23579: śīlavrataparāmarśo 'pi tān eva skandhāṃ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataś cālaṃbata iti na samudayadarśanaheyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23584: tam apāsyānyena śīlavratena śuddhiṃ pratyetīti vipratipannatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23586: yo hi kleśo yasya satyasyāpavādāya pravṛttaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23593: tad evam abhyāso bhāvanā punaḥpunarutpādanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23597: asāv apy ātmābhimatasya vastunaḥ śāśvatocchedāṃtāropād duḥkha eva vipratipanneti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:23607: īśvarādiṣv ahetuṣu hetugraho nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23617: evaṃ yāvad ye mārgasatyavipratipannāḥ te mārgadarśanaheyā iti [Tib.106b] suparicchedam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:23628: ye rāgādayo duḥkhadarśanaheyaṃ yāvan mārgadarśanaheyaṃ kleśam ālaṃbaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:23634: yac ca satyaṃ yaddaraśanaheyāś ca kleśā ālaṃbanam eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23637: nanu ca samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatrago 'vidyānuśayo duḥkhanirodhādisatyadarśanaheyādyālaṃbano 'pi bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23641: yady api hi sa paṃcanikāyālaṃbanaḥ samudayarūpākāratas [Tib.107a] tu tān nikāyān ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:23642: tena tathālaṃbanataḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavya eva sa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23645: ye yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanā iti sarva eva darśanaheyā adhikriyaṃte na kevalā rāgādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23646: teṣām api vyākhyāne imāv eva codyaparihārau vaktavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:23656: na hi tatra bāhyāḥ kuśakṣārakaṇṭakādayo nādhyātmikā tāpāpasmārādayaḥ saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23662: prakārabhedo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyo yāvad bhāvanāprahātavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23692: na hi laukiko 'sti bhavāgrapratipakṣabhūto bhāvanāmārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23698: ta ete āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyās ta eva ca pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23709: ye rāgapratighamānāvidyānuśayā yathāyogaṃ bhavaṃti akṣāṃtivadhyā jñānavadhyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23710: [Tib.108a] te ubhayeṣām āryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānām ca nityaṃ bhāvanāheyā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:23714: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23716: darśanaheyās tu sarvāsv api bhūmiṣu lokottaramārgavadhyā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:23723: tam evaṃ yaḥ paśyati śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bāhyatīrthika ṛddhimān divyacakṣuḥ paracittavit.
T07yabhkvyu:23732: [Tib.108b] brahmajālasūtre vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23737: ihaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūla gato vā śūnyāgāragato vā ātaptānvayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23742: yathā samāhite citte viṃśatiṃ saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmarati.
T07yabhkvyu:23745: tad evaṃ sarva eva ete pūrvāṃtakalpakāḥ śāśvatavādinaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23746: anayā śāśvatadṛṣṭyātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānāḥ kāmadhātum apy ālaṃbaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:23747: ity evaṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23748: tathā tasminn eva brahmajālasūtre pūrvāṃtakalpakānāṃ ekatyaśāśvatikānāṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23750: bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:23751: saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāya upapadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:23752: te tatra bhavaṃti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ [Tib.109a] svayaṃprabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣāḥb prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣā dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23753: bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ loko vivartate.
T07yabhkvyu:23754: vivartamāne loke ākāśe śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānam abhinirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:23755: athānyataraḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:23756: sa tatraikāky advitīyo 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:23757: atha tasya sattvasya dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā.
T07yabhkvyu:23758: aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23760: anye ca sattvā āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya sattvasya sabhāgatāyām upapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23762: aham asmy ekāky advitīyo 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur yāvad anye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām.
T07yabhkvyu:23764: ime ca sattvā ihopapannā mama sabhāgatāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23766: aham eṣāṃ sattvānām īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhāvānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23768: imaṃ vayaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 449) sattvam adrākṣma ekākinam advitīyam [Tib.109b] anupasthāyakaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23769: tasyāsya sattvasya dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā.
T07yabhkvyu:23770: aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām.
T07yabhkvyu:23774: eṣo 'smākaṃ sattva īśvaro yāvat pitṛbhūto bhāvānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23776: karmakṣayāt tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā teṣām itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23777: sa vṛddher anvayād indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyaga eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:23778: so 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā vistareṇa yāvat tadrūpaṃ śāṃtaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ spṛśati.
T07yabhkvyu:23779: yathā samāhite citte pūrvakam ātmabhāvaṃ samanusmarati.
T07yabhkvyu:23783: ye tu vayaṃ tena brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23784: te vayaṃ anityā adhruvā āśāśvatā vipariṇāmadharmāṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23785: tad evaṃ kāmadhātur api tayāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyālaṃbito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23787: [Tib.110a] tathā tatraiva brahmajālasūtre ahetusamutpattikānāṃ pūrvāntakalpānām iti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23791: saṃjñotpādāt teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāt sthānāt cyutir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23792: ato 'nyatamaḥ sattvas tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23798: aham asmi pūrvaṃ nābhūvan so 'smy etarhi saṃbhūta ity ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:23799: ity evam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānās tayā mithyādṛṣṭyā kāmadhātum apy ālambanta ity eteṣāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23800: kathaṃ ca punar eṣām ātmā lokaś cāhetusamutpanna ity evaṃ mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23801: pūrvakṛtaṃ kuśalasāsravam akuśalaṃ vā na hetur ātmano lokasyety evam apavadati.
T07yabhkvyu:23802: iti kāmadhātuvītarāgāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rūpāvacaryas tā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyaṃtīti vacanāvakāśaṃ matvāha.
T07yabhkvyu:23803: na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhātur ālaṃbanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:23807: iti kecit pariharaṃti tad eṣāṃ ayuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23810: parihīṇāḥ [kathaṃ tarhi vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmālaṃbanadṛṣṭisamudācāra ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:23812: yathā devadatto bhagavato 'lpotsukavihāritāśayasya bhikṣusaṃghaparikarṣaṇāya pāpakecchāsamutpādād ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23815: atha devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ utpannam aho bata me bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratiniḥsṛjet.
T07yabhkvyu:23816: ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ parikarṣayaṃ bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23817: sahacittotpādād devadattas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23825: sarvaiva hi viparītadṛṣṭisvabhāvapravṛttā dṛṣṭiḥ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā mithyopanidhyānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23831: ohāk tyāga ity etasya dhātor grahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23833: dṛṣṭyādīnām upādānaskaṃdhānāṃ paratvena pradhānatvenāmarśo dṛṣṭiparāmarśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23834: paraśabdaprayogeṇa cāyam atiśayārtho [Tib.111a] labhyata ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23841: na tu tanmātrakam ity atas tadanyeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23860: so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya iti vistaraḥ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23864: sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ adṛṣṭisvabhāvānāṃ ca duḥkhādidarśanaprahātavyānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 451) duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23865: sarvaṃ hi sāsravaṃ vastu duḥkham iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23866: tathā ca sati na kaścit samudayādidarśanaprahātavyaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23868: kīdṛśo vānyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23869: yo 'pi hi gośīlādinā śudhyati yāvat sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnotīti paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:23870: tasyāpy ayam akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyetīti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti paṭhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:23875: so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipanna ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23876: mithyādṛṣṭyādayo hi mārgadarśanaprahātavyā aṣṭāv anuśayaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśasyālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:23881: yasya ca pudgalasya nāsti mārga iti mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭirasti vicikitsā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:23882: sa pudgalo nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan.
T07yabhkvyu:23886: kathaṃ tayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati pratipatsyate etayā mithyādṛṣṭyā etayā vā vicikitsayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:23887: mithyādṛṣṭivicikitsāyogād eva hi tasya śuddhipratipattir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:23895: tasyāpy asau śīlavrataparāmarśo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālaṃbano na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:23899: yaś cāpi mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:23901: sa śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kasmān na samudayanirodhadarśanaheya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23903: yasmād ayaṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23911: yathaiva hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā ime daśānuśayā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23934: rūpāvacarās tv ekacatvāriṃśad eta eva pratighavarjyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23938: yad uktam atiprasaṃgaḥ sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:23948: śīlavrataparāmarśaś ca duḥkhamukhena duḥkhe vipratipanno nityātmagrahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23951: tadyathā sāṃkhyanirgraṃthādayaḥ svaparikalpitaṃ mārgaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti bauddhānāṃ mokṣamārga iti mithyādṛṣṭim utpādayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:23955: nāsti tu sa śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ yaḥ samudayamukhena vipratipadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:23965: samudayāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ śuddhyabhiniveśe nanv ākasmikāj janmadarśanam asya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:23969: nirodhāpavādikāyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau śuddhipratyāgamanān nirodhopāyakalpanaiva na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23970: kathaṃ nāsti nirodha iti taddarśanapṛṣṭhena tadupāyakalpanā vyarthā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:23974: yasya hi mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭir vicikitsā vāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:23975: sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23978: anyā hi tena mokṣamārgo hṛdi niveśito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23980: eṣa nyāyo yad anyo mokṣamārgo nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:23981: yac ca syān na vety anyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ vicikitsatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:23983: yaś cāsāv anyo mokṣamārgas tena hṛdi niveśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23984: [Tib.114a] sa naiva tasya mārgadarśanaheyasya śīlavrataparāmarśasya viṣayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:23988: anyad dhi tena mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:23998: tatra yathehadhārmikāṇāṃ nivāṇe dravyādravyasaṃpratipattibhedo 'pi nityaśāṃtagrahaṇasāmānyāt tadapavāde doṣo darśanam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:23999: yenapi kiṃcin mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24001: bhinnā hi śīlavratādayaḥ svabhāvataś cākārataś cāryamārgāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24029: sakalā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ ātmadṛṣṭir ātmīyadṛṣṭiś cātmaviparyāsa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24033: kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam iti paraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24040: ātmānam eva tatra paṃcopādānaskaṃdheṣu vāśinaṃ paśyann ātmīyaṃ paśyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24041: na kevalam ātmānaṃ paśyaty ātmīyam api paśyatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24044: athāham ity etasmāt prathamanirdiṣṭān mameti ṣāṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭyaṃtaraṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24045: mayā mahyam ity etad api syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24047: mayeti tṛtīyānirdeśān mahyam ity ca caturthīnirdeśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24050: kasmād anye kleśā na viparyāsā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24058: te na viparyāsā ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24060: yasmāc chīlavratamātreṇa śuddhir ity ālaṃbate nitīrayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24062: na hi śīlavrataṃ śuddhikāraṇaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24066: yady asaṃtīrako na viparyāsaḥ yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24068: na hi saṃjñā saṃtīrikā nāpi cittaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24072: anitye nityam iti vistaraḥ evaṃ yāvad anātmany ātmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:24075: yāvad anātmany ātmeti eta eva traya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24085: aśucau śucīti saṃjñācittaviparyāsāv aparau dvāv iti catvāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24092: ātmaviparyāsāv api kiṃ neṣyete ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24094: na hi striyām ātmani ca vinā sattvasāṃjñayā kāmarāgo yukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24095: tasmād etāv apy anātmany ātmeti saṃjñācittaviparyāsau bhāvanāprahātavyāv iti prāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24097: duḥkhe sukham iti aśucau śucīti yāvad anātmany ātmeti saṃjñāviparyāsaś cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ prahīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24098: tāsmād dṛṣṭisamutthe eva dṛṣṭisaṃprayukte eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye.
T07yabhkvyu:24107: yasmāt tatkālam eva darśanakālam evāryāṇāṃ bhrāṃtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24110: [Tib.116b] yathā alāta āśu bhramyamāṇe tatkālamātraṃ cakram iti bhrāṃtir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24112: citralikhitaṃ ca yakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkālaṃ bhrāṃtir utpadyate yakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24114: āryasyātra paridhyānān muhūrtaṃ sukhaśucibhrāṃtiḥ sattvabhrāṃtir vā.
T07yabhkvyu:24116: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhandhāḥ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śrutavata āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā utpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24117: atha ca punaḥ kṣipram evāstaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24118: yady asau saṃjñācittabhramo na viparyāso yat tarhi sthavirānandeneti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24121: aṃga me gautama brūhi śāṃtitvam anukampayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:24127: tasya cānayā gāthayā viparyāsāstitvaṃ paridīpitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24131: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 456) śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:24136: yaś ca śrutavān āryaśrāvaka iti vistareṇa yāvat prahīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24138: te 'pi cāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsā āryasatyānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ yathābhūtajñānāt prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24140: ity upāyasamākhyānād upāyapravartanān nāsti tasya sūtrasya virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24141: yad idam uktam idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24149: samādhisaṃniśritāḥ sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca dharmā viśeṣās tasyādhigamaḥ sākṣātkaraṇaṃ viśeṣādhigamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24153: aguṇānvitasya guṇavān aham asmīti viparītaviṣayo māno mithyāmānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24156: mithyāmānas tu nirguṇasya sato guṇavān aham asmīti nirvastukaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24159: sadṛśo hīno 'stīti mānavidhā saḍṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā hīno 'smīti mānavidheti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24165: kathaṃ śreyān aham asmīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrito 'timānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24166: 'sadṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrito mānaḥ hīno 'smīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrita ūnamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24168: asti me śreyān asti me sadṛśaḥ asti me hīna iti dṛṣṭisaṃniśritā ūnamānamānātimānāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24169: tṛtīyaṃ nāsti me śreyān nāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24188: tathā hi śraddhādimiddhaduḥkhendriyacakṣur ādayaḥ prahīṇā api saṃudācaraṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:24196: bhāvanāheyā vadhādikasattvādayaḥ eva dharmā asyālaṃbanam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:24197: satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi hi yady api bhāvanāheyān dharmān ālaṃbaṃte na tu kevalaṃ bhāvanāheyā ity ato na te bhāvanāheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24203: yāvad ayam ātmā jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24204: tāvat sarogaḥ sagaṇḍaḥ saśalyaḥ sajvaraḥ saparidāhakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24205: yataś cāyam ātmā ucchidyate vinaśyati na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24208: aho batāham airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ syām ity evamādikā bhavatṛṣṇā na samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:24209: ādiśabdena kuveraḥ syāṃ strī syām ity evamādikā gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24210: prādeśagrahaṇād indraḥ syām ity evamādikā samudācaratīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24211: (V.11) mānavidhā api bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ santīty uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24226: vadhādiparyavasthānasya vibhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśasya bhavatṛṣṇāyāś ca grahaṇam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24239: paṃcānām api nikāyānāṃ hetubhāvenāvatiṣṭhanta ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:24240: vakṣyati hi eṣāṃ prabhāvenānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24243: samudayadarśanaprahātavye dve dṛṣṭī mithyādṛṣṭiparāmarśadṛṣṭī iti sapta.
T07yabhkvyu:24249: te eva sarvatrage bhavato na rāgādisaṃprayukte.
T07yabhkvyu:24256: saṃparko veṇir ity ucyate na veṇir aveṇiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24258: evaṃ hy uktam aveṇir bhagavān aveṇir bhikṣusaṃgha [Tib.119b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24259: pṛthag bhagavān pṛthag bhikṣusaṃgha ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24267: akāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ sakalaṃ kāmadhātuṃ pratyetīty adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24268: tasmāc chīlavrataparāmarśo na sarvatraga ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24269: nocyate sakalaṃ niravaśeṣam anekaṃ bhedabhinnaṃ svadhātuṃ yugapad ālaṃbaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24270: api tu paṃcaprakāram api sarvayugapad ālaṃbaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24272: prakārasarvatāyāṃ sarvaśabdo 'yaṃ draṣṭavya ity eṣa vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ parihāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24281: tatra vastuni tasya (Abhidh-k-vy 459) pudgalasya prārthanā tatprārthanety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24287: [Tib.120a] satkāyadṛṣṭyādivad darśanabhāvanāheyālaṃbanatvāt etad ubhayaṃ tṛṣṇāmānalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ prahātavyaṃ kena prahātavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24290: te taddarśanaheyā iti niyamaṃ manasikṛtvā pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:24291: anyathā hi satkāyadṛṣṭyādivad evaitad ubhayaṃ darśanaprahātavyam eva syād iti kim atra praṣṭavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24293: na ca te na darśanaheyā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24296: yadi tṛṣṇāmānau darśanaprahātavyālaṃbanāv eva syātāṃ darśanaprahātavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:24308: dṛṣṭibalādhānena vartituṃ śīlam asyeti dṛṣṭibalādhānavarti tadubhayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24327: kadācit trīṃ dhātūn iti noktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:24328: kāmadhātusthās tu kadācid visabhāgam ekarūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṇ vālaṃbaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24331: yasmāt taṃ brahmāṇaṃ ātmatvenātmīyatvena na gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:24332: ataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir na bhavati brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24334: ato nityadṛṣṭir api tasmin brahmaṇi nāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24338: neyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ mithyājñānaṃ punar etad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24340: na hi sarvā viparītālaṃbanā prajñā dṛṣṭir iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24341: anātmany evātmeti viparītā [Tib.121a] prajñā satkāyadṛṣṭir iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24346: mahābrahmaṇi ca sattvadṛṣṭir aham ity ahaṃkārasya na saṃniśrayībhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24357: prathamā koṭir anāgatāḥ sarvatragā anuśayā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24371: na rāgas tasya varjyatvān na dveṣo 'napakārata
T07yabhkvyu:24378: evaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyā apy eta eva traya iti ṣaḍ bhūmaubhūmau bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:24389: tu dharmajñānapakṣyaḥ ṣaḍbhūmiko 'nvayajñānapakṣyo navabhūmiko mārgagocarāṇām apareṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24398: sa sarva eva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ eṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24401: sa sarva eva prathamadhyānabhūmikānām eṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanam.
T07yabhkvyu:24404: mārgas tu ṣaḍbhūmiko 'pi navabhūmiko 'pi vā teṣām ālaṃbanam ity atra hetuṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24407: ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣyo mārgo 'dharabhūmikasyordhvabhūmikasya vā samasya viśiṣṭasya vā dharmajñānapakṣyāṃtarasyānvayajñānapakṣyasyāpi ca mārgasya hetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24408: so 'pi tasyānvayajñānapakṣo navabhūmiko yojyaḥ vistareṇaitad vyākhyātaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:24411: tad evaṃ kāmāvacarānāṃ mārgālaṃbanānām anāgamyabhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣyo yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmika ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24412: anvayajñānapakṣyo 'pi mārgo 'nāgamyabhūmiko yāvad ākikṃcanyāyatanabhūmikaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānām eṣāṃ mārgālaṃbanānām ālaṃbanam.
T07yabhkvyu:24414: yadi [Tib.122b] kāmāvacarā mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭyādayo rūpārūpyapratipakṣam api nirodhamārgākhyaṃ dharmajñānam ālambaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24416: kasmāt ta eva mithyādṛṣṭyādayo 'nvayajñānapakṣyam api mārgaṃ nālaṃbaṃte dharmajñānānvayajñānayor anyonyahetukatvād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:24420: dharmajñānaṃ tu kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti rūpārūpyapratipakṣam apy ālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:24422: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
T07yabhkvyu:24424: iti siddhāntād dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyapratipakṣaḥ tadbhāvāt tadbhūmikānāṃ rūpārūpyabhūmikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnām ālaṃbanaṃ bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:24426: na tad dharmajñānaṃ sakalaṃ pratipakṣo rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24430: ato na rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ taddharmajñānam (Abhidh-k-vy 462) ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24431: [Tib.123a] kiṃ ca nāpi sakalayor iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24435: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpatha
T07yabhkvyu:24437: atra nigamanaṃ karoti ity ādyābhāvān na bhavaty ālaṃbanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24438: duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgāṇām ādyayor duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor yathoktarūpārūpyapratipakṣatvaṃ praty abhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24439: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ cādyeṣu darśanaprahātavyeṣu pratipakṣatvaṃ prati tasya dharmajñānasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24440: na tadbhūmikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ mārgālaṃbanānāṃ rūpārūpyabhūmikānāṃ dharmajñānam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24441: tad eva traidhātukān aṣṭādaśānāsravālaṃbanān apāsya śeṣā aśītir anuśayāḥ sāsravālaṃbanā iti sthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24443: na prāpticchedena praheyaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24444: yathā kuśalo dharmacchando 'bhilāṣarūpaḥ samyagdṛṣṭir iti na prāpticchedena praheyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24453: mārgo 'pi paramārthaśuddhiḥ paramārthena śudhyaty anayeti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:24454: yas tayoḥ śuddhir iti grāho na śīlavrataparāmarśa iti yujyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24457: api ca parāmarśau yady anāsravālaṃbanau syātāṃ samyagdṛṣṭilakṣaṇaṃ bhajetāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24459: ataś ca na darśanaheyau syātāṃ agrau hīne ca vastuny agra iti grāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśo yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24470: na tadbhūmikāḥ pratyayās tadupapattaye ānuguṇyena vartanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24472: na ca te nirodhādayaḥ teṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ anuguṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24474: yathā vātikasya rūkṣaṃ nānuśeta ity ukte na kāyasyānuguṇyena vartata iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24475: (Abhidh-k-vy 463) pūrvasmiṃs tu pakṣe pratiṣṭhālābhārtho na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhata iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24479: tac ca duḥkhaṃ tayoḥ rūpārūpyadhātvor nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:24487: mokṣo mārgopaniṣat ucchedas tu nirhetuko 'bhipreta iti bhrāṃteḥ sāvadyam ucchedadarśanam iti viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24489: svasaṃtatipatitānām upādānaskaṃdhānām ātmātmīyatvena grahaṇāt svadravyasaṃmūḍhā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24496: te hi na kācid api parapīḍāṃ kurutaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24498: svargatṛṣṇāyā asmimānasya ca dānādibhir avirodhāt svadravyasaṃmūḍhātvād aparapīḍāpravṛttatvāc cāvyākṛtatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24500: tasmān naibhiḥ kāraṇair anayor avyākṛtatvam ity anenābhiprāyeṇa pūrvācāryamatam [Tib.124b] upanyasyati.
T07yabhkvyu:24510: tatpūrvakatvāt tu sā tulyavārttety anuktāpi gamyata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:24515: kāmadhātau satkāyadṛṣṭyādiśeṣāḥ kleśā akuśalā evety avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:24517: eṣām aṣṭānavater anuśayānām ity anuvṛttatvenaivaṃ vivarjanaṃ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24521: te sarva eva paṃca prakārā apy akuśalamūlāni.
T07yabhkvyu:24525: sarvo mohaḥ anyatra satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktān mohād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24530: yady akuśalaṃ cākuśalasyaiva ca mūlam iṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24531: eta evety avadhāraṇāc cheṣā anuśayā mithyādṛṣṭyādayo (Abhidh-k-vy 464) nākuśalamūlānīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24536: trīṇy eva na catvārīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24541: anenāvyākṛtaśabdena kevalena tṛṣṇāvidyāmatayo viśeṣitā iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24542: atra ca matir akleśasvabhāvāpy avyākṛtamūlam itīṣyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24545: yā kācid avidyā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayogiṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24546: evaṃ prajñā ca yā kācid avyākṛtā.
T07yabhkvyu:24560: tasmān na māno mūlaṃ bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:24567: dṛṣṭir api tayoś ca kāmadhātau ca satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭisvabhāvā.
T07yabhkvyu:24576: yas tena manyate lābhy aham asya dhyānasya nānye tatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:24586: te ca trayo dhyāyino 'vidyāvaśād avidyāyogāt tathā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:24588: samāpattisamāpannānāṃ ca etāḥ kleśasamudācārāvasthāḥ avyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ kāraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24596: kiṃ tāni naiva kuśalāni nākuśalānīty avyākṛtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24599: yaḥ sthāpanīyatvena na vyākṛto na kathitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24609: sakleśā janiṣyaṃte na niḥkleśā ity utpattyudāharaṇaṃ vibhajyavyākaraṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:24611: kim anyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ sattva iti [Tib.126b] ātmānyatodāharaṇaṃ sthāpanīyavyākaraṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24612: kiṃ sarvasattvā mariṣyaṃtīty ekāṃśena vyākartavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24613: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā alpakaṃ bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ jīvitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24617: kim anyaḥ skandhebhyo sattvo 'nanya iti sthāpanīya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24619: kiṃ tu bho gautama sa karoti sa pratisaṃvedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:24623: sa karoti sa pratisaṃvedayata iti pṛṣṭo 'vyākṛtam etad iti vadasi.
T07yabhkvyu:24624: anyaḥ karoti anyaḥ pratisaṃvedayata iti pṛṣṭo 'vyākṛtam etad iti vadasi.
T07yabhkvyu:24625: tat ko 'tra khalv asya bhavato gautamasya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24626: sa karoti sa pratisaṃvedayata iti brāhmaṇa śāśvatāya paraiti.
T07yabhkvyu:24627: anyaḥ karoti anyaḥ pratisaṃvedayata iti ucchedāya paraiti.
T07yabhkvyu:24628: etāvaṃtāv anugamya tathāgato madhyayā pratipadā dharmaṃ deśayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24633: sarve sattvā mariṣyaṃtīti yas tu pṛcched iti vistareṇācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24634: yas tu pṛcched anena prakāreṇa ye mariṣyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:24641: tasmād yad uktam idam ekāṃśena vyākartavyaṃ na sarve janiṣyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24643: tena yujyata eva vaibhāṣikodāharaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24647: etad ubhayam āpekṣikam astīty ubhayam ekāṃśena vyākartavyaṃ tatyathā kiṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 466) vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇam iti praśna ekāṃśena vyākriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24649: tatra yad uktaṃ kiṃ manuṣyo hīno viśiṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24652: yasmād ayam ekāṃśena vyākaraṇīyaḥ praśna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24653: ekāṃtena tu pṛcchata ity ācāryo vaibhāṣikapakṣaṃ samarthayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24654: ekāṃtena tu pṛcchataḥ kiṃ manuṣyo hīna eva viśiṣṭa eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:24655: naikāṃtavyākaraṇād dhīna iti vā viśiṣṭa iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:24657: tatra tad uktaṃ manuṣyeṣv evobhayam astīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:24661: yas tu sthāpanīya ity ācāryaḥ vaibhāṣikanayenoktam [Tib.127b] etac caturvidhasyodāharanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24673: yadā tau śaṭhāśaṭhau na kiṃcit pṛcchataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24675: tayoś ca śaṭhāśaṭhayor na kiṃcid vyākriyate ime dharmā rūpādayaḥ savistaraprabhedā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24677: tad katham anayoḥ śathāśaṭhayoḥ praśno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24680: yo hi panthānaṃ brūhīti tadanabhijña āha.
T07yabhkvyu:24681: kiṃ tena paṃthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24683: yathā hi panthānaṃ brūhīti bruvatoktaṃ bhavati katamaḥ panthā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24684: evaṃ dharmān vadeti bruvatoktaṃ bhavati katame dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24685: paripṛcchyaiva ca vyākaraṇāt bahavo dharmāḥ katamān vadāmīti paripṛcchyaiva tasya praśnasya teṣāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ vyākaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24689: tatra yad uktaṃ tayoś ca na kiṃcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripṛchyete yāvat kathaṃ ca vyākaraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24696: kiṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham aduḥkhāsukham ity evaṃ pṛṣṭena vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 467) praśnaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24698: kuśalasāsravaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā sukham aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā pratisaṃvedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:24699: akuśalasaṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24700: saced evaṃ vaded audārikam iti rūpi.
T07yabhkvyu:24701: vistaraḥ prabhedo na bhavati yāvad anyo jīva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24704: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24705: naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24709: pudgalas tenānuśayena baddha iti jñāyata evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24712: tatra rāgaḥ sukhavedanīyam eva vastu ālaṃbyotpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24714: tena sukhavedanīyena vastunālaṃbyamānenonnatir bhavatīti māno 'pi svalakṣaṇakleśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24715: tathā duḥkhavedanīyaṃ vastv ālaṃbya pratigha utpadyata iti pratigho 'pi svalakṣaṇakleśa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24717: dṛṣṭivicikitsādayaḥ sāmānyāḥ sāmānyena vā kleśāḥ sāmānyakleśāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24718: ete hy aviśeṣeṇa sukhavedanīyādike vastuny utpadyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24719: atas tad ālaṃbya utpannāḥ sāmānyakleśā ity ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24723: rāgapratighamānā yasmiṃ vastuny utpannā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24724: ete rāgādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānakāyikā apy aviśeṣābhidhyānād yathāyogaṃ yasmiṃ vastuny utpannās traiyadhvike duḥkhadarśanaprahātavye yāvad bhāvanāprahātavye.
T07yabhkvyu:24728: ete hi svalakṣaṇakleśatvān na sarvasya pudgalasyāvaśyaṃ sarvatrotpadyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24734: yasmād yai rāgādibhir yasmin vastuni [Tib.129a] saṃyukta āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:24735: yadi te prahīṇā bhaveyur na taiḥ sarvatra saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24743: ebhir anāgataiḥ sarvatra traiyadhvike paṃcanaikāyike 'pi yathāsvaṃ saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24748: sarvasāsravavastvālaṃbanā hi yathāsvaṃ aparimitā anāgatā rāgādayo bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:24749: anyai rāgapratighair anāgatair anāgata eva vastuni saṃyukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24751: tair utpattidharmibhir anāgata eva vastuni saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24756: paṃcavijñānakāyikair api na kevalaṃ mānasair ity apiśabdo dyotayati.
T07yabhkvyu:24757: tair anutpattidharmibhiḥ sarvatra vastuni traiyadhvike saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24760: sasaṃprayogā hi kleśāḥ suvarcalāvad anutpattidharmiṇo viṣayābhimukhā evāvatiṣṭhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:24761: tathā hy anutpattidharmiṇo naivālaṃbanam ālaṃbyotpadyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24765: na hy ālaṃbanānutpattita eva teṣām anutpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24768: avasthāphalaṃ hi sāmagryaṃ na dravyaphalam iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24771: traiyadhvikair api dṛṣṭyādibhir anekanaikāyikair api traiyadhvike paṃcaprakāre 'pi vastuni saṃyutaḥ saṃyukta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24776: (V.25) kathaṃ tatra tena ca saṃyukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24782: yasmāt saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni jātyādīni saṃskārāṇām arthasaṃcārāya pravartante.
T07yabhkvyu:24784: rūpaṃ ced bhikṣava ity asya sūtrasyāyam āditaḥ pāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24787: evaṃdarśī śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ atīte rūpe 'napekṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24789: pratyutpannasya rūpasya nirvide [Tib.130a] virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:24790: atītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyan na śrutavān āryaśrāvako atīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:24793: anāgataṃ ced rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyan na śrutavān āryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:24796: pratyutpannaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyad iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24798: nirviṣayatvād vairāgyakāle 'tītaviṣayāpekṣāryaśrāvakasyānapekṣā matir na syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24802: pratyutpannaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyan na śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ pratyutpannasya rūpasya nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno 'bhaviṣyad ity etan noktam ubhayapakṣaprasiddhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24804: iti pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktam iti pradarśitam.
T07yabhkvyu:24805: idānīm arthato na kaṇṭhata iti viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24808: tato vijñānam eva na syāt ālaṃbanābhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24823: anāgato hi vartamānam adhvānaṃ pratipadyamāno 'nāgatabhāvaṃ jahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:24826: suvarṇaṃ kṣīraṃ ceti dṛṣṭāṃtadvayaṃ yathākramaṃ ākṛtiguṇānyathātvajñāpanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24832: evaṃ sati nānāgatam evotpannam atītam veti syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24836: anāgatam eva vartamānaṃ vartamānam evātītaṃ syāt labdhavṛttinā hi lakṣaṇena yukto vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24840: puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ [Tib.131a] śeṣāsv avirakta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24845: yasyām avasthāyāṃ so dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:24850: tasyām atīta ity avasthāṃ avasthāṃ prāpya anyo 'nyo nirdiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24851: anāgatāvasthāṃ prāpyānāgato yāvad atītāvasthāṃ prāpyātīta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24853: na dravyāṃtarata iti abhinnalakṣaṇo 'nāgatādyavasthāprāpto 'nāgatādiśabdanirdeśaḥ kevalaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24856: yathaikā gulikā ekāṃke nikṣiptā ekasthāne sthāpitā ekam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24864: pūrvam aparaṃ cāpekṣyatītānāgatavartamānā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24866: pūrvaṃ vātītaṃ aparaṃ vānāgatam apekṣya vartamāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24867: aparam eva vartamānam anāgataṃ vāpekṣyātīta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24870: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:24871: yathaikā strī duhitaram apekṣa mātety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24886: ekaikasya trilakṣaṇayogāt atīto 'nāgato vartamānaś ca prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:24893: caturthasyāpi bhadaṃtabuddhadevasyāpi ekasminn evādhvani trayo 'dhvānaḥ prāpnuvantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:24910: yad dhi kāritralakṣaṇaṃ svakarma na karoti tat tatsabhāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24915: phalaṃ ca dadāti niṣyandaphalam anaṃtaraṃ dadāti.
T07yabhkvyu:24919: tasya phaladānaparigrahasadbhāvāt tat pratyutpannam iti vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24929: brūyās tvaṃ yeṣāṃ phalaparigrahaḥ phaladānaṃ cobhayam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:24941: etad dhy atītādīnām adhvanāṃ lakṣaṇam iṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24942: uparatakāritram atītam aprāptakāritram anāgataṃ prāptānuparatakāritraṃ vartamānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24947: ko vighno 'syeti kiṃ vighnaṃ kāritram ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:24955: yasmād iha bhavadbhir nityaṃ pratyayānām (Abhidh-k-vy 472) astitvam abhyupagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:24957: yac ca tat kāritram atītam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24958: yac ca kāritram atītam ucyate anāgataṃ pratyutpannam iti cocyate siddhāṃte uparatakāritram atītam ity evamādivacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24962: na ced asti athānāgatāditvaṃ kāritrasya svarūpasattāpekṣayā evaṃ bhāvānām apy anāgatāditvaṃ bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:24966: yan naivātītaṃ nāpy anāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam ity asaṃskṛtatvān nityam astīti prāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24970: yadā kāritraṃ na karoti dharmas tadānāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24973: syād eṣa doṣaḥ kāritrasyānyat kāritram ity atiprasaṃgo 'saṃskṛtatvaprasaṃgo vā yadi dharmāt kāritram anyat syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:24979: kim asya pūrvaṃ nāsīd ity anāgatāvasthāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:24980: yadi kāritram ananyatvād dharma eva nāsīd ity uktaṃ bhavat.
T07yabhkvyu:24982: yadi kāritraṃ [Tib.133b] dharma eva nāstīty uktaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:24984: yady abhūtvā bhavatīti neṣyate pratyutpanno na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:24985: bhūtvā ca punar na bhavatīti yadi neṣyate atīto 'dhvā na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:24986: anāgatas tu yo na tāvad abhūtvā bhavatīty arthād gamyate evam adhvatrayaṃ sidhyaty ato 'nyathā na sidhyatīty vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:24989: tasmād vāṅmātram etat saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogān na śāśvatatvaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24992: sarvadā cāsty utpādavināśābhyāṃ ca yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:24996: yadi rūpādeḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadāsti tena rūpādibhāvo nityaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:24999: evaṃ sati tasmāt svabhāvād bhāvo nūnam anya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25009: avidyamānam [Tib.134a] api hetusadbhāvād vyavasthāpyata iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:25012: na tu punar dravyata evaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25016: āsīd atītaṃ bhaviṣyaty anāgatam iti vaktavye 'stīti vacanam astiśabdasya nipātatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25020: yathāsti dīpasya prāg abhāvo 'sti paścād abhāva iti vaktāro bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25023: sa pradīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti vaktāro bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25025: nanu ca vaidhāṣikasya niruddho 'py asāv astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25027: na tu pradīparūpatām eva bhibhrāṇaḥ so 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:25028: evam atītānāgatam astīty uktaṃ asaty api dravyasattve.
T07yabhkvyu:25029: anyathā hy atītānāgata eva na sidhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:25030: yadi tenaiva lakṣaṇena vidyetātītānāgata eva na sidhyed ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25031: yady atītaṃ bhūtapūrvaṃ yat tarhi laguḍaśikhīyakān iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25035: āryamahāmaudgalyāyanaś ca mārita ity āhur abhiyuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25036: yato no mārita ity atra sūtra evaṃ paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25039: kiṃ te laguḍaśikhīyakāḥ parivrājakās tasya karmaṇa ānaṃtaryasya bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25041: icchaṃti sma te tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25042: kiṃ tu na dravyam iti tasmiṃ karmaṇi te vipratipannāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25044: yato bhagavatā yatra te vipratipannāḥ svabhāve.
T07yabhkvyu:25047: tatra punaḥ sūtre yad bhūtapurvaṃ karma.
T07yabhkvyu:25048: na tad evātītam ity abhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ tat karmāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25050: tadāhitaṃ tena bhūtapūrveṇa karmaṇā āhitam arpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25051: tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam ity anenābhiprāyeṇoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25053: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānam atītaṃ na sidhyed iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25054: svalakṣaṇena vidyamānaṃ tat karma pratyutpannalakṣaṇena vidyamānam atītam iti na sidhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:25056: tadāhitam iti vistareṇaivam (Abhidh-k-vy 474) ucyamāne 'bhyatītaṃ tat karmāstīti sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:25068: tat kathaṃ sa eva vartamānaḥ svātmany adhvay abhūtvā bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:25072: atha svātmani cakṣuṣi cakṣur abhūtvā bhavati siddham idam anāgataṃ cakṣur nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25077: saṃnikṛṣṭam apy anāgataṃ janakaṃ na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25079: na hi pūrvakālīnasya phalasya paścātkālīno hetur yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25081: nirvāṇaṃ hi vijñānaṃ niruddhān na janayet.
T07yabhkvyu:25084: yad vartamānāvasthāyāṃ rūpam abhūt bhaviṣyati ca.
T07yabhkvyu:25086: kathaṃ jñāyate evaṃ tad ālaṃbyate na punar astīty [Tib.135b] ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:25087: na hi kaścid atītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarann astīti paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:25089: abhūd iti smarati tad rūpaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathānubhūtāṃ ca vedanāṃ cakṣurvijñānānubhavabalena.
T07yabhkvyu:25090: yathā khalv apīti vistareṇācārya evopacayahetum āha.
T07yabhkvyu:25091: vartamānarūpam iva bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca gṛhyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25094: atha nāsti tat tathaiva asad apy ālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25104: pūrvaṃ na vikīrṇam idānīṃ vikīrṇam etad rūpam ity evam asyāgrahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25105: yadi ca tat tad eveti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25107: tad atītāvasthāyām anāgatāvasthāyāṃ ca paramāṇuśo vibhaktam ato na vartamānavat gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25108: evaṃ sati tādavasthyān nityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25109: anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā atītāś ca ta eva ta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25110: evaṃ ca sati paramāṇusaṃcayavibhāgamātram eva prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:25111: na tu kaścid utpādo nāpi nirodha ity ājīvikānāṃ pāṣaṇḍināṃ vādaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25113: cakṣur bhikṣava utpadyamānam (Abhidh-k-vy 475) na kutaśicd āgacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:25115: iti hi bhikṣavaś cakṣur [Tib.136a] abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25116: kathakṃ punar idaṃ sūtram apaviddhaṃ virodhitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25117: yasmāc cakṣur utpadyamānaṃ svena rūpeṇa na kutaścid āgacchatīty etat padaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25118: nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchatīty etad api padaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25122: mūrtānāṃ hi saṃcitatvaṃ viprakīrṇatvaṃ vābhavad bhaven nāmūrtānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25127: atha na saṃti tadrūpāḥ asad apy ālaṃbanam iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25128: trayodaśam apy āyatanam ālaṃbanaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25131: asadālaṃbanatva iṣyamāṇe tadālaṃbanaṃ vā vijñānaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25135: yad etan nāma tryodaśam āyatanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25139: kiṃ ca yaś ca śabdasya prāgabhāvam ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:25150: tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25155: na tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25158: vidyamāne tasmiṃ śabde yasyāsau prāgabhāvaḥ katham asya nāstibuddhir yā prāgabhāvam ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:25160: tatraitat syāt vartamāno nāstīty evaṃ tadālaṃbanān nāstibuddhis tasyotpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25166: kathaṃ tasminn eva vartamāne nāstibuddhir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25168: yo vā tasyānāgatasya paścād viśeṣo vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25177: yady abhāvo vijñānasyālaṃbanaṃ yat tarhīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25180: taj jñāsyāmīty eṣa saṃbhavo nāstīti vacanād abhāvālaṃbanaṃ na bhavatīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25184: asaṃtam apy avabhāsaṃ divyacakṣuravabhāsaṃ prayogāvasthāyāṃ saṃtam ity eva paśyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25185: ahaṃ tu santam evāvabhāsaṃ pūrvarūpaṃ divyacakṣuṣo 'stīti paśyāmīty ayaṃ tatra sūtre 'bhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25187: sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadviṣayatve vyavasthāpyamāne kuto 'sya vimarśavicāraḥ saṃdeho vā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25188: yad uta loke nāstīti vistareṇa ya uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25189: sadasadālaṃbane tu buddhīnām ayaṃ vimarśaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25192: ko vā bodhisattvasyānyebhyo viśeṣaḥ yadi te 'pi santam evāvabhāsaṃ paśyaṃti nāsaṃtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25193: sadasadālaṃbanatve hi buddhīnām ayaṃ viśeṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25196: sac ca sato jñāsyaty asac cāsata itīdam atrodāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25197: sac ca vastu sattvataḥ paraiṣyati jñāsyati asac cāsattvata ity asadālaṃbanā buddhaya iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25208: utpādo 'pi yady asti na kevalaṃ hetur anāgataṃ ca phalam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
