T07yabhkvyu:25211: hetuś ca yathoktaḥ utpādaḥ phalaṃ cānāgatam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25218: yadi manyase hetunā phalasya deśāṃtarākarṣaṇaṃ vartamānīkaraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25226: amūrtatvenādeśasthatvān na tad yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25228: tad abhūtvā bhūtam ity abhūtvābhāvasiddhir ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25230: yadi manyase hetunā svabhāvo 'sya phalasya viśeṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25235: siddham abhūtvā viśeṣaṇasya (Abhidh-k-vy 477) bhavanaṃ prādurbhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25245: ity evaṃ sarvāstivādaḥ śāsane sādhur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25246: kathaṃ tena tasmiṃ vā saṃyuktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25247: kathaṃ tenātītānāgatena kleśena tasmin vā atītānāgate vastuni kathaṃ saṃyukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25255: tad atītānāgataṃ vastv ālaṃbanam asyeti tadālaṃbanaḥ kleśas tasyānuśayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25256: tasya bhāvād atīte 'nāgate ca vastuni yathākramaṃ saṃyukta iti
T07yabhkvyu:25269: adhvāpy utpadyate utpadyamānasya dharmasyādhvasaṃgṛhītatvād adhvasvabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25275: yasmād anekeṣāṃ kṣaṇānām anāgatānāṃ rāśirūpāṇāṃ kaścid eva kṣaṇa utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25294: tadyathādhimātrādhimātre prakāre prahīṇe 'dhimātramadhyādibhiḥ śeṣair aprahīṇair anuśayaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25295: tathā hy asāv adhimātrādhimātreṇa prahīṇena kleśaprakāreṇa visaṃyukto 'pi sa saṃyukta eva taiḥ śeṣair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25303: evaṃ yāvad ārūpyāvacarāḥ paṃca prakārā iti paṃcadaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:25304: anāsravaś ca ṣoḍaśa iti ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25310: yā vedanā yair darśanaprahātavyair anuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25314: ye 'nuśayāḥ ye ca tatsaṃprayuktāś cetanādayo yāś caiṣāṃ vedanādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ prāptayo jātijarāsthityanityatāś ca viprayuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25322: anāsravadarśanaprahātavyavarjyāś ca vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskandhā iti paṃcaskandhasvabhāvā bhāvanāprahātavyā veditavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25324: kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ yāvad bhāvanāprahātavyam [Tib.139b] iti paṃca cittāni.
T07yabhkvyu:25325: evaṃ rūpāvacarāṇy ārūpyāvacarāṇi ca paṃcapaṃca anāsravaṃ ca cittam iti ṣoḍaśa cittāni.
T07yabhkvyu:25328: amuṣmiṃ dharme iyaṃto 'nuśayā ye tena cittena saṃprayuktā ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vānuśerata ity etad abhyūhitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25341: bhāvanāheyāś caturanuśayās tatsahabhuvas tatprāptayaś ca sānucarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25355: anāsravasya ca dharmajñānapakṣasya ceti paṃcānāṃ cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25371: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyayoḥ [Tib.140b] sarvatragasaṃprayuktayoś cittayor bhāvanāheyasya ca kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25377: svakānām adharāṇāṃ ca trayaṃ svakādharatrayaṃ ca ūrdhvaikaṃ cāmalaṃ ceti vigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25378: rūpāvacarās ta eva triprakārā dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25381: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣām eva duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyānāṃ pūrvavad vyākhyeyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25383: teṣāṃ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyayor visabhāgadhātusarvatragasaṃprayuktayoś cittayor bhāvanāheyasya ca śrutamayasya ca cintāmayasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:25389: ta eveti ta eva duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyā [Tib.141a] adhikṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25391: kāmarūpāvacarāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyānāṃ visabhāgadhātusarvatragasaṃprayuktānāṃ caturṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyayor dvayor yathāyogaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25394: sarvatragāsarvatragasaṃprayuktayor yathāyogaṃ dvayor bhāvanāprahātavyasya cānāsravasya ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:25400: iti vacanāt pūvoktānāṃ ca gocarā ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25415: navānām ekādaśānāṃ ca cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25416: rūpāvacarā nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā navānāṃ cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25423: tasyaiva cādhikasya nirodhadarśanaprahātavyasya mārgadarśanaprahātavyasya vā cittasya.
T07yabhkvyu:25425: ārūpyāvacarā api nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekam ekādaśānāṃ cittānām ālambanaṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25437: pratisaṃkhyānirodhāryamārgau tāvat tadālaṃbanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyāsaṃprayuktānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānām anāsravasya ca dharmajñānānvayajñānapakṣasya yathāyogam ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25438: ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau tu bhāvanāprahātavyasyaivākliṣṭasya cittasyālaṃbanam iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25439: ācāryaguṇamativasumitrau tu vyācakṣāte ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau bhāvanāprahātavyasya kliṣṭākliṣṭasyālaṃbanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25444: ato na kliṣṭacittasya bhāvanālaṃbanam iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25452: etāny eva ṣoḍaśa cittāni ṣaṭtriṃśad bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25458: anāsravam api dharmajñānapakṣam anvayajñānapakṣaṃ ceti dvidhā.
T07yabhkvyu:25463: tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ mānasam ity abhisamasya yathāyogaṃ paṃcaprakāraṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ yāvad bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25468: yasmād duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītaṃ svabhūmikam ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā sukhendriyaṃ satkāyamithyādṛṣṭyādīnām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25469: mārgadarśanaheyasya ca mithyādṛṣṭyādisaṃprayuktasya mārgasatyasaṃgṛhītaṃ sukhendriyam ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25470: bhāvanāheyarāgādisaṃprayuktasya ca cittasya (Abhidh-k-vy 482) tatpaṃcavijñānakāyikaṃ sukhendriyam ālaṃbanam.
T07yabhkvyu:25480: ārūpyāvacarasya mārgadarśanaheyasya mithyādṛṣṭyādisaṃprayuktasya cittasya mārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ sukhendriyam ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25481: tad eva ca bhāvanāheyasya kuśalasya cittasyālaṃbanam.
T07yabhkvyu:25482: anāsravasya ca sarvam apy ālaṃbaṇaṃ [Tib.143a] bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25488: tadyathā nithyādṛṣṭisaṃprayukte sukhendriyālaṃbane daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā anuśayā ālaṃbanato 'nuśerate saṃprayogato vā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25491: mārgasukhendriyālaṃbane hi mithyādṛṣṭyādisaṃprayukte vijñāne mithyādṛṣṭyādayaḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśerate.
T07yabhkvyu:25500: tatra catvāro nikāyā anuśerata iti sugamam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:25504: te tatra sukhendriyālaṃbanavijñāne saṃprayogata ālaṃbanato vānuśerate.
T07yabhkvyu:25510: bhāvanāheyaṃ hi kuśalaṃ cittaṃ mārgam ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:25512: sarvatragāś cārūpyāvacarā anuśayās tatraiva vijñāne mārgālaṃbanamithyādṛṣṭyādisaṃprayukte vā vijñāne 'nuśerata iti vijñātavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25515: (Abhidh-k-vy 483) rūpāvacarasya paṃcaprakārasyārūpyāvacarasya ca dviprakārasya mārgadarśanabhāvanāheyasyānāsravasya cety anyonyālaṃbanayogatas tasya sukhendriyālaṃbanaṃ vijñānam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25516: ārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya tat sukhendriyālaṃbanaṃ vijñānam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25519: [Tib.144a] ārūpyāvacarasya sarvatragasaṃprayuktasya hi duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyabhedāt dviprakārasya cittasyārūpyāvacaramārgadarśanaheyamithyādṛṣṭyādisaṃprayuktaṃ vijñānaṃ mārgālaṃbanaṃ cārūpyāvacaraṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ kuśalam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25520: evam idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālaṃbanavijñānālaṃbanaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:25522: sukhendriyālaṃbanālaṃbane tu sakalāv apy ārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau nikāyāv anuśayāte.
T07yabhkvyu:25523: tasmāt tatra sarvatragasaṃprayukte citte duḥkhasaṃudayadarśanaheyā anuśayāḥ saṃprayogata ālaṃbanato vā yathāyogam anuśerate.
T07yabhkvyu:25528: duḥkhendriyālaṃbane katy anuśayā anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25536: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarās trayo nikāyā duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25537: tatra hi sarvatragasaṃprayukte citte bhāvanāheye ca duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau nikāyau saṃprayogata ālaṃbanato vā yathāsaṃbhavam anuśayāte.
T07yabhkvyu:25543: tat punar duḥkhendriyālaṃbanaṃ pañcavijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasya ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25547: tena hi rūpāvacaraṃ duḥkhendriyālaṃbanaṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam (Abhidh-k-vy 484) ālaṃbyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25556: saumanasyendriyālaṃbane vijñāne katy anuśayā anuśerata iti praśne vicārayitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25559: tad etat samāsatas trayodaśavidhasya vijñānasyālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25569: tat punaḥ saumanasyendriyālaṃbanaṃ [Tib.145a] trayodaśavijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:25577: anayā diśā anyad api gaṃtavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25580: anuśayānair ananuśayānaiś cānuśayaiḥ sānuśayaṃ kliṣṭam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25582: akliṣṭaṃ cittam anuśayānair eva sānuśayaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25586: (V.33) sarvasya sarvānaṃtaram utpattisaṃbhavān nāsty eṣām utpattau sārvajanyaḥ kramaniyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25598: te punā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ ābhāsagatā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25601: tatra cābhāsagateṣu viṣayeṣu viparītaḥ samanaṃtarapratyaya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25614: saha paryavasthānair āhrīkyādibhir vakṣyamāṇaiḥ ekacatvāriṃśad dravyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:25628: dvādaśa dṛṣṭayaś catasro vicikitsāḥ paṃca rāgāḥ paṃca mānā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25629: nanu ca tatrāpy asti paryavasthānadvayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25646: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga ukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25653: tasmāt sā traidhātuky api avidyāsrava iti siddham etat.
T07yabhkvyu:25655: triṣv api dhātuṣv avidyāyāḥ pratyekaṃ paṃcaprakāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25659: yāḥ kāścana durgatayaḥ asmin loke parata ca
T07yabhkvyu:25670: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:25676: vineyajanavaśāt tu dṛṣṭiyogaḥ pṛthag ukta ity abhiprāyo yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25677: āsraveṣu dṛṣṭayaḥ kimarthaṃ na pṛthag sthāpitā ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:25680: asahāyānāṃ dṛṣṭīnām āsyānukūlatā avasthānānukūlatā calatvāt paṭutvāc ca na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25682: āseti rūpe prāpte āpiśaleṣṭyā āsyeti rūpaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25684: yasmād etā dṛṣṭayo 'sahāyā nāsanānukūlāḥ sasahāyās tv āsanānukūlā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25688: āsayaṃtīty āsravāṇāṃ nirvacanaṃ paścād vakṣyatīty ata āsanārtham āsraveṣu bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25697: rāgamānā viṃśatir iti dvidhātukā rāgā daśa bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25705: rāgapratighamānāḥ paṃcadaśa vicikitsāś catasraḥ daśa paryavasthānānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25707: rāgamānā viṃśatiḥ vicikitsā aṣṭau dṛṣṭiyogaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad dravyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:25721: śīlavratopādānaṃ ṣaḍ dravyāṇi kāmadhātau dve evaṃ rūpadhātāv [Tib.148a] ārūpyadhātau ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:25743: vistareṇa yāvad yo 'sya bhavati dṛṣṭiṣu dṛṣṭirāgo dṛṣṭicchando dṛṣṭisneha iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:25749: tad uktaṃ bhavati rāga evātra yogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25765: evam ete 'py ālaṃbanāt saṃprayuktebhyo vā svām saṃtatiṃ vardhayaṃtaḥ prāptibhir upaciṃvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25769: pratinivārayato 'pi niṣedhayato 'pi pudgalasya punaḥpunaḥ saṃmukhībhāvād anubadhnaṃty ato 'nuśayā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25774: ṣaḍbhir āyatanavraṇaiś cakṣurādibhir āyatanair vraṇabhūtair āsravaṃti kṣaraṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25785: vahaṃti haraṃti gatyaṃtaraṃ viṣayāṃtaraṃ veti oghāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25786: yojayaṃti śleṣayaṃti gatyantare viṣayāṃtare veti yogāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25787: upādadaty upagṛhṇaṃti punarbhave kāmādiṣu vā vijñānasaṃtatiṃ ity upādānānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:25789: evaṃ tu sādhutaraṃ syād ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25791: āsravati gacchaty ebhir anuśayaiḥ saṃtatir vijñānasaṃtatir viṣayeṣv ity āsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25793: mahatābhisaṃskāreṇa kuśalair dharmaiś cittasaṃtānaḥ pratisroto nīyate viṣayebhyo nivāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:25807: kathaṃ ca te yogā ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:25808: vividhaduḥkhayojanāj jātyādibhir vividhair duḥkhair yojanād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25816: (V.40ab) ta evānuśayāḥ punar yāvat paryavasthānabhedena paṃcadhā bhittvoktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25826: kāmarāgaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti sūtre vacanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25835: yata eva tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī parāmarśasaṃyojanam.
T07yabhkvyu:25843: na ca tatra dṛṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta.
T07yabhkvyu:25853: teṣu hy anunayasaṃyojanena nirodhadarśanaheyena mārgadarśanaheyena vā saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25856: yasmād asāv etān nirodhadarśanamārgaprahātavyān dṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayuktān vedanādidharmān ālaṃbya rāga utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25862: yady api hy asarvatragaṃ mithyādṛṣṭisvabhāvaṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃyojanam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:25866: na cāpi tat tair vedanādibhiḥ saṃprayogi.
T07yabhkvyu:25872: dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vā teṣu vedanādiṣu dharmeṣu saṃprayogato 'nuśete.
T07yabhkvyu:25875: tayor dṛṣṭisaṃyojanam ity asaṃjñitavān na dṛṣṭyanuśayagrahaṇe paṃcadṛṣṭigrahaṇam bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:25881: aṣṭādaśa dravyāṇi tisro dṛṣṭayo bhavaṃtīti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25891: yathā kāmadhātau ṣaḍ evaṃ rūpadhātāv ārūpyadhātau [Tib.151a] cety aṣṭādaśa bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:25894: kāmadhātau dṛṣṭiparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvan mārgadarśanaprahātavya iti catuḥprakārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25898: yathā kāmadhātāv evaṃ rūpadhātāv ārūpyadhātau ca.
T07yabhkvyu:25912: na hy anyat paryavasthānam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25922: yatraikāṃtākuśalatvaṃ ca svātaṃtryaṃ cety etad ubhayaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25923: tad evaṃjātīyakam anyat paryavasthānaṃ nāstīty abhisaṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25926: tasya krodhamrakṣāv apy ubhayaprakārāv ekāṃtākuśalau svataṃtrau ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:25927: tasmān na bhavaty ayaṃ parihāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25931: ata eva ca ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃyojanatve 'pi kāmadhātūpapannānāṃ īrṣyāmātsaryasaṃyojanāḥ kauśika devamanuṣyā ity uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:25932: ādhikyena hi sugatāv etat kleśadvayaṃ bandhanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25937: yad ayaṃ sugatāv apy upapannaḥ pragāḍhaṃ paribhavam udvahati.
T07yabhkvyu:25940: alpeśākhyo 'lpabhogaś ca bandhanāv apy ubhayān mata
T07yabhkvyu:25950: [Tib.152a] tasmād daśabhyaḥ paryavasthānebhya etad eva dvayaṃ saṃyojanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:25952: traidhātukasamudāyāpekṣayā kāmadhātur avaro nihīno dhātur ekāṃtasamāhitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:25960: tau hi kāmadhātubandhanāgārān niḥkramaṇaṃ na dattaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25963: yathā hi dauvārikapramāde bandhanāgārāt puruṣo niṣkrāṃto 'pi dauvārikānucarair nivartyate.
T07yabhkvyu:25973: tasmād eva tāny avarabhāgīyāni (Abhidh-k-vy 492) apare yogācārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:25987: yataś ca mahānāmann āryaśrāvakaḥ idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:25990: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathabhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:25991: trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavaṃti parijñātāni.
T07yabhkvyu:25993: sa eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpanno bhavaty avinipātadharmā saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya saṃdhāvya duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ kariṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:26002: ataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭigrahaṇād antagrāhadṛṣṭir [Tib.153a] api gṛhītā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26007: te 'pi tadālaṃbanatvāt gṛhītā eveti śakyate vaktum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26015: ato mūlagrahaṇān mūlasaṃbhūtagrahaṇasiddhir ity aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyādayo 'py uktarūpā veditavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26016: apare punar āhur ity ayam evācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26019: (V.45) avarabhāgīyasaṃyojanavacanād anyabhāgīyam apy astīty arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26031: prakārata eva [Tib.153b] mohaḥ sarvaḥ prakārato dhātutaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:26034: duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ dveṣaḥ ālaṃbanasaṃprayogābhyām ity eva.
T07yabhkvyu:26036: nanu ca rāgadveṣāv apy aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ tathaivānuśayāte.
T07yabhkvyu:26041: moho hy apaṭutvād apaṭvyām aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyām anukūlatvāt sutarām anuśeta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26044: svasaṃtānavedanāyāṃ hi sukhāyāṃ rāgo duḥkhāyāṃ dveṣo 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ mohaḥ saṃprayogata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26047: sukhāyāṃ yathā rāgo 'nuśete na tathā dveṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26050: yathā ca duḥkhāyāṃ dveśo 'nuśete [Tib.154a] na tathā rāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26054: atha vā svāsāṃtānike sukhe ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vā rāgo 'nuśete.
T07yabhkvyu:26056: evaṃ duḥkhe svāsāṃtānike dveśo 'nuśete ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vā.
T07yabhkvyu:26070: upakleśāś caitasā eva te na cittaviprayuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26074: tadyathā aratir [Tib.154b] vijṛṃbhikā cetaso līnatvaṃ tandrī bhakṣe 'samatā nānātvasaṃjñā amanasikāraḥ kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ śṛṃgī bhittirīkā anārdavatā anārdavatā asvabhāvānuvartitā kāmavitarko vyāpādavitarko vihiṃsāvitarko jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarko 'vamanyanāpratisaṃyukto vitarkaḥ kulodayatāpratisaṃyukto vitarkaḥ śokaḥ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyam (Abhidh-k-vy 494) upāyāsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26079: dharmasyāmiṣasya kauśalasya ca pradāne virodhī cittasyāgraho mātsaryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26080: mā mattaḥ saratv ity ākāro matsaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26087: cittābhisaṃkṣepo middham ity etāvaty ucyamāne samāpattāv api prasaṃga ity ato viśeṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26093: yat tu kuśalam avyākṛtaṃ vā na tat [Tib.155a] paryavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26102: amī bhavaṃtaḥ sattvā hanyaṃtāṃ vā badhyaṃtāṃ vā śīryaṃtāṃ vā anayena vyasanam āpadyaṃtām ity ākārapravṛtto vyāpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26108: rājādibhir jñātānāṃ mrakṣavatāṃ pudgalānāṃ mrakṣas tṛṣṇāniṣyandaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26110: ajñātānām avidyāniṣyandaḥ karmasvakatām aśraddadhānaḥ tad avadyaṃ pracchādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:26111: na parasyāṃtike viśuddhyarthaṃ deśayatīty evam ubhayaniṣyando mrakṣa ity eke.
T07yabhkvyu:26121: yathā śarīrān malā jāyaṃte evam ime māyādayo malā iva kleśebhya utpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:26124: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasa
T07yabhkvyu:26150: vitathasyātmanaḥ saṃdarśanatayā mahābrahmā āyuṣmaṃtam aśvajitaṃ vaṃcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26151: kutremāni brahman mahābhūtāny apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyaṃta iti pṛṣṭo [Tib.156a] 'prajānan kṣepam akārṣīt.
T07yabhkvyu:26152: aham asmi brahmā mahābrahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhāvānām iti māyayā vaṃcayitum ārabdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26153: atha sa mahābrahmā āyuṣmaṃtam aśvajitaṃ kare gṛhītvā ekāṃte asthād ekāṃtasthitaś cedam uktavān.
T07yabhkvyu:26154: vidyamāne tathāgate māṃ praṣṭavyaṃ manyasaitīdam asya śāṭhyaṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26155: svapariṣallajjayā hy ātmīyajñānatāṃ nigūhamānaḥ sa tathā kṛtavān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26156: uktam api śāṭhyam iti tathā hi
T07yabhkvyu:26157: kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalāny ādye dhyāne na saṃty ata
T07yabhkvyu:26167: ye ca kleśamahābhūmikeṣūktā ity āśraddhyakausīdyapramādā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:26175: harṣākāravartī rāgo dainyākāravartī dveṣa iti yathāsaṃkhyena.
T07yabhkvyu:26198: prathame hi dhyāne trivijñānakāyikaṃ sukhendriyam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:26205: tatra sarve 'py anuśayā yathāyathaṃ vedanendriyeṇa saṃprayuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26207: dainyākāravartitvād eṣāṃ kaukṛtyādīnāṃ na saumanasyena saṃprayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26218: yathā avidyāyāḥ na kvacit kleśe upakleśe vā saṃprayogapratiṣedho 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:26224: ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā akuśalāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃbhavaṃtīty ataḥ paṃcabhir apīndriyaiḥ saṃprayoga eṣāṃ [Tib.157b] saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:26227: āsāṃ traidhātukatvāt tā eva niṣkṛṣya pṛcchyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:26228: kevalo 'yam iti vistaraḥ akuśalā rāśir iti bhikṣavo yad uta paṃca nivaraṇānīti te samyag vadamānā vadyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26230: kevalo 'yaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paripūrṇākuśalarāśir yad uta paṃca nivaraṇānīti vistareṇaikāṃtākuśalatvavacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26237: aṃtareṇāpi hi bhāvapratyayaṃ bhāvapradhāne nirdeśo bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:26243: abhidharme tu kṛṣṇaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ śuklaviruddhaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26255: kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ vicikitsā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:26258: na caivam ato naitat kāraṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26259: kiṃ punar atra kāraṇam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:26260: ato yathāsaṃkhyam etābhyāṃ styānamiddhena auddhatyakaukṛtyena ca nivaraṇābhyāṃ samādhiprajñāskaṃdhayor upaghāta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26267: strīrūpam iti strīśabda iti vā grahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26268: vihāragatasya pratisaṃlīnasya sthitasya vā niṣaṇṇasya vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:26274: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya kṛtadvaṃdvaikavadbhāvasya vicikitsayā saha punar dvaṃdvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26275: auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ ca vicikitsā ca auddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitse iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26276: vicikitsā tu punar vyutthitasyāpi tasya dharmanidhyānakāle 'ṃtarāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:26286: yad ālaṃbanaṃ parijñāyate duḥkhasamudayānvayajñānapakṣeṇa mārgeṇa rūpārūpyadhātvālaṃbanāvasthāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26288: duḥkhadharmajñānena samudayadharmajñānena ca yathāyogaṃ pūrvam eva prahīṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26290: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ [Tib.159a] dṛṣṭiparāmarśādīnāṃ yadālaṃbanaṃ nirodhamārgadṛgdṛggheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādikaṃ duḥkhasamudayasatyasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānapakṣeṇānvayajñānapakṣeṇa vā yathādhātu parijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26293: na ca tathā teṣām ālaṃbanaṃ parijñāyate pūrvam eva jñātatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26294: katham eṣāṃ prahāṇam ālaṃbanaparijñānāt tatprahāṇaṃ na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26295: tatrālaṃbanaparijñānāt kāmāvacarāḥ svadhātvalaṃbanā rūpārūpyāvacarāś ca duḥkhasamudayadṛggheyāḥ prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:26296: tatra visabhāgadhātvālaṃbanānām ālaṃbanaṃ parijñayā paśyataḥ prahāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayānvayajñānakṣāṃtyor yugapad dvidhātvālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26310: bhāvanāheyānāṃ pratipakṣodayād eva kṣayaḥ nālaṃbanaparijñānādibhya (Abhidh-k-vy 499) iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:26312: navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmaubhūmau tathā guṇā
T07yabhkvyu:26317: vimuktimārgo 'pi hi pratipakṣo na tu prahāṇāyety ata itthaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26327: tadyathā duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃteḥ paraṃ duḥkhadharmajñānam iti tenocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26329: yena mārgeṇa tatprāpitam ānaṃtaryamārgaprāpitaṃ prahāṇam ādhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:26341: [Tib.160a] sa cāpy ādyo vimuktimārgo dūrībhāvapratipakṣa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26343: evaṃ ca sati vimuktimārga ādhārapratipakṣo dūrībhāvapratipakṣa iti vaca nāmadvayaṃ labhata ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26345: anityādibhir ākārair yena taṃ dhātuṃ vidūṣayatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26346: tad evaṃ sati yo 'pi duḥkhasamudayālaṃbanaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣādiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26347: sa cāpi vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣa iti darśitaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:26348: api tv iyam ānupūrvī sādhvī bhaved ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26349: sopānanyāyasamāśrayāt lakṣaṇāsāṃkaryāc ceyam ānupūrvī sādhvīti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:26359: (V.60cd) na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26363: (Abhidh-k-vy 500) tasya na punas tad vastv ālaṃbyotpattir ity ataḥ kāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26365: na hy ālaṃbitaṃ vastv anālaṃbinīkartuṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26372: tasmād vaktavyam etad iti parihartavyam etad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26378: tatra saṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām anuśayānāṃ tadanuśayabalotpāditānām atadviṣayāṇām api pudgalasya saṃtāne prāptir akliṣṭacittasyāpy avicchedena pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:26380: evam asaṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām atadviṣayāṇām api ca tadviṣayakleśapṛṣṭhasamudācariṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prāptir veditavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:26381: sā hy anāgatānām utpattau pratyayagamanād dhetubhūtā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26385: ato yenālaṃbanenotpannāḥ kleśā anyālaṃbanān api kleśān pravartayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:26386: tadālaṃbanaprahāṇapratipakṣaniṣyandotpattau tatprāptivigame te kleśās tadālaṃbanā api saṃto hetuphalāpakrāṃtāḥ prahīṇā ity ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:26387: tad yasmād aparijñāte kasmiṃścit kleśaviṣaye atadviṣayāṇām api kleśānāṃ tadviṣayakleśabalenaprāptir anāgatātītakleśahetuphalabhūtā saṃtatau pravartate yathā vastu.
T07yabhkvyu:26388: tasmād ālaṃbanāt kleśāḥ prahātavyā ity abhimataṃ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26389: nanu ca tadālaṃbanaprahāṇādibhir api kleśāḥ prahīyaṃta ity abhipretaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26390: kim idam uktam ālaṃbanaparijñānabalena kleśāḥ prahīyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26393: yeṣām api hi pratipakṣodayāt prahāṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26397: tadālaṃbanaprahāṇādibhir [Tib.161b] api kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity abhiprāyo lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26405: akliṣṭaś ca dharma ity arūpī kuśalasāsravaṃ anivṛtavyākṛtaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:26412: bhinnalakṣaṇo hi pṛthivīdhātor abdhātus tasmāt pṛthivīdhātor abdhātur dūre bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26433: na cirabhūtatvenātītaṃ nāpi cirabhāvitvenānāgataṃ dūram ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26435: adhvanānātvena pratyutpanno 'dhvatayā vartamānam api dūraṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:26447: atītānāgate 'pi [Tib.162b] prasaṃga iti kuśalāder atītānāgatasya sarvatra deśe prāptiḥ saṃbhavatīty atītānāgate 'py aṃtikatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26452: atītād anāgataṃ dūram anāgatāc cātītam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26462: tad dhy atītaṃ vartamānāṃtaritatvād anāgatād dūraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26470: yasmād anāgatena svalakṣaṇaṃ na saṃprāptam (Abhidh-k-vy 502) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26471: atha vā yasmāt tatsvalakṣaṇam asaṃprāptam anupasthitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26477: tad dhy atītaṃ yad dharmasvalakṣaṇāt pracyutam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26485: tasya visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādād ānaṃtaryamārge hi na tāvad visaṃyogaprāptir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:26487: vimuktimārgo 'pi hi pratipakṣa iti śakyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26489: tathā hy uktam ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptiḥ visaṃyogaprāpter āvāhakasaṃniśrayatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26495: indriyādhikyapratipattinirāsārtham etad arthapradarśanaṃ indriyavivṛddhir ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26499: phalaprāptiviśeṣas tu pradarśayitavyo yatra punar visaṃyogaphalalābho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26500: anyathā hi phalaprāptivacanam api na kartavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26512: saṃbhavati hi bhāvāgrikasya navamasya prakārasyaikasminn eva kāle tīkṣṇendriyasya visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26513: sa tu na punarlābha iti nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26514: tatra tāvan mṛdvindriyasya ṣaṭsu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26516: srotaāpattiphalakāle sakṛdāgāmiphalakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle 'rhattvaphalakāle indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti ṣaṭsu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26519: tasyaiva mṛdvindriyasya rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ mārgānvayajñānakāle pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vā gṛhīte prathamato
T07yabhkvyu:26520: punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptikāle (Abhidh-k-vy 503) yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāla iti paṃcasu kāleṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:26521: bhāvanāheyānām api tasyaive kāmāvacarāṇāṃ paṃcaprakārāṇāṃ adhimātrādhimātrasya yāvan madhyamadhyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:26522: [Tib.164a] teṣv eva srotaāpattiphalakālavarjyeṣu paṃcasu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26523: madhyamṛdos tu ṣaṣṭhasya prakārasya tasyaiva caturṣu kāleṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:26529: tasyaiva mṛdvadhimātrasya mṛdumadhyasya ca saptamāṣṭamayoḥ prakārayoḥ pratipakṣodayakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāle veti caturṣv eva kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26530: tasyaiva mṛdumṛdor aṃtyasya prakārasya pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vaikatarasmin.
T07yabhkvyu:26533: tasyaivārhattvaphalaṃ prāpnuvato ye navaprakārā rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśā bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ prahīṇāḥ adhimātradhimātro yāvan mṛdumṛdur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26534: teṣāṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ mṛdumṛduprakāram aṃtyaṃ hitvā sarveṣāṃ triṣv eva kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26537: yas tv asyaivārūpyāvacaro mṛdumṛdur aṃtyaḥ kleśaprakāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26539: pratipakṣodayakāla iti vārhattvaphalakāla iti vā anyatarasminn indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:26542: tīkṣṇendriyasya punaḥ keṣāṃcit kleśānāṃ paṃcasu kāleṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:26548: sa tu punarlābho na bhavatīti na vaktavya iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26550: prahāṇaṃ phalaṃ parijñā jñānasvabhāvo hetuḥ tasmin prahāṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:26553: tadyathā ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni pūrvam abhisaṃskṛtāny abhisaṃcetitāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyaṃ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26556: parijñeyāṃś ca vo bhikṣavo dharmān deśayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:26576: yady apy anyeṣāṃ kleśopakleśānāṃ mānādīnāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ prahāṇam iyaṃ parijñā vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26577: rāgasya tu tatra prādhānyād ūrdhvabhāgīyasya saṃyojanasya prahāṇaṃ rūparāgakṣayaparijñety uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26578: sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna [kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi] yoṅs su śes paḥo.
T07yabhkvyu:26579: ṣes bya ba ḥdi ni zag pa thams cad spaṅs paḥi miṅ yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26580: yoṅs su śes pa ni tha dad par bstan la.
T07yabhkvyu:26581: ṣes bya ba ni bsgroms pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa ni gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26582: gzugs med par nams kyi ni kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26584: mthoṅ baḥi spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi ni ma yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26585: ṣes bya ba ni ciḥi phyir gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi yoṇs su śes pa so sor mi bstan te.
T07yabhkvyu:26586: de bṣin du gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams spaṅs pa yaṅ yoṅs su śes pa gsum yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26588: bsgom pa spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar sa daṅ sa na gzugs na spyod [Tib.165b] paḥi bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba rnam pa dguḥi gñen po bar chad med pa daṅ rnam par grol baḥi lam zag pa med pa mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs paḥi sa daṅ zag pa daṅ bcas pa bsam gtan gñis paḥi ñer ba stogs kyis bsdus pa nas nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus paḥi bar rnam pa dgu yod la gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi gñen po bar chad med paḥi lam daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26589: rnam par grol baḥi lam in ci rigs par zug pa med paḥi sa ḥog ma pa ḥam.
T07yabhkvyu:26590: ci rigs par zag pa daṅ bcas pa goṅ maḥi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa dag yod de.
T07yabhkvyu:26591: gṣan kho na yin pas gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ḥdi dag gis yoṅs su 'śes pa tha dad par stan to.
T07yabhkvyu:26592: mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams kyi gñen po ni ḥdra ste.
T07yabhkvyu:26593: rjes su śes paḥi bzod pa la sogs pa gzugs na spyod par nams kyi gñen po de dag ñid gzugs med par nams kyi yaṅ yin pas yoṅs su śes pa tha tad du rnam par mi bṣag go.
T07yabhkvyu:26595: (V.64-66) tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa la sogs pa yoṅs su śes pa ste ṣes bya ba ni tha maḥi cha daṅ ṃthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa
T07yabhkvyu:26596: gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26597: kuntu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi yoṅs su śes paḥo.
T07yabhkvyu:26598: ḥdi dag ni bsgom paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin paḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26599: bsgom paḥi lam la bzod pa dag ni med do.
T07yabhkvyu:26600: ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin ṣes bya ba ni yoṅs su śes pa daṅ śes pa ṣes bya ba don gcig ste.
T07yabhkvyu:26601: śes pa daṅ yoṅs su śes pa ni zag pa med paḥi ye śes yin no ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26602: bam po bṣi bcu rtsa bṣi pa.
T07yabhkvyu:26603: dri med bzod rnams śes pa med.
T07yabhkvyu:26604: ṣas ḥbyuṅ bas bzod pa ni śes paḥi ṅo bo [Tib.166a] ñid yin par yaṅ mi ruṅ na.
T07yabhkvyu:26605: de ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26606: ḥbras bu la rgyu btags byas na yaṅ mi ruṅ ṅo sñam du bsam pa yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26607: ḥdir bzod pa rnams ni śes paḥi ḥkhor can yin paḥi phyir ṣes bya ba smos te.
T07yabhkvyu:26608: ḥdi dag la ḥkhor śes pa yod pas na śes paḥi ḥkhor can te.
T07yabhkvyu:26610: deḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ bzod par nams kyi ḥbras bu ṣes byaḥo.
T07yabhkvyu:26611: rgyal baḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags pa bṣin te dper na rgyal poḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags paḥi phyir ḥkhor gyis byas pa la yaṅ rgyal pos byas pa ṣes byaa daṅ ḥdra ḥo.
T07yabhkvyu:26612: śes pa daṅ ḥbras bu gcig phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni bzod pa dag ni śes pa daṅ lhan cig ḥbras bu gcig pa yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26613: bzod pa dag gi ḥbras bu gaṅ yin pa de ñid śes rnams kyi yin pas bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ yoṅs su śes par ruṅ ṅo.
T07yabhkvyu:26614: mi lcogs med ḥbras thams cad do
T07yabhkvyu:26615: ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar mi lcogs paḥi sa paḥi lam gyis khams gsum paḥi mthoṅ ba daṅ bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa rnams spaṅ ba srid de.
T07yabhkvyu:26616: zag med mi lcogs med pa yis.
T07yabhkvyu:26617: thams cad las ni ḥdod chags bral.
T07yabhkvyu:26619: gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na ñon moṅs pa spaṅs paḥi raṅ bṣin gaṅ dag yin paḥo.
T07yabhkvyu:26620: ṣes bya ba ni bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅs pa ji skad bśad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26621: bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi [Tib.166b] yoṅs su śes pa ṣes bya ba lṅa ste.
T07yabhkvyu:26622: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten nas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spoṅ ba srid paḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26623: ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26624: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi rnams ni ḥdod paḥi (Abhidh-k-vy 506) khams kyi gñen po ma yin paḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26625: de lta bas na ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba rnams la bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yod du zin kyaṅ tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa bṣin du ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no ṣes zer ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26626: btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de.
T07yabhkvyu:26627: ṣes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs de ni ḥdod paḥi ḥdod chags daṅ bral baḥi gaṅ zag gi yaṅ ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅ spa yoṅs su śes pa gsum gyi ṅo bo ñid ḥphag paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin par ḥdod do.
T07yabhkvyu:26629: bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa rñed paḥi phyir te.
T07yabhkvyu:26630: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la rten nas ṅes pa ḥjug pa na yaṅ ma thoṅ bas spaṅ bas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa sṅon ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis spaṅs pa rnams kyis bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob la de la na mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis nus pa yod pas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa ba spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa bṣin du.
T07yabhkvyu:26631: ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅon spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yaṅ dṅos gṣi bsam gtan gyi ḥbras buḥo ṣes bya bar rnam pa bṣag
T07yabhkvyu:26632: de lta ba sna ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum po ḥdi dga daṅ sṅar bśad pa gzugs daṅ gzugs med paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ bcas pa yoṅs su śes pa brgyad bsam gtan gyi ḥbras bu yin [Tib.167a] no.
T07yabhkvyu:26633: śes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26634: tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho na yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26635: ṣes bya ba ni ḥdod pa las ḥdod chags ma bral ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa kho nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spoṅ bar byed kyi dṅos gṣis ni ma yin
T07yabhkvyu:26636: de na ma thob paḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26637: ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba ston du ḥgro ba yaṅ gaṅ gi tshe bsam gtan la brten nas ñes pa la des kyaṅ so soḥi skye boḥi snas skabs na ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis ḥdod pa na spyad paḥi ñon moṅs pa thams cad spaṅs pas de bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26638: sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug la deḥi tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa yoṅs su śes pa bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten par yaṅ rnam par bṣag mod kyi deḥi ḥbras bu ṣes bya bar rnam par bṣag pa ni ma yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26640: gnas skabs de na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis thob paḥi bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob pas de spaṅ spaḥi yoṅs su śes par rnam par bṣag ste.
T07yabhkvyu:26641: deḥi tshe ni mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅa ma spaṅs pas sṅar mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26642: sṅar spaṅs pa tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa bsdoms nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gcig tu rnam par bṣag ste.
T07yabhkvyu:26644: khams las ḥdod chags bral ba daṅ ḥbras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms ṣes thams cad bsdoms paḥi gtan tshigs yod paḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26645: de lta bas na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa de ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho nar rnam pa bṣag gi.
T07yabhkvyu:26646: dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ni ma [Tib.167b] yin te.
T07yabhkvyu:26647: ḥdi la ni bye brag tu smra ba daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26648: btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs mthun no.
T07yabhkvyu:26649: bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsams bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can gyi zag pa med pas kyaṅ ñon moṅs pa spoṅ bar ḥgyur te.
T07yabhkvyu:26650: de lta bas na mi lcogs pa med pa daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:26651: dṅos gṣiḥi bsam gtan rnams kho naḥi ḥbras bu kho na bśad kyi.
T07yabhkvyu:26652: bsam gtan khyad par can gyi ni ma yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:26653: deḥi phyir bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsam gtan bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba smos te.
T07yabhkvyu:26654: bsam gtan khyad par can ni bsam gtan daṅ po kho na rtog pa daṅ bral bas khyad par du ḥphags paḥi phyir ro.
T07yabhkvyu:26655: [nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyi ṣes ba ba ni.] dhyānāṃtaraṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:26671: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
T07yabhkvyu:26679: ṣaṭ paṃca ca yathāyogaṃ pakṣagrahaṇena kṣāṃtijñānayor grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26682: dharmajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ kāmāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktas tisraḥ parijñāḥ phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26688: tāś ca rūpārūpyāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktās tisraḥ parijñāḥ dve ca paścime iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26690: duḥkhadarśanaheyaprahāṇasamudayadarśanaheyaprahāṇaṃ vistareṇa yāvad bhāvāgrikasya mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārasya prahāṇam iti kasmān na gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26702: ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ tatprahāṇam ity atra parijñeti vyavasthāpyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26704: samudayadharmajñānam ārabhya yāvat kṣayajñānam ity eteṣu dharmajñānānvayajñāneṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:26720: tadā hi suṣṭhu prahāṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26725: [Tib.169a] anena ca kāraṇena prahāṇaṃ parijñety ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26726: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇa iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:26727: yadi tatra prahīṇe (Abhidh-k-vy 509) prakāre anyena tadālaṃbanena kleśena darśanaprahātavyena bhāvanāprahātavyena visaṃyukto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26728: evam idam api paṃcamaṃ kāraṇaṃ prahāṇasya parijñāvidhāne āhur apare.
T07yabhkvyu:26730: sa tūbhayasaṃyoga ubhayahetusamudghātāt duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya ca sarvatragahetoḥ samudghātād dhātusamatikramāc ca nānyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26731: tathā hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣv api na tāvad asti hetudvayasamudghāto yāvat tadālaṃbanaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatragahetur aprahīṇo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26732: bhāvanāprahātavyeṣu ca prahīṇeṣv api yāvad aṣṭāsu prakāreṣu na tāvad dhātvatikramo 'sti yāvan na navamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇam ity ato na punar brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26738: yāvacchabdena duḥkhadharmānvayajñānakṣāṃtijñāneṣu samudayadharmajñānakṣāṃtau ca naiva samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26740: samudayadharmajñāna ekayā samanvāgataḥ samudayānvayajñānakṣāṃtāv apy ekayaiva samanvāgata ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26744: yāvat paṃcabhir darśanāsthaḥ samanvāgato na ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣoḍaśasya kṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26754: yāvacchabdena bhāvanāheyakleśaprathamaprakāraprahāṇe [Tib.170a] yāvad aṣṭamaprakāraprahāṇe 'pi ṣaḍbhir eva samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26760: laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgo bhūtvā niyāmam avakrāṃto mārge 'nvayajñāne ekayāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26761: yasmād asāv āryaḥ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ prāpto 'nāgāmy eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:26765: tasmād darśanaheyaprahāṇānāṃ paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇasya ca saṃkalanād ekayaivāvarabhagīyaprahāṇaparijñayā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26766: paścād vābhisamayād ānupūrvikaḥ kāmavairāgyaprāpta ekayaivāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26770: viśeṣaṇaṃ kāmāvacareṇa parihāṇau ṣaṭparijñāsamanvāgamaparihārārtham ārūpyāvacareṇa ca parihāṇau dviparijñāsamanvāgamaparihārārtham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26777: ārūpyāvacareṇety arhattvaprāptisaṃkalitayor avarabhāgīyaprahāṇarūparāgakṣayaparijñayor ārūpyāvacareṇa kleśenārhattvāt parihāṇau punarlābhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26778: rūpāvacareṇa tu parihāṇāv ekayā samanvāgataḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:26779: kāmāvacareṇa ca ṣaḍhiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād ity ārūpyāvacaraparyavasthānagrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26787: saṃkalanam iti ko 'rthaḥ ekatvena vyavasthāpanam iti yo 'rthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26807: kaścid ekāṃ kaścid dve kaścit ṣaṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:26813: vṛttis tu vivriyate arhattvāt parihīyamāṇo yena kenacit cittena sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñām ekāṃ tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:26815: evaṃ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo rūpavītarāgo 'nāgāmī ekām evāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26824: laukikamārgaprāptasya tasyānāsravavisaṃyogaprāptyā pūrvikāḥ paṃca parijñāḥ paṃcadaśakṣaṇalabdhās tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:26826: kiṃ tu dhātuvairāgyaphalalābhato 'trāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāyāṃ saṃkaliteti naṣṭarūpeva sā nopanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26827: ānupūrviko yo na vītarāgapūrvī kāmavairāgyāt kāraṇāt ṣaṭ tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:26834: darśanamārgastho bhāvanāmārgastho vā navānāṃ parijñānāṃ yo pratilabdhapūrvāṃ pratilabhate prathamataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26836: bhāvanāmārge 'pi hi vītarāgapūrvī darśanamārgāṃte avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñām ekāṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:26837: ānupārviko 'pi kāmavairāgye navame vimuktimārge tām eva labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:26841: sa hy avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ [Tib.172a] rūparāgakṣayaparijñāṃ ca labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:26846: ata eva ca naiva kaścit paṃca labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:26848: sa eva yugapat paṃca parijñā alapsyateti.
T07yabhkvyu:26849: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyām abhidharmakośavyākyāyām anuśayanirdeśo nāma paṃcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26853: (VI.1) paṃcamasya ṣaṣṭhasya ca kośasthānayoḥ saṃbaṃdham upadarśayann idam upanyasyati.
T07yabhkvyu:26864: satyānāṃ darśanād bhāvanāc ca bhāvanāyā iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:26865: satyadarśanabhāvanāt kāraṇād darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāś ca kleśā iti vistareṇoktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:26870: [Tib.172b] satyadarśanaṃ ca darśanamārgeṇa satyabhāvanaṃ ca bhāvanāmārgeṇety ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26871: tāv idānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kim anāsravau sāsravāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26874: laukikatve sati bhavāgrapratipakṣo na syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26875: kiṃ ca navaprakārāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:26882: na tu sakṛtprahāṇam eva lokottareṇeti ato na tatprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26895: tataś cittasmṛtyupasthānam ity eṣām upapattyanukūlā deśanā evaṃ dhyānānām.
T07yabhkvyu:26903: katham utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate.
T07yabhkvyu:26906: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:26907: utpannānāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣatāyai chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:26908: na hy eṣa niyamo yat pūrvam utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:26914: satyānāṃ tv abhisamayānukūleti hetuphalayoḥ pūrvapaścādbhāvena duḥkhasamudayasatyayoḥ paścātpūrvanirdeśaprasaṃga iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:26931: caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāpahartā rājārhaś ca bhavati rājayogyaś ca rājāṃgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:26937: evam eva caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttaro bhiṣak śalyāpahartety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:26939: iha bhikṣavas [Tib.174a] tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:26942: (Abhidh-k-vy 515) iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:26946: yathā bhūmau dṛṣṭāyāṃ niḥsaṃgam aśvasya prasaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:26959: evaṃ yāvan mārgo mārgataḥ nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:26965: te hi duḥkham aduḥkhata [Tib.174b] ity evamādibhir ākārair duḥkhasatyaṃ paśyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:26971: tadyathā nirodhasatyaṃ vyathaṃte 'punarbhavāt prapātād iva bāliśā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26985: manaāpā api vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca duḥkhā.
T07yabhkvyu:26992: sukhā vedanā [Tib.175a] manaāpā duḥkhā amanaāpā aduḥkhasukhā naiva manaāpā nāmanaāpety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:26995: avedanāsvabhāvā api rūpaśabdādayas tadanukūlatvān manaāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:26998: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā maṃdākini hā priye
T07yabhkvyu:26999: ity ārttā vilapaṃto 'pi gāṃ pataṃti divokasa
T07yabhkvyu:27007: kiṃ tarhi vidūṣaṇārtham ayam upadeśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27012: yathā sukhā vedanā utpādasthitisukhatvāt sukhāpi satī vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhety eva vidūṣyate vidūṣaṇīyatvenābhiprīyamāṇatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27025: vedanāvat tadvedanīyā api saṃskārā veditavyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27027: sukhavedanīyāḥ saṃskārā utpādasukhāḥ sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27035: yāvad iti vacanāt vipariṇāma eva duḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāra eva duḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhateti vācyam.
T07yabhkvyu:27043: [Tib.176a] sarve tu manaāpādayaḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ tasyā vyāpinītvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27044: yadi sarve 'pi tathā duḥkhāḥ kasmāt sarve (vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā) na paśyaṃtīti ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27045: tāṃ tv āryā eva paśyaṃti nānye.
T07yabhkvyu:27046: katham itīdam upanyasyate āha cātreti sarvam.
T07yabhkvyu:27047: evaṃ tarhīti yadi saṃskāraduḥkhatayā sarve 'pi saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ mārge 'pi saṃskāraduḥkhatāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27049: (Abhidh-k-vy 517) pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkham iti lakṣaṇān mārgo na duḥkham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27064: kiṃ cānityam āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaṃ yat sāsravaṃ vastu.
T07yabhkvyu:27065: kasmāt punar anāsravo mārgas tathaivānityo 'pi na cāryāṇāṃ pratikūla [Tib.176b] ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27066: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27068: tadyathā gamanād gauḥ na ca gamanān mahiṣo 'pi gaur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27069: evaṃ hy arthe niyate gauḥ [kāsmiṃcid bhavati.] kasmād bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27080: māṣarāśau mudgamasūrakalāyādisadbhāve 'py alpatvān mudgādīnāṃ māṣarāśir iti loke vyapadeśo dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27083: sukhaṃ ca tad aṇukaṃ ca sukhāṇukaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27089: sukhaṃ duḥkhasya hetur duḥkhavedanīyena karmaṇā saṃprayuktatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27091: yasmāc cātibahubhir duḥkhaiḥ parasevākṛtyādikṛtaiḥ samuditaṃ sukham [Tib.177a] utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27105: anityatvāt pratikūlaṃ pratikūlatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃtīty (Abhidh-k-vy 518) arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27113: tasya bhadantasyāsau samudayākāraḥ syān na duḥkhākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27115: kiṃ cāryāṇāṃ cānāgāmināṃ rūpārūpyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:27117: na hi teṣām anāgāmināṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ duḥkhāyā vedanāyā hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27122: saṃskāraduḥkhata ca sūtre kim artham uktā bhaved iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27123: yadi duḥkhahetutvāt sukham api duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:27130: tad duḥkham ity anityatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti na duḥkhahetutvād anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27135: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatīty anityākāro duḥkhākāram ākarṣatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27140: apy tv anityaṃ tat sukhaṃ paśyatāṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27144: idam atra duḥkhasya lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27155: ya eva hi śayanādaya iṣyaṃte sukhahetavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27156: ta eveti sarvaṃ yāvad vyaktim āpadayaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27165: na hi tāvat sukham iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27168: aṃsād aṃsaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayaṃto bhāravāhakā duḥkha evāvasthite bhārātikrāmaṇe sukham iti buddhim utpādayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:27169: eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27182: anugrāhakasvalakṣaṇākāreṇa āryāṇām api hi sukhavedanānugrāhakebhya visaṃvādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27183: yadi cāsau sukhā vedanā svenātmanānugrāhakātmanānabhipretā bhavet naiva tasyāṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kasyacid rāgo bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:27186: yataḥ kāraṇāt vairāgyārtham ākārāṃtareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27188: uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavateti sthavirānandavacanam evaitat sūtrapadaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27191: idam atra duḥkhasyeti etad ayuktarūpaṃ vacanam iti paśyaṃ sthavirānandas tad eva pṛṣṭavān.
T07yabhkvyu:27192: yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viruddham eveti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:27193: yadi tu tisro vedanā ity etad ayuktarūpam adrakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:27194: tad evāprakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā ity etad viruddham eveti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:27195: bhagavān [Tib.179a] api caivaṃ vyākariṣyad idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27201: punaś ca tisṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ vacanāt tasmāt saṃty eva svbhāvatas tisro vedanāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27202: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti vedanād ābhiprāyikam etad vākyaṃ darśayati bhagavān.
T07yabhkvyu:27210: evam upapattiṃ alpasukhāṃ bahuduḥkhām ekāṃtasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27213: atha mataṃ lokasya vedanāṃ vyavasyato 'nuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27215: sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitam iti bhagavato vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27216: saṃskārānityatām ānanda mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27217: yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyety [Tib.179b] ato na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27221: na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27223: yac ca sukhendriyaṃ yac ca saumanasyendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27226: yac ca duḥkhendriyaṃ yac ca daurmanasyendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27229: aduḥkhāsukhaiṣā vedanā ity evaṃādinā vistareṇoktvā yenemāni paṃcendriyāṇy evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā dṛṣṭānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27232: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhām aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vyavasyed duḥkhasvābhāvyena duḥkhavyavasāyasyaiva prāpteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27234: atha mataṃ mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir adhimātre duḥkhabuddhiḥ madhya aduḥkhāsukhabuddhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27238: adhimātrādisukhabuddhiḥ syād adhimātramadhyamṛduḥ sukhabuddhiḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27245: adhimātram eva tad duḥkhaṃ na syād yadi tatra mṛdusukhabuddhiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27246: mṛduni ca duḥkhe yady adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ kathaṃ tasya duḥkhasya mṛdutvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27247: na hi tathā vyaktasyānubhavasya mṛdutvaṃ yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27253: tadā katamad duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhir bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27254: viṣayabalād eva hi tat sukham utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27256: kiṃ ca yadi mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti manyase.
T07yabhkvyu:27257: anutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27258: [Tib.180b] anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkhe.
T07yabhkvyu:27268: anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin rāgaduḥkhe sutarāṃ kāmasukhaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27272: yan mṛduni (Abhidh-k-vy 521) vedite yan mṛduni duḥkha ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27276: madhyaduḥkhe aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā gṛhyate ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27277: mṛduni duḥkhe tenāvyaktena bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27284: ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu cāduḥkhāsukhavacanāt [Tib.181a] sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:27288: ity ato na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27292: rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugataṃ na saumanasyaṃ na saumanasyānugataṃ na sukhaveditaṃ hetur api na prajñāyate rūpe saṃrāgāya.
T07yabhkvyu:27293: yasmāt tarhi asti rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānugataṃ pūrvavad ato rūpe hetuḥ prajñāyate yad uta saṃrāgāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:27295: yadi sukhahetvavyavasthānān na sukham asti vaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27300: yadi hi kevala eva viṣayo hetuḥ syāt syād evāvyavasthito hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27304: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣa [Tib.181b] īṣatpakvāvasthe taṇḍulasamūhe svādupākahetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27308: na tu yā pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svādupākahetur āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:27309: tāṃ punaḥ prāpya paścān na hetuḥ svādupākasya tādṛśasyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27311: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27312: na hi tad eva dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ cirakālam api samāpannānāṃ duḥkhahetur bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27313: dhyānaje ca sukhe kasya pratītkāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27317: rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugatam ity evamādi noktaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27320: na sā duḥkhā vedanā sukhatvena kalpiteti.
T07yabhkvyu:27323: anyathā hi yady avasthāṃtarajaṃ sukham eva notpadyate yāvad asau (Abhidh-k-vy 522) tādṛśī kāyāvasthā nāṃtarīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27326: atha mataṃ pānabhojanādyaṃte kuto duḥkhabuddhiḥ syāt yadi tasyāditatprāraṃbho nāsīd iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27329: [Tib.182a] kāyasya tādṛśaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣāḥ paścād utpadyate pānādyāsevanāt yat sukhotpattyavasthāyāṃ duḥkhaṃ notpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27334: yat pūrvaṃ madhuratāvasthāyāṃ mādhuryasyāvidyamānā śuktatā amlatā aṃte utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27335: atha vā yathā madyādīnāṃ parīṇāmavīśeṣān mādhuryam eṣām ādau bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27353: [Tib.182b] anyatra sūtre anyasyāpi karmāvidyāder vacanād anye 'pi samudaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27357: yataś ca bhikṣavaḥ paṃca bījajātāny akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇī apūtīni avātātapahatāni navāni sārāṇi sukhaśayitāni.
T07yabhkvyu:27359: evaṃ tāni bījāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhin vipulatām āpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:27360: iti hi bhikṣava upameyaṃ kṛtā yāvad evāsyārthasya vijñaptaya itīmaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam upanyasyedam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27361: paṃca bījajātānīti bhikṣavaḥ sopādānasya vijñānasyaitad adhivacanaṃ pṛthivīdhātur iti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnām etad adhivacanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27366: yataḥ karmādīnām api hetutvavacanāt samudayasatyatvaṃ siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27368: abhiprāye bhavaḥ abhiprāyeṇa vā dīvyatīty ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśaḥ tṛṣṇādhikṛtaṃ pudgalam adhikṛtya kṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27369: lākṣaṇikas tv abhidharme lakṣaṇe bhavo lākṣaṇiko nirdeśo 'bhidharme.
T07yabhkvyu:27370: sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu samudaya iti sāsravasya skaṃdhapaṃcakasya samudayasatyatvalakṣaṇayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27371: sa eva vaibhāṣikas tṛṣṇādīnām ābhiprāyikaṃ samudayasatyatvaṃ vivakṣur [Tib.183a] (Abhidh-k-vy 523) āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27374: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ bruvatā yāvat karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyā coktā.
T07yabhkvyu:27377: tayoḥ punas taddhetvoḥ karmatṛṣṇayor avidyā hetur ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27380: karma hetur upapattaye tṛṣṇā hetur abhinirvṛttaya iti sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27386: karmatṛṣṇāvidyā saṃkārāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ hetur abhisaṃparāya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27392: kathaṃ cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27393: kaś ca bhikṣavaś cakṣuṣo hetuḥ kaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27418: bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'py uktā vijñānaṃ bījaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27421: na kevalaṃ tṛṣṇādaya ity ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśa iti sādhitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27422: sarvasya ca duḥkhasya lākṣaṇikaḥ samudayabhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27434: atas tāḥ sarvāṃkuraprarohamātrasya hetur iti vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27464: (VI.4) atrārthe dve api satya iti satyaprasaṃgenedam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27476: tasyām anyāpoha eva saṃbhavati na bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27477: na hi paramāṇor aṣṭadravyakasyāvayavaviśleṣaḥ śakyate kartum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27486: vedanādīn dharmān apohya buddhyā vedanāsvabhāve buddhir bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27489: ghaṭaś cāṃbu cāstīti bruvaṃtaḥ satyam evāhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27498: paramārthaś ca satyaṃ ca tat paranārthasatyaṃ yathānyena jñānena laukikena gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27500: saṃvṛtyā saṃvyavahārena jñānena vā kliṣṭenākliṣṭena vā gṛhyata iti saṃvṛtisatyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27509: yac chrutaṃ satyadarśanādhikārikaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 525) tac chrutam udgṛhṇāti paṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:27510: arthaṃ vā śṛṇoti tadarthaṃ śrotradvāreṇa vijānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:27514: vyaṃjananirvṛttena nāmnārtham ākarṣaty ayam asya nāmno 'rtha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27539: annamayāḥ prāṇās tṛṇamayyo gāva iti loke prayogadarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27551: alabdhe tu praṇīte 'pi vā prabhūte 'pi vā icchābhilāṣā mahecchatety ācāryamataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27556: kathaṃ caturtho 'py ayam āryavaṃśo bhavaty alobhasvabhāva ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27567: tatra bhavaprakāre tṛṣṇā aho batāhaṃ indraḥ syāṃ cakravartī syām iti evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:27569: aho batocchidyeyaṃ na bhaveyaṃ paraṃ maraṇād ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:27597: nāśubhayā kleśaprahāṇaṃ viṣkaṃbhaṇāmātraṃ tu bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27598: svāṃgāvayave cittam upanibadhnātīti vacanāt na tāvat stryaṃgāvayave prayogakāla eva saṃrāgahetuparihārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27600: asthino māṃsam apanayan sakalām asthiśaṃkalāṃ paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:27603: gacched asau śivipathikāṃ haṃtuṃ rāgaṃ yadīcchati
T07yabhkvyu:27604: tato vinīlakaṃ paśyet tataḥ paśyed vipūyakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27608: tatra saṃkṣepacitta ādikarmiko yogācāra ekasmin pādāṃguṣṭhe mana upanibadhya pādāṃguṣṭhaṃ klidyamānaṃ paśyaty etan māṃsam evaṃ yāvat sarvaṃ śarīram asthiśaṃkalām adhimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27610: atikrāṃtamanasikāras tathaiva yāvad bhruvor madhye cittaṃ dhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:27611: vistaracittas tu āsamudrāsthivistāraḥ saṃkṣepād ādikarmika ity evamāditrividha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27612: evaṃ ca kṛtvā catuṣkoṭikaḥ praśno bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27614: [Tib.187a] prathamā koṭir jitamanaskārasya svakāyālaṃbanā aśubhā ālaṃbanaparīttatayā parīttā kāyasyālpatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27615: (Abhidh-k-vy 527) na vaśitāparīttatayā jitamanaskāratvād atikrāṃtamanasikāratvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27626: sāmaṃtakeṣu dhyānāṃtare catuḥṣu dhyāneṣu kāmadhātau ceti daśa bhūmikā.
T07yabhkvyu:27631: nāmnaiva siddham aśubhākārety ākārārthaṃ na sūtrayitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27633: cakṣurvijñānavad atītāyā atītam ālaṃbanam evaṃ yāvat pratyutpannāyāḥ pratyutpannam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27641: tasyāḥ smṛter balasyādhānena vṛttir eṣām iti smṛtibalādhānavṛttīni kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni kāyaprajñādravyādīni smṛtyupathānīty ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:27642: tadvad ānāpānaprajñā smṛtibalādhānavṛttitvād ānāpānasmṛtir ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27650: caturthadhyāne sāmaṃtake tu yady apy upekṣāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:27652: atha kim artham eṣopekṣā saṃprayogiṇy evāvadhāryata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27657: tasyāś cānāpānasmṛter avadhānasādhyatvāt tābhyām asaṃprayoga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27661: tenedaṃ pakṣāṃtaram upanyasyate ye tu mauleṣv iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27669: ayaṃ dharmo bauddha eṣām (Abhidh-k-vy 528) iti idaṃdharmāṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27674: upadeśam aṃtareṇa yasmād bāhyānāṃ nāsti svayaṃ sūkṣmadharmābhisaṃbodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27682: yāvad vāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairaṃbhāś ca vāyava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27684: kim anugrāhakā ete yāvad uṣṇā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27718: na hy etad vipākarūpasyāsti vipākātmakasya rūpasya cakṣurāder etat punaḥpratisaṃdhānaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:27719: arūpasya tu cittacaittasya punaḥpratisaṃdhānaṃ na vāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:27721: airyāpathikaṃ nairnāṇikaṃ ca cittam adharabhūmikaṃ saṃmukhībhavati yāvac caturthadhyānopapannasyety (Abhidh-k-vy 529) ata āśaṃkyocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27725: niṣpannasamādher api hi prajñām aṃtareṇa kleśā na prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:27727: kutaḥ prnar etat smṛtyupasthānabhāvanayā vipaśyanā saṃpadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27729: ekāyano 'yaṃ bhikṣavo mārgo yad uta smṛtyupasthānāni.
T07yabhkvyu:27730: kevalo 'yaṃ kuśalarāśiḥ yad uat catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:27741: dharmās tribhyo 'nya iti asaṃbhinnavyavasthām abhisaṃdhāyaivam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27743: punaḥ sarve saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27765: tad evaṃ sati tad ālaṃbanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27767: [Tib.190a] sarvadharmā iti bhikṣavaś caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām etad adhivacanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27775: tayā hi prajñayā tadvān prajñāvān anupaśyaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:27777: evam anupaśyanāyogād anupaśya ity ato 'nupaśyanā prajñeti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27779: adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī kāyānudarśī viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27787: kāyam anupaśayituṃ śīlam asyeti kāyānupaśyīti ṇinir api yadi vidhīyeta tathāpy etadrūpaṃ sidhyatīti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27793: smṛtibalādhānena vṛttir asyā iti smṛtibalādhānavṛttiḥ prajñā.
T07yabhkvyu:27796: dārupāṭakīlasaṃdhāraṇavad yathā dārupāṭena tīkṣṇakīlena dārupāṭasya saṃdhāraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:27797: evam asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ smṛtibalādhānenālaṃbane vṛttir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27798: yadi hi smṛtir ālaṃbanaṃ dharayaty evaṃ prajñā prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27799: tad evaṃ smṛtyopatiṣṭhata iti smṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñeti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthaḥ kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam iti kartary api lyuḍ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27815: evaṃ yāvad dharmeṣu smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:27818: yathaiva hi prajñayā smṛtir upatiṣṭhate kāyādiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:27820: idānīṃ sūtroktāṃ smṛtyupashānānāṃ karṇasādhanatvam asaṃbadhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kārakāṃtareṇārthaṃ vivakṣur [Tib.191a] āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27831: atra sūtre ālaṃbanam eva kāyavedanācittadharmāḥ smṛtyupasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27836: evaṃ yāvad dharmā eva smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti vigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27837: yadi cātra sūtre ālaṃbanaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ nābhipretam abhaviṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:27839: kathaṃ ca bhikṣavaś caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaś ca bhavaty astaṃgamaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:27842: kāyādīnāṃ hi smṛtyupasthānatve sati tathā vacanaṃ yujyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:27845: eṣāṃ kāyasṃṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ [Tib.191b] ālaṃbanāpekṣayā kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ yāvad dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti nāma vyavasthāpate.
T07yabhkvyu:27848: ubhayasaṃtatyālaṃbanatvāc ca pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ eṣāṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ traividhyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27853: bahirdhā ye kāyanupaśyī viharati ātāpīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:27856: vedanāsmṛtyupasthānādīnām apy adhyātmaṃ vedanānāṃ vedanānupaśyī viharatīti vistareṇa traividhyaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27861: dvābhyāṃ vedanā prakāraudārikatayeti tadanaṃtaraṃ tasyā darśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27862: sūkṣmapracāratvād durvijñatayā dharmāḥ sūkṣmā ity atas tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ cittasya darśanam.
T07yabhkvyu:27875: piṇḍavibhāgato dharmāṇām anātmakāritvād dharmamātraṃ rahitam ātmaneti (Abhidh-k-vy 532) dharmanirvacanataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27883: kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:27884: yadi kāyaṃ vedanāṃ ca dve paśyati dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27886: yadi kāyam yāvad dharmāṃś ca paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:27888: yad api kāyaṃ vedanāṃ cittaṃ dharmāṃś ca samastān paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:27900: eṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇaṃ paścād vakṣyāma iti saptame kośasthāne
T07yabhkvyu:27904: atha kim artham upadiśyaṃta ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27906: atha kasmān mūrdhāna ity ucyaṃta ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:27926: vṛkṣādimūrdhebhyo hi loke pāto vā bhaved atipāto vā.
T07yabhkvyu:27936: vivardhayato yogino vardhanena (Abhidh-k-vy 533) viśiṣṭānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27949: mūrdhabhyas tu parihīyata ity asti saṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27964: agradharmaśleṣād iti [Tib.193b] agradharmāṇāṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhasatyālaṃbanānām anaṃtarotpādāt kṣāṃteḥ kāmāvacaratvaduḥkhasatyālaṃbanam.
T07yabhkvyu:27968: adhimātrakṣāṃtyavadhāraṇenaiva hi traidhātukaduḥkhādyālaṃbanatvam eṣām uṣmagatādīnāṃ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:27972: kṣāṃter evety avadhāraṇāt anyāny uṣmagatādīni traidhātukaduḥkhādyālaṃbanānīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:27976: ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāsenaikaikasya satyākārasya ekaikasya satyālaṃbanasya cāpahrāsena yāvat kāmāvacaram eva duḥkhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:27977: eṣā sarvaiva rūpārāpyapratipakṣākārahrāsāt prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:27979: anvayajñānapakṣaṃ tāvan mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ceti [Tib.194a] taiś caturbhir ākārair ākārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:27985: tatas tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekenaiva cākārya nirodhasatyaṃ cāpāsya.
T07yabhkvyu:27991: kāmāvacarapratipakṣaṃ svaiś caturbhir ākāraiḥ tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekena cākārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:27996: evaṃ hi hrāsāraṃbhāt prabhṛti sarva ete kṣaṇā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:27999: mrdvī tu kṣāṃtir yā purastād adhimātrebhyo mūrdhabhyo 'naṃtaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvan mārgasatyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28001: svaiḥsvaiḥ sarvair ākārair anapahrāsaṃ manasikurvata ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28012: pūrvake hy ālaṃbanāpahrāse sati atibahavaś cittakṣaṇā visarpaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28014: na hi satyeṣu vidyamāneṣu ākāratyāgo yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28017: evaṃ ca sati pūrvaṃ satyālaṃbanahrāsaṃ karoti paścād ākārahrāsaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28018: na hi maule viṣaye 'napākṛte tadālaṃbanāpākaraṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28020: eṣām ākārā dvātriṃśad bhavaṃtīty etad adhunā nyāyāṃtaram upadiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28022: yadā kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:28023: evaṃ yāvad rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīyaṃ mṛdvī kṣāṃtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28024: yadā punaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīty evaṃ yāvat kāmāvacarāṇāṃ [Tib.195a] saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ manasikaroti caturbhir
T07yabhkvyu:28025: rūpārūkyāvacarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ parityajataḥ prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtir ārabdhā.
T07yabhkvyu:28051: tatrātmadṛṣṭicarito yogācāraḥ punas tat kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ tribhir ākārair manasikaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:28056: eṣā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity evam ekānnaviṃśaṃ cittaśataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28057: evam ātmīyādhimuktasya tu śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākārayataḥ śūnyākāraṃ dviḥ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:28062: adhimātrā tu kṣāṃtir ekam eva kṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28063: sā yathāpudgalacaritam anityākāreṇa vā duḥkhākāreṇa vā śūnyākāreṇa vā anātmākāreṇa vā saṃprayukteti.
T07yabhkvyu:28065: pūrvaṃ hi tena traidhātukaṃ vidūṣayatā samastaḥ pratipakṣa ālaṃbitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28066: paścāt kāmadhātoḥ pūrvaṃ praheyaparijñeyatvāt kāmāvacara eva duḥkhe 'vatiṣṭhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28072: sarve tu paṃca skaṃdhāḥ saparivāragrahaṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28073: samāhitabhūmidatvād uṣmagatādīnām avijñaptilakṣaṇo rūpaskaṃdho 'stīti [Tib.196a] paṃca skaṃdhā uṣmagatādayaḥ saparivāragrahaṇāt saparivārā gṛhyaṃte
T07yabhkvyu:28075: prāptisaṃmukhībhāvāt āryapudgalasyoṣmagatādīnāṃ phalaprāptiprayogabhūtānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvo mā bhūd iti prāptayo noṣmagatādiṣu gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28076: na hi prāptaprayogaphalasyāryasya prayogasaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ nyāyyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28081: pratiniyatālaṃbanatvena hi kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīny asamarthānīti anāgatāni catvāri (Abhidh-k-vy 536) bhāvyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28083: kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni ca pūrvapratilabdhāni bhavaṃtīty ataś catvāry api bhāvyaṃte prāptyutpādād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28091: trisatyālaṃbanasya nirodhasatyālaṃbanasya coṣmagatasyākaraṇe sadṛśā evākārā bhāvyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28103: labdhatvāt gotrāṇāṃ saṃbhavastaś catuḥsatyālaṃbanakāyasmṛtyupasthānādijātīnāṃ labdhatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28123: yasmād anyasamudayādyākārā agradharmā na saṃti duḥkhamātrālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28124: yathā tarhy agradharmāsvabhāvakāyasmṛtyupasthānādyasaṃmukhībhāve 'py agradharmasamudācārāvasthāyām anāgatāni kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni bhāvyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28125: evam agradharmāsvabhāvasamudayādyādyākārā ānagatā bhāvyaṃta iti kiṃ neṣyata ity ataḥ punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28130: darśanamārge hi yasya satyasya darśanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28133: kiṃ punar (Abhidh-k-vy 537) eṣāṃ darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ anuśleṣāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28138: yad vā pṛthagjanatvaghātāya duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃter ānaṃtaryamārgabhūtā agradharmā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28145: kathaṃ punar niścito vedha ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28148: idaṃ duḥkham ayaṃ yāvan mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28151: tasyāvāhakatvenākarṣakatvena hitatvāt tasmai hitam iti chaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28155: anāgamyaṃ cāṃtaraṃ ca dhyānāni ca bhūmayo 'syety
T07yabhkvyu:28176: atra ca hetur yasmāt sa yogī kāmāvacareṇa duḥkhena vihanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28177: tena sa pūrvaṃ tato mokṣam anveṣata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28179: teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ rūpāvacaratvāt yadi ca yogī rūpadhātāv upapadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:28180: tatas tasya tatra paṃca skaṃdhako vipāko 'bhinirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:28190: iha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28198: ihaiva janmani strīpuruṣendriyaparāvṛttau ubhayāśrayāṇi strīpuruṣendriyāśrayāṇi striyaḥ puruṣāś ca labhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28199: striyo hy etāny utpādya janmāṃtarastrībhāvaprādurbhāve stryāśrayāṇi saṃmukhīkurvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28201: na hi tallābhinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ janmāṃtare strībhāvo na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28202: puruṣā api tathaiva strībhāve janmāṃtare sati stryāśrayāṇi saṃmukhīkurvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28208: tathā hi strī tān labdhvā stryāśrayais tais tadānīṃtanaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28209: janmāṃtaraparāvṛttau ca kāmadhātau puruṣāśrayaprādurbhāve puruṣāśrayaiḥ sa puruṣaḥ samanvāgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28213: tasmiṃ janmani strītvaṃ janmāṃtare 'pi punar nāstīty asyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28215: so 'vaśyam anaṃtaraṃ darśanamārgam utapādayen [Tib.199a] na ca dṛṣṭasatyasya punaḥ strītvaprādurbhāva iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28218: yadbhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni pratilabdhāni prathamadhyānabhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni.
T07yabhkvyu:28219: tāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajan prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yavac caturthaṃ tyajann āryas tāny api yathāsvaṃ prathamadhyānadhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:28225: pṛthagjanas tu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajati nirvedhabhāgīyāni saty asati vā bhūmisaṃcāre.
T07yabhkvyu:28227: tata ūrdhvam upapadyamānas tāni bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi mṛtyunaiva tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:28228: avītarāgas tv asati bhūmi saṃcāre mṛtyunā tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:28230: na tv evam (Abhidh-k-vy 539) āryapudgalas tat kuśalamūlasaṃtater darśanamārgopabṛṃhitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28231: pṛthagjana eva tathā tyajatīti kathaṃ gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28238: tatra pṛthagjano yadā brāhmakāyikebhyaś cyutvā brahmapurohiteṣūpapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28240: yadā tu prathamāt dhyānāc cyutvā dvitīya upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28245: kāmadhātucyavanād eva ca teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyatyāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28248: tata ūrdhvam upapadyamāno nirvedhabhāgīyāni vijahyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28253: ata ūrdhvam upapadyamānasya tan masti yad vijahyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28256: yathā prātimokṣasaṃvaras tyaktaḥ punar ādīyamāno 'pūrva eva labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28271: asati pratisīmadaiśike mūlād evoṣmagatāt prabhṛtīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28283: sā hi guṇakṛtāpi bhavati na kevalaṃ doṣakṛtā.
T07yabhkvyu:28286: pratisaṃdhicittena vā keṣāṃcid dharmāṇāṃ vihānir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28293: apratisaṃkhyānirodhaṃ teṣāṃ gatyādīnāṃ pratilabhata [Tib.200b] ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28296: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mṛdvyām adhimātrāyāṃ ca kṣāṃtau pratilabhata iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:28310: pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣāṃtim api śrāvakagotrād vivartya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28311: na hi te parārtham apāyān avagāhanta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28316: yeṣām ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ matena khaḍgād anyo 'pi pratyekabuddho 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:28325: yas tu pūrvasmin janmani saṃbhṛtamokṣabhāgīyo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28326: sa ekasminn api janmani nirvedhabhāgīyāny āryamārgaṃ cotpādayatīty avagaṃtavyaṃ bījāvaropaṇetyādi bījāvaropaṇaṃ mokṣabhāgīyotpādanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28341: trikarmasvabhāvam alpakam apy etat mokṣābhilāṣabalādhānān mokṣabhāgīyam ākṣipati.
T07yabhkvyu:28348: ato manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu dvīpeṣv ākṣipyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28362: kārikāyāṃ tu dharmakṣāṃtir iti vacanam ekadeśagrahaṇato devadatto datta iti yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:28365: yat tat paryādāya rāgaprahāṇam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28367: tatra samyaktve niyama ekāṃtībhāvo niyāma iti ghañi rūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28368: api tu niyama iti yamaḥ samupaniviṣu cety appratyayasya vibhāṣitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28371: tad eva viparyāsasyāpakramān niyāmāvakrāṃtir ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28377: tathā pṛthagjanatvavyāvartane sāmarthyam anāgatāyā dharmajñānakṣāṃter abhyupagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28384: na yuktam etal laukikair agradharmais tadvyāvartana iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28393: yathā śatruskandhārūḍha eva kaścic chatruṃ ghātayet.
T07yabhkvyu:28394: evaṃ kilāgradharmāḥ pṛthagjanatvaśatruskandhārūḍhās tad eva pṛthagjanatvaṃ ghātayeyur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28396: laukikair agradharmaiḥ [Tib.202b] kṣāṃtyā ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28402: vimuktimārgeṇa prahīṇaḥ evaṃ laukikair agradharmaiḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28405: tena tato 'traiva dharmajñānam anāsravam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28406: tad duḥkhe dharmajñānam ity ucyate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28407: śāstre tena nāmnā vyavahāra it darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:28414: yathaiva dharmajñānenānugataṃ parijñātaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ duḥkhādibhir ākāraiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28415: tathaiva rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyanugamād anvayajñānam etad iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28416: evaṃ samanaṃtarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye rūpārūpyāvacare 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtir [Tib.203a] iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28420: darśanābhisamaya ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś caivaṃ ṣoḍaśacittaka ity abhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28426: yad anāsravayā prajñayā dṛṣṭam iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28428: ālaṃbanaṃ grahaṇaṃ tatsaṃprayuktair api vedanādibhir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28439: jātyādibhir ity ādiśabdāl lakṣaṇāṃtarāṇi prāptayaś ca gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28444: samudayādīnāṃ samudayanirodhamārgāṇām abhisamayaḥ prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanād yathākramaṃ prahāṇaṃ samudayasya kleśaprāpticchedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28449: na ca duḥkhākāreṇa samudayādīnāṃ darśanaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28451: athāpy anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ darśanam iti brūyāt nikāyāṃtarīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28452: śūnyatānātmate sarvasatyānāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:28453: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28455: tathā ca saty anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanam iti bruvan sūtravirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28456: yasmāt sūtra evam uktam āryaśrāvakasyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28457: atha manyase nāsti sūtravirodho yasmād abhisamayāvasthāyāh pūrvaṃ prayogāvasthāyām [Tib.204a] āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:28460: anāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto dharmāṇāṃ vicaya iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28462: bhāvanāmārga evam iti ced ya āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:28472: aṃtarā tu vyutthānām asti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28473: śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād aṃtarā vyutthānaṃ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28474: ubhayathāpi ca vicāryamāṇe bahūnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28480: samudayādīnāṃ kāryabhisamayaḥ prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanād ity [Tib.204b] ato 'smābhir apy evam abhyupagamān nāsti doṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28490: kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28492: caturṇāṃ gṛhapate āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayo na tv ekābhisamayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28493: yo gṛhapate evaṃ vaded ahaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 544) duḥkhaṃ āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvad duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28496: asthānam anavakāśo yad duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyati pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:28499: tadyathā gṛhapate ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kūṭāgārasya vā kūṭāgāraśālāyā vā vā mūlapādam apratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:28506: yan mūlapādaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:28507: yāvad evam eva gṛhapate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28508: yad duḥkhasatyam adṛṣṭvā samudayasatyaṃ drakṣyatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28510: kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28514: pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā bhikṣo ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyam abhirokṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28520: asthānam anavakāśo yac catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyakaḍevaram abhirokṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:28521: evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyam anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:28525: kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28529: tadyathānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣpadikāyā niḥśreṇyāḥ prathamaṃ niḥśreṇīpadam anabhiruhya prāsādam abhirokṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28531: vistareṇa yāvad evam evānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28534: atha mataṃ syād yo duḥke niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa iti sūtrād ekābhisamaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28538: tasmād duḥkhābhisamayān mārgo 'pi tenābhisamito yasmād duḥkhavad buddhe 'pi niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28540: atha vāniścayābhilāṣaḥ kāṃkṣā vimatir vicikitsā (Abhidh-k-vy 545) yathoktalakṣaṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:28544: duḥkhe 'bhisamite buddhaviṣaye vicikitsāyā asamudācāro 'vaśyaṃprahāṇaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28545: ato yo duḥkhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi.
T07yabhkvyu:28547: (VI.30ab) te punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ity uktaṃ prāg iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28551: kṛtyāś ca śaki liṅ ceti śakyārthe kṛtyapratyayaḥ aṃtarayituṃ śakyā aṃtaryāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28570: [Tib.206b] yadi punar dvitīyenānaṃtaryamārgeṇaiva duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyā saha visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:28574: prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālaṃbane kāmāvacaraduḥkhe prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ notpannaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28575: tatra hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ savicikitsaiva vartate vicikitsāyā aprahīṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28576: na ca tatra duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtiḥ prahīṇavicikitseti śakyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28582: samudayadharmajñānaprahatavyo nirodhadharmajñānaprahātavyo mārgadharmajñānaprahātavyaḥ duḥkhānvayajñānaprahātavyaḥ samudayānvayajñānaprahātavyo nirodhānvayajñānaprahātavyo mārgānvayajñānaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca saṃyojananikāya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28587: na hi tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 546) kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāya ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28592: kṣāṃtayo jñānasya parivārā ity ataḥ kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28594: yathā rājaparivārakṛtasya kasyacid arthasya rājakṛta iti vyapadeśo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28595: tadvad bhāvanāprahātavyas tu saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya eva.
T07yabhkvyu:28598: (VI.31ab) adṛṣṭasatyadarśanād iti jñānena katham adṛṣṭasatyadarśanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28599: tad apy adṛṣṭe satyāṃtare sati bhavatīti darśanamārgāṃtarālavartijñānaṃ darśanamārgaḥ pāraṃparyam abhisaṃdhāya.
T07yabhkvyu:28602: paṃcadaśakṣaṇā darśanamārgo yāvad asya pudgalasyādṛṣṭadarśanaṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:28604: tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi duḥkhe adṛṣṭadarśanam asya samudaye pravartata evety āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28605: bhāvanāmārga eva ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇa iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28606: nanu ca tenāpy adṛṣṭaṃ paśyati kiṃ tad adṛṣṭam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28608: mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtir ātmānaṃ virahayya śeṣam anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ mārgam ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:28613: satyaṃ prati cintā dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28614: na tu kṣaṇaṃ prati dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇo na veti.
T07yabhkvyu:28616: paṃcadaśena kṣaṇena yad anvayajñānapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28620: na hy ekakṣaṇenādṛṣṭena mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtilakṣaṇena satyaṃ tanmārgasatyam aḍṛṣṭaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28622: yathā naikaluṅgena ekasasyaśalākayā dātreṇālūnenācchinnena kedāram alūnaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28625: tathā hi kecit pramādād alūne 'pi ekaluṃge vaktāro bhavaṃti lūnam asmābhiḥ kedāram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28627: phalatvād ityadihetubhir bhāvanāmārgam eva ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ sādhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:28634: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ yāvan (Abhidh-k-vy 547) mārge 'nvayajñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28643: na ca darśanamārge kṣāṃtir jñānaṃ vā kiṃcit prābaṃdhikam astīty ato 'pi mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28651: tad idam aṃtarnītam abhisamīkṣya punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28653: yasmād darśanaheyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānenādhārapratipakṣeṇa [Tib.208b] saṃdhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:28654: yadi ca tasmāt phalamārgāt ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇāt parihāṇiḥ syāt srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28655: na ca srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇir ity ato na tasmāt parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28661: kim ayam upalabdhisamam iti cottaram udgrāhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28664: yadi manyase yata eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānena.
T07yabhkvyu:28668: yadi mārgānvayajñānena darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam ity ato darśanamārgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28670: tasmān mārgānvayajñānāt pareṇa sarveṇa bhāvanāmārgeṇa darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam iti sarva eva darśanamārgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28672: ṣoḍaśa eva hi kṣaṇo darśanamārgo bhavadhir iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28674: dvitīye tṛtīye vā divase ya utpadyate tajjātīyo viśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28677: tad evaṃ saty āvaśyakāparihāṇitvaṃ yo hetur uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28682: sapta jñānāni duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge dharmajñānaṃ kasmād durśanamārgo na punar aṣṭamaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānam (Abhidh-k-vy 548) ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28686: duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yady api kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28689: mārge dharmajñāna utpanne rūpārūpyapratipakṣo na tāvad dṛṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28696: (VI.31cd, 32) pūrvaṃ parapratyayena paroditena arthānusaraṇād duḥkhādisatyapratipatter ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28697: pūrvam iti viśeṣaṇena bhāvanākāle paropadeśanirapekṣam arthānusaraṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28702: [Tib.209b] pūrvaṃ svayam eva sūtrādibhir dharmair dvādaśāṃgaiḥ pravacanair arthānusaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28705: yāvacchabdena yady eko dvau trayaś catvāraḥ paṃca prahīṇāḥ prakārā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28714: yadi tayoḥ pudgalayos tasmāt paṃcaprakāraprahāṇāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptaṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28717: pratipannakāv iti cādhikārād evaṃ padārthavyavasthā labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28720: (VI.33) arhattvaṃ tu na śakyam āditaḥ prāptum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28721: anāgāmiphalam aprāpyādita evārhattvaṃ prāptuṃ na śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28724: na hi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28725: yathā darśanamārgasvabhāveṣu paṃcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ aditas tṛtīyaphalapratipannakād [Tib.210a] arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:28726: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne ādito 'nāgāmino 'rhan syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28729: yadi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ nāstīti ato 'rhattvaṃ aśakyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 549) pūrvam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:28730: tarhi pṛthagjanāvasthāyām eva bhāvanāmārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyāt tatphalapratipannakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28735: na hi pūrvaṃ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyasaṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28737: tasmād āditaḥ pratipannako 'rhaṃś ca na syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28745: na tu tasya śraddhā nāsīti pūrvavad vācyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28752: ataḥ pṛcchati kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28760: tadā pratipannaka ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28761: tadā hi pūrvaprahīṇakleśapratipakṣasyāpratilabdhapūrvasya tatprahāṇasya cānāsravā prāptir utpadyata iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28763: ṣoḍaśe citte srotaāpanna evocyata iti vacanāt.
