T07yabhkvyu:28766: laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇāṣṭaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte sakṛdāgāmy evocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28768: yasmāt phale phalaviśiṣṭasya mārgasya lābho nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28769: evaṃ kāmavītarāga ūrdhvaṃ vā ṣoḍaśe citte nārhattvaphalapratipannaka ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28772: tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgaḥ adharāṃ bhūmiṃ niśrityānāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmatīty asti saṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28773: so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tṛtīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:28775: asti hi sambhāvanā yad asau phalaviśiṣṭamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28776: yasmād asya tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28777: tena so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 550) saṃmukhīkarotīti niyamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28778: anyathā hi yadi na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28781: tasmāt tṛtīyadhyānād ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu vā sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28786: yadi na saṃmukhīkṛtaṃ syād ubhayenāpi sukhendriyenāsamanvāgataḥ syād āryāṇāṃ cordhvopapannānām avaśyaṃ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgama uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28790: so 'vaśyaṃ paṃcabhir upekṣājīvitamanaḥsukhasaumanasyendriyair ity evamādivacanāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:28795: yo hi caturthadhyānalābhī ṣaṇṇāṃ bhūmīnām anyatamāṃ bhūmiṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:28796: sa ṣaḍbhūmikenānāgāmiphalenānāgamyabhūmikena yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikena ṣoḍaśe citte samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28804: yas tu vītarāgaḥ prathamadhyānalābhī vā dvitīyālābhī.
T07yabhkvyu:28808: sarvajaghanyo 'pi hy anāgāmy avaśyam eva tribhūmikenānāgāmiphalena samanvāgata iti varṇayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28809: tasmād aparapakṣāpekṣayaivam uktam ācāryeṇeti yuktaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28813: tatra bhūyovītarāgo yasya saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:28831: (Abhidh-k-vy 551) tad evam anayā yuktyānena vā prakāreṇānyo 'pi dṛṣṭāṃto vaktavya iti sūcayati.
T07yabhkvyu:28832: anyathā hy eṣa dṛṣṭāṃta ity eva brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28835: svahetuparaṃparayā dhyāpitā abhivardhitās tataś cādhimātrapramāṇam eteṣām ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28837: mūlasadharmiṇyo hi prāptayas tatprabaṃdhatvāt kleśānāṃ tṛvṛtkarṣaniṣkarṣaṇavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28838: yathā trivṛtkarṣeṇa dharaṇena subahukāle saṃvardhitānāṃ vātapittādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ niṣkarṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28840: yathā ca kṣaṇikenālpena pradīpena [Tib.212b] mahatas tamaso ghātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28848: ādyo 'nāsravo mārgo darśanamārgas tasya lābhāc cet srotaāpannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28851: tathā hi pratilomakrameṇārhata ārabhyāṣṭānāṃ puruṣapudgalānām arhatpratipannakādīnāṃ srotaāpattiphalapratipanno 'ṣṭamako bhavati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī vā tasyāpy ādyamārgalābhāt so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28853: atha mataṃ apūrvaphalasya lābhāt srotaāpanna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28866: tam adhikṛtya tam abhisaṃdhāyādyaphalalābhād apūrvaphalalābhāt srotaāpanna ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28869: nāṣṭamakaḥ sa cāpi hy āryamārgasrotaāpanna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28873: aṣṭamakena tu pratipannakaḥ mārga eva labdha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28875: yasmāc ca tena darśanamārgaś ca sa eva bhāvanāmārgaś ca sa eva labdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28878: yasmāc cānena sakalaṃ sroto'bhisamitaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtikṣaṇasyāpi darśanān na tv aṣṭamakena.
T07yabhkvyu:28879: tasmād (Abhidh-k-vy 552) ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvaphalaprāpy eva srotaāpanna ity ucyate nāṣṭamakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28881: tadyathā loke yaḥ prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:28888: yathā saptakasāmānyāt saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣur uktaḥ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:28891: kathaṃ ca bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ saptasthānakuśalo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28893: rūpasamudayaṃ rūpanirodhaṃ rūpanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ rūpasyāsvādam ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:28894: evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:28895: vijñānasamudayaṃ vistareṇa yāvan niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28896: evam anena nyāyena paṃcasaptakāni paṃcatriṃśad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28899: yathā ca pattrikāyāṃ pattrikāyāṃ saptaparṇasādṛśyād anekaśatapattro 'pi san sa vṛkṣaḥ saptaparṇa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28903: yadi saptakasāmānyāt saptakṛtvaḥ parama iti vyākhyāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28905: tad virudhyata ity ato 'pavyākhyānam etad ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28906: ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīty avirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28908: saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya saṃdhāvya [Tib.214a] duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ karotīti devamanuṣyavacanād aṃtarābhavo 'pi na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28911: yadi aṃtarābhavaiḥ saha saptabhavā gaṇyeran janmacatuṣṭayam evāsya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:28912: tad evānenāniṣṭāpattivacanena tadātmīyaṃ vyākhyānam ekasyāṃ gatāv iti samarthayati.
T07yabhkvyu:28915: yady ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti vyākhyāpayasi.
T07yabhkvyu:28916: kathaṃ tarhi ūrdhvasrotaso 'ṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttir ekasyāṃ gatau bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28919: sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvaś cyutaś cānyo bhavāgraga
T07yabhkvyu:28922: bhavaprakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu bhavāgraparamagrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaṃ lakṣayāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28933: yena codakenaivaṃ coditaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir veti.
T07yabhkvyu:28935: iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28937: na punar ubhayeṣv eva devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28940: sa deveṣu triṣkṛtvaḥ saṃsṛtya manuṣyeṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva tato devān āgamya parinirvātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28943: sa manuṣyeṣu triṣkṛtvo deveṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva saṃsṛtya tato manuṣyān āgamya parinirvātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28944: evaṃ hi paṭhyate saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:28946: na pratyekam iti viśiṣya paṭhyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28947: evaṃ vaibhāṣikapakṣe saṃśayāvasthe kṛte ācāryaḥ samarthayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:28948: pratyekam api tu kāśyapīyā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28954: yad uktaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir vā kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28955: yac coktam iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:28957: [Tib.215a] pratyekamarthaparigraheṇaiva hi kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhir api sūcito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28958: na hi rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ saptakṛtvo devamanuṣyeṣu saṃsaraṇaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28967: yena tāvatā kālenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākān nāṣṭamaṃ bhavam abhinirvartayati.
T07yabhkvyu:28969: saptapadāśīrviṣeṇa tena daṣṭo yathā saptapadāni gatvā mriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:28973: yathā cāturthako jvaraś caturtha evāhani bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28984: [Tib.215b] saptasaṃyojanāvaśeṣatvād ity ahetur eṣa ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:28985: na hy ūrdhvabhāgīyāni kāmadhātau janmābhinirvartayituṃ samarthāny ūrdhvabhūmikatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:28988: tatprāptisāmarthyāt tu tāvatāṃ bhavānām abhinirvṛttir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:28989: (Abhidh-k-vy 554) na hi tāni ūrdhvam api vipākahetutvena vyavasthāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:28994: sa hi tasya svabhāvo yad bhikṣuliṃgena yojayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:28997: srotaāpanno bhavann avinipātakadharmā niyataṃ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛtvaḥparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:29007: pṛthagjanāvasthāyām upacitasyāniyatavedanīyasya tadgāmikasya karmaṇo vipākadānavaiguṇyāt saṃtateḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29010: yad asau tadgāmikasya karmaṇa upacitasya vipākadānavaiguṇyenāvasthiteti.
T07yabhkvyu:29026: apāyaniyate tu karmaṇi saty asau pudgalaḥ kṣāṃtim api nirvedhabhāgīyalakṣaṇāṃ notpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:29060: na tu budho guṇaiḥ pātrīkṛtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29062: yasmād duḥkhāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāsti bhavāṃtarasaṃgṛhītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29069: nityatvāt karaṇaṃ na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29072: tatprāpter vibaṃdhaḥ kleśaprāptir upadhir vā tadapanayanān nirvāṇaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:29075: tadapanayanān nityam apy ākāśaṃ karotīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29077: yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavaṃti vaktāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29078: anyo 'pi veti pṛthagjanaḥ paripakvasaṃtānaḥ na tu niyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29079: kadācid ihaiva parinirvāyāt aṃtarābhaveṣu cety ato nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29081: dve vā trīṇi vā janmāny asyeti [Tib.217a] dvitrijanmā.
T07yabhkvyu:29091: srotaāpannasyānupūrvikasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānām ekasya prakārasya yāvac caturṇāṃ paścāt prahāṇe sati.
T07yabhkvyu:29093: na hi vinā pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprakāraprahāṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:29094: laukikenāpi hi mārgeṇa tasyāryasya kleśaprakāraprahāṇe 'nāsravasya tatpratipakṣasyendriyasya lābho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29099: srotaāpattiphalāt pareṇa sakṛdāgāmitvasya yāvad arhattvasya bhavyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29112: naitad vyākhyānakārair vicāritam iti vicāryam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:29119: na hi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ phalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29123: naivam asya srotaāpannasya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prakāraḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29127: ato 'syaiko 'pi prakāro navamaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho dhātvatikramasya duṣkaratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29129: na tasyaikaḥ kleśaḥ prakāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29131: tadyathā trāyastriṃśeṣu satyāni dṛṣṭvā dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃsṛtya.
T07yabhkvyu:29136: rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tanutvād ity ucyata iti sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:29138: trayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ [Tib.218a] prahāṇāt rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvāt sakṛdāgāmībhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29144: indriyata iti cātra tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ na sūtritaṃ tathaiva vyākhyeyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29146: katham asyaikavīcikasyaikaprakāro navamaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho na hi kulaṃkulasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29149: yasmād asau navame prakāre prahīṇe kāmadhātusamatikrāṃto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29151: sa ca navamaḥ prakāraḥ karmaṇā saha tatropapadyavedanīya ity atas tadvipākaniṣyandaphalabhūmyatikramāt phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29152: avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhaṃta ity uktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:29162: ekena vā kleśaprakāreṇa vyavahitam asyānāgāmiphalam ity [Tib.218b] ekavīcikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29163: na tāvat kulaṃkulo bhavaty ekavīciko veti.
T07yabhkvyu:29164: laukikena mārgeṇa pūrvaṃ tricaturvidhamukto 'pi na tāvat kulaṃkulo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29168: yāvat phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na saṃmukhīkṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29169: phalaviśiṣṭe tu tatpratipakṣe tadūrdhvaprakārapratipakṣe vā saṃmukhīkṛte tadānāsravendriyalābhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29170: kulaṃkulo bhavaty ekavīciko vety arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29172: paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt anāgāmīty ucyate sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:29174: satkāyadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ prahāṇaikatvavyavasthāpanāt dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29183: tasmāt sākalyena paṃcānāṃ prahāṇād ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29188: aṃtarā utpanne saṃskāreṇāsaṃskāreṇa [Tib.219a] parinirvṛtir asyeti aṃtarotpannasaṃskārāsaṃskāraparinirvṛtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29191: katham utpannasyānāgāminaḥ parinirvṛtir asyeti bahuvrīhiḥ samāso bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29194: tenaivam iha pāṭhaṃ paśyāmaḥ evam utpanne 'syeti.
T07yabhkvyu:29202: utpannasya janmanaḥ parinirvṛtir asyānāgāmina ity utpannaparinirvṛtir anāgāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29209: pūrvapadārthānanyatve 'py anāgāmisamānādhikaraṇasyotpannaśabdasya parinirvṛtiśabdena saha bahuvrīhiḥ samāsa itīccheyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29212: aṃtarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrdhvaṃsrotāś ceti nigamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:29226: na kevalam aṃtarāparinirvāyī nirupadhiśeṣaparinirvāṇena parinirvāty arhattvaṃ prāpyāyur aparisamāpya.
T07yabhkvyu:29236: tac ca prāṃtakoṭikaṃ dhyānaṃ manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu dvīpeṣūtpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29244: upapadyaparinirvāyī tu yāvadāyuḥ sthitvā parinirvātīty upapadyaparinirvāyy eva sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇena parinirvātīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29260: tad evam abhiyogādinānātvāt parinirvāṇaviśeṣa ukto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29262: abhigogaś ca vāhī ca mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29266: nābhiyogo na ca vāhī mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29270: saṃskārālaṃbanena mārgeṇa duḥkhasamudayamārgālaṃbanena mārgeṇa yaḥ kleśān prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:29291: mārgayor eva grahaṇaṃ na pudgalayor abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29298: yady anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇo vāhī (Abhidh-k-vy 560) mārgo 'nabhisaṃskāraśādhyatvāt upapadyaparinirvāyiṇo 'pi vāhī mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29310: yathā ciraśabdasya ciraṃtanam ity ūrdhvam iti nipāto 'stīty apare.
T07yabhkvyu:29315: iha dhyānāni vyavakīrya dhyānatrayāt parihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29319: caturtham eva hi dhyānam ādito vyavakiraṇe samarthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29321: caturthāc ca dhyānād aparihīṇasya prathamādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapattir nāstīty ata ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29327: ya ekam api sthānāṃtaraṃ vilaṃghya śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyākaniṣṭhān praviśatīty evaṃ vākyābhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29333: āryasya hi prabhāvavatas tatrotpāde saty ubhayanāyakatvaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29337: brahmakāyikebhyaś cyutvā brahmapurohitādīni sudarśanāntāni caturdaśasthānāṃtarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati.
T07yabhkvyu:29338: yatropapannas tatas tatra cātyaṃtam anāgamanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29343: tatra ca punaḥ prathame dhyāne 'tyaṃtam anāgamanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29354: na ca pratiṣiddham ato 'pratiṣedhād ūrdhvasrotaso 'kaniṣṭhaparamasya bhavāgraparamasya cāṃtarā akaniṣṭhāṃ bhavāgraṃ ca praviśya parinirvāṇaṃ yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29356: nanu cākaniṣṭhaparamo bhavāgraparama iti coktam ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:29357: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvād akaniṣṭhebhyo bhavāgrāc cordhvaṃ gatyabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29359: na hi tasya dvau trīn vā bhavān abhinirvartya parinirvāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29360: tataḥ pareṇa tv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29362: sa punaś caturvidha ity aṃtarāparinirvāyyabhāvān na paṃcavidhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29364: aṃtarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrdhvasrotāḥ ārūpyagaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:29369: trayo 'nāgāmina iti nirbhidya noktā ity anavabudhyamāna itaraḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:29370: ācāryo 'py arthāpattyoktā eta iti paśyan vivṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:29374: āśuparinirvāyī anāśuparinirvāyī ciraparinirvāyī ca dṛṣṭāṃtatrayeṇa yojayyitavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29375: tadyathā parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir abhinirvartamāna eva nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29377: tadyathāyoguḍānāṃ vāyasphālānāṃ vādīptāgnisaṃprataptānāṃ ayoghanena hanyamānānāṃ ayaḥprapāṭikotpataty eva nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29379: tadyathāyoguḍānām iti pūrvavad yāvad ayaḥprapāṭikotplutya pṛthivyām apatitaiva nirvāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29381: etac ca sūtraṃ vistareṇa purastāl likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29383: upapadya parinirvāṇād abhisaṃskāreṇānabhisaṃskāreṇa parinirvāṇāt [Tib.223a] tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti saṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29389: asya hi yady api vāhī mārgo 'sti abhiyogena tu parinirvāti.
T07yabhkvyu:29391: anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī (Abhidh-k-vy 562) punaḥ pratiprasrabdhapūrvābhisaṃskāro 'bhisaṃskāram anaṃtareṇa parinirvātīty ayam eva eṣāṃ viśeṣo
T07yabhkvyu:29392: yathā tu sābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇāv apy upapadyaparinirvāyyākhyāṃ labhete.
T07yabhkvyu:29394: sarve hy eta upapadyaparinirvāṇād upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29403: asmāc ca tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti sa eva saṃbaṃdho vācyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29405: teṣāṃ punas trayāṇām aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇoḥ ūrdhvasrotasaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:29406: navānāṃ caiṣām eva pratyekaṃ tridhābhedād yathā varṇitād viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29411: abhinirvṛttir aṃtarābhāvaḥ abhinirvṛttivedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād aṃtarāparinirvāyī.
T07yabhkvyu:29413: aparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād ūrdhvaṃsrotā ity evaṃ tāvat teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29414: mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśasamudācāratvād yathākramam eṣām eva kleśaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29415: adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca yathākramam eṣām evendriyaviśeṣād viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29416: teṣām api pratyekam ata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29417: teṣām api pratyekaṃ bhinnānāṃ navānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29418: ata eva karmādiviśeṣāt [Tib.224a] yathāyogaṃ na yathākramaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29443: na hi prathamayos (Abhidh-k-vy 563) trikayoḥ karmaviśeṣād [Tib.224b] viśeṣo 'stīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29457: tathaivendriyam api triprakāram adhimātraṃ mṛdu ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:29470: (VI.41) kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29473: ity etat sarvaṃ sūtraṃ gatisūtrata ity atra pradeśe likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29474: atra ca sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29487: gatir utpattiḥ saṃparāya ity ete sūtre paryāyā ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:29492: teṣāṃ tu vītarāgāṇāṃ saty eva karmaṇi vṛttir nāsati prahīṇakuśalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29495: tatratatra caiṣām atyaṃtam anāgamanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29497: yad etat saty eva vṛttir asati cāvṛttir evāpunaḥpratyāgamanaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:29498: tad etat (Abhidh-k-vy 564) srotaāpanne sakṛdāgāmini ca nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29508: na hy āryā janmāṃtare 'py etat paṃcavidhaṃ pāpam adhyācaraṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29515: yeṣāṃ tu niḥparyāyeṇa na prakārāṃtareṇa srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmivat satpuruṣatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29519: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ navaprakārāṇām api prahāṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29521: sapta satpuruṣagataya ity ato 'nyeṣāṃ pāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29522: (VI.42) kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'py anāgāmina eśa bhedo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:29524: parivṛttajanmānāgāmīyaḥ prathame janmani srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpya dvitīye janmany anāgāmī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29526: yasmāt rūpadhātau parivṛttajanmā kadācid ārūpyān praviśatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29530: śakreṇoktam itaś cyuto 'haṃ manuṣyeṣūpapanno yady arhattvaṃ prāpya na parinirvāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:29531: ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29533: sa hi deveṣv eva srotaāpanno manuṣyāṃś cāgatya parinirvāsyāmīti vacanāt parivṛttajanmā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:29534: aṃte nikāyasabhāgāvasāne mama hīyamānasyārhattvād [Tib.226b] aprāptiparihāṇyā parihīyamāṇasya.
T07yabhkvyu:29535: tatrākaniṣṭheṣūpapattir bhaviṣyatīti prārthanāvacanād dhātvaṃtaragamanam astīti darśitaṃ bhavatīti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29536: tat kathaṃ kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmāṃtara āryo dhātvāṃtaraṃ na gacchatīty ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29541: bhagavatā tarhy evaṃ śṛṇvatā kasmād asau na nivārito mā tvam eva voca ity ata ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29550: dṛṣyaṃte hi tīkṣṇendriyā api saṃta āśrayavaiguṇyāt guṇebhyaḥ parihīyamāṇā ity ato janmāṇtaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād indriyasaṃcāro
T07yabhkvyu:29551: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca parihāṇir nāsty anenaiva janmāṃtaraparivāsena dhātvaṃtaragamanaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29554: tasmāt kāraṇād avītarāgaḥ śaikṣaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī ca nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:29557: ato nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavatīty ayam ācāryasya parihāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29562: akuśalāvyākṛtakleśaprahāṇam akuśalānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ avyākṛtānāṃ ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇam anena kartavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29563: vītarāgeṇa punaḥ śaikṣeṇāvyākṛtānām eva prahāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29565: dve vā trīṇi vā śrāmaṇyāni phalāni prāptavyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:29568: srotaāpannena trīṇi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:29569: vītarāgeṇa punar ekam evārhattvaphalaṃ prāptavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29571: vītarāgeṇa tu rūpāvītarāgeṇāṃtarāparinirvāyinā bhavatā dvidhātusamatikramaḥ [Tib.227b] kartavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29574: anāsravābhyāṃ sāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ miśrīkriyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29583: aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇam iti vistareṇa dvau hi kṣaṇāv ānaṃtaryamārgasadṛśāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29588: tīkṣṇendriyās tu śuddhāvāsopattyarthaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 566) dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham eva ca vyavakiraṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29591: kathaṃ punaḥ kleśabhīrutayā aparihāṇyarthaṃ vyavakiraṃtīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:29597: tasya pudgalasya tāvatī śaktir ity evam upariṣṭhād api vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29600: punar anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam ity aparāṇi trīṇīti ṣaḍ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29601: evam eva ca tṛtīyāyāṃ nava caturthyāṃ dvādaśa paṃcamyāṃ paṃcadaśeti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29603: tāsāṃ vyavakīrṇabhāvanānāṃ yathākramaṃ paṃca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29604: mṛdvyā bhāvanāyā avṛhāḥ phalam evaṃ yāvad adhimātratamāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29607: evaṃ yāvat prajñādhikāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29614: evaṃ tu bhavitavyam iti svamatam ācāryasya.
T07yabhkvyu:29620: savijñānakakāyaśāṃtipratilaṃbhena vā avijñānakakāyaśāṃtyavasthāyāṃ tatprāptir gamyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29621: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29625: aṣṭādaśa gṛhapate śaikṣā navāśaikṣā dakṣiṇīyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29658: adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñam iti tisraḥ śikṣā āryamārgalakṣaṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29666: ato na tadyogān nirodhasamāpattiyogāt śaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29670: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtre kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ śaikṣa ity evaṃ noktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29677: atrācāryo gaṇanopāyapradarśanārthaṃ [Tib.229b] prathamam aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyabhūmigotrādibhedaṃ vyutpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:29679: tadbhede hi gaṇite yathāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyādibhedād bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29680: evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti sukham atideśaṃ kariṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29685: tatra prathame dhyāne 'ṃtarāparinirvāyī yāvac caturtha iti catvāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29687: ta eva parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇādharmā sthitākaṃpyaḥ prativedhanābhavyaḥ akopyadharmā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:29691: bahirdeśakanayenāpi sthānāṃtaratve tatrāryo notpadyata ity agaṇanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29697: rūpadhātau prathame dhyāne sakalabandhana ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava.
T07yabhkvyu:29698: dvitīye 'pi nava sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29709: tathā ca sati sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29710: sthānāṃtarāṇāṃ gotrāṇāṃ vairāgyāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca bhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29711: dvānavatīni dvānavatyadhikāni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti teṣām aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29726: yena nyāyena sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava pudgalā vyavasthāpitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29727: taṃ nyāyaṃ darśayann āhayo hy adhare dhyāna iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29728: yo hy adhare dhyāne prathame yāvat tṛtīye navaprakāravītarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29729: sa uttare dhyāne dvitīye yāvac caturthe sakalabandhana ity uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29732: caturṣu dhyāneṣu navanava yathā syur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29734: prathame dhyāne daśa syuḥ sakalabandhano yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29735: dvitīye nava ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29736: evaṃ tṛtīye nava caturthe tv aṣṭau syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29738: navaprakāravītarāgasyārūpyasakalabandhanatvād ity uktaṃ evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29740: sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedāt [Tib.231a] pratyekaṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃtīty abhisamasya punaḥ paṃcābhedāṃś catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāṇy anāgāmināṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29741: ārūpyagais tu sahopapadyādicaturbhedabhinnair atitarāṃ bahavo bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29742: anayā tu vartanyā gamyata eveti na likhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29745: ābhavāgrād āṣṭau prakārān kṣiṇotīty ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣid ābhavāgrāṣṭaprakārakṣayakṛd ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29750: evam ayaṃ samādhiḥ sarvam anuśayaṃ bhinattīti sāmarthyāt vajra upamā asyeti vajropamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29752: traidhātukān (Abhidh-k-vy 569) darśanaprahātavyān bhāvanāprahatavyāṃś ca kāmāvacarān yāvad bhāvāgrikān aṣṭau prakārān.
T07yabhkvyu:29753: yadi sarvān na bhinatti kasmāt sarvānuśayabhedīty ucyata ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:29757: nava bhūmīḥ anāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ [Tib.231b] catvāri dhyānāni trīṃś cārūpyān bhavāgravarjyān niśrityārhattvaprāptir ity ata evaṃ pratanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29759: bhāvāgrikaduḥkhālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiś caturbhiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānvayajñānākaraiḥ caturbhir aparaiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity aṣṭau.
T07yabhkvyu:29760: evam eva nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭāv iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29761: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
T07yabhkvyu:29763: iti siddhāṃtāt tayor evehopanyāso na duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29767: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity atra pratibhūmimārgālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ catvāra iti nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29770: aviśiṣṭo hy anvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ pratipakṣabhāvenānyonyahetukaś ca mārga iti samastam evālaṃbyate.
T07yabhkvyu:29771: [Tib.232a] na nirodhavad ity ataś catvāra eva mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29774: atha vā jñānānām ākārāṇām ālaṃbanānāṃ ca tribhedena bhinnāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29781: prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāro yāvan mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti navacatuṣkāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśat.
T07yabhkvyu:29782: ṣoḍaśa ca ṣaṭtriṃśac ca dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29801: bhavāgra āryamārgo nāstīti tatsaṃgṛhītā na saṃtīti na ciṃtyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:29805: tasmān nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29807: nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś caturdhyānanirodhālaṃbanāḥ ṣoḍaśa punar na bhavaṃtīty aṣṭāviṃśatir bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29815: ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā vijñānānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanān apy aparān apanīya viṃśatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29816: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikanirodham evālaṃbaṃta ārūpyā nādhobhūmikaṃ dhyānavat.
T07yabhkvyu:29817: na hy adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkham anālaṃbya tannirodhaḥ śakyam ālaṃbituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29826: atha kasmān nirodham evālaṃbaṃte na punar duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:29828: tasya hi bhāvāgrika eva navamaḥ prakāro vajropamavadhyo 'vaśiṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29837: yeṣām ābhidhārmikānāṃ mārgānvayajñānam api na kevalanirodhānvayajñānam ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam iṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29838: teṣām aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29843: evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity evam aṣṭāviṃśatir adhikā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29844: evam aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya dvāpaṃcāśad aśītir bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29845: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro na gaṇyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:29853: yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānam apy ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam [Tib.234a] iṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29858: evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29859: evaṃ mārgānvayajñānākārair api saṃprayuktās tathaiva dvātriṃśad iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:29860: aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipyānāmyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29861: teṣāṃ hi ye hi kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālaṃbanān mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāras te na saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29862: bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanās tu tatsthāne bhavaṃtīty ato aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29864: aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29868: bhavāgravarjyeṣu triṣv ārūpyeṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśac caturviṃśatiś ca bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29870: [Tib.234b] ākāśānaṃtyāyatane tāvad aṣṭāviṃśatyāṃ vajropameṣv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanān (Abhidh-k-vy 572) mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś catura iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29872: evaṃ caturviṃśatyāṃ vijñānāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipyākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29873: evaṃ viṃśatyām ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya caturviṃśatir bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29880: aviśeṣya navabhūmikam anvayajñānapakṣaṃ mārgam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29894: evaṃ yāvad bhāvāgrikanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:29896: evaṃ yāvad bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:29897: ta ete dviṣoḍaśa pūrvoktāś cāṣṭāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29903: bhavāgrasyāpi hi te 'dhobhūmikaṃ pratipakṣamārgam ācakṣata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29913: evaṃ bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29915: yathā caiṣām aṣṭānāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt pratyekaṃ ṣoḍhā tridhā ca bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29916: evaṃ sarveṣām anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītānāṃ gotrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29920: yāvad viṃśatir ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā ity abhisamasya caturaśītir uttarāṇi trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29921: tāni ṣaḍguṇīkṛtya triguṇīkṛtya ca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi navaśatāni dvādaśottarāṇi bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:29926: daśasahasrāṇi aṣṭaṣaṣṭyuttarāṇi ca trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ [Tib.236a] bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:29930: yasmāt sarvāsravakṣayaprāptyā saha jātaṃ tatprathamato jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29942: sarāgāḥ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ pūjām arhatīty arhan.
T07yabhkvyu:29945: anye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29946: trayaḥ phalasthāś catvāraś ca pratipannakā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:29947: asāv evāśaikṣa ity avadhāraṇād etadanye āryāḥ śaikṣā iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:29949: kena kāraṇena te sapta pudgalāḥ śaikṣā ity ucyaṃta ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:29960: śīle śīkṣā adhiśīlam evaṃ yāvat prajñāyāṃ śikṣety adhiprajñam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:29962: śikṣākriyāṇāṃ tv avyatirekāc chīlādisvabhāvāḥ śikṣā iti vyācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:29970: tad dhi bhikṣavo (Abhidh-k-vy 574) dṛṣṭaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:29971: tathā hi sūtre adhiśīlam adhicittaṃ vā śikṣāṃ vistareṇoktvāha.
T07yabhkvyu:29973: idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:29980: prātimokṣasaṃvaraparityāgataḥ uṣmagatādiparihāṇitaś cāryaḥ punar yady api kiṃcit parityajati.
T07yabhkvyu:29982: [Tib.237a] na hy āryasya kadācid api śikṣātrayaṃ nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30021: tathā ca sati dravyataḥ sapta bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:30022: srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakās trayaś catvāraś ca phalasthā ity arhattvaphalapratipannaka eko 'nāgāmiphalasthān na vyatirikta ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30026: tatkleśānuśayitatvād iti yasmāt tadbhūmikaḥ kleśas tatra laukike (Abhidh-k-vy 575) mārge ālaṃbanato 'nuśayitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30027: yo hi kleśa iti vistareṇa sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāṃtaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:30040: laukikena mārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ gacchataḥ pratiprakāraṃ viśaṃyogaprāptayaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś cotpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:30042: yasmāc chaikṣaḥ ṣaḍ bhūmīr niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:30044: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣas tu ṣaḍ
T07yabhkvyu:30047: sa kṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgād ārūpyamārgāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pūrvalabdhānāṃ tyāgāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30049: sa viśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalm āproti vardhayann
T07yabhkvyu:30053: tyakte ca tasminn ūrdhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyoge [Tib.238b] taiḥ kleśair ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30065: asatyām api tasya pudgalasya laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau.
T07yabhkvyu:30066: na taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt tadyathā bhavāgrārdhaprakāravimuktasyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30069: lokottarā ca tadvisaṃyogaprāptir dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyasaṃcāreṇa tyaktā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30070: na ca punas tair bhāvāgrikakleśaprakāraiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatīty abhyupagamyate bhavadbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30072: yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvaṃ jātasya dvitīyadhyānādyupapannasya.
T07yabhkvyu:30079: tasmān na punas taiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ [Tib.239a] kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatīty abhyupagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30082: yasmād āryasya laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ vā vairagyaṃ gacchataḥ kleśavisaṃyogaprāptir laukikī lokottarā ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30084: tasyāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvajātasya bhūmisaṃcāreṇa tyāgo bhavati na lokottarāyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30087: tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ lokottarāyāṃ prathamadhyānād ūrdhvaṃ jātasyāpy āryasya na punas taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30100: maulasāmaṃtakayor upekṣendriyasāmānye sati kim arthaṃ maulād evāṃtyaṃ vimuktimārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:30108: yady adharāṃ bhūmim audārikataḥ paśyaṃty ūrdhvaṃ tadviparyayeṇa śāṃtata ity eke.
T07yabhkvyu:30117: idaṃ mahābhisaṃskāraṃ yatnasādhyaṃ mārgeṇa sahādharaṃ sthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30118: idam api mahābhisaṃskāraṃ saha mārgeṇordhvaṃ sthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:30129: idam api bahudauṣṭhulyaṃ samārgam adharaṃ sthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30130: idam api bahudauṣṭhulyaṃ samārgam ūrdhvaṃ sthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:30136: tayaiva bhūmyā tasyā eva bhūmer aniḥsaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30138: yathā tayaiva bhittyā tasyā eva bhitter aniḥsaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30141: alpābhisaṃskāratvāt alpadauṣṭhulyataratvenāpratikūlabhāvāt tayā bhūmyā tadbhūminiḥsaraṇād yathākramaṃ śāṃtapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30162: tasya śrāmaṇyasyānaṃtaryamārgalakṣaṇasya yathāyogaṃ vimuktimārgā asaṃskṛtāni ca [Tib.240b] niṣyandaphalatvāt puruṣakāraphalatvāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:30165: yadbalāj jāyate yat tat phalaṃ puruṣakārajaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30166: yadbalāt prāpyate ca yat tac ca puruṣakāraphalam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:30168: yathā pṛthagjanasya pāṇineḥ pravacane upasaṃkhyānaṃ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30169: evaṃ sarvajñasyāpi buddhasyopasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyam upajāyata iti vākyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30174: sarvasya darśanaheyaprahāṇasyaikā bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītā prāptiḥ srotaāpattiphalaprāptikāle labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30175: tathā sakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptikāle darśanaheyaprahāṇasya ṣaḍvidhabhāvanāmārgaheyaprahāṇasya ca sarvasyaikā sakṛdāgāmiphalasaṃgṛhītā prāptir labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30178: satyabhedāc caturvidhānāṃ dharmajñānānām anvayajñānānāṃ ca tathaiva caturvidhānām (Abhidh-k-vy 578) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30182: tad dhi laukikenāpi mārgeṇa prāptaṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30186: tasya dviprakārasyāpi prahāṇasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasaṃgṛhītānāgāmiphalasaṃgṛhītā vā ekā prāptir labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30187: tasmād darśanamārgaphalaprahāṇayogād asaṃskṛtaṃ sakṛdāgaṃiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30198: iti tatranāsravayā visaṃyogaprāptyā tat prahāṇaṃ yal laukikamārgasaṃprāptaṃ saṃdhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:30201: tadabhāve hi laukikasyeva parihīṇasya maraṇaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30203: saiva ca vartamānalaukikamārgopajanitānāsravā prātir anāgataś cāṣṭāṃga āryamārgo laukikabalena prāpyamāṇaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ vyavasthāpyamānaṃ na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30208: vāhitā anenānekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā iti brāhmaṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30216: eṣa hi bhagavān brāhmety etad udāharaṇaṃ jīvakenoktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:30226: yathā tad anyaṃ deśaṃ tyajaty anyaṃ deśaṃ krāmati.
T07yabhkvyu:30227: [Tib.242a] evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgaṃ tyajati vimuktimārgaṃ krāmati saṃmukhībhāvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30232: evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgeṇājitān satkāyadṛṣṭyādīn kleśāṃ jayati tatprāticchedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30236: yathā ca tat kvacid utpatati kvacin nipatati.
T07yabhkvyu:30242: iha śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhaḥ samādhilābhāt prajñā yathābhūtaṃ bhāvyata ity ataḥ samyagvākkarmāṃtājivā nābhisthānīyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30243: samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt śīlam ādhārabhūtam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:30248: kiṃ svamatam etad vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ darśanamārgo dharmacakram ity āhodvid āgamata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30250: darśanamārgotpattau pravartitaṃ dharmacakram iti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30252: bhagavān bārāṇāsyāṃ viharati sma ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve.
T07yabhkvyu:30253: tatra bhagavān paṃcakāṃ bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:30254: idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30258: pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30259: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30260: tat khalu duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyam abhijñayā prahātavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30261: tat khalu duḥkhanirodha āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkartavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30262: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30263: [Tib.243a] tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30264: tat khalu duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyam abhijñayā prahīṇaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30265: tat khalu (Abhidh-k-vy 580) duḥkhanirodha āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30266: tat khalu punar duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvitaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:30267: yāvac ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ na cakṣur udapādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30268: na jñānaṃ na vidyā na buddhir udapādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30269: na tāvad aham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyā mukto niḥsṛto visaṃyukto viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyahārṣaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30270: na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'smīty adhyajñāsiṣaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30271: yataś ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ cakṣur udapādi yāvad buddhir udapādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30272: tato 'ham asmāt sadevakād yāvat viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā [Tib.243b] bahulaṃ vyahārṣaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30274: asmin khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam aśīteś ca devatāsahasrāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30275: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ kauṇḍinyam āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:30280: ājñāta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena dharma iti bhaumā yakṣāḥ śabdam udīrayaṃti ghoṣam anuśrāvayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:30281: etan mārṣā bhagavatā bārāṇasyām ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve triparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30282: apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:30283: kenacit punar loke sahadharmeṇa bahujanahitāyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30284: tad evam āryasya kauṇḍinyasya darśanamārga utpanne devatābhir uktaṃ bhagavatā pravartitaṃ dharmacakram iti sūtravacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30287: idaṃ duḥkham ārgasatyam ity ekaḥ parivartaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30291: ekaikasmin parivarte idaṃ duḥkham ity asmiṃś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ [Tib.244a] vidyā buddhir udapādīti catvāra ākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30293: parijñātam ity asmin punar api catvāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30300: punar bāhyakānāṃ satyeṣu darśanaṃ kudṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām apratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ ceti tato viśeṣaṇārthaṃ cakṣurādigrahaṇaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 581) punas triṣu parivarteṣu prathamaṃ darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30306: punar ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣv ānumānikajñānapratiṣedhārthaṃ cakṣur ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:30313: tat khalu prahīṇam ity ete trayaḥ parivartāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30314: ekaikasmiṃ parivarte cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir ity ete dvādaśākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30318: trayaḥ parivartā dvādaśa cākārāḥ [Tib.244b] dvādaśa parivartāḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśac cākārāḥ prāpnuvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:30321: trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt tu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30325: tadyathā vistaram uktvā tena hi bhikṣo dvayaṃ te deśayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye.
T07yabhkvyu:30330: yathā ca saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:30336: saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ trividhārthopaparīkṣī kṣipram evāsmin dharmavinaye duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30338: evam ihāpi trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30340: ebhiś ca parivartair yathāsūtranirdiṣṭair darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā [Tib.245a] yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30341: idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam ity ārabhya yāvad iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti darśanamārgo darśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30342: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātavyam ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyam iti bhāvanāmārgo darśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30343: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātam ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvitam ity aśaikṣamārgo darśita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30346: yady evam ebhiḥ parivartair darśanādimārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30347: na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivarto dvādaśākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30351: triparivartābhāve (Abhidh-k-vy 582) cakrasādharmyābhāvān na cakraṃ yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30358: duḥkhaṃ yāvan mārga ity ekaṃ parivartanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30362: duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti satyasvarūpaṃ praty eka ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30363: parijñātavyaṃ prahātavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ iti kartavyarūpāṃ parijñānakriyāṃ prati dvitīya ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30364: parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitam iti pariniṣṭhitāṃ parijñānādikriyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:30372: atha vā sarva evāryamārgo darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgo dharmacakraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30376: katham āryājñātakauṇḍinyasya darśanamārgamātrotpāde tat pravartitam ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30379: darśanamārgotpādanād vartayitum ārabdham ādau vartitam ity etat pravartitam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30384: ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe kasmād anāgāmiphalaprāptir na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30391: śrāvakābhisamayaś ca parato ghoṣam aṃtareṇa na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30395: traidhātukālaṃbanena ca darśanamārgeṇa bhavitavyam ity ataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30400: anurakṣaṇādharmā yas tāṃ vimuktim anurakṣituṃ śaknoti.
T07yabhkvyu:30411: śraddhādhimuktā bhūtvā ete jātā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30413: ṣaṣṭhas [Tib.246b] tv anyathāpi bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ sāmayikīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30419: kāṃtaṃ hi nityam anurakṣyam iti loke dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30421: tadyathā nāmaikākṣasya puruṣasya jñātaya ekam akṣi sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:30422: māsya śītaṃ māsyoṣṇaṃ māsya rajo'ṃśavaś cakṣuṣi nipateyur māsya yad apy ekaṃ cakṣur avinaṣṭaṃ tad api vinaśyed iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30424: tata evaṃ samayavimukto 'rhan sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30425: kaccid aham etasmād dharmān na parihīyeyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:30428: yathā ghṛtasya pūrṇo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭa iti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30430: yathā vā ghṛtāpekṣo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭo yatra ghṛtaṃ prakṣepsyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30432: evam ihāpi madhyagatasyāpekṣaśabdasya lopāt samayāapekṣāś caite vimuktāś ceti samayavimuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30447: atha svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe dṛṣṭiprāpta eva.
T07yabhkvyu:30448: tasmād asāv akopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvaka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30456: tat kim idaṃ parihāṇadharmagotraṃ nāma yāvad akopyadharmagotram [Tib.247b] iti na taiḥ parihāṇadharmādigotram apadiṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30457: tatra kecid evaṃ varṇayaṃti kuśalamūlāni gotram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30460: anye (Abhidh-k-vy 584) punar āhuḥ pṛthagjanāvasthām ārabhyendriyabhedo gotram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30461: sautrāṃtikāḥ punar varṇayaṃti bījaṃ sāmarthyaṃ cetaso gotram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30462: pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ ca parihāṇadharmabīje sati hetau parihāṇadharmagotraka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30468: na ca cetanādidharmety etan na brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30469: sarva evaite cetanādharmādayaś catvāraḥ parihātuṃ bhavyā ity eṣām evānyataraḥ parihāṇadharmā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30471: atas tebhyo 'nya evāyaṃ paṃcama iti viśeṣayan na ca cetanādidharmety āha.
T07yabhkvyu:30472: cetanādharmādīnāṃ punaś caturṇāṃ parihāṇadharmakatve 'sati [Tib.248a] ekaikasya viśeṣalakṣaṇāpadeśād eva punar idaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30473: cetanādharmā cetayituṃ bhavyo na cānurakṣaṇādharmā yāvat prativedhanābhavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30475: yadi parihāṇipratyayo balavān syāt parihīyeta sa ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30479: paṃca hetavaḥ paṃcapratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:30487: sa hy anurakṣann eva na parihīyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:30489: ananurakṣayann api tatphalaṃ sthātuṃ bhavyas tatphale.
T07yabhkvyu:30494: yady abhiyogaṃ kuryād bhavyaḥ syād iti prativedhanābhavyāc cāyam evaṃ viśeṣito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30495: [Tib.248b] sa hi vinā apy abhiyogena prativeddhuṃ bhavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30499: viśeṣeṇa tu satkṛtyaprayogeṇa vikala ity anayor viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30502: indriyakṛto hy anayor viśeṣo na prayogakṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30505: tasmād rūpārūpyadhātvor api ṣaḍ arhaṃto na kevalaṃ kāmadhātāv eva ṣaḍ ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30508: sthitākaṃpyas (Abhidh-k-vy 585) tāvad baddhābhiruciḥ syān na prativedhanābhavyatākriyādaravān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30512: na cendriyāṇi saṃcaraṃtīti sthitākaṃpyagotraka eva saṃ tatra bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30521: [Tib.249a] ata eva cendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt prativedhanābhavyo 'pi na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30525: tatra ca nātmasaṃcetanā na parasaṃcetanāstīti cetanādharmāpi na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30528: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30536: sa tasmān na parihīyata ity arhan.
T07yabhkvyu:30542: tābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na tasmāt so 'rhan parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30544: śikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt prathamāt gotrān na parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30545: yat tad ātmīyaṃ prathamaṃ gotraṃ tal laukikena mārgeṇa pūrvaṃ bhāvitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30546: śaikṣeṇa ca mārgeṇa punar bhāvitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30551: sa tasmān na parihīyate śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30553: yasmād yo 'pi cetanādharmā uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30554: tad gotraṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30556: tasmāt gotram eva tat tādṛśaṃ yasmād ādyān na parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30558: yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na parihīyata ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30560: na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30563: atra vayam ācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ darśayāmo yenaivam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30565: yat tāvad uktaṃ cetanādharmā uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30567: yad dhi cetanādharmagotraṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitaṃ punaś cāśaikṣāvasthāyām api bhāvitam iti dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30568: naiva sa tasmād arhattvāt parihīyamāṇaḥ parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30570: uktaṃ cācāryasaṃghabhadreṇa yaḥ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ gotrāṃtaram adhigamyārhattvaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:30572: na cottāpanāgata eva gotre nāvatiṣṭhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30573: yat tu cetanādharmagotram aśaikṣāvasthāyām idānīm evādhigataṃ na śaikṣāvasthāyām adhigataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30577: yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na parihīyeta ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30579: na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ laukikena lokottareṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30585: na hi kiṃcid apy asti phalaṃ yad yugapad ubhābhyāṃ laukikalokottarābhyāṃ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30586: gotraṃ tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30587: aihajanmikenoṣmagatādinā pārajanmikena vā prahāṇamārgeṇānyena vā laukikena mārgeṇa lokottareṇa śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30589: yad āgaṃtukaṃ gotraṃ paścād eva na dvayor avasthayor adhigataṃ tasmāt [Tib.250b] parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30591: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30592: ata eva ca srotaāpattiphalān nāsti parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30593: yasmāt srotaāpattiphalaṃ yadi prāpyate 'vaśyaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30594: sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphale tu kadācit tu prathame bhavato yadi bhūyovītarāgakāmavītarāgayoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30596: tatra yadyat phalaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:30598: yat tu paścāt sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ arhattvaphalaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:30601: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ phalaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:30602: sa tasmān na parihīyata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:30603: yathākramaṃ paṃca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30605: tadavasthasya parinirvāṇam indriyasaṃcāraḥ parihāya vā śaikṣatvaṃ cetanādharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ parihāṇadharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:30607: (Abhidh-k-vy 587) ta eva ca paṃca anurakṣaṇādharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30609: eta eva ca ṣaṭ sthitākaṃpyagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca saptamam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30610: yasya ca yat [Tib.251a] prathamaṃ gotraṃ śaikṣāvasthāyām āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:30614: anyathā hi gotraviśeṣalābhāc chaikṣāvasthād gotrād viśiṣṭaṃ tad gotraṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30615: ato viśiṣṭagotralābhāt vṛddhir evāsya pudgalasya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30618: yathā tāvat parihāṇadharmā arhattvāvasthāyām indriyottāpanayā prativedhābhavyatāprāptaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30620: śaikṣībhūtas tadgotrād api parihīyamāṇo na sthitākaṃpyagotre tiṣṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:30626: tasmād avaśyam arhattvāt parihīyamāṇa indriyottāpanād api gotrāt parihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30627: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamāt phalān nāsti parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30628: yasya yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:30635: uktaṃ ca yāni vā punaḥ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni.
T07yabhkvyu:30637: sa cātmā nāstīty avastukatvān nāsti parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30645: ye kecid bhikṣava ātmeti ātmīya iti samanupaśyaṃtaḥ samanupaśyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:30646: imān eva te paṃcopādānaskandhān ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30654: kim asāv asti nāstītyevamādyākārapravṛttās tadanyaddarśanaheyā avastukā ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:30661: mānasyāpi manaāpaṃ avidyāyā api tad eva dvayaṃ saṃmohanīyaṃ kiṃcid iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30663: na tu darśanaheyānām ātmātmīyalakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ vastu kiṃcid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:30666: tasmān na pratiniyatavastukā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30668: āryasya śaikṣasyānupanidhyāyato 'saṃtīrayataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kliṣṭasmṛtiyogāt kleśa utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30671: rajjvām iva sarpasaṃjñā kasyacid anupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāj jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30681: ato 'nupanidhyānād āryasyātmadṛṣṭyādīnām utpattir na yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30684: na kevalaṃ darśanaheyaprahāṇān nāsti parihāṇir arhattvād api nāsti parihāṇir ity apiśabdena darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:30687: eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ samarthayati.
T07yabhkvyu:30694: śaikṣasya cāpramāda iti vistareṇa dvitīyaṃ sūtrapadaṃ jñāpakam arhattvān nāsti parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30695: ayaṃ cāsyārthaḥ śaikṣasyāpramādanimittam apramādakarma pravedayāmy apramādaḥ śaikṣeṇa kartavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30696: nanu ca śaikṣasyāpy āryayā prajñayā prahāṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:30700: atra vaibhāṣiko brūyād arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti sūtre vacanād asty arhato 'pi parihāṇir ity ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30701: arhato 'pi vistareṇa yāvad atra sūtre dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramātrād eva parihāṇir ukteti.
T07yabhkvyu:30703: yatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma.
T07yabhkvyu:30704: arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30707: arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30712: api tu ye 'nena catvāra (Abhidh-k-vy 589) ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30715: yā tv anenaikākināvyapakṛṣṭenāpramattenātāpinā prahitātmanā viharatā akopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā.
T07yabhkvyu:30716: tato 'syāhaṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:30718: yal lābbasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāṇo na cātyantair lābhasatkārakaiś cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati.
T07yabhkvyu:30721: akopyā iti viśeṣaṇāt sāmayikyā asti parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30726: sā tu vicāryā sā tu sāmayikī vimuktir vicāryā.
T07yabhkvyu:30729: [Tib.253b] āhosvid dhyānāny eva laukikāni sāmayikī vimuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30736: samaye bhavā samāyikī vimuktir ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30738: parihāṇau parihāṇau kamanīyatvāt prārthanīyatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30744: na yujyate sāmayikīty anena sāmayikyā vimukter viparyayeṇārhattvavimuktiṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:30745: apunaḥprārthanīyatvān na kāṃtety anena kāṃtaviparyaye 'rhattvavimuktir na kāṃteti.
T07yabhkvyu:30754: kim arthaṃ tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:30755: na tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30788: yo na kupyati utpannebhyo na parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30791: aparihāṇadharmādīnāṃ trayāṇām aparihāṇiyogād viśeṣam apaśyan praśnayati.
T07yabhkvyu:30799: nanu cāyuṣmān gautiko 'rhattvāt parihīṇa ity evaṃ yadi vaibhāṣiko brūyād ity asya pratividhānam ārabhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30818: pṛthagvacanād dhy akopyavimuktilakṣaṇād arhattvād arhattvasvabhāvā na kāṃtā cetovimuktir uktety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30819: dviprakāratvād arhattvasya pṛthagvacanam iti vaibhāṣikavacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:30821: yady arhattvam eva sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir abhaviṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:30822: kim arthaṃ tatraiva daśake na sūtrāṃtare arhattvasya dvigrahaṇam akariṣyat.
T07yabhkvyu:30832: na ca kvacid arhattvam utpādayitavyam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30838: kim anena jñāpanena jñāpitaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30839: yadi tāvad utpādayituṃ śakyam ity etaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30841: anyad api śakyaṃ yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30842: tathā ca saty evaṃ sūtre vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30847: anyat sutarām arhati yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30848: tad dhy akopyatvāt suṣṭhūtpādayitum arhatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30851: evaṃ tadyogāt samaya vimukto 'rhann iti yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30853: yasmād asya samādhiḥ sāsravo 'nāsravo 'pi vā samayam ārogyadeśaviśeṣādilakṣaṇam apekṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:30867: sā tadekadeśavikalā satī tasyotpattaye na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:30869: sa tadanyetaravikalā satī tadutpattaye na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30873: atha notpanna iti pratipakṣaḥ tadbījadharmatāyām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30875: tasyām anapoddhṛtāyām anunmūlitāyāṃ kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:30880: smṛtimataś carata ity arthaḥ anaṃtaraṃ smṛtivacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30881: śaikṣas sa ity asya vacanasya parihārārthaṃ sa eva parihāṇivādy āha.
T07yabhkvyu:30882: sa hi tatrārhann eva jñāpita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30886: śaikṣasyedaṃ vivekanimnacittam ucyate yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30888: arhato hy etad balam anyatroktam iti sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:30891: [Tib.256b] aṣṭau śāriputrārhato bhikṣor dīrgharātraṃ vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30893: yathāsya kāmān jānataḥ kāmān paśyato yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ vistareṇa yāvat kāmādhyavasānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30894: tatrāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30895: kiṃ ca śītībhūtaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 592) vāṃtībhūtam iti cābhidhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30898: aṃgārakarṣūpame yad uktam arhann eva jñāpita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30899: yāvat tu cāro na supratividdha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30903: kadācit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyaṃte pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30908: yac cāpy uktaṃ sāsravasthānīyair dharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāṃtībhūtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30911: [Tib.257a] arhattvāvasthāṃ cādhikṛtya tathābhidhānād adoṣa iti ācāryasyābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30916: [kim anityādyākārapatitena mārgeṇendriyāṇi saṃcarati.] kim audārikādyākāreṇa mārgeṇendriyāṇi saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:30919: tathā hy enam artham ācāryaḥ sūcayiṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:30920: na hi sāsraveṇa mārgeṇāryāṇām indriyasaṃcāra ity āryāṇām iti viśeṣaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30921: api nāma mamendriyāṇi tīkṣṇāni syur iti prayogam abhisaṃdhāya.
T07yabhkvyu:30927: tīkṣnendriyatvād asya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir na saṃbhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:30928: kim utākopyāyā vimukter ity asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:30935: yasmād akopyadharmāpi kaścin mahāśrāvakāṇām āryaśāriputramaudgalyāyanādīnāṃ prāṃtakoṭikādīn dharmān.
T07yabhkvyu:30936: svayaṃbhuvāṃ ca kāṃścid dharmān na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:30937: mahāśrāvakā api svayaṃbhuvāṃ kāṃścid viśeṣadharmān na prāpnuvaṃtītyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:30938: anyasyārhata iti parihāṇadharmāder mṛdvindriyasya prāptaparihāṇir apy asti.
T07yabhkvyu:30939: apiśabdāt pūrvokta api (Abhidh-k-vy 593) parihāṇī sta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30945: ṣaṇṇām apy arhatām akopyā vimuktir ity ukte vaibhāṣiko brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30947: kasmād asamayavimukta evākopyadharmā vyavasthāpito nānya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30952: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyas tu kaścil lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabhraṃśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30957: yata eva ca dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyo lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30963: pūrvam akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir nāstīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:30970: ata evocyate akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30972: yad uktaṃ sūtram āśritya katham akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇi iti.
T07yabhkvyu:30975: yady arhattvāt parihīṇaḥ punar jāyeta sucīrṇabrahmacarye 'smin mārge cāpi subhāvite tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣayād bhavati rogasyāpagame yathety āśvāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:30978: yathā śūrasya praskhalane apatanaṃ bhavati śaktita ātmadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:30979: tadvad āryaḥ phalāt parihīṇo 'pi tatphalam alabdhvā na mriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30983: śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti prayogamārgas tu sarvatraika eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:30987: anyathā hi kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ indriyāṇi saṃcaratīty etad virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:30990: anyatra ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu rūpārūpyadhātvoś ca parihāṇir nāstīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:30996: atha kasmāt kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu parihāṇir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:30997: ye pūrvam abhyudārebhyo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ saṃvijaṃto niyataṃ satyāni paśyaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:30999: avaśyaṃ hi te tīkṣṇendriyā bhavantīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31008: paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmīti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31020: parihāṇidharmā mṛdumṛdvindriyo yāvad bhagavān adhimātrādhimātrendriya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31024: pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ parapratyayena parataḥ śrutvā smṛtyupasthānādīn dharmān.
T07yabhkvyu:31027: tathā pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ prajñayā dvādaśāṃgapravacanadharmānusāreṇa svayam evaṃ bodhipakṣādīn dharmān anusarann artheṣu prayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31036: kleśavimuktitaḥ prajñayā kleśād vimuktaḥ prajñāvimukta iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:31045: yady api śraddhānusāriṇaḥ sarva eva mṛdvindriyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31046: tathāpi tāratamyenāvasthānād eṣāṃ punas tridhābhedaḥ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31049: parihāṇadharmagotrako yāvat prativedhanābhavyagotraka iti paṃca bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:31050: punar eṣāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt paṃcadaśānām ekaiko mārgataḥ paṃcadaśa bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:31059: aṣṭau ca sapta ca paṃcadaśa bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:31061: evam eṣāṃ mārgataḥ paṃcadaśadhābhinnānāṃ punar ekaiko vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31084: evam anye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31117: tan na budhyāmahe kenābhiprāyeṇaivam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31120: vairāgyatas trisaptatir iti sa evārtho darśito bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:31130: yadi tu śraddhādhimukta ā vajropamāt samādher gṛhyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:31134: vairāgyata ekāśītiḥ trisaptattau bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāravītarāgān aṣṭāv adhikān prakṣipya.
T07yabhkvyu:31146: yadi tv ā vajropamāt samādher dṛṣṭiprāpto gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31150: kāyasākṣī śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptayor antarbhūta iti na gaṇyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31152: yadi śraddhādhimuktaḥ sa kāyasākṣī gotrataḥ paṃca.
T07yabhkvyu:31156: yady api bhavāgre sakalabandanaḥ ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31171: bhavāgraṃ ṣaḍviṃśatitama āśrayaḥ syād ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31182: vimokṣāḥ punar aṣṭau vakṣyante rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31189: (VI.67) kleśān prahāyeha hi yas tu paṃceti.
T07yabhkvyu:31198: avītarāgatvāt tu na phalato nāpi samāpattitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31199: anāgāmiphalasamāpattyor abhāvāt evam anyeṣām api saṃbhavato yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31201: samāpattita eva paripūrṇatvaṃ nendriyaphalābhyām iti nāsty etat.
T07yabhkvyu:31203: na hy asatyām anāgāmiphalaprāptau nirodhasamāpattir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:31205: samāpattīndriyata eva ca paripūrṇatvaṃ na phalata ity etad api nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:31224: asamayavimuktatvād indriyataḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktatvāt samāpattita iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31227: asti sa ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ na prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:31232: yasmāt tṛtīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tajjātīyo [Tib.263b] mārgo viśeṣamārga itīṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31236: kiṃ ca yadi prathamata iti na brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31237: vimuktimārgo yas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmukta ity etāvad brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31238: evaṃ sati duḥkhadharmajñānāt pareṇa sarve ānantaryamārgādayas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmuktā utpadyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31244: tena praheyāvaraṇena nirmukto yaḥ prathamata utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31249: ṣoḍaśān mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇāt pareṇa saptadaśādayas tajjātīyā ye 'nāsravāḥ kṣaṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31254: yaś ca dṛṣṭadharmasakhavihārāya vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāya vā mārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31255: so 'pi viśeṣamārga [Tib.264a] eva prayogamārgo yasmād ānantaryamārgotpattir ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31256: ato laukikā agradharmāḥ prayogamārga iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31261: viprakṛṣṭas tv asau prayogamārga ity ayaṃ tasyāgradharmebhyo viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31262: udāharaṇārthatvāc cācāryeṇa saṃnikṛṣṭa eva prayogamārga ukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31276: prayogānantaryamārgayor eva tatprāptau sāmarthyān na tayor iti abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31285: yasmād vimuktimārgeṇa viśeṣamārgeṇa ca uttarottaro (Abhidh-k-vy 599) mārgaḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31287: yasmād vā tābhyāṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇaṃ praviśati.
T07yabhkvyu:31293: yasmād anena nirvāṇaṃ pratipadyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31302: yasmād aṃgaparigṛhītāni dhyānāni śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ samāni ca.
T07yabhkvyu:31318: evaṃ kṣiprasya tīkṣṇasya pudgalasyābhijñā kṣiprābhijñeti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31322: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31327: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:31328: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:31329: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatājñānasākṣātkriyāyai chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:31341: evaṃ yāvad upekṣaiva saṃbodhyaṃgaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 600) upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31354: anena śaikṣapṛthagjanānāṃ prajñā na bodhir vyavasthāpyata iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31357: kṣayajñānena yathābhūtaṃ kṛtāvabodhāt tat kṣayajñānaṃ bodhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31358: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:31361: mārgo me bhāvita iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:31363: [mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavya] tad anutpādajñānam api bodhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31364: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:31366: samudayo me prahīṇo na punaḥ prahātavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31367: nirodho me sākṣātkṛto na punaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31368: mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:31369: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity anena kṣayajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31371: ity ubhayam api tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya darśayatīti sarvaṃ neyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31372: tad evaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ca bodhir ity avayavārthaṃ prasādhya samudayārthaṃ prasādhayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:31384: vakṣyati hi vaibhāṣikāṇām ekādaśa kāyavākkarmaṇor asaṃbhinnatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31393: yasmād uktam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31398: yasmād uktaṃ chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 601) bhāvayatīti sarvaṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ punar atrāṣṭau sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:31411: teṣāṃ prajñaiva sā yāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni.
T07yabhkvyu:31415: vīryam eva tad yāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:31418: samādhir eva ca sa ye catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31429: śīlāṃgāni trīṇy avijñaptisvabhāvānīti kṛtvaikaṃ dravyaṃ vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31431: kāyavākkarmaṇor asaṃbhinnatvāt dve dravyaṃ iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:31433: yadi tu mukhyavṛttyā tasmin kalāpe yāvaṃti dravyāṇi saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:31435: naiva tāni daśa dravyāṇi samāhitavijñaptirūpāṇāṃ saptadravyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31439: sarve tu prāyogikaguṇāḥ sāsravānāsravāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā yathāyogaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31451: uktaṃ hi chandaṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31453: (Abhidh-k-vy 602) cittaṃ vīryaṃ mīmāṃsāṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31455: tena hi samyak kāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31456: pradhīyaṃte dhāryaṃte niyamyante pravartyante vā kadācid aneneti pradhānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31458: yasmāt sarvaguṇasaṃpattilakṣaṇā ṛddhis tasmin samādhau pratiṣṭhitā.
T07yabhkvyu:31460: ye tv āhuḥ samādhir eva ṛddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31463: teṣām evaṃvādināṃ vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ trayodaśa bodhipakṣāḥ prāpnuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:31471: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānaḥ kāyena gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:31479: imau vā punaḥ bhūyo candramasāv evaṃ mahardhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
T07yabhkvyu:31480: yāvad brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31489: tasmān na samādhir eva rudhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31495: kaścid dhi samādhiḥ kuśalamūlaprayogāvasthāyāṃ pradhānī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:31504: katham eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātrabheda iti hetum āha.
T07yabhkvyu:31506: tadvipakṣabhūtair āśraddhyakausīdyamuṣitasmṛtitāvikṣepāsaṃprajanyair antarāsamudācārād indriyāṇy avamṛdyante na tv cvaṃ balānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:31544: atha vā laukikair anyair dharmair anavamardanīyatvād agradharmāvasthāyāṃ śraddhādīni balānīti prabhāvyante.
T07yabhkvyu:31553: pāṭaliputram ayaṃ panthā gacchatīti loke vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31558: bhāvanāmārgeṇa tu bhūmibhedena prākarṣakatvāt bahunā kālena gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:31562: tathā tam abhittvā bodhipakṣāṇām ānupūrvīṃ varṇayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:31577: caturvidhaṃ kāryam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:31582: tataḥ samyakpradhānebhyo 'nataraṃ samādher viśodhanād ṛddhipādāḥ [Tib.270a] prabhāvyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:31597: bhāvanayā paripūrir bhāvanāparipūriḥ tāṃ gacchaty āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31598: tasmin gacchati catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ yacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:31600: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchaṃtīti vacanāt bhāvanāmārge 'pi āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgo bhavatīti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31601: na hi darśanamārge bhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:31603: punaś coktam ubhayor mārgāṃgāni vyavasthāpyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31604: caturṇām āryasatyānām etad adhivacanam iti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31605: yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇam iti vistareṇa yāvan mārgasyaitad [Tib.270b] adhivacanam iti bhāvanāmārgaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31606: yathāgatena yathāprāptena mārgeṇa prakramaṇaṃ yāvad bodhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31607: tad evaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca mārgāṃgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31608: ata ubhayor āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga eṣṭavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31610: pūrvaṃ bodhyaṃgāni paścād āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31632: na ca bhavāgraṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ cālāmbate.
T07yabhkvyu:31639: bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca kāya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31640: tatra yadi kevalabhūtālaṃbanā kevalabhautikālaṃbanā tadubhayālaṃbanā vā prajñā bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:31642: bhavāgre ca kuśalasāsravā prajñā mārgata iti nyāyata iti vānāsravasaṃvaramārgālaṃbanata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31646: (VI.77, 78) catvāro 'vetyaprasādāḥ buddhe 'vetyaprasādo dharme saṃghe cāryakāntāni ca śīlānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:31648: yathākramaṃ satyatrayam abhisamayan paśyan dharme cāvetyaprasādam āryakāntāni cāśīlāni anāsravāṇi pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:31649: na buddhe na saṃghe vā avetyaprasādaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31652: yathā] mārgasatyam abhisamayato buddhe tasya ca srāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:31655: bahavo dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā ity evamādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31657: yad uktaṃ dharme cāvetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31658: atha vā buddharatnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ cedam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31659: tasmād idam api dharmarātnam ihābhipretaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:31661: buddhasaṃghakarāṃ dharmān aśaikṣān ubhayāṃś ca saḥ
T07yabhkvyu:31662: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam
T07yabhkvyu:31664: tat kim ayaṃ nirvāṇadharmo 'bhipreta ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:31670: pratyekabuddhasya ca śaikṣāśaikṣalakṣaṇo mārgo dharma ihābhipreta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31672: mārgasatyam apy abhisamayan dharmam api bodhisattvapratyekabuddhamārgalakṣaṇam abhisamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:31673: tasmāc catvāry api satyāny abhisamayato dharme 'vetyaprasādalābha ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31675: yasmāt tadabhisamayato buddhe saṃghe cāvetyaprasādalābha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31676: kathaṃ punar mārgasatyābhisamayataḥ śraddhālakṣaṇānāṃ trayāṇāṃ buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādānāṃ yugapat saṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31677: saiva śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedāpekṣayā [Tib.272a] nāmatrayaṃ labhata ity adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31682: yady adhiṣṭhānāpekṣayāvetyaprasādavyavasthānaṃ dharmāvetyaprasādaḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:31686: vaidyabhūto bhagavān anuttaro viṣak śalyaharteti sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31698: ante trayāṇāṃ prasādānāṃ caturtha uktaḥ śīlaprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31700: evaṃ prasannasya samyaksaṃbuddho bata bhagavān iti vistareṇaiṣā pratipattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31719: aśaikṣyā samyagdṛṣṭyā yāvad aśaikṣeṇa samyaksamādhinā aśaikṣyā samyagvimuktyā aśaikṣeṇa ca samyagjñāneneti.
T07yabhkvyu:31721: tasyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 607) vimuktau pratyātmajñānaṃ tatpratyātmajñānaṃ vimuktiś ca tatpratyātmajñānaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:31732: tathā vimuktir api saṃskṛtaiva gṛhyate nāsaṃskṛtā.
T07yabhkvyu:31751: yāvad yaś chando vīryam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31757: [Tib.273b] tad evam atra vimuktipariśuddhipradhāna iti praśnatrayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31758: tatra iha bhikṣo rāgāc cittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31765: yaś chando vīryam iti vistareṇa pradhānam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31766: yata evaṃ rāgādibhyo vimuktiḥ prahāṇam ity evaṃlakṣaṇā vimuktir uktā sūtre nādhimuktiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31769: tattvajñānāpanīteṣu rāgādiṣu cetaso vaimalyam anāsravatvam anarthāntarabhūtaṃ ghṛtamaṇḍasvacchatāvad iti apara ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31774: yad anāgataṃ vajropamāt samādher anantaraṃ na bhavaty aśaikṣam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:31775: laukikaṃ vety aśaikṣasaṃtāna eva yal laukikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31783: tadutpattivibaṃdhād (Abhidh-k-vy 608) iti tad evātra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31784: yady aśaikṣasaṃtānalaukikam api vimucyata ity abhyupagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31790: na tv aśaikṣasya laukikam evaṃ bhavatīty asāmyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31796: (VI.82) yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktir uktā śāstre ihaiva vā
T07yabhkvyu:31825: nirvidyata eva duḥkhasamudayakṣāṃtibhir duḥkhasamudayajñānaiś ca nirvedavastvālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31826: duḥkhasamudayau hi nirvedasya vastunī ālaṃbanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31828: kleśān aprajahad iti vacanena prahāṇakriyāyā asaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:31835: ubhayapūrvaiḥ kleśān prajahad iti nirvidyate ca virājyate ca pūrvair duḥkhasamudayakṣāntijñānaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31845: kleśān aprajahad iti vacanena prahāṇakriyāyā abhāvāt na virajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31847: apadiṣṭaṃ prathamāyāṃ koṭyaṃ caturthyāṃ ca kleśāṃ aprajahad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:31853: dharmajñānakṣāṃtibhir dharmajñānair dharmajñānakṣāntibhiś ca kleśān na prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:31857: na hi laukikena mārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:31859: prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgair ānantaryamārgair ap iva kaiścid indriyasaṃcārādyāvasthāsu na kleśān prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:31861: tadanya ānantaryamārgās taiḥ kleśān prajahātīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31862: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyāṃ sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31866: (VII.1) ṣaṣṭhāt kośasthānād anantaraṃ saptamasyopanyāse saṃbaṃdhaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:31876: saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhir yathoditety
T07yabhkvyu:31878: ihaiva vā ṣaṣṭhakośasthānāvasāna etat sarvam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:31885: tatpratyāyanāya cāyam ārabhyata ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:31886: kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31889: amalā eva kṣāntayo na jñānam ity [Tib.276a] avadhāraṇāt sāsravāḥ kṣāntayo jñānam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:31899: na niścayarūpeṇeti na jñānam iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:31900: vicikitsānuśayasyāprahīṇatvād (Abhidh-k-vy 612) ity etāvati vaktavye tatpraheyasyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ kim arthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31901: dvitīye hi kṣaṇe prathamakṣāntipraheyo vicikitsānuśayaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti prathamaiva kṣāntir na jñānam iti gamyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:31912: asaṃtīraṇaṃ ca tad aparimārgaṇāśayaṃ ca asaṃtīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:31915: kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭir ity [Tib.276b] arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31917: tāvad duḥkhādīni satyāny upanidhyāyati parimārgayati cāśayato yathoktair anityādibhir ākāraiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31918: kṛtakṛtyasya punar yathā dṛṣṭiṣv eva duḥkhādiṣv āryasatyeṣu pratyavekṣaṇamātraṃ tābhyāṃ bhavatīti duḥkhaṃ mayā parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam
T07yabhkvyu:31930: paṃcavijñānakāyikā kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtā mānasī yā dṛṣṭisvabhāvakleśasaṃprayuktā anivṛtāvyākṛtā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:31931: yā punar dṛṣṭisvabhāvā yā ca mānasī kuśalā.
T07yabhkvyu:31942: tato 'nyā ca pūrvoktā jñānam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:31946: yasmād etāḥ ṣaṭ jñānāni cocyante dṛṣṭayaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:31951: (Abhidh-k-vy 613) samāsena tu dve eva sāsravam anāsravaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:31969: ete eva dharmānvayajñāne dve duḥkhādyālaṃbanabhedāc caturvidhe.
T07yabhkvyu:31978: tasmād yena ca pīḍyate yena ca baddhaṃ tata eva mokṣaṃ bahu manyamāno 'nantaraṃ kṣīṇaṃ bhavāgram ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:31979: tac ca duḥkhaṃ yā samudayā cityato duḥkhasamudayākārair bhavāgram ālaṃbate.] yasmād avaśyaṃ te prathamotpannakṣayānutpādajñāne [Tib.277b] duḥkhākārair anityādibhiḥ samudayākārair vā hetvādibhir bhāvāgrikān skaṃdhān ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:31980: aprathamotpanne tv anyasatyālaṃbane api te bhavata ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:31985: yathā kṣayānutpādajñāne ekālaṃbane kiṃ vajropamo 'pi tābhyām ekālaṃbana ity apiśabdasyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:31991: yathā hi viṣakāṇḍaviddhasya mṛtasya viṣaṃ sarvam aṃgam abhivyāpya vraṇadeśa eva maraṇakāle 'vatiṣṭhate nānyatra.
T07yabhkvyu:31992: tadvad asya yoginaḥ praheya eva bhāvāgrikaskaṃdhalakṣaṇe jñānam avatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:31999: anāsravaṃ hi paracittajñānaṃ mārgākāram eva mārgajñānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32013: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ceti saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32014: kadācid dhi prayogavaśād duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ ca jñātuṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32016: dharmajñānapakṣau dvau kṣaṇau jñātvānvayajñānapakṣaṃ pareṇa cittaṃ jñāsyāmīti prayogaṃ kṛtvā samudayānvayajñānam aṣṭamaṃ saṃbhāvayati.
T07yabhkvyu:32018: śrāvakasya hi mahāprayogasādhyaṃ tad anvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanaṃ [Tib.278b] paracittam.
T07yabhkvyu:32019: ato yāvat sa tatra prayogam ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:32020: tāvad ayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ cittam anuprāpto bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32022: prathamadvitīyapaṃcadaśān iti etān eva trīn jānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32024: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca jñātvā prayogāntaraṃ ca kṛtvā paṃcadaśakṣaṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāntiṃ jānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32027: idaṃ ca saṃvṛtyākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākāratvād ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:32029: tasya saṃvṛtijñānadvayasya tatpṛṣṭhalabdhasya viśeṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ yāvan me mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32030: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32031: yāvan mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavyaḥ iti ca jānātīty evaṃrūpeṇa tayor anāsravayoḥ kṣayānutpādajñānayor viśeṣaḥ śāstre jñāpito darśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32033: tad upādāyeti pūrvīkṛtya tat puraskṛtyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32034: niṣyaṃdane tayor nirvikalpayor viśeṣo 'numīyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32038: yadi tad upādāya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti śāstravacanena duḥkhaparijñānādisaṃvṛtijñānaphalam [Tib.279a] amāsravaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32045: yad etac chāstre vacanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32047: duḥkhajñānādiṣu hi jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhir bodhir iti paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32056: na hy etajjñānadvaye ānumānikavad āgāmikavad vā parokṣavṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32059: tadsādharmyād etad api jñānadvayaṃ darśanam ity uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:32061: ata eva pratyakṣavṛttitvād uktaṃ śāstre yat tāvaj jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32063: syāt tu darśanaṃ na jñānam aṣṭāv ābhisamayāntikāḥ kṣāntayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32064: tad idam uktaṃ bhavati darśanatvam anayor iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32066: tatreti teṣu daśasu jñāneṣu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam eva svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32068: tasya hi sāsravānāsravasya [Tib.279b] sāsrava eva bhāgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32070: dharmajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:32076: evaṃ samudayajñāsya yāvad anutpādajñānasya dharmānvayajñānasvabhāvasya yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32079: paracittajñānasya tu dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvasya dharmajñānabhāgo dharmajñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32087: etāni hi dharmajñānādīni catvāri catuḥsatyālaṃbanāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:32093: caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ yaḥ samudayālaṃbanabhāgo nirodhālaṃbanabhāgo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32095: mārgajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv [Tib.280a] ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva mārgajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32103: etāni hi catvāri jñānāni paracittāparacittajñānaṃ svabhāvāni bhāvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:32107: kṣayajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva kṣayajñānaṃ svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32109: kṣayajñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākārajñānaniṣyandaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32115: tad duḥkhajñānaṃ yāvan mārgajñānaṃ vā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32119: [Tib.280b] evam anutpādajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad evānutpādajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32121: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam ity evamādyākāraniṣyandaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32143: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 617) saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32144: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32146: api khalu dharmajñāne dharmajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32150: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ [Tib.281a] hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32151: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32152: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:32154: api khalv anvayajñāne anvayajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:32157: ākārata eva nālaṃbanataḥ paṃcopādānaskaṃdhalakṣaṇatvena tayor abhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32160: paṃcopādānaskaṃdhān anityato duḥkhataḥ śunyato 'nātmataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32163: sāsravaṃ hetukaṃ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:32170: praṇītato niḥsaraṇataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:32173: mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:32178: prathamotpannāni daśa jñānāny adhikṛtya sabhāgahetunā sarvānāsravahetukam anutpādajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32180: na hy anutpādajñānam asya hetur bhavati viśiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32182: sakalasya kāmadhātor darśanabhāvanāprahātavyasaṃgṛhītasya paṃcaprakārasya sakalaṃ dhārmajñānaṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ caturāryasatyālaṃbanaṃ pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā kāmadhātor eva pratipakṣo dharmajñānam ity uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:32183: api tv asti saṃbhavo yad rūpārūpyadhātor api dharmajñānaṃ pratipakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32187: tāv adharāv api na hinau vyavasthāpyete.
T07yabhkvyu:32189: na tad ālambanaṃ dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyadhātupratipakṣa ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32192: anvayajñānaṃ tarhi nirodhamārgālaṃbanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ kasmāt tridhātupratipakṣo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32196: tataḥ kāmadhātor jitatvān na tat kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32197: dharmajñānaṃ tu rūpārūpyadhātor ajitatvāt pratipakṣo yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32201: nirodhāt pratipakṣād vā rūpārūpyāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhasya pratipakṣasya vāsti kaścid viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32202: sarvo hi nirodhaḥ kuśalo 'saṃskṛto mārgaś ca nairyāṇikaḥ.] anvayam ity anvetīty anvayaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32210: ādiśabdena bhuṃkṣva tiṣṭha gacchety evam ākāraṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:32217: rāgasya ca cittasya ca yugapadgrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32219: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32220: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32222: evaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam [Tib.282b] anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ bhāvitam avimuktaṃ vimuktam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32227: yathā yadā vastram iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate na tadā malaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32228: yadā ca malam iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32237: yat kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ ca laukikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32239: tad evam ubhayam apy etat sarāgam evoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32241: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam ekīyamatena rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32243: yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam api.
T07yabhkvyu:32246: [Tib.283a] tad api hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ saṃprayuktam api.
T07yabhkvyu:32247: na ca sūtre dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32251: na hi rāgapratipakṣo dveṣādibhiḥ saṃprayujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32253: yadi rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32259: ādiśabdena sadveṣaṃ samoham iti tulyaprasaṃgo yojyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32261: atra tu sūtre dveṣasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ dveṣapratipakṣo vigatadveṣam iti.
