T07yabhkvyu:32264: evaṃ tarhi tad [Tib.283b] apratipakṣaś cittam akliṣṭaṃ naiva sadveṣaṃ syāt na vigatadveṣam.
T07yabhkvyu:32265: ity evaṃ samohaṃ cittaṃ vigatamoham iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32270: tasmād dveṣasaṃyuktatayāpi sadveṣaṃ mohasaṃyuktatayāpi samoham atra sūtre eṣṭavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32278: tad eva hi cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktam iti saṃkṣiptaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32279: kliṣṭam iti ca vikṣiptaṃ syād iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32282: saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānāti vistareṇa yathā vṛttau.
T07yabhkvyu:32283: teṣām anvayajñānaṃ tāvat saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32284: kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ middhabhāvād anvayajñānasya [Tib.284a] (Abhidh-k-vy 620) ca kāmadhātvanālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32290: ye tu varṇayanti saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ kuśam ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32292: tad akliṣṭena middhena na saṃprayujyata iti saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:32294: kuśalaṃ traidhātukasaṃgṛhītam asaṃgṛhītaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānānīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32301: mūlādīnaṃ balāntānāṃ alpabahutvam ekaikasya mūlasyālpabahutvād yathākramaṃ parīttaṃ ca veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32303: kliṣṭaṃ hi [Tib.284b] dvābhyām akuśalamūlābhyāṃ samūlaṃ mohena lobhadveṣayoś cānyatareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:32307: kliṣṭajātīyasyānāgatasya bhāvanāyāḥ pratilaṃbhasyābhāvāt kuśalasaṃskṛtā dharmā bhāvayitavyā iti nyāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32317: nanu ca kuśalam api durbalam ekena mithyādṛṣṭikṣaṇena kuśalapaṃcaskaṃdhasamudghātāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32318: na tad atyaṃtam ucchidyate punaḥ pratisaṃdhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32319: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃtya tu daśānām anuśayānām atyaṃtasamuccheda iti tasād apīty apiśabdena pūrvoktād apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32324: vyupaśāntaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvād iti kleśasaṃprayogāsaṃprayogato vā tad avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32332: na hi kliṣṭaṃ kuśalavad anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32339: kṣīṇakleśasaṃtānānutpatteś ca na saṃtānavimuktyā ca vimuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32344: etad eva nigamayati na tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32345: anuvikṣiptam ity asya nirdeśaṃ karoty anuvisṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32347: kim iti kṛtvā vikṣiptatvam atra na pratijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32348: kiṃ middhasahagate kliṣṭe citte vikṣiptatvaṃ nāstīti na pratijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32353: middhasahagatād dhi kliṣṭād yad anyat kliṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32355: middhasahagataṃ tu kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ cāviśeṣeṇa saṃkṣiptam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:32360: tad eva vikṣiptam ity ato 'tra middhasaṃprayukte citte.
T07yabhkvyu:32368: saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ cābhinnalakṣaṇavacanān nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavatīti saṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32375: na nokta iti dvau pratiṣedhau ukta evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32379: kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi vikṣiptādīnāṃ tulye kliṣṭatve teṣāṃ doṣāviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepayogād vikṣiptaṃ kliṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32380: kausīdyayogāl līnam auddhatyayogād uddhatam ity evamādidoṣe viśeṣasaṃdarśanād ukta evārthaviśeṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32381: evaṃ kuśalasyāpi saṃkṣiptāder (Abhidh-k-vy 622) guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kuśalaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ pragṛhītam iti vistareṇokta evārthaviśeṣo
T07yabhkvyu:32388: yadi [Tib.286b] yuṣmannītyā sūtre līnam evoddhataṃ bhagavatābhipretaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32392: līnābhiśaṃki līnam etad bhaviṣyatīty abhiśaṃkato līnābhiāśaṃki.
T07yabhkvyu:32393: akālas tasmin samaye praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32395: akālas tasmin samaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32397: tad eva līnaṃ cittam uddhatam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:32398: tathā yasmin samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ bhavaty auddhatyābhiśaṃki.
T07yabhkvyu:32399: akālas tasmin samaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32401: akālas tasmin samaye praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32403: tad evoddhataṃ cittaṃ līnam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:32405: yasmin samaye cittaṃ līnaṃ bhavati līnābhiśaṃki uddhataṃ vā bhavaty auddhatyābhiśaṃki.
T07yabhkvyu:32409: [Tib.287a] smṛtiṃ khalv ahaṃ sarvatragatāṃ vadāmīti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32410: kathaṃ punar vaibhāṣikeṇa yad eva līnaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32413: uddhataṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃprayogād iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32414: kiṃ punar atra bodhyaṃgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:32421: līne citte akālaḥ praśrabdhyādīnām ālaṃbanīkaraṇasyābhogakaraṇasyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32422: uddhate ca citte akālo dharmavicayādīnām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32429: yatra kausīdyam [Tib.287b] adhikam auddhatyaṃ tu nyagbhāvena vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:32431: yatra cauddhatyam adhikaṃ kausīdyaṃ tu nyagbhāvena.
T07yabhkvyu:32433: ity anayor viśeṣād avirodhaḥ sūtrasya pṛthagvacane.
T07yabhkvyu:32434: tayos tu sahabhāvād ekasmin kalāpe yugapad bhāvāt tad eva līnaṃ tad evoddhatam iti brūma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32438: ābhiprāyikaṃ yāvat sūtre tu nāyam abhiprāya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32441: yasmin samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati vistareṇa na tv evaṃ viśinaṣṭi kausīdyādhikam anddhatyādhikam iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32442: yat tūktaṃ sarvam eva rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32446: tatra rāgasaṃyuktatayāpi sarāgaṃ cittam atreṣṭavyam iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32447: anāsravam api sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32452: arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ parakīyasya rāgasyālaṃbanatvāt rāgasaṃyuktam iti kṛtvā sarāgam iti gṛhṇīyāt paracittavit paracittajñānaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32453: atha mataṃ na tad rāgeṇālaṃbyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32457: atha mataṃ sāmānyakleśānāṃ dṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām ālaṃbaṇaṃ tad ataḥ sāsravam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32464: tasmān na rāgapraptisahitatvena rāgasaṃyuktatvāt sarāgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32466: tad iti yat tat parakīyaṃ cittaṃ paracittajñānena [Tib.288b] gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32470: ālaṃabanam asya paracittajñānasyeti tad bhavati taccittālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32471: yasmād evaṃvidhaṃ rāgaṃ nālaṃbate paracittajñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32473: na ca parakīyacittajñānaṃ tasya cittasyālaṃbanaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32475: raktam idaṃ eittaṃ jānātīti vacanāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:32476: tasmād api na rāgasaṃyogāt sarāgaṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32480: saṃdhāyoktaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 624) na saṃprayogam iti darśayaty anāvartikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārūpyabhave iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32484: atra tu sūtra iti vistareṇa yāvad yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam [Tib.289a] api vigatarāgaṃ syād ity
T07yabhkvyu:32485: etenābhisaṃdhinā rāyaviprayuktatvād vigatarāgam anyakleśasaṃprayuktam apīty anena.
T07yabhkvyu:32486: yady evaṃ sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:32487: na vaktavyaṃ syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:32489: na tu tad dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgam api sad vigatarāgam iti kṛtvā gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32491: sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi dveṣādisaṃprayogitayā viśiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32492: ādiśabdena cātra saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptam ity evamādisūtroktāni padāni gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:32494: yady asmin vastuni rūpādike raktam iti vijānīyāt tad rūpālaṃbanam api syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32495: tathā ca sati na tat paracittajñānaṃ syād rūpālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32496: tadālaṃbanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhṇataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32498: asti hi saṃbhavo yat paracittavid yasya cittaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:32499: asāv api tasya paracittavidaś cittam ālaṃbeta.
T07yabhkvyu:32500: tataś ca paracittajñānasya svālaṃbanaparijñānāt [Tib.289b] svam evāsau paracittavic cittam ālambeta.
T07yabhkvyu:32502: yat tenaiva cittena tad eva gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32504: dravyasya svalakṣaṇaṃ ca cittacaittāś ca pratyutpannāś ca parasaṃtatiś ca kāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāś cāpratisaṃyuktāś ca viṣayo 'syeti samāsavigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32512: darśanamārge vartamānaḥ paracittajñānaṃ na saṃmukhīkarotīty ato darśananārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:32529: na caiva kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ceti tābhyām asaṃgṛhītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32545: atas tanniṣyandena tayoḥ saṃvṛtibhajanam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32546: na tu mukhyavṛttyā tayoḥ saṃvṛtibhajanam [Tib.290b] ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32547: yataś caiva niṣyandenātmadṛṣṭiṃ bhajamāne iva te pravartete.
T07yabhkvyu:32548: atra tasmāc chūnyānātmākāravivarjitaiś caturdaśabhir evākāraiḥ saṃprayukte iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32553: atha vāntareṇāpi bhāvapratyayaṃ bhāvapradhāno nirdeśo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32556: asty etat sthānam asty etad vastv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32558: asty etat sthānam ity asty etal lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32559: asty etad vastv ity ayaṃ hetur ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32564: asty etat sthānam asty etad vastv ity asty ayaṃ saṃbhavo 'sty ayaṃ yogo yad anityādito vijānīyād iti mataṃ cet.
T07yabhkvyu:32576: agrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramata iti dṛṣṭiparāmarśena.
T07yabhkvyu:32584: evam ātmādibhir viparītatā vijānīyād iti nigamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:32592: sa eva samudayaḥ prabhavaḥ pratyayaś ca paryāyamātraṃ nārthabhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32594: evaṃ nirodha eva śāntaḥ praṇīto niḥsaraṇam ity eka ākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32595: mārga eva ca nyāyaḥ pratipan nairyāṇika ity eka ākāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32600: vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti duḥkhākāravat samudayādyākārāṇāṃ sarveṣām api pṛthakpṛthak saṃmukhīkartavyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32603: na niyatabhavam anityaṃ pratyayādhīnatvāt pratyayapratibaddhajanmatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32614: yataḥ kṣaṇād anantaram utpadyate samudety asmād iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:32639: duḥkhena bhārabhūtena hi sa pudgalo bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32648: labhyeta ca rūpe evaṃ bhavatv evaṃ mā bhūd iti kāmakāry ātmeti (Abhidh-k-vy 627) niruktiparigrahāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32650: hi gatau hinoty asmād iti hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32665: yasmād anena nirvāṇapuraṃ na virodhyate na visaṃvādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32666: kiṃ tarhi pratipadyata evety ataḥ pratipat.
T07yabhkvyu:32680: kaḥ punar eṣāṃ [padānāṃ] chandānām [iva vā] viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32682: anavadhāryaikaṃ dravyaṃ samasteṣu paṃcasūpādānaskaṃdheṣu asmīty abhedena prakārāntaraviśiṣṭasya pratyutpannasyātmabhāvavastuno 'nālaṃbanataḥ traiyadhvikātmabhāvanālambanato vā ātmabhāvaprārthanā ātmabhāvacchanda iti prathamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32683: syām ity abhedeneti punarbhavamātraprārthanā na viśeṣarūpāprārthaneti dvitīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32685: idaṃprakāraḥ [Tib.293a] syām iti bhedena punarbhavaccandas tṛtīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32694: kathaṃ punas te chandā mūlādiśabdavācyā iti pratipādayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:32696: ādiḥ kāraṇam ādau vā kāraṇam ādikāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32703: tena dvitīyena chadena punarbhavasya samudāgamāt kṣaṇaparaṃparayā phalasyevāṃkurādiprasavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32709: tatprakārasya duḥkhasya (Abhidh-k-vy 628) pratyayaḥ saṃbhavati tasya viśeṣarūpatvād viśeṣaphalarūpam eva phalam utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32717: tadyathāmlatve tulye bījapūrakarasaḥ pittaṃ janayaty āmalakarasaṃ tu śamayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32719: tata eva pratisaṃdhibaṃdhacchandāt tasya punarbhavalakṣaṇasya saṃbhavād utpādāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32726: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvav paṃcakau gaṇau dvav catuṣkau catvāraś chandā yathākramaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:32732: asmīti bhikṣavaḥ satyātmadṛṣṭau satyām ittham asmīti bhavatīdaṃ prakāro 'smīti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32734: evam asmīti yathā pūrvam eva nānyathety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32737: viparyayād asad asmīty ayam abhedena paṃcadhātmabhāvaccandaḥ prathamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32743: itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām ity asya bhavatīty ayaṃ bhedena caturdhāpunarbhavacchaṃdas tṛtīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32744: api tu syām ity asya bhavaty apītthaṃ syām apy evaṃ syām apy anyathā syām ity asya caturdhāpratisaṃdhibaṃdhacchandas caturthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32745: tatra prathamo duḥkhasyādikāraṇatvān mūlahetur iti vistareṇa pūrvavad yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32752: nityaṃ sukham ātmīyaṃ ātmeti ca dṛṣṭicaritam eṣāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32755: nāsti hetur ity ahetudṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa hetvākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32756: eko hetur īśvaraḥ pradhānaṃ cety ekahetudṛṣṭicaritānāṃ samudayākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32760: na tu pūrvam avasthitaḥ pariṇamata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32766: tasmād anekapratyayajanitaṃ jagad iti jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32770: nairuktā vidhir iti darśayaty ālambanaśabdād ākāraṃ gṛhītvā prakāraśabdāc ca kāraśabdaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32771: śeṣavarṇalope ca kṛte ākāra iti rupaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32772: tad evaṃ sati prajñāpi sākārā bhavatīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32782: śāstre hi dharmajñānam ādyaṃ paṭhitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32791: yuktaṃ tāvad ārūpyadhātau dharmajñānaṃ na saṃmukhīkriyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32796: rūpadhātūpapannasya ca dharmajñānaṃ na kāmadhātuṃ vidūṣayitum [Tib.295a] upajāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32798: kāmadhātūpapannas tu tad vītarāgo 'pi tat saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:32799: kāmadhātūpapatteḥ sāvaśeṣatvād ity ato na rūpadhātau dharmajñānaṃ saṃmukhīkriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32805: dharmajñānānuparivartakasya hi śīlasya kāmāvacarāṇy eva bhūtāny āśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32808: tāni ca tatra na saṃtīti dharmajñānam kāmadhātv āśrayaṃ eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:32816: mārgajñānam api yad anāsravasaṃvarālambanaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ tad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32819: dharmajñānaṃ yady anāsravaṃ jñānam ālaṃbeta [Tib.295b] dharmajñānapakṣam evālambeta.
T07yabhkvyu:32821: tatra dharmajñānasya mārgajñānabhūtasya dharmajñānāntaraṃ duḥkhajñānādīni cānutpādajñānāntāny ālambanaṃ saṃbhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:32833: yat sāsravaṃ tasya saṃvṛtijñānaṃ prarcittajñānaṃ cālambanaṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32834: kṣayānutpādajñāne duḥkhajñānādisvabhāva iti daśāpi jñānāni tayor ālambanāni bhuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:32846: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarā api tata eva bhedāt ṣaṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:32849: ārūpyāvacarāṃāṃ cittacaittānāṃ viprayuktāsaṃskṛtānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ paracittajñānāviṣayatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:32856: ihāsmākaṃ bho gautama upasthānaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām evaṃrūpāntarākathāsamudāhāro 'bhūt.
T07yabhkvyu:32858: nāsti sa kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32859: yaḥ sakṛt sarvaṃ jānīyāt sarvaṃ paśyed iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32860: tathyam idaṃ bho gautama smarāmi bhavato 'ham evaṃ vaktum.
T07yabhkvyu:32861: api tu nāsti sa kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32862: yaḥ sakṛt sarvaṃ jñāsyati vā drakṣyati veti.
T07yabhkvyu:32866: na sa eva tasya viṣayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32869: tasmāt tena saṃvṛtijñānena svabhāvo na gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32874: yadi ca te saṃprayuktā gṛhyeran svabhāvālambanāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32883: yasmād bhāvanāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ vyavacchinnam eva bhūmim ālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:32884: kāmadhātuṃ vā prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:32891: prayogaviśeṣamārgayor api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kācid eva bhūmir ālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32901: yasmāt kṣāntijñānaṃ na bhavati anyenāpi anāsraveṇa jñānena samanvāgato na bhavati rāgīti grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32905: tad eva duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ cocyate duḥkhajñānaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:32907: dharmajñānena duḥkhajñānena saṃvṛtijñānena ceti tribhiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32911: kṣāntiṣu pūrvavad evāsamanvāgamāt duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣaṇe hy anvayam eva vardhate.
T07yabhkvyu:32917: evaṃ nirodhamārgadharmajñānakṣaṇayor nirodhamārgajñāne eva vardhete iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32919: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau yāvan mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇe paracittajñānenāpi samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32920: taiś ca yathoktair jñānair iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32921: mārge 'nvayajñāne tu tair eva saptabhir avītarāgaḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32924: kṣayānutpādajñānābhyāṃ tv arhann eva samanvāgata iti subodhān na tadarthaṃ sūtritam ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:32931: iti yāniyāny utpannāni tānitāni bhāvyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32932: tadyathā duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tajjātīyā kṣāntir evānāgatā bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32936: evaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne tad evānāgataṃ bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32940: kasmāt [Tib.298a] sabhāgajñānabhāvanā sabhāgākārabhāvanā ca darśanamārga eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:32946: na hi duḥkhakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ samudayādiduḥkhakṣāntyākarā bhāvyante.
T07yabhkvyu:32947: udāharaṇamātrārthatvāt tu jñānaparipraśno na kṣāntiparipraśna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32951: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tadgotraṃ tadākārāṇāṃ ca caturṇāṃ gotrāṇi labdhāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:32953: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam anityādīnāṃ ākārāṇām ekaikasminn ākāre saṃmukhībhūte pariśiṣṭānām ākārāṇāṃ gotrāṇi pratilabhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:32957: evaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yāvan mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tadgotrāṇi tadākarāṇi ca caturṇāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 633) gotrāṇi labdhāni bhavantīti tad eva bhāvanāṃ gacchati nānyat.
T07yabhkvyu:32958: bhāvanāmārge tu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ sabhāgavisabhāgānāṃ tadākarāṇāṃ ca saṃmukhībhāvāt sarveṣāṃ hetavo labdhā bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:32963: [Tib.298b] na hi tadānīṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ duḥkaṃ parijñātaṃ samudayaḥ prahīṇas tannirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32966: na tu saṃvṛtijñānena kadācin mārgo mārgādibhir ākārair abhisamitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32970: na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32972: samudayo 'pi tadā na sarvaḥ prahīṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:32974: duḥkhaṃ punaḥ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ parijñātaṃ tasya parijñeyatvād ity ataḥ samudayam eva praticodyate.
T07yabhkvyu:32979: tāni bahūni gotrāṇy asyeti bahugotro mārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32984: teṣāṃ kaścid eva darśanaheyapratipakṣo bhāvyate saṃmukhīkriyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32994: vayaṃ hi bhāvanāmārgaparivāro 'pi tad iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32997: tato viśiṣṭam eva ca laukikam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:32999: tasya saṃvṛtijñānasya saṃmukhībhāve samarthāśrayasya yo lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33005: etad uktaṃ bhavati tatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābhe tad api tenāśrayeṇotpadyamānaṃ labdhaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:33009: darśanamārge cotpattyanavakāśo 'syāsti tad anutpattidharmakam iti varṇayaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:33014: dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikādīni ca pūrvoktāni evaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaś cet paṃcabhūmikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33021: ekasya parisaṃkhyānāt siddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvārīti.
T07yabhkvyu:33022: nirodhe 'ntyam evāntyam eva ca nirodha ity ubhayāvadhāraṇāc cheṣaṃ catuḥsmṛtyupasthānam iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:33052: atrāntare prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu bhāvyamāneṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante.
T07yabhkvyu:33067: saṃvṛtijñānam api hi tasya kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:33070: akopyaprativedhe tu na tathā pratipakṣarūpaṃ bhūtaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:33076: bhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣv aṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33079: ataḥ ekaprakāre prahīṇe yāvad aṣṭaprakāre prahīṇe pūrvaparacittajñānaviśiṣṭaṃ paracittajñānaṃ bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33080: yat sa evaṃvidha āryapudgalas tato mārgād vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33086: darśanamārgasādṛśyāt tatra tad ābhisamayāntikavad bhāvyeta ity eke.
T07yabhkvyu:33087: na cābhisamayo 'sti darśanamārgasādṛśyaṃ cety apara ity evaṃ vivādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33093: yathā darśanamārgeṇa srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33094: evam anenāpy ānantaryamārgeṇa śaikṣasya śaikṣendriyottāpanāyāṃ tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītāni saṃskṛtāni srotaāpattiphalādīni prāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:33095: darśanamārge cānantaryamārgāvasthāyāṃ na saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanāsti evam ihāpi.
T07yabhkvyu:33096: ity evaṃ darśanamārgasādṛśyād ānantaryamārge na saṃvṛtijñānasya bhāvanā.
T07yabhkvyu:33110: tasyāpy ante vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvaneti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33112: sarve ca vītarāgasyānāgāminaḥ prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ śeṣās teṣāṃ bhāvanāyām avacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33115: kathaṃ punaḥ evam aviśeṣite viśeṣapratipattir labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33122: yady akopyadharmā [Tib.302a] daśa tad eva prakṣipya.
T07yabhkvyu:33146: dhyānabhūmikeṣv eva prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33147: yat tatsaṃgṛhītaṃ paracittajñānaṃ ca viśiṣṭam eva bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33150: teṣu hi nirvebhabhāgīyeṣu paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33154: tathā tatparivāre 'pi na bhāvyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33161: (VII.31, 32) atha kasmin mārga iti laukike lokottare vā.
T07yabhkvyu:33164: yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ prathamato labhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33165: vairāgyataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ tadbhūmikam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33167: yady anāgamyabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa hi laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate anāgmyabhūmikaṃ sāmantakasvabhāvaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca maulasvabhāvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33169: evaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇa prathamadhyānavairāgyāt dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:33171: evaṃ yāvad yadi naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyād bhavāgraṃ labhata iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33174: yadāpi maulaprathamadhyānabhūmikasaṃniśrayeṇa prathamadhyānavairāyānāsravsaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:33175: tadāpi prathamadhyānaprathamaprakārapratipakṣabhūtaṃ yāvan navamapratipakṣabhūtaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:33176: sā hi prathamato bhūmis tadā labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33177: navame tu vimuktimārge mauladvitīyasaṃgṛhītam api saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33178: evam anāsravadhyānāntarabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa yāvad anāsravākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanā yojya.
T07yabhkvyu:33191: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi na kevalaṃ yadbhūmika ity apiśabdaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33195: yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhate vairāgyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33198: tadyathā dvitīyam anāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tṛtīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ [Tib.304a] karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:33199: yadbhūmiko mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33200: yasyāś ca bhūmervairāgyaṃ karoti tṛtīyāyā bhūmes tadbhūmikaṃ tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ navame vimuktimārge 'nāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33201: adhobhūmikaṃ ca prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ vānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33202: adhobhūmikam api hi tatprayogamārgādikaṃ saṃbhavāmi tajjātīyam iti bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33203: atha tu tṛtīyadhyānasāmantakaṃ niśritya dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:33204: tatrāṣṭāsv ānantaryamārgeṣu vimuktimārge ca tasya sāmantakasya sāsravatvāt tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ na bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33206: adhobhūmikaṃ tu tajjātīyaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ ca tajjātīyam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:33207: evam anyatrāpi yojyam eṣā dig iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33210: yān guṇān arhadbhūtvā saṃmukhīkuryāt te sāsravās tasyām avasthāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33219: yathāsau rajjvā nipīḍya baddhā (Abhidh-k-vy 639) peḍā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva.
T07yabhkvyu:33220: evaṃ yathoktā aśubhādayo guṇā vajropamena samādhinā kleśaprāptirajjūcchedād aśailṣasaṃtāne vartsyanta ucchvasantīva.
T07yabhkvyu:33228: tatprāptasyārhataḥ prāptibhiḥ prābhṛtasthānīyābhiḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyudgamanānte guṇā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33229: ādhirājye prāptau kasyacid rājādhirājasya prābhṛtena vastrādinā viṣayāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33231: tadvat tad eva kleśaprāptirajjūcchede sati svaprāptilābhāt ucchvasantīva guṇā uttaptatarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ prāptir utpadyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33232: kāmadhātāv arhattvaprāptāv evāśubhādayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayās traidhātukā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33234: [Tib.305a] evaṃ bhūmito 'pi boddhavyaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopapannasyārhattvaprāptau tadbhūmikā eva ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33236: yad vihīnaṃ punar labhyate saṃmukhīkriyate saṃsārocitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33239: yad evātra dhyānāpramāṇādyanucitaṃ saṃsāre viśiṣṭām anāsravāṇuguṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33240: tat saṃmukhībhāve tajjātīyam evānāgataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhāvyata iyt ācāryo darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:33243: yat pratilabdhavihīnaṃ punar labhyate na tad bhāvyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33244: arthād gamyate yad alabdhapūrvaṃ labhyate tad bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33249: bhāvitapratiprasrabdhatvāt kṛtakṛtyadattaphalatvāc ca vegahīna iti tatsaṃmukhībhāvad anāgato na bhāvyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33252: tad evaṃ sati yad uktaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvad iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:33253: tad āryasaṃtānapatitam eva gṛhyate saṃsārānucitatvād iti ācāryavasumitreṇātra likhitam.
T07yabhkvyu:33257: yasmād alabdham eva tad bhavati tyaktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33258: tasmād bhāvitotsṛṣṭasyāpi punarlābhe bhavaty eva bhāvaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:33259: kathaṃ tad apūrvaṃ bhavati yāvatā labdhapūrvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33260: na hy evaṃvidhaṃ loke pūrvaṃ prasiddham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33263: yad vihīnam asminn eva janmani punar labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33272: evaṃ niṣevaṇam eva pratipakṣa eva vinirdhāvanam eva bhāvāneti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33275: niṣevaṇaṃ punaḥpunaḥsaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ pratipakṣo mārgo yathoktaṃ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:33279: tathā hy uktaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhikṣur ity ucyate bhāvitacitto bhāvitaśīlaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33281: kāyād vigatarāgo vigataspṛho vigatapipāso vigatapremā vigataniyaṃtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33290: yasmāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane kuśalasaṃskṛtānām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravaṇāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33291: pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane ca sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ kliṣṭānām akliṣṭānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33292: tasmād evam itthaṃ kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33295: ye tarhi na kuśalasāsravāḥ ye saṃskṛtā ye 'nāsravā ye ca kliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33296: teṣāṃ kati bhāvanā ity āhānāsravāṇāṃ dve iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33305: tat punar bhāvanādvayam āgamena yathākramaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:33307: sa punar indriyasaṃvaraḥ smṛti [Tib.306b] saṃprajñānasvabhāva uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33310: te tu saṃvaravibhāvanabhāvane pratipakṣanirdhāvanabhāvanāntarbhūte yathākramam ubhayam ubhayatrāntarbhūtam ity api na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33316: ete balādyā mahākaruṇāntā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā vaibhāṣikair vyavasthāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:33317: balādivyatiriktān kecid anyān aṣṭādaśāveṇikān (Abhidh-k-vy 641) buddhadharmān varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33354: ihāyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33357: yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhasthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati.
T07yabhkvyu:33359: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāni karmadharmasamādānāni [Tib.307b] sthānato hetuto vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:33364: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthānaviśuddhiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33366: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33370: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam anekavimuktikam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33374: punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33378: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33382: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.
T07yabhkvyu:33383: tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśatiṃ yāvad anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān anusmarati.
T07yabhkvyu:33385: yatrāham āsa evaṃnāmā evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evamāyuṣparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33386: iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.
T07yabhkvyu:33390: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavanān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān durvarṇān durbalān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagān sattvān [Tib.308b] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantaḥ kāyaduścaritena smanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvagatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33391: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipāte
T07yabhkvyu:33392: amī punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatan svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:33396: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya prativedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:33406: sthānāsthānaṃ samāsena saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca tad api saṃskṛtam aṣṭadhā bhettavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33411: (Abhidh-k-vy 643) daśasv api dharmeṣu tasya vṛttir ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33424: kathaṃ punar daśā dharmāḥ sthānāsthānam ity uccyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:33426: atha vā asthānam anavakāśo yaḥ strī buddhatvaṃ kārayiṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:33428: asthānam anavakāśo yaḥ strī brahmatvaṃ [Tib.309b] kārayiṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:33430: tathā sthānam etad yad duḥkhasya nirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33438: dhyānam ādir āsām iti dhyānādayo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33450: dhyānādīnāṃ sāsravānāsravasaṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt tadālaṃbanāni nava jñānāni saṃbhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33452: [teṣāṃ san nirodhajñānaṃ tu na bhavati.] teṣāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33456: teṣv api sāsravānāsravabhedabhinneṣu nava jñānāni saṃbhavanti nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:33458: tāḥ punaḥ sāsravānāsravās traidhātukāś ca tadālambanatvāt nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:33460: tatra hi dhātuḥ pūrvābhyāsavāsanāsamudāgata āśayo dhātur ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33461: sa punas tu eva te cittacaittā viśiṣṭāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33462: teṣāṃ tathaiva sāsravānāsravabhedabhinnānāṃ nirodhajñanaṃ hitvā nava jñānāni bhavantīti pūrvavad yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33484: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33486: tatra sarvatra gaṃtuṃ śīlam asyā iti sarvatragāminī cāsau pratipac ca sarvatragāminīpratipat.
T07yabhkvyu:33487: tat jñānaṃ tad eva ca balam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33498: kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāne sarvāṇi jñānāni samudācarantīti daśa jñānāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:33500: jaṃbūdvīpād anyatra buddhānutpādad iti jaṃbūdvīpapuruṣāśrayāṇi daśa balāni buddhāśrayotpatter ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33501: tad eva daśavidhajñānam anyasya balaṃ nocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33502: anyasyāpy etad asti na tu balaṃ vyāhatatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33508: tad udāharaṇaṃ yathā anyasya vyāhanyate jñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33509: āryaśāriputreṇa kila kasyacit pravrajyāprekṣasya puruṣasya mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ vyavalokayatā na dṛṣṭam iti pratyākhyāto na pravrājita ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33516: api tūpātteṣv eva skaṃdhadhātvāyataneṣv iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33518: mokṣabījam ahaṃ hy asya svasūkṣmam upalakṣaye.
T07yabhkvyu:33534: sahanaśīlo bhagavān na bhaved ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33544: hastyādīnāṃ hastigandhahastimahānagnapraskaṃdivarāṃgacāṇūranārāyaṇānāṃ saptakaṃ tasya balaṃ daśabhir adhikaṃ daśabhyo vādhikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33554: āditas tathaiva prakramya yad daśānāṃ praskandināṃ balaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33560: anyathā hy anantajñānabalasahiṣṇur na syād iti tad eva kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33563: mahābhūtaviśeṣasvabhāvam evedaṃ balaṃ na bhautikam iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:33565: ślakṣnatvādibhyaḥ pūrvoktebhyo 'nyad eva balaṃ nāmopādāyarūpam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:33568: yair vaiśaradyaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati.
T07yabhkvyu:33570: samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me sato ime dharmā (Abhidh-k-vy 646) anabhisaṃbuddhā ity atra māṃ kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā saha dharmeṇa codayet.
T07yabhkvyu:33573: evaṃ cāhaṃ nimittam asamanupaṣyan kṣemaprāptaś ca viharāmy abhayaprāptaś ca vaiśāradyaprāptaś ca udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāmi brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:33576: kṣīṇāsravasya bata me sata ime āsravā aprahīṇā ity atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:33579: ye vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33580: tān pratiṣevamāṇasya nālam antarāyāyety atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:33582: yo vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ mārga ākhyātaḥ āryo nairyāṇiko nairvedhiko niryāti.
T07yabhkvyu:33583: tatkarasya samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai sa na niryāsyatīty atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:33586: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33587: evaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me sata ity etad vaiśāradyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33588: tathaiva daśadhā dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33589: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ṣaṭ daśa vā jñānāni daśabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33590: evaṃ kṣīṇāsravasyeti dvitīyaṃ vaiśāradyam atrāpi tathaiva dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṭ daśa vā jñānānīti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33591: yathā karmasvakajñānabalam aṣṭau jñānāni nirodhamārgajñāne hitvā sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33592: evaṃ ya vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā iti vistareṇa tṛtīyaṃ vaiśāradyam.
T07yabhkvyu:33593: atrāpi tathaiva dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītā evāntarāyikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33594: na nirodhamārgasatyasaṃgṛhītā [Tib.313a] ity aṣṭau jñānānīti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33595: yathā sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni nava vā sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33596: evaṃ yo vā mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ākhyāta ity etad vaiśāradyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33600: ebhiś ca jñānair nirbhayo bhavatīti jñānāni vaiśāradyānīti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33608: ebhiś ca jñānair hetubhūtair nirbhayo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:33610: jñānakṛtaṃ tu vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate na jñānam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:33616: iha bhikṣavaḥ śāstā śravakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati anukaṃpakaḥ kāruṇiko 'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāyamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33617: idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāya idaṃ vo hitasukhāya.
T07yabhkvyu:33623: tena tathāgatasya na nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:33624: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan.
T07yabhkvyu:33628: punar aparaṃ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:33634: tena tathāgatasya nāghāto bhavati nākṣāntir nāpratyayo na cetaso 'nabhirāddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33635: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan.
T07yabhkvyu:33639: punar aparaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvac chāsane tatra tathāgatasya na nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33641: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan.
T07yabhkvyu:33644: yad āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati gaṇam anuśāsayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33650: yadā śrāvakasyāpi hīnakleśasya śuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca śiṣyeṣv aśuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca ubhayeṣu ca śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca.
T07yabhkvyu:33653: kasmād ete āveṇikā asādhāraṇā buddhadharmā ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:33656: kā punar iyaṃ vāsanā nāma śrāvakāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33658: tasya tatkṛtaḥ kāyavāgaceṣṭāvikārahetusāmarthyaviśeṣaś citte vāsanety ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33661: yasya śrāvakā buddhasya bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhavanti nānyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:33663: śuśrūṣamāṇe cāśuśrūṣamāṇe cobhayasmiṃś ca śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśruṣamāṇeṣu [Tib.314b] ubhayeṣu tasyaiva śravakavatas tatanutpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33668: yadi saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā na syād adveṣasvabhāvā syāt karuṇāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:33674: duḥkhitasattvālambanatvād evaṃ siddhaṃ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33675: na ca triduḥkhatākārā sidhyed iti vartate karuṇāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:33689: na hi vinā vīryeṇa dānaṃ dīyate śīlaṃ samādīyate kṣāntir bhāvyata iti mahāpuṇyasaṃbhārabhāgīyaṃ vīryaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:33690: tathā nāntareṇa vīryaṃ prajñā bhavatīti mahājñānasaṃbhārabhāgīyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:33693: tad evaṃ mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārābhyāṃ samudāgamān nirvṛtter mahatīyaṃ karuṇeti mahākaruṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:33695: yasmāt tisṛbhir api duḥkhatābhir ākārayati na duḥkhaduḥkatayaiva karuṇāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:33697: yasmāt traidhātukopapannan sattvān ālambate na ca kāmadhātūpapannān eva karuṇāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:33701: yasmāt sarvasattveṣu traidhātukaparyāpanneṣu samaṃ vartate saṃskāraduḥkhatākāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:33717: anāgamyadhyānāntarayoḥ prathamadhyānagrahaṇena grahaṇān na ṣaḍbhūmikety uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33718: mahākaruṇā tu caturthadhyānabhūmikaiva sarvasamādhikarmaṇyatvena tasyaiva tadutpādanasamarthatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33725: karuṇayā śrāvakādayaḥ karuṇāyanta eva kevalaṃ anuglāyaṃty evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33727: mahākaruṇayā tu karuṇāyamāno bhagavān mahataḥ saṃsārabhayāt paritrāyte.
T07yabhkvyu:33733: pūrveṣu janmasu puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa pūrvoktena jñānasaṃbhāreṇa ca samudāgamataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33740: tulyā hi sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ mahākaruṇā parārthahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33744: cirālpajīvanād yathākālaṃ dīrghāyuṣi prajāyāṃ dīrgāyuṣo buddhā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:33764: dharmakāyapariniṣpattyā jñānādisaṃpadaś catasro bhavantīti tā api phalasaṃpada iti vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:33766: tathā prahāṇasaṃpat prabhāvasaṃpat rūpakāyasaṃpac ca caturvidheti vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:33784: ayatnajñānam itīcchāmātrāvabodhanārthena sarvakleśaprahāṇam iti traidhātukadarśanabhāvanāheyakleśocchitteḥ atyantaprahāṇam ity aparihāṇitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33792: āyuṣa utsarge 'dhiṣṭhāne ca vaśitvasaṃpad āyurutsargādhiṣṭhānavaśitvasaṃpad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:33804: dharmataiṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yat teṣāṃ gacchatāṃ nimnasthalaṃ ca samībhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:33811: unmattāḥ smṛtim iti yathāsūtraṃ sarvam anusartavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33823: ye kecit prasādajātāḥ satpuruṣā buddhaṃ bhagavantam astāviṣuḥ stuvanti stoṣyaṃti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:33825: yady anekā asaṃkhyeyāḥ kalpā asyety anekāsaṃkhyeyakalpaṃ jīvitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33827: [Tib.318a] evaṃ te sakalaṃ tanmāhātmyaṃ jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vaktuṃ ca samarthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33830: guṇāś ca jñānāni ca prabhāvaś (Abhidh-k-vy 651) copakāraś ceti dvaṃdvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33831: anantāś ca te 'dbhutāś ceti punaḥ karmadhārayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33834: atha ca punar bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ svaguṇadāridryeṇānumānabhūtena hatādhimokṣā hatarucayaḥ yāvad buddhaṃ nādriyaṃte buddhe nādaraṃ kurvantīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33851: [Tib.318b] kecid guṇāḥ śrāvakasādhāraṇā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ araṇāpraṇidhijñānādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33854: (VII.42) na kasyacit tadālaṃbano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno veti.
T07yabhkvyu:33856: yathāyathā ca tenābhisamitaṃ bhavaty araṇāsamādher abhyutthitenāsya māṃ dṛṣṭvā rāga utpatsyate asya dveṣaḥ asya māna asyāprasāda utpatsyate
T07yabhkvyu:33858: paracittarakṣaṇopāyaviśeṣe tu tasyāraṇāsamādher utpattimātrasāmarthyād eva pareṣāṃ kleśo notpadyata ity artho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:33876: ārūpyas tu na sākṣāt praṇidhijñānena jñāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:33889: tataḥ pracyutānāṃ tatsamāpattilābhiṇāṃ ca tad ubhayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:33893: yathā vā kārṣako jānīte īdṛśe kṣetre īdṛśāphalaṃ dhānyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:33896: evaṃ śāntamūrtiṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuminoti ārūpyāc cyuto 'yam.
T07yabhkvyu:33900: na hi buddānām asty aviṣaya ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33911: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmiti, atra deśanādharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33914: tathā dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchetety atra phaladharmo nirvāṇam ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:33929: [Tib.320a] tatra cāvivartyaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvid iti viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:33942: na hi duḥkhādijñānam anāsravaṃ duḥkhaikadeśaṃ samudayaikadeśaṃ vā svalakṣaṇākāreṇālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:33953: vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata iti sūtraṃ nāmādyālambanatvaṃ punar āsāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ samāpannasyāpi.
T07yabhkvyu:33988: niruktipratisaṃvidaḥ tadbalena lābho na tu sā caurthadhyānabhūmikā.
T07yabhkvyu:34006: eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati bahudhābhūtvā eko bhavatīti vistaragraṃtha ṛddhipādā ity atra likhito draṣṭavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34008: iha bhikṣur divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa ubhayāṃ cchabdān śṛṇoti mānuṣān amānuṣān api ye vā dūre [Tib.321b] ye vāntika iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34010: ikha bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyatīti bahuḥ sūtravad granthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34012: iha bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmaratīti bahuḥ sūtravad granthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34014: iha bhikṣuḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicaritaṃ manasā mānasaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34015: sarāgacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34017: sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ vikṣiptaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam asamāhitam abhāvitaṃ bhāvitam avimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34018: vimuktaṃ cittaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34020: iha bhikṣur idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34023: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam [Tib.322a] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34024: tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34027: kṣīṇā me jātir yāvan nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajanāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34038: raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ mūḍham iti vā kramo vā paryāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34039: kadācid raktaṃ kadācid dviṣṭaṃ mūḍhaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:34084: tasmād apīyam ṣaṣṭhy abhijñā sarvabhūmiketi gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34093: īdṛśe rūpe īdṛśaṃ cittaṃ bhavatīti na cārūpyāṇāṃ rūpam ālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34100: tāni cāvasthāntarāṇy ātmanaḥ kāmāvacarāṇy abhiniṣpādanakāle tasyālambanam ity etasmāt tadbhūmikā nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34105: yatrāham abhūvam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātir evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuṣparyantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34107: tasmād api cyuto ['mutropapannaḥ tasmāc cyuta] ihopapanna iti sākāraṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmaratīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34108: na cārūpyāḥ sthānagotrādyālambanāḥ [Tib.323b] adhobhūmyālambanāś cety etasmād api kāraṇān nārūpyabhūmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34109: kathaṃ paracittajñānaṃ rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyam ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:34116: tasyaiva cittasya pratīpaṃ samanantaraniruddhāny avasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:34118: ekaṃ janma dve vā vilaṃghyāpi vyatikramyāpi smaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34121: na hi śuddhāvāsānām ihāgamanam asty anāgāmitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34128: dvividho hy anubhavo darśanānubhavaḥ śravaṇānubhavaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:34133: samanaṃtaraniruddhān manovijñānāt parakīyān nimittam udgṛhyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34138: ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñānāṃ [Tib.324a] tisṛṇāṃ yathākramaṃ laghutvamanasikaraṇam ṛddheḥ prayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34141: katham etā labhyaṃta iti prāptim adhikṛtya praśnaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34142: saṃmukhībhāvas tu citānām anucitānāṃ ca prayogata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:34149: anyatra śabdād iti uccheditvāc chabdo na nirmīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34155: yadi cakṣurabhijñā rūpāyatanālambanā kathaṃ tarhi cyutyupapādajñānenāmī bata bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:34159: tad vāṅmanaskarmasamanvāgamādi tena cakṣurjñānena na jānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:34169: na hi dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣurjñānaṃ śrotrajñānaṃ vāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:34203: ity ataś ca tisṛṇām eva vidyātvaṃ pūrvayātmaparavipaddarśanāt saṃvegotpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34210: etā hi pūrvāntāparāntamadhyasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayanti yathākramam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34211: kathaṃ punar gamyateti tisra evābhijñās tisro vidyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34220: naiva rttate pūrvenivāsacyutyupapadābhijñe na śaikṣyau nāśaikṣyau sāsravatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34232: vineyamanasām ādita ādau atibhṛśaṃ haraṃty ebhir iti prātihāryāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:34244: tad āsannam adhimucya tenāśv āgamanād ādhimokṣikīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34252: [Tib.326a] yast svātmano bahir nirmīyate siṃho nāgo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:34259: tad api dvividhāṃ svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham iti caturvidhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34263: yathā ca vastrābharaṇaiḥ svaśarīrasaṃbaddhair apy asattvasaṃkhyātatvāt indriyādhiṣṭhānāsaṃbandhatvād vā na samanvāgamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34281: tad dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ nirmāṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānabhūmiṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:34287: iti mauladhyānānām iva vairāgyato nirmāṇacittānāṃ lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34298: ūrdhvaṃ dvitīyādiṣu vijñaptisamutthāpakasya savitarkasya savicārasya cittasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34302: nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpy abhāva ity asantaṃ [Tib.327a] katham enaṃ nirmitaṃ bhāṣayantīti abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34305: nirmāṇacittena nirmitaṃ nirmāya tataś cādhiṣṭhāyāvasthānakāmatayā tiṣṭhatv etad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34306: tata uttarakālam anyena vijñaptisamutthāpakena savitarkasavicārakeṇa cittena vācaṃ pravartayanti nirmātāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34308: pūrvaṃ hi tena cetasi vyavasthāpitaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmāsyāmi tad adhiṣṭhāsyāmi tad vācayiṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34315: kadācid dhi devādayaḥ parānugrahārthaṃ parān nirmiṇvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:34327: tannirmitaś cāturmahābhautiko vaktavyo [Tib.327b] na cāturmahābhautiko vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34342: yasmāc cakṣurādibhir indriyaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ svaparaśarīrasambaddhaṃ nirmāṇaṃ rūparasaspraṣṭavyasvabhāvam avinirbhāgenāvasthitaṃ bhavan navāyatanikam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34343: na tv indriyaṃ nirmīyata iti eṣa siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34344: yat punas tad eva svaparaśarīrasambaddhaṃ nirmiṇoti tac caturāyatanikam eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:34350: yadi hy ete divi bhave divye ity artho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34352: atha tu divye iveti divye ity aupacārikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34360: vibhrāntaṃ kekaraṃ sarvataś ca na paśyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34363: pārśvato 'pi paśyati na tv evam adivyaṃ cakṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34365: ādiśabdena divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pūrvenivāsānusmṛtiḥ paracittajñānaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:34371: tatra rūpābhāvat dṛṣṭir gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:34377: atha vā sarvā apy abhijñā na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:34386: manuṣyāṇām etad yathoktam ṛddhyādikaṃ vairāgyalābhikaṃ tarkavidyauiadhakarmakṛtaṃ cāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:34395: upapattilābhikaṃ hi nāma yad upapattikāla eva sarveṣāṃ nisargato labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34396: na tu yat kasyacid evopapattikālād ūrdhvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34408: (VIII.1, 2) saptamād anantaram aṣṭamasya kośasthānasyopanyāse saṃbaṃdhaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:34410: jñānādhikāreṇa daśānām jñānānām adhikāreṇa jñānamayānāṃ jñānasvabhāvānāṃ praṇidhijñānābhijñānādīnāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ anyasvabhāvānāṃ tu [Tib.329a] samādhyādīnāṃ kartavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34411: sarvaguṇāśrayatvād iti kāmam ārūpyā api guṇāśrayā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:34430: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caittānām apy ekālaṃbanatve ekālambanatvaṃ cittānām ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34431: na punar ekālambanatā cittacaittānām ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34436: yena tu tāny ekāgrāni vartante samāhitāni.
T07yabhkvyu:34439: sa eva guṇo 'sya [Tib.329b] śauklam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34441: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvāt sarvaṃ cittam ekāgraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34442: kim idam ucyate yena tu tāny ekāgrāṇi vartante.
T07yabhkvyu:34445: yady etat syād dvitīyasya cittasya tasmāt samādheḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 664) [avikṣepaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34446: kasminn ālambane] na vikṣepo 'sminn ālambana iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34450: tatra kāritraṃ samādhir na karoti dvitīye karotīti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:34451: kiṃ ca yata eva ca kāraṇāt samādhir ekāgratālakṣaṇo 'bhipretaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34452: tata eva ca kāraṇāt cittānām ekālaṃbanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34456: na mahābhūmikatvāt samādheḥ sadbhāvāt sarvasya cittasyaikāgryatāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34461: saty api mahābhūmikatve samādher na sarvacittānām ekāgratāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34472: yathā hy adhiśīlam śikṣā śīlam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:34480: yathā cāsminn eva sūtre śīlaparīśuddhipradhānaṃ vimuktipariśuddhipradhānaṃ ity ukte.
T07yabhkvyu:34483: tathaiva cittapariśuddhir api na cittād anyā.
T07yabhkvyu:34493: tadyathā ya eva prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:34498: sa hy aṃgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganaddhābhyām ivāśvābhyāṃ ratho vahatīti yuganaddhavāhī.
T07yabhkvyu:34502: sukhā ca pratipad ity ukta iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:34517: tat pratirūpa eva hi nātibahuvilakṣaṇe kliṣṭe dhyānam iti saṃjñāsaṃniveśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34519: yathā kiṃcid abījaṃ pāṣāṇādy atyantatajjātivilakṣaṇam na pūtibījam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34524: sa kāmarāgaparyavasthitaḥ [Tib.331a] kāmarāgaparyavasthānam antarīkṛtvā dhyāyati pradhyāyatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34525: anena kāmarāgādiparyavasthānasyāpi dhyānatve sati na doṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:34527: yathā dhūmo 'treti dhūmavacanenāgnir apy ukto bhavati sāhacaryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34534: tathā hy ayoguḍāṃgārādiṣv agnir eva gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34537: anyathā hi dvaṃdve 'pīty agniśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34538: kathaṃ punaḥ sāhacaryeṇa hi prītisukhavān vicāro vinā vitarkeṇa nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:34546: prītisukhavatā vicāreṇa prītisukhena ca saṃprayuktaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34547: yadi punar vitarkaprītisukhavad iti sūtraṃ kriyeta ko doṣaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34551: vitarkavarjitaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam [Tib.331b] iti dhyānāntaram api dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:34553: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34555: ebhiś caturbhir aṃgair vitarkeṇa ca sarvaprathamoktena paṃcāṃgam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34557: avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34558: (Abhidh-k-vy 666) caturṇām eṣāṃ pūrvāṃgena vicāralakṣaṇena varjitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34560: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati vistareṇa yāvat sukhavihārīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34564: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād vistareṇa yāvad aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34565: sukhenāpy aṃgena varjitaṃ samādhir evātra kevalam avaśiṣyata ity ata eva sūtraṃ kṛtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:34583: vibhūtarūpasaṃjñā ity ākhyā eṣām iti vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34586: yadi hi syād hi syād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34591: na cāsati bhūte ārūpyāvacare saṃvarabhautikam ārūpyāvacaraṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34597: atha vārūpyāvacarasaṃvaraḥ syāt bhautikaṃ rūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34603: tatratyāni sāsravāṇy upādāya bhavatīty akalpaneyam asāmyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34605: anenaivopapattirūpapratiṣedhena samāpattāv api rūpapratiṣedha ukto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:34615: samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:34616: tad evaṃ nārūpyasamāpattiṣu nārūpyopapattiṣu rūpam astīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:34621: udakajaṃtukeṣv apy aṇutvād adṛśyarūpeṣu prasaṃgaḥ ārūpyaprasaṃga ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34625: antarābhavarūpāvacarā hi vajramayeṣv api parvateṣv acchatvād asajjamānā [Tib.333a] gacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:34639: tad evaṃ dhyānopapattirūpasya cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇāt kas tatra viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34640: ārūpyadhātau yad acchataratamābhyāṃ sāmānye 'pi ta evārūpyā iṣyaṃgte na rūpāvacarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34642: atha mataṃ dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā.
T07yabhkvyu:34650: yuktyā pratiṣidhya nārūpyadhātau rūpam astīti āgamaṃ parigṛhyāśaṃkitaṃ vāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:34652: ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti ced ity etat padaṃ pratyekaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34656: yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmakaṃ saṃsṛṣṭāv imau dharmau.
T07yabhkvyu:34663: tadyathāyuṣman śāriputra dve naḍakalāpyāv ākāśe ucchrite syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34669: evam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmaṃ ca rūpaṃ cānyonyaniśritaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34674: ārūpyaprasiddhikṣaṇe vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vacanāt tasmād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:34680: ahaṃ anyatra rūpād vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34681: tasya tad vāgvastv eva syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34682: asmād api cāgamād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyaty evaṃ cet.
T07yabhkvyu:34690: āyur ūṣmātha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahaty amī.
T07yabhkvyu:34691: apaviddhas tadā śete yathā kāṣṭham acetana
T07yabhkvyu:34698: tad api kāmarūpāvacaram eva saṃdhāyoktam iti lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34701: vijñānaṃ pratyayo 'syeti vijñānāpratyayaṃ nāmarūpam ity evaṃ ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhisamāse.
T07yabhkvyu:34702: kim atra sarvavijñānaṃ kāmāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ yāvad ārūpyāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34704: vayaṃ brūmo vijñānapratyayaṃ māmarūpam ity evaṃ sarvasya nāmarūpasya vijñānaṃ pratyaya ity avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:34705: na tu sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyaya ity avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:34706: kiṃcid vijñānaṃ nāmna eva pratyayo yad ārūpyāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34710: na tv asyaiva samuditasya nāmarūpasya pratyaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34712: tathā hy upapādukānāṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:34713: na nāmarūpam aniṣpannaṣaḍāyatanāvasthā hi paṃca skaṃdhā nāmarūpam (Abhidh-k-vy 669) ity ākhyāyante.
T07yabhkvyu:34715: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvāya saṃmūrchet.
T07yabhkvyu:34717: vijñānaṃ ced ānandāvakrāmya kṣipram evāpakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpam itthavtāya prajñāyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:34719: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda daharasya kumārasya kumārikāyā vā ucchidyeta vinaśyen na bhaved api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatām āpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:34724: kim atra sarvair etai rūpādibhir vinā tatpratiṣedha āgatigatipratiṣedhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34725: tatra pūrvasmāl lokād aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā ihopapattir āgatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34726: aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā punar asmāl lokāt paraloka upapattir gatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34732: yac cāyuṣman mahākauṣṭhila āyur iti vistareṇa yāvad rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhatīty anena sūtravacanena viśeṣitaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ vāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktaṃ yāvat sarvair eva tair vinā rūpādibhis tatpratiṣedha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34735: bāhyasyāpi hy ūṣmaṇa āyuṣā vinābhāvo na prāpnotīty aviśeṣavacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34736: na hy evaṃ viśeṣitaṃ yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmā ādhyātmika ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:34737: [Tib.335b] bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya kāṣṭhakuḍyāder asattvasaṃkhyātasya vijñānāśritatvaṃ prāpnoty aviśeṣavacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34739: yathā catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnām aviśeṣavacanād ārūpyadhātau tava rūpāstitvam.
T07yabhkvyu:34742: catvāra āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye.
T07yabhkvyu:34749: kāmāvacarāṇām ity aviśeṣitatvāt tava rūpārūpyadhātvor api kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34754: udāyisūtrādiṣu bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomayakāya upapadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34756: bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:34757: saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā [Tib.336a] ābhāsvare (Abhidh-k-vy 670) devanikāye utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:34758: tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃprabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣāḥ prītyahārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantīty evamādiṣu sūtreṣu vacanād aprasaṃgaḥ kavaḍīkārāhārasya.
T07yabhkvyu:34762: rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇam ārūpyā ity ekaṃ sūtram apavādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34763: ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyā iti dvitīyam.
T07yabhkvyu:34768: sati hi rūpe svaṃ rūpam avaśyaṃ saṃjānīrann iti sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti vacanaṃ noktaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:34774: ye te śāntā vimokṣā iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:34778: atikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān ity audārikam adhobhūmikaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāram abhisaṃdhāyoktam na rūpāvacaraṃ kavaḍīkārāhāraṃ sūkṣmam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34786: yady adhobhūmikaudārikaniḥsaraṇāt saty api svabhūmikarūpe ārūpyā ity ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:34787: vedanādiniḥsaraṇād ārūpyā avedanā iti kiṃ nocyante.
T07yabhkvyu:34789: ādiśabdena yāvad avijñānā iti kiṃ nocyante.
T07yabhkvyu:34795: [Tib.337a] yā kācid rūpajātiḥ audārikī vā sūkṣmā vā ādhyātmikī vā bāhyā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:34797: na vedanādijātiṃ na vedanāṃ sarvām atikrāntā ārūpyāḥ samāpattyupapattau.
T07yabhkvyu:34802: tasmād evaṃvādinām asmākaṃ na bhavaty ayaṃ prasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34807: yat tarhy uktaṃ sūtre nāhaṃ bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34810: tenaiva bhavena tasyaiva bhavasyāniḥsaraṇāt evam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:34813: na hi rūpabhavena kāmabhavasya niḥsaraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34826: prayogakāle ākāśādīny ālambanāni bhavanti anyadā tv anye 'pi dharmā yathāsaṃbhavam ālambanānīti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:34829: caturtha ārūpyaḥ kasmān na saṃjñīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34833: yena hi kāraṇena sa caturtha ārūpyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34839: yady api tatrāpy evaṃ prayujyata ity ādi.
T07yabhkvyu:34852: kasmāt tu tais tad evaṃ gṛhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34855: [Tib.338a] evaṃ gṛhyata iti naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñeti gṛhyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34856: tad evaṃ paripraśne vigṛhītasyāvaśyam idaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34871: evaṃ paṃcāṃgadhyānaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 672) nārthāntaram iti svamataṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:34913: caturthī uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ [Tib.339a] yāny aṃgāni dvitīye dhyāne.
T07yabhkvyu:34927: yāny aṃgāni tṛtīye dhyāne caturthe 'pi tāni.
T07yabhkvyu:34934: kasmāt tṛtīye dhyāne sukhaṃ dravyāntaram ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34936: tāny etāny aṣṭādaśadhyānāṃgāni bhavantīti vistareṇoktvā punar āha.
T07yabhkvyu:34946: nāsty eva caitasikaṃ sukheṃdriyaṃ triṣv api hi dhyāneṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:34951: teṣāṃ hi na dvibhūmikam eva sukhendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34956: ata eva ca vibhāṣāyāṃ bhadantena sautrāntikenoktam.
T07yabhkvyu:34957: ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ araghaṭṭeneva cakṣurvijñānādikam adhastād ūrdhvam ākṛṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:34962: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti svaśabdena vacanāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:34964: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānamān.
T07yabhkvyu:34966: yat tad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:34967: yadi hi tac caitasikaṃ syāt kathaṃ tat kāyena pratisaṃvedyet.
T07yabhkvyu:34972: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata ity evaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34974: caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhisukhaṃ bhūyo bhavati bahutaraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:34979: vedanāsukham eva tat tṛtīye dhyāne gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:34980: na caturthe sukhā vedanāstīti tatra nocyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:34985: taddvayoḥ sukham ity uktvā caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhiḥ sukhavedanānukūlā na bhavatīti noktā.
T07yabhkvyu:34989: vedanāsukham eva hi tatra bhavadbhir vyavasthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:34999: upekṣayaiva tu tatra tṛtīye dhyāne praśrabdhisukhavṛddheḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35000: na hy upaghātahetunaiva vṛddhir yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35001: katham upekṣayaiva tadvṛddhir ity ato bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35007: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35010: adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ sukhaṃ [prajñā] samādhiś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:35011: praśrabdhisukhayor ananyatve katham eṣāṃ paṃcatvaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35012: arthāntaratve ca sati kāyikam eva sukhaṃ triṣv api dhyāneṣv iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35015: samādhiviśeṣajena praśrabdhināmnā sukhavedanīyena sukhavedanānukūlena vāyunā kāyaspharaṇāt kāyadhmāpanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35019: yadi manyeta kāyvijñānotpattyā bahirvikṣepād bāhyaviṣayavikṣepāt samādhibhraṃśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35025: kāyasukhasya kāyavijñānasaṃprayuktasya veditasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvān nāsmāt samādhibhraṃśa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35029: ata eva kāraṇāt samādhyanukūlatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35030: tatsaṃmukhībhāvāntaraṃ hi punar upatiṣṭhate samādhir ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35031: kāmāvacareṇa kāyavijñānena rūpāvacarasya spraṣṭavyasyāgrahaṇād rūpāvacaram etat kāyavijñānaṃ na kāmāvacaram.
T07yabhkvyu:35032: ata eva tatsaṃprayogi sukhaṃ dhyānāṃgaṃ na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35035: tad dhi kāyendriyaṃ samāhitasya tām avasthāṃ gataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35038: spraṣṭavyaṃ ca praśrabdhilakṣaṇaṃ tadālaṃbanaṃ ca kāyavijñānaṃ spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne 'nāsrave api syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35040: mā bhūt kiṃcid aṃgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiṃcid anāsravam iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:35044: tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:35045: yāpi (Abhidh-k-vy 675) cittapraśrabdhir yāvad eva spraṣṭavyāni saṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartata iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35050: tasmād bodhyaṃgam ity upacaryate na tu bodhyaṃgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35053: anāsravatvānukūlatvāt te spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne anāsrave ity upacaryete.
T07yabhkvyu:35058: yāvad eva cakṣur yāvanti eva rūpāṇi yāvad eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35059: yāvad yāvān eva kāyo yāvanty eva spraṣṭavyāni yāvad eva kāyavijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35060: asya sūtrasya virodha iti evaṃ cen manyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:35063: tat praśrabdhivyatiriktānāṃ spraṣṭavyānāṃ kāyavijñānavyatiriktānāṃ ca kayavijñānānām abhisaṃdhivacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35065: nanv anāsrave 'nāsravavavyavasthāne kiṃcid aṃgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiṃcid anāsravaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35074: na tadā sāsravam ity adoṣa eṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35076: sukhasya kāyikasya prīteś ca mānasyāḥ asamavadhānād ayaugapadyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35077: na paṃcāṃgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ syād iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:35082: yathā savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam iti paryāyeṇa vitarkavicārau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35083: evaṃ sukhaprītī api saṃbhavaṃ praty upadeśād adoṣa eṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35085: vitarkavicārau paryāyeṇa bhavata iti sādhyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35096: āpekṣikī caudārikasūkṣmatā bhūmiprakārabhedād ity ā bhavāgrād vitarkavicārau syātām ity ādi.
T07yabhkvyu:35098: asmavadhānena ca na kaścid doṣa ucyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35106: na tu saṃjñādīnām aṃgatvam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35114: tathā vitarkavicārāv upakarau yathā smṛtiprajñe iṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:35117: yogācārabhūmidarśanena vicāryam etad iti tatra kautūhalaṃ pātayaty ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35119: kiṃ punar adhikṛtya vitarkādaya evāṃgatvena vyavasthāpitāḥ satsv anyeṣu dharmeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:35127: prathame tāvad dhyāne vitarko vicāraś ca pratipakṣāṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35135: prītisukhe cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṃge pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:35138: sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṃge yathākramaṃ pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:35139: caturthe dhyāne upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiś ca pratipakṣāṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35147: avasthāviśeṣo 'pi hi nāma cetasaś caitasiko bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35155: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35160: tayā hi tat samāhitam api cittaṃ kṣipyata ivonnamyata iva sāmodaṃ sahāsaṃ viplutam iva vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35162: tadā bhūmyantaraprāptā tajjātīyaiva vedanā sukham ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35176: mūladvayam ahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśalaṃ sadeti
T07yabhkvyu:35178: kiṃ punar ete pūrvasmin pakṣe kliṣṭeṣv api dhyāneṣu bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35182: kuśalamahābhūmikayoḥ praśrabdhyupekṣayor aparigrahād bhavata eva te ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:35192: yathā nivāte dīpo na kaṃpyate vāyunā.
T07yabhkvyu:35193: tadvad ity uktaṃ sūtra ity apara āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35199: yathādharabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmātukāmā nirmātāraḥ saṃmukhīkurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35202: tad dhi prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ kuśalaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikān nihīnaṃ nikṛṣṭam.
T07yabhkvyu:35207: na ca tadvipākena te 'rthina iti kuśalacittasaṃmukhīkaraṇe yatnaṃ na kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35212: adhobhūmivairāgyād (Abhidh-k-vy 678) vā asamanvāgatas tena śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate dhyānaṃ ārūpyaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:35213: kāmavairāgyāt prathamaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate triprakāram anyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35216: upariṣṭād adharāyāṃ bhūmāv upapadyamānas tal labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:35220: tasya vairāgyopapattikṛtaḥ sa lābho na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35227: syāc chuddhakaṃ parihāṇyā labheta parihāṇyā vijahyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35228: syāc chuddhakaṃ dhyānam upapattyā labheta upapattyā vijahyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35241: yadi brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā parihīyate punas tad dhānabhāgīyaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:35247: dvitīyādibhyo brahmaloka upapadyamāno hānabhāgīyaṃ tadbhūmikakleśavad eva labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:35255: yady ānupūrviko 'nāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa niyāmam avakrāmati na labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:35271: evam anyadhyānārūpyād anaṃtaraṃ daśa dravyāṇi yojyānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35283: tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāry utpadyanta ity evaṃ daśa bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35286: ūrdhvādharabhūmyālaṃbanatvād dhyānānam asti prasaṃga iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:35288: yamāt tad dharmajñānam adharāśrayakāmadhātvāśrayam adharālambanaṃ kāmaduḥkhādyālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35292: ūrdhvād adhobhūmike ca [Tib.346a] yāvat tṛtīyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35294: yadi kaścid evaṃ buddhim utpādyārdharātre candrodaye candrāstamaye vā mayā praboddhavyam iti svapet.
T07yabhkvyu:35295: sa pūrvābhiprāyānuvartanāt saṃtatateḥ tasminn eva kāle prabudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35300: nāpi svabhūmikaṃ nāpy adharabhūmikam utpadyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35302: śuddhakāt kliṣṭāc ca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikam eva kliṣṭam utpadyate nānyabhūmikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35305: kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddhakaṃ kliṣṭam ity evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35310: tad api śuddhakaṃ dhyānam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35316: na hi tadānīṃ śuddhakaṃ samāpattidhyānam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35318: svabhūmikādharordhvabhūmikaṃ pratisaṃdhicittaṃ kliṣṭam asamāhitam utpadyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35352: anyathā hi tasyottaratvam eva na sidhyed ekabhūmisthānāntaravat.
T07yabhkvyu:35353: ata evauttarādharye 'pi sthānāntarāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ trayāṇām aṣṭānāṃ [Tib.347a] caikabhūmitā sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35360: ārūpyasāmantakāni hy adharāṃ sāsravāṃ bhūmim ālaṃbate.
T07yabhkvyu:35363: yadi hy ārūpyā ity evocyeta āsvādanāsaṃprayuktā maulā ārūpyā na sāsravādharagocarā iti saṃbhāvyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:35366: dhyānāni hi maulāni api sāsravādharavastvālambanāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35369: anāsravā hy adharā dharmā maulānāṃ kuśalānāṃ ārūpyānām ālambanāni saṃbhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35372: anāsravaṃ tv ālambanam ity udgrāhya darśyati sarvānvayajñānapakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35374: anvayajñānapakṣa iti pakṣagrahaṇena duḥkhādyanvayajñānakṣāntayaḥ tatsahabhuvaś (Abhidh-k-vy 681) ca gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35387: apavādarūpeṇa sāmantakena śuddhakena kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35390: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhakena kleśā na prahīyanta ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:35400: na hi bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:35404: na ca nyūnam āśritya viśiṣṭānāṃ prahāṇaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35405: ity anena śuddhakenāpi kleśā na prahīyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35415: yena sāmantakena teṣāṃ maulānāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ praveśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35425: tāni ca sāmantakāni yatnavāhyāni sābhisaṃskāravāhyānīty ata upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:35430: yadi hy āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni syur vairāgyamārgo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35431: na hi tṛṣṇāsaṃprayukto mārgaḥ kleśaprahāṇāya (Abhidh-k-vy 682) bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35434: adhobhūmyudvegānapagamād vairāgyapathatvāc ceti dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35437: aṣṭāsv api dhyānārūpyeṣu yasya yat sāmantake.
T07yabhkvyu:35438: tasya tena sāmantakacittena kliṣṭenāsamāhitena saṃdhibandha ity eṣa siddhāntaḥ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35443: yathā hi tad anāsravam api saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35447: tad eva maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkāpaganmād viśiṣṭaṃ [sa] dhyānāntaram ity ucyate [Tib.349a] ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35463: samudayākāraś catvāro mārgākāraś catvāra ity ete daśākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35466: tasya duḥkhasya hetoś ca samudayād udvegāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35478: yathā hi kolam āśritya nadīm uttaran na kolaniṣṭho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35480: evaṃ mārgam āśritya na mārganiṣṭho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35487: anityaduḥkhataddhetvatikramābhimukha ity anuktam apy etad gamyata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:35490: yady api hi duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:35491: na tu tābhyāṃ tasmād duḥkhād udvegaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35496: na ca tābhyāṃ tasmān nirvāṇād udvegaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35512: śūnyatāśūnyatā [Tib.350a] hi śūnyatākāreṇāśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhim ālambate nāyam ātmīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35515: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yac chūnyatāśūnyatāsamādhiḥ śūnyatākāra eva.
T07yabhkvyu:35520: kim arthaṃ punaḥ śūnyatākārapravṛttaśūnyatāpṛṣṭhenotpattir na punar anātmākārapravṛttaśūnyatāpṛṣṭheneti.
T07yabhkvyu:35523: sa eva hi śūnyatākārapravṛttaśūnyatāsamādhis tasya śūnyatāśūnyatāsamādher utpattāv ānukūlyenāvatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:35525: na hy evam anātmadarśanam udvejayati yathā śūnyadarśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35526: dṛṣṭeṣv api hy anātmato bhaveṣv abhiratir asti saṃsāre śūnyadarśanābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35535: na hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārair anāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvād evānāsravasyāsamudayādilakṣaṇatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35537: so 'śaikṣaḥ samādhir dūṣayitavyo na ca mārgākārā dūṣaṇarūpā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35538: ato na mārgākārais taṃ samādhim ālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:35547: aśaikṣād ānimittāt samādher vyutthitasya tadanantaraṃ ye sāsravāḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmanti anye cānāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35551: teṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anyānāsravāṇāṃ cotpattikāle teṣām aśaikṣāṇāṃ ānimittakṣaṇānām apratisaṃkhyānirodho labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35559: tat saṃyogasya visaṃyogāya yatas te yatante.
T07yabhkvyu:35565: śatrūpagraheṇa hi loke māryopaghātaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35572: anyathā hi śāntākāreṇa tadviśiṣṭena nālambitaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35573: nirodhākāreṇa hy anityatānirodhenaiva dūṣita evāsāv apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35574: taddūṣaṇena nāśaikṣa ānimittasamādhidūṣitaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35583: tathā hi saty apy apratisaṃkhyānirodhe keṣāṃcit kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taiḥ saṃprayukta eva tatprāptyavicchedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:35591: tebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāratvād āsaṃgāspadabhūtebhyo 'śaikṣebhyaḥ śūnyatādisamādhibhyo vaimukhyārtham aparasamādhīn samāpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35593: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:35594: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:35595: asti samādhibhāvanāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāprabhedāya saṃvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:35596: asti samādhibhāvanā (Abhidh-k-vy 685) āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā āsravakṣayāya saṃvartata iti sūtraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35610: iti dhyānasaṃgṛhītā eva mānasā vimuktimārgāḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35613: pūrvaka eva tu pakṣo abhidharmakośacintakānām ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35630: amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā ity evamādivikalpād darśanaṃ cakṣurvijñānasaṃprayuktā prajñā avikalpikā.
T07yabhkvyu:35634: atra tu samādhisaṃprayogāt prāyogikānāṃ [Tib.352b] guṇānāṃ samādhibhāvanety upacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35638: ātmana upanāyikā ātmano deśikety arthaḥ bodhisattvo hi karmāntapratyavekṣaṇāya niḥkrānto jambumūle prathamaṃ dhyānam utpāditavān.
T07yabhkvyu:35639: bodhimūle ca devaputramāraṃ bhaṃktvā prathame yāme divyaṃ cakṣur utpāditavān.
T07yabhkvyu:35640: tena divyena cakṣuṣā sattvāṃś cyutyupapattisaṃkaṭasthān abhivīkṣya tatparitrāṇāya madhyame yāme dhyānavimokṣasamāpattiḥ saṃmukhīkṛtavān.
T07yabhkvyu:35642: tatas tṛtīye yāme caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakramya yāvad vajropamena samādhinā sarvasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ kṛtavān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35663: alobhasvabhāvā cādveṣasvabhāvā ca yujyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35666: atas tu naiko dharma ubhayasvabhāva iti grahītavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35677: kāmadhātubhūmikāni anāgamyabhūmikāni ca maitryādīni trīṇi maulapramāṇasadṛśāni vidyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35679: tair apramāṇais tribhis tān kleśān viṣkaṃbhya prahāṇamārgaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35682: apakṣapātivenāpy anunīto nāpi pratihata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35685: sukham astīty adhimokṣāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35690: āśayaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ sukhitā bata sattvā ity ete cittacaittāḥ saparivārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35708: duḥkhāpanayanākāratvāc ca karuṇā (Abhidh-k-vy 687) duḥkhopasaṃhārākārāyā vihiṃsāyāḥ pratipakṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35710: upekṣā ca mādhyasthyāt kāmarāgavyāpādayoḥ pratipakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35716: ṣaṭpaṃcadaśabhūmikatvāt trayāṇām api kāraṇam ucyate saṃbhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35719: ṣaṭbhūmikavyāvasthāne 'nāgamyaṃ sāmantakam apīṣyate [Tib.354a] sāmantakāny api prayogabhūtāni gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35723: na hi śuddhakair mauladhyānaiḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity uktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:35735: yasmād ānantaryamārgair laukikair lokottarair vā mārgair vyāpādādayaḥ kleśopakleśā dūrīkriyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35741: tair apramāṇais tribhis tān kleśān viṣkaṃbhya prahāṇamārgair ānantaryamārgaiḥ prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:35743: vyāpādādipratyayalābhe 'pi balavati sati taiḥ kleśair anādhṛṣyo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35751: pūrvapuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt samucchinnakuśalamūle 'pi pudgale śakyaṃ guṇagrāhiṇānena bhavituṃ puṇyam anena kṛtam āsīd yenāsya rūpādisaṃpad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35752: pratyekabuddhe ca doṣagrāhiṇā nūnam anenāpuṇyaṃ kṛtam āsīd yenāsyaivaṃ rūpādivaikalyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35753: api eva duḥkhād vimucyerann ity adhimucyamānaḥ karuṇāyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 688) prayujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35754: apy evābhipramoderann ity adhimucyamāno muditāyāṃ prayujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35763: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīty ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35764: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi [Tib.355a] paśyatīty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35765: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35766: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35769: punar aparaṃ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānaṃtaṃ vijñānam anaṃtaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35772: punar aparaṃ sarvaśo vijñānānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35775: punar aparaṃ sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35778: punar aparaṃ sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñānirodhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya [Tib.355b] viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:35781: svātmani rūpāṇi vibhāvya bahir api rūpāṇi paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35784: adhirāgasya varṇarāgādipratipakṣam ārabhya saṃbhavato vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35789: etau ca dvau punar dūrībhāvapratipakṣau veditavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:35794: niyatam asau tadgrāhakād api vijñānād viraktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35802: [Tib.356a] pūrvasmiṃs tu pakṣe maraṇabhavāvasthāyām evāsamāhitā ārūpyā iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:35818: tatra samāpattyāvaraṇaṃ yasminn āvaraṇe cittākarmaṇyatā traidhātukavītarāgā api saṃtaḥ prathamam api maulaṃ dhyānaṃ notpādayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:35835: te ca sapta sāmantakāni hitvānyāsv ekādaśasu bhūmiṣu kāmadhātāv anāgamye dhyānāntareṣu dhyanārūpyeṣu cāṣṭāsv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:35836: sopasaṃkhyānaṃ śāstram iti śāstralakṣaṇaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35849: ata āha aśubhayā līnāṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ veti.
T07yabhkvyu:35865: imaṃ tu kālam avatiṣṭhatām iti tathāyuṣā utsargaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35866: ādiśabdena sumeroḥ paramāṇau praveśa ity evam anyac ca sūtre draṣṭavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35874: upasaṃpadya viharatīti tāṃ samāpadya samāpattiṃ viharatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35884: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaraḥ yāvad idaṃ dvitīyam abhibhvāyatanam.
T07yabhkvyu:35887: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavad yāvad idaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35888: tathā adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśayti adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavad yāvad idaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:35889: tathā adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī paśyaty adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavat yāvād idaṃ caturtham abhibhvāyatanam ity etāni catvārīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35892: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni.
T07yabhkvyu:35893: tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 691) tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35895: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni.
T07yabhkvyu:35896: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ pītam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35898: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni.
T07yabhkvyu:35899: tadyathā baṃdhūkapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ lohitam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35901: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati avadātāny avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni avadātanirbhāsāni.
T07yabhkvyu:35902: tadyathā uśanastārakā saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastram avadātam [Tib.358b] iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35907: yathā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35908: ātmagataṃ rūpaṃ paśyan bahirgataṃ rūpaṃ paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35910: tayor hy ekam ātmagataṃ rūpaṃ paśyan bahirgataṃ paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:35912: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35914: ayaṃ tu viśeṣo bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty adhimātrāṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:35915: kiṃ ca yathā prathamo vimokṣaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikaḥ kāmāvacaravarṇarāgapratipakṣaḥ kāmāvacararūpāyatanālambanaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:35919: yathādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīty evaṃlakṣaṇo dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35922: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñībahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānīti tṛtīyaḥ paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35923: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty adhimātrāṇīti caturthaḥ paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35924: kiṃ ca yathā dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikavarṇarāgapratipakṣaḥ [Tib.359a] kāmāvacararūpālaṃbanaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:35928: yathā śubho vimokṣaś caturthadhyānabhūmikaḥ kāmāvacaramanojñarūpāyatanālambanaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:35930: kevalaṃ tv iha varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ vibhajya gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35937: kathaṃ cābhibhvāyatanair ālaṃbanābhibhavanam ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:35943: śubhato 'pi ca sāṃkleśikaṃ vastv ākārayataḥ kleśānutpattes tair abhibhvāyatanair ālaṃbanābhibhavanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:35945: nirantaraṃ kṛtsnānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ spharaṇād vyāpanāt tasmāt kṛtsnāyatanānīty [Tib.359b] ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:35948: āpas tejaś ca vāyuś ca dhātur eva tathāpi ceti
T07yabhkvyu:35979: ārūpyadhātau rūpadhātau vā yasyāṃ bhūmāv upapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:35990: kaścid ārūpyasamāpattiṃ samāpadya tataś ca parihāyānantaram eva rūpadhātāv upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35991: ārūpyasamāpattilakṣaṇasya sabhāgahetor balīyastvāt tasya rūpadhātāv ārūpyasamāpattir utpatsyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35993: yadi kaścid ārūpyasamāpattim (Abhidh-k-vy 693) abhīkṣṇaṃ samāpadya tataś ca parihāya rūpadhātāv upapadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35994: tasyārūpyasamāpattilakṣaṇasya sabhāgahetor balīyastvād rūpadhātāv ārūpyasamāpattir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:35995: evaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter [Tib.360b] api parihīṇasyākāśānantyāyatanopapannasya tathaiva tatsamāpattīnām utpādanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36000: na hy adhastād avītarāgeṇordhvam ārūpyadhātau śakyam upapattum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36004: na hy adhastād avītarāgeṇordhvaṃ śakyam upapattum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36012: eṣām eva dharmāṇām udbhūtavṛttīnāṃ pūrvadhyānavāsanādhipatyāt tadutpattāv upadeśam antareṇa dhyānotpattāv ānuguṇyaṃ dharmatā prakṛtiḥ svabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36017: tatra saṃvartanīkāle kuśalānāṃ karmapathānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36018: vṛttis teṣām eva dharmāṇāṃ yat kāritram.
T07yabhkvyu:36019: udbhūtā utkṛṣṭā vṛttir eṣām ity udbhūtavṛttayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36023: teṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ prakarṣeṇātmalābhāt tadutpattyānuguṇyenātmalābhāt tadupadeśam antareṇānyataḥ pūrvadhyānavāsanāyāṃ satyāṃ dhyānotpattir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36025: sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmānāṃ dhātubhūmyālaṃbanākārādiprakārā yathāyogam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36026: dhātāras tasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:36027: tasyāgamādhigamātmakasya saddharmasya yathāsaṃkhyam āgamasya ye vaktāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36035: eṣa eva pakṣo yukta iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36039: eṣa eva śāstro 'bhidharmo Jñānaprasthānādilakṣaṇo deśitaḥ ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36043: vibhāṣayā dīvyanti vaibhāṣikā iti vyākhyātam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:36061: saddharmasyāgamādhigamalakṣaṇasya nītau varṇane munayo buddhā bhagavanto buddhaputrāś cāryaśāradvatīputrādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvākārasarvadharmāvabodhe āptā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36066: sākṣāddraṣṭari sākṣī mārgāmārgajño bhagavān iti yo 'dhigatatattvo bhagavataḥ sākṣijanaḥ sahāyabhūtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36080: ityādi pūrvaślokoktasyārthasya heturūpo 'yaṃ dvitīyaḥ śloka upanyasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36111: tad atra moktukāmaiḥ pramādo na kartavya ity arthād uktam ācāryena.
T07yabhkvyu:36118: vitathāyām ātmadṛṣṭau niviṣṭāḥ kutīrthyā vitathātma [Tib.362b] dṛṣṭiniviṣṭāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36123: sāhaṃkāre manasi na śamaṃ yāti janmaprabandho
T07yabhkvyu:36124: nāhaṃkāraś calati hṛdayād ātmadṛṣṭau ca satyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36125: anyaḥ śāstā jagati ca yato nāsti nairātmyavādī
T07yabhkvyu:36126: nānyas tasmād upaśamavidhes tvanmatād asti mārga
T07yabhkvyu:36133: yāni vā punar ihaikatyānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāni tānīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36134: ātmadṛṣṭau ca satyām ātmasnehādayaḥ kleśāḥ pravartante.
T07yabhkvyu:36137: nānyasminn abhidheye skaṃdhasaṃtānavyatirikte kalpita ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36140: pratyakṣasyānumānasya cābhāvān na tasyāstitvam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36144: pratyakṣaṃ tadupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣata upalabdhir ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36145: atha vā pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam upalabdhir upalabhyate 'nayety upalabdhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36149: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 698) dharmāyatanasya ca vedanādilakṣaṇasya yogiviṣayasya cāgamavikalpātītasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:36154: raktaṃ vā dviṣṭaṃ vā sukhasaṃprayuktaṃ vā duḥkhasaṃprayuktaṃ vā ity evamādi svasaṃvedyatayety apare.
T07yabhkvyu:36155: tad etad dvividhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ grāhyagataṃ grāhakagataṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:36163: bhāve ca tasya bījasya punarbhavo 'ṃkurasya dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36165: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntam upanyasya dārṣṭāṃtikam upadarśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:36167: vidyamāna eva saṃmukhīprāpte viṣaye rūpādike manaskāre ca tajje kāraṇe.
