T07yabhkvyu:36174: atas tatrāpi kāraṇāṃtarasya kasyāpi anirbhinnarūpasyābhāvo bhāvaś ca yathāsaṃkhyam eva niścīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36190: sa hy anaṃdhābadhirādyāvasthāyāṃ tasya paṃcavijñānakāyalakṣaṇasya svakāryasya janako bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36195: kāraṇāṃtaram atrāstīty etāvad eva hi paricchidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36198: maharṣipraṇidhijñānaparicchinnatvād asty eva cakṣurādikaṃ indriyaṃ cakṣurvijñānādikāraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36200: na caivam ātmato 'stīti nāsty ātmeti nigamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36211: na vānmātreṇāsiddho 'yaṃ hetur iti pratyavasthātavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36214: anena vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭalakṣaṇo hetur anaikāṃtika iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36217: atha vā prākpakṣavirodhasāpakṣālo 'yaṃ pakṣo nāsty ātmety anena darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36220: tannikāye prajñaptisatpudgala ity adoṣa eṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36221: kiṃ vedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptita iti codita acārya āha.
T07yabhkvyu:36223: yadi yathā rūpādiḥ śabdāder bhāvāntaram abhiprīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36228: tṛṇakāṣṭheṣṭīkādibhyaḥ hastyaśvarathādibhyaś ca na bhāvāntaram iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36230: teṣām eva samudāyamātram ity evaṃ cet.
T07yabhkvyu:36232: na hi rūpādibhyas ṭṛṇādibhyo hastyādibhyo vā kṣīragṛhaseneti vā kaścid bhāvo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:36233: kiṃ cātaḥ kaś cāto doṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36234: yadi tāvad dravyata iti pakṣaḥ āśrīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36235: sa pudgalo bhinnasvabhāvatvāt bhinnasvalakṣaṇatvāt skaṃdhebhyo 'nyo vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36247: varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaś carmaṇy asti tayoḥ [Tib.365a] phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36258: yadi tathā pudgala iti prajñaptir asatpudgalaḥ prāpnotīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36262: teṣv eva skaṃdheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnotīty arthaḥ atha vā (Abhidh-k-vy 700) pudgalaprajñapteḥ skaṃdhāḥ pratyayo na pudgalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36269: yo hi bhāvo nānyo nānanya iti svam upādāya prajñapyamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36272: yadi hy anyaḥ syād iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:36281: tena hi tad idhyate dahyate ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:36288: idhyate dahyate ceti paryāyāv ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:36290: indhanaṃ cāgniś caitad ubhayam apy aṣṭadravyakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36291: cetvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36301: tayor api siddham anyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36302: tayor apy agnīndhanayor evaṃlakṣaṇayoḥ siddham anyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36307: na hi tat tasya kāraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36326: anyad apīti na kevalam auṣṇyam uṣṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:36327: anyad api tatpradīptāgnisaṃbandhaṃ bhūmyādikam uṣṇaṃ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:36338: paṃcavidhaṃ jñeyam iti kathaṃ tarhi vaktavyam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:36339: naiva hi tad atītādibhyaḥ paṃcamaṃ nāpaṃcamaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36342: cakṣurādiṣu satsu tasyopalambhāt tāni cakṣurādīny upādāya rūpaṃ prajñapyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36345: na tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā no veti.
T07yabhkvyu:36347: evaṃ yāvad dharmo vā no veti.
T07yabhkvyu:36351: cakṣurvijñeyāni ced rūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ prativibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīraṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36361: yāvat spraṣṭavyānīti yady ucyeta kṣīrasyodakasya vā catuṣṭvaṃ prasajyet.
T07yabhkvyu:36362: catuḥprakāraṃ kṣīram udakaṃ vā prāpnotīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36364: ato yathā rūpādīny eva samastāni samuditāni kṣīram ity udakam iti vā prajñapyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36365: tathā skandhā eva samastāḥ pudgala iti prajñapyanta iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36366: rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti rūpāṇy ualabhamānaḥ pudgalam upalabhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36373: sa ca pudgalas tebhyo rūpebhyo 'nyo na vaktavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36376: yathā rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36378: tad api rūpaṃ tebhya ālokādibhyo 'nyan na vaktavyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36389: upalabdher ekatve rūpapudgalayoḥ paricchedo na prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36398: śrotravijñeyān śabdān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti ko 'sya vākyasyārthaḥ kiṃ tāvac chabdaḥ pudgalopalabdheḥ [Tib.367b] kāraṇaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:36399: āhosvic chabdān upalabhamānaḥ pudgalam upalabhata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36400: yadi tāvac chabdāḥ pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:36402: evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py ālokaśrotramanaskārebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36407: yadi tayaiva śabdād abhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:36409: ayaṃ ca śabdo 'yaṃ pudgala iti katham idaṃ paricchidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36420: tac ca nīlāt pītam anyad iti pratītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36423: evaṃ kṣaṇād api kṣaṇāntaram anyad ity udāhāryam.
T07yabhkvyu:36430: nīlād iva pītaṃ [Tib.368a] kṣaṇād iva kṣaṇāntaram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36431: bhinnalakṣaṇe viṣaye abhinnalakṣaṇe ca bhinnakālopalabdhyānyatvaṃ darśitam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:36434: yathā rūpapudgalayor anyānanyatvam avaktavyam evaṃ tadupalabdhyor apy anyānanyatvam avaktavyam ity evaṃ yadi brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36435: tena tarhi saṃskṛtam apy avaktavyaṃ bhavati tadupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ saṃskṛtam apy etad avaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36441: yady evaṃ rūpāṇi no veti na vaktavyaḥ kiṃ tarhi etad bhagavatoktaṃ rūpam anātmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:36443: evaṃ hi bruvato vaktavya eva pudgalo nāvaktavya iti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36452: anena copanyāsena dharmiviśeṣaviparyayapratijñādoṣa udbhāvyata ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36454: dvayaṃ pratītya na tu trayaṃ pratītyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:36464: tathā śabdād anyaḥ pudgala iti pakṣaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36471: svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavantīti vacanāt pudgalena pratyanubhavantīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36475: tathāpi tu manaś caiṣām indriyāṇāṃ pratisaraṇam iti tadapekṣāṇīndriyāṇi vijñānotpattau [Tib.369a] kāraṇaṃ bhavantīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36480: yadi na kasyacid vijñānasya viṣaya na tarhi vijñeyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36481: tataś ca paṃcavidhaṃ jñeyam iti svasiddhānto bādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36482: yady evaṃ sūtre vacanān nānyad anyasya gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatīti paṃcānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ pramāṇīkriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36484: svaviṣayāvyabhicāre ca na cakṣurvijñānādibhir vijñeyaḥ pudgalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36485: tad evaṃ sati manaindriyasyāpy avyabhicāraḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:36486: ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇīti vistareṇa sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36487: kukkurapakṣiśṛgālaśiśumārasarpamarkaṭāḥ ṣaṭprāṇakāḥ kenacid baddhā madhye granthiṃ kṛtvotsṛṣṭāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36490: evam eva ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇi svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayam ākāṃkṣante.
T07yabhkvyu:36492: atha saty api sūtravacane manaindriyasya vyabhicāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36494: vyabhicāre ca cakṣurvijñānādibhir vijñeyaḥ pudgalo bhaviṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36497: tatra ṣaṭprāṇakopame sūtre nendriyam eva cakṣurādikam indriyaṃ kṛtvoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36500: yasmād eṣāṃ darśanaśravaṇādyākāṃkṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati rūpasvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36505: tadādhipatyādhyāhṛtaṃ tu manovijñānam indriyam ity uktam indriyam iveti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:36507: yadi hi cakṣurādidvāreṇa cakṣurvijñānādi notpannaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36508: katham anyathā vikalpakaṃ manovijñānam utpannaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36511: tan manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādīndriyabhūtaṃ svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ rūpādikam ākāṃkṣatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36512: yac ca tat kevalam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36513: naiva tadanyeṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayam ākāṃkṣati yan mana-ādhipatyādhyāhṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36517: yady evaṃ manaindriyasyāpy [Tib.370a] avyabhicāraḥ prāpnotīti yad uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36521: tasmād vijñeyo 'py asau pudgalo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36522: nanu cāsāv arthād abhijñeyaḥ parijñeyaś ca na bhavatīty uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36530: nītārthaṃ ca sūtraṃ pratisaraṇam uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36538: yatraiva prajñaptiḥ kṛtā ātmeti vyavahārārthaṃ tām evātmety abhiniviṣṭa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36545: yogy api nāsti yaḥ śūnyatām abhyasyātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36546: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati yāvaj jīvadṛṣṭir iti prathamā ādinavo nirviśeṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36549: śūnyatāyām (Abhidh-k-vy 705) asya cittaṃ na praskandati yāvan nādhimucyata iti caturthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36550: āryadharmā asya na vyavadāyanta iti paṃcamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36552: buddhavacanam eṣāṃ na pramāṇam ity abhiprāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36556: na ca sūtraṃ bādhate na ca sūtrāntaraṃ bādhate.
T07yabhkvyu:36561: na caiteṣv ātmā vidyata iti anātmānaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36563: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvan mano dharmān iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36565: nātmā skaṃdhāyatanadhātava iti vacane yat kaścit pūrvaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vety uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:36570: yadīmān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān samanusmarantaḥ samanvasmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā na pudgalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36572: aham iti vacanāt pudgala ucyate iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36575: apāṭha eva cātra śaraṇaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36576: aham iti pāṭhe hi sati satkāyadṛṣṭiparigrahaprasaṃgaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36581: rūpe ātmety evaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36587: rāśidṛṣṭāntena bahuṣu dharmeṣu pudgalaprajñaptiṃ darśayati dhārādṛṣṭāntena bahutve sati rūpavedanādīnāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ pravāhe pudgalaprajñaptiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:36599: bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36600: [Tib.371b] bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:36601: tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye.
T07yabhkvyu:36607: yad asyā eva tṛsṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāḥ tatratatrābhinandinyāḥ aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgamaḥ bhārahāraḥ katamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36609: yo 'sāv āyuṣmān evaṃnāmā evaṃjanya evaṃgotraḥ evamāhāraḥ evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuṣmanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36614: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36619: ity artham eva ceti vistareṇa sarvam uktvā vaktavyaṃ mānyatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:36620: yadi dravyasan syāt pudgalaḥ bhārahāraḥ katamaḥ pudgala iti syād vacanīyam ity etāvad evoktaṃ syāt tatra sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:36622: yo 'sāv āyuṣmān iti vistareṇa yāvad āyuḥparyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36623: [Tib.372a] prajñaptisatpudgalapratipattyarthaṃ hy etat pareṇa viśeṣaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36624: sa eva tu prajñaptisan kuto vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36625: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vāvaktavyo vā dravyasatpudgala iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36627: tatra ye upaghātāya saṃvartante duḥkhahetavaḥ skaṃdhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36634: yasmād yathāparikalpitasya pudgalasya satyeṣu duḥkhādisu nānantarbhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36635: na hi pudgalo duḥkhaṃ yāvan mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36637: yā hi dṛṣṭir yasmin satye vipratipannā.
T07yabhkvyu:36640: bhāvanāprahātavyo hi kleśo bhāvanāprahātavyam (Abhidh-k-vy 707) eva vastu duḥkaṃ samudayaṃ vālaṃbata ity evaṃ tasyā bhāvanāprahātavyatvaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36641: na ca pudgalas tayor aṃtarbhūta ity ato bhāvanāprahātavyā sā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36642: atha vā na kadācid api dṛṣṭir bhāvanāprahātavyeti nāsau bhāvanāprahātavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:36648: utpadyata iti vacanād utpattimattvam asyābhyupagataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36649: tataś ca saṃskṛta iti vaktavyo bhavadbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36652: yathā hi yājñiko jāta iti vidyopādānād ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36659: ya imāṃś caihikāṃ skandhān nikṣipati tyajaty anyāṃś ca pāratrikān skaṃdhān pratisaṃdadhāti upasaṃgṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:36661: anyatra dharmasaṃketād iti pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāntenāha yad utāsmin satīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36663: ahaṃ ced evaṃ vadeyam upādatta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36664: atra te kalpaḥ syād vacanāya ko nu bhadanta upādānam upādatta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36665: tasmān nāsti skandhānāṃ kaścid upādātā nāpi nikṣipteti.
T07yabhkvyu:36675: yathopādeyāyā vidyāyā liṃgāc ca śarīrasya anyatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36676: evam upādeyāt skandhāt pudgalasyānyatvam upādātṛtvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36677: jīrṇaṃ taṃ śarīrāntaram eva vyādhitaṃ ceti pratikṣaṇam anyatvam avasthānād ity abhiprāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36678: tatra yad uktaṃ jīrṇo jāto vyādhito jāta ity asiddho dṛṣṭānta iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36679: athāpi syād avasthitasya śarīrasyāvasthāntaranirvṛttāv avasthāntaraprādurbhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36680: tac ca nāpratiṣiddho hi sāṃkhyeyaḥ pariṇāmavādaḥ pūrvasmin kośasthāne.
T07yabhkvyu:36682: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36684: tad eva cedaṃ tathety apūrvikā vācoyuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36688: pākṣika eva doṣa iti ekasmin pakṣe ayaṃ doṣavāda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36689: bhūtamātrikapakṣa iti sthavirabuddhadevapakṣe nāsmatpakṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36692: bhūtamātrikapakṣe 'pi bhūtebhyo rūpavat skandhebhyo nānyaḥ pudgala ity upagataṃ bhavatīti svasiddhāntaḥ parityāgaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36694: tac charīram anyo veti na vyākṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36696: yadi skandheṣu pudgalopacāraḥ kasmāc charīram eva jīva iti noktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36701: yadi pudgalo nāvaktavyaḥ kasmān nokto nāsty eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:36706: bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmoham āpadyeteti ucchedadṛṣṭisahagataṃ dṛṣṭyantaram utpādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36708: abhūn me ātmā sa me etarhi nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36725: yathā vyāghrī nātiniṣṭhureṇa dantagrahaṇena svapotam apaharati nayati.
T07yabhkvyu:36726: māsya daṃṣṭrayā śarīraṃ kṣataṃ bhūd iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36727: nāpy atiśithilena dantagrahaṇena tam apaharati māsya bhraṃśapāto 'smin visaye bhūd iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36729: apaharatīty apare [Tib.374a] paṭhanti sthānāntarād apaharaty apanayatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36749: saṃvṛtisann api pudgalo nāstīti kaścid gṛhṇīyād ity ato
T07yabhkvyu:36753: yadi bhūtārthena pudgalo 'sti kim iti kṛtvā bhagavān asti pudgala iti na bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36754: na hi rūpam astīti vacane doṣo bhavati tasyāstitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36756: nirgranthaśrāvakeṇa caṭakaṃ jīvantaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36757: kim ayaṃ caṭako jīvati na veti.
T07yabhkvyu:36758: tasyāyam abhiprāyaḥ yadi śramaṇo gautama ādiśej jīvatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36760: yadi punar bhagavān evam ādiśen mṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36762: kathaṃ nāmāyam ajña iti loko jānīyād iti tasyābhinveśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36763: bhagavatā tu tasyāśayaṃ viditvā na vyākṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36764: tvaccittapratibaddham evaitaj jīvati vā na veti cety evābhihitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36767: śāśvato loko 'śāśvato loka ity anena catuṣkena antavān loko 'naṃtavān ity ayaṃ catuṣkas tulyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36772: sa jīvas tac charīram anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram iti dvikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36773: trayaś catuṣkāḥ ekaś ca dvika iti caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūnīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36778: kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryāsyatīti anena antavān iti aśāśvata iti ca pṛṣṭaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36779: āhosvid ekadeśo lokasyety anenāntavāṃś cānantavāṃś ceti (Abhidh-k-vy 710) śāśvataś cāśāśvataś ceti ca pṛṣṭaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36781: tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaṃ santam eva pudgalaṃ vyākarotīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36784: sārvajñam ity aṇ bhāvapratyayo yauvanam iti yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:36785: na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā na veti.
T07yabhkvyu:36786: paśyati na paśyati na vaktavyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36788: sarvajño vā bhagavān na veti na vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36800: sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavateti vistareṇa yāvad apadṛṣṭāntā eta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36801: kim idam upādāyety ārabhyaitad apareṣāṃ vyākhyānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36811: saptasūryodayasūtre 'yam eva bhagavān ṛṣiḥ sunetro nāma babhūveti.
T07yabhkvyu:36817: [Tib.375b] yathā sa evāgnir yaḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭo dahann āgata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36823: ātmadṛṣṭāv ātmīyadṛṣṭau ca satyām ātmasneha ātmīyasnehaś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36824: ity ato rāgo bandhanam iti kṛtvā dṛḍhīkṛtabandhanānāṃ satāṃ mokṣo dūrībhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:36831: tatra saṃjñā sānvayo hetur asyeti smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayaś cittaviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36835: evam ubhayaviśeṣaṇe kṛte pṛcchati kīdṛśāc cittaviśeṣād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36839: yatra tena sadṛśāḥ saṃbaṃdhinaś ca saṃjñādayo ye te vidyante 'syeti tadābhogasadṛśasaṃbaṃdhisaṃjñādimāṃś cittaviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36841: [Tib.376a] āśrayaviśeṣaś ca śokataś ca vyākṣepataś cādir eṣām iti āśrayaviśeṣaśokavyākṣepādīni.
T07yabhkvyu:36848: sambandhisaṃjñādimataḥ yatrāntareṇāpi sādṛśyaṃ dhūmādidarśanāt smṛtir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36849: praṇidhānanibaṃdhābhyāsādimataś ca yatra praṇidhānam atra kāle smartavyam abhyāso vāsya tatsmartavyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:36873: atha devadattānubhavacittānusmaraṇacittayor anyatvapratijñāyām idaṃ dūṣaṇam udgrāhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:36875: bhavatsiddhānte 'pi hi devadattānubhavacittānubhūtam arthaṃ tatsmaraṇacittaṃ smaratīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36876: na ca brūmo 'nyena cetasā dṛṣṭam anyat anyat smaratīti.
T07yabhkvyu:36882: tad evedaṃ yan mayā dṛṣṭam iti smaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:36885: yat tarhi caitraḥ smaratīti tat katham iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36888: saṃskārasamūhasaṃtānas tasya gavākhyasya deśāṃtaravikārotpattau [Tib.377a] deśāntarotpattau vikārotpattau ca kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasikṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:36907: ata eva cocyate yathāyogam ity eṣa viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36913: yathā kasya kaḥ svāmīti vistareṇa yāvat kva ca punar vijñānaṃ viniyoktavyaṃ yata etasya svāmī mṛgyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36918: tad eva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36922: [Tib.377b] hetur eva tarhi svāmīti vistareṇa yāvad yo hy eva heturvijñānasya tasyaivāsau.
T07yabhkvyu:36923: yaś cāpi sa caitrābhidhāna iti vistareṇa yāvan na tatrāpi hetubhāvaṃ vyatītyāsti svāmibhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:36932: yathā jvālā gacchati śabdo gacchatīti gacchatiśabdābhidhānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36935: anena dṛṣṭāntena vijānāti devadatta iti sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:36947: tadyathā nādasya kāraṇaṃ ghaṇṭeti ghaṇṭā rautīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36954: evaṃ cittānāṃ saṃtāne vijñānam ity upacaryate.
T07yabhkvyu:36956: tat saṃtānarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃtaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36959: yathā bhavitū rūpasya bhāvāj janitur jāteḥ sthātuḥ sthiter anarthāntaratvam.
T07yabhkvyu:36965: yadi nātmano vijñānam utpadyate vijñānalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt tādṛśam eva vijñānam utpadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:36966: yadi tv ātmanaḥ tasyābhiprāyaviśeṣād viśiṣṭaṃ jñānam utpadyetety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36969: aniyamenāpi hy utpadyate gobuddher anantaraṃ strībhuddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36974: kāṇḍāt pattram evotpadyate na puṣpādy aṃkurādi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:36981: evam anena kasmān na nityaṃ sadṛśam evotpadyata ity yat pṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:36983: yat tu pṛṣṭaṃ na ca kramaniyameneti.
T07yabhkvyu:36989: strīcittāt stryālambanāc cittād anantaraṃ tasyāḥ striyāḥ kāyas tatkāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:36990: tatkāyasya vidūsāṇāyai yadi parivrājakasyānyasya vā sādhoś cittam utpannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36995: tad vānyatarad yad idaṃ tasmāt strīcittād anantam utpannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:36996: punaś ca kālāntareṇa saṃtatipariṇāmena strīcittam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:36997: tat paścād utpannaṃ strīcittaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 714) samarthaṃ bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatstrīkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā samarthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37000: tadkāyavidūsaṇācittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā gotraṃ bījam asyeti tadgotraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37007: strīcittāt tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittaṃ tatas tatpaticittaṃ tatas tatputracittaṃ tata eva ca tadduhitṛcittaṃ tata eva ca tadupakaraṇādicittaṃ utpannaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:37008: tataḥ strīcittād anaṃtarotpannebhyaś cittebhyo yad bahutaraṃ pravāhataḥ paṭutaraṃ śaktitaḥ āsannataraṃ vāsyotpādyasya cittasya.
T07yabhkvyu:37010: tadbhāvanāyā balīyastvāt tasya bahutarasya paṭutarasyāsannatarasya vā bhāvanāyā balavattaratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:37013: tasmād anyatra tasmād ṛta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37014: tad eva hy upapadyate yasya kāyo bāhyo vā pratyayaviṣaya uptiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:37016: yā bahutarasya paṭutarasya āsannatarasya vābhihitā saiva balīyasi bhāvanā.
T07yabhkvyu:37017: kasmān nityaṃ na phalati na hi tac cittaṃ nivartate.
T07yabhkvyu:37023: anyabhāvanāphalotpattau anyabhāvanāphalasya cittāntarasyotpattāv ānuguṇyān nityaṃ na phalati tad evety arthasaṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37032: idam asya kāraṇaṃ yenaivaṃ varṇaḥ evaṃ saṃniveśaḥ evaṃ snigdhateti.
T07yabhkvyu:37041: yena tat kāraṇaṃ jñāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37043: rūpakāraṇam api sarvathā jñātum aśakyaṃ kim arūpiṇām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37046: syān mataṃ tulye 'py ātmaprabhavatve cittotpatter ātmā kadācit karhicin manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣam apekṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:37047: ity ato na nityaṃ tādṛśam eva cittam utpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37053: na hi saṃyogo nāma bhāvaḥ kaścid asmākaṃ siddho 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:37072: tato lakṣaṇād aprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ saṃyoga iti manaḥsaṃcārād yaṃyaṃ śarīrapradeśaṃ manaḥ saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:37076: tathā ca sati niḥkriyatvam asya bādhitaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:37086: syān matam ātmanā pradeśena saṃyogo manasaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37087: ātmano vā pradeśena manasā saha saṃyogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37091: tasṃād aprāptipūrvakatve 'pi saṃyogasyāprāptenaivātmapradeśena manaḥ saṃyujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37097: abhyupetyāpi saṃyogaṃ tathāpi nirvikāratvād aviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37101: sa evopari codyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37102: kasmān na nityam īdṛśam evotpadyate cittam aviśiṣṭe ātmanīti.
T07yabhkvyu:37105: syān mataṃ nityam aviśiṣṭe 'py ātmani manasi ca saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣād ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād buddhiviśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37112: [sāntarbhavaś cittam astīty avivādaḥ] mama tava ca cittam astīty avivādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37113: [Tib.381a] saṃskāraviśeṣo 'py asti bhāvanāviśeṣalakṣaṇo yo 'sau vāsanā bījam iti vāsmābhir vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37118: kuhakenaikatareṇa vaidyena kasmaicit glānāyauṣadhaṃ dadānena cintitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37124: iti cintayitvā tad abhimaṃtrya phūḥ svāhā phūḥ svāheti janasya darśitam.
T07yabhkvyu:37126: tatra yathā kuhakavaidyaphūḥsvāhānām auṣadhakāryasiddhau sāmarthyaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:37130: saty ātmani tayoḥ saṃbhava iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:37145: yathā kuḍye citram ādhāryaṃ badaraṃ ca kuṇḍe.
T07yabhkvyu:37150: nāpi sa ātmā kuḍyavat kuṇḍavac cādhāro yuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37155: yathā citrabadarayoḥ kuḍyakuṇḍayoś cādhāryādhārabhāve pratighātitvam yutatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:37161: (Abhidh-k-vy 717) ko hi satpuruṣo gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nidhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:37162: na hi pṛthivī katamety ukte rūpagandharasasparśebhyo 'nyā darśayituṃ śakyate yathā rūpaṃ gandhādibhyo 'nyad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37164: katham ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gandhādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37169: [Tib.382a] viśeṣaṇārthaṃ ity abādibhyo viśeṣaṇārtham ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37190: sa eva baliṣṭhaḥ kasmān nityaṃ na phalatīty ācāryavacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37192: yo 'sya nyāyo yaḥ saṃskārasya nyāyo vināśaḥ pratibandho vā.
T07yabhkvyu:37200: smṛtisaṃskārecchādveṣādīnāṃ [Tib.382b] guṇapadārthatvāt tasya ca guṇapadārthasyāvaśyadravyāśritatvād dravyāśrayaś ca guṇavān ity evaṃ lakṣaṇopadeśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:37201: na caiṣām anya āśrayaḥ pṛthvyādiko yujyate 'parapratyakṣatvādhibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37215: rūpaskandhādīni paṃca skandhāni śrāmaṇyaphalāny asaṃskṛtaṃ ca ṣaṣṭham iti ṣaṭ dravyāṇi bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:37220: na hi te citrabadarādivad ādhārya iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:37226: na tv aham ity evam ākaraḥ pratyaya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37231: yathā goś caitraḥ katham asau tasyāḥ svāmī.
T07yabhkvyu:37233: kva ca punar ahaṃkāro viniyoktavyo yata etasya svāmi mṛgyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37238: sa eva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37248: puṣpito vṛkṣa iti dṛṣṭānto yatra siddhānte vṛkṣāvayavī neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37253: na hi vanaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:37254: yathā yasmin vane phalam utpannaṃ tat phalitam iti ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37255: yathā yasminn āśraye ṣaḍāyatanalakṣaṇe sukham utpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:37271: tasyāpy evaṃ tasya cittakāraṇasya svakāraṇaparataṃtrā vṛttir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37272: nāsti kasyacid api svātaṃtryaṃ kāyasya cittasya cittakāraṇasyānyasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:37277: ātmano 'pi ca nirapekṣasya buddhiviśeṣādyutpattāv akāraṇatvābhyupagamān na svātaṃtryaṃ sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:37284: sa evam api kartā na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37302: na hi kiṃcid ātmana upalabhyate samarthyam.
T07yabhkvyu:37312: pratighātitvayuktatvādidoṣān na vai sa evam āśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37315: tena bījenāhitaṃ tat sāmarthyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37321: eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ gurukarma pūrvakam iti tribhyas tat pūrvaṃ vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37322: āsannābhyastapūrvakṛtānām [Tib.384b] apy āsannaṃ pūrvam iti tat pūrvaṃ dvābhyāṃ vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37323: abhyastapūrvakṛtayoś cābhyastaṃ pūrvam iti ekasmāt pūrvaṃ vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37341: odanaṃ pacati saktuṃ pinaṣṭīti yathā bhāvinyā saṃjñayā vyapadeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37342: evaṃ pūrvako 'pi (Abhidh-k-vy 720) saṃtānaḥ aviklinnabījāvasthaḥ bījam ity ākhyāyate bhāvinyānayā saṃjñayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:37345: sa pūrvakaḥ saṃtāna iti kṛtvā bījam ity ākhyāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37351: yathā na phalād eva phalāntaram utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37354: evaṃ na vipākād eva vipākāntaram utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37361: na ca sa tasmāt punar anya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37362: na rasaraktaḥ kesaras tasmād uktāt kesarāt punar upajāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37364: prākṛta evāraktaḥ kesaras upajāyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37366: yathā lākṣārasaraktamātuluṃgapuṣpaphalād raktakesarān na raktaṃ kesarāntaraṃ punar bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:37367: evaṃ karmajād vipakān na punar vipākāntaram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37369: cittaṃ hy etad anantabījasahitaṃ saṃtānato vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:37370: tattad bījam upaiti puṣṭim udite sve pratyaye cetasi.|
T07yabhkvyu:37371: tat puṣṭaṃ drumalabdhavṛtti phaladaṃ kālena saṃpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37397: buddha eva tat sarvaṃ sarvathā prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:37401: etāṃ buddhānāṃ pravacanadharmatāṃ suvihitena hetor mārgeṇa hetumārgeṇa śuddhāṃ niravadyāṃ niśāmya dṛṣṭvā.
T07yabhkvyu:37406: vividhāni kudṛṣṭiceṣṭitān eṣām iti vividhakudṛṣṭiceṣṭitāḥ svargāpavargahetāv apratipanna mithyāpratipannāś cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37407: teṣām evaṃvidhānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kapilolūkādīnāṃ mataṃ darśanam apavidhya tyaktvā yāṃti saṃsārān nirvāṇam iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37409: atha vā tām eva pravacanadharmatāṃ yānti pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37410: pravacanadharmatā punar atra nairātmyaṃ buddhānuśāsani vā.
T07yabhkvyu:37415: yathoktaṃ sarva ime dharmā nirvāṇapravaṇāḥ nirvāṇaprāgbhārāḥ nirvāṇam evābhivadanto [Tib.386a] 'bhivadantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:37420: andhās tu bhramanty eva saṃsārārṇave nairātmyam apaśyantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37421: tad darśayann āha imāṃ hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37424: tasyaikā vartinīti nirvāṇapuraikamārgo nānyo mārga ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37430: tām imāṃ nirvāṇapuraikavartinīṃ tathāgatādityavaco'ṃśubhāsvatīṃ vivṛtām api nirātmatāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37431: prajñācakṣuṣo viśadasyābhāvād avidyākośapaṭalaparyavanaddhanetratvād vā mandacakṣuḥ tīrthiko vātsīputrīyo 'pi vā nekṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:37438: caturbhiś ca kāraṇair mārgo na vidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37443: teṣām ihaikam eva kāraṇam asya mārgasyādarśana uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:37444: yato draṣṭur doṣeṇaivāyaṃ mārgo na dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:37446: yata eṣa mandacakṣur etaṃ na paśyatīty avagantavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:37451: dik pramāṇam asyeti diṅmātram iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:37462: yathā visaṃ svasāmarthyād vraṇadeśaṃ prāpya sarveṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣv atyantaṃ visarpatīti matvā kenacit tasya vraṇadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:37465: ity atas teṣāṃ sumedhasām udghaṭitajñānāṃ prājñānām idam upadiṣṭaṃ mayā.
T07yabhkvyu:37471: iti diṅmātram evedam iti idam eva nairātmyaprativedham adhikṛtyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:37484: sa imāṃ kṛtavān vyākhyāṃ vyākhyāsv anyāsv asaṃtuṣṭaḥ.||
T07yabhkvyu:37487: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyāṃ sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyām aṣṭamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptam iti.
